title: DETECTING AND MONITORING OXYGEN-RELATED EVENTS IN HEMODIALYSIS PATIENTS
abstract_text: The present teachings include analyzing oxygen saturation levels sensed during a hemodialysis treatment for a patient to determine whether the patient has a medical condition based on hypoxemia, apnea, or the like experienced during the treatment. To this end, the present teachings may include the use of a machine-learning algorithm trained to identify a presence of a high-frequency intermittent pattern that would be formed in a plot of the oxygen saturation levels, e.g., to determine a severity of respiratory instability experienced. The present teaching may also or instead include a time-series analysis including at least one of: (i) calculating recurrence-based quantification, such as, but not limited to, recurrence rate, determinism, and laminarity; (ii) calculating the optimal recurrence threshold based on maximum variations of the system's determinism and degree of predictability; and (iii) calculating complexity-based measures such as permutation entropy. Such analyses may be used to detect, inter-alia, sleep apnea syndrome.

title: A METHOD OF TEACHING A SCREW ASSEMBLY LOCATION BASED ON A DEEP LEARNING AUTOMATICALLY AN APPARATUS OF TEACHING A SCREW ASSEMBLY LOCATION BASED ON A DEEP LEARNING AUTOMATICALLY AND MEDIUM OF STORITNG A PROGRAM TEACHING A SCREW ASSEMBLY LOCATION BASED ON A DEEP LEARNING AUTOMATICALLY
abstract_text: 실시예들에 따른 딥러닝 기반 스크류 체결 위치 자동화 티칭 방법은 이미지를 획득하는 단계; 이미지에 대한 전처리를 수행하는 단계; 이미지를 탐색하는 단계; 이미지로부터 스크류 체결 영역을 추출하는 단계; 추출된 이미지에 대한 전처리를 수행하는 단계; 스크류 체결 영역으로부터 홀 영역을 추출하는 단계; 및 홀 영역에 대한 좌표를 저장하는 단계; 를 포함할 수 있다.

title: HANDWRITING TEACHING SYSTEM AND METHOD BASED ON AI EDGE COMPUTING
applicants: NATIONAL PENGHU UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY [TW]

title: Method for determining a torque for an operation of a robot using a model and method for teaching the model
abstract_text: A method for determining a torque for an operation of a robot that includes multiple components, using a model of the robot. Two components of the robot being movable using an actuator relative to one another at a connection point. The model maps parameters for the connection points onto a torque for the respective actuator. The method includes: providing values for the parameters including: a position or an angle a velocity, and an acceleration of the respective actuator; determining a value for the rigid body partial torque, the friction partial torque, and the machine learning partial torque, based on the values of the parameters and the model; determining a value of the torque of the respective actuator based on the values of the partial torques, and providing the value of the torque for the respective actuator for use during the operation, control or regulating of the robot.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER READABLE MEDIUM
abstract_text: An information processing apparatus includes a processor configured to: extract a feature quantity regarding one or more ongoing projects; input the feature quantity extracted from the one or more ongoing projects to a prediction model, to predict a project that is to have a final outcome of failure among the one or more ongoing projects, the prediction model having been subjected to machine learning using, as teaching data, a feature quantity of a past project having a final outcome of failure and the final outcome of failure; and give a warning for the project predicted to have a final outcome of failure.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INCREASING CONTENT INSERTION OPPORTUNITIES VIA MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for increasing content insertion opportunities. A prediction input is received that characterizes utilization of content stream utilization channels (CSUCs). Schedule parameters are automatically predicted for the prediction input using prediction models obtained via machine learning based on grouped historic data related to CSUCs, where grouping is based on an operational mode in which the prediction models operate. Using the predicted schedule parameters, insertion opportunity may be identified with respect to CSUCs and insertion schedules are generated specifying insertions of content streams into identified CSUCs at respective insertion times.

title: METHOD FOR TEACHING AN ELECTRONIC COMPUTING DEVICE, A COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT, A COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AS WELL AS AN ELECTRONIC COMPUTING DEVICE
abstract_text: A method for teaching an electronic computing device includes at least a machine learning algorithm for predicting a position-based propagation of radio waves in an environment, including the steps of: providing a mathematical model for the position-based propagation, wherein the mathematical model includes at least a physical model for the position-based propagation in the environment generating training data for the machine learning algorithm including a propagation field and/or a propagation domain; training the machine learning algorithm by fitting the training data to a partial derivative of the machine learning algorithm; and obtaining a prediction of a propagation loss by a weighted sum of multiple evaluations of the trained machine learning algorithm. Furthermore, provided is a computer program product, a computer-readable storage medium as well as an electronic computing device.

title: Artificial intelligence class course case intelligent recommendation method and system
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence class course case intelligent recommendation method and system, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining and screening M cases related to an artificial intelligence class course, and obtaining N cases; performing knowledge point labeling on S cases in the N cases; training a multi-classifier according to the result; performing knowledge point labeling on the remaining N-S cases in the N cases by adopting a multi-classifier; constructing a knowledge graph for the knowledge points of the artificial intelligence class curriculums by adopting an open source knowledge graph tool; constructing a case model according to the N cases and the knowledge graph; training and testing the case model; and according to the target knowledge point, recommending a case corresponding to the target knowledge point. According to the method, high-quality artificial intelligence course case recommendation service can be provided for teachers, the course fusion effect is good, the problems of shallow fusion and difficult fusion are solved, the workload of the teachers is reduced, and the teaching content can be enriched.

title: Teaching data analysis system and method based on big data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent analysis, and particularly discloses a teaching data analysis system and method based on big data, and the system employs an artificial intelligence technology based on a deep neural network model to obtain a speech signal of a teacher in a preset time period and a monitoring video of a class behavior of the teacher. The method comprises the following steps of: after performing Fourier transform on a voice signal, capturing a local mode and a local structure of a frequency domain feature through a feature extractor comprising a first convolutional layer and a second convolutional layer; emphasizing the time period with the most information amount in the monitored video and extracting the key spatial features of the teaching behavior of the teacher through a time attention mechanism and a spatial attention convolutional network, and fusing to obtain a classification result for representing whether the teacher has improper speech or not in the class. In this way, feature extraction and classification can be carried out on the voice signals and the class behaviors of the teachers to judge whether the teachers have improper speech or not in class, and the teaching performance of the teachers can be monitored and evaluated.

title: SLEEP STATE PREDICTION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A sleep state prediction system includes a phase coherence acquisition device that acquires phase coherence calculated based on a difference in an instantaneous phase between a variation in a heartbeat interval and a breathing pattern; at least one of a body movement information acquisition device that acquires body movement information, a heartbeat information acquisition device that acquires heartbeat information from the animal simultaneously with the variation, and a respiratory information acquisition device that acquires respiratory information; and a sleep state prediction device that includes a sleep state prediction model, which is established through machine learning with sleep stages assessed by polysomnography on the animal as teaching data and at least 2 sets of data out 4 parameters of phase coherence, body movement, heartbeat, and respiration respectively obtained from bio-vibration signals acquired simultaneously during the polysomnography as input data, mandatorily including the phase coherence.

title: TEACHING DEVICE, TEACHING METHOD, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT
abstract_text: According to an embodiment, a teaching device includes: an acquisition unit configured to acquire first input data; an estimation unit configured to estimate a first estimation result from the first input data, using a machine learning model; a search unit configured to search for a second taught estimation result taught for second input data, the second taught estimation result being associated with at least one of the second input data similar to the first input data, and a second estimation result similar to the first estimation result and estimated from the second input data, using the machine learning model; and a selection unit configured to select one selection candidate among a plurality of selection candidates including the first estimation result and the second taught estimation result, as a correction target estimation result to be used for correction of the first estimation result.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching aid vehicle with positioning structure
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence teaching aid vehicle with the positioning structure comprises a vehicle body, a first groove body and a second groove body are formed in one side and the other side of the vehicle body respectively, a positioning mechanism is installed in the first groove body, and installation blocks are fixedly connected to the front portion and the rear portion between the upper ends of the first groove body and the second groove body. A positioning mechanism is mounted in a first groove in the vehicle body, a cover plate is rotatably connected between the two mounting blocks through a first rotating shaft, pulleys are rotatably connected to the front portion and the rear portion of one side of the vehicle body through second rotating shafts, and sleeve plates are fixedly connected to the outer sides of the two second rotating shafts in a sleeving mode. The sleeve plate is arranged on the second rotating shaft provided with the pulley, and the clamping plate of the positioning mechanism is clamped on the sleeve plate in use, so that the second rotating shaft is difficult to drive the pulley to rotate, it is guaranteed that the whole teaching aid is difficult to move on the ground, and a teacher or a student can conveniently take down the teaching aid from the vehicle body.

title: Adaptive learning system and method based on deep learning principle
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to an adaptive learning system and method based on a deep learning principle. The system comprises an interaction module, a user data storage module, a learning resource storage module, a learning analysis module and a pushing module. According to the embodiment of the invention, for historical learning data of a user, target content data to be learned and interactive data generated by real-time interaction, which are collected by the system, the learning analysis module fuses the data and the content of the learning resource storage module, and the fused data are used as data input of the learning analysis module; further, deep learning analysis and modeling are implemented, and finally, course content data and teaching modes are output to a content pushing module for a user to learn. By means of the system, the time for the user to actively input into the learning process in the learning process and the quantifiable learning effect within unit time can be fed back and fully improved, and the identifiable critical thinking learning effect of the user and the frequency and effect of participating in practice cooperation are improved.

title: Control system and method of intelligent teaching loudspeaker box
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent control, and particularly discloses a control system and method of an intelligent teaching loudspeaker box, which uses an artificial intelligence technology based on a deep learning model to perform feature extraction and coding on an audio signal so as to obtain a classification result that the intensity of noise reduction is increased or decreased. In this way, more accurate and effective noise reduction processing is realized by adaptively adjusting the noise reduction intensity, and better audio experience is provided.

title: Teaching device, teaching method, and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to a teaching apparatus, a teaching method, and a storage medium. An acquisition unit (20A) of a teaching device (10) acquires first input data. The estimation unit (20B) estimates a first estimation result from the first input data using the machine learning model (90). The search unit (20C) searches for a second taught estimation result taught for second input data, the second taught estimation result being associated with at least one of second input data similar to the first input data and a second estimation result similar to the first estimation result and estimated from the second input data using the machine learning model (90). A selection unit (20D) selects one of a plurality of selection candidates including the first estimation result and the second taught estimation result as a correction target estimation result for correcting the first estimation result.

title: Educational administration management interaction method and system based on AI smart campus
applicants: GUANGZHOU AVCIT ELECTRONICS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching office, and discloses an educational administration interaction method and system based on an AI smart campus, the system comprises a server capable of integrating calculation processing data, the server is externally provided with classroom electronic equipment, the classroom electronic equipment comprises a plurality of blackboard writing cameras, a plurality of student cameras and a plurality of computer PPT audios, the blackboard-writing camera, the student camera and the computer PPT audio are connected with the server in a WIFI/Ethernet/GPRS mode. According to the teaching affair management interaction method and system based on the AI smart campus, through cooperation of the server, the blackboard writing camera, the student camera and the computer PPT audio, indoor blackboard writing content, student learning states and computer teaching PPT audio content data are conveniently collected and transmitted to the server, conditions in a classroom are monitored and managed in an omnibearing and centralized manner, and the teaching affair management interaction system is convenient to use and high in practicability. The teaching affair management quality is improved, and the teaching affair management interaction method and system can be conveniently used for teaching affair management.

title: LEARNING PLATFORM WITH INTEGRATED ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)
abstract_text: This present utility model pertains to a learning platform with integrated Artificial Intelligence (AI) and would be applied in the area of vocational education and remote learning. The learning platform with integrated AI according to the present utility model includes a web server (1) which hosts a database of learning materials in video, textual and presentation format, wherein said web server has two-way links over the internet to user devices (2), to a data server (3) and to a teacher’s computer (4). Said teacher’s computer (4) has two-way links to said user devices (2) and data server (3). The data server (3) has two-way links to GPU (graphics processing unit) modules (5) and to said user devices (2) which are laptops and/or tablets. Said learning platform with integrated Artificial Intelligence helps improve the quality of teaching and of the learning material as well as the efficiency of the assessment process by enabling the development of individualized analyses of test results.

title: Resource library control method and system of intelligent teaching platform
applicants: GUANGZHOU LANFAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching platforms, in particular to a resource library control method and system for an intelligent teaching platform, and the method comprises the steps: collecting teaching materials through each front-end platform, storing the teaching materials in a resource library, classifying the teaching materials in the resource library according to subjects and teachers, constructing multi-level information association through the classified teaching materials in the resource library, and storing the classified teaching materials in the resource library. Association in the multi-level teaching data is screened according to a matching algorithm, the association information is accurately pushed to the teaching platform, the innovation thinking ability of students is cultivated through cross experiments, the learning interest is stimulated, the innovation spirit and innovation consciousness of the students are cultivated, and the students are guided to perform active scientific research and exploration; and subjective and objective question group analysis is carried out by using artificial intelligence, personalized automatic setting for students is realized, time and space limitations are broken, and a teaching mode open to the students in all directions is realized.

title: Student growth evaluation system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NANJING GREEN IOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based student growth evaluation system and method, and belongs to the field of data processing systems for management purposes, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a prediction network model of which the input is environmental data and the output is a student average attention judgment value and a student average motion judgment value, inputting real-time environmental data, and carrying out the prediction network model; and outputting a predicted real-time student average attention judgment value and a student average action judgment value, and importing the attention judgment value, the action judgment value, the student average attention judgment value and the student average action judgment value obtained by calculation into a score evaluation strategy to evaluate the student growth score. And transmitting the student condition of which the student growth score evaluation is greater than or equal to the set score to parents and teaching personnel, and reminding the parents and the teaching personnel to pay attention to the abnormal condition of the student so as to accurately judge the learning and living states of the student.

title: Circuit breaker digital twinning practical training system
applicants: HULUDAO POWER SUPPLY CO STATE GRID LIAONING ELECTRIC POWER CO LTD
STATE GRID LIAONING ELECTRIC POWER SUPPLY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a circuit breaker digital twinning practical training system in the power field. Comprising a control system, fault setting, digital twinning and safety protection. The control system comprises a hardware platform and a software platform; the fault setting comprises element abnormity and line abnormity; the digital twinning comprises state detection, visual teaching and protection measurement and control; safety protection comprises electric shock protection and mechanical protection. According to the invention, based on the digital twinning related technology, the technical means of artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things and intelligent electronic equipment are fused, the problems of difficult state evaluation, difficult fault detection and trend prediction of the circuit breaker are solved, and the functions of real-time twinning perception, fault autonomous research and judgment, multi-dimensional state evaluation and intelligent negotiation adaptation are realized. The circuit breaker working condition change trend is estimated, the periodic off-line evaluation frequency is reduced, the fault studying and judging efficiency is improved, the power failure time is shortened, the operation reliability of power grid equipment is improved, and the voltage drop of the circuit breaker fault removal time is 70% or above. The circuit breaker digital twinning training system is suitable for application.

title: AI simulation teaching method and system based on image processing
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of image processing, in particular to an AI simulation teaching method and system based on image processing, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining frame-by-frame grayscale images of a teaching video, obtaining the motion blur characteristic quantity of a pixel point according to the gray value change condition of the pixel point at the same position in a plurality of frames of grayscale images, and obtaining the motion blur characteristic quantity of the pixel point; obtaining correlation vectors of the pixel points in combination with the gradient directions of the pixel points, obtaining the dynamic degree of each block according to the correlation vectors of all the pixel points in each block, and obtaining motion characteristic quantities of the pixel points according to the correlation vectors of the pixel points and other pixel points in eight neighborhoods of the pixel points and the dynamic degree of the block where the pixel points are located; and dividing the current frame grayscale image into a plurality of categories according to the motion characteristic quantity, and performing blind deconvolution on each category of image to obtain a current frame deblurred grayscale image. According to the method, the influence of motion blur caused by teacher action changes in the teaching video on the definition of the teaching video is eliminated, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Detector control device, detector control method and detector
abstract_text: Provided are a probe control device, a probe control method, and a probe that make it possible to more accurately predict the tip position of a probe. A probe control device for bringing a probe into contact with a semiconductor chip is provided with: an input data acquisition unit for acquiring input data including temperature data of at least one of a probe card and a card holder; a prediction unit that, on the basis of the input data acquired by the input data acquisition unit, predicts the tip position of the probe using a prediction model that uses the input data as an input and the tip position of the probe as an output; and a determination unit that, prior to the prediction by the prediction unit, determines whether or not the prediction by the prediction unit can be performed on the basis of input data used as teaching data in machine learning of the prediction model and the input data acquired by the input data acquisition unit.

title: Classroom learning condition display method and system and readable storage medium
applicants: BEIJING ZONEKEY MODERN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom learning condition display method and system and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of education. The method comprises the following steps: displaying a classroom learning condition display picture according to learning condition indexes, a classroom scene and student behavior distribution, wherein the classroom learning condition display picture comprises a first area, a second area, a third area and an indication line; displaying a learning condition index graph in the first area, wherein the learning condition index graph is a time-varying graphical representation of learning condition indexes; displaying a classroom scene graph in the second area, wherein the classroom scene graph is a graphical representation of a time-varying sequence of classroom scenes in the teaching process; displaying a student behavior distribution diagram in the third area, wherein the student behavior distribution diagram is a time-varying graphical representation of student behavior distribution; the indication lines are used for indicating the information of the first area, the second area or the third area to interpret the teaching process. Therefore, the analysis capability of AI on classroom learning condition data is improved, the presentation mode of the data is improved, and the capability of guiding teachers to interpret the teaching process is enhanced.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Intelligent teaching controller
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent teaching controller. The intelligent teaching controller comprises an online centralized teaching module, an intelligent teaching system, an offline autonomous learning module and a base station module, wherein the intelligent teaching system is used for planning learning paths for students according to offline learning states; the base station module is used for collecting position information of a teaching object; the base station module is also used for supervising the teaching object and at least supervising whether the teaching object operates the learning equipment; the online centralized teaching module carries out unified teaching on all teaching objects; the teaching modes of the online centralized teaching module for the teaching objects at least comprise the teaching of the same mode for all the teaching objects and the independent pointing teaching for different teaching objects; the intelligent teaching system designs at least one learning scheme for different teaching objects; different teaching objects autonomously select or replace different learning schemes through the offline autonomous learning module. According to the invention, the base station module is established and has moderate monitoring strength, so that the position information of a teaching object is monitored and whether the teaching object operates learning equipment is supervised at the same time; through the arrangement of the online centralized teaching module and the intelligent teaching system, a more flexible teaching idea is provided, and an intelligent learning method can be conveniently applied to learning by means of the machine learning module. The arrangement of the offline autonomous learning module facilitates the selection of the learning methods of the teaching object, that is, the learning method which is directly recommended can be selected from the recommendation module, and the learning method which is considered to be suitable for the teaching object can also be selected from the recommendation module.

title: Experiment table teaching system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN DINGZHIHUI TEACHING EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of experiment teaching equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based experiment table teaching system, which comprises an experiment table, an operation module, a voice processing module and a voice control module, and is characterized in that the operation module is arranged on the experiment table and is used for teaching experiment demonstration; the voice processing module is used for performing voice input and voice processing, and generating a feature signal after voice processing is completed; the voice control module is in signal connection with the voice processing module; the operation module is in signal connection with the voice control module. An operation demonstration experiment of a teacher is separated from a theory teaching experiment, that is, the experiment table teaching system carries out the operation demonstration experiment, the teacher synchronously carries out the theory teaching experiment, and students can also synchronously follow the experiment table teaching system to carry out actual demonstration, in the process, the teacher can switch between theory teaching and patrol supervision, and the teaching efficiency is improved. Therefore, the safe operation of the experiment environment is ensured, and the teaching efficiency is greatly improved.

title: Method and system for recommending teaching resources in fused education field based on knowledge graph
applicants: ZHONGKE LETING INTELLIGENT TECH JINAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a knowledge graph-based fused education field teaching resource recommendation method and system. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a teaching resource knowledge graph according to teaching resources and type labels of the teaching resources; if it is judged that the to-be-recommended user is a new user, resource click historical records of all old users are obtained, non-clicked resources are searched through keywords, the total click score and the total search non-click score of each teaching resource are calculated, and therefore the epidemic score of each resource is calculated; selecting the resources of which the epidemic scores exceed a set threshold value as recommendation resource seeds of the to-be-recommended user; and querying teaching resource entities with the same labels as the recommended resource seeds in a teaching resource knowledge graph, and recommending the recommended resource seeds and the teaching resource entities with the same labels to the to-be-recommended user. According to the invention, the threshold that teachers in common schools need children to obtain teaching resources in education and teaching is reduced, and the working pressure of the teachers in the common schools is reduced.

title: Magnetic control micro-robot, autonomous navigation system and teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a magnetic control micro robot, an autonomous navigation system and a teaching system, an ultrasonic probe and a magnetic drive device are fixed at the tail end of a multi-degree-of-freedom moving mechanism together to form a teaching device, and a controller of an autonomous navigation model based on a deep neural network is arranged to form the teaching system. Images of the micro-robot and the environment where the micro-robot is located and pose information of the magnetic drive device are monitored in real time; taking the image as input and the pose information as a label, constructing samples, collecting a plurality of samples in real time to form a training set, and training the autonomous navigation model; in the autonomous navigation process, images captured by visual equipment are input into the trained autonomous navigation model, a pose adjustment control instruction is obtained, the pose of the magnetic drive device is adjusted, and autonomous navigation is achieved. In-vitro high-precision control of the magnetic robot can be achieved, the method is high in universality for different application scenes, and application of artificial intelligence in the field of magnetic control robot control is greatly promoted.

title: Non-verbal behavior recognition method and device based on text graph data enhancement model
abstract_text: The invention provides a non-verbal behavior recognition method and device based on a text graph data enhancement model, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education application, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-recognized original image, inputting the to-be-recognized original image to a pre-trained text graph data enhancement model, outputting a to-be-recognized full-classroom teaching scene graph; wherein the text graph data enhancement model comprises a stable diffusion sub-model and a control network sub-model; taking the to-be-recognized original image and the to-be-recognized full-classroom teaching scene graph as an original data set, inputting the original data set into a pre-trained non-speech behavior recognition model, and outputting a recognized non-speech behavior; wherein the non-speech behavior recognition model is obtained by training a convolutional neural network based on a historical original image and a historical full-classroom teaching scene graph. Through the method provided by the invention, high accuracy of non-speech behavior recognition is ensured.

title: Intelligent teaching assisting system and algorithm for multi-modal oral English learning and evaluation analysis
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent teaching assisting system and algorithm, in particular to an intelligent teaching assisting system and algorithm for multi-mode oral English learning and evaluation analysis. The oral English teaching assisting robot aims to solve the problems that an existing oral English teaching assisting robot is simple in structure, single in function, only capable of detecting sound signals of a testee and incapable of testing, evaluating or simulating examination room functions. The intelligent teaching assisting system comprises a loudspeaker, a display, a controller, a camera and a microphone, the loudspeaker is used for outputting correct voice, the display is used for outputting correct lip language actions, the controller is used for controlling the intelligent teaching assisting system to carry out voice and lip language detection, analysis and judgment, the camera is used for lip language action input, and the microphone is used for voice input. The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence.

title: Intelligent combined conveying line system
applicants: JIANGSU HAIDU EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an intelligent combined conveying line system, which performs deep learning of various conveying modes through various conveying modes, various transmission mechanisms, various motion control and diversified combination, and simulates an industrial actual conveying environment so as to achieve teaching demonstration learning effects. The conveying line comprises a conveying line main body, the conveying line main body comprises a system cabinet body, a connecting frame, an electrical board and a maintenance observation door, the connecting frame is arranged on the upper layer of the system cabinet body, the electrical board is arranged in the system cabinet body, and the upper surface of the system cabinet body is open so that external equipment and the electrical board can be connected and arranged conveniently; the bottom of each set of intelligent conveying line is provided with a structure correspondingly and fixedly installed with the connecting frame.

title: METHOD FOR LEARNING MAPPING
abstract_text: A mapping, which is as a subject of learning, is a learning model that uses a sound signal as an input variable and outputs a variable indicating the cause of a sound in a vehicle. A learning method includes a signal correction process that corrects a sound signal by superimposing a noise signal on the sound signal, and an update process that updates the mapping through machine learning in which the sound signal corrected in the signal correction process serves as training data and a cause of a sound paired with the sound signal serves as teaching data.

title: Female pelvic floor ultrasonic model and application thereof
applicants: YANTAI NEW OLD ENERGY CONVERSION RESEARCH INSTITUTE AND TECH ACHIEVEMENT TRANSFER DEMONSTRATION BASE
abstract_text: The invention relates to a female pelvic floor ultrasonic model and application thereof, the female pelvic floor ultrasonic model comprises a processing unit, an image input unit, an output unit, an AI training unit, a virtual reality equipment system and a display, and the input end of the processing unit is electrically connected with the image input unit. The female pelvic floor ultrasonic model can be widely applied to the field of gynecological diagnosis and treatment teaching, an immersive female pelvic floor ultrasonic model is constructed by combining a virtual reality technology and an ultrasonic detection technology, a learner can observe and diagnose pelvic floor tissues in a virtual environment, and the learning efficiency is improved. The influence of interference factors in traditional ultrasonic examination is avoided, the practical operation experience is improved through sedimentation in the learning process, the diagnosis accuracy and efficiency are further improved, the diagnosis and treatment quality and efficiency are improved, the real environment and use mode can be simulated through the virtual reality equipment system and the female abdomen simulation model, and the diagnosis and treatment efficiency is improved. A user can carry out virtual practical operation more truly, and interactivity and experience feeling are enhanced.

title: Auxiliary artificial intelligence teaching aid
applicants: TAOLI TECH INNOVATION SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an auxiliary intelligent artificial teaching aid which comprises a teacher's desk body, a display board and a lifting device. The teacher's desk body comprises a desk top, a square groove is formed in the desk top, the display board can be arranged in the square groove, a mounting box is fixedly connected to the lower portion of the desk top, a connecting box is fixedly connected to the lower side of the display board, and the connecting box is slidably connected into the mounting box in the vertical direction; the lifting device comprises two screws, a motor and a lifting block, the two screws are vertically and rotationally connected into the mounting box, the lifting block is slidably connected into the mounting box in the vertical direction, the lifting block is in threaded connection with the screws, the motor is fixedly connected into the mounting box, an output shaft of the motor is fixed to the screws, and push blocks are fixedly connected to the two sides of the connecting box correspondingly; the upper side of the lifting block can abut against the lower side of the push block, and a plurality of fixing rods are fixedly connected into the mounting box. The teaching aid provided by the invention can push the push block upwards to enable the display board to move upwards, facilitates the display of the content on the display board, facilitates the watching of students in the back row, and guarantees the teaching quality.

title: Teaching behavior analysis method for intelligent teaching application
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a teaching behavior analysis method for intelligent teaching application, and the method comprises the steps: S1, collecting teacher behavior data which comprises specific teaching behaviors; s2, dividing the teacher behavior data into a plurality of teaching modes according to the diversity and frequency of specific teaching behaviors; s3, performing behavior path analysis and behavior pattern analysis by adopting a lagging sequence algorithm and a Louvain algorithm respectively; and S4, performing visualization and interactive output based on the teaching mode and the analysis result, and providing behavior description, suggestion and early warning for the teacher. According to the method, the cross dependency relationship in the complex interaction behaviors in the teaching process is concerned, the behavior modes of different teachers are identified and classified, and the specific teaching behaviors in the intelligent teaching application are analyzed in combination with the actual log data generated when the teachers use the intelligent teaching application in teaching.

title: Network video teaching interaction method based on artificial intelligence model
abstract_text: Along with continuous development of network science and society, network video teaching gradually becomes a popular learning mode, the network video teaching has certain limitation in the aspect of teacher-student interaction, students can have the problem of untimely reply when asking questions to teachers, and the teachers also have relatively less teaching feedback, so that the teaching quality is influenced. Therefore, the invention provides a video teaching interaction method based on an artificial intelligence model. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, establishing an artificial intelligence model for teaching by utilizing an existing artificial intelligence large model, deploying the artificial intelligence model to a server, secondly, analyzing a teaching video and a teaching outline uploaded by a teacher to construct a training set, and finally, adjusting answer random degree parameters of an API (Application Program Interface) to form a virtual teacher. And the virtual teacher quickly replies the questions of the students, collects the questions of each student, arranges the questions into classroom teaching feedback, and feeds back the classroom teaching feedback to the teacher, so that the teaching quality is improved.

title: Basic education promotion system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a basic education promotion system based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of education informatization. The system comprises an external information sensing module, a sensing memory module, a working memory module, a long-time memory module, an activation condition module, an acquisition condition module, a consolidation condition module, a migration condition module, a quantitative data processing module and a result visualization module. The quantitative data processing module comprises an SPSS analysis module, a DINA cognitive diagnosis module, an analytic hierarchy process module and a multi-face Rasch module. The method is high in operability, helps to improve the teaching ability and professional level of teachers, and scientifically promotes the improvement of the basic education quality.

title: Cost reducing and efficiency increasing system and method based on AI
applicants: WUHAN WANMU HEALTH TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI-based cost-reducing and efficiency-increasing system and a method thereof, and relates to the technical field of AI cost-reducing and efficiency-increasing. The AI-based cost reduction and efficiency improvement system comprises an intelligent medical education system, the intelligent medical education system is connected with an effect enhancement system and an intelligent control system, and the effect enhancement system comprises a credibility enhancement system, a data auditing system, a data balancing system, a transparency system and a data privacy security system. And the credibility enhancement system, the data auditing system, the data balancing system, the transparency system and the data privacy security system are connected to the intelligent control system. Through the medical education and medical cost-reducing and efficiency-improving system based on artificial intelligence, the system can assist a medical education institution and a medical institution to improve teaching and clinical working efficiency and effectively reduce the operation cost, and manual judgment intervention and AI intelligent correction are fused, so that the accuracy of artificial intelligence judgment is improved, and the medical cost-reducing and efficiency-improving system is suitable for popularization and application. And the working intensity and the medical teaching system cost are reduced.

title: Teaching auxiliary system for pronunciation training and method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching assistance system and method for pronunciation training, and relates to the field of intelligent assistance, and the system employs an artificial intelligence technology based on a deep neural network model, obtains a pronunciation voice signal and an oscillogram of the pronunciation voice signal, carries out the feature extraction through a convolutional neural network model, and then carries out the spatial correlation. And obtaining a classification result for representing whether the pronunciation is accurate or not. Therefore, objective feedback can be provided, students can be helped to understand their pronunciation problems, and training and improvement can be carried out in a targeted manner.

title: Multi-platform knowledge graph fusion method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a multi-platform knowledge graph fusion method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: embedding a knowledge graph construction component into a teaching platform to construct a content resource layer, and the knowledge graph construction component is an artificial intelligence technology and knowledge graph editing tool and is used for sorting teaching resources in the teaching platform. Based on the content resource layer, a plurality of different functional components are embedded into the teaching platform to construct the teaching application layer, and the plurality of different functional components integrate the learning functions of a plurality of different teaching platforms. Based on the content resource layer and the teaching application layer, a data analysis component is embedded into the teaching platform to construct a data analysis layer, and the data analysis component is used for tracking and analyzing teaching resources. According to the method, a knowledge graph construction component, a plurality of learning components and a data analysis component are embedded into a teaching platform, so that the knowledge graph is integrated into the existing teaching platform, and unification and standardization of operation data of the teaching platform are realized.

title: Intelligent operation and maintenance artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: BEIJING HONGSHAN INFORMATION TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent operation and maintenance artificial intelligence teaching platform in the technical field of intelligent teaching, which comprises a teaching platform, an intelligent learning module, a virtual test module, a knowledge sharing module and an automatic evaluation module, the virtual experiment environment is used for simulating operation and maintenance experiments in a real scene and providing real-time guidance and feedback, the knowledge sharing platform is used for communication and knowledge sharing between students and teachers, and the automatic evaluation system is used for automatically evaluating student homework and experiment reports. The intelligent operation and maintenance artificial intelligence teaching platform has the advantages that the limitation of a traditional teaching mode is solved, an effective tool is provided for cultivating and promoting intelligent operation and maintenance talents, and the intelligent operation and maintenance artificial intelligence teaching platform is based on the cloud computing technology, combines virtual reality and augmented reality technologies and provides an omnibearing teaching environment.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are an apparatus and a method for presenting an evaluation score of teaching data and necessary teaching data to a user in an easily understandable manner in a configuration for performing learning using the teaching data. A teaching data execution unit generates, as learning data, movement position information about the robot and an image captured by an imaging device according to movement of the robot by a user operation based on the teaching data, and a learning unit performs machine learning by inputting the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit, and generating a teaching data set including the images and the robot motion rules as learning result data. The feedback information generation unit inputs the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit and the learning result data generated by the learning unit, performs evaluation of the teaching data, and generates and outputs numerical feedback information and visual feedback information based on an evaluation result.

title: Course ability achievement degree analysis method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a course ability achievement degree analysis method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: sorting knowledge maps in a teaching platform based on teaching resources in the teaching platform, so as to construct a basic course; based on the basic course, a professional support system is built in the course platform, and the professional support system is obtained by structuring professional ability indexes according to the training scheme. And an AI course is constructed based on the knowledge graph to obtain a course knowledge graph, and the course knowledge graph is used for complete course teaching design and new-form AI course construction. And according to requirements of engineering education authentication, learning data of each stage of the user is operated in combination with an AI course, and a corresponding course and a corresponding course ability achievement degree analysis report are output. According to the method, a school is helped to collect engineering authentication and verification data in advance and automatically give an evaluation analysis report through platform construction, so that time waste caused by collection of multiple data is avoided, and time cost is saved.

title: Natural language understanding method based on deep learning and AI teaching assisting system
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHIZHIQUAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a natural language understanding method based on deep learning and an intelligent teaching assistant system.The method comprises the steps that firstly, a knowledge database and a question database are constructed, learning material documents are stored in the knowledge database, and preprocessed natural language information is stored in the question database; then, learning and understanding the natural language information in the question database, searching knowledge points related to the natural language information in the knowledge database according to the understanding content, selecting learning materials corresponding to the optimally matched knowledge points as samples to reply the natural language information, and generating a record including questions, replies and evaluations; storing the data in a knowledge database; and finally, generating replies in various forms, and outputting the replies according to corresponding requirements. And the effects of saving more computing resources, improving the efficiency, and realizing multi-user real-time use and non-interference are achieved. And the user interaction practicability and the information transmission efficiency are improved.

title: Student offline teaching management method based on platform data feature matching
applicants: HEFEI JIUXUEWANG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of student teaching management, and discloses a student offline teaching management method based on platform data feature matching, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the statistics and numbering of offline teaching websites and online learning students, learning target formulation, learning resource preparation and data collection, enabling a teaching platform to collect various data features of the students, and carrying out the recognition of the students. Comprising learning habits, hobbies and interests, learning ability evaluation, student archives and other information, feature matching, and feature extraction and matching of student data by using a machine learning algorithm or a data mining technology. According to the invention, through data feature matching, personalized education service and support can be provided for each student according to the feature model of the student, and teaching management can be adjusted and customized according to factors such as learning habits, hobbies and interests, learning ability and the like of the student so as to meet learning requirements of the student to the greatest extent; and matching is performed according to characteristics of different students to complete specific teaching, so that personalized education is realized.

title: ADJUSTABLE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE HIGHER EDUCATION DEVICE
abstract_text: The present invention discloses an adjustable artificial intelligence higher education device, which relates to the technical field of teaching appliances. The adjustable artificial intelligence higher education device comprises a loading shell, the bottom of the loading shell is fixedly connected with an anti-topple shell, opening a telescopic rod, the telescopic rod drives a concave block for lifting movement, and the concave block drives a whiteboard I and a whiteboard II for lifting movement, so as to achieve automatic lifting. Since the whiteboard I and the whiteboard II are arranged in a sliding manner, the whiteboard I is connected with a circular ring, the circular ring is connected with an elastic tube, when the whiteboard I and the whiteboard II are inside the loading shell, the elastic tube is compressed, when the whiteboard I and the whiteboard II rise, due to the elastic tube, the whiteboard I gradually extends to two sides due to the elastic tube, so that a writing area during teaching is increased and can be controlled by the use, also with the arrangement of the position control plate, the position control plate can contact the whiteboard I when the whiteboard I rises, so that the display size of the writing area can be controlled more accurately.

title: An artificial intelligence-based English teaching aid
abstract_text: The present invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based English teaching aid, comprising a base plate, said lectern having a dust plate running through and provided at the top middle position, said telescopic pole having a fixed plate fixedly connected at the top position, said second motor output fixedly connected to a take-up shaft, said take-up shaft fixedly connected at the bottom position to a projection cloth. In the present invention, the nut vice drives the winding axis and the projection cloth to move up and down, so as to adjust the projection position, and the fixed plate and the projector are slid into the lectern by the telescopic rod, and the winding axis reels in the projection cloth, which can prevent the projection cloth from being damaged.

title: MOOD ESTIMATING PROGRAM
abstract_text: In the present invention, an estimating device estimates a mood score for a subject by inputting a brain-wave characteristic amount of the subject, when the subject is listening to audio in which a text is read, to an estimation model generated by machine learning which used a plurality of teaching data sets each configured using a combination of a brain-wave characteristic amount of a training test-subject and a mood score of the training test-subject when same was listening to audio in which a text is read.

title: Medical image AI intelligent teaching management system and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical image AI intelligent teaching management system and a use method thereof. The system comprises the following modules: a teaching database, a teaching convergence server, a learning workstation, an AI interaction server, an AI job analysis server, an AI report training server and a screen. The learning work station is connected with the teaching convergence server, the teaching convergence server is connected with the teaching database, the teaching database is connected with the AI interaction server, the AI interaction server is connected with the AI work analysis server, the AI work analysis server is connected with the AI report training server, and the AI report training server is connected with the teaching database. The AI interaction server is connected with the teaching convergence server, and the screen is connected with the learning work station. The system and the using method thereof have the characteristics of assisting teachers to teach and students to train image diagnosis in real time.

title: Reading teaching quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a reading teaching quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of data acquisition, data preprocessing, reading teaching quality evaluation model design, model parameter search and real-time operation. The invention belongs to the technical field of data analysis. According to the scheme, based on convolutional layer and pooling layer design, model parameters are reduced, data dimensions are reduced, the model generalization ability is improved, fitting residual errors are designed based on gradients, the model stability is improved, and the flexibility of the model in feature processing is improved by importing feature conversion; based on the positions of the initialization parameters of the upper limit and the lower limit of the search space, the algorithm can better search a solution target in different stages through an adaptive scaling factor, so that the global optimum and the local optimum reach the standard.

title: Teaching-repeated positioning method based on millimeter wave radar matching network
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) and deep learning, provides a teaching-repeated positioning method based on a millimeter-wave radar matching network, designs the millimeter-wave radar matching network, and constructs a geographic positioning system based on the network. A millimeter wave radar with global positioning data is mainly used for collecting signal image data in a target path to construct a teaching sequence, then relative pose transformation calculation is carried out according to a registration result of a repetitive sequence and the teaching sequence, once the teaching sequence is established, global positioning data can be obtained without relying on a GPS device when a user enters a region subsequently, and the positioning accuracy is improved. Accurate positioning can be realized only by using the relative relationship between the current data and the prior data. According to the invention, the problem that the existing positioning scheme cannot accurately position under the condition of poor GPS is solved, the strong robustness under various meteorological conditions is improved, and all-weather high-precision positioning can be stably realized for a long time under the condition of no GPS signal.

title: Fish Count Calculation Method, Fish Count Calculation Program, and Fish Count Calculation Device
abstract_text: In the present invention, an estimator for estimating the number of fish present in an underwater space is constructed by means of machine learning using, as teaching data, a plurality of data sets for learning that each include an echo image for learning, the echo image being based on received sound waves reflected by fish when sound waves are transmitted in an underwater space where fish are present, and the number of fish present in the underwater space in the echo image. The plurality of data sets for learning each include: an echo image for learning that is based on received sound waves reflected by fish when sound waves are transmitted in the underwater space where fish are present; and the number of fish present in the underwater space in the echo image. The estimator is used on an echo image generated on the basis of received sound waves reflected by an unknown number of fish present in the underwater space after transmitting sound waves in the underwater space, so as to calculate the number of said unknown number of fish present in the underwater space.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: Method and system for constructing virtual dynamic ultrasonic image based on CT (Computed Tomography) data
applicants: CHENGDU HUAMU CHUANGLIAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and system for constructing a virtual dynamic ultrasonic image based on CT data, and relates to the technical field of ultrasonic teaching equipment. The method comprises the steps of generating a visceral organ three-dimensional model based on CT data three-dimensional reconstruction of visceral organs, performing slicing according to the created three-dimensional model, endowing different structures in the slices with different RGB values to obtain color slices, matching the structures with different colors in the color slices with different gray values, and performing conversion to generate a tracing picture based on the three-dimensional model slices. And inputting the tracing picture into a pre-trained style migration AI model, and outputting to obtain a virtual ultrasonic image. According to the method, different RGB values are given to different structures in the slices of the three-dimensional model, and then the color slices are processed into the tracing pictures with different gray values, so that relatively clear edge information can be obtained, different tissue structures in visceral organ complex structures can be distinguished, and the finally generated virtual ultrasonic image is closer to a real ultrasonic image. The device is used for ultrasonic teaching, and is convenient for medical students to master the use of ultrasonic equipment and obtain ultrasonic images.

title: Virtual scene generation method and system based on sound AI model
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of teaching application of artificial intelligence, and provides a virtual scene generation method and system based on a sound AI model, and the system comprises a multi-source audio data collection module, a sound feature extraction module, a sound AI model learning module, a teaching environment contour recognition module, a teacher and student state recognition module, a teaching environment object generation module and a teaching environment dynamic reconstruction module. According to the method, a sound AI model is constructed, voiceprints and environment contour features of teachers and students in a teaching environment are extracted, objects in the teaching environment are identified, segmented and generated, and a virtual model and teachers and students are aggregated. According to the method and the system, generation of virtual teaching resources and teaching scenes is facilitated, and a new generation mode is provided for the virtual teaching resources.

title: English learning assisting system and method based on virtual digital human
applicants: BEIJING FENGHUO WANJIA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an English learning assisting system and method based on a virtual digital human, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. Performing anthropomorphic image processing according to the real image through the interaction platform, and transmitting the anthropomorphic image to the teaching whiteboard according to the teaching request data; controlling the anthropomorphic image to perform language communication according to the voice data; encoding and decoding are carried out according to pre-stored action data and an action frame sent by the learning terminal, an action instruction is generated, and the anthropomorphic image is controlled to move on the teaching whiteboard according to the action instruction; after the evaluation module performs feature extraction on the voice data, evaluation data are output through the voice evaluation model; the voice evaluation model is a voice quality evaluation model constructed based on a deep neural network; and finally, the interaction platform performs voice correction on the voice data of the target person according to the evaluation data. According to the invention, the interaction effect and the voice evaluation precision can be improved.

title: Online academic emotion recognition system based on multi-visual feature fusion
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online academic emotion recognition system based on multi-visual feature fusion, and relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching. A video data acquisition module is used for recording video information of learning activities of a learner in different environments; the emotion data set construction module is used for marking a data set through the determined online academic emotion type and definition; the machine learning module is used for determining an extraction mode of effective features and training a target detection model and an academic emotion recognition model which are used for automatically recognizing emotions; an academic emotion automatic identification module which classifies the visual features of the learner to obtain an identification result according to the effective features determined by the machine learning module and a trained target detection model and academic emotion identification model; and the visual feedback module is used for visually outputting the emotion type and the recognition result of the online learner. According to the method, facial expression, eye movement, head posture and gesture features are fused, so that the emotion information of the online learner is represented more comprehensively, and the emotion recognition accuracy is improved.

title: Convolutional neural network teaching aid and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a convolutional neural network teaching aid and system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence convolutional neural networks, and the teaching aid comprises a box body, an XY stepping motor module is movably installed in the box body, a transparent display frame is movably installed in the middle of the interior of the box body, and a display is movably installed at the bottom end of the transparent display frame. A signal processing unit is movably mounted on the left lower side of the box body, a switch power supply is movably mounted on the right lower side of the box body, a four-channel signal generator is movably mounted on the left lower side of the box body, and a control panel is movably mounted on the lower side of the interior of the box body, signals are generated through four channels of the four-channel signal generator and sent to the signal processing unit, and the processed signals are input into an INPUT6 port of a controller; one end of the driver 1 is connected with the OUTPUT1 of the controller, the other end of the driver 1 is connected with the XY stepping motor module, the driver 1 is used for controlling and driving the position of the X stepping motor, one end of the driver 1 is connected with the OUTPUT2 of the controller, one end of the driver 1 is connected with the OUTPUT3 of the controller, and the driver 1 and the driver 2 respectively control the position control and driving of the Y stepping motor on the two sides.

title: Classroom teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN HONGYANG DEJIAO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence, particularly relates to the field of teaching interaction, and comprises a learning data acquisition module, a learning data analysis module, a comprehensive data processing module, a teaching quality judgment module and a man-machine interaction module. Student interaction parameters, student homework parameters and student examination score parameters are obtained through a learning data acquisition module, the obtained student interaction parameters, student homework parameters and student examination score parameters are processed to obtain teaching quality indexes, and the teaching level of a teacher is obtained by comparing theoretical teaching quality indexes; the learning information of the students is evaluated by collecting the student interaction parameters, the student homework parameters and the student examination score parameters of the students, and the teaching quality of the teacher is evaluated according to the learning information of the students, so that the teacher can know the learning conditions of the students conveniently and carry out targeted teaching or tutoring.

title: Integrated education and teaching resource association search method and system based on knowledge graph
applicants: ZHONGKE LETING INTELLIGENT TECH JINAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a fusion education and teaching resource association search method and system based on a knowledge graph. And according to education work, obstacle types, teaching resource types and the like, establishing an association relationship between the teaching resources and the type knowledge points thereof, and forming a high-availability teaching resource knowledge graph integrated with the education field. By establishing a teaching resource knowledge graph and a knowledge graph-based knowledge search service, the problems of data isomerism, islanding and difficulty in use of commonly used teaching resources in the field of special education can be effectively solved; and meanwhile, the working pressure of searching and acquiring related teaching resources when teachers in common schools carry out education and teaching on specially needed children is greatly reduced.

title: Collaborative robot teaching assembly method and system based on digital twinning
applicants: SUZHOU NOKE AUTOMOTIVE ENG EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a digital twinning-based collaborative robot teaching assembly method and system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring teaching data, processing the teaching data to obtain a path corresponding to each point of a mechanical arm, and performing model training on the teaching path to generate a corresponding track model; inverse kinematics calculation is conducted through the track model, and the track of the tail end of the mechanical arm and position information of all joints are generated; in the digital twin corresponding to the track compensation algorithm, establishing a motion simulation model, searching and positioning assembly point positions, establishing a contact surface motion model according to stress analysis, adjusting the tail end position through the contact surface motion model, generating motion parameters of assembly parts, and assembling according to the motion parameters of the assembly parts; through real scene teaching, a robot obtains a smooth motion path and data required during assembly, the data are uploaded to map digital twins, and through machine learning, a proper path and an assembly mode in a simulation scene are obtained.

title: Teaching method and device based on AI robot teaching platform, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching method and device based on an AI robot teaching platform, computer equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: formulating an AI teaching robot; the AI teaching robot executes classroom interactive teaching; and after the classroom interactive teaching is finished, teaching evaluation is carried out. According to the invention, the AI robot teaching platform is utilized, teachers with different requirements are supported to quickly establish required AI teaching robots, classroom interactive teaching and classroom question answering are carried out on each student, the teaching effect can be effectively improved, and the application scene is wide.

title: Music online learning method and system based on hand action judgment
applicants: FUJIAN JINJIANG VOCATIONAL SECONDARY TECHNICAL SCHOOL
abstract_text: The invention discloses a music online learning method and system based on hand action judgment, and belongs to the technical field of music online education, and the method comprises the following steps: capturing and obtaining the playing action and playing sound of a professional player, and endowing the playing action with a three-dimensional model; the music score, the playing sound and the three-dimensional modeling action are combined to explain the technical key points of the music score and the playing for the learner, and online teaching data are formed; a learner performs training step by step according to explanation, extracts gesture force exerting action states in a training video, inputs an action classification model to judge whether hand force exerting has problems or not, and performs difficulty level classification judgment on training playing audios in the training video followed by the learner through audio signal processing and machine learning methods. And carrying out advanced breakthrough exercise on the music score. Through the fusion design of the three-dimensional model, the evaluation system, the hand shape judgment and other methods, the problem that the correction of the hand shape force exerting exercise in the online music course is insufficient is solved, and the advancement and interestingness of the exercise are improved.

title: Classroom teaching evaluation method and system for normal teachers
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom teaching evaluation method and system for normal teachers, and the method comprises the steps: segmenting a teaching video into fragments of different stages according to the time dimension, obtaining a training set, training an evaluation model based on multi-modal feature fusion through the training set, and obtaining a teaching evaluation model; the teaching evaluation model evaluates the input teaching video to obtain evaluation results of three evaluation dimensions of teaching state evaluation, blackboard writing evaluation and teaching content evaluation of a teacher of the input teaching video, and a diagnosis report is obtained according to the evaluation results; and adopting a deep neural network to identify personal characteristics according to expressions and behaviors of a teacher's classroom, storing the personal characteristics in a user portrait knowledge graph, obtaining a diagnosis result according to the diagnosis report and a user portrait in the user portrait knowledge graph, and recommending to obtain a corresponding teaching case according to the diagnosis result. According to the teaching diagnosis principle, the whole process of teaching skill evaluation and diagnosis of normal teachers is solved by adopting advanced artificial intelligence theories and models.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR INTEGRATED LARGE-SCALE AUDIENCE TARGETING VIA AUGMENTED HETEROGENEOUS SUBSYSTEMS
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for integrated targeting. An expert hierarchy is constructed with an initial expert layer with multiple initial experts and one or more augmented expert layers with each augmented expert therein augments, via machine learning, experts at any lower layer of the expert hierarchy. A nonlinear integration model is obtained, via machine learning, for combining expert predictions from experts in the expert hierarch based on an input to generate an integrated expert prediction in response to the input.

title: Table tennis intelligent training teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent table tennis training teaching system. The system comprises an intelligent monitoring terminal with a built-in 5G communication module, a double-path camera, a wearable Bluetooth motion tracker, a Bluetooth wireless earphone and a cloud data processing platform. According to the system, the motion posture and heart rate and heartbeat data of an athlete are obtained through a motion tracker and a two-way camera, multi-source collection data are integrated through an intelligent monitoring terminal, the fusion posterior probability is calculated according to an AI model, and the decision-level fusion result is judged through maximum posterior judgment logic.
