Cooperative management and control between the cloud platform and the intelligent monitoring terminal are supported through 5G communication, the action postures and psychological states of athletes are judged through cloud computing, scientific priority guidance decisions are given through comprehensive analysis, and cloud voice commands are received through the Bluetooth wireless headset to adjust the actions of the athletes. According to the invention, the problems of insufficient on-site self-perception of students and excessive dependence on coach guidance in traditional table tennis teaching are solved; action skills of athletes are improved, and measures are applied due to materials.

title: DETECTING AND MONITORING OXYGEN-RELATED EVENTS IN HEMODIALYSIS PATIENTS
abstract_text: The present teachings include analyzing oxygen saturation levels sensed during a hemodialysis treatment for a patient to determine whether the patient has a medical condition based on hypoxemia, apnea, or the like experienced during the treatment. To this end, the present teachings may include the use of a machine-learning algorithm trained to identify a presence of a high-frequency intermittent pattern that would be formed in a plot of the oxygen saturation levels, e.g., to determine a severity of respiratory instability experienced. The present teaching may also or instead include a time-series analysis including at least one of: (i) calculating recurrence-based quantification, such as, but not limited to, recurrence rate, determinism, and laminarity; (ii) calculating the optimal recurrence threshold based on maximum variations of the system's determinism and degree of predictability; and (iii) calculating complexity-based measures such as permutation entropy. Such analyses may be used to detect, inter-alia, sleep apnea syndrome.

title: Automatic driving practical training device for teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an automatic driving practical training device for teaching, which comprises an ROS trolley chassis and a driving mainboard fixed on the ROS trolley chassis, a module mounting plate is arranged above the driving mainboard, and two ends of the module mounting plate are respectively provided with an edge computing gateway and a quick-change teaching module. The quick-change teaching module is one of a multi-degree-of-freedom mechanical arm or a license plate assembly, and students can select to install the multi-degree-of-freedom mechanical arm to learn the development and control technology of the mechanical arm when needing courses such as a robot control technology and a robot operating system; when students need to go to courses such as a machine vision technology and an artificial intelligence application technology, the students can choose to install license plate assemblies and learn license plate recognition, traffic violation recognition and other artificial intelligence application technologies, and the problems that existing training equipment in colleges is single in function, and training equipment for integrated display and learning in the field of intelligent traffic is lacked are solved. And the practical training effect of students is not good, and the students cannot systematically learn the advanced technology of intelligent traffic.

title: Teaching demonstration method and system based on artificial intelligence, terminal and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING BUJU FUTURE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching demonstration method and system based on artificial intelligence, a terminal and a storage medium, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence education. The teaching demonstration method based on artificial intelligence comprises the steps of obtaining preset teaching content information, teacher basic information and student basic information; determining teaching process information according to the preset teaching content information and the teacher basic information; obtaining student class state information, and adjusting the teaching process information according to the student class state information, the teacher basic information and the student basic information; performing analysis according to the teaching process information and the student class state information to obtain student concentration information; and generating reminding information according to the student concentration degree information, and sending the reminding information to students and/or teachers. The method has the effect of improving the education quality and efficiency of artificial intelligence education.

title: AI intelligent interactive lesson system and method based on large language model
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI intelligent interactive lesson system based on a large language model, and the system comprises a user side, a knowledge base, a course module, a learning management module, an intelligent education auxiliary module, an intelligent education commenting module, an intelligent creation auxiliary module, and an AI digital human teaching module. The knowledge base, the course module, the learning management module, the intelligent education auxiliary module, the intelligent education commenting module and the intelligent creation auxiliary module all provide teaching data support for the AI digital human teaching module. The invention belongs to the technical field of online education, and particularly relates to an AI intelligent interactive lesson system based on a large language model. The AI intelligent interactive lesson system can integrate intelligent education assistance, intelligent education comment, intelligent creation assistance and the like.

title: Teacher level identification system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher level affirmation system and method, belongs to the technical field of education systems, and aims to solve the technical problem of how to realize teacher evaluation efficiently and fairly in a multi-level manner. Comprising an AI class evaluation subsystem, a comprehensive declaration subsystem, a student and parent comprehensive evaluation subsystem and a result calculation subsystem. The AI class evaluation subsystem is used for performing multi-modal analysis on the classroom teaching condition of the teacher based on the classroom teaching video to generate a classroom analysis report; the comprehensive declaration subsystem is used for performing comprehensive score final calculation on the teachers based on review scores of experts to obtain comprehensive declaration scores of the teachers; the student parent comprehensive evaluation subsystem is used for supporting student parents to perform scoring evaluation based on questionnaires and supporting school administrators to perform statistical analysis on questionnaire scores of teachers based on the scoring evaluation of the student parents to obtain questionnaire results; and the result final subsystem is used for summarizing the classroom analysis reports, the comprehensive scores and the questionnaire results of the teachers based on the weights to obtain the comprehensive scores of the teachers.

title: MEASUREMENT DEVICE AND MEASUREMENT METHOD
abstract_text: The measurement device includes: an image pickup unit that picks up an image of an object including a tray having a reference object and a cargo; an image processing unit that extracts a specific region of the reference object and a region of the cargo on the basis of image data of the object captured by the image capturing unit; and a calculation unit that acquires first coordinate information indicating the 3D coordinates associated with the image data of the object, and fixed-specification package outer shape structure information indicating the structure size of the fixed-specification package outer shape of the tray associated with the coordinates of the specific region. The length of the cargo exceeding the tray is calculated on the basis of the specific area, the area of the cargo, the first coordinate information, and the fixed-specification package outer shape structure information. The image processing unit extracts a specific region in a reference object by inputting image data of an object to a first machine learning model that has been machine-learned using image data of a tray and data indicating the specific region as teaching data.

title: METHOD FOR DETERMINING TORQUE OF OPERATING ROBOT USING MODEL AND METHOD FOR TACHING
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for determining a torque for operating a robot using a model of a robot having a plurality of components, in which two components of the robot at a connection point can be moved relative to each other by means of actuators, and in which the model maps parameters of the connection point as a torque of the respective actuator, the method comprises: providing values of parameters, where the parameters comprise: a position or angle, velocity and acceleration of a respective actuator, where the model comprises a rigid body model, a friction model and a machine learning model; respectively determining values of a rigid body sub-torque, a friction sub-torque and a machine learning sub-torque based on values of parameters and the model; determining values of moments of the respective actuators based on values of the rigid body sub-moments, the friction sub-moments, and the machine learning sub-moments; and providing a value of the torque of the respective actuator for operating the robot, in particular for controlling or regulating the robot. The invention also relates to a method for teaching such a model.

title: DETECTING AND MONITORING OXYGEN-RELATED EVENTS IN HEMODIALYSIS PATIENTS
abstract_text: The present teachings include analyzing oxygen saturation levels sensed during a hemodialysis treatment for a patient to determine whether the patient has a medical condition based on hypoxemia, apnea, or the like experienced during the treatment. To this end, the present teachings may include the use of a machine-learning algorithm trained to identify a presence of a high-frequency intermittent pattern that would be formed in a plot of the oxygen saturation levels, e.g., to determine a severity of respiratory instability experienced. The present teaching may also or instead include a time-series analysis including at least one of: (i) calculating recurrence-based quantification, such as, but not limited to, recurrence rate, determinism, and laminarity; (ii) calculating the optimal recurrence threshold based on maximum variations of the system's determinism and degree of predictability; and (iii) calculating complexity-based measures such as permutation entropy. Such analyses may be used to detect, inter-alia, sleep apnea syndrome.

title: Teacher comprehensive ability evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a teacher comprehensive ability evaluation method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, and the method comprises the steps: recording teaching video and audio files; obtaining a teaching process text by using a pre-trained speech recognition model; constructing a knowledge point library, and calculating to obtain a teaching content score of the teacher; performing keyword search and text analysis on the teaching process text to obtain a teaching quality score of the teacher; calculating a teaching state score of the teacher by using a pre-trained action recognition model; performing quantification by using a pre-trained target detection model to obtain a teaching mode score of the teacher; counting academic scores of classes teaching by each teacher according to the teaching stages to obtain teaching quality scores of the teachers; and comprehensively processing the teaching content, the teaching quality, the teaching state, the teaching mode and the teaching quality to obtain a comprehensive ability evaluation result of the teacher. According to the invention, automatic quantitative evaluation is carried out on the teacher, so that the teacher evaluation process is objective and comprehensive, and the labor cost of a supervision group is greatly reduced.

title: Teaching quality monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a teaching quality monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring classroom image data and classroom audio data; acquiring expression change information, body posture information and hand raising information of students and blackboard writing information of teachers according to the acquired classroom image data; according to the collected classroom audio data, obtaining speaking sound information of the teacher and noise information when the teacher speaks; calculating a student listening state value; calculating the class participation degree value of the student; calculating the teaching content redundancy of the teacher and the language expression quality score of the teacher; acquiring blackboard writing neatness according to the blackboard writing information of the teacher; and calculating a classroom quality score of the teacher based on the acquired student attending state value, the student attending participation degree value, the teaching content redundancy, the language expression quality score and the blackboard writing neatness. By adopting the method, the accuracy of a teaching quality evaluation result can be greatly improved.

title: Scene classification method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: GUANGDONG NORMAL UNIV INTELLIGENT TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a scene classification method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a student audio data set and a teacher audio data set in a classroom teaching process, carrying out the sequential rearrangement and merging of all atomic fragments according to a time sequence, obtaining a second-stage merging and dividing group through two times of merging and dividing processing, and carrying out the classification of a second-stage image through the second-stage merging and dividing group; and performing merging traversal analysis on each second-level merging division group and each corresponding result judgment array to obtain time period information corresponding to each scene. According to the method, the mode of performing scene classification in combination with each scene classification judgment formula is a scene classification algorithm based on rules, a large amount of data is not needed for learning, compared with a machine learning mode, the requirement for a data set is greatly reduced, and the research and development cost is low. Meanwhile, the method is a targeted scene classification algorithm, the problem that a universal algorithm cannot meet the fine classification requirement in a classroom scene can be solved, and the algorithm effect is better in the targeted scene.

title: Retina image analysis system and method
applicants: SOUTH CHINA HOSPITAL AFFILIATED TO SHENZHEN UNIV
abstract_text: The invention provides a retina image analysis system. The retina image analysis system comprises an AI retina multimedia library, a teaching module, a comparison data collection module, an assessment module, an evaluation module and a feedback upgrading module. According to the retina image analysis system, an eyeball anatomy three-dimensional model, a normal retina structure diagram, a clinical real retina case image and a multi-level and multi-dimensional standard retina lesion image are collected through the AI retina multimedia library, and teaching filing, teaching practice, learning assessment and summary analysis are realized based on the AI retina multimedia library; and the AI retina multimedia library is further optimized according to the summarized analysis result, so that students can fully master the characteristics of normal and abnormal retinas and know the disease characteristics.

title: Special digital twinning system for alpine skiing
abstract_text: The invention discloses a special digital twinning system for alpine skiing, which belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and comprises a user terminal, an unmanned aerial vehicle, a high-speed camera, an image processing module, a 3D simulation module, an attitude analysis module, a parameter updating module and a database. The user terminal is used for displaying 3D scene animation and providing an interactive teaching function; the method can prevent complex ambient light from affecting data acquisition, can accurately extract the action image of the skier, improves the action recognition accuracy, reduces the acquisition limitation, can enable a user to more visually see the skiing action defects of the skier through a 3D model marking mode, can automatically update the model, and improves the skiing efficiency. The use personalization and expansibility of the system are improved, the time of manually searching parameters by the user is saved, and the use experience is improved.

title: Virtual human self-adjusting teaching cloud platform, system, method and related equipment
applicants: CHINA MOBILE HANGZHOU INF TECH CO LTD
CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching, and provides a virtual human self-adjusting teaching cloud platform, system and method and related equipment, and the teaching cloud platform comprises an initial scheme teaching module which is used for obtaining a first version of virtual human teaching video clip sequence and sending the sequence to a student terminal for playing in sequence; the learning condition analysis module is used for acquiring the knowledge mastery level of the taught lecture video clip according to the answer condition of the student, and analyzing the expression action characteristics of the student in lecture to acquire the lecture attention level; the voice semantic emotion processing module is used for obtaining a virtual human voice style conforming to the emotion information; and the teaching scheme adjustment module is used for obtaining the new version of the virtual human teaching video clip sequence, fusing the virtual human voice style through the virtual human animation generation module, replacing the original virtual human teaching video clip sequence, and continuously playing the original virtual human teaching video clip sequence at the student end. According to the invention, the virtual human can realize the timely and effective self-adjustment capability of the teaching scheme during teaching so as to improve the teaching effect.

title: Education training personnel evaluation method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of educational training personnel evaluation, and discloses an educational training personnel evaluation method based on machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining and storing related features, which comprise the personal information, education background, professional skill, teaching experience and student evaluation of educational training personnel; based on the related characteristics of the education background, professional skills, teaching experience and student evaluation of the education and training personnel, comprehensively scoring the education and training personnel by using a machine learning algorithm; setting an incentive mechanism for the educational training personnel based on the comprehensive score of the educational training personnel; personalized training content is generated based on related characteristics of education backgrounds, professional skills, teaching experience and student evaluation of education training personnel; based on personalized training content, an interactive communication platform is provided for educational trainers. The method has the advantages that the comprehensive management function and personalized training plan generation have great practical significance for the development of the online network education industry.

title: Generative teaching resource system in virtual teaching scene and working method thereof
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of teaching application of artificial intelligence, and provides a generation type teaching resource system in a virtual teaching scene and a working method thereof. The working method comprises the following steps: (1) generating a virtual teaching scene environment; (2) constructing a subject corpus; (3) student intention understanding; (4) teacher response feedback; (5) performing virtual teacher posture synchronization; (6) presenting a response result; and (7) response result interaction. According to the method, real-time presentation and interaction of the generated teaching resources in the virtual teaching scene are facilitated, and a new form of man-airport interaction in a'physics-information-social 'ternary space is realized.

title: X-ray CT device and high-quality image generation device
abstract_text: The invention provides an X-ray CT apparatus and a high-quality image generation apparatus. Provided is an X-ray CT device provided with a learned model which is generated by acquiring one or more sets of learning data sets from a single image capture without increasing the radiation of a subject and performing machine learning using the acquired learning sets. The learning completion model is a learning completion model using a low-image-quality image as input data and a high-image-quality image as teaching data. The low-quality image and the high-quality image are obtained on the basis of the same learning measurement data or learning projection data obtained by logarithmically transforming the learning measurement data. The low-quality image is a CT image reconstructed from partial data obtained by dividing the learning measurement data or the learning projection data, and the high-quality image is a CT image obtained by reconstructing the learning projection data.

title: AI assistance-based lesson preparation data pushing method and system
abstract_text: According to the AI assistance-based lesson preparation data pushing method and system provided by the invention, sample subject chapters related to subject weak knowledge points can be accurately recognized by utilizing chapter learning behavior data of sample subject chapters and subject chapter embedding recognition rules; and clustering and parameter updating are carried out on the learning behavior data according to the sample subject chapters, so that a target subject weak point prediction network for weak knowledge points of different subjects is generated. Meanwhile, by using the loaded learning behavior data of any target subject chapter, the confidence coefficient of weak knowledge points of each subject under the chapter can be determined, and pushing of lesson preparation data is further guided. Namely, the weak knowledge points of the students in different subject chapters can be quickly predicted, and the corresponding lesson preparation data number is pushed to the teacher, so that the teacher can better understand the learning requirements of the students, and teaching support and education resources are provided in a targeted manner.

title: Multifunctional teaching system
applicants: ZHEJIANG LIYUN EDUCATION TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multifunctional teaching system, and relates to the field of digital teaching. The multifunctional teaching system comprises a server side, a PC management side, a PC teaching side, a teacher correction side composed of a dot matrix pen and a teacher mobile phone side, and a student mobile phone side, a student answering mode and a teacher paper correction mode are not changed in a data acquisition mode, and a teacher can directly correct homework according to an original mode through the dot matrix pen; error question information is analyzed through big data and an artificial intelligence technology, the learning condition of the student is comprehensively and deeply analyzed and evaluated, and a set of accurate learning scheme is made for the student in a tailored mode. According to the multifunctional teaching system, on one hand, data support and guidance can be provided for schools and teachers, the schools and the teachers are helped to better carry out teaching management and guidance, and the education quality is improved; on the other hand, more accurate, personalized and efficient learning services can be provided for the students, the students are helped to better complete academic works, and comprehensive development of the students is promoted.

title: ABC artificial intelligence practical training platform
applicants: SHANGHAI HAIWEN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching practical training, in particular to an ABC artificial intelligence practical training platform. The management authority module carries out authentication and authority control on user identities, the users are students and teachers, corresponding authorities are set according to different user roles, the data cloud platform summarizes and sorts course teaching and practical training teaching, the teaching module teaches course basic knowledge for the students online, and the practical training module teaches practical training operation knowledge for the students online. The teaching recording module generates learning data for video and audio data in the teaching and practical training process and stores and reserves the learning data in the data cloud platform, the learning data can be rapidly made into a template and put into teaching use, the later teaching time is saved, and the monitoring module monitors learning of students in the teaching and practical training process. An online experiment environment can be realized, local deployment and configuration are not needed, the learning enthusiasm of students is improved, and learning of the students is facilitated.

title: Central control system and method for smart classroom
applicants: SHENZHEN BDSTAR NAVIGATION COMMUNICATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a central control system and method for a smart classroom. The system comprises a smart platform, a server, a smart desk, an Internet of Things server, Internet of Things terminal equipment, a recording and broadcasting host, a camera, an AI loudspeaker box, a teaching computer all-in-one machine and a group computer all-in-one machine. The method comprises the following steps: a teacher and students simultaneously carry out card swiping authentication; the smart desks passing the student authentication are controlled by the teacher computer host, and finally, the teacher computer host controls all devices in the smart classroom. The beneficial effects of the system are that the system enables various high-tech devices to be connected together, provides dominant control for teachers in a centralized manner, and better assists the teachers in teaching; meanwhile, an efficient control method is invented, and the teaching efficiency of teachers is improved.

title: Teaching question pushing method and system based on AI assistance
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching question pushing method and system based on AI assistance, personalized learning support can be provided according to individual differences of students by analyzing historical question learning behavior data of target student users in a first teaching test platform, and by generating a target learning behavior representation vector and predicting weak knowledge point data, the teaching question pushing method and system based on AI assistance can provide personalized learning support according to the individual differences of the students. And corresponding teaching question data are pushed in a targeted manner, so that knowledge blind areas and weak links of students can be diagnosed in time. By pushing the corresponding teaching question data in a targeted manner, time and energy waste of the students on unnecessary knowledge points is avoided. Meanwhile, the teacher can better adjust and optimize the teaching resources according to the personalized learning requirements of the students, more effective teaching guidance and feedback are provided, the teaching resources can be utilized to the maximum extent, and the teaching efficiency is improved. Namely, the method can better meet the learning requirements of students, improve the learning effect, and provide a more effective teaching aid for teachers.

title: Integrated teaching experiment device and programming method thereof
abstract_text: The invention provides an integrated teaching experiment device and a programming method thereof. The integrated teaching experiment device comprises a main board which is integrated with at least one signal interface and is used for connecting at least one electronic component outside the integrated teaching experiment device and monitoring and/or controlling the state of the at least one electronic component; the OPS host is connected with the mainboard through an OPS daughter card; and the display screen is connected with the mainboard and presents a graphical or code programming environment interface interacting with a user, so that the user can carry out graphical or code programming operation on at least one electronic component externally connected with the integrated teaching experiment device. Therefore, equipment used in various aspects of intelligent hardware connection testing, electronic circuit teaching, artificial intelligence programming teaching and the like can be integrated, and various teaching requirements of artificial intelligence, electronic circuit technology, intelligent hardware teaching and the like are efficiently met.

title: Classroom state evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of data processing for supervision, in particular to a classroom state evaluation method based on artificial intelligence. The classroom state evaluation method based on artificial intelligence comprises the following steps: acquiring voice data of a teacher through recording equipment; acquiring a starting signal for entering a teaching node and an ending signal for leaving the teaching node sent by the teacher according to the voice data; obtaining a picture of a student position in the current teaching node through a depth camera; obtaining the head posture change of each student in the current teaching node according to the picture of the position of the student; and judging whether the student in the current teaching node listens to the class or not according to the head posture change of each student. According to the method, the time period guided by the teacher is identified as the teaching node, and whether the behavior of the student is fully guided by the teacher is detected in the teaching node, so that whether the student is attending the class is detected, and the accuracy of class state evaluation can be improved.

title: Speech and language disorder assessment and rehabilitation training system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based speech and language disorder assessment and rehabilitation training system, which comprises an airflow detection device, and the airflow detection device comprises a computer, a whistle, a balloon, a first camera, a second camera and a box body. The evaluation method of the system comprises the following steps that parents or a treatment teacher generates a virtual assistant; generating a story script for evaluation; the child interacts with the virtual assistant, and assesses the child. The rehabilitation training method of the system comprises the following steps that virtual assistant teaching accompanies growth of children for a long time and continuous collection and analysis are carried out; establishing a norm and monitoring the children according to the norm; the virtual assistant carries out speech and language development condition analysis on the whole interaction process through chat interaction of a specific theme and a multi-modal data processing model; generating a rehabilitation training course; and the children are examined. The system can be used for home evaluation and course generation, can carry out children speech and language disorder rehabilitation training, and can record and output flashing spots in the development process.

title: Smart city scene teaching practical training system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart city scene teaching practical training system, which comprises a smart center sensing device, a smart middle platform subsystem, a smart facility subsystem and a smart traffic subsystem, and is characterized in that the smart center sensing device is used as a center node of the smart city scene teaching practical training system and is connected with all other subsystems. According to the invention, functions of unified intelligent dimming, intelligent management and control, power consumption monitoring and the like are provided for street lamps based on the Internet of Things technology, energy saving of a power supply system is realized, light intensity monitoring and human body infrared monitoring are supported, LED adjustment can be dynamically carried out according to a use scene, application development of intelligent security monitoring can be completed based on the artificial intelligence technology, and the intelligent security monitoring system is suitable for popularization and application. Comprising the steps of face recognition, target recognition, pedestrian monitoring, vehicle monitoring, target tracking, danger early warning and the like, and a traffic light group realizes the functions of SLAM navigation, ROS path planning, traffic sign recognition, pedestrian and multi-target monitoring, vehicle-vehicle communication and the like. Simulation of a smart city system is realized with high reduction degree, and the method has high value in scientific research and practice.

title: Traffic safety facility patrol detection method and system
applicants: WUHAN ZONGHENG INTELLIGENT CITY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a traffic safety facility patrol detection method and system, and relates to the field of traffic safety detection, and the method specifically comprises the steps: obtaining the video image data and geographic position coordinate information of a traffic safety facility; performing data calibration on the video image data to obtain a target traffic safety facility, and performing data combination on the target traffic safety facility and a reference object to form teaching plan facility calibration data; constructing an equipment state recognition model, and performing precision training by using a deep learning algorithm; and performing state abnormity identification on the road by using the trained equipment state identification model. Through a mode of carrying video recording equipment on a vehicle, automatic evaluation of toppling and skewing conditions of guardrails, signs, rod pieces, cameras and signal lamps on a road is realized, and low-cost and high-efficiency patrol detection of traffic safety facilities is realized.

title: Artificial intelligence visual inspection system
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence visual inspection system which is characterized by comprising a conveying device, a discharging device, an artificial intelligence visual inspection device and at least one lifting type material guiding device, and the discharging device, the artificial intelligence visual inspection device and the lifting type material guiding device are sequentially arranged side by side in the conveying direction of the conveying device. According to the utility model, when artificial intelligence technology teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can obtain theory and practice knowledge at the same time, and the colleges and universities can output more talents mastering the artificial intelligence visual detection technology; the artificial intelligence visual inspection system has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, convenient to use, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: Automatic production line simulation device
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an automatic production line simulation device which is characterized by comprising a rack, a storage device, an artificial intelligence processing and sorting device, a packaging device and a material transferring device, and the storage device, the artificial intelligence processing and sorting device, the packaging device and the material transferring device are all arranged on the rack. According to the utility model, when artificial intelligence technology comprehensive application teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can conveniently obtain theory and practice knowledge at the same time, and colleges and universities can conveniently output more talents mastering artificial intelligence technology development and comprehensive application; therefore, more enterprises can have artificial intelligence technology development and comprehensive application capabilities, and the automatic production line simulation device has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: Stereoscopic display method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a three-dimensional display method and device in the technical field of three-dimensional display. The three-dimensional display method comprises the following steps of: 1, segmenting an image into a plurality of parts according to the visual depth or the spatial position depth of the image; step 2, enabling display parts with different depths to alternately appear in a display area through the movement of one or more displays; and 3, displaying the image which is divided into multiple parts on displays at different positions in a time-sharing manner according to the spatial position of the image. The three-dimensional display method and device are reasonable in structural design, image segmentation tasks are completed through multiple algorithms, the definition and the three-dimensional display effect of 3D imaging pictures are improved, the requirement for deep fusion of the artificial intelligence technology and the naked eye 3D technology is better met, and the three-dimensional display effect is improved. The system can be widely applied to immersive scenes such as naked eye 3D movies, 5D games, intelligent exhibition halls, intelligent medical teaching and 3D advertisement putting.

title: Deep learning-based student abnormal behavior analysis method and system
applicants: JIANGXI TAIHAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student abnormal behavior analysis method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, dividing students in a whole school into students in school and students not in school, and numbering the students in the whole school; s2, uniformly issuing campus cards for the students of the whole school, and marking the numbers of the students of the whole school on the cards of the campus cards; and S3, fixed consumption terminals are arranged at multiple places of the school, and when the students in the whole school enter the multiple places of the school. Good data of consumption, dining, sleeping, classroom learning, book borrowing and the like of students are acquired through the campus card and the consumption terminal, various behaviors and activities in the school period can be embodied, people can visually see the abnormal conditions of the students through data modeling, valuable information is mined from the abnormal conditions, and the students can know the abnormal conditions of the students. The system is helpful for schools and class managers to manage students, and provides powerful support for enhancing teaching management.

title: Game image processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a game image processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium, which can be applied to various scenes such as cloud technology, artificial intelligence, intelligent transportation and vehicle-mounted scenes, and the method comprises the following steps: respectively carrying out feature extraction on a view image of a target role in a game picture and game situation information to obtain corresponding image features and situation features; and then combining the image features and the situation features to predict a plurality of global view tags representing the next game operation to be executed by the target role. And if the plurality of global view tags meet the threshold condition for enabling the target role to be in the safe state, the operation prompt information of the next game operation is presented in the game picture, so that teaching guidance is provided for the player role in the real-time game process, and the teaching effect of the game playing method is improved. And secondly, the operation prompt information is output only when the target role is ensured to be in the safe state, so that the operation prompt information enabling the target role to be in a dangerous state is prevented from being presented, and the game experience of players is improved.

title: Clinical teaching student transient behavior model evaluation system based on deep learning algorithm
applicants: SHANGHAI JIAOTONG UNIV SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
abstract_text: The invention provides a clinical teaching student transient behavior model evaluation system based on a deep learning algorithm. The clinical teaching student transient behavior model evaluation system is characterized in that a high-speed camera is connected with 5G network communication equipment; the high-speed camera is connected with the face recognition equipment, and the face recognition equipment is connected with the 5G network communication equipment; the 5G network communication equipment is connected with the cloud server cluster; a teaching behavior analysis management system, a transient behavior analysis scoring system and a dynamic vision library are installed in the cloud server cluster. According to the invention, behaviors of students are evaluated timely and accurately, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: AI analog simulation system and method in drilling process
applicants: SICHUAN TIANDI HONGHUA NAVIGATION EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI analog simulation system and method in a drilling process, and relates to the technical field of data processing, the AI analog simulation system comprises a data acquisition unit, a drilling three-dimensional modeling unit, a simulation scene rendering unit and a drilling motion trail generation unit; the data acquisition unit is used for acquiring real-time dynamic data of a drilling well mouth and a drilling well underground and generating a real-time dynamic model of a drilling well; the well drilling three-dimensional modeling unit is used for performing 3D modeling according to the real-time dynamic model of the well drilling to generate a well drilling simulation model; the simulation scene rendering unit is used for performing scene rendering on the drilling simulation model; and the drilling motion trail generation unit is used for generating a drilling motion trail according to the drilling simulation model after scene rendering. According to the method, scene rendering is carried out on the drilling real-time dynamic model, various parameters of a scene graph are calculated, final rendering parameters are determined, rendering is completed, and the simulation effect of a simulation system is more accurate, visual and convenient; driller operation teaching, simulation training and the like are facilitated.

title: Experiment teaching development system based on single-chip microcomputer
abstract_text: The utility model provides an experiment teaching development system based on a single-chip microcomputer, comprising a main controller which is respectively connected with a USB downloading circuit, an eight-path LED circuit, a button circuit, a four-digit nixie tube display circuit, a first display circuit, a second display circuit, an OLED display circuit, an A/D converter circuit and a temperature acquisition circuit. The experimental development system is rich in integrated resources and diversified in function, and is beneficial to deep learning and development of the single-chip microcomputer technology; and the use of beginners is facilitated.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PREDICTIVE ENGAGEMENT
abstract_text: A machine learning (ML) process can include teaching, with a teaching set, a first ML algorithm to generate one or more machine-predicted results. One or more weights can be generated based on the one or more machine-predicted results and the teaching set. A second ML algorithm can be generated based on the one or more weights. Via the second ML algorithm, one or more machine-learned results can be generated. A description of one or more candidates can be received. Based on the one or more machine-learned results, a respective likelihood of interest in a CCG class of positions for each of the one or more candidates can be generated. A respective communication can be transmitted to each of a subset of the one or more candidates open to the respective likelihood of interest in the CCG class of positions for the subset above a threshold.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention provides an information processing apparatus, an information processing method, an information processing program, and an information processing system that facilitates recognition of an identification result. An information processing apparatus has a first acquisition unit configured to acquire measurement data obtained by measurement of a physical condition of a patient, a second acquisition unit configured to acquire, using a first disease identification model generated by machine learning that uses teaching data labeled with first classifications of body portions included in measurement data obtained by measurement of a physical condition of a human and presence of a disease in the body portions, the first classification of a body portion in the measurement data acquired by the first acquisition unit and presence of a disease in the body portions, and a display unit configured to display the presence of the disease in the body portions that is acquired by the second acquisition unit in accordance with the first classification.

title: Online teaching system based on artificial intelligence and virtual reality technology
applicants: SHENXIANG EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online teaching system based on artificial intelligence and virtual reality technology, and the system comprises an intelligent teacher role creation module which is used for creating an intelligent teacher role, and the intelligent teacher role comprises intelligent synthesis and real-time rendering of body actions, voice and facial expressions; the intelligent teaching scene construction module is used for constructing an intelligent teaching scene; the intelligent real-time interaction and feedback module is used for realizing intelligent real-time interaction and feedback functions, and the functions comprise intelligent analysis and understanding of questions and answers of students, generation of personalized teaching suggestions and feedback and the like; an intelligent diversified teaching method implementation module; and the intelligent cross-platform integration module is used for realizing integration with other intelligent teaching platforms, learning management systems and social media, analyzing and managing learning data through an artificial intelligence technology, and realizing intelligent recommendation and personalized learning resource allocation.

title: Intelligent sports classroom training system and method based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart sports classroom training system and method based on an AI technology, and the system comprises an acquisition module which obtains a sports teaching video and a sports learning video of a user; the processing module is used for obtaining motion information contained in each video key frame according to the obtained video key frames of the physical education teaching video and the physical learning video of the user, and the motion information comprises at least one of a human body contour, limb key joint points and pixel information thereof, a face contour, a motion speed and motion strength; the training module is used for inputting the motion information contained in each video key frame of the teaching video and the motion information contained in each video key frame of the user learning video into an intelligent sports neural network model to obtain the similarity between the sports teaching video and the sports learning video of the user; and the output module outputs the similarity of the sports learning videos of the user. The method can quickly feed back the physical education video learning similarity of the user, and assists the user in performing physical education classroom training.

title: Estimation model generation device and machining state estimation device
abstract_text: This estimation model generation device is a device for generating an estimation model for estimating the machining state of laser machining, and is provided with: an information acquisition unit that, during laser machining by a first device, observes first heat radiation, first visible light, first reflected light, and first laser light from an object to be machined, and acquires the first heat radiation, the first visible light, the first reflected light, and the first laser light; acquiring first waveform data including a first waveform and a second waveform for at least two of the first heat radiation, the first visible light, the first light, and the first laser light; an estimation model generation unit that generates a first estimation model that estimates the machining state of the first device by performing machine learning using teaching data that associates the first waveform data as an explanation variable and the machining state as a target variable; and a storage unit that stores the first estimation model.

title: LEARNING SYSTEM, DEFECT PREDICTION SYSTEM, LEARNED MODEL, LEARNING METHOD, AND DEFECT PREDICTION METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a learning system capable of predicting product defects which may occur in a product production line.SOLUTION: A learning system inputs, into an unlearned model 14, teaching data including change point information 22 indicating a change point regarding at least one of operators, production facilities, and work content in a production line which produces products, and defect information 24 indicating product defects having occurred in the production line with the change point. The learning system inputs the change point information 22 by performing machine learning of the unlearned model 14, and generates a learned model 15 which outputs defect prediction information indicating product defects which are predicted to occur at a change point indicated by the change point information 22.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Teaching management system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching management, in particular to a teaching management system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a course information acquisition module, a classroom information acquisition module, a course arrangement business set determination module, a constraint condition determination module, a target function establishment module, an optimal planning module, and an optimization module. Wherein the optimal planning module is used for realizing multi-objective optimization of a course arrangement scheme in a course arrangement business set based on an improved genetic algorithm and determined objective functions and constraint conditions; and the optimization module is used for optimizing the course arrangement scheme of the course arrangement business set according to a multi-objective optimization result, and generating a corresponding optimal course arrangement scheme.

title: Sound fault detection system, device and method for multimedia teaching equipment
applicants: ANHUI CHANGDAO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a sound fault detection system, device and method for multimedia teaching equipment, and the system comprises a main control module which is electrically connected with a storage module, a sound collection module, a display module, an AI modeling module, an audio playing module, a data collection module, and a data analysis module. Comprising a base, a rotating table is mounted on the base, a rotating mechanism capable of driving the rotating table to rotate in the circumferential direction is mounted on the base, vertical mounting grooves are formed in the two sides of the rotating table, and a sound collector and a three-dimensional scanning head are sequentially mounted in each mounting groove from top to bottom; and an angle adjusting mechanism capable of adjusting the angles of the sound collector and the three-dimensional scanning head is mounted in the mounting groove. The equipment can perform 3D modeling on positions of classrooms and loudspeakers, the same audio data is played through a virtual loudspeaker and a real loudspeaker for comparison, comparison data is finally analyzed, a comparison result is displayed through a display module, and a fault loudspeaker is visually detected.

title: Ternary space tactile communication system based on tactile information
abstract_text: The invention discloses a ternary space tactile communication system based on tactile information. The ternary space tactile communication system comprises a tactile acquisition glove, a communication module and a tactile representation glove, the tactile acquisition glove acquires tactile information; the communication module realizes information communication between the tactile acquisition glove and the tactile representation glove; the tactile representation glove is used for reproducing the tactile information and automatically controlling the stimulation degree of the tactile information; based on the system, manipulator AI operation teaching, virtual hand AI operation teaching, remote hand tactile communication between natural persons, hand tactile control between natural persons and a robot, and hand tactile interaction between natural persons and digital persons can be realized. According to the system, traffic channels among ternary spaces of a human space, an information space and a physical space are established based on tactile information, and the whole process of tactile information acquisition, transmission and feedback among the ternary spaces is realized, so that development of industries such as artificial intelligence, intelligent robots, meta-universe digital humans and VR/AR is promoted.

title: Teaching and training system examination promotion assistant with AI scoring technology
applicants: SHANGHAI LANGYING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching and training system examination promotion assistant with an AI scoring technology. The teaching and training system examination promotion assistant comprises a use object, an operation environment, an invigilation client and an examination client. Compared with the prior art, the system has the advantages that the participation of teachers can be reduced, scores can be disclosed, and the system is convenient to use.

title: CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND SYSTEM OF DESCRIPTIVE MODEL OF CLASSROOM TEACHING BEHAVIOR EVENTS
abstract_text: The present invention discloses construction method and system of a descriptive model of classroom teaching behavior events. The construction method includes steps as the followings: acquiring classroom teaching video data to be trained; dividing the classroom teaching video data to be trained into multiple events according to utterances of a teacher by using a voice activity detection technology; and performing multi-modal recognition on all events by using multiple artificial intelligence technologies to divide the events into sub-events in multiple dimensions, establishing an event descriptive model according to the sub-events, and describing various teaching behavior events of the teacher in a classroom. The present invention divides a classroom video according to voice, which can ensure the completeness of the teacher's non-verbal behavior in each event to the greatest extent. Also, a descriptive model that uniformly describes all events is established by extracting commonality between different events, which can not only complete the description of various teaching behaviors of the teacher, but also reflect the correlation between events, so that the events are no longer isolated.

title: Mechanical fault diagnosis simulation system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a mechanical fault diagnosis simulation system based on artificial intelligence, which is characterized by comprising a rotating device, a vibration sensor and an artificial intelligence fault diagnosis module, the vibration sensor is arranged on the rotating device, and the vibration sensor is electrically connected with the artificial intelligence fault diagnosis module. According to the utility model, when artificial intelligence deep learning technology teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can simultaneously obtain theory and practice knowledge, and the colleges and universities can output more talents mastering development and application of the artificial intelligence deep learning technology. The mechanical fault diagnosis simulation system based on the artificial intelligence has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: AI AI-based golf swing teaching method and device
abstract_text: 본 발명은 사용자로 하여금 화면상으로 보다 편리하고 쉬운 접근뿐만 아니라 조작까지 가능한 실시간 조작 도움말의 디지털 비디오 레코딩장치에 관한 것으로, 더욱 상세하게는 사용자가 별도의 디지털 비디오 레코딩 시스템에 대한 지식이나 안내서가 없어도 실시간으로 화면 디스플레이되는 조작 도움말을 보고 정확한 조작이 가능할 수 있도록 개량된 디지털 비디오 레코딩장치에 관한 것이다. 이를 위한 본 발명은, 전체 시스템의 제어 및 통제하는 코덱(CODEC) + 중앙처리장치(CPU)의 시스템 제어부(70)에는 카메라와 디코더의 영상입력부(10), 메모리(SDRAM)의 도움말 제어부(20), 하드디스크 드라이버(HDD)의 도움말 저장부(30), LAN, 프론트 키, 조그 셔틀의 도움말 인터페이스부(40), 메모리(ROM)의 도움말 데이터부(50) 및 모니터와 엔코더, 오디오 코덱과 마이크/스피커의 도움말 출력부(60)가 각각 연결되도록 구성되어; 모니터상에 메뉴키를 입력하면 화면에 메뉴가 디스플레이되고 있으며, 이어 포커스 항목에 대한 도움말 설명을 화면 하단에 디스플레이시키고, 항목을 변경함에 따라 변경항목에 대한 도움말 설명을 디스플레이시킨 것을 그 특징으로 한다.

title: Sorting robot practical training platform based on visual inspection
applicants: JIANGSU CHANGJIANG INTELLIGENT MANUFACTURING RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a sorting robot practical training platform based on visual inspection. The sorting robot practical training platform comprises a practical training table, a robot, a visual inspection module, a linear cylinder module, four groups of conveyor belts, four card boxes and an automatic turnover device. The six-axis robot is fixed on the rear side of the practical training table; the visual inspection module, the linear cylinder module, the conveyor belt and the automatic turnover device are mounted on the practical training table; the card box is installed on the front side of the practical training table and below the tail end of the conveying belt. According to the utility model, practical teaching activities of robot sorting can be realized, and practical teaching activities of interdisciplines such as a visual inspection technology and an automatic control technology based on deep learning are satisfied on the premise of ensuring the safety of teachers and students.

title: Object position detection device and method
abstract_text: The present invention provides an object position detection device capable of detecting an object with high accuracy even in a situation where a plurality of objects or structures approaching, such as reflected wave interference, approach compared to the prior art. The object position detection device detects the position of an object on the basis of a radar signal from a radar device. An object position detection device is provided with a position estimation unit (4) that estimates the presence or absence and position of an object on the basis of image data including a radar signal using a machine learning model obtained by learning on the basis of predetermined teaching image data indicating the position of the object, and outputs image data indicating the presence or absence or position of the estimated object. Here, the image data is two-dimensional image data for the azimuth distance or three-dimensional image data for the azimuth distance and the relative velocity. The teaching image data is represented by an object label, which is a graph configured by a plurality of pixels representing the position of the object.

title: Taekwondo teaching scoring system based on computer vision
applicants: GUANGXI VOCATIONAL & TECHNICAL INST OF INDUSTRY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a taekwondo teaching scoring system based on computer vision, particularly relates to the technical field of teaching assistance, and comprises a student training test module, a data acquisition module, a data processing module, a difficulty assessment model establishment module, a data calculation module, a teaching scoring module and a result feedback module. A sensor technology, a camera device and a computer vision technology are adopted to carry out data acquisition and processing on taekwondo tests and basic training of students, an artificial intelligence model based on deep learning is systematically constructed, the taekwondo technical difficulty of the students is scored according to the taekwondo contact performance of the students, and the taekwondo technical difficulty of the students is determined. The system calculates the comprehensive evaluation index of each student through various data, scores the comprehensive evaluation indexes of the students according to the scoring standard, and feeds back the scoring result to the intelligent terminal of the user, so that the fairness and accuracy of scoring are ensured, the workload of teachers is reduced, and the working efficiency of the teachers is improved.

title: PREDICTION METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR PREDICTING PLASTIC STRAIN DISTRIBUTION, RESIDUAL STRESS DISTRIBUTION, OR DEFORMATION
abstract_text: The present invention provides a prediction method that can predict a plastic strain distribution, deformation distribution, or residual stress distribution in a short time and with high accuracy. The prediction method according to the present invention is for predicting a plastic strain distribution, residual stress distribution, or deformation of an object, and includes a step for outputting predictive output data corresponding to a plastic strain distribution from predictive input data that includes heating conditions by using a machine learning model that has been trained using teaching data, which includes input data for learning that includes heating conditions and output data for learning that corresponds to a plastic strain distribution calculated from the heating conditions using a numerical analysis method.

title: Intelligent intelligent manufacturing practical training teaching equipment
applicants: SICHUAN JIUZHANG ZHIZAO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent intelligence manufacturing teaching equipment teaching, and discloses intelligent intelligence manufacturing practical training teaching equipment which comprises an intelligent warehousing system, a robot system, a simulation processing and quality detection system and a sorting system. The system has the advantages that the mechanical design and model selection practical operation capabilities of students are cultivated, and the students are enabled to skillfully apply common mechanical components and non-standard system design; common mechanical components such as a motor control technology, a pneumatic technology, a sensor technology, quality detection and analysis, a transmission line and the like can be skillfully applied; the on-site practical operation capability of the automatic control technology of students is cultivated; students are trained to more intuitively understand components of the industrial 4.0 intelligent manufacturing factory; the control logic capability of MES, WCS, PLC, AI, IOT and other technologies and systems of students is exercised; the AI industrial vision technology development, debugging and optimization capabilities of students are trained; and the mechatronics comprehensive application design practical operation capability of students is cultivated.

title: Student information management system for online education
applicants: HUAXIN CLOUD INFORMATION TECH SHANDONG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of online education, and discloses an online education student information management system comprising a central controller used for starting the whole system; the student information management module is used for managing basic information and student status information of students; the course management module is used for managing all set course information; the course selection management module is used for students to autonomously select courses according to own demands and plans and submit course selection applications; and the student score management module is used for recording examination scores and usual scores of the students. Through the arrangement of the online interaction management module, the interaction between teachers and students is improved, then the learning effect is improved, the interaction between the teachers and the students can help the students to better understand knowledge, clarify concepts, integrate thinking and carry out deep learning, and meanwhile, the teachers can better understand the learning conditions and difficulties of the students and adjust the teaching content and method in a targeted mode.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR JOINT PREDICTIVE MODELING OF MULTIPLE TARGETING SEGMENTS
abstract_text: This teaching relates to predictive targeting. Training data are obtained with pairs of data. Each pair includes an ad opportunity context corresponding to an ad served to a plurality of audiences and a label vector having a plurality of labels, each of which indicates a reaction, with respect to the ad served, of a corresponding one of the audiences in the ad opportunity context. Based on the training data, model parameters of a joint predictive model are learned via machine learning based on an initialized model with initial model parameters by minimizing a loss in an iterative process. The learned joint predictive model is to be used to map an input context of an ad opportunity to an output label vector having a plurality of probabilities, each of which predicts a likelihood of a reaction of a corresponding one of the audiences to the input context of the ad opportunity.

title: Data searching method, system and equipment based on artificial intelligence and medium
applicants: SICHUAN XIWANG YUNHUI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a data searching method, system and device based on artificial intelligence and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: receiving a voice control instruction based on an intelligent voice interaction program, and starting a voice input function; receiving voice search information through the voice input function, and receiving, recognizing and sorting the voice search information expressed by a user to obtain an information data set; importing the information data set into an AI data model; the voice search information is received through the voice input function, the voice search information expressed by the user is received, recognized and sorted, the information data set is obtained, related data and information are searched through the AI data model, the search result is obtained, and the method is simple, convenient and high in intelligent degree; by recognizing the voice information of the teacher and automatically searching the data on the computer, the artificial intelligence calls the required data, which is very convenient and rapid, and the classroom teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Intelligent human motion planning system based on conditional generative adversarial network
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence and robots, in particular to a human body action intelligent planning system based on a conditional generative adversarial network. The system comprises a data preprocessing module, a conditional generative adversarial network module and an action planning module, potential distribution characteristics of human body action data are implicitly learned by using the conditional generative adversarial network, and a specified action plan similar to a real human body action is generated based on an action description text given by a user. Through the system, the problems of huge teaching action cost, complicated track generation program, low action acquisition efficiency and the like in the existing humanoid action planning technical process can be solved, the diversity of robot action planning is greatly enriched, and an action generation model is provided for subsequent intelligent action planning in each field.

title: Teaching blog combined with chat robot system
abstract_text: A teaching blog combined with a chat robot system to assist the lecturer in teaching courses and answer questions from students or students. The feature of the present invention is to use voice recognition to confirm the identity of the student, and record the content of the student's question and answer in the database of the teaching system through voice Based on the recognition and the model training mechanism of artificial intelligence natural language processing technology, artificial intelligence assistant teachers will be able to more accurately answer course information and professional course content, and can also perform classroom teacher-student interaction tasks.

title: COLOR PREDICTION MODEL CREATION METHOD AND COLOR PREDICTION MODEL CREATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: To provide a color prediction model creation method capable of shortening the time required for generation of teacher data and generation of a color prediction model, and a color prediction model creation system.SOLUTION: A color prediction model creation method, which is a color prediction model creation method of creating a color prediction model by means of machine learning, using teacher data in which an ink amount set that is the combination of ink amounts of ink used for printing is mapped with the spectral reflectivity of a printed matter printed on a printing medium by means of the ink amount set, includes a step S22 of acquiring a medium identifier that represents a kind of the printing medium, a step S26 of acquiring an ink amount set matching an acquired medium identifier, a step S30 of generating teaching data, using the acquired ink amount set, and a step S31 of creating a color prediction model by performing machine learning by means of generated teacher data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

title: Deep learning algorithm-based clinical teaching teacher transient behavior model evaluation system
applicants: SHANGHAI JIAOTONG UNIV SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
abstract_text: The invention provides a clinical teaching teacher transient behavior model evaluation system based on a deep learning algorithm. The clinical teaching teacher transient behavior model evaluation system is characterized in that a high-speed camera is connected with 5G network communication equipment; the high-speed camera is connected with the face recognition equipment, and the face recognition equipment is connected with the 5G network communication equipment; the 5G network communication equipment is connected with the cloud server cluster; a teaching behavior analysis management system, a transient behavior analysis scoring system and a dynamic vision library are installed in the cloud server cluster. According to the invention, behaviors of students and teachers are evaluated timely and accurately, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Internet of Things teaching platform based on Internet of Things and deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI YUYANG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an Internet of Things teaching platform based on Internet of Things and deep learning, which comprises a student end, the student end is connected with an online class work completion end, the online class work completion end is connected with a basic communication task feedback module, and the basic communication task feedback module is connected with a teacher end and a functional task feedback module. The functional task feedback module is connected with the teacher end and the homework completion analysis module, the homework completion analysis module is connected with the teacher end, the teacher end is connected with the functional task creation module, and the functional task creation module is connected with the basic communication task module and the class work online completion end. The platform can effectively detect and feed back the real-time learning state and learning efficiency of the students to the teacher, and the classroom teaching quality is effectively improved; according to different curriculum contents, customizable curriculum contents and curriculum key points are provided, and classroom learning conditions of students are analyzed more reasonably.

title: Intelligent ultrasonic teaching platform and equipment fusing virtual reality and large language model
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent ultrasonic teaching platform and device fusing virtual reality and a big language model, the intelligent ultrasonic teaching platform constructs a virtual teaching scene, and the virtual teaching scene is implanted with an auxiliary diagnosis module, a big language module and a multi-channel video teaching module. The auxiliary diagnosis module is used for determining a diagnosis result based on the ultrasonic image and displaying the diagnosis result in the virtual teaching scene; the large language module is used for performing question and answer interaction in a virtual teaching scene; and the multi-channel video teaching module is used for playing ultrasonic teaching video resources. By combining artificial intelligence, virtual reality and a big language platform, full-stack real-time intelligent assistance and opinion guidance are provided in the early, middle and later stages of ultrasonic scanning teaching, and high-quality teaching is provided for doctors anytime and anywhere, so that the popularity rate and the teaching quality of primary ultrasonic teaching training can be improved.

title: Knowledge point sorting method based on multi-dimensional information
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teacher teaching, in particular to a knowledge point sorting method based on multi-dimensional information. The method comprises the following steps: constructing initial knowledge point information by obtaining knowledge points; constructing a statistical basic diagram according to the occurrence frequency of knowledge points in the initial knowledge point information; according to the textbook directory hierarchical structure and statistical information weighting, sorting is carried out; and a machine learning classification algorithm model based on simple machine learning logistic regression is constructed. According to the knowledge point sorting method based on multi-dimensional information provided by the invention, the importance of knowledge points is comprehensively considered based on multi-dimensional data in a statistical information arrangement mode, and meanwhile, a classification model is constructed to perform business importance classification on the knowledge points; the PageRank algorithm is used for accurate scoring, under the condition that the knowledge point directory structure is guaranteed, rapid interaction with subject professionals is achieved, the model is continuously iterated, the marking efficiency is improved, and meanwhile the accuracy of knowledge point sorting is guaranteed.

title: DEEP LEARNING IN BIPARTITE MEMRISTIVE NETWORKS
abstract_text: A bipartite memristive network and method of teaching such a network is described herein. In one example case, the memristive network can include a number of nanofibers, wherein each nanofiber comprises a metallic core and a memristive shell. The memristive network can also include a number of electrodes deposited upon the nanofibers. A first set of the number of electrodes can include input electrodes in the memristive network, and a second set of the number of electrodes can include output electrodes in the memristive network. The memristive network can be embodied as a bipartite memristive network and trained according to the method of teaching described herein.

title: AUTOMATIC DESIGN METHOD AND AUTOMATIC DESIGN PROGRAM FOR LIFTING DEVICE
