abstract_text: To efficiently perform design of a lifting device with appropriate specifications designed for a building structure by using information on the past operating state of the lifting device.SOLUTION: An automatic design method for a lifting device executes: a learning step of building a learning model 74 by performing machine learning using, as teaching data Dt, building structure design data D1 being design data of a completed building structure 10, lifting device design data D2 being design data of a lifting device 14 built in correspondence with the completed building structure 10, and operating state history information Dh on a database unit 66; and an output step of inputting building structure design data D3 of the building structure 10 designed this time to the learning model 74, thereby causing the learning model 74 to output lifting device design data D4 of the lifting device 14 to be designed this time.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 11

title: Outdoor AI education projection equipment
abstract_text: The utility model discloses outdoor AI education projection equipment, belongs to the field of AI projection equipment, is used for outdoor teaching, and is characterized in that the AI projection equipment is located on a supporting assembly, the supporting assembly is located in a protection box, the top of the protection box is open, and the top opening is connected with a box cover; the supporting assembly comprises a supporting plate, a supporting column is hinged to the side edge of the supporting plate through a side wall hinge hole, and the supporting column is inserted into a supporting guide base and connected with the supporting guide base through a pin shaft. The supporting guide seat is located on the side wall of the protection box, a box body sleeve is further arranged in the protection box, a supporting plate adjusting rod is inserted into the box body sleeve, and the supporting plate adjusting rod is matched with a sleeve supporting hole in the box body sleeve through a hinged rod body supporting block; a torsional spring is arranged at the hinged position of the supporting plate adjusting rod and the rod body supporting block. The protection and placement device can be provided for AI projection equipment needed when students are organized to carry out live-action teaching or group activities at night, and dependence on other table and chair supports is reduced.

title: Intelligent teaching method and system based on AI intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, and particularly discloses an intelligent teaching method and system based on AI intellectualization, and the method comprises the steps: S1, building basic data models for teachers, students and parents according to classes, endowing the basic data models with learning evaluation initial attributes, and determining the basic data models to be zero by default; s2, obtaining score information of all students, carrying out classification processing on the information, obtaining in-class test information of the students, and carrying out classification processing on the in-class test information; s3, obtaining classified content such as score information and in-class test information; according to the method, the AI intelligent technology is combined, the acceptance model of the class is trained through information such as class exercises and test scores, as time goes on, the model becomes more and more mature, accurate score information and acceptance information reference can be provided for teachers and parents, and reference is provided for teaching progress arrangement and homework exercise content adjustment.

title: Robot stud nail roller surfacing path planning method based on point cloud
applicants: JIANGSU WUDE PRECISION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent welding manufacturing, in particular to a robot stud nail roller surfacing path planning method based on point cloud. The overlaying path is projected to the cylindrical central axis of the stud roller twice in an auxiliary mode to complete the row and column sequence of the mass center of the ceramic columns, the upper edges and the lower edges of every two adjacent ceramic columns on the same column serve as the terminal point and the starting point of the segmented welding path respectively, and all the small segments of welding paths are sequentially connected to finally form an automatic welding track. Key features of the weldment are segmented and extracted through a deep learning algorithm, the height size of data is sensed by the model by utilizing the characteristic that ceramic columns protrude out of the surface of the weldment in a step shape, and the segmentation precision is improved; the central axis of the stud roller is obtained by fitting a spatial three-dimensional circle according to columns and then fitting a straight line from each circle center; sequencing of the mass centers is completed through two times of auxiliary projection, and finally planning of a surfacing path is achieved; when the working content changes, teaching is not needed, the workload of welding operators is reduced, the application range is wide, and the surfacing quality stability is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education classroom interaction method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence education classroom interaction method and system, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the information of a teacher end and a student end, and building the data connection between the teacher end and the student end; obtaining task progress data of the student end, and comparing the task progress data with a preset standard progress bar; if the task progress data of the student terminal is lower than the standard progress bar, a to-be-helped prompt is sent to the teacher terminal, and the teacher terminal obtains a student terminal operation interface and a student terminal control authority; the teacher terminal establishes communication connection with the student terminal to realize remote guidance; the student terminal completes and submits the works, and the teacher terminal scores and records the works. According to the artificial intelligence education classroom interaction method provided by the invention, the standard progress bar is preset, in the teaching process, the student terminal is monitored, and the teacher terminal can timely guide the students, help the students to complete works, accelerate and help the students to master and apply knowledge points and technologies, and improve the learning interest of the students.

title: Intelligent classroom analysis and identification method and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to a smart classroom analysis and identification method and device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of smart classrooms, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a real-time on-class monitoring image in a target classroom; inputting the preprocessed on-class monitoring image into the trained student class state analysis model, and obtaining a behavior analysis result of each student in the on-class monitoring image; obtaining a student behavior distribution diagram of the target classroom based on the behavior analysis result, and sending the student behavior distribution diagram of each classroom to a display screen; by adopting the method, the behavior actions of the students in the classroom in the teaching process can be comprehensively analyzed, and a user can conveniently obtain the learning quality of the students in real time.

title: Big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data artificial intelligence teaching practical training room platform, and relates to the technical field of teaching practical training room platforms, the teaching practical training room platform comprises a teaching practical training room platform room, and the inner wall of one side of the teaching practical training room platform room is fixedly provided with a surrounding large screen. Through cooperation of the teaching practical training room platform chamber, the surrounding large screen, the teaching platform, the teaching display, the main console, the main display, the input disc, the starter, the winding box, the cloth outlet groove, the winding roller, the dustproof cloth and the control motor box, the main console is used for controlling the surrounding large screen to realize comprehensive teaching operation; a student can use the teaching display to perform practice learning and double-sided learning by directly turning back, the comprehensiveness and the efficiency of teaching are ensured, when the surrounding large screen is not used, the main console is directly used for controlling the dustproof cloth to fall down, a certain dustproof effect is performed on the surface of the surrounding large screen, the definition of the surrounding large screen is ensured, and the teaching effect is improved. Meanwhile, the service life of the device is prolonged.

title: Method for compressing network based on knowledge migration
applicants: SHANDONG INSPUR SCIENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, in particular to a method for compressing a network based on knowledge migration, which comprises the following steps: step 1, manually designing a lightweight model; 2, initializing network parameters; 3, measuring the sensitivity of each layer on the trained network; 4, finely adjusting door parameters; 5, repeating the step 3 and the step 4, and finally obtaining a compressed network containing most of information; step 6, deploying the compressed network into an embedded device; the system has the beneficial effects that a lightweight network for detecting student emotion recognition is arranged in the embedded equipment, and the teaching quality can be improved in combination with a small camera.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, TREATMENT SYSTEM, LEARNING DEVICE, AND IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: Provided are an image processing device, a treatment system, a learning device, and an image processing method that make it possible to continue treatment of a treatment site even when the field of view of an endoscope has deteriorated. This image processing device comprises: an image acquisition unit that acquires cloudy image data including at least a portion of an area where cloudiness has occurred, the area being an area of a living body to be treated using an energy treatment tool; an estimation unit that estimates an object included in the image corresponding to the cloudy image data, using a trained model obtained through machine learning of teaching data in which are associated, with one another, a plurality of pieces of annotation image data obtained by annotating the object included in the plurality of treatment images corresponding to the plurality of pieces of treatment image data in which at least the area of the living body to be treated using the energy treatment tool is imaged, and an identification result in which the object included in each of the plurality of treatment images is identified; and a display image generation unit that generates a display image pertaining to the object on the basis of the cloudy image data acquired by the image acquisition unit and the object estimated by the estimation unit.

title: LEARNING METHOD, ESTIMATION METHOD, LEARNING ESTIMATION SYSTEM, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: In order to learn/estimate correspondence relationships between input fields and elements corresponding to those input fields on the basis of a visual configuration of a screen, this learning estimation system 200 comprises a learning device 210 and an estimation device 220. The learning device comprises: a time-of-learning disposition means 231 that disposes input fields on a screen and elements corresponding with those input fields in a planar coordinate system; a time-of-learning acquisition means 232 that acquires the relative positional relationships in the planar coordinate system of the input fields and the elements corresponding to those input fields; and a machine learning model creation means 233 that creates a machine learning model by carrying out machine learning using teaching data that uses the relative positional relationships as correct-answer labels as input. The estimation device comprises: a time-of-estimation disposition means 241 that disposes input fields on a screen and elements in a planar coordinate system; a time-of-estimation acquisition means 242 that acquires the relative positional relationship in the planar coordinate system of a certain input field and element; and an estimation means 243 that inputs the relative positional relationship into the learned model, and estimates that the elements in output relative positions are the elements corresponding to the input fields.

title: AUTOMATIC CLASSIFICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM OF TEACHING VIDEOS BASED ON DIFFERENT PRESENTATION FORMS
abstract_text: The present disclosure belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an automatic classification method and system of teaching videos based on different presentation forms, which with three convolutional neural network models, may accurately locate the information required for teaching video classification by two self-trained YOLOV4 target detection neural network models and human body key point detection technology, solves the problem that the background and character features of teaching videos do not change significantly, and improves the accuracy of feature extraction. The structure of the self-built convolutional neural network models is suitable for classification of Interview type and Head type teaching videos. The depth of the network is just appropriate compared with several classical video classification algorithms, which reduces the energy consumption of computer hardware. Using other related image data sets preprocessed as the required training sets breaks through the bottleneck in data sets of teaching video.

title: AGING AWARE REWARD CONSTRUCT FOR MACHINE TEACHING
abstract_text: The techniques disclosed herein enable systems to integrate aging awareness into machine learning agents for management of control systems. To achieve this, the machine learning agent extracts a set of states and an aging model from the control system and derives an aging term from the aging model. Based on the states and the aging term, the machine learning agent determines a set of actions that are applied to the control system. Subsequently, the machine learning agent can extract a new set of states to analyze the efficacy of the set of actions. This is achieved through an optimality function that quantifies the success of the set of actions by calculating an optimality score. The calculation is based on both a current performance of the system and a future drift or degradation of system components. Through many iterations of the action set, the machine learning agent can optimize system operations.

title: Rapid AI teaching method suitable for vocational skill teaching field
applicants: SHANGHAI WANLIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a rapid AI teaching method suitable for the field of vocational skill teaching. The rapid AI teaching method comprises the following steps: step 1, system integration; step 2, account login; step 3, proposing a problem; step 4, learning communication; step 5, evaluation and improvement; in the first step, a natural language processing technology, an online collaborative learning technology, a webpage rendering technology, a search and recommendation technology function module and a data management and analysis technology are integrated into an AI teaching system, and the AI teaching system can provide personalized learning support and suggestions according to learning data and feedback information of students; according to the invention, learning efficiency and quality are improved, online collaborative learning and communication are promoted, learning resources and channels are expanded, teaching cost is reduced, efficiency and personalized learning support and suggestion are improved, and a more scientific, more efficient and more humanized digital learning and education solution is provided for students and teachers.

title: Education device for assisting science popularization volunteer service
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education device for assisting a science popularization volunteer service, and the device obtains a question voice signal provided by a volunteer, and a first alternative answer. And by adopting an artificial intelligence technology based on deep learning, mining relevance feature information between the question voice semantic understanding feature of the volunteer and the semantic understanding feature of the alternative answer, so as to perform voice answer matching of the question of the volunteer, thereby optimizing the accuracy and efficiency of science popularization teaching.

title: Teaching behavior identification method for middle and primary school classrooms
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of behavior feature recognition, and particularly discloses a teaching behavior recognition method for middle and primary school classrooms, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an original classroom teaching video, and segmenting the original classroom teaching video into a plurality of short videos; labeling the short video by using a labeling label to obtain picture sequence data; and constructing a recognition model, and training the recognition model based on the picture sequence data to obtain a teaching behavior recognition model. Based on the real classroom teaching video, the classroom teaching behavior data set special for middle and primary schools is constructed, a data basis is provided for automatic identification and analysis of classroom teacher and student behaviors through the artificial intelligence technology, and therefore the teaching behavior research cost of traditional methods such as questionnaire survey and interview is effectively reduced.

title: Chinese reading training system based on artificial intelligence and eye movement capture technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to a Chinese reading training system based on artificial intelligence and an eye movement capturing technology, and the system comprises a detection system which collects an eyeball track and a hotspot map of a user; the collection system is used for collecting fixation data and eye jump data; the suggestion system compares data collected by the detection system and the collection system with data obtained by natural language processing technology analysis, and gives suggestions and reading promotion plan arrangement based on reading speed, reading skills, key information extraction, memory and attention; according to the method, words concerned when a reader reads a text are recorded through an eye tracker, keywords of the text are obtained through a natural language processing technology, the words concerned when the reader reads the text are compared with the keywords of the text obtained through the natural language processing technology, and problems existing during reading are obtained. A natural language processing technology is applied and an eye movement technology is combined to provide auxiliary training for Chinese reading of students, so that a teacher can carry out more accurate teaching guidance.

title: Character learning system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN ZHILIANSHUN SUPPLY CHAIN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of literacy teaching, and discloses a literacy system and method based on artificial intelligence. The literacy system comprises a display module; the teaching module is used for calling corresponding teaching contents to display and output; four links of reading, reciting, slicing and card flashing must be executed in sequence in the teaching module, and in addition, translation links can be selected according to different learning requirements; the assessment module is used for calling the corresponding assessment content to display and output; the intelligent control module is used for scoring according to the pronunciation data acquired by the voice acquisition module and the teaching content or the examination content corresponding to the pronunciation data, and is used for outputting the score after the current teaching content or the examination content is finished; and selecting a corresponding teaching mode and an assessment mode according to the accuracy of the collected pronunciation phonemes, the number of repetitions and the historical score data of the user. According to the character learning system, through continuous interaction with the user, the invalid practice frequency is greatly reduced, so that the learning efficiency can be improved.

title: Big data interactive teaching training system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data interactive teaching practical training method, which comprises the following steps of: 1, constructing a teaching practical training platform on a cloud server, developing teacher review, student review and interconnection teaching subsystems, and writing an AI algorithm, 2, inputting course videos into the subsystems by teachers, checking the videos and scoring by students, and 3, carrying out the teaching practical training on the cloud server. Step 3, a process of marking student homework by a teacher, inputting the student homework into the system, calling an algorithm by the platform, and training and learning the marking process of the teacher; step 4, training a model by the platform, calling an AI reference model to mark the homework, making course notes by the students, recording original creators by the system, and bringing score assessment, AI, scoring the notes by the teacher and the students, and providing high-score and high-quality notes for reference by the students; 5, the videos and the notes with high scores are pushed to an interconnected teaching subsystem through the platform for learning reference of teachers and students in various places, and the system has the ability of changing a traditional marking mode of interactive teaching and practical training and exciting teaching interaction of the teachers and the students.

title: Automatic textbook structuring method based on deep learning
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of higher education, in particular to an automatic textbook structuring method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: collecting teaching materials, and preprocessing the collected teaching materials; traditional teaching materials and electronic teaching materials are collected from teaching materials published by the Internet, a library and a publishing house; screening the preprocessed teaching material data; different contents can be analyzed and identified according to whether the teaching materials can be analyzed or not; and classifying the textbook pages through a ResNet deep learning technology, and identifying directory pages in the textbook. The automatic textbook structuring method based on deep learning provided by the invention is used for improving the readability and the searchability of the textbook: since the textbook is automatically structured into a data model of a tree structure, a user can more quickly find required contents, and the readability and the searchability of the textbook are improved; the method is of great significance in the aspects of lesson preparation of teachers, learning of students, review of examinees and the like.

title: Real-time display system for AI piano teaching
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of piano teaching, in particular to an AI piano teaching real-time display system which comprises a piano body, a groove is formed in the top of the piano body, a sliding rod is fixedly connected in the groove, a first through hole is formed in one side of the piano body, and a second through hole is formed in the other side of the piano body. A groove is formed in the piano body, a lifting assembly is arranged in the piano body, a display assembly is arranged in the piano body, a controller is fixedly connected to one side of the piano body, one side of the lead screw is rotationally connected to the interior of the groove, and a driven gear is fixedly connected to one side of the lead screw. The piano has the advantages that the lead screw drives the display screen to move up and down, the display screen can be placed in the piano body through the lifting assembly, the display screen is protected, the problem that the display screen is exposed outside the piano and is prone to being collided and damaged is solved, the service life of the display screen is prolonged, and practicability is improved.

title: Multimedia culture education courseware display equipment
applicants: SHAANXI ZHONGTIAN DENGLINGGU ENTPR HATCHING CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses multimedia culture education courseware display equipment, which relates to the technical field of teaching display equipment, and comprises a base, a support frame is arranged at the upper end of the base, a display screen is arranged on one side of the support frame, and a display screen is arranged on the other side of the support frame. An automatic adjusting assembly is arranged at the joint of the supporting frame and the display screen, and a connecting plate, an infrared sensor, an AI camera and a control button are arranged on the outer side of the display screen. According to the multimedia culture education courseware display equipment, through the arrangement of an automatic adjusting assembly, in the use process of the equipment, an infrared sensor and an AI camera are matched with the face of a user, and when the user is away from a display screen, the display screen is controlled to move upwards; and operation of the motor is stopped until the infrared sensor can recognize that the user or the moving block abuts against the limiting switch, the height of the user can be automatically adjusted, and then the practicability of the equipment is improved.

title: Intelligent solving method, system and equipment for mathematical application questions and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mathematical application question intelligent solving method, system and device and a storage medium, which are one-to-one corresponding schemes, in the scheme, through mathematical general knowledge formula guided mathematical application question intelligent solving, the accuracy of problem solving and the interpretability of a reasoning process can be improved, and in addition, the accuracy of problem solving can be improved. The constructed intelligent problem solving model comprising a knowledge system and an inference system can expand and fuse various machine learning tasks, so that the process of learning and applying common sense formula knowledge in a complex scene by human beings is simulated, and a certain basis is provided for exploring strong artificial intelligence; besides, the excavated formula knowledge can be used as prior information of intelligent reasoning tasks of numerous machines to improve task performance, and can also be used as teaching resources to assist an education platform to provide better teaching service, and certain potential application value is brought.

title: Online education management and service system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU DESUDA INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education management and service system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises an online teaching video management module which is used for carrying out the unique classification of an online education video, and obtaining a unique number; the account management module is used for storing accounts of a user, performing uniqueness classification on the accounts and obtaining uniqueness codes; the online management module is used for acquiring the authority of online equipment of a user, performing feature detection on the user in real time, and obtaining a feature detection value of the user; the online management module obtains a feature detection value of the user and outputs a matched feature result, and when the artificial intelligence plug-in module receives the feature result, the artificial intelligence plug-in module executes a preset neural network, generates intelligent information and sends the intelligent information to user online equipment; and the service module is used for acquiring intelligent information fed back by the user online equipment, obtaining a classification number through background analysis, and sending preset course information corresponding to the classification number to the user online equipment to complete the service.

title: Experiment teaching system based on augmented reality and machine vision
abstract_text: The invention relates to an experiment teaching system based on augmented reality and machine vision, which takes Microsoft Hololens 2 glasses as a hardware basis, comprises a development end, a client and a server end, and specifically comprises a virtual experiment equipment library, a three-dimensional registration module, a material rendering module, an intelligent guidance module, an information transmission module, a target recognition module and a man-machine interaction module, the system can be used for intelligent teaching of middle school experiments. The method specifically analyzes the characteristics of different experiments, models experimental apparatuses, recognizes the experimental apparatuses on the basis of a deep learning algorithm and in combination with a machine vision algorithm, monitors and analyzes the experimental process in real time, and feeds back and guides the experimental operation of students in real time. The problems that an existing virtual experiment is poor in immersion and cannot provide intelligent experiment guidance are solved, and the method can be expanded into a multi-person collaborative experiment.

title: Intelligent classroom roll call system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGDONG CHAOYUAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching systems, in particular to an intelligent classroom roll call system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a shooting module, a processing module, a storage module, a display module, an information transmission module and a cloud host. By arranging the shooting module, the storage module and the processing module, real-time shooting operation can be carried out on students through the shooting module during use, shot image information is processed through the processing module in real time, and shooting data and original data are compared and analyzed through a system program in the storage module; according to the classroom roll-call system, roll-call operation is convenient, replacement roll-call conditions are avoided, shot data can be updated in real time, the intelligent degree of the classroom roll-call system is improved, and roll-call accuracy is further improved. The system has the advantages of intelligent roll call and good teaching effect.

title: ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION MODEL GENERATION METHOD, ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION DEVICE, ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION METHOD, AND TRAINED MODEL
abstract_text: This abnormality determination model generation method comprises: detecting the load of a subject (S) by means of load sensors (LS1, LS2, LS3, LS4) disposed in a bed (BD); creating teaching data in which a plurality of kinds of feature amounts based on the detected load are respectively associated with abnormal states; and creating a model which classifies, on the basis of the plurality of kinds of feature amounts, states of the subject into the abnormal state by supervised machine-learning using the teaching data and determining, as an explanatory variable, at least one of the plurality of kinds of feature amounts on the basis of the model; and generating an abnormal determination model which determines, by means of the machine-learning using the explanatory variable, that the subject is in the abnormal state on the basis of the explanatory variable. The plurality of kinds of feature amounts include frequency feature amounts calculated by performing a short-time Fourier transform on the load of the subject.

title: IMAGE CONFIRMATION DEVICE AND IMAGE CONFIRMATION METHOD
abstract_text: This image confirmation device comprises an acquiring unit and a guiding unit. The acquiring unit extracts image feature amounts that are feature amounts of an entire image for each of teaching images that are a plurality of images which are used for machine learning and in which is imaged an object provided on a substrate by a substrate working machine that performs predetermined substrate working on a substrate, and acquires a feature amount distribution that is a distribution of the extracted feature amounts. The guiding unit guides the teaching images in order of the largest degree of deviation of the image feature amounts in the feature amount distribution acquired by the acquiring unit.

title: METHOD OF GENERATING A LEARNING MODEL FOR TRANSFERRING FLUID FROM ONE CONTAINER TO ANOTHER BY CONTROLLING ROBOT ARM BASED ON A MACHINE-LEARNED LEARNING MODEL, AND A METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR WEIGHING THE FLUID
abstract_text: A system for controlling a robot arm, a fluid contained in a container is poured into another container. A learning model is generated by a machine learning with teaching data. Practically, a plurality of sets of learning data are acquired, each set including i) time-series information showing a posture of a robot arm which holds a first container holding therein a target fluid and pouring the target fluid from the first container to a second container and ii) a weight of the second container which changes time serially. This learning model is used such that only two types of information consisting of the information showing the posture of the robot arm and the weight of the second container at a first time are inputted to the learning model and information showing the posture of the robot arm at a second time is outputted from the learning model.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ROTATION INVARIANT FINGERPRINT RECOGNITION
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for biometric authentication. Rotation covariant convolution kernels at multiple convolution layers are obtained with weights learned via machine learning based on rotation invariant (RI) training data. For an input image with fingerprint information captured therein related to a person to be authenticated, an initial feature map is obtained and then at each convolution layer, a feature map is processed based on the RC convolution kernels for the layer to output a rotation covariant (RC) feature map, with the feature map being either the initial feature map and an output RC feature map from a previous convolution layer. The last convolution layer outputs a rotation invariant (RI) feature vector representing fingerprint features of the person in a rotation invariant manner, which is then used to authenticate the person.

title: Teaching posture and expression application skill analysis method based on computer vision
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching posture and expression application skill analysis method based on computer vision, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the teaching video clip data of a target teacher, and carrying out the feature recognition processing of the video clip data, and obtaining the teaching posture data and the facial expression data; performing index calculation processing on the teaching posture data and the facial expression data based on a time baseline to obtain index parameters, the index parameters including a shoulder state, a leg state, an expression polarity proportion, a posture change frequency and an expression change frequency; and analyzing and evaluating the teaching posture and expression application skills of the target teacher according to the index parameters to obtain an analysis result. According to the embodiment of the invention, correlation analysis can be carried out according to the time dimension, teaching postures and expression application skills of teachers can be accurately evaluated and analyzed, and the method can be widely applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence.

title: Mechanical arm learning method and equipment for humanoid arm rigidity and motion skills
applicants: CHANGCHUN INST OPTICS FINE MECH & PHYSICS CAS
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of robot control and machine learning, and particularly provides a humanoid arm rigidity and motion skill mechanical arm learning method, computer equipment and a medium, and the method comprises a teaching demonstration stage and a learning stage, in the teaching demonstration stage, task trajectory information and human arm rigidity information are collected; in the learning stage, extraction of track information and arm rigidity information is completed, a corresponding motion track model and a corresponding adaptive rigidity model are established, control over the mechanical arm is achieved, motion planning of task tracks is completed while humanization-like rigidity skills are learned, the mechanical arm is made to have the variable rigidity skills while having the motion skills, and the mechanical arm is made to have the variable rigidity skills while learning humanization-like rigidity skills while learning humanization-like rigidity skills. And the mechanical arm can be applied to more working occasions such as man-machine cooperation and auxiliary medical treatment.

title: Auxiliary teaching method and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an auxiliary teaching method and device based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a question text of a user, and carrying out the word segmentation of the question text, and obtaining a word segmentation result; searching a sentence pattern template matched with the question text from a preset template library; identifying a target keyword from the word segmentation result, and filling a sentence pattern template according to the target keyword to obtain a question intention; respectively obtaining recommendation results corresponding to the question intention from a plurality of databases, and fusing the recommendation results; and outputting a fusion result corresponding to the recommendation result so that the user can carry out teaching according to the fusion result. Assisted teaching can be realized according to the artificial intelligence technology, and the method can be widely applied to the field of artificial intelligence teaching assistance.

title: AI assistance-based question bank knowledge point mining method and teaching service system
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI assistance-based question bank knowledge point mining method and a teaching service system, and the method comprises the steps: estimating a question answer vector for encoding loaded question answer data through a first temporary weak knowledge point estimation network generated through competition training, wherein the question answer vector comprises shared vectors corresponding to different training knowledge samples; then, a second temporary weak knowledge point estimation network is generated through adaptive network training according to the first temporary weak knowledge point estimation network, and a target weak knowledge point estimation network is obtained according to the second temporary weak knowledge point estimation network; therefore, the target weak knowledge point estimation network can also extract shared vectors corresponding to different training knowledge samples from the loaded question answering data, and the accuracy of weak knowledge point estimation in different fields can be improved.

title: Carrying robot for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: HAINAN YILIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a transfer robot for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a machine body, a first motor, a first worm and a first planet carrier, the bottom of the inner wall of the machine body is provided with the first motor, the outer wall of the first motor is provided with a first rotating shaft, the outer wall of the first rotating shaft is sleeved with a first worm gear, the outer wall of the machine body is provided with the first worm, and the first worm gear is sleeved with a second worm gear. And a first planet carrier is mounted on the outer wall of the first worm. The machine body, the first motor, the first worm and the first planet carrier are installed, the first motor is installed at the bottom of the inner wall of the machine body, the first rotating shaft is installed on the outer wall of the first motor, the first worm gear is installed on the outer wall of the first rotating shaft in a sleeving mode, and the first worm is installed on the outer wall of the machine body; a first planet carrier is mounted on the outer wall of the first worm, the function that the transfer robot crosses obstacles in the working process is achieved, and the problem that the obstacles cannot pass through the advancing route of the transfer robot in the working process is solved.

title: Intelligent physical education method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent physical education teaching method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining and processing the content of a physical education scene teaching course through VR terminal equipment, determining the layout of a target physical education teaching module, and teaching a target taught person. And comparing with a standard posture and a parameter index of the first target simulation following degree module, identifying a wrong posture of the target taught person by the VR terminal equipment, and correcting the wrong posture until the motion posture is correct, and finally, evaluating and scoring the motion training learning process of the target taught person by the VR terminal equipment. And recording the motion posture of each time. Through the implementation of the system and the method, in the physical education process, limitation of the physical education level of teachers, the stadium and the stadium is avoided, the user can move in the space through the corresponding scene in the large VR space, and the user can experience brand-new visual perception in a visual angle center, omnibearing and immersive mode.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device with protection function
applicants: SHANDONG LABOR VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL COLLEGE SHANDONG LABOR TECHNICIAN INST
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the related technical field of teaching devices, and discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device with a protection function, which comprises a base, protection plates are fixedly arranged on the two sides of the upper end of the base, a motor is fixedly arranged in the middle of the interior of the base, and the output end of the motor is fixedly connected with a lead screw. The outer wall of the lead screw is sleeved with a movable sleeve in a threaded mode, a fixed rod is fixedly arranged at the front end of the movable sleeve, a supporting rod is fixedly arranged at the front end of the fixed rod, sliding blocks are fixedly arranged on the two sides of the supporting rod, sliding grooves are formed in one sides of the two protection plates, and sliding rods are fixedly arranged in the middles of the interiors of the two sliding grooves. According to the teaching device, the supporting height can be adjusted, a teacher can be conveniently matched with teaching equipment in the teaching process, the teaching board can be protected, collision and scratches are avoided, and the protection performance of the teaching device is improved.

title: Big data and artificial intelligence teaching training platform based on computer
abstract_text: A computer-based big data and artificial intelligence teaching training platform disclosed by the present invention comprises a computer module and a training module, the computer module is connected with a local area network, the local area network is connected with a server, the server is connected with the training module, and the training module is connected with the computer module. The computer module comprises a data collection module, a data aggregation module, a data detection module and a data storage module, and further comprises a data conversion module, a data processing module and a data transmission module; the practical training module comprises a system login module, a basic test module, a teaching module, a practical training module and an evaluation module. According to the invention, targeted teaching and practical training can be carried out based on the basic level of the user, the practical training process of the user can be evaluated in real time, and the evaluation report is generated, so that the state of teaching and practical training can be monitored in real time, and teachers can be helped to reasonably arrange courses and corresponding resources.

title: Artificial intelligence education system applying big data
applicants: GUANGZHOU RUNXIN EDUCATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education system applying big data, which comprises a processor, the input end of the processor is electrically connected with an evaluation module, the input end of the evaluation module is electrically connected with a recognition unit, the input end of the recognition unit is electrically connected with a control unit, and the input end of the control unit is bidirectionally and electrically connected with a voice unit. The input end of the processor is electrically connected with a power supply module, and the output end of the processor is electrically connected with a display module. According to the invention, the voice unit controls the control unit, then the recognition unit monitors the emotion and answer conditions of a user through the processor and the evaluation module, and finally the processor sends data to the teaching terminal through the first data receiving and transmitting module and the second data receiving and transmitting module. A teacher can conveniently understand the answer data and the emotion data of each student in detail through the teaching terminal, the advantage of intelligent monitoring is achieved, and meanwhile the teacher can conveniently understand the question doing difficulty of each student.

title: Method for grammar analysis and vocabulary discrimination
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and a system for performing syntactic analysis on a text through a semantic tree and a syntactic logic parser. The method and the system realize automatic recognition of a sentence core structure, component classification, a modification relationship among components, part-of-speech, accurate word meaning and the like. The method is directly based on the grammatical rule and the teaching outline, the sentence component recognition accuracy is improved, meanwhile, the grammatical component labels are automatically marked on the sentences, and the analysis efficiency is improved. By combining with machine learning, the AI can better grasp the grammar analysis model, and the natural language processing technology level is effectively improved. The specific implementation mode comprises the steps of compiling a grammar analysis algorithm suitable for multiple languages, designing a script system for describing grammar knowledge points and the hierarchical relation of the grammar knowledge points, designing an analyzer to conduct sentence component analysis, and conducting difficulty evaluation in combination with a teaching program.

title: Education field multi-modal relation extraction method and device based on deep learning
applicants: BEIJING SIHAI XINTONG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning-based multi-modal relationship extraction method and device in the education field, and relates to the technical field of natural language processing. Comprising the following steps: acquiring multi-modal data of a to-be-identified education field; inputting the multi-modal data into the constructed multi-modal relation extraction model; wherein the multi-modal relation extraction model comprises a multi-modal relation category extraction model and a multi-modal entity recognition model; and according to the multi-modal data and the multi-modal relationship extraction model, obtaining an identification result of the multi-modal data in the education field. According to the method, the relationship between teaching courses in education can be sorted, the teaching scheme is optimized, and meanwhile, help is provided for construction of the knowledge graph in the education field.

title: Synchronous interactive remote teaching method, system and equipment
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a synchronous interaction remote teaching system, method and equipment, the remote teaching system comprises a test question video explanation module, the test question video explanation module comprises a keyword animation sub-module, an audio content sub-module and a blackboard writing sub-module; the keyword animation sub-module is used for synchronizing the content of the audio content sub-module and marking the content of the test question; the audio content sub-module is used for recording the audio explanation content of a lecturer on the test question; and the blackboard writing sub-module is used for restoring and recording the blackboard writing content written when the lecturer explains the test question. A test question video explanation module is arranged, the content of the test question video explanation module is applied to a driving test type APP, the content investigated by a test question and matters needing attention are clearly and comprehensively explained in a video mode, blackboard writing, animation and audio are adopted in the explanation process, key points are drawn, a user can understand explained knowledge points, and the user experience is improved. And a good experience effect is achieved.

title: Training and teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN ZHONGKE HUAYU EDUCATION MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a training and teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a connecting box, and the top of the connecting box is movably contacted with a transverse plate. A second motor drives a vertical rod to move through a second screw, the vertical rod drives an extrusion wheel to drive a connecting plate to move upwards, the connecting plate drives a transverse plate to move upwards, a vertical plate drives a blackboard to move, the height of a display screen and the height of the blackboard are adjusted, students write on the blackboard, a teacher corrects the content written on the blackboard through correct answers, and the teaching efficiency is improved. A first motor drives a moving block to move through a first screw rod, the moving block drives a gear to rotate through movement of a rack, the gear drives a connecting block to rotate through a cylinder, and a vertical plate drives a display screen to rotate, so that the display screen and the blackboard can perform multi-angle display, and students on the two sides can conveniently watch during classroom interaction; meanwhile, the height of the display screen and the height of the blackboard can be adjusted according to actual needs, users of different heights can watch and write conveniently, and teaching interaction is facilitated.

title: Interactive teaching management method and system for intellectual building practical training
applicants: SHENYANG INNOVATION & DESIGN RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intellectual building practical training interactive teaching management method and system, and relates to the field of virtual reality, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the basic information of target practical training equipment, carrying out the image and audio collection, and obtaining a collection result. And inputting the basic information, the image and the audio acquisition result into 3D simulation software, and creating a three-dimensional virtual practical training scene. And restoring the three-dimensional scene through the VR projection screen. And performing intellectual building practical training simulation in combination with a preset intellectual building practical training scheme, recording a student practical training simulation process by using image acquisition equipment, obtaining an image acquisition result, inputting the image acquisition result into the practical training simulation evaluation model, and obtaining a practical training simulation score. According to the invention, action recognition and evaluation are carried out through the training simulation evaluation model established and trained by the neural network based on deep learning, so that the technical problem that the training score of a trainee is not accurate due to low recognition accuracy can be solved. Therefore, the reliability of limb movement recognition is improved. And the accuracy and objectivity of the practical training score of the trainee are improved.

title: Intelligent playground system for intelligent teaching
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent education, and discloses an intelligent playground system for intelligent teaching, which comprises the following modules: an exercise data acquisition module for acquiring exercise video data of a user on a playground; the human body key point generation module is used for generating human body key point coordinates; the data preprocessing module is used for converting the human body key point coordinates from the image coordinate system to a relative coordinate system to obtain human body key point information; the data processing module is used for converting the human body key point information into sequence data; the model generation module is used for establishing a diving scoring model; according to the method, training is carried out based on deep learning to obtain the neural network model, the limb movement of user movement and the time continuity of the movement are comprehensively considered, the established prediction model integrates the factors to output the limb deviation angle of user movement, and reasonable suggestions are made for correcting the movement posture of the user.

title: Education knowledge graph system based on artificial intelligence and big data
applicants: BEIJING BEIWAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational knowledge graph system based on artificial intelligence and big data, a knowledge graph is constructed through multi-source heterogeneous data, the diversity and coverage of data are ensured, the teaching knowledge graph is analyzed and updated through natural language processing, the freshness of the teaching knowledge graph can be effectively ensured, and the teaching knowledge graph is more interesting. And the recommendation accuracy is improved. Through data mining and artificial intelligence analysis, learning behaviors of student users can be effectively analyzed, learning plans are made for the student users, and high-precision knowledge point recommendation is realized.

title: QUALITY AWARE MACHINE TEACHING FOR AUTONOMOUS PLATFORMS
abstract_text: The techniques disclosed herein enable systems to enhance autonomous process control platforms using a quality aware machine learning agent. To achieve this, a machine learning agent is integrated into a process control system. The machine learning agent extracts a set of states from an environment containing the process and defines a set of corresponding quality states which are then extracted from the environment as well. Based on the set of states and quality states, the machine learning agent determines a set of actions that modify operating parameters of the process. Applying the actions results in an updated set of states and quality states which can be analyzed to compute an optimality score, quantifying the effectiveness of the actions. Based on the updated states and quality states, the machine learning agent determines a modified set of actions to apply to the environment and increase the optimality score.

title: OPHTHALMIC INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, OPHTHALMIC APPARATUS, OPHTHALMIC INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: An ophthalmic information processing apparatus includes a determiner and a detector. The determiner is configured to determine a presence or absence of a disc hemorrhage for a front image of a fundus of a subject's eye, using a disc hemorrhage determination model obtained by performing machine learning using a plurality of fundus images labeled with labels indicating the presence or absence of a disc hemorrhage as first teaching data. The detector is configured to detect a disc hemorrhage region depicted in the front image that is determined to have the disc hemorrhage, using a disc hemorrhage region detection model obtained by performing machine learning using a plurality of pairs of image groups as second teaching data, each pair having a front image of a fundus and a disc hemorrhage region image representing a disc hemorrhage region depicted in the front image.

title: AI NFT . A choreography teaching system that utilizes the AI motion recognition function and a method of providing an NFT video transaction service
abstract_text: 본 발명은 AI 모션인식 기능을 활용한 안무 티칭 시스템 및 이를 이용하는 NFT 영상거래 서비스 제공방법에 관한 것으로서, 더욱 상세하게는 사용자에 안무영상을 AI 모션인식 기능으로 분석하여 적합한 안무 티칭을 제공해줄 뿐만 아니라, 안무가의 저작권 보호를 제공하는 AI 모션인식 기능을 활용한 안무 티칭 시스템 및 이를 이용하는 NFT 영상거래 서비스 제공방법에 관한 것이다.

title: Information analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence and big data
applicants: JIANGSU KONGZHI ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an information analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence and big data, and the system comprises a learning information collection module, a database, an information analysis module, a machine learning module and a training adjustment module, the learning information collection module collects test, learning and teaching data, and stores and manages all collected data through the database; the information analysis module analyzes test data and teaching data and draws an ability curve, the machine learning module fits the ability curve and establishes a teaching screening model, the training adjustment module screens teaching objects and training test questions and checks training results, and the teaching ability of the teacher is evaluated according to the comprehensive learning ability of the user and the comprehensive teaching ability of the teacher. Proper teaching objects and training test questions are matched, and the learning ability of the user is helped to be comprehensively and stably improved.

title: Learning method, learning apparatus, moving object control method, and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning method, a learning device, a moving body control method, and a storage medium, which can detect a travelable space of a moving body based on less learning data without complicating a hardware configuration for sensing. The learning method comprises the following steps: establishing a corresponding relationship between an extension region in an aerial view image and an annotation representing that the extension region is a three-dimensional object; and generating a learned model by learning parameters of the machine learning model so as to output a three-dimensional object in the bird's-eye view image when the bird's-eye view image is input, on the basis of teaching data in which the three-dimensional object in the bird's-eye view image is displayed on the basis of the three-dimensional object in the bird's-eye view image. A correspondence is established with an annotated bird's-eye view image in which a three-dimensional object in the bird's-eye view image is annotated.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system and artificial intelligence teaching method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching system and an artificial intelligence teaching method, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the learning state data of each student through a learning process video corresponding to each student, and determining the learning state of each student based on the learning state data; analyzing the registration information of each student to obtain identity information of each student, and obtaining target learning ability data corresponding to each student from a target teaching platform according to the identity information; and generating a target teaching strategy corresponding to each student based on the learning state and the target learning ability data, and determining a teaching scene corresponding to each student based on the target teaching strategy, thereby teaching each student through the target teaching strategy and the teaching scene. According to the invention, the teaching strategy corresponding to each student is generated based on the learning state and learning ability data corresponding to each student, and each student is subjected to teaching through the teaching strategy and the teaching scene, so that each student can be subjected to accurate and targeted teaching.

title: Yoga mat pressure detection device and method
applicants: LEYUAN NETWORK TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a yoga mat pressure detection device and method, and the method comprises the steps: collecting the pressure in a grid manner through a conduction line composed of an over-force sensitive resistance layer and two isolated conduction layers, producing a pressure detection diagram from the collected pressure points, and carrying out the matching of the pressure detection diagram to determine the yoga pressing action of a user, and the action accuracy is corrected. The yoga mat provided by the embodiment of the invention at least has the following beneficial effects that the production cost and the production difficulty of the yoga mat are reduced and the portability of the yoga mat is improved while the accurate pressure detection is ensured; the pressure of the grid detection points is collected, the pressure detection diagram is produced, the pressure detection diagram is mapped to the intelligent device, and the artificial intelligence model is adopted to perform yoga action matching on the pressure detection diagram, so that a yoga user can be taught, the action accuracy can be verified, and the teaching effect of yoga actions is improved.

title: Machine learning method
abstract_text: The second device executes the following steps: receiving an analysis result of the analysis machine on the food sample; analyzing the analysis result to obtain an analysis result; obtaining first information related to disclosure or hiding of the analysis result and second information related to disclosure or hiding of the analysis result; storing the first information in association with the analysis result, and storing the second information in association with the analysis result; and performing machine learning for predicting the analysis result using at least one of the analysis result or the analysis result subjected to the public setting as teaching data.

title: Intelligent course arrangement system based on artificial intelligence self-learning algorithm
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computer technology and teaching management, in particular to an intelligent course arrangement system based on an artificial intelligence self-learning algorithm. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a self-learning model, and checking an initial queuing training model of a teaching task on the basis of automatically measuring and calculating the course arrangement difficulty of teachers, classes and classrooms (or classroom types); and through self-learning queuing training, a reasonable sequence is finally obtained, and course arrangement is completed. Through the technical scheme provided by the invention, artificial intelligence self-learning training is realized, charts and data of each round of'non-scheduled class hours' and'unexpected class hours' in the whole self-learning process are obtained, the round of selecting 0'non-scheduled class hours' and least'unexpected class hours' is provided for a user, the optimal class schedule is obtained, intelligent class scheduling can be more efficiently realized, and various resource conflict problems are solved.

title: Spoken language teaching evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a spoken language teaching evaluation method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining audio data of a target text read by a student, carrying out the processing of the audio data to obtain n frames of audio segments, carrying out the feature extraction of each frame of audio segment, obtaining a feature vector set F, and further determining a to-be-recognized phoneme sequence P corresponding to the audio data; and aligning the to-be-recognized phoneme sequence P with the reference phoneme sequence C of the target text, and determining a phoneme sequence alignment result to generate a spoken language evaluation result of the student. According to the mode, the audio data of the target text read by the student is formed into the to-be-recognized phoneme sequence P through the artificial intelligence technology, the to-be-recognized phoneme sequence P is analyzed in the mode of aligning the to-be-recognized phoneme sequence P with the reference phoneme sequence C, the difference between each phoneme (can be refined into words or syllables) can be determined, the spoken language evaluation accuracy and evaluation precision are improved, and the spoken language evaluation efficiency is improved. The oral question of the student can be accurately positioned, and the oral ability of the student can be improved.

title: Tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of tourism management teaching, in particular to a tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a teaching table, a pressure sensor is fixedly arranged at the top end of a first track sleeve plate, and a second track sleeve plate is arranged at the top end of the first track sleeve plate. An outer glass layer and an inner glass layer are fixedly arranged between the top end of the base plate and the inner side of the bottom end of the cover plate, the bottom end of the cover plate is provided with an upper track guiding sleeve plate and a lower track guiding sleeve plate, and the bottom end of the track guiding sleeve plate is fixedly provided with an annular groove guide rail plate. A safety belt buckle and a safety belt buckle plate are arranged at the front end of the back plate; through the first track sleeve plate, the pressure sensor, the second track sleeve plate, the outer glass layer, the inner glass layer, the track guide sleeve plate, the back plate, the safety belt bag, the safety belt buckle and the safety belt buckle plate, a track guide function for tourism environment experience simulation teaching of experiencers is formed.

title: Intelligent physical education teaching management method and system
applicants: YUWEI YIZHI TECH DEVELOPMENT BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent physical education teaching management method and system, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: configuring a plurality of cameras at an examination point according to physical examination items and the position information of the examination point, and associating the plurality of cameras with the examination point; obtaining an examination number of an examinee, associating the examination number of the examinee with the examination point location, and starting a camera associated with the examination point location to record an examination video of the examinee; if the examinee initiates a complaint for the examination score, calling an examination video of the examinee according to the examination number, the examination starting time and the examination ending time of the examinee, and determining whether the complaint is valid or not through playback of the examination video of the examinee; and if the appeal is determined to be effective, testing the examinee again. According to the invention, the accuracy and reliability of the sports examination can be improved by quickly calling and playing back the sports examination video.

title: Artificial intelligence comprehensive application technology training system
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence comprehensive application technology practical training system which is characterized by comprising a rack, a storage device, an artificial intelligence processing and sorting device, a packaging device, a material transferring device and a master control module, and the storage device, the artificial intelligence processing and sorting device, the packaging device, the material transferring device and the master control module are all arranged on the rack. And the artificial intelligence processing and sorting device, the packaging device and the transferring and feeding device are all electrically connected with the master control module. According to the invention, when artificial intelligence technology comprehensive application teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can conveniently obtain theory and practice knowledge at the same time, and colleges and universities can conveniently output more talents mastering artificial intelligence technology development and comprehensive application; the artificial intelligence comprehensive application technology practical training system has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, convenient to use, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
applicants: HENAN INST OF ECONOMICS AND TRADE
abstract_text: The invention provides a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device, and relates to the technical field of education interaction devices.The novel artificial intelligence education interaction device comprises a desktop, a displayer above the desktop and a distance measuring probe outside the displayer, the bottom of the outer side wall of the displayer is slidably sleeved with an insertion frame, and the bottom end of the insertion frame is fixedly connected with a rotating cylinder; an acute angle supporting plate is fixedly connected to the outer side wall of the table top, a movable sliding cylinder is slidably connected to the upper surface of the acute angle supporting plate, a guide sliding rod is fixedly connected to the inner side wall of the movable sliding cylinder, and the outer side wall of the guide sliding rod is rotationally sleeved with the rotating cylinder. By means of the technical scheme, the problems that in the using process of an education interaction device in the related technology, the distance between a displayer and a student cannot be autonomously adjusted, the distance between the displayer and eyes is kept close for a long time, myopia and eyestrain of the student are likely to be caused, and the teaching effect is poor are solved. And adverse effects on the health of students are caused.

title: Artificial intelligence education teaching device
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence education teaching device which comprises a table body, a table top is fixedly installed on the top of the table body and comprises a first fixing plate, a second fixing plate, a drawing plate and a turnover plate, and the first fixing plate and the second fixing plate are symmetrically installed on the two sides of the top of the table body; an overturning plate is spliced between the first fixing plate and the second fixing plate, the overturning plate is in sliding connection with first sliding grooves formed in the two sides of the second fixing plate through a U-shaped groove formed in one side and matched with a sliding pin, a drawing plate is spliced to the top of the first fixing plate and the top of the overturning plate, and a media assembly is arranged at the bottom end of the drawing plate; the media assembly comprises a microphone, a camera, a USB interface and a telescopic rod, and the middle of the bottom end of the drawing plate is rotationally connected with the microphone and the camera through a hinge seat, and the problems that in a teaching device, a teaching desk is not matched, teaching equipment has no place to be placed, and the angle and height of a projector are adjusted are solved.

title: Education field subject knowledge graph construction method and device based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education domain knowledge graph construction method and device based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, acquiring multi-source data of an education domain; performing structured extraction on the multi-source data to obtain keywords and knowledge points; then, according to the front-back relation between the keywords, a keyword skeleton is formed; then extracting a preposition and postposition association relationship from the knowledge points by applying a keyword skeleton; deriving a knowledge point framework by applying a keyword skeleton and a knowledge point front-back relation; and finally, performing knowledge fusion in an unsupervised mode and a similarity calculation mode by using a knowledge point framework, and constructing a subject knowledge graph. According to the method, knowledge points and association relationships are extracted from total massive teaching resource data, and the teaching resource knowledge graph is constructed, so that intelligent application in the teaching field is enabled, and basic support is provided for combination of artificial intelligence and education.

title: AI intelligent learning vehicle for children teaching
applicants: SHENZHEN LINGTIAN ZHIJIE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of AI intelligence learning vehicles, and discloses an AI intelligence learning vehicle for children teaching, which comprises a main body mechanism and an auxiliary training mechanism, the auxiliary training mechanism is located on the upper side of the main body mechanism, the main body mechanism comprises a bearing plate and a connecting plate, the connecting plate is fixedly mounted at the upper end of the bearing plate, and the connecting plate is fixedly connected with the main body mechanism. The main body mechanism further comprises an adjusting assembly, a display screen and a vehicle body. The adjusting assembly is fixedly installed at the upper end of the connecting plate. According to the AI intelligence learning vehicle for children teaching, by installing the adjusting assembly, when children use the AI intelligence learning vehicle to watch the display screen, the height of the display screen can be conveniently adjusted through cooperation of a transmission motor, a lead screw, a movable block and the like, use habits of different children are facilitated, convenience can be provided for the children, and the practicability of the AI intelligence learning vehicle is improved; the learning effect of children can be improved, and the situation that the vision of children is reduced due to long-time use of the children due to height mismatching of the display screen is avoided.

title: Intelligent robot control method based on deep learning
applicants: HENAN QINGXIANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent robots, in particular to an intelligent robot control method based on deep learning, comprising S1, an open modular control system method, S2, a hierarchical control system method, and S3, a fault diagnosis safety maintenance method, S1, the open modular control system method comprises a robot controller and a programming teaching method, S2, the hierarchical control system method comprises a hierarchical control system method, and S3, the fault diagnosis safety maintenance method comprises a fault diagnosis safety maintenance method. According to the open modular control system method, a distributed CPU computer structure is adopted, a main computer of a robot controller completes the functions of motion planning, interpolation, position servo, main control logic, digital I/O, sensor processing and the like of a robot, and a programming teaching box completes information display and key input. The robot control technology can accurately grasp data such as movement position, posture and track, operation sequence and action time in a working space, and has the characteristics of simple programming, convenience in software menu operation, online operation prompt, convenience in use and the like.

title: Teaching management system and method based on wisdom education
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching management system and method based on wisdom education.
