The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a learning behavior video of a monitored student object collected by a camera; the deep learning-based artificial intelligence technology is adopted to fully express the facial semantic implicit feature distribution information of the student in the monitoring video, so that the learning state of the student is accurately detected, the teaching content is optimized based on the learning state of the student, more targeted teaching assistance is provided in actual teaching, and the teaching efficiency is improved. And education and teaching management efficiency and education and teaching quality are improved.

title: Intelligent interactive reading learning method based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent interactive reading learning methods, and relates to an AI technology-based intelligent interactive reading learning method, which comprises an online teaching system APP, and the learning method of a student end based on the online teaching system APP comprises the following steps: S1, pre-class preview; s2, in-class interaction is carried out; s3, after-class classroom report and learning condition analysis; s4, after-class auxiliary learning; in the reading interaction process, the network learning community really pointing to deep learning must be self-constructed, meaningful and exploring learning, the deep exploration of the learning community is promoted, the participation degree of high-order thinking in the learning process of students must be concerned, and the learning efficiency is greatly improved from autonomous learning, cooperative learning and research learning. And under the guidance of the teacher and the accompanying of the parents, the reading content is explored, so that the exploration desire of the children is stimulated, and in the accompanying process, the children can better improve the ability of establishing multi-element communication due to the actions of the parents and the parents close to the teacher.

title: AI intelligent supervision online education system
applicants: SHENZHEN LINGTIAN ZHIJIE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of online education systems, in particular to an AI intelligent supervision online education system. Comprising a data management library, a user side, an acquisition module, a recording module, a course management unit, a learning condition tracking module, a learning condition report generation module, a data reading module, an analysis module, an uploading unit, a generation module, a time management unit, a scanning module, a correction module and an explanation module. The data management library is electrically connected with the recording module, the course management unit, the time management unit, the uploading unit, the data reading module and the scanning module. According to the invention, the teaching surface of a child in a live classroom can be tracked and recorded, and a learning condition report is generated, so that the learning condition report can be fed back to parents subsequently, the parents can know the learning condition of the child in real time conveniently, homework done by the child can be corrected in time, wrong questions can be explained conveniently, and the learning efficiency of the child is improved. And the children can understand conveniently.

title: Remote management system and method for multimedia equipment based on big data
applicants: SHENZHEN V SENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a remote management system and method for multimedia equipment based on big data, and belongs to the technical field of data remote processing. The system comprises a multimedia equipment management module, a machine learning action module, a time information judgment module and a remote control module, the output end of the multimedia equipment management module is connected with the input end of the machine learning action module; the output end of the machine learning action module is connected with the input end of the time information judgment module; the output end of the time information judgment module is connected with the input end of the remote control module. According to the invention, the application of diversified creative animations and teaching components in multimedia equipment can be further improved, a valuable intelligent platform with a brand new concept is provided from the aspects of education, operation interface, program flexibility and the like, multimedia teaching tools are efficiently applied to assist teaching, and the remote control intelligent level of the equipment is improved.

title: Small target detection method and detection device for laboratory teaching
applicants: NANTONG XIDING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a small target detection method and device for laboratory teaching, and relates to the technical field of laboratory monitoring, and the method comprises the steps: building an image degradation model and a preset machine learning model; training the preset machine learning model based on the image degradation model and a preset super-resolution image set to generate a super-resolution network; constructing a semi-supervised learning model based on the super-resolution network; and detecting a target image based on the semi-supervised learning model to generate a corresponding small target detection result. The existing target detection method is improved, and a mode of combining a super-resolution network with a semi-supervised learning network is adopted, so that the accuracy of small target detection in a laboratory teaching process is effectively improved.

title: College student dynamic comprehensive evaluation method and system
abstract_text: Aiming at the technical problems in the prior art, the invention provides a college student dynamic comprehensive evaluation method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: building a comprehensive evaluation model based on deep learning, which comprises a data source module, an index score module, an evaluation category module, an evaluation method module and an evaluation result module; the data source module, the index score module, the evaluation category module, the evaluation method module and the evaluation result module are connected in sequence; the invention designs a set of complete comprehensive evaluation method and system for the learning process and learning ability of the students based on dynamic conditions, which can help to manage and master the learning and ability of the students, at the same time, help to improve and adjust related teaching teams of schools, and have bidirectional early warning and supervision effects.

title: Method and apparatus for continuous machine learning of sequence of different tasks
abstract_text: It is proposed a method for parameterizing a function (H) that outputs an ideal parameterization of a machine learning system for a large number of different data sets. For this purpose, a first teaching (S13) of the machine learning system is carried out on the basis of a plurality of training data sets one after the other, wherein a parameterization of an individual optimization of the machine learning system is stored for each training data set. A second teaching of the machine learning system is then performed simultaneously based on all data sets (S14), where an optimal parameterization of the machine learning system is stored. The parameterization of the function (H) is then optimized (S15) such that, given the optimal parameterization of the first teaching, the function output is assigned to the optimal parameterization of the second teaching.

title: Intelligent mobile class arrangement method based on genetic algorithm
abstract_text: The invention, which belongs to the intelligent course arrangement field, discloses a genetic algorithm-based intelligent class shift course arrangement method comprising the following steps: S1, generating an initial course schedule by adopting an individual optimization mode, and carrying out binary coding on the initial course schedule to obtain an initial pre-arrangement course schedule population; s2, calculating the fitness of the initial pre-arranged class schedule population by adopting a genetic algorithm, and selecting the class schedule with the minimum fitness value as the optimal class schedule; s3, judging whether the fitness corresponding to the current optimal class schedule reaches an expected value or not; if yes, outputting the current optimal class schedule; and if not, crossing and mutating the current optimal class schedule, returning to the step S2 until the fitness reaches the expected value, and outputting the corresponding optimal class schedule. According to the intelligent class-shifting course arrangement method based on the genetic algorithm, constraint conditions in course arrangement can be met to the maximum extent on the basis of big data analysis, data mining and machine learning under the condition of limited teaching resources, and intelligent course arrangement is achieved.

title: AI identification management method for education robot
applicants: SHENZHEN VISION TALK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education robot management, in particular to an AI identification management method for an education robot. By analyzing the eye concentration degree and the body concentration degree of the student in each sub-time period in the current monitoring time period, on one hand, multi-dimensional analysis of the corresponding eye concentration degree of the student is realized, and the comprehensiveness and the accuracy of the student eye concentration degree analysis result by the education robot are improved to a great extent; the teaching content of the students can be correspondingly adjusted subsequently by the education robot; and on the other hand, the body movement change of the student corresponding to the current monitoring time period can be intuitively judged, the concentration degree of the student corresponding to the current monitoring time period can be analyzed more accurately, and reliable data support is provided for subsequent analysis of the adjustment mode of the education robot corresponding to the next stage.

title: Teaching evaluation method, system and device and readable storage medium
applicants: GUANGDONG SHIDA INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching evaluation method, system and device and a readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps that audio and video data in classroom teaching, submitted data of teachers and students in the classroom teaching and analysis requirements of users are collected; performing coding conversion and content translation recognition on audio data in the audio and video data to obtain a voice processing result of the classroom activity; performing frame extraction processing on video data in the audio and video data, and realizing regional modular labeling to obtain a video processing result of the classroom activity; and based on the voice processing result, the video processing result and the submission data, performing AI analysis according to an analysis demand of the user to obtain multi-modal evaluation data of classroom teaching, and generating a corresponding teaching evaluation report. According to the invention, the AI algorithm is used to analyze and count classroom teaching behaviors, and a comprehensive, standardized and diversified teaching evaluation report reflecting classroom teaching activities is generated.

title: AI intelligent teaching robot control system and method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching robots, and particularly relates to an AI intelligent teaching robot control system and method. By setting the question information, the tension of the students is improved, the attention of the students can be concentrated, the current teaching quality score can be measured and calculated according to the accuracy of the response information of the students, and the corresponding review plan can be generated according to the teaching quality score. And the teaching content of the subsequent teaching video is regulated and controlled in real time according to the execution duration of the review plan, so that the teaching video can be played within the teaching plan, and after the intelligent teaching robot is put into use, not only can the learning effect of students be improved, but also the teaching plan is not influenced.

title: Mechanical arm trajectory planning method based on visual and dynamic motion primitives
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mechanical arm trajectory planning method based on visual and dynamic motion primitives, and relates to the technical field of mechanical arm trajectory planning. Which comprises a robot and a computer, and comprises the following steps: human body back skin area segmentation: performing visual perception on the environment by using a visual system, and segmenting the human body skin area through a deep learning algorithm; a human body back skin area input trajectory planning system; learning a teaching track based on a dynamic motion primitive algorithm, and solving a weight parameter of the teaching track by using local weighted regression; a wiping motion track is generated, and the wiping motion track of the robot in the target area is generated in combination with human body back skin area environment information provided by a visual system; the robot executes the track to wipe the back skin of the human body, the robot executes the multi-contact operation task of wiping the back skin of the human body according to the motion track, the target area is segmented in real time, the execution precision of the robot in the task is improved, multi-modal information is fused, and the robot adapts to individual differences.

title: Teaching training system
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHONGMAO MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching and training system. The teaching and training system comprises a teacher terminal module, an intelligent teaching assisting module, a live broadcast content loading module and a student terminal module. The live broadcast content loading module can receive an instruction reality 3D material model, a teacher 3D image and local courseware from a teacher terminal, and students can carry out real-time remote learning through a virtual reality device. The intelligent teaching assisting module can perform knowledge training and classroom test according to instructions of the teacher terminal, and can autonomously answer questions of students, thereby realizing intelligent and personalized teaching. According to the invention, beneficial attempts are made in the aspect of display of the 3D medical model through the virtual reality technology, and the artificial intelligence technology is adopted to assist teaching, so that the medical teaching effect is remarkably improved.

title: Processing apparatus and method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a processing apparatus and a method for performing a process for a robot to take out a workpiece. A processing device is provided with: a receiving unit that receives a teaching of a take-out position of at least one object among a plurality of objects determined on the basis of images relating to the plurality of objects; and a learning unit that performs machine learning using information relating to a fetch position of the teaching as input data, and using, as a label, at least one of an evaluation value corresponding to the teaching and an evaluation value corresponding to a fetch result for the input data. As a result, a learning model that outputs an evaluation value for the input information is learned.

title: Virtual online teaching system based on meta universe
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual online teaching system based on element universe, and relates to the technical field of AI and VR, and the virtual online teaching system comprises an eye movement tracking module, an expression recognition module, a 3D modeling module and a calibration feedback module. The eye movement tracking module records the eye state of a certain person and the staring condition of other people on the eye of the person by tracking the eye of the person; the expression recognition module can analyze the concentration condition of the students in class, so that timely interaction between teachers and students is facilitated; the 3D modeling module creates a character image through half-body modeling and captures character body movement information online, so that the classroom immersion and the teacher-student interaction effect are enhanced; and the calibration feedback module is used for scoring and evaluating multiple indexes of the meta universe classroom so as to feed back and optimize the classroom quality and improve the credibility of communication between teachers and students in the classroom. According to the embodiment of the invention, the method starts from cognitive psychology and artificial intelligence, restores an offline classroom to the greatest extent, and assists the development process and upgrading and updating of online education.

title: Method for generating learned model, non-transitory storage medium, and congestion prediction device
abstract_text: The purpose of the present disclosure is to provide a method for generating a learned model capable of predicting a long-term road condition, a non-transitory storage medium, and a congestion prediction device. The method implements the following processing through a processor, the present invention acquires number information indicating the number of users who have departed from a facility for each preset period including users who take a vehicle, weather information for each preset period, and vehicle information pertaining to vehicles traveling from the surroundings of the facility, and uses the vehicle information to determine the number of users who have departed from the facility for each preset period. A congestion situation indicating the presence or absence of a congestion on a road located in the vicinity of the facility during the predetermined period is determined by the determination unit. A learned model for predicting congestion of a road is generated by machine learning that is used using the number of people information, the weather information, and the congestion status associated with the number of people information and the weather information as teaching data.

title: METHOD FOR GENERATING LEARNED MODEL, NON-TRANSITORY STORAGE MEDIUM, AND TRAFFIC JAM PREDICTING DEVICE
abstract_text: A method includes, by a processor, acquiring number of persons information that indicates a number of users, including users who ride in vehicles, who depart from a facility at each of a predetermined time period, weather information for each predetermined time period, and vehicle information relating to vehicles traveling in a periphery of the facility, determining traffic jam status that indicates absence/presence of a traffic jam on a road located in a vicinity of the facility in the predetermined time period, by using the vehicle information; and generating a learned model for predicting a traffic jam of a road by machine learning using, as teaching data, the number of persons information, the weather information, and the traffic jam status that is associated with the number of persons information and the weather information.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CONVERSION BASED DYNAMIC CREATIVE OPTIMIZATION AND APPLICATION THEREOF
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to generating combination distributions for ads. Features are computed based on training data associated with ads, each of which has a plurality of attributes. The training data include asset combinations with past performance thereof for each of the ads. Each combination includes multiple assets representing respective attributes of an ad. The features are used in machine learning to obtain an auxiliary model, which is used to generate combination distributions for each ad based on predicted performance for each combination associated with the ad. Such generated combination distributions are sent to an explore/exploit layer (EEL) for a frontend ad serving engine to draw a combination therefrom for an auction winning ad for rendering on a webpage viewed by a user on a user device.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CLICK RATE BASED DYNAMIC CREATIVE OPTIMIZATION AND APPLICATION THEREOF
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to generating combination distributions for ads. A prediction model is obtained via machine learning with respect to a criterion. Training data are associated with multiple ads each having multiple attributes, and include combinations with recorded performance for each ad. Each combination has multiple assets representing respective attributes of an ad. Using the prediction model, performance of each combination of each ad can be predicted and used for generating combination distributions for the ads. Such generated combination distributions are then sent to an explore/exploit layer (EEL) at a frontend ad serving engine so that it can draw a combination associated with an auction winning ad for rendering on a webpage viewed by a user on a user device.

title: Course interaction method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a course interaction method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: logging in a teacher terminal device through a teacher account, and logging in a student terminal device through a student account; the teacher-side equipment is connected with the student-side equipment, the student-side equipment can be controlled through the teacher-side equipment, and a teaching course plan is transmitted to the student-side equipment to be displayed. Marking a teaching course plan through the student-side equipment, determining teaching difficulties according to marks, and transmitting the teaching difficulties to the teacher-side equipment; counting knowledge points corresponding to the teaching difficulty points based on the teaching difficulty points to obtain knowledge point statistical data; the teaching scheme is modified and improved based on the knowledge point statistical data, targeted task arrangement is carried out on the teaching scheme of the students, and the teaching scheme is output; and detecting the performance of the student based on the teaching scheme, and judging the implementation effect of the teaching scheme according to the detection result. The method has the effect of improving the interaction effect in the course.

title: Multidirectional student video and coach video synchronization system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multidirectional student video and coach video synchronization system, which belongs to the technical field of video motion teaching, and comprises a multidirectional camera module, a coach video playing module executes a video playing command, a user learner follows the command to practice, the multidirectional camera module records the command, and the command is sent to the coach video playing module. The AI scoring correction module scores and prompts correction, and records video frame information of scoring correction of the student video; and the student synchronously plays back the multi-azimuth practice videos of the student and the corresponding coach videos through a playback module, and AI scoring correction frames in playback are synchronized with frames corresponding to the coach videos. The training efficiency of the trainee is effectively improved, feedback is obtained in time, the trainee can conduct correction and adjustment at any time easily, the posture of the trainee in the process of training along with the coach video can be well restored, and the trainee can conduct action correction very conveniently afterwards.

title: Visual inspection sorting system
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a visual inspection sorting system which is characterized in that the visual inspection sorting system comprises a conveying device, a discharging device, an artificial intelligence visual inspection device, at least one lifting type material guiding device and a master control module, and the discharging device, the artificial intelligence visual inspection device and the lifting type material guiding device are sequentially arranged side by side in the conveying direction of the conveying device; the conveying device, the discharging device, the artificial intelligence visual detection device and the lifting type material guiding device are all electrically connected with the master control module. According to the invention, when artificial intelligence technology teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can conveniently obtain theory and practice knowledge at the same time, and colleges and universities can conveniently output more talents mastering the artificial intelligence visual detection technology; the visual inspection sorting system has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, convenient to use, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: Learning behavior prediction management system and method based on artificial intelligence and deep learning
applicants: GUIZHOU OPEN UNIV GUIZHOU VOCATIONAL TECHNOLOGY INSTITUTE
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning behavior prediction management system and method based on artificial intelligence and deep learning. The learning behavior prediction management system comprises a learning terminal which is used for providing electronic teaching materials according to teaching material requirements of student users and managing learning data information generated in the learning process of the student users; the data analysis processing end is used for carrying out analysis processing according to the learning content of the student user and carrying out associated learning content recommendation and learning result evaluation on the student user according to the learning content; and the learning server side is used for storing data generated in the operation process of the learning terminal and the data analysis and processing side, and updating and training the deep learning model of the data analysis and processing side in real time. The method comprises steps corresponding to the system module.

title: AI simulation teaching method and system based on graphical programming platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI simulation teaching method and system based on a graphical programming platform, and the method is based on the AI simulation teaching system of the graphical programming platform, the system can assist the programming teaching through a teaching program, is also provided with a functional program, expands the application range of the system to a large extent, and improves the teaching efficiency. The system not only can realize teaching, but also can meet other requirements of users. Most of the AI simulation teaching systems adopting the graphical programming platform accept programming education by children, and the children are generally dislike to an inscribed teaching mode and even generate traitor emotions, so that the teaching effect is influenced. No matter what functional program is used by a user or what function is achieved by the functional program, the teaching purpose can be combined with the functional program through the method and system in the specification, and programming teaching is conducted on the user based on the visual effect provided by the functional program.

title: Network interactive teaching system platform based on AI technology and teaching method thereof
abstract_text: The invention provides a network interactive teaching system platform based on an AI technology and a teaching method thereof, and belongs to the technical field of teaching platforms. Comprising a platform main body, a student end, a teacher end and a server module which is arranged on the platform main body and is connected with the student end and the teacher end through network signals. The height of the teaching fixing frame can be adjusted through the lifting adjusting frame, the using habits of different teachers are met, the lifting adjusting frame is arranged in the platform body, the overall size of the device is greatly reduced, and the occupied space is saved; related devices on the network interactive teaching system platform are shielded and effectively protected by arranging the closed shielding frame, dust accumulation and cleaning frequency and difficulty increase due to long-term exposure can be avoided, audio frequency and audio frequency teaching materials can be input through the audio frequency input module, teaching diversification is increased, the learning interest and learning effect of students are improved, and the teaching effect is improved. And the communication efficiency between teachers and students is improved.

title: Cross-modal feature fusion engineering authentication classroom quality intelligent evaluation method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cross-modal feature fusion engineering certification classroom quality intelligent evaluation method and system, which realize cross fusion of new-generation information technologies such as artificial intelligence and practical education and teaching problems, make beneficial exploration, and provide modern education technology support for universal monitoring of higher engineering education talent training quality. Comprising the following steps: (1) selecting classroom data from an engineering certification classroom teaching database with known expert scoring conditions to form teaching classrooms of different grades and form a classroom data set for training; (2) through extraction and matching of different modal data features in the data set and matching of engineering certification classroom teaching quality evaluation indexes and classroom scoring structures, an objective of engineering certification classroom teaching quality prediction evaluation under multi-task guidance is realized; and (3) through corresponding training and learning, the intelligent evaluation system to be developed is researched, so that real-time evaluation on the classroom teaching content in the aspects of preset classification indexes and content matching degree can be realized.

title: College classroom teaching evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of classroom teaching quality evaluation, in particular to a college classroom teaching evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence. Comprises: constructing a teaching quality evaluation system; constructing a teaching coordination index analysis model comprising a text feature extraction module, a voice feature extraction module, a video feature extraction module, a feature fusion module and an emotion recognition module; constructing a teaching order index analysis model comprising a face detection module, a human body detection module and a fusion analysis module; respectively training and testing the teaching coordination index analysis model and the teaching order index analysis model; analyzing by using the teaching coordination index analysis model to obtain a teaching coordination index score, and analyzing by using the teaching order index analysis model to obtain a teaching order index score; and performing teaching quality evaluation according to the score of each index. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is applied to the teaching quality evaluation, and the objectivity, scientificity and accuracy of the teaching quality evaluation process and result are effectively improved.

title: Character-based virtual human model driving method and device and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning of artificial intelligence, can be used for investment education in the financial field, pathology teaching in the medical field and other scenes, and particularly relates to a character-based virtual human model driving method and device and computer equipment. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a to-be-processed text; obtaining a first action sequence based on the text; corresponding a first preset format file based on each first attitude frame; whether the condition that the joint point coordinates in each first preset format file are aligned with the bone joint points of a preset virtual human model or not meets a first preset condition is judged; if yes, setting a first attitude frame corresponding to the first preset file as a target attitude frame; integrating all the target attitude frames to obtain a target action sequence; and driving the preset virtual human model based on the target action sequence. According to the method, the device and the computer equipment, the driving process of the virtual human model can be simplified.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Set top box audio processing system and method based on artificial intelligence teaching classroom
applicants: SHENZHEN UNITED INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a set top box audio processing system and method based on an artificial intelligence teaching classroom, and belongs to the technical field of audio processing. In order to solve the problems that voice processing is slow and blackboard writing needs to be carried out, the segmentation sub-module can carry out segmentation processing on the audio according to the key frame, so that when a system records a long audio, segmentation processing can be carried out on the long audio according to the key frame in the long audio, key words in the audio can be effectively extracted, and the efficiency of the system is improved. The semantic judgment sub-module and the character region sub-module can automatically recognize the input long audio frequency, select out and execute controllable statements, and re-typeset and display the displayed statements, so that the recognition efficiency and the reading efficiency of the audio frequency are improved, and the semantic judgment sub-module and the character region sub-module can automatically recognize the input long audio frequency, select out and execute the controllable statements and re-compose and display the displayed statements. Therefore, the system can automatically typeset and display the content on the display screen when a teacher gives a lesson, control instructions and blackboard writing content are intelligently recognized according to the content spoken by the teacher, and the efficiency is improved.

title: Welding robot parametric programming method and system based on machine vision and neural network
applicants: QINGDAO LONGLIFU MACHINERY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a welding robot parameterization programming method and system based on machine vision and a neural network, and the method comprises the steps: judging a welding seam type through a deep learning target detection algorithm, determining a target welding seam region, determining a corresponding welding gun posture according to the welding seam type, taking the target welding seam region as an ROI region, carrying out the primary processing, and carrying out the secondary processing. Determining Cartesian space welding path feature points according to a primary processing result; and according to the Cartesian space welding path feature points, trajectory planning of a robot joint space is conducted, the welding seam width and the pre-welding welding seam depth are calculated, welding gun working parameters are calculated by predicting a neural network model and combining preset welding parameters, and a welding program execution command is sent to a robot execution mechanism to complete welding work. According to the method, rapid parameterization programming can be achieved in a teaching-free mode, the problems that manual teaching online programming of a traditional welding robot is tedious and low in efficiency, setting of welding gun working parameters for different welding seam types and plates is not ideal, and the position needs to be found again before welding every time are solved, and the intelligent degree of the welding robot is improved.

title: Teacher classroom walking distance measuring method based on teaching video
abstract_text: Development of the information technology enables multimedia equipment and intelligent equipment to be universally applied in teaching, and promotion of improvement and innovation of education and teaching by utilizing the information technology has become a new trend. Classroom teaching condition detection and evaluation are inevitable requirements for improving teaching quality and improving learning results. A traditional teaching evaluation method is high in subjectivity and low in efficiency, in the digital informatization age, big data and artificial intelligence technologies should be fully used for classroom teaching condition detection and evaluation, and the interaction degree between a teacher and students, the teaching concentration degree of the teacher and the classroom atmosphere can be judged by detecting the walking distance of the teacher. The method focuses on the classroom teaching video, analyzes the teaching behaviors of the teacher, selects the movement distance of the teacher as an index, and carries out the research from the aspects of teacher target detection and tracking, video movement distance measurement, teacher behavior modeling and action recognition. The method is mainly characterized in that in a teaching video, the face of a teacher is identified, a centroid point is taken, the face change of the teacher is positioned and tracked, and the transverse movement distance of the teacher in a platform area and the longitudinal movement distance of the teacher in an aisle area are measured online.

title: Inpatient area information issuing terminal
applicants: SUZHOU DERPIN MEDICAL SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an inpatient area information issuing terminal. The inpatient area information issuing terminal comprises a control module; the central display screen is used for displaying published information; detailed patient information is stored in the patient information database; the nursing planning unit is internally stored with a nursing plan of each patient according to a daily timeline; propagating and teaching an AI knowledge base; the control module sequentially reads the nursing plans of the patients in the nursing plan unit according to the daily timeline, sends the nursing plan of the patient at the current time point to the central display screen for display, and exports the detailed information of the patient at the corresponding timeline from the interior of the patient information database and sends the detailed information of the patient to the central display screen for display; according to the invention, the medical staff can know the detailed information of the patient while obtaining the nursing plan of the patient, and the medical staff does not need to check the detailed information of the patient before nursing, so that the working convenience and the working efficiency are improved.

title: Teaching information processing system and method based on digital twinning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching information processing system and method based on digital twinning, and belongs to the technical field of digital twinning teaching. The system comprises a content data transmission module, a teaching page processing module, a digital twin platform distribution module and an auxiliary analysis module. The output end of the content data transmission module is connected with the input end of the teaching page processing module; the output end of the teaching page processing module is connected with the input end of the digital twin platform distribution module; the output end of the digital twin platform distribution module is connected with the input end of the auxiliary analysis module. In the application, online and offline teaching connection and virtual entity experiment complementation are completed by using the digital twinborn experiment teaching platform, subjective and objective question group analysis is performed by using artificial intelligence, personalized automatic setting for students is realized, time and space limitations are broken, and a teaching mode open to the students in all directions is realized.

title: Welding system, welding method, welding assistance device, program, learning device, and method for generating learned model
abstract_text: A welding system includes: a welding device; a plurality of sensors of different types for detecting an event accompanying welding by the welding device; and an estimation unit that estimates the degree of abnormality of welding by the welding device from the plurality of pieces of detection data generated by the plurality of sensors using the learned model. The learned model is generated in advance by means of machine learning using a plurality of pieces of learning data in which an event accompanying welding is detected by a sensor of the same type as a plurality of sensors as input data and a tag indicating whether the welding is normal or abnormal as teaching data.

title: Small target attitude detection method and device based on deep learning
applicants: UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY BEIJING
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of attitude detection, in particular to a small target attitude detection method and device based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining original data, carrying out the preprocessing of the original data, and obtaining training data; performing structure improvement on the SSD network, and establishing a posture detection training model; training the posture detection training model by using the training data to obtain a posture detection model; and inputting the to-be-detected data into the attitude detection model to obtain an attitude detection result. The invention provides an accurate and efficient small target attitude detection method for a multi-person teaching scene.

title: Intelligent trolley based on AI edge computing device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent network connection automobiles, in particular to an intelligent trolley based on AI edge computing equipment. Comprising a hardware system and a software system, the hardware system comprises a chassis, a sensor and a central controller, and the software system comprises a Linux system carried by JetsonNano and a Simulink tool installed on an upper computer. The invention provides an intelligent trolley based on AI edge computing equipment, which can support intelligent network connection automobile subject teaching in colleges and universities, has the advantages of in-loop simulation, test verification, open source high efficiency, intelligent interconnection and the like, and can well solve the problems of complex teaching scenes and the like in the existing colleges and universities.

title: Artificial intelligence mechanical fault diagnosis system
applicants: GUANGDONG SANXIANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence mechanical fault diagnosis system which is characterized by comprising a rotating device, a vibration sensor, an artificial intelligence fault diagnosis module and a master control module, the rotating device is electrically connected with the master control module, and the vibration sensor is arranged on the rotating device. And the vibration sensor is electrically connected with the artificial intelligence fault diagnosis module. According to the invention, when artificial intelligence deep learning technology teaching activities are carried out in colleges and universities, theory and practice are really combined, so that students can conveniently obtain theory and practice knowledge at the same time, and colleges and universities can conveniently output more talents mastering artificial intelligence deep learning technology development and application. The artificial intelligence mechanical fault diagnosis system has the advantages of being beneficial to teaching, convenient to use, high in reliability, high in applicability and the like.

title: Situational teaching simulator for management science
abstract_text: The invention provides a situational teaching simulator for management science, which structurally comprises a chassis, an AI case, a program module, a regulation and control end, a display screen, a viewing lens and a sound production end, and is characterized in that the chassis is perpendicular to the AI case, and the lower end of the AI case is electrically connected with the program module; on the basis that four sets of intelligent connecting assemblies, movable devices and other parts which are newly added to the lower end of the chassis are arranged on the edge of the lower layer of the chassis in an annular direction, the intelligent connecting assemblies are combined with a program module and an operation program set by a regulation and control end, so that when students carry out scene discussion and answer, the students can carry out scene discussion and answer; the simulator utilizes the program module to drive the intelligent connecting assembly and the movable device to move, so that the movable device can respond according to the program of the AI case and the received language information, the rotating wheel of the movable device can move according to different discussion characteristics, and the simulator moves through the rotating wheel. Therefore, the simulator can move according to different demonstration emotions.

title: Virtual human teaching animation generation method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning of artificial intelligence, can be used for investment education in the financial field, pathology teaching in the medical field and other scenes, and particularly relates to a virtual human teaching animation generation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an audio, a face photo and an action video, wherein the audio comprises content information and emotion information; obtaining a first face key point based on the audio and a pre-trained sound face reasoning model; obtaining a second face key point based on the face photo; obtaining a target face file according to the first face key point and the second face key point; obtaining a target action file based on the action video; importing the target face file and the target action file into a preset virtual human model to obtain a face animation and a body action animation; and synthesizing the face animation and the body action animation to obtain a teaching animation of the virtual human model. According to the method and device, the computer equipment and the storage medium, the teaching effect can be improved.

title: Intelligent playground training system and method based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent playground training system and method based on the AI technology, and the system comprises a front-end detection device and a rear-end operation device, the front-end detection device comprises an identification login device, an AI identification video collection device and an audio and video display device, and the rear-end operation device comprises an AI identification analysis server and a data storage server. The front-end detection equipment is arranged in a playground sports field, acquires sports personnel information data and a sports data process and transmits the data to the rear-end computing equipment, the rear-end computing equipment identifies, analyzes and stores analysis result data, and the front-end detection equipment broadcasts a sports instruction, broadcasts the scores of the sports personnel and forms a sports report; according to the invention, motion normalization analysis and motion data analysis are carried out by using a motion vision technology, motion instructions and motion scores are generated in real time, a teaching mode is improved, intelligent interactivity is enhanced, a group training mode is flexible, training data are fed back in real time, and motion pertinence is enhanced.

title: Universe interactive teaching framework
applicants: OOK BEIJING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a universe interactive teaching framework. The system comprises a support layer, an application layer, a service layer, an asset layer and an artificial intelligence layer. Wherein the support layer is configured to integrate a plurality of cloud platforms to provide platform-as-a-service for the system; the asset layer is configured to integrate the received interaction information into teaching assets; and the artificial intelligence layer is configured to provide intelligent services to the application layer, the service layer or the asset layer sending the service request based on the teaching assets. The recommendation system in the asset layer can actively recommend the concerned learning content to the user according to the learning habit type of the user, and actively promotes the learning progress of the user. Meanwhile, the system can provide services of a chat robot and a question and answer robot for the user through a customer service system of the artificial intelligence layer. The chat robot and the question and answer robot automatically generate question and answer voices based on the teaching assets, so that the user can obtain timely and thought teaching services.

title: Auxiliary system and method for basketball practice based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses an auxiliary system and method for basketball practice based on an AI technology. The auxiliary system comprises an AI data acquisition part, a display query terminal and an analysis processing part arranged at a background, the AI data acquisition part is used for acquiring facial information and motion video data of an athlete; the AI recognition processing server is used for analyzing and processing the exercise video data to generate three-dimensional skeleton data of the athletes; the virtual simulation server is used for carrying out venue modeling and role modeling, binding athlete three-dimensional skeleton data and role modeling and generating a rendering model for query; the site display screen is used for displaying the query rendering model; according to the method, three-dimensional skeleton data of an athlete is bound with virtual character modeling, so that a rendering model is generated for query; an athlete can look back self training actions from a three-dimensional angle, so that the repeated teaching intensity of a coach is reduced; an athlete can visually check the training condition, search for action defects and take targeted measures, so that the training efficiency is improved.

title: Intelligent campus electronic student card system based on AI technology
applicants: NANJING YINHE ZHILIAN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of G05B, in particular to an intelligent campus electronic student card system based on the AI technology, which at least comprises a student terminal, a school terminal and a parent terminal, and the student terminal, the school terminal and the parent terminal are in interactive connection through a communication network. The communication network comprises a GSM (Global System for Mobile Communications), an FDD-LTE (Frequency Division Duplex-Long The electronic student card system provided by the invention meets the requirement that the Education Ministry prohibits the mobile phone from entering the school, meets the school management demand and the parent communication demand, helps the school to solve the student mobile phone management problem, develops the good time management habit of the student, realizes rapid evaluation and answer, and helps the teacher to examine and teach; meanwhile, campus safety management, consumption safety management, student home-school safety and intelligent teaching management are realized, intelligent campus construction is assisted, and the system has very high practical application value and commercial application potential.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: To provide an information processing device and an information processing method that enable the use of a voice AI assistant service by taking advantage of its characteristics when viewing a reproduced video.SOLUTION: In an information processing system 100, an information processing device 4 includes a display and a speaker for acquiring and reproducing video data including a service object that can use a service for processing a voice request from a user, and an application execution environment 43 that adds an additional image to the reproduced video for teaching the user the service object, and uses the identification information of the video data and the start time and end time of the additional image as a bookmark for the scene with the additional image arbitrarily selected by the user.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 25

title: Information processing method, information processing device, and information processing program
abstract_text: An information processing method that generates an identification algorithm for identifying types of waste material, said information processing method including: a step for generating a first model, which is an identification algorithm for the types of waste material, by carrying out machine learning for first image data obtained by imaging interiors of garbage pits of a plurality of facilities in which the waste material is stored, and first teaching data in which the types of waste material in the image have been labeled; and a step for generating a second model, which is an identification algorithm corresponding to the waste material in a second facility different from the plurality of facilities, by additionally learning second image data obtained by imaging the interior of the garbage pit of the second facility, and second teaching data in which the types of waste material in the image have been labeled.

title: Professional ability map construction method based on skill guidance
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a skill-oriented vocational ability map construction method, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: constructing an atlas model, and layering the atlas; and enumerating names of first-level node elements of the atlas: disassembling post capability requirements by skills/themes/practical training, and constructing a capability atlas through knowledge points, skill points, practical operation and practical training elements. According to the invention, the personalized vocational ability learning and mastering path of the current learner is depicted based on the mastering condition of the current ability node of the learner through the disassembly of the ability and the correspondence between the ability and the post, so that the teaching is really realized according to the materials and different from different persons; meanwhile, teaching observation can be carried out according to the ability mastering condition of the student dimension and the overall mastering progress of the ability node dimension, the learning condition of each student, group and class can be accurately mastered, and learning condition early warning and learning resource utilization rate statistical analysis are carried out.

title: Intelligent dance movement quality evaluation method, device and system
applicants: CHINA TELECOM SHUZHI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent dance movement quality evaluation method, device and system, and relates to the technical field of dance education. The intelligent dance motion quality evaluation method comprises the steps of obtaining dance video data, and identifying user identity information through the dance video data; according to the deep neural network model, obtaining human body posture data of the dance video; obtaining an action quality evaluation result through the intelligent dance action quality evaluation model; and visually displaying an action quality evaluation result. According to the scheme, human body posture estimation based on computer vision is adopted, a deep learning method is applied, on the basis of posture estimation, character actions are analyzed, the action quality is evaluated in a regression estimation mode, and the application scene range is wide. According to the scheme, the application of the scheme in the dance teaching field is explored from attitude estimation, and the problems of high labor cost and shortage of teacher resources in traditional practice are solved.

title: An AI vision combined with programmable control of a three-axis storage and transportation teaching module
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an AI vision combined with programmable control of a three-axis storage and transportation teaching module, which constructs an AI vision sensing module in a storage and transportation teaching module, wherein the AI vision sensing module comprises an image capturing unit and an image recognition unit, the recognition port on the material is captured through the image capturing unit, and through the image recognition unit, the material is analyzed and connected to the storage and transportation teaching module, and the material can be transported and placed in a designated position. Accordingly, the AI intelligent technology is effectively and practically applied to the teaching field to achieve the effectiveness of enhancing learning.

title: Recording and demonstrating device and method for AI composition based on integration of music learning and teaching
applicants: HAINAN HAIRUI ZHONGCHUANG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a recording and demonstrating device and method for AI composition based on integration of music learning and teaching, belongs to the technical field of auxiliary music composition, and aims to solve the problem that saliva and other sundries in the mouth of a composition person are easy to splash to the surface of a microphone because the mouth of the composition person needs to be close to the position of the microphone during recording of the microphone. The device comprises an installation shell and supporting bases fixedly installed at the two ends of the bottom face of the installation shell respectively, a driving assembly is installed in a front-end inner cavity in the middle of the upper end of the installation shell, a microphone shell is arranged in the front-end inner cavity in the middle of the upper end of the installation shell, and a microphone is fixedly installed on the top face of the microphone shell in an embedded mode; a wiping assembly is further arranged in an inner cavity of the front end of the middle of the upper end of the installation shell, and a material supplementing assembly is fixedly installed at the front end of one end of the upper end of the installation shell in an embedded mode, the top face of the microphone shell is automatically wiped and cleaned, and the hygiene and experience feeling of a composer in the next time of use are guaranteed.

title: Advanced mathematics intelligent test paper composition method based on bidirectional detail table
applicants: SHANGHAI ABLE DIGITAL & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an advanced mathematics intelligent test paper composition method based on a bidirectional detail table, and relates to the technical field of higher education. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a bidirectional detail table, and determining the proportion of examination question scores according to the coincidence of knowledge points and investigation ability; each item listed in the longitudinal direction of the bidirectional detail table is content to be examined, namely knowledge points, and each item listed in the transverse direction is ability to be examined. According to the method, course knowledge content and teaching cognition target requirements are clearly defined and described through an AI course two-way detail table, the AI course two-way detail table is a course teaching standard blueprint, and it is guaranteed that the course content is comprehensive and accurate in the aspect of knowledge content and is properly distributed in the aspect of ability cognition targets; for a learner, learning targets of all parts can be defined according to the scale, key points and difficult points of a course can be accurately positioned, meanwhile, knowledge point practice can be performed in a targeted mode according to the mastering condition of all knowledge points of the learner, excessive doing and disordered doing are avoided, and personalized learning is promoted.

title: MODEL TRAINING METHOD, MODEL TRAINING PROGRAM, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: An information processing device according to the present invention calculates first vectors on the basis of text data and generates first dictionary information in which the first vectors have been associated with identification information distinguishing among the first vectors that are similar. The information processing device calculates second vectors on the basis of explanatory text of still image or moving image data and generates second dictionary information in which the second vectors have been associated with identification information distinguishing among the second vectors that are similar. The information processing device generates teaching data in which the similar first vectors recorded in the first dictionary information and the similar second vectors recorded in the second dictionary information have been associated, and executes machine learning of a training model on the basis of the teaching data.

title: CONTROL DEVICE, CONTROL SYSTEM, AND CONTROL METHOD FOR WIRE STRAIGHTENER
abstract_text: Accuracy of feedforward control for a wire straightener is improved. A feedback operation amount to a straightener is determined by a feedback control means based on an error between a target curvature and a straightening curvature. A feedforward compensation means determines a feedforward compensation value from a measurement value of the straightener using a prediction model. A learning means performs machine learning on the prediction model using teaching data. The learning means adds at least one combination including the measurement value and a manipulated variable when an absolute value of an error is smaller than a reference value to the teaching data.

title: Legal Spend Document Processing with Machine Learning
abstract_text: A unique user interface for improving legal (and other fields) spend management is described herein. The algorithm may include looping through the lines of an invoice and displaying an icon with multiple visual indicators displaying the machine learning confidence score. When a mouse hovers over the icon, a set of icons are displayed to accept the teaching user's input. In addition, the words that drove the machine learning confidence score are highlighted with formatting so that the teaching user can understand what drove the machine learning confidence score.

title: Automatic parcel sorting method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic parcel sorting method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of sorting, and the method comprises the steps: recognizing an object bounding box of a to-be-sorted parcel in an initial image through a target detection network obtained through pre-training based on a deep learning network after coordinate system calibration and teaching of a mechanical arm are completed; then, parcel boundary areas of parcels to be sorted are obtained through semantic segmentation; the three-dimensional point cloud corresponding to the pixel points in the parcel boundary area is subjected to plane segmentation to obtain the plane point cloud set, the parcel center of the to-be-sorted parcel can be obtained through positioning, the position of the to-be-sorted parcel is determined, a mechanical arm is guided to automatically grab and sort, the method is high in automation degree, various to-be-sorted parcels can be dealt with, and the parcel sorting efficiency is improved. And the grabbing accuracy is high.

title: Teaching interaction method and system based on education element universe
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching interaction method and system based on an education element universe, and the method comprises the steps: creating a virtual image which comprises a teacher and a testee; signing in the virtual image, and randomly or appointed grouping; carrying out two-layer conversion on the teaching courseware, and carrying out space projection; learning task interaction is carried out between the teacher and the testee, and a learning task comprises language deep learning and interaction relation detection of a virtual layer; the method further comprises courseware real-time synchronization and task three-dimensional interaction of the display layer. According to the invention, diversified multi-dimensional teaching means can be provided, a highly interactive learning situation is created, a highly free learning social meta-universe community is created, and users can interact through different multi-terminal entrances.

title: English speaking teaching method using interactive artificial intelligence avatar based on the topic of educational content device and system therefor
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 교육 컨텐츠 주제 기반의 대화형 인공지능 아바타 영어 말하기 교육 방법에 있어서, 제1 영어 문장이 포함된 사용자 입력을 수신하는 단계; 상기 제1 영어 문장에 대한 자연어 이해 동작을 수행하는 단계; 자연어 이해 동작을 수행한 결과, 상기 제1 영어 문장에 포함된 대화 의도와 매칭되는 기설정된 의도 분류가 있는지 판단하는 단계; 상기 대화 의도와 매칭되는 상기 기설정된 의도 분류가 없는 경우, 상기 제1 영어 문장을 기반으로 적어도 하나의 제1 자연어를 생성하는 단계; 상기 대화 의도와 매칭되는 상기 기설정된 의도 분류가 있는 경우, 상기 기설정된 의도 분류와 연관된 템플릿을 호출하고, 호출한 템플릿을 기반으로 적어도 하나의 제2 자연어를 생성하는 단계; 상기 적어도 하나의 제1 또는 제2 자연어로부터 임베딩 값을 추출하고, 추출한 임베딩 값을 기준으로 제1 또는 제2 자연어를 추출하는 단계; 및 추출한 제1 또는 제2 자연어를, 상기 제1 영어 문장에 대한 응답인 제2 영어 문장으로서 출력하는 단계; 를 포함할 수 있다.

title: English speaking teaching method using interactive artificial intelligence avatar based on emotion and memory device and system therefor
abstract_text: 본 발명의 일 실시예에 따른 감정 및 기억 기반의 대화형 인공지능 아바타 영어 말하기 교육 방법에 있어서, 제1 영어 문장이 포함된 사용자 입력을 수신하는 단계; 상기 제1 영어 문장에 대한 자연어 이해 동작을 수행하는 단계; 자연어 이해 동작을 수행한 결과, 상기 제1 영어 문장에 포함된 대화 의도와 매칭되는 기설정된 의도 분류가 있는지 판단하는 단계; 상기 대화 의도와 매칭되는 상기 기설정된 의도 분류가 없는 경우, 상기 제1 영어 문장을 기반으로 적어도 하나의 제1 자연어를 생성하는 단계; 상기 대화 의도와 매칭되는 상기 기설정된 의도 분류가 있는 경우, 상기 기설정된 의도 분류와 연관된 템플릿을 호출하고, 호출한 템플릿을 기반으로 적어도 하나의 제2 자연어를 생성하는 단계; 상기 적어도 하나의 제1 또는 제2 자연어로부터 임베딩 값을 추출하고, 추출한 임베딩 값을 기준으로 제1 또는 제2 자연어를 추출하는 단계; 및 추출한 제1 또는 제2 자연어를, 상기 제1 영어 문장에 대한 응답인 제2 영어 문장으로서 출력하는 단계; 를 포함할 수 있다.

title: Intelligent vehicle auxiliary teaching method and device based on artificial intelligence, medium and equipment
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an intelligent vehicle auxiliary teaching method and device based on artificial intelligence, a medium and equipment, and the method comprises the steps: calling a running video of an intelligent vehicle from entering a racing track to deviating from the racing track when the intelligent vehicle is determined to deviate from the racing track, and carrying out the teaching of the intelligent vehicle according to the running video, determining at least two frames of images of racing track elements entering the racing track before the intelligent vehicle deviates from the racing track; according to the at least two frames of images, determining an abnormal reason of the intelligent vehicle in the racing track element; and carrying out auxiliary teaching according to the abnormal reason. According to the embodiment of the invention, students can find fault reasons in time through auxiliary teaching, so that debugging is carried out according to the fault reasons, and the debugging efficiency of the intelligent vehicle is improved.

title: Teaching and practical training device for metal surface defect detection
applicants: CHONGQING HAIYUN JIEXUN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching practical training device for metal surface defect detection, which comprises a practical training platform, a conveying assembly and a control assembly, the conveying assembly comprises a conveying belt installed on the practical training platform and a synchronous motor driving the conveying belt, the control assembly is electrically connected with the synchronous motor, and the control assembly is electrically connected with the conveying belt. A detection assembly and a sorting assembly are sequentially arranged on the practical training platform in the rotating direction of the conveying belt, and a distance measuring sensor electrically connected with the synchronous motor is further arranged between the detection assembly and the sorting assembly so that the sorting assembly can grab materials detected by the detection assembly. The system can be combined with typical application scenes in the industry, provides training environments in the directions of artificial intelligence, Internet of Things and the like for teaching experiments of teachers and students, and further promotes the development of automatic detection of industrial surface defects.

title: Video interactive teaching system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGDONG ZHIMAIHUI DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A video interactive teaching system based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the present invention comprises a CUP processor, the input end of the CUP processor is bidirectionally and electrically connected with a data connection interface, the input end of the CUP processor is bidirectionally and electrically connected with a man-machine interaction assembly, and the output end of the CUP processor is bidirectionally and electrically connected with an edge AI chip. The output end of the CUP processor is bidirectionally and electrically connected with a wireless transceiver, the output end of the wireless transceiver is bidirectionally and electrically connected with a cloud processor, and the input end of the CUP processor is bidirectionally and electrically connected with an artificial intelligence creation platform. The artificial intelligence creation platform is composed of a face recognition programming block, an image recognition programming block, a character recognition programming block, a posture recognition programming block, a word meaning recognition programming block and an emotion recognition programming block. According to the invention, an identification mode of an existing teaching system is added, an internal AI chip is assisted for identification, the influence of a large amount of data on the operation of an internal processor is reduced, and the response speed of the teaching system is improved.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: ZHONGKE MAIHANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching disclosed by the present invention comprises a robot charging port, one side of the robot charging port is provided with a robot charging plug, one end of the robot charging plug extends into the robot charging port, and both sides of the robot charging plug are fixedly connected with connecting blocks. A connecting groove corresponding to the connecting block is formed in the inner side wall of the robot charging port, the end, away from the robot charging plug, of the connecting block extends into the connecting groove, a sliding groove is formed in the connecting block, a sliding block is slidably connected into the sliding groove, and two symmetrically-arranged sliding rods are slidably inserted into the sliding block; the two ends of the sliding rod penetrate through the sliding blocks correspondingly and are fixedly connected with the opposite side walls in the sliding groove. Through the arrangement of the clamping mechanism, the stability after the robot charging plug is inserted into the robot charging port is improved, the robot charging plug is prevented from being easily loosened due to the influence of external force, and the user experience is improved.

title: Intelligent teaching system based on AI visual technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of smart schools, and discloses an intelligent teaching system based on an AI visual technology, and the system comprises an image collection module which is used for collecting the motion images of students; the motion data extraction module is used for processing and obtaining corresponding image motion data based on the collected motion image; the first image screening module is used for extracting key images from the moving images; the historical image mapping module is used for establishing a mapping relation between the historical first motion image set and motion images of the first motion image set of the current exercise item of the current student; the qualified parameter calculation module is used for calculating qualified parameters; the result evaluation module is used for evaluating the result of the current sports item of the current student based on the qualified parameters; according to the invention, the AI vision technology is used to identify the motion data of the student based on the collected motion image, and the probability comprehensive calculation of qualified parameters is carried out based on the associated historical data of the motion data to accurately evaluate the motion item of the student.

title: Teaching auxiliary embedded system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching assistance embedded system based on artificial intelligence. The teaching assistance embedded system comprises a classroom evaluation subsystem and an examination analysis subsystem. The classroom evaluation subsystem comprises a camera module, a recognition and extraction module and an emotion calculation module; the recognition module runs an image preprocessing algorithm and a feature recognition algorithm and can extract a target portrait; the emotion calculation module analyzes the emotion of the examinee and comprises a classroom expression recognition unit, a head posture analysis unit and a classroom evaluation unit; the expression analysis unit learns facial expressions by applying a discriminant deep fusion method of an improved conditional generative adversarial network, and outputs facial emotion information; and the head posture analysis unit adopts a head posture estimation algorithm. According to the embedded system, images can be quickly recognized, the classroom language communication condition, the learning emotional state and the examination condition of students are comprehensively analyzed, the economic cost and time cost of teachers and students can be well reduced, and the teaching quality and efficiency are improved.

title: Big data trend prediction method and system based on deep learning
applicants: ANHUI BAOXIN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data trend prediction method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining user interaction data in real time, carrying out the big data feature analysis according to the user interaction data and teaching big data, obtaining a data feature analysis result, and carrying out the data prediction according to the data feature analysis result. According to the method, big data prediction analysis information is obtained, platform configuration scheme analysis is carried out through the big data prediction analysis information, and an AI practical training platform configuration scheme is obtained, so that an efficient and reasonable configuration scheme can be provided for the AI practical training platform, and the data processing efficiency of the platform is improved. Besides, practical training behavior feature analysis is performed according to the user interaction data to obtain user recommendation data for teaching practical training content, and the purpose of improving the AI practical training ability of the user is achieved.

title: College specialty optimization method and system based on talent knowledge graph construction
abstract_text: The invention provides a college specialty optimization method and system constructed based on a talent knowledge graph, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Basic information of a target college is obtained, a predetermined area range is set, an enterprise data set is obtained, an enterprise evaluation feature set is constructed, and enterprise post information is obtained; and post enterprise association coefficient evaluation is carried out to generate post enterprise association coefficient evaluation values, professional data are collected and recorded according to enterprise post information to construct post professional association degree parameters, and an enterprise-post-professional knowledge graph is constructed to obtain professional optimization suggestions of a target college.
