The technical problem that in the prior art, a vocational education production and teaching fusion method lacks scientific and systematic research on regional industries and employment markets, so that production and teaching fusion is difficult and deep is solved, and the requirements of the industries for talents in regional economic transformation development are clearly met; the integrating degree of professional setting of vocational colleges and regional industrial structures is improved, and then production and teaching integration is deepened.

title: Artificial intelligence experiment training device
applicants: JINAN ZHONGWEI SHUTONG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of practical training equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence experiment practical training device, which comprises a protective box body, two groups of guide rails are symmetrically and fixedly arranged in the protective box body; the servo motors are fixedly mounted at the upper ends of the guide rails; the lead screws are connected to one ends of driving shafts of the servo motors; the screw rod sleeve is in threaded connection with the outer side of the screw rod; and the baffle is fixedly connected to the upper end of the interior of the protection box body, and an I-shaped groove is formed in the middle end of the baffle in a penetrating mode. The electrical assembly practical training platform overcomes the defects in the prior art, the electrical assembly practical training platform is driven to move to the outside through the two sets of linear guide rail mechanisms, meanwhile, residual space can be sealed and shielded through the designed baffle, dust is effectively prevented from entering the box body in the practical training operation process, meanwhile, the device is provided with the intelligent camera, and the intelligent camera is convenient to use. Through the intelligent camera, a teacher can observe the learning state and the operation standard degree of students in real time, real-time communication can be carried out through the microphone, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Image quality improvement system and image quality improvement method
abstract_text: Provided are a high-precision and high-reliability image quality improvement system and an image quality improvement method that improve the image quality of a low-quality image by machine learning and that can learn appropriate teaching information even for a sample, the image of which changes easily every time the image is captured. An image quality improvement system for improving the image quality of a low-image-quality image is provided with: an image quality improvement unit for improving the image quality of a low-image-quality image; a deformation prediction unit that predicts the amount of deformation occurring between a first low-image-quality image included in the input low-image-quality image sequence and a second low-image-quality image different from the first low-image-quality image; and a deformation correction unit. And a correction unit that corrects, on the basis of the amount of deformation predicted by the deformation prediction unit, a first predicted image obtained by applying the processing by the image quality improvement unit to the first low-image-quality image and the second low-image-quality image. And a second prediction image obtained by applying the processing of the image quality improvement unit to the second low-image-quality image, learning such that the evaluation of the loss function between the first prediction image corrected by the distortion correction unit and the second low-image-quality image or the second prediction image is reduced. Alternatively, the evaluation of the loss function between the first predicted image and the second low-quality image or the second predicted image corrected by the distortion correction unit is reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence practical training system and method
applicants: BEIJING PUKAI DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence practical training system and method. The artificial intelligence practical training system comprises a cloud management platform, a cloud management module and a teaching module, wherein a plurality of experimental environment mirror images are pre-stored in the cloud management platform, and the experimental environment mirror images comprise a container environment mirror image and a virtual machine environment mirror image; the teaching module is used for responding to an experiment request of a teacher user or a student user; the cloud management module is used for sending an experiment environment scheduling request to the cloud management platform based on the experiment request; and the cloud management platform is used for receiving the experiment environment scheduling request sent by the cloud management module, determining a target experiment environment mirror image based on the experiment environment scheduling request, and sending the target experiment environment mirror image to the teaching module, so that the teacher user or the student user performs experiment training. According to the invention, the container environment mirror image or the virtual machine environment mirror image can be flexibly provided for the user, and the flexibility and universality of the artificial intelligence practical training system are improved.

title: Virtual simulation training platform based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual simulation training platform based on an AI technology, and the platform comprises a helmet detection end, the helmet detection end is electrically connected with a display panel, the display panel is electrically connected with a teaching end, an operation input end and a simulation end, the teaching end is electrically connected with a video input module, the teaching end is electrically connected with a database, and the database is electrically connected with a display module. The database is electrically connected with an equipment model import unit, the setting unit is electrically connected with a storage end, and the simulation end is electrically connected with an experiment unit and a detection unit. According to the virtual simulation training platform based on the AI technology, the platform is provided with the teaching end, the operation input end and the simulation end, the training effect can be achieved before training through the arranged teaching end, key operation and equipment in the training process can be input and action frames of the key operation and equipment can be analyzed and recorded through the arranged key action extraction module, and therefore the training effect is improved. And a new teaching video is made by matching the produced model with the action, so that tutoring teaching can be performed on students through the teaching video during subsequent training.

title: Automatic digital textbook modeling system based on AI deep learning
applicants: GUANGDONG PUBLISHING GROUP DIGITAL PUBLISHING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of digital textbook modeling, in particular to an automatic digital textbook modeling system based on AI deep learning, which comprises a database, a textbook editing module, a textbook output module, an acquisition module and an AI module, the judgment module is used for determining a corresponding material selection standard according to the teaching duration and the number of teaching knowledge points so as to select corresponding materials from the database and judging whether material selection for the knowledge points meets the standard or not according to interaction parameter values, collected by the collection module, of the knowledge points in the classroom after the classroom is ended; and when the material selection for the knowledge point is judged not to meet the standard, the material selection standard is adjusted in a targeted manner, so that the problem of low interaction efficiency during classroom teaching caused by the fact that the corresponding material cannot be applied to the teaching material during digital teaching material modeling in the prior art is solved by utilizing an AI deep learning mode.

title: Deaf-mute sign language error correction method and device based on machine learning and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deaf-mute sign language error correction method and device based on machine learning, and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining sign language body language video data, building a manual statement method corpus and a manual statement method error detection model, carrying out the error detection and error correction of text data error information, improving the feature accuracy of a sign language image, and improving the recognition accuracy of the sign language image. By establishing cross-modal unified representation of text data and sign language and body language video data, cross-modal confrontation training is performed on the text data after error correction, feedback video data is generated, a cross-modal heterogeneity gap existing between a video and a text is eliminated, and the feedback video data is obtained. A sign language video sample with a syntactic error can be converted into a corrected teaching feedback animation, a deaf-mute learner is guided to carry out autonomous sign language cognitive training, a sign language sample demonstrated by the deaf-mute learner is decomposed, and the syntactic error which does not conform to a sign language rule in the sample is detected and corrected and fed back. Therefore, the learning interaction experience of the deaf-mute is improved.

title: Intelligent visual sports evaluation system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent visual sports evaluation system and method. In the system, a video acquisition device arranged at each sports item area of a playground is used for acquiring sports video data in each sports item area; the transmission device obtains motion video data in each motion item area; for each sports item, analyzing the sports video data acquired in the sports area by using the corresponding AI algorithm model to obtain a sports analysis result; according to the obtained motion analysis result, displaying the motion analysis result at each terminal; and generating a student physical health report according to the motion analysis result. According to the invention, through the Internet of Things camera and the artificial intelligence motion vision algorithm, scientific training, personalized teaching and large-scale testing of sports can be realized.

title: Method for densifying sparse mode in 3D point cloud detection
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly discloses a method for densifying a sparse mode in 3D point cloud detection, a Sparse2Dense framework is adopted, the Sparse2Dense framework comprises a dense point cloud three-dimensional detector and a sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector, the dense point cloud three-dimensional detector takes dense point cloud as input, and the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector takes sparse point cloud as output; the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector takes the sparse point cloud as input; the method comprises the following steps: S1, preprocessing an original point cloud sequence to generate dense point clouds, and training a dense point cloud three-dimensional detector by taking the dense point clouds as input; s2, the features of the dense point cloud three-dimensional detector are migrated and embedded into the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector to serve as supervision signals, and the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector is trained; according to the method, when the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector is trained, the dense point cloud three-dimensional detector is used for teaching the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector to simulate and generate dense three-dimensional features, so that the sparse point cloud three-dimensional detector can learn to generate high-quality three-dimensional features from conventional point clouds, and the detection performance is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence simulation teaching system and method
applicants: BEIJING BUJU FUTURE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence application, and provides an artificial intelligence simulation teaching system, which comprises a data recognizer, a mechanical arm, a mechanical arm controller and a control host, and is characterized in that the data recognizer is in signal connection with the mechanical arm controller and the control host, and stores a first recognition program and a second recognition program; wherein the first identification program and the second identification program are realized based on an artificial intelligence algorithm and are different from each other; the mechanical arm controller is in control connection with the mechanical arm, and a control program is burnt on the mechanical arm controller; a simulation teaching application platform runs on the control host; wherein the simulation teaching application platform is used for analyzing the first recognition result and the second recognition result and generating first teaching feedback information. Therefore, not only can interestingness and operability of the teaching system be realized, but also performance comparison and feedback of the identification program can be realized.

title: Experiment box trolley
applicants: SHENZHEN LABPLUS SCIENCE AND EDUCATION CULTURE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to an experiment box trolley which comprises an experiment box trolley body, a control plate is embedded in one end of the upper surface of the experiment box trolley body, and a knob potentiometer is rotationally installed in the center of the upper surface of the experiment box trolley body. A human body infrared sensor and a temperature and humidity instrument are fixedly arranged at the positions, located on the two sides of the knob potentiometer, of the upper surface of the experiment box trolley respectively, a five-direction rocker is installed on one side of the upper surface of the experiment box trolley, and building block insertion holes are formed in the four side faces of the experiment box trolley. According to the utility model, a plurality of input and output sensors are integrated, graphical and code programming are supported, and the teaching device is suitable for popularization of artificial intelligence education, programming education and STEAM maker education, so that students can experience artificial intelligence from zero basis, support expansion, are compatible with Lego building blocks, can complete a plurality of creative applications, and can solve the problem that hair winds the driving wheels.

title: Language teaching auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: CHENGDU COLLEGE OF ELECTRONIC SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY UNIV
abstract_text: The invention discloses a language teaching auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence. The language teaching auxiliary system comprises a language recognition system, an image recognition system and an examination analysis system. The language recognition system is used for recognizing pronunciation, rhythm, translation, emotion and state of the learner in the language expression process; the image recognition system is used for extracting and recognizing the mastering condition of the learner on the problem from video signals provided in real time and extracting the learning state and emotion change of the learner from the posture and the face; and the examination analysis system is used for judging the learning condition of the examinee in combination with the examination result of the examinee and the real-time examination taking image, and generating an individual targeted learning state report. The artificial intelligence auxiliary system is provided for online teaching and offline teaching in the teaching process, teaching suggestions are provided for teachers according to comprehensive analysis of classroom language communication conditions, learning emotional states and examination conditions of students, the economic cost and time cost of the teachers and the students can be well reduced, and the teaching quality and efficiency are improved.

title: Intelligent sorting simulation teaching system and method
applicants: BEIJING BUJU FUTURE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence application, and provides an intelligent sorting simulation teaching system which comprises a sorting pad, a sorting table and a feedback host. The sorting pad is divided into a sorting area and a plurality of storage areas, the sorting area is used for placing the sorting table, the sorting table is used for placing target samples to be sorted, and the storage areas are used for placing the sorted target samples; the sorting table is provided with a data collector, each storage area is provided with a sensor, and the data collector and each sensor send collected data and sensing data to the feedback host; the feedback host confirms target sample characteristics of the target sample based on the collected data, determines a target storage area where the target sample is located according to the sensing data, and compares the target sample characteristics and the target storage area with a pre-established storage relationship; and determining whether the sorting result of the target sample meets the expectation or not, and outputting a feedback result.

title: Ultrasonic image data management method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of big data medical treatment, in particular to an ultrasonic image data management method and system.The system comprises an image sensor, the output end of the image sensor is electrically connected with an image input module in a one-way mode, and the output end of the image input module is electrically connected with an information editing module in a one-way mode; the output end of the information editing module is unidirectionally and electrically connected with an image retrieval module, and the output end of the image retrieval module is bidirectionally and electrically connected with an image analysis module. According to the ultrasonic image data management method and system, existing image data annotated and commented by doctors are compared and stored, and meanwhile, data fed back by big data are subjected to comparison teaching and misdiagnosis prompting through artificial intelligence; the functions of teaching users and popularizing medical knowledge by combining big data and artificial intelligence, training low-age doctors and teaching and prompting medical students are effectively realized.

title: Go online teaching implementation method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a go online teaching implementation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: loading chess manual courseware to carry out teaching according to a chess step sequence; obtaining an interactive teaching action; decomposing the interactive teaching action to obtain a decomposition result; performing conversion according to the decomposition result to obtain a conversion result; performing time sequence data synchronization on the conversion result and the decomposition result to obtain a synchronization result; integrating the synchronization result into a plain text to obtain a standardized courseware; and sending the standardized courseware to a receiving end so as to carry out teaching at the receiving end according to the standardized courseware. By implementing the method provided by the embodiment of the invention, the automation and intelligence of the teaching process can be realized, the reusability is high, and the method is suitable for artificial intelligence robot teaching.

title: Multi-style personalized Tibetan language speech synthesis model under low-resource condition
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-style personalized Tibetan language speech synthesis model oriented to a low-resource condition. The model comprises a speaker style encoder, and a character-tone conversion module, a text encoder, a variance adapter, a Mel-spectrum decoder and a HifiGAN vocoder which are connected in sequence. Training the synthetic model by adopting a model algorithm of'pre-training + meta-learning '; a model parameter theta learnable by the deep learning model is divided into a parameter theta p related to rhythm, a parameter theta s related to a speaker and other residual parameters, namely theta p and theta s comprise learnable model parameters of a speaker style encoder and learnable model parameters of a text encoder, a Mel spectrum decoder and a variance adapter. The synthesis model can be applied to intelligent bilingual teaching products, and can also be applied to the fields of oral conversation of Tibetan language, multimedia information processing, other man-machine interaction and the like.

title: Campus education informatization management platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus education informatization management platform based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of campus education informatization management, and solves the technical problems that in the prior art, real-time progress analysis cannot be carried out on teaching tasks in a campus, and teaching task quality detection cannot be carried out through information quantification. The campus teaching task completion progress is analyzed in real time, teaching task analysis is performed through teaching task quantification, and whether the campus real-time education quality and efficiency are qualified or not is judged, so that the campus education informatization monitoring efficiency is improved, the execution efficiency of the teaching task can be seen more clearly through quantified data, and the campus education informatization monitoring efficiency is improved. When the teaching task analysis is unqualified, teaching task planning can be carried out in time, and it is ensured that the teaching task can be completed on time; and risk analysis is performed on the teaching process when the teaching task is qualified, so that the teaching quality reduction caused by potential quality hazards of the teaching task can be prevented.

title: Classroom teaching method and system based on man-machine cooperation
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom teaching method and system based on man-machine cooperation, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: building a teaching environment; intelligent diagnosis before class; man-machine learning is assisted in class; and after-class accurate evaluation is realized. According to the invention, through man-machine cooperation and learning community theory, a classroom teaching mode including teacher intelligence, machine intelligence, man-machine cooperation and other elements is constructed, a man-machine cooperation platform is utilized to collect student data, and after analysis and diagnosis, a personalized teaching report is formed, so that a personalized teaching scheme is formulated, and the teaching quality can be effectively improved.

title: CTMR imaging anatomical annotation and 3D modeling mapping teaching system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a CTMR imaging anatomical annotation and 3D modeling mapping teaching system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a graph and data collection module, a graph and data processing module, a graph refining module, a visual three-dimensional model building module, and a three-dimensional model editing module. The problems that medical students or primary doctors need to continuously and repeatedly browse a plurality of two-dimensional images to judge anatomical positioning in combination with an existing map to judge the anatomical positioning of the two-dimensional cross-sectional images output by a common CTMR machine after scanning, much time is needed to judge which spatial anatomical positioning the two-dimensional cross-sectional images belong to, the effect is not visual, and the medical students are seriously affected are solved. Inconvenience is brought to learning and working of primary medical staff, and lag, errors and delay of a clinical work preliminary report are directly caused.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of logistics equipment training teaching, and particularly relates to a teaching device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a simulation teaching platform, a logistics robot, a pressure sensor and a display screen, and is characterized in that the simulation teaching platform is connected with the display screen through a display screen bracket; the logistics robot is arranged above the simulation teaching platform, and the top end of the simulation teaching platform is provided with a displacement sensor. The equipment is provided with a simulation teaching platform, the robot is placed on the platform, simulation training can be carried out on path programming on a control host, a person uses the host to carry out action programming, the robot works on the platform, and a sensor on the platform records the actions of moving, steering, lifting and the like of the robot. Whether the programming path is reasonable or not is displayed on the display screen, and efficient practical operation teaching is carried out.

title: System for intelligently generating ancient poetry situation video through AI and working method thereof
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of teaching application of information technology, and provides an AI intelligent ancient poetry situation video generation system and a working method thereof, the system comprises an ancient poetry paraphrase retrieval module, a Chinese-English conversion module, a prompt statement extraction module, a single sentence image generation module and a video synthesis module; the working method comprises the following steps: (1) retrieving paraphrases of ancient poetry; (2) converting Chinese paraphrases into English paraphrases; (3) extracting prompt statements; (4) generating a single-sentence poem image; and (5) video synthesis. The AI intelligent generation ancient poetry situation video system is constructed, the system automatically generates the situation video corresponding to the content according to the ancient poetry text, a large number of video learning resources can be provided for teaching of teachers and self-learning activities of students, the understanding difficulty is reduced, a new way for generation of ancient poetry learning videos is provided, and the method is suitable for popularization and application. And the intelligence of ancient poetry teaching resource generation is promoted.

title: Intelligent education evaluation supervision method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent education evaluation supervision method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: capturing the behavior actions of students and teachers and the language in a classroom through a camera and a plurality of pieces of pickup equipment; the invention relates to an intelligent supervision and evaluation system integrating a computer vision technology and a voice recognition and semantic analysis technology, the system captures behavior actions of students and teachers and languages in a classroom through a plurality of cameras and a plurality of pickup devices distributed in the classroom, and the behaviors and the voices are matched with each other, so that the students and the teachers are supervised and evaluated. Through an edge computing device, a behavior analysis algorithm and a semantic analysis algorithm, behaviors and languages which appear or possibly appear in a classroom and are irrelevant to learning and teaching are monitored and alarmed, and through combination of a semantic analysis result and classroom actions of students and teachers, the class attending effect of the students and the teaching content of the teachers are scored and evaluated. And a scientific basis is provided for improvement of a teaching mode of a teacher and cultivation of learning habits of students.

title: DEFECT DETECTION METHOD, DEFECT DETECTION SYSTEM, AND DEFECT DETECTION PROGRAM
abstract_text: The present invention enables detection and classification of various products as a good product, a defective product containing a known defect, or a defective product containing an unknown defect. This defect learning method includes: a step in which a processing circuit prepares one or more sets of first teaching data by using, as first teaching data, raw image data which captures an inspection target and contains a defect, and marked image data obtained in a prescribed color application step by attaching a label of a prescribed color for each type of defect to the raw image data; a step in which the processing circuit prepares one or more sets of second teaching data by using, as second teaching data, defect-free raw image data which captures the inspection target, and identity mapping data which does not differ from the raw image data; and a step in which the processing circuit prepares a trained machine learning model by using the first and the second teaching data to perform training.

title: Pediatric tracheal intubation training system and method based on augmented reality
abstract_text: The invention relates to a pediatric tracheal intubation training system and method based on augmented reality. The pediatric tracheal intubation training system comprises an augmented reality module, a tracheal intubation entity model module, a medical behavior recognition and evaluation module and a voice interaction module. The augmented reality module comprises augmented reality glasses, and the augmented reality module is used for providing augmented reality pictures and audios for a user; the trachea cannula solid model module is used for providing a solid model for simulating completion of trachea cannula operation for a user; the medical behavior identification and evaluation module is used for identifying behaviors of the user in the process of executing tracheal intubation and performing real-time evaluation; and the voice interaction module is used for sending an instruction or a reply to a user and simulating sound made when tracheal intubation operation is executed clinically. The technology of augmented reality, voice interaction, deep learning and the like is fused, so that the training method is more professional and efficient. Compared with the prior art, the system has the advantages of low cost, teaching time saving, high teaching efficiency and the like.

title: Teaching quality evaluation method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of classroom teaching quality evaluation, in particular to a teaching quality evaluation method and system, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a teaching quality evaluation system: constructing a teacher teaching index and a student learning index with a teacher and a student as evaluation subjects, and constructing a teaching coordination index and a teaching order index; collecting teacher teaching index data and student learning index data, and calculating a teacher teaching index score and a student learning index score according to the index data; acquiring teaching coordination index data and teaching order index data, and analyzing a teaching coordination index score and a teaching order index score according to the index data by using an intelligent program; calculating a final teaching quality evaluation score; and performing teaching quality evaluation according to the final teaching quality evaluation score. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is applied to the teaching quality evaluation, the evaluation subject and the evaluation index are considered from multiple dimensions, and the objectivity, scientificity and accuracy of the teaching quality evaluation process and result are effectively improved.

title: Integrated circuit packaging test teaching system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of integrated circuit detection, and particularly relates to an integrated circuit packaging test teaching system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a training end, a simulation end and a server which are in communication connection with one another. The simulation end generates an integrated circuit package test simulation task in combination with the model and the control software, and the server transmits the simulation task generated by the simulation end to the training end for the user to train, so that the training efficiency is improved. Therefore, the problems of low efficiency and cost increase caused by high requirement on manual operation proficiency in the existing integrated circuit packaging test process can be solved.

title: Artificial intelligence technology teaching device
applicants: ZHEJIANG WEILONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence technology teaching device provided by the present invention comprises a base, handrails, a soundproof shed and a cushion, the handrails are fixedly connected to two sides of the base, the tops of the tail ends of the handrails are fixedly connected with the soundproof shed, the soundproof shed wraps the tail end of the base and the tail ends of the handrails to form a semi-sealed cavity, and the cushion is arranged at the top of the base. The invention provides an artificial intelligence technology teaching device, and aims to solve the problems that a student is prone to fatigue when using the teaching device for a long time, the learning efficiency is reduced, and the physical and psychological health is affected. The problems that an existing intelligent teaching device is single in teaching mode, the memory efficiency cannot be improved, and external environment interference easily affects students to distract attention are solved.

title: TRAINING DEVICE
abstract_text: Provided is a training device 10 in which: a first annotation unit 11 performs first annotation processing that gives feature information, which indicates the feature of an object image, to the object image by using a trained model for annotation, which is duplicated from a trained model for recognition used by an object sorting device 30 that sorts out a desired object on the basis of a recognition result of the object image; a machine-learning unit 13 updates the trained model for annotation by performing machine-learning by using, as teaching data, the object image and the feature information given by the first annotation processing; and a model management unit 15 updates the trained model for recognition by using the updated trained model for annotation.

title: PICKING SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: Provided is an picking system which can suitably extract a workpiece by machine learning. The picking system is provided with: a robot which has a hand; an acquisition unit which acquires a two-dimensional camera image of an area where a plurality of workpieces are present; a teaching unit which can display the two-dimensional camera image and teach an picking position of a target workpiece to be extracted by the hand from among the plurality of workpieces; a training unit which generates a trained model on the basis of the two-dimensional camera image and the taught picking position; an inference unit which infers the picking position of the target work on the basis of the trained model and the two-dimensional camera image; and a control unit which controls the robot to extract the target workpiece by means of the hand on the basis of the inferred picking position.

title: Patient health intervention and accelerated rehabilitation method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING FUQUAN HEALTH TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a patient health intervention and accelerated rehabilitation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of data processing.The method comprises the steps that S1, based on collected basic information, health conditions, exercise habits and dietary habits, related to diseases, of patients in the perioperative period, the patient health intervention and accelerated rehabilitation are obtained; a rehabilitation intervention scheme used for being pushed to the patient every day is matched; s2, calling the corresponding learning content and the question bank, and sending the learning content and the question bank to the patient; s3, calling a corresponding training item, and sending the training item to the patient; s4, determining the learning and mastering condition of the patient in the perioperative period on the rehabilitation knowledge patient teaching scheme, and determining the execution condition of the patient in the perioperative period on the rehabilitation training scheme; and S5, performing behavior driving on the patient in the perioperative period, or performing intensity adjustment on the rehabilitation intervention scheme. According to the application, the learning and training conditions of the patient can be monitored, and the health education management effect of the patient in the perioperative period is improved.

title: Intelligent deduction system for English multi-role dialogue creation training
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent deduction system for English multi-role dialogue creation training. The intelligent deduction system comprises a user input and output module, a voice processing module, a logic control module, a multi-role voice synthesis module, a dialogue text evaluation module, a sharing module and a database. Through the preset character, gender and character design, students are guided to carry out dialogues, the interest of users is improved, the students are guided to use wrong words and newly learned vocabularies in recent practice, and certain feedback and evaluation and final scoring can be carried out on the quality of the dialogues created by the students; a brand-new training mode is brought to foreign language teaching in middle and primary schools, that is, students perform dialogue character creation and perform voice deduction of characters through artificial intelligence, so that creation results of the students can be better displayed, and particularly, the method is very helpful to practice newly learned vocabularies.

title: Multi-dimensional analysis method and system based on video AI
applicants: SHENZHEN HUARUI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-dimensional analysis method and system based on video AI, and the method comprises the following steps: collecting and preprocessing a teaching video, and respectively extracting a video stream and voice of the teaching video for processing; performing target detection based on a target detection algorithm to obtain all target objects in the teaching video; performing attitude analysis on the target object based on an attitude evaluation algorithm; and performing action recognition by adopting a trained full-connection neural network, and performing behavior statistics on the target object according to an S-T algorithm to obtain an analysis result of teaching evaluation. According to the invention, the teaching video is collected and preprocessed, the video stream and the voice of the teaching video are respectively extracted and processed, and the behavior statistics of the target object is carried out according to the S-T algorithm to obtain the analysis result of teaching evaluation, so that the class state of teachers and students is evaluated, and the teaching quality is effectively improved.

title: Middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality-oriented education service platform design method
applicants: BEIJING BAYI SPACE INFORMATION ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education service platform design method. The method comprises the following steps: (1) model construction; (2) designing an overall frame; (3) designing a visual programming system; (4) designing a middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education knowledge system; and (5) creative course system design. The system has the advantages that the artificial intelligence quality-oriented education service platform is constructed, and the functions of art creation, intelligent perception, interaction, virtual and real experience and the like are integrated; a visual programming system, an offline practical training system, a creative course system, a teaching management and service system and the like form a middle and primary school artificial intelligence quality education service platform. The platform is characterized in that art creativity and artificial intelligence technology are fused, platform positioning provides technology and application support for artificial intelligence quality-oriented education of middle and primary schools, and the platform has certain innovativeness in the aspect of overall design of the artificial intelligence quality-oriented education service platform.

title: Children teaching robot based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a child teaching robot based on an artificial intelligence technology, and relates to the technical field of child teaching robots, the child teaching robot comprises a desktop box, the top of the desktop box is provided with a hidden groove, the inner wall of the hidden groove is fixedly provided with a rotating shaft, the outside of the rotating shaft is rotatably connected with an intelligent screen, and the top of the desktop box is provided with a sorting mechanism. A reading mechanism is fixed to the inner wall of the desktop box, a stool is fixed to the front side of the desktop box, a first sitting posture reminding mechanism is fixed to the top of the stool, a second sitting posture reminding mechanism is fixed to the front side of the desktop box, and the sorting mechanism comprises a first groove and a second groove which are formed in the top of the desktop box. The groove I is communicated with the groove II; according to the invention, the English score, manipulative ability and learning interest of children can be improved in the game playing process, the sitting posture of the children can be corrected in the learning process, and the eyesight and skeletal development of the children can be protected.

title: Three-dimensional point cloud analysis guiding method applied to mechanical arm machining
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a three-dimensional point cloud analysis guiding method applied to mechanical arm machining. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, carrying out calibration and coordinate system conversion on a three-dimensional visual system and a mechanical arm, carrying out rapid three-dimensional scanning on a workpiece through a binocular three-dimensional reconstruction device, carrying out filtering and other processing on an obtained three-dimensional point cloud to obtain a depth map, dividing the depth map into blocks according to the diameter of a tool head of the mechanical arm and an operation step length, and carrying out calculation; and block target points and normal vectors are determined according to fitting planes and machining depths of points in all blocks, then block quaternions are calculated, a coordinate point set and quaternion set information in the process are input into a mechanical arm control end through Ethernet communication, and therefore autonomous guiding of the mechanical arm is achieved. Compared with a traditional mechanical arm teaching programming method, the three-dimensional point cloud analysis guiding method designed by the invention has the advantages that personalized and intelligent machining of different workpieces can be realized without teaching programming, the reliability and accuracy of path planning and guiding are improved, the production efficiency is improved, the production cost is reduced, and intelligent machining and manufacturing are boosted.

title: Virtual teaching management method and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a virtual teaching management method and device based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of teaching management. According to the invention, on the basis of the classroom teaching style of a teacher and the psychological fluctuation when students listen to the classroom content in the classroom teaching style, fusion is carried out based on the multi-dimensional features of voice emotion, facial emotion and limb emotion, and a classroom concentration evaluation model is constructed to calculate a classroom atmosphere evaluation value; according to the invention, features of different dimensions of teachers and students in a classroom are reasonably utilized for fusion, so that an emotion recognition result which is more accurate than that of a single feature is achieved. And meanwhile, corresponding measures are taken for teaching management based on the early warning level corresponding to the classroom atmosphere evaluation value, so that learning of students can be effectively promoted, teachers are helped to perform teaching reflection, and a teaching scheme can be continuously optimized by analyzing the characteristics of the video. And meanwhile, a good basic data support is provided for improving the teaching quality and determining the education reform direction.

title: Digital electrocardiogram teaching equipment with automatic feedback function
applicants: SHANGHAI SID MEDICAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an automatic feedback digital electrocardiogram teaching device, which is characterized by comprising a database establishment module, an automatic feedback module, an automatic feedback module and an automatic feedback module, and is characterized in that the database establishment module is used for establishing a digital standard electrocardiogram spectrum data set; all electrocardiogram data conclusions in the standard electrocardiogram spectrum data set are labeled; and the user answering module is used for automatically recording label accuracy, automatically prompting and feeding back weak points and formulating personalized learning paths in a targeted manner in the answering process of the user in a question bank mode. The beneficial effects of the invention are that based on an artificial intelligence algorithm technology, a knowledge tracking and personalized learning path planning algorithm is combined, so that a learner can realize automatic response feedback in a learning process, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: System for counting quantity of game tokens
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at leastpartiallyhave a specificcolorindicative ofavalue of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color thatis presentin the image anddiffers from the specificcolor; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Teacher experience type intelligent question bank based on AI technology and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher experience type intelligent question bank based on an AI technology and a use method thereof, and the intelligent question bank comprises a server, and a teacher terminal and a student terminal which are in contact with the server. The server is provided with an AI question bank, a virtual question speaking person, a student portrait bank, a question answering module of the student portrait bank, a class portrait bank, a class question answering area, a teacher intelligent question bank and a structured processor of the teacher intelligent question bank, and an audio question bank and an audio question structured processor are further arranged in the teacher intelligent question bank. The system has the remarkable effects that the requirements of teachers, students and parents for timely tracking teaching progress and learning difficulty are met, the requirements for comparing learning condition differences between individual students and the whole team are met, and the students are helped to achieve learning targets and learning effects.

title: Image-based virtual simulation practical training classroom teaching management method and system
applicants: SHANDONG UNIV OF ENGINEERING AND VOCATIONAL TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: The invention provides an image-based virtual simulation practical training classroom teaching management method and system, and belongs to the technical field of image processing. The problem that an existing virtual simulation practical training classroom cannot comprehensively evaluate the action execution process of students is solved. The method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: sequentially carrying out feature extraction on continuous video frame images of each student after denoising to obtain an initial student action feature sequence; wherein the initial student action feature sequence comprises angle features and energy features; performing core action video frame image screening according to the angle features and the energy features to obtain a screened student action feature sequence; according to the screened student action feature sequence and a preset deep learning classification model, obtaining a student continuous action recognition result, further obtaining a first external evaluation result, and taking the weighted sum of the first external evaluation result and the internal evaluation result as a student classroom evaluation result; according to the invention, more accurate training action standardization evaluation is realized.

title: Teaching scene intelligent analysis system and method based on group behaviors
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching scene intelligent analysis system and method based on group behaviors. The system comprises the following parts: M1: a multi-modal data acquisition module; m2: an individual behavior identification module used for converting the original multi-modal data related to the individual in the M1 into an individual behavior sequence; m3, a group behavior analysis module which is used for aggregating the individual behavior sequences of the students into a student group behavior matrix and analyzing individual behaviors from a group perspective; m4, a teaching scene judgment module used for carrying out teaching scene division and carrying out performance judgment on abnormal individuals; and M5, an education domain knowledge definition module which is used for forming teacher and student behavior classification coding specifications and teaching scene classification coding specifications. According to the intelligent teaching scene analysis system and method based on group behaviors, the integrity of teaching roles and the difference of teaching scenes in teaching analysis are reflected, and a scene innovation basis is provided for teaching analysis and intervention under the support of artificial intelligence.

title: 3D virtual image auditory speech training method based on AI interaction
abstract_text: The invention discloses a 3D virtual image auditory speech training method based on AI interaction, which is a brand-new English speech learning method capable of combining auditory training with body action stimulation and oral (speaking) practice, combines an intonation auditory method with 3D virtual image and AI speech recognition and evaluation, can effectively improve the speech level of an English learner, and improves the speech quality of the English learner. According to the method, the defects of voice teaching in a classroom and staggered voice conditions of teachers are overcome, the problem of timeliness in classroom teaching is solved, and more importantly, the method capable of being operated on the mobile intelligent terminal is a positive innovation of promoting educational fairness and achieving joint balanced development of educational.

title: COOLANT STATE SPECULATION SYSTEM, COOLANT STATE SPECULATION METHOD, PROGRAM, LEARNED MODEL AND MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a coolant state speculation system which can speculate a coolant state at the time zone when coolant is not sufficiently stirred.SOLUTION: A coolant state speculation system speculating time variation of a coolant state used for a process machine comprises: a coolant state acquisition part which acquires measurement information in which a measured value of the coolant state is associated with measurement time of the measured value; a processing information acquisition part which acquires processing information regarding processing condition of the process machine; and a speculation part which speculates time variation of the measurement value after the measurement time of the measurement information by use of the learned model based on the measurement information and the processing information. The learned model is given by learning the time variation of the measurement value using teaching data created based on the measurement information and the processing information.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: MACHINE LEARNING MODEL EVALUATION SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: To evaluate the reliability of a machine learning model without time and effort for teaching.SOLUTION: A machine learning model evaluation system according to an embodiment comprises a calculation unit and an evaluation unit. The calculation unit inputs, to the machine learning model, use data that was used for learning of a learned machine learning model and object data which is input to the machine learning model and subjected to prediction. The calculation unit calculates first statistical information from an output of the machine learning model in response to the use data, and calculates second statistical information from the output of the machine learning model in response to the object data. The evaluation unit evaluates the reliability of the machine learning model on the basis of a difference or a rate of change between the first statistical information and the second statistical information, and of a predetermined threshold value.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Multi-lens multi-screen collaborative teaching aid
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, in particular to a multi-lens multi-screen collaborative teaching aid, which comprises a control cylinder, a plurality of lens adjusting seats are mounted at one end of the control cylinder, and an AI lens is mounted on each lens adjusting seat; the lens adjusting seat comprises a rotating clamping seat, a rotating shaft hole is formed in the rotating clamping seat, the AI lens comprises a lens barrel, a rotating seat is installed at the end, away from the lens, of the lens barrel, and the width of the rotating seat is the same as the clamping distance of the rotating clamping seat. According to the utility model, multiple groups of AI lenses are arranged and can cooperate with multiple teaching flat plates for auxiliary teaching, the AI lenses are placed at required positions, pictures of the AI lenses are controlled through the teaching flat plates, interfaces on the flat plates are synchronized with a large screen in real time, and a rotating seat and a rotating clamping seat of each AI lens are rotatably connected through a rotating shaft. The angle of each lens can be independently adjusted, and the use is convenient.

title: Robot suitable for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: WUHAN ZHIDONGXIN TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a robot suitable for artificial intelligence teaching. The robot comprises a robot body, a first control panel, a second control panel, a driving module, a camera module and an optical sensing module. The robot is suitable for artificial intelligence teaching and is reasonable in structure, convenient to install and high in functionality, the plate-shaped machine body facilitates heat dissipation of electronic devices, the electronic devices are prevented from being rapidly aged due to overheating, a user can conveniently observe the overall structure of the robot, and great convenience is brought to the teaching process; the robot can identify an identification path through the optical sensing module, and then the robot is driven to move through the driving mechanism, so that'tracking movement 'teaching is facilitated; through the camera module, the robot has a visual function, obstacles on a moving path can be observed, and visual driving teaching is facilitated.

title: Medical learning guidance system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHONGCHENGMING BEIJING BUSINESS SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a medical learning guidance system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a collection module which is used for recording the played medical teaching content of a playing module for a learner, and building a knowledge network of the learner, and an analysis module which is used for analyzing the knowledge network, estimating the mastering degree of the learner for each knowledge point, and outputting the mastering degree of each knowledge point. And the guidance module is used for establishing a review guidance scheme based on the mastery degree of the learner for each knowledge point, transmitting the review guidance scheme to the playing module for display, and establishing a learning guidance scheme for integrating learning and medical knowledge consolidation, and the learning guidance scheme can be adjusted according to the mastery degree of the learner for each knowledge point, so that the learning guidance scheme is more accurate. The objective of the invention is to provide a feasible learning scheme for learners.

title: Handheld holder
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of holders, in particular to a handheld holder, which comprises an identification assembly composed of a mounting shell, an AI camera, an interface board, a core board and a lower cover. The AI camera at the front end of the mounting shell is used for recognizing human body morphological characteristics and transmitting recognized human body morphological characteristic data to the core board in real time, and then the core board controls the heading and pitching motor to operate to automatically adjust the angle of the holder. A mobile phone or camera equipment fixed on the clamping assembly can be driven to follow the walking of a person for shooting. According to the utility model, AI identification can be carried out to follow fixed persons and objects to automatically track targets and adjust the rotation angle of the camera to carry out real-time shooting. And the method can also be applied to mobile phone application end video synchronization and auxiliary teaching. And extension landing of any application scene and special field can be supported independently by splitting.

title: AI practical training method and system based on big data
applicants: ANHUI BAOXIN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI practical training method and system based on big data, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the multi-module test question screening from AI teaching big data, obtaining AI test question data, sending the AI test question data to a target student terminal device, carrying out the multi-module testing, carrying out the multi-module comprehensive analysis according to the target student test question completion data, and carrying out the multi-module practical training. Learning progress evaluation data of the target student is obtained, training content analysis and retrieval are further carried out according to the learning progress evaluation data of the target student, and teaching training scheme information of different students is obtained. The AI practical training efficiency of students is improved, the workload of teachers is reduced, and the purpose of improving the AI practical training ability of the students is further achieved.

title: Digital training method and system for safety production, medium and equipment
applicants: CHIPONT BEIJING RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF SAFETY PRODUCTION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of safety generation, and particularly relates to a digital training method and system for safety production, a medium and equipment. The method comprises the steps that learning content is allocated to each preset student through preset digital safety production learning resources; recording course related information of each student in the learning process; and judging whether the course content corresponding to the course related information in the digital safety production learning resources is updated or not based on any course related information, and if the judgment result is yes, updating until the judgment of all the course related information is completed. According to the invention, the AI technology can be utilized to promote the digital education resource construction in the aspect of safety production, enable the education and learning process, improve the digital learning efficiency in a mode of presetting learning resources, improve the active safety awareness and willingness of a learner, and achieve deep teaching and learning, and furthermore, the safety of the learner is improved. And through continuous updating of the learning resources, the significance of training can be further improved.

title: Multi-task knowledge tracking method with enhanced option value
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of education data mining, deep learning and knowledge tracking, and provides an option value enhanced multi-task knowledge tracking method, which comprises the following steps: (1) option value calculation and feature embedding; (2) integrating mixed experts; (3) attention gating selection; and (4) performing multi-task prediction. According to the method, technical methods such as time sequence modeling and multi-task learning are utilized, option values are adopted to represent part or all of knowledge, and meanwhile, modeling is performed on the knowledge state of the student, so that the learning state of the student better conforms to a real learning scene, and personalized teaching is assisted.

title: Part assembly interactive teaching system and method
applicants: SHANGHAI INTELLIGENT MFG FUNCTION PLATFORM CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a part assembly interactive teaching system, which comprises an assembly field terminal for carrying out interactive teaching and executing part assembly; and the background server is used for receiving the information in the assembly process of the assembly field terminal and executing assembly supervision. According to the interactive teaching system and method for part assembly, installation of each step is carried out interactively, detection and supervision are completed, intelligent error correction is achieved, and the assembly quality is guaranteed; according to the invention, the assembler can be guided to assemble through the animation teaching video, and the training efficiency of the assembler is effectively improved; establishment of an error correction model is achieved through an artificial intelligence mode, the working mode is flexible, the system can adapt to different materials and different assembly scenes, and interactive teaching of different part assembly processes can be met through a small amount of improvement.

title: SIGNAL PROCESSING APPARATUS, SIGNAL PROCESSING SYSTEM, AND SIGNAL PROCESSING PROGRAM
abstract_text: An apparatus yields signals that are equivalent to ECG signals and allow determination of a heartbeat interval or heart rate from bio-vibration signals including vibrations derived from heartbeats. An ECG meter acquires ECG signals of a sample, and a piezoelectric sensor acquires bio-vibration signals of the sample simultaneously. The bio-vibration signals include beating vibration signals derived from heartbeats. A learning unit of a prediction modeling apparatus establishes a prediction model by machine learning in which ECG signals are used as teaching data, and model input signals obtained by performing a specified processing on the bio-vibration signals are input. The learning unit delivers the prediction model to a prediction unit of a signal processing apparatus. The prediction model predicts and outputs pECG signals upon input of model input signals obtained by performing a specified processing on bio-vibration signals acquired from a subject under prediction with a piezoelectric sensor.

title: Error cause speculation method and system based on artificial intelligence and storable medium
applicants: SUZHOU BAIZHITONG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an error cause speculation method and system based on artificial intelligence and a storable medium, an error cause feature library is established by manually setting answer error causes, and the manual setting comprises setting subject general error causes by an administrator and marking question individual error causes by a teacher; inputting a student answering library, predicting student error causes by utilizing machine learning according to the general error cause library, and outputting results; and the student selects the output result and records the selection in the error cause feature library. According to the method, manual learning and machine learning are combined, the complexity of error cause marking is reduced, the marking efficiency of students is improved, error cause selection of the students is continuously recorded, more accurate student data are obtained, student portraits are formed, and individualized teaching and individualized learning are achieved.

title: Double-arm drawing robot teaching system and drawing control method and device thereof
applicants: CHONGQING LUBAN ROBOT TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a double-arm drawing robot teaching system and a drawing control method and device thereof, and relates to the field of double-arm robots. The drawing control method of the double-arm drawing robot comprises the steps that target drawing information is acquired; drawing information is collected according to a machine vision system, and the drawing track of the first drawing arm and the drawing track of the second drawing arm are calculated through a deep learning algorithm; acquiring detection information of a drawing board and a brush; according to the detection information of the drawing board and the paintbrush, whether the double-arm drawing robot can conduct drawing or not is judged; and if the double-arm drawing robot can perform drawing, the left arm and the right arm are controlled to coordinate to complete a drawing task. According to the double-arm drawing robot teaching system and the drawing control method and device thereof, the drawing efficiency can be improved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TEACHING A ROBOT PROGRAM
abstract_text: A system and method for teaching a robot program based on user input. In some embodiments, poses of a posing device manipulated by a user are captured and analyzed. In some embodiments, robot instructions are determined by a machine-learning algorithm that is trained on data concerning previously executed instructions evaluated by a user. In some embodiments, a user-selected process type defines workpiece geometry types for guiding the creation of robot instructions. In some embodiments, an augmented- or virtual-reality user interface is provided for obtaining user input.

title: Education informatization method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education informatization method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: training a deep learning model which comprises an improved BERT model and a Bi-LSTM model; inputting text data published by a user in the interactive communication area of the online education platform into the trained deep learning model to obtain an output text; and displaying the obtained output text in an interactive communication area of the online education platform. According to the invention, through the deep learning model for natural language processing, a sexual language left in the communication interaction area of the online education platform by the dishonor is converted into a sponsored language and displayed in the communication interaction area, so that the purposes of improving the teaching interest of teachers and driving the dishonor are achieved.

title: Teaching evaluation method and system based on AI classroom behavior recognition
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education and teaching, in particular to a teaching evaluation method and system based on AI classroom behavior recognition. The method comprises the following steps: collecting and preprocessing a teaching video, and respectively extracting video streams and voices of the teaching video to be processed; carrying out target detection based on a YOLO target detection algorithm, obtaining all target objects in the teaching video, and determining the positions and types of the target objects; carrying out attitude analysis on all target objects in the teaching video by adopting a single camera based on an attitude evaluation algorithm, extracting features through relative positions of key points, analyzing actions of the target objects, and carrying out behavior recognition; and performing action recognition by adopting a trained full-connection neural network, and performing behavior statistics on the target object according to an S-T algorithm to obtain an analysis result of teaching evaluation. According to the invention, the teaching process can be evaluated effectively, objectively and quantitatively, teaching evaluation is daily, and the education and teaching quality is improved.

title: Position coordinate detection device and method
abstract_text: In order to enable teaching data to be created easily and position coordinates to be detected with high reliability, this position coordinate detection device is constituted by comprising: a deep learning model having been trained using training image data in which the position coordinate to be detected is specified and teaching image data in which a pixel group exhibiting a shape independent of the subject of the training image data is disposed at a position relative to the position coordinate to be detected; a position coordinate calculation unit for calculating a position coordinate using the inference image data outputted from the deep learning model; and a reliability calculation unit for calculating reliability using the global pixel group information of the inference image data outputted from the deep learning model.

title: Automatic segmentation system for cardio-pulmonary resuscitation AI
applicants: GUANGZHOU RUIXING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a cardiopulmonary resuscitation AI automatic segmentation system, which comprises an action recognition module used for determining an end posture of each operation in cardiopulmonary resuscitation, determining an end frame of each operation based on the end posture, and obtaining a first segmentation node; the semantic detection module is used for extracting video semantics of the original video to obtain audio features, and checking the first segmentation node based on the audio features to obtain a checking result; and the video segmentation module is used for segmenting the original video according to the inspection result and automatically filing video segmentation information. The cardiopulmonary resuscitation teaching video or practice video is automatically segmented, the cardiopulmonary resuscitation teaching video is segmented to facilitate targeted learning of repeated watching of a certain operation of cardiopulmonary resuscitation by students according to own learning requirements, and the student practice video is segmented to facilitate watching and scoring by teachers. And a teacher can timely find the action problem of the cardio-pulmonary resuscitation operation of the student and propose improvement suggestions

title: AGING AWARE REWARD CONSTRUCT FOR MACHINE TEACHING
abstract_text: The techniques disclosed herein enable systems to integrate aging awareness into machine learning agents for management of control systems. To achieve this, the machine learning agent extracts a set of states and an aging model from the control system and derives an aging term from the aging model. Based on the states and the aging term, the machine learning agent determines a set of actions that are applied to the control system. Subsequently, the machine learning agent can extract a new set of states to analyze the efficacy of the set of actions. This is achieved through an optimality function that quantifies the success of the set of actions by calculating an optimality score. The calculation is based on both a current performance of the system and a future drift or degradation of system components. Through many iterations of the action set, the machine learning agent can optimize system operations.

title: LABELING SYSTEM, ACTIVITY RECOGNITION SYSTEM, AND TEACHING MATERIAL GENERATING SYSTEM
abstract_text: To easily and properly label data that corresponds to an activity included in time-series data.SOLUTION: A labeling system 1 includes a processor (102, 103, 104) and a machine learning model from which, in response to an input of time series data, a high-level label indicating a high-level activity included in the time series data and low-level labels indicating a plurality of low-level activities included in the high-level activity are output. The processor is configured to output a high-level label and a low-level label by using the machine learning model and cause the high-level label and the low-level label to be displayed, accept an input regarding a high-level label included in the time series data, train the machine learning model assuming that a high-level activity corresponding to the accepted high-level label is included in the time series data, and output a high-level label and a low-level label by using the trained machine learning model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Intelligent teaching management method and system
applicants: XIAMEN UULIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching management method and system, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a target teaching subject and a target teaching grade; establishing a target teaching resource library, wherein the target teaching resource library comprises teaching content resources and test question resources; obtaining a target teaching class hour, carrying out matching to obtain basic teaching contents, and generating basic teaching courseware; forming a basic knowledge point set; traversing to generate basic test questions; obtaining a target student, and obtaining a target test result; and analyzing and performing teaching management. The problems that in the prior art, a teacher subjectively formulates teaching courseware based on own teaching experience, so that the'teaching 'management effect in teaching management is poor, 'learning' management in teaching management cannot be performed in a targeted mode based on the learning condition of each student, and the teaching quality is affected are solved. Through intelligent teaching management, the technical effects of improving school teaching management efficiency, teaching management scientificity and reasonability and further improving teaching quality are achieved.

title: AI simulation teaching system based on graphical programming platform
abstract_text: According to the AI simulation teaching system based on the graphical programming platform provided by the embodiment of the invention, simulation combining an overall mode and a local mode is adopted, and the AI simulation teaching system is superior to an existing robot simulator which only carries out overall simulation, but is different from existing simulation of the same type. Simulation combining an overall mode and a local mode can provide visual overall display for primary and secondary school students, and meanwhile, visual simulation is adopted to display the working effect of local hardware, so that the students can more comprehensively know the influence on the robot when each piece of hardware of the robot works. The working state and data information displayed by simulation only meet the requirements of artificial intelligence education classes, namely, hardware facility interface information and data obtained by work are displayed, and information exchange between unnecessary fine data on the hardware working principle level and actual hardware is not displayed. Therefore, the problem that the simulation mode of the current hardware simulator is not suitable for artificial intelligence education classes can be solved.

title: AI education learning instrument for campus
