abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus AI education learning instrument, and particularly relates to the field of teaching instruments.The campus AI education learning instrument comprises a placing plate, a support is fixedly installed at the edge of the top of the placing plate, a transverse frame is fixedly installed on the side face of the support, a center column is fixedly installed at the end, away from the support, of the transverse frame, and a groove is formed in the top of the placing plate; and a photosensitive resistor is fixedly installed at the top of the placement plate and located in the groove, a sensing control assembly is arranged in the center column body, a corner assembly is arranged at the bottom of the sensing control assembly, and a light supplementing lamp is fixedly installed on the bottom face of the corner assembly. According to the AI education learning instrument for the campus, paper is placed on the placement plate, the placement position of the paper cannot completely cover the four photoresistors and block light rays of the photoresistors, it is indicated that the placement position of the paper is not in the center of the placement plate, the electric push rod changes the stretching and retracting states, the light rays are shielded through paper position deviation, and the position of the paper is judged.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching robot anti-collision early warning system and method
applicants: FUJIAN HUIZHOU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an anti-collision early warning system and method for an artificial intelligence teaching robot, relates to the technical field of robots, and solves the problem that when the artificial intelligence teaching robot encounters an obstacle, anti-collision early warning can be performed, and at the moment, a worker needs to decide whether to detour or not, which is relatively troublesome. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an advancing destination and a departure place of the artificial intelligence teaching robot; planning an advancing route of the artificial intelligence teaching robot according to the advancing destination and departure place of the artificial intelligence teaching robot; the artificial intelligence teaching robot is started to advance according to the planned advancing route; acquiring whether an obstacle exists on the planned advancing route or not; if the obstacle exists, the artificial intelligence teaching robot is controlled to bypass the obstacle and return to the planned advancing route until the artificial intelligence teaching robot reaches the destination, and the method has the following effect that the ability of the artificial intelligence teaching robot to judge whether the encountered obstacle bypasses or not is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence interaction terminal and system for improving classroom teaching efficiency
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence interaction terminal and system for improving classroom teaching efficiency, and relates to the field of intelligent classroom teaching, and the terminal comprises a teacher login unit, an information base verification unit, a teaching course verification unit, a student equipment receiving unit, a lecturer operation unit, an input unit, and an interaction unit. According to the system, courses prepared by teachers in advance are verified and modified through the teaching course verification unit, and meanwhile, the teachers supervise devices of students in real time through the lecturer supervision module and can analyze and process the lecture attending effect of the courses through the interaction unit and the wrong question input module; the teaching system has the advantages that the teaching quality and the learning mastering efficiency of the students are improved, the teaching state and the knowledge mastering degree of the students can be easily mastered in real time by teachers when the teaching system is used for teaching, and the difficulty of observing the learning dynamics of the students by the teachers is greatly reduced.

title: Intelligent experiment teaching platform based on embedded core MCU and AI chip
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent experiment teaching platform based on an embedded core MCU and an AI chip, which is characterized in that a hardware architecture arranged on an experiment board comprises a core MCU, a peripheral circuit, an expansion slot, a communication interface, an external memory and an experiment simulation component used for realizing onboard projects; wherein the peripheral circuit comprises a PICKit debugger interface, an onboard power supply, a crystal oscillator, a reset circuit and a code downloading circuit; the expansion slot comprises a MicroBUS slot and an Xpage Pro expansion slot; the expansion slot comprises a MicroBUS slot and an Xpage Pro expansion slot The communication interface comprises a USB interface, an RS232 interface and an infrared transceiver; the external memory is a Flash memory chip; the onboard project comprises an industrial simulation project and a man-machine interaction project; a teaching object completes an intelligent experiment project through software layer configuration and hardware layer deployment; the intelligent experiment items comprise an onboard item, an extended micro item and an AI image classification experiment.

title: Modularized magnetic AI robot
abstract_text: The utility model provides a modularized magnetic attraction AI robot which comprises a robot driving chassis module, a robot control module and a carrying induction module, the robot control module and the carrying induction module are provided with connecting magnet pieces, the robot driving chassis module is provided with connecting metal pieces, and the connecting metal pieces are connected with the connecting magnet pieces. The robot control module comprises a robot interaction display module, a robot power module and a robot driving control module. The carrying induction module comprises a robot induction module and a desktop type mechanical arm. The robot has the advantages that the problems that in the prior art, a robot is integrally in a fixed shape, cannot adapt to different teaching scenes and is low in flexibility can be effectively solved, by means of the structure, the connecting magnet pieces and the connecting metal pieces of all the modules are matched in a magnetic attraction mode, the robot is convenient to disassemble and assemble, and the teaching efficiency is improved. The forms can be switched according to different teaching scenes, the use flexibility is improved, and the use experience of a user is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence growth education robot
applicants: JIANGXI TIDECOL ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence growth education robot comprises a machine body assembly, a hardware module is arranged in the machine body assembly, a buckle plate is rotationally connected to the machine body assembly, and a child lock is arranged on the buckle plate. According to the growth education robot, by arranging the independent machine body assembly and the hardware module, the machine body assembly and the hardware module can be divided into two independent parts, so that when the hardware part of the growth education robot needs to be upgraded and updated, a user can directly take out the hardware module from the sleeve shell for replacement; therefore, hardware configuration of the robot is not eliminated according to science and technology development, practical requirements of users are met, children are prevented from feeling uncomfortable and even being injured, the growth teaching aid robot can accompany growth of children for a long time, growth and education of the children are intelligently assisted, and the development efficiency of the children is improved. In addition, emotional requirements of children can be met, the replacement mode is simple and convenient, and parents do not need to have relevant professional skills.

title: Online teaching system integrating artificial intelligence and virtual reality technology
applicants: ZHONGRUAN HANGKE DATA TECH ZHUHAI HENGQIN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online teaching system integrating artificial intelligence and virtual reality technologies, and relates to the technical field of virtual reality. An online teaching system integrating artificial intelligence and virtual reality technologies comprises a personal information management module used for managing and storing personal basic information of teachers, name information of courses needing teaching, course arrangement information and personal basic information of students in a database; and the artificial intelligence processing module is used for constructing a virtual character model of the teacher character based on the mapping relationship between the database and the virtual action library, obtaining corresponding scene elements through the teaching content in the database, synthesizing a virtual teaching scene based on the virtual character model and the scene elements, and sending the virtual teaching scene to the teaching library for storage. And the virtual reality module is used for selecting a virtual teaching scene of at least one course teaching by the teacher from the teaching library, preprocessing the virtual teaching scene, and determining a playing sequence of dynamically displaying all the virtual teaching scenes to the students.

title: LABELING SYSTEM, ACTIVITY RECOGNITION SYSTEM, AND TEACHING MATERIAL GENERATING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A label is attached to data corresponding to an activity included in time series data. A labeling system includes a processor and a machine learning model from which, in response to an input of time series data, a high-level label indicating a high-level activity included in the time series data and low-level labels indicating a plurality of low-level activities included in the high-level activity are outputted. The processor is configured to output a high-level label and a low-level label by using the machine learning model and cause the high-level label and the low-level label to be displayed, accept an input regarding a high-level label included in the time series data, train the machine learning model assuming that a high-level activity corresponding to the accepted high-level label is included in the time series data, and output a high-level label and a low-level label by using the trained machine learning model.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR APPROXIMATING NUMERICAL FEATURES VIA CUBIC SPLINES AND APPLICATIONS THEREOF
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for approximating a non-linear relationship between a numerical feature and an output of a model. A value of a numerical feature is received and is transformed, via a transform function, into a transformed value within a fixed range. With respect to each of a plurality of basis functions used for approximating the non-linear relationship, a respective basis function value of the basis function is computed based on the transformed value. An approximated value of the non-linear numeric feature is generated based on a sum of the plurality of basis function values weighted respectively by each corresponding one of a set of the weights, obtained via machine learning.

title: Suspended sound reinforcement array microphone
abstract_text: The utility model provides a suspension type sound reinforcement array microphone, which adopts an array microphone technology and an artificial intelligence voice algorithm, greatly reduces processing time delay and tone quality loss while continuously obtaining sound reinforcement gain and improving voice definition through the suspension type sound reinforcement array microphone, and obtains satisfactory low-delay and high-fidelity effects. The environment is kept clean, tidy and attractive due to suspension type installation, speech is freer due to long-distance pickup, debugging and maintenance workload is omitted due to intelligent processing, and the ceiling type installation is simple, attractive and suitable for normalized recording and broadcasting classrooms and interactive teaching, engineering deployment time is shortened, complex software debugging is not needed, installation and use are achieved, an adaptive algorithm is adopted, and adjustment is not needed. And the microphone can transmit audio through a USB (Universal Serial Bus) or is connected with the switching box through a standard shielding network cable to transmit the audio, so that sound amplification and interaction are supported.

title: Method for evaluating age based on trial watching video completion rate
applicants: WUYOU CHUANGXIANG WUHAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for evaluating age based on a trial-watching video completion rate, and relates to the technical field of trial-watching video completion rates of users and machine learning recognition. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring training sample data by constructing playing completion rates and corresponding ages of different videos; constructing a model; inputting training set data into the model for calculation training; adjusting and optimizing parameters according to an evaluation result; the optimized model is obtained and used for prediction; different from existing traditional educational administration methods that most of which evaluate the quality of teaching videos are subjective and passive investigation methods to objectively evaluate the quality of the videos, the method introduces a more scientific and more objective method to evaluate the quality of the videos, an evaluation model is established according to the age groups of users, the model is trained by utilizing a machine learning algorithm, and the evaluation efficiency is improved. And finally, a more objective and more efficient evaluation model is obtained, so that different videos can be better recommended corresponding to different age groups, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CONSTRUCTING CLASSROOM TEACHING BEHAVIOR EVENT DESCRIPTION MODEL
abstract_text: The present invention discloses a method and system for constructing a classroom teaching behavior event description model. The construction method comprises the following steps: acquiring classroom teaching video data to be trained; using a voice activity detection technology to divide the classroom teaching video data to be trained into multiple events according to an utterance of a teacher; and using multiple artificial intelligence technologies to perform multi-modal identification on all events, dividing the events into sub-events under multiple dimensions, and establishing, according to the sub-events, the event description model which describes various teaching behavior events of the teacher in the classroom. The present invention can ensure, to the greatest extent possible, the integrity of non-verbal behavior of the teacher in each event by dividing the classroom video according to the voice; and construct the description model that can uniformly describe all events by extracting the commonality between different events. The invention can not only describe the various teaching behavior of the teacher, but also reflect the association between events such that events are not isolated.

title: Device for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The invention provides a device for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a blackboard frame assembly, a dust collection assembly, a linkage erasing assembly and a linkage synergistic assembly, and is characterized in that a blackboard of which the surface is uniformly provided with a plurality of groups of reference through holes is fixedly connected in a bottom frame, so that on one hand, the reference through holes can be used as scales for writing on the blackboard; the reference through hole is connected with the negative pressure fan at the rear end and the dust collecting box, and dust generated in the blackboard writing erasing process can be adsorbed; meanwhile, the erasing shell capable of automatically reciprocating and the fixed erasing block are in transmission connection with the pneumatic fan wheel located in the negative pressure connecting cover through the transmission mechanism, reciprocating motion of the fixed erasing block can be achieved through rotation power generated by negative pressure on the pneumatic fan wheel, writing on a blackboard can be automatically erased through the negative pressure, and synchronous and automatic erasing can be achieved. Dust is adsorbed into the dust collecting box; more further, through the linkage synergistic assembly in transmission connection with the linkage erasing assembly, the erasing efficiency of the blackboard writing can be improved, and the intelligent blackboard eraser has the advantages of being intelligent and automatic.

title: QUALITY AWARE MACHINE TEACHING FOR AUTONOMOUS PLATFORMS
abstract_text: The techniques disclosed herein enable systems to enhance autonomous process control platforms using a quality aware machine learning agent. To achieve this, a machine learning agent is integrated into a process control system. The machine learning agent extracts a set of states from an environment containing the process and defines a set of corresponding quality states which are then extracted from the environment as well. Based on the set of states and quality states, the machine learning agent determines a set of actions that modify operating parameters of the process. Applying the actions results in an updated set of states and quality states which can be analyzed to compute an optimality score, quantifying the effectiveness of the actions. Based on the updated states and quality states, the machine learning agent determines a modified set of actions to apply to the environment and increase the optimality score.

title: Tissue Load Sensor with Reduced Calibration Requirements
abstract_text: Measurement of an induced shear wave in tensioned tissue of a given individual is provided to a machine learning system trained to determine absolute load from shear wave signal data. The machine learning system uses a teaching set linking shear wave signal data to absolute load, however, does not require normal calibration data based on measured loads allowing reduced or no calibration for absolute load determinations.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND CLASSIFICATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD
abstract_text: To construct a classification model capable of accurately extracting a cell region in an image from any of two types of bright field images having different contrast states.SOLUTION: An image processing method includes the steps of: obtaining a ground truth image teaching a cell region occupied by a cell in an original image for each of a plurality of original images obtained by bright-field imaging of the cell; generating a reverse image by reversing luminance of the original image at least for the cell region based on each original image; constructing a classification model by performing machine learning using a set of the original image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image and a set of the reverse image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image as a basis of the reverse image, respectively, as training data; and inputting a bright-field image of two-dimensionally cultured cells, as a test image, to the classification model, and acquiring an output image thereof.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR LEARNING SCENE EMBEDDINGS VIA VISUAL SEMANTICS AND APPLICATION THEREOF
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, and programming for responding to an image related query. Information related to each of a plurality of images is received, wherein the information represents concepts co-existing in the image. Visual semantics for each of the plurality of images are created based on the information related thereto. Representations of scenes of the plurality of images are obtained via machine learning, based on the visual semantics of the plurality of images, wherein the representations capture concepts associated with the scenes.

title: Traditional Chinese medicine shape feature database construction method, database and identification system
applicants: INST CHINESE MATERIA MEDICA CHINA ACADEMY OF CMS
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of traditional Chinese medicine quality identification, and particularly relates to a traditional Chinese medicine shape feature database construction method, a database and an identification system.The traditional Chinese medicine shape feature database construction method comprises the following steps that traditional Chinese medicine standard sample images of various traditional Chinese medicines are collected and stored; shape features in the traditional Chinese medicine standard sample image of any traditional Chinese medicine are positioned, measured and calibrated, and all shape recognition feature points are demonstrated; performing deep learning on each shape recognition feature point for teaching; and processing the traditional Chinese medicine standard sample images of all traditional Chinese medicines to obtain a traditional Chinese medicine shape feature database. The traditional Chinese medicine shape feature database construction method is intelligent and standardized innovation in traditional Chinese medicine form identification, and solves the problems that traditional Chinese medicine identification depends on a manual identification mode so far, no unified standard exists, the speed is low, the efficiency is low, the accuracy rate is low, and the quality of traditional Chinese medicine cannot be effectively maintained and improved.

title: Student course score analysis and management method and system based on smart campus
applicants: SHENZHEN FANGYUANBAO INFORMATION TECH SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a student course score analysis and management method and system based on a smart campus, which are used for analyzing learning habits of students and improving the generation accuracy of a personalized teaching guidance scheme. The method comprises the steps of performing course composition analysis on course associated information to obtain a course composition factor, performing borrowing behavior feature extraction on library associated information to obtain a borrowing behavior factor, and generating a learning behavior evaluation factor according to the course composition factor and the borrowing behavior factor; personal interest feature extraction is carried out on the personal interest information to obtain personal interest influence factors; inputting the learning behavior evaluation factor and the personal interest influence factor into a learning habit analysis model for learning habit analysis to obtain a learning habit analysis result; and constructing an association relationship between the course score data and the learning habit analysis result, generating a relationship report, and generating a personalized teaching guidance scheme according to the relationship report.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: DATA CREATION DEVICE, STORAGE DEVICE, DATA PROCESSING SYSTEM, DATA CREATION METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: The present invention utilizes information included in supplemental information recorded in image data to appropriately select image data for use in creating teaching data, from a plurality of image data.　One embodiment of the present invention is a data creation device for creating teaching data for use in machine learning from image data in which supplemental information is recorded, said data creation device being configured so as to execute: a setting process in which a given setting condition pertaining to first information, pertaining to machine learning and included in the image data supplemental information, or second information, pertaining to the creator of the image data, or the creator of the supplemental information, or the holder of the rights to the image data, is set with respect to a plurality of image data in which the supplemental information that includes the first information or the second information is recorded; and a creation process, in which teaching data is created on the basis of the selected image data in which the first information or the second information satisfying the setting condition is recorded.

title: System, program, and method for discriminating hypermutant cancer
abstract_text: Provided are a system, a program, and a method for discriminating hypermutant cancer. Provided are a method, a program, and a method for discriminating hypermutant cancer with higher accuracy than in the prior art. According to the present invention, provided is a system for discriminating hypermutant cancer, which is characterized by being provided with an input unit that is configured so as to be able to input a plurality of first image data, a plurality of second image data, and a plurality of third image data, a holding unit that is configured so as to hold the plurality of first image data, the plurality of second image data, and the plurality of third image data, a machine learning execution unit that executes machine learning, and a discrimination unit that discriminates the plurality of second image data. The holding unit is configured to hold first image data and second image data, the machine learning execution unit is configured to be able to generate a discrimination model for discriminating whether or not the cancer is a hypermutant cancer using the first image data and the second image data held by the holding unit as teaching data, and the discrimination unit is configured to be able to input third image data to the discrimination model, and to determine whether or not the cancer is a hypermutant cancer. And determines whether or not the third image data is a hypermutant cancer.

title: System, program, and method for discriminating hypermutant cancer
abstract_text: Provided are a system, a program, and a method for discriminating hypermutant cancer. Provided are a method, a program, and a method for discriminating hypermutant cancer with higher accuracy than in the prior art. According to the present invention, provided is a system for discriminating hypermutant cancer, which is characterized by being provided with an input unit that is configured so as to be able to input a plurality of first image data, a plurality of second image data, and a plurality of third image data, a holding unit that is configured so as to hold the plurality of first image data, the plurality of second image data, and the plurality of third image data, a machine learning execution unit that executes machine learning, and a discrimination unit that discriminates the plurality of second image data. The holding unit is configured to hold first image data and second image data, the machine learning execution unit is configured to be able to generate a discrimination model for discriminating whether or not the cancer is a hypermutant cancer using the first image data and the second image data held by the holding unit as teaching data, and the discrimination unit is configured to be able to input third image data to the discrimination model, and to determine whether or not the cancer is a hypermutant cancer. And determines whether or not the third image data is a hypermutant cancer.

title: Unmanned vehicle intelligent tracking control method, system, equipment and medium
applicants: PEOPLE'S LIBERATION ARMY NATIONAL UNIVERSITY OF DEFENSE TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: The invention relates to an unmanned vehicle intelligent tracking control method, system and device and a medium. The method comprises the steps that trajectory data of expert teaching tracking are collected; inputting the trajectory data into a deep neural network for deep learning to obtain an initial strategy of expert teaching tracking; according to the initial strategy, utilizing an apprentice learning method to carry out promotion learning to obtain an optimal strategy; and performing tracking control on the unmanned vehicle by using the optimal strategy. Through combination of an artificial intelligence machine learning method and an apprentice learning method, after a human-like initial strategy is obtained from expert data through deep learning, apprentice learning is carried out to complete a reconstruction process of a reward function; and an optimal strategy closer to expert teaching tracking (strategy) is obtained through reinforcement learning and is used for intelligent tracking control of the unmanned vehicle. The driving stability, vehicle distance control, obstacle crossing and other aspects of unmanned vehicle tracking driving are remarkably improved, and the purpose of greatly improving the tracking driving performance is achieved.

title: Campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of education. The invention discloses a campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence, and the platform comprises a resource database module which is used for building a campus education resource database through the collection of teaching materials of a teaching question bank, a teaching database, informatization big data analysis data, a student microscopic data warehouse, a teacher microscopic data warehouse, and a network platform; the student management module is used for carrying out advanced collection on student learning behavior data, carrying out buried point collection on identification equipment and supervision equipment through a behavior data collection center, carrying out multi-dimensional collection on student related information by taking a human body as a center, and carrying out multi-dimensional collection on school related information of the student and other resource information of the student by taking a school as a center; the campus teaching quality level is analyzed, and intelligent decision support is provided for campus education of artificial intelligence. Integration, unified management and efficient operation and maintenance service of all application platforms can be achieved, and the problem of information islands is solved.

title: Central control system and method for smart classroom
applicants: SHENZHEN HANJIN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a central control system and method for a smart classroom. The system comprises a smart platform, a server, a smart desk, an Internet of Things server, Internet of Things terminal equipment, a recording and broadcasting host, a camera, an AI loudspeaker box, a teaching computer all-in-one machine and a group computer all-in-one machine. The method comprises the following steps: a teacher and students simultaneously carry out card swiping authentication; the smart desks passing the student authentication are controlled by the teacher computer host, and finally, the teacher computer host controls all devices in the smart classroom. The beneficial effects of the system are that the system enables various high-tech devices to be connected together, provides dominant control for teachers in a centralized manner, and better assists the teachers in teaching; meanwhile, an efficient control method is invented, and the teaching efficiency of teachers is improved.

title: Video quality evaluation method and device based on emotion recognition and machine learning
applicants: WUYOU CHUANGXIANG WUHAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video quality evaluation method and device based on emotion recognition and machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: constructing an emotion recognition module, collecting and preprocessing training sample data, and building a video quality evaluation model, the training sample data comprising an emotion value generated when a user watches a video and a user evaluation value; segmenting the training sample data into a training data set and a test data set, and inputting the training data set and the test data set into the video quality evaluation model for evaluation to form an evaluation result; adjusting and optimizing parameters of the video quality evaluation model according to an evaluation result, and evaluating the video quality by using the adjusted and optimized video quality evaluation model; the video quality can be accurately evaluated, so that the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND CLASSIFICATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD
abstract_text: An image processing method according to the invention includes obtaining a ground truth image teaching a cell region occupied by a cell in an original image for each of a plurality of the original images obtained by bright-field imaging of the cell, generating a reverse image by reversing luminance of the original image at least for the cell region based on each original image, and constructing a classification model by performing machine learning using a set of the original image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image and a set of the reverse image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image as a basis of the reverse image respectively as training data.

title: Classroom teaching system, device and method based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom teaching system, equipment and method based on an artificial intelligence technology, and relates to the technical field of intelligent classroom teaching, the classroom teaching system comprises a touch control unit and a central control processing unit, the output end of the central control processing unit is connected with an intelligent mirror image unit, the central control processing unit comprises a storage mechanism, a screen adjusting mechanism and a pull-down mechanism, the storage mechanism comprises a box body, a plurality of fixing frames are fixed to the periphery of the box body, first sliding grooves are formed in the inner wall of the top and the inner wall of the bottom of the box body, two sets of folding doors are arranged in the first sliding grooves in a sleeved mode, and the storage mechanism protects an internal screen in the class after the class, so that the damage condition is avoided; the screen adjusting mechanism comprises a first supporting plate arranged in the box body in a sleeved mode. According to the invention, students in different directions can learn and watch, vision decline and score decline caused by daylight can be reduced, teachers with different heights can use the display screen, the utilization rate of the upper half part of the screen is improved, and students behind the display screen can learn more conveniently.

title: Garbage type AI recognition voice broadcast science popularization device applied to intelligent garbage can
applicants: XIAMEN MOKE CREATIVE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a garbage category AI identification voice broadcast science popularization device applied to an intelligent garbage can, and relates to the technical field of garbage classification, the garbage category AI identification voice broadcast science popularization device comprises a placing platform, an identification frame and a main control box, a pneumatic cylinder is arranged at the bottom in the identification frame, a connecting frame is arranged at the output end of the pneumatic cylinder, and a movable groove is formed in the front side of the identification frame; the front side of the connecting frame extends out of the movable groove, a mounting column is arranged on the front side of the connecting frame, and an AI camera is arranged below the mounting column; garbage is recognized through the AI camera, the host of the control terminal processes recognized data based on garbage type recognition programs, judges garbage types and sends messages to the main controller, the voice broadcaster broadcasts the garbage types in a voice mode according to the messages received by the main controller, and at the moment, people can throw garbage according to voice reminding. And the garbage can also be used as a teenager science and technology education teaching aid.

title: AI computing server device based on teaching
applicants: GUANGDONG XIAOCUINIAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching-based AI computing server device, which comprises a micro case, a server mainboard and an AI computing board card, the micro case is arranged at the left upper corner of the device, the server mainboard is arranged at the lower end of the micro case, an image processing board card is arranged on the server mainboard, the AI computing board card is arranged at the right end of the micro case, a PCIE patch cord is arranged at the lower end of the AI computing board card, and the image processing board card is arranged on the image processing board card. A heat dissipation device is arranged at the middle end of the device, a fan is arranged on the heat dissipation device, a hard disk array is arranged at the right end of the heat dissipation device, heat dissipation device supports are arranged at the upper end and the lower end of the heat dissipation device, one end of a power module is fixed to an air inlet of the miniature case, and an air outlet in the other end of the power module faces the heat dissipation device. The side part of each AI computing board card is fixed with the side wall of the server mainboard; the AI computing server device based on teaching has the advantages that the heat dissipation effect is good, downtime is avoided, and the transmission rate is high.

title: AI-based teaching perception equipment
applicants: GUANGDONG XIAOCUINIAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses AI-based teaching perception equipment, which comprises a camera signal video unit, a DSP (Digital Signal Processor) processing unit, a camera judgment unit, a visual data storage unit, a visual data processing unit, an infrared detection unit, a visual field detection unit, an image information processing unit and an image feature calculation unit, a camera judgment unit is arranged below the DSP processing unit, an image information processing unit is arranged on the right side of the camera judgment unit, an image feature calculation unit is arranged on the right side of the image information processing unit, a visual data storage unit is arranged below the camera judgment unit, and a visual data processing unit is arranged below the visual data storage unit. Infrared detection and visual field detection are arranged in the camera judgment unit, and the camera judgment unit is used for identifying portrait type information loaded by a camera system function; the AI-based teaching perception equipment has the advantages of being more mature, more stable and more efficient.

title: Construction method of AI teaching practical training programming platform based on Web page
applicants: JIANGSU HONGCHENG BIG DATA TECH AND APPLICATION RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a construction method of an AI teaching practical training programming platform based on a Web page. The method comprises the following steps: (1) constructing an underlying cloud native environment which comprises a Kubernetes cluster, a Ceph storage layer, Harbor mirror image management and Nacos service discovery; (2) a rear end adopts a micro-service technology, is deployed on a Kubernetes cluster in a Pod form and is registered on Nacos, and service discovery and access are carried out through a unified gateway entry; (3) the front end also adopts the micro-service technology, and unified entry access is realized through an Nginx proxy; and (4) establishing a database for storing information related to the platform, such as users and resources of the platform. According to the invention, the user can conveniently, quickly and efficiently learn and apply the artificial intelligence technology. A series of problems of non-uniform individual development and construction environments of users, inconvenience in multi-person teaching, low user management efficiency and the like are solved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM
abstract_text: An information processing method that generates an identification algorithm for identifying types of waste material, said information processing method including: a step for generating a first model, which is an identification algorithm for the types of waste material, by carrying out machine learning for first image data obtained by imaging interiors of garbage pits of a plurality of facilities in which the waste material is stored, and first teaching data in which the types of waste material in the image have been labeled; and a step for generating a second model, which is an identification algorithm corresponding to the waste material in a second facility different from the plurality of facilities, by additionally learning second image data obtained by imaging the interior of the garbage pit of the second facility, and second teaching data in which the types of waste material in the image have been labeled.

title: Localized self-learning tutoring management system and method based on neural network
applicants: SHANGHAI SONGSHU KETANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence education, and particularly discloses a neural network-based localized self-learning tutoring management system, which comprises a user side and a server side, the user side is used for collecting label information of a user and allowing the user to learn teaching content; the server is used for pushing teaching content to the user according to the label information of the user; the label information of the user comprises an intelligence dimension label K2, a learning time dimension label K3 and an environment dimension label K4. According to the invention, the teaching content corresponding to the textbook suitable for the user can be screened for the user.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: Full-smear digital scanning artificial intelligence cell morphology intelligent learning platform
applicants: UNION HOSPITAL TONGJI MEDICAL COLLEGE HUAZHONG UNIV SCI & TECH
abstract_text: The invention discloses a full-smear digital scanning artificial intelligence cell morphology intelligent learning platform, which comprises a storage module, a learning module, a training module and a consultation module, and is characterized in that the learning module is set for learning of a beginner in an'entry 'stage, and the training module is set for learning of a student in an'improvement' stage; the examination module is used for students to practice and identify cells in smears in a closed-rolling mode and propose diagnosis suggestions, the consultation module provides a channel for the students to upload cases, and the students can upload all-digital scanning specimen slices made by themselves to the platform for consultation. The artificial intelligence system of the platform can help trainees to identify cells, write reports and provide diagnosis suggestions, or online experts of the expert system of the platform assist in completing identification of difficult cells and diagnosis of consultation cases, and the problem that in the teaching and learning process of cell morphology of medical workers at present, the learning efficiency is greatly improved is solved. And the learning and teaching modes are relatively single due to the restriction of time, space and teaching resources.

title: Raspberry Pi expansion board for artificial intelligence education
abstract_text: The embodiment of the utility model provides a Raspberry Pi expansion board for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a Raspberry Pi expansion board and a Raspberry Pi microcomputer, the expansion board comprises a power supply protection circuit, a voltage stabilizing circuit, a PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) circuit, an audio power amplifier circuit, a serial port communication circuit, an IIC (Inter-Integrated Circuit) communication interface, an SPI (Serial Peripheral Interface) communication interface, a USB (Universal Serial Bus) power supply interface, a 4Pin line sequence unified XH2.54 ultrasonic sensor interface, a 3Pin line sequence unified XH2.54 universal sensor interface and a PWM interface; a user can use the Raspberry Pi code to generate PWM to drive common peripherals such as a steering engine, an ultrasonic sensor and an infrared sensor, students can practice manually under the guidance of teachers, the artificial intelligence technology is experienced through the artificial intelligence teaching aid, initial perception of artificial intelligence is formed, and initial experience of artificial intelligence is achieved.

title: MACHINE LEARNING MODEL DETERMINATION SYSTEM AND MACHINE LEARNING MODEL DETERMINATION METHOD
abstract_text: Provided is a machine learning model determination system including: at least one server and at least one client terminal; an evaluation information database which stores evaluation information being information on an evaluation of machine learning; an evaluation information update module which updates the evaluation information based on a specific value of a parameter and an evaluation of the machine learning through use of specific teaching data; a teaching data input module; a verification data input module; a parameter determination module which determines the specific value of the parameter based on the evaluation information; and a machine learning engine which includes a learning module which executes learning for a machine learning model through use of the specific teaching data, and an evaluation module which evaluates a result of the machine learning through use of the specific verification data.

title: AI intelligent teaching robot control system and method
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI intelligent teaching robot control system and method, and the system comprises a first obtaining module which is used for obtaining the conditions of students in a classroom; the first determination module is used for determining teaching content based on the student condition; the second acquisition module is used for acquiring the position distribution of the students in the classroom; the second determination module is used for determining a teaching position based on the position distribution; and the control module is used for controlling the intelligent teaching robot to go to the teaching position to teach students according to the teaching content. According to the AI intelligent teaching robot control system and method, the appropriate teaching position is determined based on the position distribution of the students in the classroom, the intelligent teaching robot simulates a teacher to adjust the teaching position according to the position distribution of the students, the students do not need to adjust the position, convenience is improved, in addition, the appropriate teaching content is determined according to the conditions of the students, and the teaching efficiency is improved. The intelligent teaching robot is controlled to carry out teaching according to the teaching content, and the teaching effect is prevented from being affected.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching device based on an artificial intelligence technology, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence technology teaching. Comprising an adjusting block, a spherical groove is formed in the surface of one side of the adjusting block, a ball head rod is arranged in the spherical groove, a displayer is fixedly connected to one end of the ball head rod, first cavities are formed in the upper side and the lower side of the inner wall of the spherical groove correspondingly, and a supporting groove body is fixedly connected to the lower surface of the adjusting block; the teaching aid can be adjusted according to teaching needs, a beginner can better learn knowledge, the teaching aid is simple in structure and convenient to operate, the adaptation effect of the teaching aid is improved, the display surface can be cleaned in the using process, the display effect of the teaching aid is guaranteed, and the teaching aid is convenient to use. The use quality of equipment is ensured, and the equipment teaching effect is improved.

title: Big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of big data artificial intelligence teaching, and discloses a big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform, which comprises a table plate, a bottom shell is bolted to the bottom of the table plate, a back plate is hinged to the interior of the table plate, a display is bolted to the bottom of the back plate, and supporting rods are hinged to two sides of the bottom of the back plate; the back plate is pulled through cooperation of the first groove and the second groove, the back plate drives the displayer to be vertically placed, then the supporting rod is pulled to be clamped on the back face of the limiting block, the displayer and the back plate can be effectively limited, and therefore a user can conveniently hide and store the displayer; according to the invention, the table plate is pulled, then the table plate slides in the sleeve, and then the limiting bolts are screwed, so that the limiting bolts limit and fix the supporting legs through the cooperation of the limiting sleeves, and therefore, a user can effectively and conveniently adjust the height of the device.

title: Rope skipping training system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of sports equipment, and particularly relates to a rope skipping training system and method based on artificial intelligence, the rope skipping training system comprises a rope skipping counting system, the rope skipping counting system comprises a violation detection module, the training system further comprises a mobile training device, and the violation detection module is used for detecting the rope skipping state of a user in the training system; when it is detected that the rope skipping state is a violation action, a data correction message is sent to the mobile training device, and the mobile training device conducts violation adjustment on the current rope skipping state of the user based on the data correction message; and when the violation state is not detected, the mobile training device adjusts the rope skipping state of the current user into a training mode to realize rope skipping training. Students who do not jump ropes can be trained from zero basis, training including hand and foot coordination training, wrist rope throwing training, jumping height training and jumping posture training can be started, and compared with manual teaching and rope skipping training, the rope skipping training device is more comprehensive in type, progressive in training, high in efficiency and obvious in learning effect.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system, and the system comprises an interactive teaching module which is used for achieving interactive teaching in a mode that teaching video playing carries a dynamic dialogue, and achieving the real-time tracking of a learning progress; an artificial intelligence algorithm model is arranged in the information processing module, and the pushed training test questions are determined according to the learning state of the student; the learning obstacle point detection module calls corresponding learning condition detection test questions and a learning obstacle point detection model to realize detection of learning obstacle points of the user, and the learning obstacle points of the user are obtained; a learning material configuration module; and a learning task generation module. According to the artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system, the learning contents of students can be determined according to information such as learning states of the students, and corresponding learning resources are configured for each user according to different learning obstacle points; and the situation of knowledge point omission caused by conditions such as small errors in the learning process is well avoided, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: Education resource processing method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to voice recognition in the field of artificial intelligence, and provides an educational resource processing method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining teaching video data sent by camera equipment and identification information of the camera equipment, determining class hour numbers corresponding to the teaching video data based on the identification information of the camera equipment, generating teaching supervision parameters according to the teaching video data and the class hour numbers, and obtaining teaching supervision information according to the teaching supervision parameters. The teaching supervision parameters comprise class hour number supervision parameters, teaching teacher supervision parameters, teaching content supervision parameters and student sign-in parameters. By adopting the method, off-line teaching supervision is combined with one-class one-elimination, a supervision closed loop is realized, students do not need to manually confirm class elimination, supervisors do not need to go to the scene for verification, and the processing efficiency of educational resources is improved.

title: Building block part for teaching
applicants: SHENZHEN HUAYI INTELLIGENT MANUFACTURING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The system is suitable for the technical fields of artificial intelligence, robots and electronic teaching equipment. The utility model discloses a building block part for teaching. The building block part comprises a U-shaped beam 1, a single-hole right-angle beam 2, a photoelectric switch support 3, a double-hole L-shaped beam 4 and a multifunctional connecting piece 5. The robot has the advantages that the U-shaped beam, the single-hole right-angle beam, the photoelectric switch support, the double-hole L-shaped beam and the multifunctional connecting piece are arranged, the robot can be conveniently spliced with building blocks, screws and electronic modules to form the robot or device, and the robot or device is used for educating students to make electronic products; the part is convenient to splice and disassemble and can be recycled; the structure is simple, operation is easy, and production is easy.

title: VR teaching interaction system based on AI
applicants: SHENZHEN FUTURE 3D EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a VR teaching interaction system based on AI. The VR teaching interaction system comprises Bluetooth VR glasses, VR equipment and a Bluetooth signal processing unit. The Bluetooth VR glasses comprise a first MCU, a posture detection unit, a voice unit and a first Bluetooth unit; the posture detection unit, the voice unit and the first Bluetooth unit are connected with the first MCU; the posture detection unit is used for detecting a user head movement track and generating a visual angle interaction instruction; the voice unit is used for acquiring a user voice signal and generating a voice interaction instruction; the first MCU is used for processing the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction and then transmitting the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction to the VR equipment through the first Bluetooth unit and the Bluetooth signal processing unit; and the VR equipment is used for playing 3D content corresponding to the visual angle or the voice content to the Bluetooth VR glasses after receiving the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction. According to the utility model, the problems that hands are occupied, more body languages and auxiliary teaching aids cannot be used and the VR teaching effect is poor in the existing VR teaching are solved.

title: SLEEPING STATE ESTIMATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: [Subject] To deliver a sleep state prediction system capable of predicting a sleep state including multiple sleep depths.[Solution] A sleep state prediction system includes a phase coherence acquisition device that acquires phase coherence calculated based on a difference in instantaneous phase between a variation in heartbeat interval obtained from an animal during sleep and a breathing pattern; a body movement information acquisition device that acquires body movement information, a heartbeat information acquisition device that acquires heartbeat information from the animal simultaneously with the variation, or a respiratory information acquisition device that acquires respiratory information; and a sleep state prediction device that has a sleep state prediction model built-in, which is established through machine learning using sleep stages assessed by polysomnography on the animal as teaching data and at least 2 sets of simultaneously acquired data on phase coherence, body movement, heartbeat, and respiration as input data. The system inputs at least 2 data sets in the sleep state prediction model to predict a sleep state of the animal.

title: BUSINESS STRATEGY EVALUATION DEVICE AND BUSINESS STRATEGY EVALUATION PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are a business strategy evaluation device and a business strategy evaluation program through which a strategy planner can rapidly plan a high-quality strategy and which can increase the determination accuracy regarding whether a strategy plan adoption determiner adopts the execution of a strategic plan.　The business strategy evaluation device comprises: an evaluation execution unit which inputs input parameters pertaining to a business strategy to be evaluated to a trained model, which is obtained by machine-learning by taking, as teaching data, a data set including the input parameters that are explanatory variables pertaining to the success or failure of a plurality of business strategies, and objective variables that indicate success possibilities of the business strategies, and obtains the evaluation result including an evaluation value that indicates a success possibility of the business strategy; and an evaluation result presentation unit which presents the evaluation result obtained by the evaluation execution unit to a user.

title: Teaching observation video information extraction system based on edge calculation and AI analysis
applicants: GUANGDONG XIAOCUINIAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching observation video information extraction system based on edge calculation and AI analysis, and the system comprises the steps: recognizing a target from a recorded video, recognizing a preset target from the recorded video, obtaining attribute characteristics, transmitting the obtained preset target characteristics to an analysis center, and carrying out the video sorting and classification. A preset target is identified from the recorded video under the identification target in the recorded video, an attribute characteristic is acquired under the identification preset target in the recorded video, an acquired preset target characteristic is acquired under the attribute characteristic, and the acquired preset target characteristic is transmitted to an analysis center on the right side; the right side of the analysis center is provided with a camera and a recorder which are used for sorting and classifying videos, identifying targets from recorded videos and applying the targets to a video network; the teaching observation video information extraction system based on edge calculation and AI analysis has the advantages of convenience, rapidness, high efficiency and cost saving.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: Deep learning intelligent robot
abstract_text: The deep learning intelligent robot comprises a remote control trolley, and the lower surfaces of the left side and the right side of the remote control trolley are fixedly connected with protection baffles used for protection work. Through mutual cooperation of a robot clamping jaw, an image recognition camera, an ultrasonic ranging sensor, a roller, a protection box body, a wireless receiving/transmitting antenna, a motor, an intelligent controller and a storage battery, a user can carry out wireless remote control work conveniently, and the intelligent robot can learn ultrasonic obstacle avoidance, obstacle recognition, path planning driving and obstacle cleaning; therefore, the intelligent robot can be conveniently suitable for different spaces, so that the intelligent robot can be better put into application, and teaching work can be better carried out. And through a hollow elastic plate, a telescopic spring, an X-shaped elastic supporting block and a silica gel pad in the protection baffle, protection work and damping work can be better carried out, so that the damage rate of the protection box body can be reduced, and damping protection work can be carried out on electrical equipment in the protection box body.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and comprises a teaching product device body, a display screen is arranged on one side of the teaching product device body, and two loudspeakers which are symmetrically distributed are further arranged on one side of the teaching product device body. And a camera is arranged on one side of the teaching product device body. A rotating shaft rod is rotated, so that two second rotating wheels can be driven to rotate, a transmission belt can be driven to start transmission, the transmission belt can drive a fixing plate to move along the transmission belt, at the moment, the fixing plate can drive cleaning cotton to clean the display screen, and the rotating shaft rod is rotated reversely after use; in this way, the fixing plates can be driven to move to the position before use, the cleaning cotton continues to clean the display screen while the fixing plates move, the fixing plates are evenly arranged and cover the display screen, other objects can be prevented from impacting the display screen, the display screen is protected, and therefore the effect of conveniently cleaning the display screen is achieved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM OF AUTO TEACHING FOR A TRANSFER ROBOT AND SYSTEM
abstract_text: An auto-teaching method and auto-teaching system of a transfer robot are disclosed, wherein it is possible to implement full automation by artificial intelligence teaching, achieve unmanned production line accordingly, and omit the process of aligning a cassette on a port, thereby preventing damage to a substrate during the alignment process. The auto-teaching method by an auto-teaching system equipped with a port on which a cassette loaded with a plurality of substrates is placed and with a transfer robot that moves a substrate loaded on the cassette while moving between the ports comprises the steps of: obtaining an absolute position of the port; obtaining a position of the cassette relative to the port; and using the absolute position of the port and the relative position of the cassette to the port to calculate an absolute position of the cassette.

title: DETERMINATION SYSTEM AND DETERMINATION METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a technique in which a work quality is determined to be good or bad using a machine learning model that is applicable to even different types of workpieces.SOLUTION: A determination system comprises: a detection unit for detecting work-state information about a production facility; a first machine learning model in which a quality determination of a work result is made by inputting images of the work result of the production facility; and a second machine learning model in which learning is performed using teaching data in such a way that the work-state information about the production facility is denoted as good-labeled teaching data when the first machine learning model determines it to be good, and that the work-state information about the production facility is denoted as bad-labeled teaching data when the first machine learning model determines it to be bad.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Novel intelligent curtain plate for artificial intelligence education
applicants: SHANDONG YUANZHI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel intelligent curtain plate for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a curtain and an adjusting part for adjusting the length of the curtain, the adjusting part comprises two supporting rods arranged on one side of the curtain, a concentric-square-shaped hole formed in the supporting rods, an adjusting hole formed in one side of the concentric-square-shaped hole, a plurality of arc-shaped grooves formed in the other side of the concentric-square-shaped hole, a plurality of cylindrical rods arranged in the arc-shaped grooves, hinge rods arranged on one sides of the cylindrical rods, hinge blocks arranged at one ends of the hinge rods, and first connecting rods arranged on one sides of the hinge blocks. The intelligent curtain plate for artificial intelligence education comprises a support rod, a first connecting rod arranged on one side of the support rod, a connecting rod arranged on one side of the support rod, an adjusting pipe arranged on one side of the connecting rod, a second connecting rod arranged at one end of the adjusting pipe and a winding part used for winding a curtain, and the curtain, the support rod, a concentric-square-shaped hole, an adjusting hole, an arc-shaped groove, a cylindrical rod, a hinge rod, a hinge block, the first connecting rod, the adjusting pipe and the second connecting rod are arranged. Teaching can only be carried out at the same place, the size of the curtain cannot be adjusted, and carrying is inconvenient.

title: Teaching scene video capture and analysis system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI FENGSHI INTELLIGENT ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching scene video capture and analysis system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of campus equipment. The device comprises a guide rail, a supporting frame is horizontally and slidably connected to the guide rail, a second motor is fixedly connected to the top of the end, away from the guide rail, of the supporting frame, the rotating end of the second motor is fixedly connected with the top of a monitor through a rotating shaft, and an arc-shaped support is fixedly connected to the bottom of the supporting frame. And the arc-shaped bracket is magnetically connected with a cleaning piece. The first motor is driven to drive the supporting frame to move up and down along the guide rail, the monitor can be driven to move up and down along the guide rail, the position height of the monitor is adjusted, and use is more flexible; and dust on the surface of the monitoring instrument can be cleaned through a cleaning cotton strip on the cleaning piece, so that the monitoring instrument can better capture a teaching scene view screen.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AI-BASED TASK MANAGEMENT
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for task management. When information related to at least one task to be carried out by a user is received, multiple features associated with each of the at least one task are predicted automatically based on a plurality prediction models, derived based on historic information related to the user in carrying out past tasks. The at least one task is then automatically scheduled in a calendar associated with the user based on the multiple features predicted for each of the at least one task to generate an updated calendar with the at least one task scheduled therein.

title: AI teaching robot
abstract_text: An AI teaching robot has the functions of intelligent voice conversation, face recognition, an external link port, an intelligent enterprise steward and the like, assists individuals to continuously increase occupational skills after entering an enterprise, realizes personal values of the individuals, selects portraits of each type of employees with excellent work, and enables each person to realize own values in the system. According to the invention, the software core system is used for helping everyone to improve vocational skills, and in the related technology, the method focuses on helping individuals to improve vocational cultivation, and in the aspect of employment, high-quality units can be recommended for the individuals according to credit scores of the individuals in the system; in the aspect of entrepreneurship, the system can help the entrepreneurship to find proper talents and proper enterprises. The technical problem to be solved is that a teaching system at the present stage is not combined with AI, intelligent teaching cannot be achieved, and the vocational skills of people can be improved constantly.

title: Block chain-based remote education training system and application device
applicants: HENAN LILIANG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a remote education training system based on a block chain and an application device, and belongs to the field of remote education training, through setting a block server and an AI processing module, the block chain has two core characteristics: one is that data is difficult to tamper and the other is decentralization, based on the two characteristics, information recorded by the block chain is more real and reliable, and the system is more convenient to use. The problem that people do not trust each other can be solved, the input module, the sound collection module and the graph collection module collect current data of a user and transmit the data to the AI processing module through an electric signal, and the AI processing module autonomously detects the learning state of a student. And the detected data is fed back to the user through the image display module and the audio playing module, so that the learning state of the user is autonomously detected, and the problem that the learning progress of the students and the teaching quality of the teacher are affected as the teacher cannot pay attention to each student during teaching in the prior art is solved.

title: AI motion mirror-based motion assessment method, apparatus and device, and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN JUYUE TECH CULTURE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI exercise mirror-based exercise assessment method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring face image information of a user so as to display an exercise item associated with the face image information; playing an exercise video related to the exercise item in real time, and collecting a real-time exercise image of the user; identifying human body skeleton point information in the real-time motion image to judge whether the action of the user is matched with the action in a preset standard action model or not; and if not, generating a correction prompt. The teaching workload of teachers can be reduced, and meanwhile scientific training action demonstration and standard teaching are provided for students.

title: Teaching device for artificial intelligence machine vision detection
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching device for visual inspection of an artificial intelligence machine, which comprises a support frame A. The teaching device also comprises a placing mechanism which is connected with the support frame A through a connecting assembly and is used for limiting an object; the connecting assembly is connected with the support frame A and the placing mechanism and is used for connecting the placing mechanism and the support frame A; the connecting assembly comprises an arc-shaped sliding rail, a supporting frame C and an arc-shaped sliding block, the arc-shaped sliding rail is rotationally connected with the supporting frame A, the arc-shaped sliding block is fixedly connected with the supporting frame C, the arc-shaped sliding block is in sliding fit with the arc-shaped sliding rail, and the arc-shaped sliding rail is connected with the supporting frame C through an adjusting mechanism; the placing mechanism comprises a support frame B and a clamping assembly; according to the utility model, a machine vision detection device based on artificial intelligence can be promoted to capture the forms of objects at different positions and at different angles, so that image capture teaching of the objects is completed.

title: Multi-user collaborative virtual interaction method based on MR recording and broadcasting technology
applicants: LIAONING SUNFLOWER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a multi-person collaborative virtual interaction method based on an MR recording and broadcasting technology, and the method comprises the steps: constructing teaching auxiliary courseware according to the related course data of any course, carrying out the courseware expansion of the teaching auxiliary courseware, obtaining an assembly interaction system, and carrying out the interaction of the teaching auxiliary courseware. Performing orthogonal transformation on a three-dimensional virtual model constructed based on the assembly interaction system to obtain a transformed model, mapping the transformed model to a world coordinate system, and constructing a virtual simulation platform corresponding to the transformed model in the world coordinate system, and creating a stream socket corresponding to the user terminal, establishing a connection between the user terminal and the virtual simulation system based on the stream socket, and when a content interaction request is received, enabling a user corresponding to the user terminal to execute a virtual interaction operation in the virtual simulation system. The invention further provides a multi-user collaborative virtual interaction device based on the MR recording and broadcasting technology. According to the invention, the problem of low efficiency of multi-user collaborative virtual interaction based on the MR recording and broadcasting technology can be solved.

title: Teaching method and device for autonomous vehicle and autonomous vehicle
applicants: APOLLO ZHILIAN BEIJING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching method and device for an automatic driving vehicle, electronic equipment, a storage medium, a computer program product and the automatic driving vehicle, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to the technical field of automatic driving. According to the specific implementation scheme, a teaching video is played, and the teaching video comprises a plurality of teaching sub-videos; in response to the completion of playing of the current teaching sub-video, outputting operation prompt information corresponding to the current teaching sub-video; receiving a control operation on the vehicle; and judging whether the control operation is matched with a specified operation of the operation prompt information, and if so, playing a next teaching sub-video of the current teaching sub-video until the teaching video is completely played. By judging whether the control operation is matched with the specified operation of the operation prompt information or not, the safety of automatic driving is improved.

title: AI education system for intelligent community education
