abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI education system for intelligent community education, and relates to the technical field of education systems, the AI education system comprises a school terminal, and the school terminal is connected with a plurality of community terminals and a plurality of teacher terminals through a cloud server. Student information and community information can be respectively stored in a community information storage module and a student information storage module through an information input module arranged at a school terminal, and when a community real-time condition query module receives that community students cannot enter a school for class due to epidemic situations or other emergencies, the community students can enter the school for class. The student community automatic distribution module can extract information in the community information storage module and the student information storage module for automatic matching, students in the same community are automatically distributed into a group to form a community terminal, each community terminal can form a community teaching module, and meanwhile corresponding teachers are distributed. Therefore, teachers can carry out online teaching on students in the same community, and learning in the same community can be kept consistent in course progress and teaching mode.

title: AUTO TEACHING METHOD AND AUTO TEACHING SYSTEM FOR TRANSFER ROBOT
abstract_text: Disclosed are an auto teaching method and an auto teaching system for a transfer robot, which are capable of implementing full automation by means of artificial intelligence teaching so as to be capable of achieving an unmanned production line and omitting aligning of a cassette, on a port and thus can prevent substrate damage from alignment. The auto teaching method, in which the auto teaching system comprises a port at which a cassette having a plurality of substrates loaded thereon is arranged, and a transfer robot for transferring the substrates loaded on the cassette while moving between ports, comprises the steps of: acquiring the absolute position of the port; acquiring the relative position of the cassette with respect to the port; and calculating the absolute position of the cassette by using the absolute position of the port and the relative position of the cassette with respect to the port.

title: Intelligent dimming and color-adjusting lighting platform
abstract_text: The utility model provides an intelligent dimming and color-adjusting lighting platform, which comprises a main controller module and a sensor module which are integrated on a PCB (Printed Circuit Board), and the main controller module comprises an MCU (Microprogrammed Control Unit) module, a DALI (Digital Addressable Lighting Interface) communication module, a WiFi (Wireless Fidelity) communication module, an RS485 communication module, a DMX512 communication module, a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller) communication module, an Ethernet communication module, a Zigbee communication module and an LED (Light Emitting Diode) module. The intelligent dimming and color-adjusting lighting platform fully considers multi-disciplinary crossing and multi-level application requirements, and the practical training suite can meet the requirements of in-class experiments, course design and innovative experiment teaching of related courses such as the automation major, the computer major, the software major, the artificial intelligence major and the Internet of Things major. Students can carry out task setting according to professional backgrounds of themselves and teacher tasks, task tasks or hobbies, then select hardware resources to carry out hardware verification, and grasp the architecture and implementation flow of the students and key technologies of all links in the practical training process.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system (10) in which a chip (W) is configured to at least partially have a specific color (121) indicative of a value of the chip (W) includes: a recording device (11) that uses a camera (212) and records a state of the chip (W) as an image; an image analysis device (14) that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color (121) and a reference color (4a) that is present in the image and differs from the specific color (121) ; and a recognition device (12) at least including an artificial intelligence device (12a) that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device (14) and specifies the specific color (121) of the chip (W), wherein the artificial intelligence device (12a) of the recognition device (12) has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip (W) and the reference color (121) irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: DETECTING AND MONITORING OXYGEN-RELATED EVENTS IN HEMODIALYSIS PATIENTS
abstract_text: The present teachings include analyzing oxygen saturation levels sensed during a hemodialysis treatment for a patient to determine whether the patient has a medical condition based on hypoxemia, apnea, or the like experienced during the treatment. To this end, the present teachings may include the use of a machine-learning algorithm trained to identify a presence of a high-frequency intermittent pattern that would be formed in a plot of the oxygen saturation levels, e.g., to determine a severity of respiratory instability experienced. The present teaching may also or instead include a time-series analysis including at least one of: (i) calculating recurrence-based quantification, such as, but not limited to, recurrence rate, determinism, and laminarity; (ii) calculating the optimal recurrence threshold based on maximum variations of the system's determinism and degree of predictability; and (iii) calculating complexity-based measures such as permutation entropy. Such analyses may be used to detect, inter-alia, sleep apnea syndrome.

title: Online education system based on AI algorithm
applicants: SHANGHAI WANRUILONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, in particular to an online education system based on an AI algorithm, which comprises an acquisition subsystem, an AI analysis subsystem and an interaction subsystem, and is characterized in that the AI analysis subsystem comprises an identification module, an analysis module, a prompt module and a storage module; acquiring and packaging exercise data arranged by a teacher and exercise completion conditions of students through an acquisition subsystem to obtain a data packet; the identification module decompresses and identifies the data packet to obtain identification information; the analysis module analyzes the identification information to construct an analysis file; the prompt module records the error-prone questions in the analysis file and prompts the teacher to explain the question with the highest error rate subsequently; the storage module stores the analysis file; the interaction subsystem can realize online teaching of teachers and teaching interaction of teachers and students, and the system can know the understanding of the students on teaching content through the analysis file constructed by the analysis module, and visually reminds the students of learning progress.

title: Homework evaluation system for online education
applicants: SHANGHAI WANRUILONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, in particular to an online education homework evaluation system, which comprises an acquisition subsystem, an evaluation subsystem and a display subsystem, and is characterized in that the evaluation subsystem comprises an input module, an identification module and an evaluation module, the acquisition subsystem scans and acquires student homework to obtain a homework image, and the display subsystem displays the homework image; a teacher uses the input module to input answers of corresponding homework and obtain exercise answers, the recognition module recognizes homework images and obtains exercise data, the evaluation module compares and corrects the exercise data and the exercise answers and then evaluates the exercise data and the exercise answers to obtain evaluation data, and finally the display subsystem displays the evaluation data for the teacher and students to check. The system analyzes the homework of the student by using AI intelligent comparison exercise answers through the evaluation module, the homework correction is rapid, multiple homework can be corrected at the same time, a teacher does not need to go straight to correct, and the workload of the teacher is reduced.

title: Education network management equipment based on wireless technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education network management device based on a wireless technology, and relates to the technical field of information technology teaching, the education network management device comprises a network education network management system installed between a teacher computer and a plurality of student computers, and the management system comprises a management module, an acquisition module, a processing module and an early warning module; the acquisition module is mainly used for acquiring a student step screenshot image Bi, the processing module sequentially performs similarity matching on the student step screenshot image Bi and an image Ai (i is greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to n) in a correct step screenshot image group [A1, A2,..., An], if the image Bi and the image Ai are the same, the student practical operation step is marked to be correct, and if the image Bi and the image Ai are not the same, the student practical operation step is marked to be correct. If yes, whether the image Bi and the image Ai + 1 are the same or not is judged, if yes, it is judged that the practical operation steps of the student are correct, and if not, an early warning result is sent to an early warning module after it is judged that the practical operation steps are different. The education network management equipment based on the wireless technology assists teaching and improves the teaching effect.

title: WeChat-based fetal monitoring teaching platform and online user recommendation system
applicants: UNIV SICHUAN WEST CHINA 2ND UNIV HOSPITAL
abstract_text: The invention discloses a fetal monitoring teaching platform based on WeChat, and relates to the field of medical teaching digitization, and the key points of the technical scheme are that a system architecture comprises a centralized calculation storage background, a medical care student terminal, a medical care teacher terminal and a function module, and the medical care student terminal and the medical care teacher terminal access the centralized background; the background responds to the access of the medical care student terminal and the medical care teacher terminal; the function module comprises a fetal monitoring basic knowledge learning module, a fetal monitoring atlas database learning module, a fetal monitoring course live broadcast learning module, a fetal monitoring interactive question and answer module and a breakthrough ranking module. According to the invention, medical treatment is combined with Internet +, a brand new fetal monitoring learning mode is constructed for a medical group, and a personalized learning mode is realized by using a WeChat applet, big data, artificial intelligence and deep learning; the device can be installed in mobile equipment such as a mobile phone, a tablet computer and a notebook computer, so that the learner can open the application anytime and anywhere when the learner is busy, and a continuous learning and communication platform using fragmented time is provided for the learner.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system (10) in which a chip (W) is configured to at least partially have a specific color (121) indicative of a value of the chip (W) includes: a recording device (11) that uses a camera (212) and records a state of the chip (W) as an image; an image analysis device (14) that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color (121) and a reference color (4a) that is present in the image and differs from the specific color (121) ; and a recognition device (12) at least including an artificial intelligence device (12a) that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device (14) and specifies the specific color (121) of the chip (W), wherein the artificial intelligence device (12a) of the recognition device (12) has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip (W) and the reference color (121) irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Teaching method using AI teaching decision assistant
applicants: SHENZHEN JINSHI ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching method applying an AI teaching decision-making assistant in the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: S1, operating a teaching decision-making assistant, enabling a student to transmit a signal fed back by a personal digital device to teaching software on a teaching computer, then, the teaching software sends the processed student feedback data to a teaching decision assistant running on a teacher personal terminal, and finally, after the teacher stops receiving the data sent by the teaching software at the personal terminal, the teacher inputs a correct answer and displays the correct answer; s2, generating decision suggestions; and S3, evaluating teaching decision quality. According to the invention, after a teacher asks questions in the form of choice questions in the classroom and students make feedback, a teaching decision assistant provides effective and feasible teaching strategy suggestions for reference of the teacher during teaching based on the feedback answer data, so that the teaching quality is improved, and the teaching is more targeted.

title: Deep learning model-based teacher micro-ability evaluation method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher informatization teaching micro-ability evaluation method based on a deep learning model. The method is characterized by comprising the steps of constructing a teacher micro-ability classification framework, designing a teacher micro-ability classification standard and an evaluation standard, collecting lesson evaluation data from a mobile listening and evaluating lesson system, cleaning and converting a lesson evaluation text, performing micro-ability classification standard and micro-ability level evaluation on the lesson evaluation text, and evaluating the micro-ability classification standard and the micro-ability level of the lesson evaluation text. A deep learning teacher micro-ability classification model based on pre-training is constructed, a deep learning teacher micro-ability evaluation model based on an attention mechanism is constructed, and a teacher micro-ability classification prediction result and a micro-ability level evaluation result are obtained through prediction and weighted average. And visualizing the micro-ability analysis result of the teacher to the individual portrait of the teacher. Compared with the prior art, the method has the advantages that the classroom ability of teachers is scientifically evaluated from multiple angles, the data authenticity and accuracy are improved, the manual collection workload and analysis cost are reduced, and the method has high research and practice value.

title: Machine vision platform system applied to teaching and practical training
applicants: SHANDONG XINGKE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a machine vision platform system applied to teaching and practical training, which belongs to the technical field and comprises an operation table top, a machine vision platform, a machine vision platform, a machine vision platform and a machine vision platform, and is characterized in that a support is arranged on the operation table top; a visual device is detachably mounted on the bracket; a first display device is arranged on one side of the operation table top, and a second display device is arranged on the other side of the operation table top. According to the utility model, repeated dismounting, calibration and debugging are not needed in a machine vision practical training process, so that students can deeply understand and learn principles of artificial intelligence and machine vision; the position of the visual device can be adjusted through control and adjustment of the industrial personal computer, and visual simulation can be carried out more accurately. The USB 3.0 data line is adopted to be fixedly connected with the industrial personal computer, connection is stable and reliable, and image data and video stream transmission is rapid and stable.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To provide an information processing device capable of presenting evaluation scores of teaching data and necessary teaching data to a user in an easily understandable manner in a configuration in which learning processing is performed using teaching data, and an information processing method.SOLUTION: A teaching data execution unit generates a camera photographic image according to movement of a robot by a user operation based on teaching data and movement position information of the robot as learning data. A learning processing unit inputs the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit, executes machine learning, and generates a teaching data set consisting of images and robot action rules as learning result data. A feedback information generation unit inputs the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit and the learning result data generated by the learning processing unit, evaluates the teaching data, and generates and outputs numerical feedback information and visual feedback information based on the evaluation results.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 6

title: CONTROL DEVICE, CONTROL SYSTEM, AND CONTROL METHOD FOR WIRE STRAIGHTENER
abstract_text: Accuracy of feedforward control for a wire straightener is improved. A feedback operation amount (rb) to a straightener (200) is determined by a feedback control means (110) based on an error between a target curvature (qr) and a straightening curvature (q). A feedforward compensation means (120) determines a feedforward compensation value (rf) from a measurement value (do) of the straightener (200) using a prediction model (Mp). A learning means (130) performs machine learning on the prediction model (Mp) using teaching data (Ds). The learning means (130) adds at least one combination including the measurement value (do) and a manipulated variable (r) when an absolute value of an error (eq) is smaller than a reference value (a) to the teaching data (Ds).

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
applicants: STATE GRID SHANDONG ELECTRIC POWER CO RIZHAO POWER SUPPLY CO
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching systems, and particularly discloses an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system which comprises a control module, an interactive panel, a timer, a data memory and a distance sensor are connected to the control module, and a face acquisition device and a voice device are connected to the distance sensor. The face acquisition device is connected with an access recording device, the data storage device is connected with a knowledge point question bank and an input module, and the face calling module and the data transmission module are connected with the face acquisition device. When the knowledge point question bank in the teaching system is used, the control module can retrieve different data information from the question bank center through the retrieval module, and the retrieved data information can be transmitted to the display panel through the control module, so that different question bank information can be displayed on the display panel; therefore, different question bank information can be displayed according to the use of different persons, and the self-adaptive use of the system for different persons during working can be realized.

title: Video suspension playing method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a video suspension playing method and device.The method comprises the steps that a video playing instruction issued by a user is responded, a video corresponding to the video playing instruction is played in a display window of target software, and after a second function page switching operation of the user in the target software is received, the video is played in the display window of the target software; and displaying the content of a second function page corresponding to the second function page switching operation in the display window, simultaneously pausing a video being played in the first function page, starting a video floating window in the display window, and continuing to play the paused video in the video floating window. According to the embodiment of the invention, when the student switches the video course page to the teaching page or the student note page, the teaching video is played in the suspended playing frame, so that the student can watch the teaching video while browsing the teaching PPT or recording the teaching note, thereby improving the learning efficiency of the student.

title: Emergency teaching method, system and equipment based on virtual scene and medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an emergency teaching method, system and device based on a virtual scene and a medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence, the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a plurality of preset emergency teaching scenes, each emergency teaching scene at least comprising an access node and an exit node; the multiple emergency teaching scenes are combined according to the corresponding access nodes and the corresponding exit nodes, a scene sequence for connecting all the emergency teaching scenes in series is obtained, and the scene sequence is connected in series end to end; matching an emergency teaching scene in the scene sequence according to input information of a target object to obtain a matched scene; and taking the matched scene as a first output scene, and completing interactive display of all emergency teaching scenes according to the sequence of the scene sequence. The virtual scene can be flexibly configured, scene association is carried out, and different teaching requirements are met.

title: Training user system conversations in task-oriented conversation system
abstract_text: Methods and systems for improving dialog management of a task-oriented dialog system are disclosed. The disclosed dialog builder utilizes machine teaching processing to improve development of a dialog manager. In this manner, the dialogue builder combines the advantages of both rule-based and machine learning methods to allow dialogue authors to: (1) import dialogue graphics developed using popular dialogue authors, (2) convert the dialogue graphics into text-based training dialogues, (3) continuously improve the trained dialogues based on log dialogues, and (4) improve the training dialogues based on log dialogues. And (4) generating a corrected dialog to retrain machine learning.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: METHOD FOR GENERATING LEARNED MODEL, NON-TRANSITORY STORAGE MEDIUM, AND TRAFFIC JAM PREDICTING DEVICE
abstract_text: A method includes, by a processor (30A), acquiring number of persons information that indicates a number of users, including users who ride in vehicles (12), who depart from a facility at each of a predetermined time period, weather information for each predetermined time period, and vehicle information relating to vehicles (12) traveling in a periphery of the facility, determining traffic jam status that indicates absence/presence of a traffic jam on a road located in a vicinity of the facility in the predetermined time period, by using the vehicle information; and generating a learned model (150) for predicting a traffic jam of a road by machine learning using, as teaching data, the number of persons information, the weather information, and the traffic jam status that is associated with the number of persons information and the weather information.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are a device and method for presenting an evaluation score for teaching data and necessary teaching data to a user in an easily understandable manner in a configuration for carrying out learning using teaching data. A teaching data execution unit generates, as learning data, movement position information about a robot and an image captured by a camera in accordance with the movement of the robot by a user operation based on teaching data. A learning unit executes machine learning by inputting the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit, and generates, as learning result data, a teaching data set comprising an image and a robot movement rule. A feedback information generation unit inputs the learning data generated by the teaching data execution unit and the learning result data generated by the learning unit, executes an evaluation of the teaching data, and generates and outputs numerical feedback information and visual feedback information based on the result of the evaluation.

title: TRAINING METHOD, TRAINING DEVICE, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: This training method includes: acquiring an image and a distance image corresponding to the image (S01, S02); cutting a partial region of the acquired distance image (S05); pasting the distance image within the cut partial region into a prescribed region of the image that corresponds in position and size to the partial region, and thereby generating a embedded image (S06); and training a machine learning model (133) using teaching data in which the generated embedded image is employed as input data and the distance image is employed as correct-answer data (S07-S09).

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system which comprises an AI intelligent display screen body and a connecting box, an inductive head is fixed to the front face of the AI intelligent display screen body, and a moving mechanism is arranged, so that when the AI intelligent display screen body needs to be moved, the inductive head can move on the AI intelligent display screen body; the AI intelligent display screen has the advantages that the AI intelligent display screen body can be conveniently moved by conveniently operating the lifting mechanism to enable the moving wheels to be in contact with the bottom surface, jacking up the base and enabling the base to be suspended, the AI intelligent display screen body can be conveniently moved, and by arranging the lifting mechanism, learners with different heights can conveniently adjust the height of the AI intelligent display screen body when using the AI intelligent display screen body; the AI intelligent display screen has the advantages that the AI intelligent display screen body can be conveniently operated by a learner, heat dissipated during use of the AI intelligent display screen body can be timely treated by the aid of the cooling mechanism, and the problem that the service lives of parts of the AI intelligent display screen body are shortened due to the fact that the heat is accumulated in the AL intelligent display screen body is solved.

title: Determining Gas Leak Flow Rate In A Wellbore Environment
abstract_text: An estimated gas leak flow rate can be determined using a teaching set of concentration profiles, a regression model implemented by a machine-learning subsystem, and a subset of attributes measured within an environment. The teaching set of concentration profiles can include gas flow rates associated with relevant attributes. The regression model can be transformed into a gas leak flow regression model via the machine-learning subsystem using the teaching set. The subset of attributes measured within the environment can be applied to the gas leak flow regression model to determine other attributes absent from the subset of attributes and an estimated gas flow rate for the environment. A gas leak attenuation action can be performed in response to the estimated gas flow rate.

title: Automatic driving sand table system applied to teaching and practical training
applicants: SHANDONG XINGKE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an automatic driving sand table system applied to teaching and practical training, and belongs to the technical field of teaching and practical training equipment. The automatic driving sand table system comprises an industrial personal computer, a video monitoring device, a traffic light device, an electronic toll collection system and an intelligent vehicle, the industrial personal computer is connected with the scanning induction device, and the scanning induction device is connected with the electronic toll collection system. According to the utility model, students can more intuitively experience the working operation principle of the intelligent vehicle, and intelligent actions of the intelligent vehicle on the sand table are realized, so that the interest of development and learning is increased; the automatic driving automobile sand table system comprises three intelligent automobiles, namely an intelligent automobile based on c language programming of an STM32f103 single chip microcomputer, an artificial intelligence intelligent automobile based on jetson nano development board and python programming and an ROS automatic driving intelligent automobile, simplicity is achieved, singleness is achieved, integration and fusion are achieved, and it is guaranteed that all-around and full-automatic driving of students is achieved. And basic knowledge and deep knowledge of the intelligent networked automobile can be learned in a multi-level manner.

title: AI teaching type intelligent frying pan
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of cooking utensils, and discloses an AI teaching type intelligent wok which comprises an intelligent wok body, a temperature measuring handle is arranged on the outer side wall of the front end of the intelligent wok body, fastening clamping rods are arranged on the outer side wall of the bottom end of the intelligent wok body in a bilateral symmetry mode, and a wok turning mechanism is arranged below the intelligent wok body. The pot turning mechanism comprises a bottom ring, a turnover ring capable of being turned over is arranged above the bottom ring, a pot ring is fixedly connected to the top face of the turnover ring, a pot fixing mechanism is arranged on the turnover ring, the pot fixing mechanism comprises two clamping seats, and the two clamping seats are fixedly connected to the centers of the left face and the right face of the turnover ring respectively. Clamping grooves penetrating left and right are formed in the top faces of the two clamping bases respectively, locking insertion blocks capable of moving front and back are arranged on the front faces of the two clamping bases respectively, the device is simple in structure, vegetable discharging operation is facilitated, a student does not need to hold a pot to discharge vegetables, labor is saved, meanwhile, operation safety is high, and the student is prevented from being scalded.

title: AI mirror household video teaching and body-building all-in-one machine
applicants: SHENZHEN YINGHONGJUN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI mirror surface household video teaching and body-building all-in-one machine, which comprises a machine body, the machine body comprises a front cover and a rear cover, the machine body is installed in a fixed seat, the fixed seat is fixed on a base, a display screen is installed above the machine body, panel glass is fixedly installed in front of the display screen, and the panel glass is fixed on the base. A mirror surface body is fixedly installed below the display screen, a loudspeaker is fixedly installed between the mirror surface body and the display screen, a control panel is arranged below the mirror surface body, a protective baffle is slidably installed in the control panel, and a camera is fixedly installed in the center of the top end of the display screen. The left side of the camera is fixedly provided with a photosensitive sensor, the right side of the camera is fixedly provided with a hand waving sensor, the machine body is fixedly provided with light supplementing lamps at equal intervals on the two sides of the display screen and the mirror surface body, the back of the machine body is provided with an access hole, and the access hole is a sealing plate which is detachably installed through a first bolt.

title: Convolutional neural network training method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a convolutional neural network training method, which comprises the steps of performing model training through a first training data set to obtain a teaching model, the first training data set being images carrying manual annotations; each piece of training data in the second training data set is labeled by using the teaching model to obtain a target training data set, each piece of training data in the second training data set is an image to be recognized, and each piece of training data in the target training data set carries a prediction label; performing enhancement processing on the first training data set and the target training data set to obtain an enhanced third training data set; and performing iterative training on the initial detector model according to the third training data set until the iterative detector model meets the training constraint condition, and determining the iterative detector model meeting the training constraint condition as a target detector model. According to the method, the generalization ability and the training efficiency of the convolutional neural network are improved.

title: Machine learning model determination system and machine learning model determination method
abstract_text: A machine learning model determination system (1) is provided, comprising: at least one server (2) and at least one client terminal (3) connected to an information communication network and capable of communicating with each other; an evaluation information database (202) that stores evaluation information relating to evaluation of machine learning; an evaluation information updating module (203) that updates evaluation information on the basis of the specific value of the parameter and evaluation on machine learning performed using the specific teaching data; a teaching data input module (304) for inputting specific teaching data; a verification data input module (305) that inputs specific verification data; a parameter determination module (307) that determines a particular value of the parameter based on the evaluation information; and a machine learning engine (303) including a learning module (301) that performs learning of the machine learning model by using the specific teaching data, and an evaluation module (302) that evaluates a result of machine learning by using the specific verification data.

title: Method, device and equipment for predicting use willingness of old people to intelligent product
abstract_text: The invention provides a method, device and equipment for predicting the will of old people to use an intelligent product, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the basic information of the old people; the basic information comprises at least one of the following information: age, gender, living style, culture degree, health condition, living area, community type, living age limit, use information of community 24-hour service hotline or online service platform, use information of community WeChat group or WeChat official account, and teaching information of intelligent product use by old people developed in the community; configuration information of the community elderly intelligent product and use information of the community elderly intelligent product; based on the basic information of the old people, obtaining a prediction result through a preset prediction model; the prediction model is used for predicting the willing degree of the old people to use the intelligent product based on the basic information of the old people, and the prediction result is used for representing the willing degree of the old people to use the intelligent product.

title: Intelligent education all-in-one machine based on AI intelligence
applicants: HENAN IND AND TRADE VOCATIONAL COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a wisdom education all-in-one machine based on AI intelligence, and relates to the field of teaching aids, and the all-in-one machine comprises a VR glasses body and two earphones, and also comprises a locking assembly which is arranged on the VR glasses body and is used for locking the earphones; and after the insertion stroke of each earphone drives the locking assembly to lock the earphone, the earphone can rotate at any angle. According to the intelligent education all-in-one machine based on AI intelligence provided by the invention, the VR glasses are connected with the education all-in-one machine, so that students can be more immersive in the learning process, the learning interestingness is increased, the VR glasses body is detachably connected with the headset, the VR glasses are further connected with the headset, and the learning interestingness is improved. And the headset is convenient to replace and install.

title: Pathology teaching method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a pathology teaching method and system based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of pathology education, and aims to determine the pathology teaching task quantity in a preset time period, perform real-time state analysis on a target student, further perform information quantity receiving degree prediction, and perform distribution adjustment of the pathology teaching task quantity based on a prediction result. Carrying out teaching mode matching based on pathological teaching characteristics, determining an optimal teaching mode suitable for a target student, carrying out pathological teaching, obtaining a teaching effect evaluation result, adjusting the teaching mode, determining an optimized teaching mode, carrying out subsequent teaching based on the result, and carrying out real-time updating of the optimized teaching mode according to the teaching effect. According to the technical scheme of the invention, the technical problem that the teaching effect of students cannot be ensured due to insufficient intelligence, relatively conventional method and relatively strong universality of a common pathology teaching mode in the prior art is solved, and high-information-receiving-degree teaching matched with the students is realized by optimizing and determining the teaching mode.

title: ANALYSIS DEVICE AND WAVEFORM PROCESSING PROGRAM FOR ANALYSIS DEVICE
abstract_text: An analysis device according to one mode of the present invention includes: a waveform deformation unit (112) configured to enlarge or reduce a target signal waveform obtained by analysis and indicating a change in signal intensity depending on a change in a value of a predetermined parameter by a scale factor of N (where N is a positive value other than 0 and 1) in the direction of the signal intensity axis and/or enlarge or reduce by a scale factor of M (where M may be a positive value other than 0 and 1 and may be the same value as N) in the direction of the predetermined parameter axis; a peak detection unit (113) configured to use a learned model generated in advance by machine learning using, as teaching data, a signal waveform and a start point and an end point of a correct solution, and use, as an input, a signal waveform after deformation by the waveform deformation unit, and output, as a detection result, the start point and the end point of the peak; and a waveform inverse deformation unit (114) configured to reduce or enlarge information on a start point and an end point of a peak, the information being output by the peak detection unit, by a scale factor inverse to that at the time of deformation by the waveform deformation unit, and obtain a peak detection result for the target signal waveform.

title: WIRELESS COMMUNICATION DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a wireless communication device that can automatically switch to a bandwidth in which optimal throughput can be obtained according to a degree of congestion in an object space.SOLUTION: A wireless communication unit 11 performs wireless communication with a communication terminal 4 present in an object space. An information acquisition unit 12 acquires a value representing a degree of congestion in the object space. A learned model 14 is a model that is learned with a value representing the degree of congestion in the object space, a bandwidth, a channel, and throughput as teaching data. An AI processing unit 15 inputs the value representing the degree of congestion in the object space acquired by the information acquisition unit 12 to the learned model 14 and acquires the bandwidth and the channel output by the learned model 14. A bandwidth control unit 16 causes the wireless communication unit 11 to perform the wireless communication with the bandwidth acquired by the AI processing unit 15. A channel control unit 17 causes the wireless communication unit 11 to perform the wireless communication with the channel acquired by the AI processing unit 15.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Teaching information analysis method based on artificial intelligence and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching information analysis method based on artificial intelligence and electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring target learning condition information; extracting subject features in the target learning condition information for analysis; analyzing learning condition similarity between the subject features and preset subject features of each preset reference student group, wherein the preset reference student groups are student groups with similar learning condition types; based on each learning condition similarity and a first preset learning condition similarity condition, retrieving a target reference student group matched with the analysis subject characteristics in all preset reference student groups; and determining a learning condition information analysis result according to the learning condition type corresponding to the target reference student group. Through the analysis subject features in the learning condition information, the learning condition analysis result can be obtained based on the learning condition type corresponding to the target reference student group. The process of matching the similar target reference student group is actually obtained based on the way of analyzing the learning condition similarity, so that the efficiency of the learning condition similarity analysis process is improved, and the learning condition analysis can be quickly realized.

title: Teaching knowledge graph construction and retrieval method and system based on multi-view learning
applicants: SHANDONG INSPUR SCIENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching knowledge graph construction and retrieval method and system based on multi-view learning, belongs to the technical field of teaching resource recommendation, and aims to solve the technical problem of how to utilize a deep learning technology, combine multi-view learning and a user portrait technology, effectively utilize massive teaching resources and improve the teaching quality. And a more accurate and reasonable teaching knowledge graph is automatically constructed, and personalized knowledge point retrieval recommendation is realized. Comprising the following steps: constructing a graph construction and retrieval model based on a multi-view feature extractor, a teaching resource portrait model, a knowledge graph construction model, a user portrait model and a retrieval recommendation model; carrying out model training on the multi-view feature extractor, the teaching resource portrait model, the knowledge graph construction model, the user portrait model and the retrieval recommendation model in sequence; and constructing a teaching knowledge point knowledge graph through the trained graph construction and retrieval model, constructing an index based on the teaching knowledge point knowledge graph, and providing a retrieval recommendation service.

title: VR teaching interaction system and method based on AI
applicants: SHENZHEN FUTURE 3D EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based VR teaching interaction system and method. The system comprises Bluetooth VR glasses, VR equipment and a Bluetooth signal processing unit. The Bluetooth VR glasses comprise a first MCU, a posture detection unit, a voice unit and a first Bluetooth unit; the posture detection unit, the voice unit and the first Bluetooth unit are connected with the first MCU; the posture detection unit is used for detecting a user head movement track and generating a visual angle interaction instruction; the voice unit is used for acquiring a user voice signal and generating a voice interaction instruction; the first MCU is used for processing the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction and then transmitting the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction to the VR equipment through the first Bluetooth unit and the Bluetooth signal processing unit; and the VR equipment is used for playing 3D content corresponding to the visual angle or the voice content to the Bluetooth VR glasses after receiving the visual angle interaction instruction and the voice interaction instruction. A method is also disclosed. The problems that in existing VR teaching, hands are occupied, more body languages and auxiliary teaching aids cannot be used, and the VR teaching effect is poor are solved.

title: AI teaching system and method for garbage classification
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an AI teaching system and method for garbage classification, and the system comprises a system mainboard which employs a Linux system and is used for data processing, touch interaction, audio control and PWM communication; the image acquisition equipment is used for acquiring image data and transmitting the acquired data to the system mainboard; the touch control equipment is in data communication with the system mainboard and is used for touch signal acquisition and upper computer visual display; the sound equipment is in data communication with the system main board, receives the control signal of the system main board and then outputs audio; and the four-way steering engine is in PWM communication with the system mainboard and is used for controlling the states of the four types of garbage can covers. Based on the garbage classification theme, the user can learn the implementation method for solving the garbage classification problem by applying the artificial intelligence technology and the knowledge of garbage classification.

title: Classroom teaching application system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NANJING QIANLU YOUGUANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A classroom teaching application system based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the present invention comprises an information processing host, a teacher operation end and a student terminal, the teacher operation end and the student terminal are both connected with the information processing host, and the information processing host is also connected with a local circulation end and a cloud server. According to the invention, in different teaching situations, the courseware can have different extended contents, and a teacher does not need to operate too much, so that the teaching mode and progress of the teacher are not influenced; according to the invention, a teacher can lead students to think deeply from more angles under the action of the information processing host and the cloud server in class; according to the invention, during self-study of students, through the effects of the information processing host and the local circulation terminal, historical courseware content or historical correction information can be called and acquired, so that the students do not need to record classroom notes, and the students can conveniently perform self-study without tutoring of teachers when needing after-class consolidation.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: A teaching device based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the present invention comprises a desktop and four supporting legs, the four supporting legs are located at four corners of the bottom of the desktop, the tops of the supporting legs are fixedly connected with the bottom of the desktop, the top of the desktop is provided with a mounting plate, and the bottom of the desktop is fixedly connected with a transmission case. And a lifting mechanism is arranged at the bottom in the transmission box. By arranging the table top, the mounting plate, the transmission box, the lifting mechanism and the positioning mechanism, the lifting mechanism can drive the lifting rod to ascend or descend, the lifting rod drives the mounting plate to ascend or descend through the first bearing seat, and meanwhile the positioning mechanism fixes the mounting plate; the problems that when an existing artificial intelligence teaching device is used for installing, connecting and debugging control equipment or connecting equipment, the equipment needs to be lifted with one hand, the other hand is used for installation, the equipment is extremely prone to falling, and meanwhile an operator lifts the equipment for a long time and is prone to fatigue are solved.

title: CORRECTION SYSTEM, INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM, ROBOT CONTROL SYSTEM, CORRECTION METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, ROBOT CONTROL METHOD, CORRECTION PROGRAM, INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM, CORRECTION DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND ROBOT CONTROL DEVICE
abstract_text: In a correction system provided with a robot arm, an imaging device, and a correction device, a correction device is provided on the basis of a learning model generated by performing machine learning on a plurality of pieces of teaching data and a captured image obtained by capturing an image of a gripping section from a predetermined direction. The robot arm is provided with a gripping section that grips an object to be gripped at a distal end thereof, and generates first coordinate information indicating a position of the gripping section in a captured image coordinate system based on a captured image. The plurality of pieces of teaching data include an image obtained by capturing a virtual space including a three-dimensional model relating to the gripping section, and information indicating the position of the gripping section included in the virtual space. The correction device coordinate-converts the first coordinate information into second coordinate information indicating the position of the gripping section in a robot coordinate system based on the robot arm, using coordinate conversion information used in a coordinate conversion process for coordinate-converting the first coordinate information into the second coordinate information.

title: SEVERITY EVALUATION APPARATUS AND MODEL GENERATION APPARATUS
abstract_text: The present invention provides a severity evaluation apparatus that enables optimum distribution of medical resources to provide optimized medical care. A model generation apparatus 10 has a teaching data acquisition unit 31 operable to acquire teaching data 90 labeled with disease information indicative of a level of disease of a body region for a CT image and a model generation unit 32 operable to generate a disease information model 50 configured to output disease information in response to an input of a CT image with machine learning that uses the teaching data 90. The severity evaluation apparatus 20 has a measurement data acquisition unit 41 operable to acquire CT images 60 of a patient, a disease information acquisition unit 42 operable to acquire disease information 70 from each of the CT images 60 with use of the disease information model 50, and a severity calculation unit 43 operable to calculate a severity 75 of the patient based on the disease information 70 acquired by the disease information acquisition unit 42.

title: Athlete noninvasive function monitoring method and system based on Internet of Things
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of human body function monitoring, and particularly relates to an athlete noninvasive function monitoring method and system based on the Internet of Things, and the method and system form an expert analysis report through expert system analysis based on a physiological data set. The system and the method have the beneficial technical effects that a coach can conveniently know the function condition of the athlete, timely adjust the training plan and deeply analyze big data, and the teaching and research work is improved by utilizing artificial intelligence. The system and the method have the beneficial technical effects of being convenient for the coach to know the function condition of the athlete, timely adjust the training plan and deeply analyze big data.

title: Teaching live broadcast method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: MAIMIAO GUANGDONG CLOUD TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching live broadcast method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: processing teaching courseware based on an artificial intelligence technology, and forming a voice format file of the teaching courseware; in the teaching live broadcast process, recording a teaching site in a camera shooting mode to form a live broadcast video; setting a teaching site area and a teaching courseware area on a teaching live broadcast picture displayed by the teaching live broadcast receiving end; the live video is displayed in the teaching field area, and the teaching courseware is displayed in the teaching courseware area; and in a teaching live broadcast process, synchronizing a live broadcast video with the teaching courseware based on an artificial intelligence technology in combination with the voice format file of the teaching courseware.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine, especially relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, and comprises a rack and an intelligent screen located at the left side of the rack; the first T sleeve can drive the lead screw to rotate forwards, the lead screw sleeve drives the ball cup to move upwards, the right end of the limiting rod can abut against the right side of the inner wall of the vertical groove again, therefore, the limiting rod cannot move rightwards, the intelligent screen can be stabilized at the rotating point, the height and angle of the intelligent screen can be adjusted at the same time, and adjustment is convenient. The short sleeve can be held to apply force conveniently, so that the lead screw is driven to rotate forwards, the height of the intelligent screen can be adjusted, after adjustment is completed, the second T sleeve can be rotated upwards clockwise, and after the upper portion of the first T sleeve is in threaded connection with the lead screw, the lead screw can be stable and is not prone to rotating. The height of the intelligent screen can be manually adjusted, the practicability is good, and the problems that an existing artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine is insufficient in practicability and inconvenient in angle adjustment are solved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To reflect conditions on parameters affecting decision processing on a decision flow.SOLUTION: A storage unit 11 stores information on a decision flow 20 for obtaining decision results by a plurality of first decision steps indicating decision conditions for parameters. A processing unit 12 acquires a plurality of second decision steps related to a decision model generated by machine learning based on machine learning which uses teaching data representing the decision results for the plurality of parameters, and identifies parameters related to each of a plurality of second decision steps. The processing unit 12 extracts a set of parameters from a plurality of parameters according to influence of parameters on the decision model. The processing unit 12 changes a part of the plurality of first decision steps included in the decision flow 20 based on the extracted set of parameters.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Internet of Things security management system based on machine learning
applicants: INFORMATION & TELECOMMUNICATION BRANCH OF STATE GRID FUJIAN ELECTRIC POWER CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an Internet of Things security management system based on machine learning, comprising: generating one or more of pilot frequency and data information for a data signal, one or more elements in the pilot frequency and data information respectively corresponding to a specific time and a specific frequency in a time frequency spectrum; a fuzzy neural network is used for obtaining delay time of a controlled object, PID is used as an output sequence number of a controller pair obtained object, and a teaching signal for training a general learning network is used, so that relation analysis of input lag is carried out, and the delayed object is corrected. According to the Internet of Things security management system based on machine learning provided by the invention, when the delay time of the object changes, the general learning network pre-estimation control system can compensate the influence caused by the change in time, the control stability is kept, and a better control effect is obtained.

title: AI short board supervising and learning three-teacher integrated online teaching system and use method thereof
applicants: GUANGZHOU QIANKE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to G09B5/14, in particular to an AI short board supervising and learning three-teacher integrated online teaching system and a use method. Comprising an AI teaching system, a path planning system and a supervision evaluation system. According to the invention, on the basis of the whole process of student examination preparation, through examination site screening planning, learning path planning for students and one-to-one real-time question answering service providing, a teacher, a question answering teacher and an educational administration teacher are integrated to provide curriculum teaching service for students, so that efficient examination preparation, temperament teaching, personalized teaching and AI educational administration whole-course supervision service are truly realized.

title: Classroom teaching data processing method and system based on answer codes
abstract_text: The invention relates to a classroom teaching data processing method and system based on answer codes. The method relates to artificial intelligence, and comprises the steps of extracting a corresponding classroom teaching scene image for a classroom question of classroom teaching, and obtaining an answer code image of each student for the classroom question in the classroom teaching scene image; and extracting pixel features corresponding to the answer code image, performing decoding according to the pixel features, obtaining answer code numbers and answers corresponding to the answer code numbers, determining students matched with the answer code numbers, and obtaining answers of the students to the classroom questions. By adopting the method, the classroom teaching scene image is directly identified and decoded, the answer code number of each student and the answers of different classroom questions are obtained, the answer condition of the students is known, flexible interaction between a teacher and the students during classroom teaching is realized, corresponding electronic equipment does not need to be equipped for each student, and the teaching efficiency is improved. On the basis of realizing flexible classroom interaction, the teaching cost is reduced, and the universality of intelligent teaching in different teaching environments is improved.

title: Education and training all-in-one machine system for developing network service based on juyer-lab
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence education and training all-in-one machine system based on a juyer-lab development local area network, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises a course end and a management end, and also comprises a juyer-lab management platform implementation module which achieves a juyer-lab management platform based on a back-end function; and the user side can be in signal connection with the educational training all-in-one machine system by accessing the IP, the port number and the account password of the user side in the browser of the computer side so as to realize computer operation. Tedious steps of installing software and building an environment can be omitted for a user, and the time cost is saved; by means of the method, the process of downloading a data set and a model can be omitted for a user, it can be guaranteed that in the teaching process, the using environment, codes and data of students are the same, the teaching quality is improved, and the important research significance and use value are achieved.

title: Intelligent network security protection method, system, equipment and medium
applicants: STATE GRID XINJIANG ELECTRIC POWER CO LTD INFORMATION COMMUNICATION COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent network security protection method, system and device and a medium, and relates to the field of network security. An intelligent network security protection method comprises the following steps that multiple groups of hostile attack data are obtained, and each group of hostile attack data comprises abnormal data traffic of hostile attack behaviors, an attack source IP address, an attack destination IP address, attack times and an application firewall; s2, performing machine learning training on the multiple groups of hostile attack data to obtain an attack behavior teaching model which is used for outputting an application firewall of a hostile attack behavior to be detected, and detecting the hostile attack behavior of a service system to obtain abnormal data traffic, an attack source IP address, an attack destination IP address and attack times, obtaining an application firewall of the business system through the attack behavior teaching model; according to the method, the security protection strategy can be dynamically managed, and the processing efficiency of hostile attack behaviors is improved.

title: AI teaching practical training system and method based on cloud native
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI teaching practical training system and method based on cloud native. The AI teaching practical training system based on cloud native comprises a plurality of business systems which are deployed by adopting a Kubernetes cluster and face teachers or students; a MinIO bottom layer object storage system; the cluster proxy service system is used for storing a data set uploaded by a teacher through the business system to the MinIO bottom layer object storage system; the s3fs-fuse protocol agent system is used for mapping the data stored in the MinIO underlying object storage system to an experimental environment of a business system of a student; and the cluster proxy service system is also used for creating a JupyterNotebookPod in the Kubernetes, and mapping the data in the experimental environment to the JupyterNotebookPod in a PV or PVC mode, so that the data can be read by the students, and the cluster proxy service system is also used for creating the JupyterNotebookPod in the Kubernetes and mapping the data in the experimental environment to the JupyterNotebookPod in the Kubernetes. By adopting the method and the system, artificial intelligence coding, operation environment and standardized data set management can be unified, the teaching effect of teachers is improved, the learning threshold of students is reduced, and the teachers can evaluate the learning conditions of the students more accurately and conveniently.

title: Student teaching material content auditing and evaluating method and system based on artificial intelligence and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based student teaching material content auditing and evaluating method and system and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the page number statistics of a to-be-audited student electronic teaching material, and extracting a text part and an illustration part from the content of each page; according to the method and the device, the target textbook content is determined based on the audit result, so that the dual compliance audit of the student textbook content is realized, the audit direction of the student textbook content is expanded, an effective basis is provided for the subsequent readability improvement of the student textbook, and the reading efficiency of the student textbook content is improved. Meanwhile, when the text part of the student textbook is audited, format compliance auditing, historical expression compliance auditing and word compliance auditing of the text part are integrated, comprehensive and multi-azimuth auditing of the text part is achieved by enriching auditing indexes, then the reliability of an auditing result is improved to a certain degree, and the auditing efficiency is improved. And the authority of teaching materials of students is improved.

title: Take-out system and method
abstract_text: The invention provides a taking-out system capable of properly taking out a workpiece through machine learning. The extraction system includes: a robot having a hand; an acquisition unit that acquires a two-dimensional camera image of a presence region of the plurality of workpieces; a teaching unit that displays the two-dimensional camera image and is capable of teaching a take-out position of a target workpiece to be taken out by a hand among the plurality of workpieces; a learning unit that generates a learning model on the basis of the two-dimensional camera image and the takeout position of the teaching; an inference unit for inferring the extraction position of the target workpiece on the basis of the learning model and the two-dimensional camera image; and a control unit that controls the robot so as to take out the target workpiece by the hand on the basis of the deduced take-out position.

title: Guitar fingering teaching auxiliary method and system based on visual perception
applicants: NANTONG WEILAI CULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a guitar fingering teaching assisting method and system based on visual perception. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a guitar area image, and performing edge detection on the guitar area image to acquire positions of strings and articles of a guitar; acquiring positions of key points of a hand to obtain fingering information; comparing the fingering information with a standard fingering to obtain a first evaluation result of any finger; obtaining a second evaluation result that the difference between each segment of real-time audio and the standard audio is any finger; the mean value of the first evaluation result and the second evaluation result is calculated as a quality evaluation result, and when the quality evaluation result is smaller than a preset threshold value, the fingering practice of the fingers needs to be strengthened. On the basis of ensuring that the position of each finger is correct, the finger force during playing is further judged by using the audio information, and the accuracy of fingering analysis is improved.

title: Design and implementation of intelligent teaching auxiliary system based on hierarchical/hierarchical model
applicants: BEIJING FEITE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the design and implementation of an intelligent teaching auxiliary system based on a hierarchical/hierarchical model, and provides a novel artificial intelligence teaching auxiliary system and method which are derived from but different from a traditional offline teaching mode and fuse online'teaching + learning '. Through the cooperative use of platform functions and learning efficiency methods, the teaching efficiency of teachers is improved, and the teaching efficiency of the teachers is improved. A teacher can organize and improve lesson preparation (knowledge points and graded exercises) content in advance, holographic weighted evaluation of hierarchical teaching, graded homework and knowledge point learning is carried out for students with different ability levels, the students can be guided to carry out autonomous preview and real-time evaluation, the students can carry out hierarchical learning, and the teaching efficiency is improved. According to the ability level of a user, self-grading work, self-output and evaluation of knowledge and real-time online question answering and confusion with teaching assistance are carried out, and the learning effect is improved through an AI auxiliary system and a high-efficiency learning strategy, so that the advantages of traditional offline and online teaching are integrated, and the defects of the traditional offline and online teaching are overcome.

title: Business data intelligent analysis system based on big data and artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: WUXI YUNYIN TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: According to the technical scheme, the business data intelligent analysis system based on big data and artificial intelligence teaching comprises a data system and a central processing system, and the data system internally comprises a data acquisition module, a data processing module, a data analysis module and a data scheduling module. The data system obtains, processes and analyzes external business data, the central processing system internally comprises a data visualization module, a deep mining module, a deep learning module and a load monitoring module, and the business data transmitted to the central processing system are deeply mined through the deep mining module; the deep learning module is used for carrying out deep learning on the received business data relevance information and the integrated multi-year data of the enterprise, so that a business data floating model is established; and analyzing and judging the business data of a subsequent period of time according to the existing data through the business data floating model.

title: Method, apparatus and computer program for uncertainty evaluation of image classification
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for determining a predictive uncertainty of a first machine learning system (201), comprising the following steps: processing a detected input variable (21) by the first machine learning system (201), in which an intermediate result (24) determined when the input variable is processed by the machine learning system (201) is stored. At least one of the stored intermediate results (24) is processed by a second machine learning system (202), wherein the second machine learning system outputs an output variable (26, 27) characterizing the uncertainty of the classification of the output. Furthermore, the invention relates to a method for teaching a second machine learning system and to a computer system, to a computer program and to a machine-readable storage element on which the computer program is stored.

title: State estimation system and storage medium
abstract_text: A state estimation system and a storage medium capable of compensating for a decrease in accuracy of an estimated value output by a learned model. A state estimation system is configured by including: a learned model generated by machine learning using sample data of a first state variable and a second state variable of a predetermined object as teaching data; a first state variable measurement unit that measures a first state variable of the object to be monitored; a second state variable estimation unit that executes a second state variable estimation process in which a measured value of the first state variable is inputted to the learned model and an output of the learned model is acquired as an estimated value of a second state variable of the object to be monitored; and a replacement estimation unit that outputs a replacement estimation value as a replacement value for the estimation value of the second state variable when a predetermined first sudden change determination condition is satisfied with respect to the estimation value of the second state variable acquired in accordance with the input of the first measured value of the first state variable by the second state variable estimation processing.

title: Method for representing semanteme and relation between semanteme in natural language, reasoning method and artificial intelligence system
applicants: HANGZHOU XINFANSHI BIOLOGICAL MEDICINE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for representing a relationship between semantics in a natural language, a reasoning method and an artificial intelligence system. The technical scheme of the invention is based on an organization structure of the natural language; abstracting the information into a single entity form and a set form for describing the semanteme of an object, a single entity form and a sequence form for describing the semanteme of a relationship, a normal form semanteme-instance semanteme corresponding structure for describing the form of the semanteme and the corresponding structure of the connotation, and a normal form semanteme relationship for describing the reasoning logic; on this basis, a complete semantic expression, logic expression and reasoning calculation technical system is formed, a user can use a mode similar to a natural language to carry out knowledge teaching on an artificial intelligence system constructed based on the technical scheme of the invention, and the artificial intelligence system carries out reasoning according to the taught knowledge and answers questions proposed by the user; the method can be applied to construction of an artificial intelligence system with reasoning ability, and questions and answers completed by human beings are completed.

title: Classroom type intelligent evaluation system based on teaching video
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a classroom type intelligent evaluation system based on a teaching video, which comprises a background analysis module and a foreground evaluation report visualization module, and the method comprises the following steps: realizing automatic slicing of a classroom video based on near-field voice, carrying out behavior extraction and recognition on an education fragment, and carrying out classification on the education fragment; generating a preliminary educational behavior sequence; performing dynamic behavior compensation on the initial sequence, reducing behavior fragments and enhancing behavior connection; constructing an improved classroom type evaluation method for the education sequence based on a traditional S-T analysis method; and comparing the improved evaluation method with a traditional S-T analysis method to verify the effectiveness of the improved method, and realizing visual display of an evaluation report by using a webpage as a medium. By adopting the method, the classroom type evaluation efficiency and accuracy can be greatly improved, the teaching behaviors of the teachers can be well counted, the teaching characteristics of the teachers can be visually displayed, the information in the final evaluation report can help the teachers to perform self-examination, self-rescue and self-revision, and suggestions are provided for the school teaching departments to select, classify classes and realize the personalized education of the students.

title: Industrial robot teaching method based on six-dimensional force sensor information learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an industrial robot teaching method based on six-dimensional force sensing information learning, and belongs to the field of intelligent manufacturing. Through a machine learning method, the neural network is trained by taking the tail end stress condition as input and the tail end speed as output in the teaching process of the six-axis collaborative robot, and the trained neural network is applied to the teaching process of the industrial robot, so that the tail end of the industrial robot has the motion characteristics of the tail end of the collaborative robot.
