According to the invention, teaching can be carried out by dragging the tail end of the industrial robot, and the problems of poor man-machine interaction and tedious teaching process in the teaching process of the industrial robot are improved.

title: Education and training all-in-one machine system for developing network service based on juyer-lab and implementation method
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence education and training all-in-one machine system based on a juyer-lab development local area network, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises a course end and a management end, and also comprises a juyer-lab management platform implementation module which achieves a juyer-lab management platform based on a back-end function; and the user side can be in signal connection with the educational training all-in-one machine system by accessing the IP, the port number and the account password of the user side in the browser of the computer side so as to realize computer operation. Tedious steps of installing software and building an environment can be omitted for a user, and the time cost is saved; by means of the method, the process of downloading a data set and a model can be omitted for a user, it can be guaranteed that in the teaching process, the using environment, codes and data of students are the same, the teaching quality is improved, and the important research significance and use value are achieved.

title: DIAGNOSIS PREDICTION SYSTEM USING DIGITAL DEVICE, LEARNING DEVICE, COMPUTER PROGRAM, DIAGNOSIS PREDICTION METHOD, AND PREDICTION MODEL GENERATION/UPDATING METHOD
abstract_text: Provided is a diagnosis prediction system capable of predicting specific disease-related information. A diagnosis prediction system (100) comprises: an input unit (11) for inputting biological data measured by a digital device worn by a subject, and medical interview data for the subject; and a prediction unit (12) that uses, as input data, biological data measured by digital devices worn respectively by a plurality of subjects and medical interview data corresponding to the biological data of the plurality of subjects, and by using a trained model that has undergone deep learning using disease-related information corresponding to each of the subjects as teaching data, predicts disease-related information for the subject on the basis of the biological data and the medical interview data for the subject input from the input unit.

title: DIAGNOSIS PREDICTION SYSTEM USING DIGITAL DEVICE, LEARNING DEVICE, COMPUTER PROGRAM, DIAGNOSIS PREDICTION METHOD, AND PREDICTION MODEL GENERATION/UPDATING METHOD
abstract_text: Provided is a diagnosis prediction system capable of predicting specific disease-related information.　A diagnosis prediction system 100 comprises: an input unit 11 for inputting biological data measured by a digital device worn by a subject, and medical interview data for the subject; and a prediction unit 12 that uses, as input data, biological data measured by digital devices worn respectively by a plurality of subjects and medical interview data corresponding to the biological data of the plurality of subjects, and by using a trained model that has undergone deep learning using disease-related information corresponding to each of the subjects as teaching data, predicts disease-related information for the subject on the basis of the biological data and the medical interview data for the subject input from the input unit.

title: METHOD AND PROGRAM FOR GENERATING TRAINED MODEL FOR INSPECTING NUMBER OF OBJECTS
abstract_text: This trained model generation method involves generating a trained model to be used in machine learning, the trained model being for performing a process to automatically inspect the number of objects accommodated inside a container. The method involves causing a device for generating the trained model to execute: a step for inputting model data in which the shapes of the container and the objects are expressed using images; a step for creating a plurality of unit arranged bodies, in which a plurality of objects are arranged in a discretionary manner, by using the model data, and arranging the unit arranged bodies in a discretionary manner inside a container area that corresponds to the container, thereby creating shape image data pertaining to the container in which the objects are accommodated at a discretionary density; and a step for applying, to the shape image data, a process for imparting the actual textures of the container and the objects, and creating teaching image data to be used when constructing the trained model.

title: INFERENCE DEVICE, INFERENCE METHOD, LEARNING DEVICE, LEARNING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: A learning device (1) according to the present disclosure is provided with a combined mathematical model (140) that is capable of machine learning, the learning device (1) learning a dataset of a target domain from a dataset of an original domain for teaching, wherein a preliminary-stage unit of the combined mathematical model (140): generates a plurality of low-level feature maps from inputted image data; compares the low-level feature maps of datasets, among the image data, that belong to the same type of learning subject with respect to the original domain and the target domain; calculates a domain shared feature quantity; and calculates domain mitigation learning information with respect to the space of each of {1} color, {2} luminance, {3} low-frequency components, and {4} high-frequency components within the domain shared feature quantity.

title: An electronic podium system that performs AI control technology in cloud environment and includes a self-sterilization function
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an electronic teaching desk, which includes a video camera for continuously photographing and storing the motion of a user for each unit time and a voice sensor for recognizing the voice of the user, comprising: a microphone array for receiving voice signals through the voice sensor from the user, separating sound and canceling noise; a voice recognition engine for receiving the voice signals, which are analog signal having noise removed therefrom, from the microphone array and converting the same into digital data, which are text signals; a database for repeatedly storing the received voice signals and converted text signals; a command interpretation part for receiving the converted text signals from the speech recognition engine and interpreting the same as a command through machine learning using the database; and a control part for performing a query search or internal/external control functions with an external cloud service according to the interpreted command, wherein the voice recognition engine includes a deep learning-based correction timing determining software for determining the correction timing of the voice signals inputted from the user.

title: Prediction model construction method based on MRI image
abstract_text: The invention provides a prediction model construction method based on an MRI image. The prediction model construction method comprises the following steps: constructing a visual matrix model; constructing an influence factor library; obtaining target matrix parameter information and target focus parameter information through the MRI image information; correcting the matrix model through target matrix parameter information, and obtaining a target matrix correction model after associating an influence factor library; obtaining characteristic factors of a target focus according to the target focus parameter information and constructing a target focus model; and associating a target lesion model with the target matrix correction model, and visually displaying the time dimension process of the target lesion through the target matrix correction model according to the feature factors of the target lesion. The prediction model is constructed through the MRI image and deep learning, visual display and operation are performed in the prediction model through MRI image data information and the like of the target, visual demonstration and observation understanding of the teaching process are facilitated, and the method has the advantages of being high in intuition and convenient to use.

title: Deep learning-based teacher-machine-student-oriented teaching effect evaluation method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher-machine-student oriented teaching effect evaluation method and system based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of teaching management information. Comprising the following steps: respectively extracting activity features of teachers and students in a classroom learning process from video data by adopting a video feature extraction network model; respectively extracting activity characteristics of teachers, students and tutoring machines in the online learning process from the text data by adopting a language model; adopting a voice feature extraction network model to extract teacher-student activity features of teacher-student dialogue, teacher-machine dialogue, life dialogue and life dialogue processes from the audio data; and fusing various characteristics to obtain a teaching effect evaluation index. According to the method, teacher-machine-student is taken as an object, education effect evaluation is carried out from a composite subject degree, video, text and audio multi-source data are comprehensively considered, deep learning is adopted to extract features and fuse the features, complete level evaluation indexes are obtained from different aspects, and closed-loop feedback and capability enhancement of composite subject cognition are realized.

title: POSITION COORDINATE DETECTION DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: In order to enable teaching data to be created easily and position coordinates to be detected with high reliability, this position coordinate detection device is constituted by comprising: a deep learning model having been trained using training image data in which the position coordinate to be detected is specified and teaching image data in which a pixel group exhibiting a shape independent of the subject of the training image data is disposed at a position relative to the position coordinate to be detected; a position coordinate calculation unit for calculating a position coordinate using the inference image data outputted from the deep learning model; and a reliability calculation unit for calculating reliability using the global pixel group information of the inference image data outputted from the deep learning model.

title: Intelligent programming learning system and learning method based on multi-modal deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent programming learning system and method based on multi-modal deep learning, and an intelligent classroom, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the learning information of a target programming learner in a learning process in an intelligent learning environment, and obtaining the learning evaluation of the target programming learner according to the learning information; the multi-modal features including the facial expression features and the learning behavior features of the programming learner are obtained, the learning state of the target programming learner is obtained according to the multi-modal features, finally, a teaching evaluation result is obtained according to the learning state obtained through the learning evaluation and the multi-modal features, and a corresponding programming learning strategy is determined. Compared with the prior art, the multi-modal evaluation mode is adopted, the real learning state of a programming learner is obtained according to the facial expression and the learning behavior of the programming learner, the learning evaluation and the learning state are combined, an accurate and perfect programming teaching evaluation system is established, a targeted programming learning strategy is formulated, programming personalized guidance is achieved, and the programming teaching efficiency is improved. Precise teaching of teachers is promoted, and the programming ability of programming learners is practically improved.

title: Teaching application system based on artificial intelligence
inventor_name: OTHER INVENTORS HAVE WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE MENTIONED
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching application system based on artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching systems, and is used for solving the technical problems that a user cannot conveniently and intuitively know classification and sorting of course resources, auditing of teaching resources uploaded by the user is tedious, and selectivity and creation enthusiasm of the user to the teaching resources need to be improved. According to the method, the hierarchical integration information of the education and teaching resources is subjected to hierarchical integration analysis, so that a user can intuitively know the classification and sorting of the course resources; by performing multi-dimensional auditing analysis on education and teaching resources and teaching solution resources uploaded by a user, whether the resources are worthy of being adopted or not is comprehensively judged, and the workload of subsequent resource processing is reduced; after the education and teaching resource format packet is integrated into the three-level course resource subset, the selectivity of the user is increased; a statistical analysis mode is convenient for the user to know income creation and influence of the uploaded resources, and the enthusiasm of resource creation of the user is stimulated.

title: Intelligent cupboard based on image recognition and cupboard intelligent prompting method
applicants: GUANGDONG HAIXIN INTELLIGENT KITCHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to artificial intelligence and Internet of Things technologies, and provides an intelligent cupboard based on image recognition and an intelligent cupboard prompting method, which are applied to an intelligent cupboard. The intelligent cabinet at least comprises a cabinet body, a gas stove, an intelligent smoke exhaust ventilator, a camera, a display screen and a host, wherein the gas stove and the intelligent smoke exhaust ventilator are arranged on the cabinet body; the camera is arranged on the cabinet body or the intelligent smoke exhaust ventilator; the display screen is arranged on the cabinet body or the intelligent smoke exhaust ventilator; the host intelligently recommends the article combination result through the selected article image shot by the camera, and obtains the corresponding processing teaching audio and video data after obtaining the target article combination from the article combination result according to the screening strategy, and the user can efficiently obtain cooking prompt information based on checking the processing teaching audio and video data. It is not needed to check pictures on the display screen before actual operation for cooking.

title: Digital art teaching system for children
abstract_text: The invention discloses a child digital art teaching system, which comprises a sub-lens design module, a 3D modeling module, an editing dubbing module, a one-key imaging module and a teaching decomposition module, and is characterized in that the sub-lens design module, the 3D modeling module, the editing dubbing module, the one-key imaging module and the teaching decomposition module are in data communication in sequence. Compared with the prior art, the method has the following advantages that through AI digital art, the innovative art is statically embodied and conveniently and dynamically displayed, the single thinking education of traditional art is broken, the animation thinking, compiled thinking, video production thinking and digital development thinking of children are inspired in multiple dimensions, the children have systematic understanding on the art, the children are cultivated to apply the art more widely, and the interestingness of the children is improved. Good popularization prospects and markets are realized.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching auxiliary robot which structurally comprises an adjusting device, a power switch, a robot body, a robot head, a voice player, a touch control screen, a rotating disc and a manipulator. When the robot is used, a mounting seat is fixedly connected to a frame body, and the position of the robot body is adjusted through cooperation of moving wheels and the frame body; after the limiting assembly is adjusted to the corresponding position, the limiting assembly moves downwards, air in the limiting assembly is pumped out through the vacuum air pump, so that the limiting assembly can be tightly attached to the table top, and then the extension assembly extends outwards to form a support to be separated between the machine body and the child; therefore, the distance between the child and the touch control screen can be kept at a relatively healthy distance.

title: Classroom interaction system based on AI technology
applicants: ZHUOSHI FUTURE BEIJING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI technology-based classroom interaction system, which comprises a teacher-side PC, an auxiliary teaching device and a plurality of student-side tablet computers, and is characterized in that the teacher-side PC is provided with an interaction platform system, and the interaction platform system comprises a multimedia teaching module, a student behavior monitoring module, a private reminding module and an auxiliary question and answer module. The auxiliary teaching equipment comprises a second camera, and the second camera is used for collecting behavior action videos of students in the class process; according to the invention, through the arrangement of the student behavior monitoring module, the student behavior application recorded by the first camera can be extracted, analyzed and identified, the students who are not authenticated to listen to the class can be marked on the interface of the teacher end PC, and the teacher can send the prompt pop-up window to the student end tablet corresponding to the students on the PC. Therefore, the student is reminded of carefully attending the class without being known by other students, so that negative effects on the psychologically fragile student are avoided.

title: QUALITY EVALUATION DEVICE AND INSPECTION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
abstract_text: This quality evaluation device comprising: a non-defective image acquisition unit which acquires a non-defective image that is an inspection image determined as non-defective in an inspection process using a first trained learning apparatus generated by machine-learning with, as learning data, an inspection image generated by capturing an image of a subject to be inspected and, as teaching data, inspection results; a quality change evaluation unit which evaluates a change in quality of the subject to be inspected; and a quality evaluation information generation unit which generates quality evaluation information including the results of the evaluation.

title: Online teaching management method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an online teaching management method and system based on artificial intelligence, which are used for improving the recognition accuracy of the learning state of students and further improving the learning interest of courses. The method comprises the following steps: performing posture recognition, facial emotion recognition and intonation analysis of a target user on a learning state video, and performing feature comprehensive analysis on a posture recognition result, a facial emotion recognition result and an intonation analysis result according to a target learning environment factor to obtain a video analysis result; performing code running test and code quality analysis on the after-class code practice data to obtain a code quality analysis result; according to the video analysis result, the code quality analysis result and the current course evaluation data, course learning scheme adjustment is carried out on the target user, a target course learning scheme is obtained, and the target course learning scheme comprises a course arrangement progress and a course learning target.

title: Artificial intelligence online teaching method and system
applicants: PENGCHENG GONGJIANG JIANGSU INFORMATION TECH RESEARCH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computer data processing, in particular to an artificial intelligence online teaching method and system.The difficulty coefficient of a question relative to a user is evaluated by obtaining the knowledge point condition involved in the question in online teaching test paper content and the mastering condition of the user for each knowledge point; the score corresponding to the question is adjusted according to the difficulty coefficient of the question, the total score of the test paper is kept unchanged, the question answering time corresponding to the question is adjusted according to the difficulty coefficient of the question, the total question answering time of the test paper is kept unchanged, and when the difficulty of the question is higher, smaller motivation and more question answering time are provided for a user, so that the difficulty is reduced, and the user experience is improved. The motivation motivation is reduced, the difficulty of exercise doing is adapted to the motivation level, when the difficulty of the exercise doing is lower, the exercise doing time is properly shortened, the task difficulty is improved, the stronger motivation motivation is provided, a good motivation effect is achieved on learning of the user, the possibility of generating negative emotion of the user is reduced, and the learning effect is improved.

title: Medical education cooperation system based on objectification of inspection diagnosis of traditional Chinese medicine
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of medical treatment and education, in particular to a medical education cooperation system based on objectification of inspection diagnosis of traditional Chinese medicine, and in a mode of newly inputting a medical record of a patient, the system comprises a data storage module used for storing face and tongue pictures and inquiry information of a subject; the prediction model is a pre-trained convolutional neural network and is used for inputting the face and tongue picture and inquiry information and outputting a prediction result; the prediction result comprises a recognition result of the face region and a classification result of face and tongue picture objective characteristics, traditional Chinese medicine physique and traditional Chinese medicine syndrome types; the student evaluation module is used for inputting answer results and feeding back correction errors by students and evaluating the answer results by teachers; and the model upgrading module is used for carrying out expert correction on the feedback correction error, then returning the feedback correction error to the prediction model and triggering the prediction model to carry out optimization training. Traditional Chinese medicine experience is output in a modeled mode and combined with a deep learning algorithm to be used for traditional Chinese medicine clinic and teaching and finally serve traditional Chinese medicine experience scientific explanation.

title: Multi-source image fusion method under intelligent teaching space
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-source image fusion method under an intelligent teaching space, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining a multi-source image of a teaching space, and enabling the multi-source image to shoot a student seat region of the teaching space in a crossing and complete manner; s2, preprocessing the obtained multi-source image, and removing positions which do not contain seats and have no same position points in the multi-source image; s3, carrying out image feature point extraction on the multi-source image processed in the step S2; s4, performing image registration on the multi-source image according to the extracted image feature points; and S5, carrying out image splicing fusion on the multi-source image after image registration to obtain a fused image. According to the method, repeated data interference between non-homologous images after identification can be effectively reduced, and the requirement of artificial intelligence computing resources is greatly reduced, so that classroom teaching quality analysis is easier and more successful.

title: Teaching platform system based on AI technology
applicants: ZHUOSHI FUTURE BEIJING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching platform system based on AI technology, comprising a student terminal and a teacher terminal which are in communication connection with the teaching platform system, and the teaching platform system is also in communication connection with a database. The teaching platform system comprises an account management module, a self-service sign-in module, a course recording module, a course on-demand module, an online course evaluation module, a mutual aid question and answer module and a behavior recognition module; through the arrangement of the mutual aid question and answer module, students can choose to upload questions in different learning aspects in an anonymous mode after logging in the teaching platform system through accounts, other students can answer the questions, and teachers check and publish the questions, so that the teaching platform system is convenient to use. According to the method, the enthusiasm of students to participate in learning in after-class time is effectively improved, and the enthusiasm of students who make correct answers and are accepted can be sent to students who make correct answers through the setting of the point rewards, so that the enthusiasm of students who often help each other to answer questions and answer questions for others is further improved.

title: Portable terminal teaching and training system based on AR glasses
abstract_text: The invention provides a portable terminal teaching and training system based on AR glasses, which can realize synchronous display and control of an intelligent terminal and augmented reality, supports an internet mode and can be suitable for an outdoor environment. In order to solve the problem that unit modules with similar background and similar appearance characteristics of equipment are difficult to identify under the complex use condition of an external field, domestic split type AR binocular glasses with edge calculation processing capacity are adopted, the problem of intelligent equipment identification in the outdoor environment is solved by adopting deep learning, a client identification design method is adopted, and the equipment identification efficiency is improved. According to the invention, a split type integrated architecture mode of combining the edge calculation processing capability of the domestic augmented reality glasses and the intelligent terminal and the augmented reality glasses is established, synchronous display and control of the intelligent terminal and the augmented reality glasses are realized, and training can be effectively carried out under the condition of no internet connection.

title: Profile measurement and recognition system for robot welding workpiece
applicants: CHONGQING CHUANGYU INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a contour measurement and recognition system for a robot welding workpiece. The contour measurement and recognition system comprises the following steps that (1) an image is collected and preprocessed; (2) identifying a welding seam through a visual sensor and a laser sensor; (3) calculating the position coordinates of the key points; (4) performing image processing on the weld seam image of the workpiece to be welded to form weld seam teaching information; and (5) robot automatic path planning. Spatial position coordinates of key point positions are processed into robot teaching information through the upper computer, the tail end of a welding gun of the robot is guided to move to a to-be-welded position, the welding robot has the to-be-welded workpiece spatial position self-adaptive capacity, welding robot machine vision intelligent welding seam locating is achieved, and the welding efficiency is improved. A visual identification and positioning algorithm based on a deep learning model is established, a boundary pixel detection algorithm is combined, and a double-camera visual system is adopted to realize detection, identification and accurate positioning of a welding workpiece and a welding seam track.

title: Interaction system based on artificial intelligence education
applicants: WUHAN CENXI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education interaction system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the education interaction system comprises a cloud artificial intelligence server, an identification port, a teaching demonstration terminal and a power supply starting terminal, and the teaching demonstration terminal keeps real-time data intercommunication with the cloud artificial intelligence server, the identification port and the power supply starting terminal through the Internet. The cloud artificial intelligence server, the identification port, the teaching demonstration terminal and the power supply starting terminal are arranged to form a complete education interaction system, starting is performed through the power supply starting terminal during use, dual information identification is performed on input information and current information of an operator, the identification efficiency and accuracy are improved, and the user experience is improved. According to the system and the method, system process interaction request instruction database comparison, learning analysis, comparison reasoning, language processing and demonstration operation are carried out, and the purpose of optimal interaction effect is achieved, so that the overall operation process is shortened, the overall working efficiency is improved, and the requirements during use are met.

title: Education and teaching device based on artificial intelligence and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses an education and teaching device based on artificial intelligence and a use method thereof, the education and teaching device comprises a frame body, the frame body comprises a projection screen and a writing board, and the upper end of the frame body is connected with a camera; a groove is formed in the frame body, the writing board is fixedly connected with a fixed plate, the fixed plate is arranged in the groove in a sliding mode, a movable hook is rotationally connected into the groove, a sliding groove is formed in the fixed plate, and the movable hook is arranged in the sliding groove in a sliding mode; the frame body is connected with a proximity switch, and the writing board is connected with an induction metal sheet matched with the proximity switch. A student screen arranged in the vertical direction is slidably connected into the desk, the student screen further comprises a voice recognition mechanism, the student screen is connected with a lifting mechanism, and in the initial state, the upper surface of the student screen is lower than or equal to the upper surface of the desk. The method is convenient to operate, teaching interaction between students and teachers can be effectively enhanced, the teachers can adjust the teaching progress and the teaching method in time, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Educational teaching aid for improving color identification ability of children
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational teaching aid for improving the color identification ability of children, and the teaching aid comprises a teaching aid packaging shell which is provided with an intelligent color distinguishing mechanism for automatic color identification learning and an interesting splicing assembly for color identification and classified practice. The intelligent color distinguishing mechanism comprises a machine body rear cover fixed on the inner side of the teaching aid packaging shell and a sensing end part used for color recognition. The intelligent color distinguishing mechanism is used for active learning, the interesting splicing assembly is used for learning in the game process, the demonstration cylinder and the guiding component are used for experimental deep learning, the color distinguishing ability of children is improved, the use method is simple, the learning interest of the children is improved, the learning impression is deepened, the learning effect is greatly improved, and the development of the children is facilitated. The intelligent color distinguishing mechanism can achieve self-learning and is high in intelligence, when the interesting splicing assembly is used, error correction is achieved through the device, the observation ability of children is refined, interestingness is achieved, and the device can be conveniently popularized in the children market.

title: Bionic eye medical robot for cervical vertebra rehabilitation and rehabilitation evaluation method
abstract_text: The bionic eye medical robot comprises a robot body, and the robot body is provided with a seven-degree-of-freedom cervical vertebra operation teaching motion control module, a man-machine interaction voice module, a patient motion sensing module, a cloud database system and a robot visualization module. The robot body is used for carrying out human-simulated actions and carrying out interactive perception, analysis and evaluation on actions in the cervical vertebra exercise process of a patient through a video and audio multi-mode artificial intelligence algorithm, and the cervical spondylosis patient is assisted to obtain standardized exercise treatment and log records. Compared with the prior art, the cervical spondylosis rehabilitation training device has the advantages that the cervical spondylosis patient is helped to obtain good exercise treatment, the labor cost of rehabilitation exercise of the cervical spondylosis patient is reduced, and the safety and stability of cervical spondylosis rehabilitation exercise are guaranteed.

title: Children puzzle game system based on somatosensory interaction technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children puzzle game system based on a somatosensory interaction technology. The children puzzle game system comprises a somatosensory sensor, a computer processing system, a memory, an artificial intelligence voice recognition system, a display and a loudspeaker box, the somatosensory sensor is used for sensing perception information of a human body and inputting the perception information into the computer processing system; the computer processing system is used for receiving the sensing information and sending the sensing information and a processing result to the display and the sound box, the display is used for receiving and displaying a video signal, and the sound box is used for receiving and playing an audio signal; the memory is used for storing a computer control program, a control model, a control algorithm and a database; and the artificial intelligence voice recognition system is used for performing voice recognition, and the computer processing system performs selection or executes an operation command according to the voice recognition content. The interactive technology is utilized, the potential intelligence of children is excavated, teaching is achieved through lively activities, the user experience is improved, the positive exercise effect is achieved for the user, and certain practicability is achieved.

title: Method for constructing multi-modal data set in real scene
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for constructing a multi-modal data set in a real scene. The method comprises the following steps of: constructing a mousse teaching video into a data set comprising three modals, namely an audio mode, an image mode and a video mode; the method uses a multi-task convolutional neural network to carry out face detection, uses FaceNet to extract speaker features and construct a face library, gradually expands and perfects the face library in a video scanning process, classifies the video by calculating the Euclidean distance between the face intercepted by the video and the face in the face library, and improves the face recognition efficiency. And in combination with ffmpeg, batch automatic video classification and segmentation are completed, and a data set with speaker face visual information and speaker sound information at the same time is constructed. According to the method, the audio diversity and scene authenticity of the data set are ensured by collecting the mousse network teaching video, and the generalization performance of an audio-related deep learning model can be trained; and the full-automatic batch processing method improves the construction efficiency of the multi-modal data set.

title: Liquid metal circuit manufacturing board recoverer
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a liquid metal circuit manufacturing board recoverer. The liquid metal circuit manufacturing board recoverer is characterized in that the liquid metal circuit manufacturing board recoverer is arranged on a substrate; the characteristic that the temperature of high-performance liquid metal used by the liquid metal 3D handwriting pen can be adjusted and controlled in the forming process is utilized, a flow guide groove is formed in the surface of a metal heat conduction plate, and the liquid metal is melted through a heating unit, then flows into a recycling groove through the flow guide groove and then enters a liquid metal ink recycling box through a collecting opening to be stored; the teaching aid is simple in structure and efficient, liquid metal is recycled and reused, and the teaching aid is formed in cooperation with a liquid metal 3D handwriting pen, a single-chip microcomputer and the like. The device is used for teaching of circuit experiments, circuit courses, artificial intelligence design courses and the like in middle and primary schools and universities and colleges. The system is used for teenagers to learn electrical basic theoretical knowledge, cultivate artificial intelligence design thinking and practical problem solving ability, and improve scientific qualities of students such as creation consciousness and innovation ability. And the device can be used as a maker tool.

title: Method for analyzing classroom interaction behaviors based on audio and video
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for analyzing classroom interaction behaviors based on audios and videos, and the method comprises the following steps: recording audio data through a recording device in a classroom, carrying out the processing through a speaker segmentation clustering algorithm, obtaining a classroom speaker change sequence, and analyzing the sequence change to obtain speech classroom interaction behaviors; video data on and off a platform is collected through a camera in a classroom, position information of teachers and students is obtained through a self-built face detection network FDN and a human body standing posture recognition network, and non-speech class classroom interaction sequence behaviors are obtained through auxiliary analysis with an audio speaker sequence. The problems that an existing classroom interaction behavior analysis method cannot make full use of classroom data, feedback lags and the like are solved, automatic classroom interaction behavior analysis is achieved through the deep learning technology, the teaching situation can be fed back timely and objectively, and development of teaching activities is effectively promoted.

title: Campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of education, and particularly relates to a campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence. Comprising a comprehensive management sub-platform, a teaching management sub-platform, a course practice sub-platform, an education big data analysis sub-platform, an artificial intelligence sub-platform, a course resource sub-platform, a data resource management sub-platform, a student behavior management sub-platform, a teaching quality evaluation sub-platform and a teacher archive management sub-platform. The beneficial effects of the invention are that a plurality of problems faced by the current education industry are effectively solved by using current new-generation information technologies such as cloud computing, big data analysis, Internet of Things and artificial intelligence, and the establishment of the platform will promote the advantages of students, parents, teachers and schools to develop in a balanced manner to form a smart campus ecological system; platform construction is uniform, other independent application construction resources are reduced, and expenditures in all aspects of manpower, material resources and financial resources are saved; and teaching application integration can be realized, and a unified and college operation and maintenance service system is provided.

title: Deep learning-based electrical and electronic experiment teaching intelligent learning condition evaluation system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an electrical and electronic experiment teaching intelligent learning condition evaluation system and method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: completing the construction of a learning condition evaluation model based on a deep learning algorithm through collecting the experimental operation track information of operating experimental instruments, equipment and the like in the experiment process of students; and the condition of the experiment operation process of the student is analyzed by utilizing the learning condition evaluation model, and an objective and scientific learning condition evaluation result for experiment teaching is obtained. The system can more scientifically evaluate experiment teaching results of students and adjust teaching contents and methods in time according to the evaluation results, thereby improving experiment teaching quality.

title: Online class patrol supervision system and method based on AI class
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online class patrol supervision system and method based on an AI class, and relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching management. The system comprises an AI auxiliary class patrol module which is used for accessing an AI classroom main body, obtaining and analyzing face and behavior information of personnel in a classroom based on the AI classroom main body, and generating classroom abnormity analysis data; the manual online course patrol module is used for acquiring and uploading teaching condition information in the corresponding classroom through the monitoring terminal and inputting course patrol evaluation information of a course patrol person; and the course patrol analysis module is used for generating a course patrol report according to the course patrol evaluation information of the course patrol personnel. According to the invention, analysis and identification can be carried out according to teacher teaching and student attending conditions, classroom problems can be found in time, and effective and comprehensive class patrol supervision is realized.

title: Intelligent teaching method and system for air traffic control simulation training
applicants: NO 15 INSTITUTE OF CHINA ELECTRONICS TECH GROUP CORPORATION
abstract_text: The invention provides an air traffic control simulation training intelligent teaching method and system. The method comprises the steps of extracting important control assessment knowledge points according to teaching requirements, performing knowledge point association marking on training scenarios, and establishing a basic control knowledge graph, namely a Q matrix, so that digitization and quantification of the subjective assessment method are realized, and a more powerful objective basis is provided for assessment. In order to realize 1-to-1 personalized teaching and intellectual test question recommendation, research results of artificial intelligence in the education field are referred, a cognitive diagnosis method is adopted to carry out cognitive diagnosis analysis on students, and a cognitive model of the students is established. Finally, the invention provides a test question recommendation method, which combines the cognitive model of the student and the knowledge graph in the database to predict the score condition of the student, and performs reasonable test question recommendation based on score prediction.

title: Infant massage manipulation data acquisition device and automatic evaluation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an infant massage manipulation data acquisition device and an automatic evaluation system, and relates to the field of infant massage, the infant massage manipulation data acquisition device comprises a massage plate, a massage dummy is placed outside the massage plate, a support frame is mounted outside the massage plate, a display screen is mounted outside the massage plate, and a processing host is mounted on one side, away from the massage dummy, of the massage plate. A transmission line is installed outside the massage dummy, one end, away from the massage dummy, of the transmission line is connected with a processing host, an optical fiber sensor is installed inside the massage dummy, deep learning is performed on received data through a deep learning module, and infant massage manipulation data and a motion path are introduced as learning references. According to the technical scheme, an infant manipulation and massage judgment model is established, manipulation and massage actions are objectively scored through the manipulation and massage judgment module, and meanwhile, the teaching module transmits problems and solutions existing in manipulation during massage to the display screen to be displayed, so that a manipulation and massage student can learn conveniently.

title: Translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses a translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching, and the device comprises a supporting platform, a teaching screen which is fixed on the supporting platform, and is vertically arranged; the practice screen is placed on the supporting table on the front side of the display surface of the teaching screen, and the practice screen is horizontally arranged; the monitoring assembly is arranged on the teaching screen; and the writing assembly is arranged on the supporting table. According to the invention, the spherical camera can be conveniently driven to rotate at will within a certain range by setting the monitoring group, so that the learning state of a learner can be monitored, and the situation that the learner is located outside a monitoring picture, so that a teacher cannot observe the state of the learner is avoided; through the writing assembly, winding of a connecting rope by a winding wheel can be controlled, so that the time of using a writing pen by a person is controlled, and then the writing time of a learner can be conveniently controlled when the learner performs a test.

title: Garbage classification intelligent teaching aid, control method thereof and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent teaching aids, and particularly discloses a garbage classification intelligent teaching aid, a control method thereof and a medium, and the garbage classification intelligent teaching aid comprises an omnidirectional motion chassis, a garbage hopper, an electric baffle plate, an infrared trigger switch, a distance measuring sensor, a camera, a microphone, a loudspeaker and a control circuit. The control circuit comprises a motion control module, an image recognition module and an intelligent response module. The sensing technology, image recognition, mechanical control and intelligent voice are integrated, the classroom teaching aid and the control method of the classroom teaching aid in the aspects of the artificial intelligence technology and environmental consciousness of primary and secondary school students are provided, the students are familiar with the artificial intelligence technology, learning and understanding of garbage classification environmental protection knowledge of the students are enhanced, interactivity is high, and the teaching aid is worthy of popularization and application. And popularization and classroom research, interesting competition and teaching application are facilitated.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM
abstract_text: The invention relates to an information processing method, an information processing apparatus, and a computer program. Provided is a technique capable of knowing a discrimination basis for category discrimination using a machine learning model. The category discrimination method includes: (a) preparing, for each of the one or more categories, a known characteristic spectrum group obtained from an output of a specific layer among the plurality of vector neuron layers when the plurality of pieces of teaching data are input into the machine learning model; and (b) performing category discrimination processing of the discriminated data using the machine learning model and the known characteristic spectrum group. The step (b) includes: (b1) calculating a characteristic spectrum from the output of the specific layer on the basis of the input of the discriminated data into the machine learning model; (b2) calculating the similarity between the characteristic spectrum and known characteristic spectrum groups respectively related to a plurality of categories; (b3) according to the similarity, creating an explanatory statement for the category discrimination result of the discriminated data; and (b4) outputting the explanatory statement.

title: Physical exercise teaching device adopting multi-view high-speed camera and human body posture recognition
applicants: CAPITAL UNIV OF PHYSICAL EDUCATION AND SPORTS
abstract_text: The invention discloses a physical exercise teaching device adopting a multi-view high-speed camera and human body posture recognition, which is characterized in that firstly, the high-speed camera is used for carrying out multi-angle shooting on demonstration actions of a physical education teacher, and a shot video is stored in a computer; then, human body key point recognition is carried out on the pictures at different angles through a human body posture recognition algorithm based on deep learning, and the recognized human body key points are marked in the pictures; and then, the picture with the key points of the human body is played in a video slow playing mode, so that students can more intuitively understand the detailed process of the motion, and the understanding and experience of the students on the motion process are deepened. The teacher explains the essentials of the actions in combination with the key point information of the human body and takes the essentials as reference technical indexes for measuring the quality of the actions. According to the method, abstract physical exercises are embodied and visualized, great convenience is brought to physical education teachers and students, and the method has important and profound significance for improving the national physical education science and technology level.

title: Medical image processing method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PEKING UNION MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL CAMS
abstract_text: The invention relates to a medical image processing method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the field of medical images. Firstly, medical image information is obtained from a preset knowledge base according to a received operation instruction, the medical image information comprises a medical image and a prediction diagnosis result corresponding to the medical image, and the prediction diagnosis result is a diagnosis result obtained after the medical image is input into a pre-trained image classification model; generating target image information according to the operation instruction and the medical image information; and finally displaying the target image information. The prediction diagnosis result of the medical image is obtained through the artificial intelligence technology, the stored medical image and the corresponding prediction diagnosis result are used for the medical imaging teaching task, massive image information of a real case is fully utilized, an intelligent man-machine interaction teaching platform is provided, and the teaching effect of medical imaging teaching is improved.

title: Protective machine learning model device based on Internet of Things
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of learning teaching aids, and discloses a protective machine learning model device based on the Internet of Things, which comprises a supporting seat, and a fixed supporting plate is arranged at the top end of the supporting seat; the adjusting structure is arranged at one end of the fixed supporting plate, the adjusting structure comprises a second motor, and the second motor is connected with the fixed supporting plate; the movable structure is arranged at one end of the adjusting structure, the movable structure comprises a connecting shaft, and the connecting shaft is connected with the adjusting structure; the top end of the movable structure is connected with a supporting back plate, and the top end of the supporting back plate is connected with the massage structure; and the bottom end of the supporting seat is connected with the moving structure, and the moving structure comprises a connecting clamping plate. The chair has the beneficial effects that the sitting posture of the backrest can be conveniently adjusted according to the sitting posture of a user through the matching of the adjusting structure, the movable structure and the supporting back plate, the sitting posture is conveniently corrected, and the correct sitting posture is healthier.

title: Telecturer course selecting and reporting method, device and equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a lecturer course selecting and reporting method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining to-be-designed course information from a course design instruction when the course design instruction is received, the to-be-designed course information comprises a target domain label used for representing a knowledge domain corresponding to the to-be-designed course; obtaining a knowledge point tag set and a learning object tag set belonging to the target domain tag; generating an alternative course information set according to the target domain label, the knowledge point label set and the learning object label set; obtaining a predicted teaching intention of each lecturer for each piece of alternative course information in the alternative course information set through a pre-trained course prediction model, and calculating a report selection probability of each piece of alternative course information according to each predicted teaching intention; and selecting target course information from the alternative course information set according to the newspaper selection probability, and issuing the target course information to each lecturer for each lecturer to select newspaper.

title: Mathematical course knowledge graph automatic construction method and system based on textbook
applicants: BEIJING UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching material-based mathematical course knowledge graph automatic construction method and system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and knowledge engineering. Comprising a preprocessing module used for preprocessing teaching materials; the curriculum term set construction module is used for constructing a curriculum term set according to the preprocessed textbook; the co-occurrence relation extraction module is used for extracting co-occurrence relations among terms in the textbook; the training data generation module is used for generating basic relationship category training data according to a co-occurrence relationship among terms in a teaching material and a predefined basic relationship category among mathematical course terms; the relation set construction module is used for constructing a relation set; the course knowledge graph construction module is used for constructing a course knowledge graph. According to the method, efficient and automatic construction of the mathematical course knowledge graph based on the textbook in a low-resource scene can be realized by virtue of an existing open source knowledge base.

title: PREDICTION METHOD FOR CROSS SECTIONAL SHAPE OF TIRE AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR TIRE
abstract_text: To provide a prediction method that can more accurately predict a cross sectional shape of a tire that is manufactured by vulcanizing a green tire, using design specification data of the green tire and cross sectional shape data of a molding surface of a mold to be used, and a manufacturing method for a tire utilizing the prediction method.SOLUTION: A prediction model PM, which is created by subjecting design specification data D1 including cross section shapes of green tires G, cross sectional shape data D2 on a molding surface 7 of a mold 6 and cross section image data D3 on a tire T manufactured by vulcanizing a number of green tires G whose design specification data D1 are different using the mold 6, as teaching data, to machine learning, is stored in a calculation device 2; and the design specification data D1 on green tires Ga to be predicted and the cross sectional shape data D2 on the molding surface 7 are substituted in the prediction model PM and are subjected to calculation processing, so as to predict a cross sectional shape of a target tire Ta that is manufactured by vulcanizing the green tires Ga using the mold 6.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: PREDICTION METHOD FOR CROSS SECTIONAL SHAPE OF TIRE AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR TIRE
abstract_text: To provide a prediction method that can more accurately predict a cross sectional shape of a tire manufactured by vulcanizing a green tire, using data on a cross sectional shape the green tire and data on a cross sectional shape a molding surface of a mold to be used, and a manufacturing method for a tire utilizing the prediction method.SOLUTION: A prediction model PM, which is created by subjecting tire specification data D1 including a cross section shape of green tires G, cross sectional shape data D2 on a molding surface 7 of a mold 6 and cross section image data D3 on a tire T manufactured by vulcanizing a number of green tires G whose tire specification data D1 are different using the mold 6, as teaching data, to machine learning, is stored in a calculation device 2; and the tire specification data D1 on green tires Ga to be predicted and the cross sectional shape data D2 on the molding surface 7 are substituted in the prediction model PM and are subjected to calculation processing, so as to predict a cross sectional shape of a target tire Ta that is manufactured by vulcanizing the green tires Ga using the mold 6.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: SIGNAL PROCESSING DEVICE, SIGNAL PROCESSING SYSTEM, AND SIGNAL PROCESSING PROGRAM
abstract_text: An apparatus yields signals that are equivalent to ECG signals and allow determination of a heartbeat interval or heart rate from bio-vibration signals including vibrations derived from heartbeats.An ECG meter 30 acquires ECG signals of a sample, and a piezoelectric sensor 40 acquires bio-vibration signals of the sample simultaneously. The bio-vibration signals include beating vibration signals derived from heartbeats. A learning unit 13 of a prediction modeling apparatus 10 establishes a prediction model 24 by machine learning in which ECG signals are used as teaching data, and model input signals obtained by performing a specified processing on the bio-vibration signals are input. The learning unit 13 delivers the prediction model 24 to a prediction unit 23 of a signal processing apparatus 20. The prediction model 24 predicts and outputs pECG signals upon input of model input signals obtained by performing a specified processing on bio-vibration signals acquired from a subject under prediction with a piezoelectric sensor 40.

title: MOTION CONTROL DATA GENERATION DEVICE AND MOTION CONTROL DATA GENERATION METHOD FOR ROBOT
abstract_text: To reduce a work time loss with limited teaching time and labor while moving an end effector in a work section at a fixed speed.SOLUTION: A control device 13 generates motion control data of a painting robot 10 for painting an object 30 to be painted while moving a painting gun 11F (end effector) in a spraying section (from start point Ai to end point Bi) at a fixed speed V1. A control unit 14 calculates, as a speed-reduction distance D, a distance of the painting gun 11F to reach a maximum circle speed V2 when the painting gun 11F moving at the fixed speed V1 is reduced in speed at maximum acceleration A, and calculates a position away from a speed-reduction start position Gi by the speed-reduction distance D in a moving direction as a speed-reduction end position Ei of the painting gun 11F.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: Calibration of a Machine Learning Confidence Score
abstract_text: A unique user interface for improving machine learning algorithms is described herein. The user interface comprises an icon with multiple visual indicators displaying the machine learning confidence score. When a mouse hovers over the icon, a set of icons are displayed to accept the teaching user's input. In addition, the words that drove the machine learning confidence score are highlighted with formatting so that the teaching user can understand what drove the machine learning confidence score.

title: Intelligent editing method and system for teaching video, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent editing method and system for a teaching video, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an original video recorded based on a teaching scene; performing screening processing on the original video to obtain a selected video; acquiring voice content in the original video, performing voice recognition on the voice content to obtain teaching content, and performing natural language processing on the teaching content to obtain important copywriting in the teaching process; performing framing processing on the selected video to obtain a plurality of candidate video frames, and performing screening in the plurality of candidate video frames according to the important copywriting to obtain important video frames corresponding to the important copywriting; and recombining the important video frames to obtain and output an intelligent editing result. According to the invention, intelligent and efficient editing of the original video is realized, the output intelligent editing result does not contain redundant content, and the teaching efficiency can be improved.

title: Generalization-enhanced minority dance video action segmentation method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a generalization-enhanced minority dance video action segmentation method, and belongs to the field of deep learning video action segmentation. According to the method, a multi-stage domain generalization video action segmentation network is provided, and a plurality of single-stage domain generalization time convolutions are included. In each single-stage domain generalization time convolution, multi-level features are obtained by capturing inter-frame relationships, inter-action relationships and inter-action relationships, and action categories are inferred through multi-level relationships, so that the accuracy is improved. And a domain generalization method for enhancing resistance data is executed by using a multilevel relationship to obtain an augmented domain sample, and the augmented domain sample and a source domain sample are jointly used as a training set to participate in a network training process, so that the generalization ability of the network is improved. And gradually optimizing augmented area samples and action segmentation results through a multi-stage network structure. The method is suitable for the fields of minority dance video teaching, security monitoring and the like.

title: Memory card manufacturing method based on generative pre-training model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a memory card manufacturing method based on a generative pre-training model, and belongs to the technical field of education tools of internet education, and the manufacturing method comprises the following specific steps: step (1), determining card manufacturing blueprint data; (2) loading the pre-training model to an internal memory and a video memory; (3) processing the data by using the model to generate a question and answer material; (4) importing the question and answer material into anki software to generate a card group; according to the method, a neural network technology in an artificial intelligence technology is utilized, a pre-training model is generated in combination with an existing natural language, and a memory card group which can be used for sales or education is generated by taking scientific materials, science popularization data, teaching materials, teaching aid data and the like as a blue book. The flash card material manufacturing method is high in efficiency, high in automation degree, capable of saving time and labor and low in manufacturing cost, the existing flash card education and learning requirements can be met, and quantitative popularization can be achieved to achieve the commercialization purpose.

title: Data acquisition and analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU XINYE DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a data acquisition and analysis method, system and device based on artificial intelligence, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a certain number of student samples which carry multi-dimensional data information and label information, the multi-dimensional data information comprises basic information, consumption information, score information and behavior information of the students; the label information comprises a basic label, a consumption label, a score label and a behavior label of the student; training the constructed student portrait model based on the multi-dimensional data information and the label information of the student sample to obtain a trained student portrait model; and inputting student information to be analyzed into the trained student portrait model to obtain a student portrait. According to the invention, mass student data can be intelligently analyzed through the deep neural network, and accurate student portraits can be constructed for school teaching management reference.

title: New-form textbook learning system based on digital twinning
applicants: LIAONING SUNFLOWER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a new-form textbook learning system based on digital twinning, which comprises the steps of performing field prediction on a teacher speech audio subjected to text conversion to obtain a speech field corresponding to the teacher speech audio, and selecting a target offline textbook consistent with the speech field from an offline textbook library. The teaching material content data corresponding to the speaking request in the target offline teaching material is identified, the data type of the teaching material content data is identified, virtual dialogue video generation or three-dimensional image generation is carried out according to different data types, the virtual dialogue video and the three-dimensional image are added to the online teaching material, and the optimized teaching material is obtained. And performing textbook writing on the textbook content data and the optimized online textbook to obtain a new-form textbook and performing classroom teaching. The invention further provides a new-form textbook learning device based on digital twinning, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The problem that the accuracy of teaching material optimization is low can be solved.

title: Smart campus management method based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of smart campus management, and particularly relates to a smart campus management method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following specific steps: 1, enabling the identity information of a school owner to enter a big data service platform through a login module with a face recognition function, according to the system and the method, statistics of attendance conditions of students in the whole school, statistics and early warning of disease conditions of the students, daily assessment, evaluation and summary of classes, attendance conditions of teachers and attendance arrangement of the teachers are displayed in real time through the display module. The latest technologies such as the mobile internet, the internet of things, intelligent display and artificial intelligence are applied to campus culture and daily management; according to the campus management system, various scattered software and hardware systems of a campus are integrated, the school management and teaching informatization level is improved according to the design ideas of visualization, mobility and convenience, the traditional campus management mode is changed by adopting brand new modes such as big data analysis and face recognition, and the school management level is improved.

title: Auxiliary teaching method and device and storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI SHANGTANG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an auxiliary teaching method and device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining first data based on a first instruction in response to the first instruction of a target object for a first task; wherein the target object belongs to an object set corresponding to a teaching project of an artificial intelligence course, the teaching project comprises a practical operation task set corresponding to a plurality of data processing steps, and the first task is a practical operation task corresponding to at least one data processing step in the plurality of data processing steps in the practical operation task set; the first instruction is used for executing a first task or a subtask of the first task; and obtaining evaluation information of executing the first task by the target object according to the first data. By adopting the method and the device, the data processing steps in the integrated teaching project are practically operated, and knowledge is combined with actual application, so that the teaching effect can be improved, and students can form a systematic knowledge system.

title: Method and terminal for carrying out offline single-person training by utilizing AR (Augmented Reality) technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of AR (Augmented Reality) glasses identification, in particular to a method and a terminal for carrying out offline single-person training by utilizing an AR technology. The method comprises the following steps: a server performs deep learning training based on a preset image set to obtain a trained model, and generates and sends a Blob file corresponding to the trained model to a portable intelligent terminal; and the portable intelligent terminal receives the to-be-recognized image collected by the AR glasses, operates the Blob file to recognize the to-be-recognized image, and sends a recognition result to the AR glasses for single-person training. The server carries out deep learning training, a trained model is transplanted to the portable intelligent terminal for use, the recognition accuracy can be improved, the endurance time of the AR glasses can be prolonged, a student only needs to carry the AR glasses and the portable intelligent terminal, and even under the condition that no internet connection exists, the student can conveniently learn the AR glasses and the portable intelligent terminal. Single-person training such as teaching training and fire-fighting training can be effectively carried out, and the single-person training effect is guaranteed.

title: Internet of Things experiment device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of Internet of Things teaching, in particular to an Internet of Things experimental device based on artificial intelligence. Comprising an experiment cabinet and an adjusting box, an experiment host is installed in the experiment cabinet, a rotating plate is arranged at the top of the experiment cabinet, the left side of the rotating plate is rotationally connected with the experiment cabinet, a base is arranged at the top of the rotating plate, an operation screen is installed on the base and electrically connected with the experiment host, and the adjusting box is located below the experiment cabinet. An adjusting through hole is formed in the front side of the adjusting box, an adjusting plate is slidably connected into the adjusting through hole, an adjusting handle is installed on the front side of the adjusting plate, an adjusting motor is installed on the rear side of the adjusting plate, an adjusting gear is arranged at the output end of the rear side of the adjusting motor, and a lifting worm is rotationally connected to the right side in the adjusting box. A lifting gear is arranged on the front side of the lifting worm, and lifting worm gears are rotationally connected to the front side and the rear side of the interior of the adjusting box; during an experiment, the height and the angle can be flexibly adjusted, so that the experiment can be smoothly carried out.

title: Teacher non-speech behavior detection method based on graph convolutional neural network
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence education application, particularly designs a teacher non-speech behavior recognition method based on a graph convolutional neural network, and aims to solve the problem of teacher non-speech behavior detection in a classroom scene. According to the method, classroom recorded and broadcast video data is used as input, and five kinds of teacher non-speech behavior detection results of'symbolic action ', 'desirable action', 'indicative action ', 'evaluation action' and'adaptive action 'are used as output. Firstly, a target algorithm is used to determine a teacher position and extract a teacher image; analyzing the teacher image by adopting a human body posture estimation algorithm to obtain teacher skeleton point coordinates; and finally, according to the coordinate information of the skeleton points and the physical connection and logic connection relationship between the skeleton points, constructing a graph convolutional neural network model to realize teacher non-speech behavior recognition. According to the invention, the accuracy of teacher non-speech behavior recognition can be effectively improved, the problem of automatic recognition of teacher non-speech behaviors can be solved, and teachers can be assisted to optimize teaching strategies.

title: Data processing method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING ZHIHUI RONGSHENG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a data processing method and device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining classroom data in a teaching process, analyzing the classroom data, when it is determined that participants in the teaching process have preset red line behaviors according to an analysis result, prompting alarm information to preset management personnel, and scoring the participants according to the classroom data and a preset scoring rule, the preset scoring rule is associated with deep learning, according to the classroom data and the scoring result, sorting objects of a preset dimension according to a preset sorting rule, and generating a corresponding report, and the objects of the preset dimension comprise at least one of a school, a student and a teacher. According to the technical scheme, interaction between students and teachers in the classroom is deeply analyzed, teaching data processing based on deep learning is standardized, and important reference information is provided for classroom management and classroom quality evaluation.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform
applicants: CONTROL TIANJIN INDUSTRIAL AUTOMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention, which relates to the technical field of the teaching experiment platform, discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform comprising a main body, experiment equipment, a cabinet door, a connecting column, a handle, a connecting block and an adjusting mechanism. A touch display; a locking mechanism and a clamping mechanism.
