By arranging the adjusting mechanism, a movable column is pressed to drive a connecting ring in a fixed column to extrude a contraction spring to contract, so that the movable column drives the connecting ring to move and drives the fixed column to move, the fixed column moves to release connection and fixation between the movable column and the fixed column, and then the movable column is rotated to drive a supporting plate to rotate; the supporting plate rotates to drive the touch display at the top end to rotate, then extrusion on the movable column is released, extrusion of the connecting ring on the contraction spring is relieved, the contraction spring pushes the connecting ring to drive the fixed column to move, the fixed column moves into the fixed block, fixation of the fixed block and the movable column is completed, and angle adjustment of the touch display can be completed.

title: Classroom behavior analysis system based on deep learning
applicants: ZHEJIANG JIYUN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom behavior analysis system based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of teaching equipment.The classroom behavior analysis system based on deep learning comprises a blackboard, a camera installed above the blackboard, a face recognition module, a timer, a controller and a reminding assembly, and the camera is electrically connected with the face recognition module; the face recognition module is electrically connected with the timer, the timer is electrically connected with the controller, whether a student observes the blackboard or not can be judged through the face recognition module, and by means of the arrangement of the timer and the reminding assembly, it is judged that the student is in an inattention state when the student does not watch the blackboard for a long time; according to the invention, a corresponding reminding function is triggered, the attention of the student is pulled back by virtue of vibration, and meanwhile, the relatively small vibration can avoid influence on class attentions of other students on one hand, and can also avoid psychological burdens on the students on the other hand.

title: A METHOD FOR TEACHING AN ELECTRONIC COMPUTING DEVICE, A COMPUTER PROGRAM PRODUCT, A COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM AS WELL AS AN ELECTRONIC COMPUTING DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for teaching an electronic computing device (10) comprising at least a machine learning algorithm (22) for predicting a position-based propagation (12) in an environment (14), comprising the steps of:- providing a mathematical model for the position-based propagation (12), wherein the mathematical model comprises at least a physical model for the propagation in the environment (14- generating training data for the machine learning algorithm (22) comprising a propagation field and/or a propagation domain;- training the machine learning algorithm (22) by fitting the training data to a partial derivative of the machine learning algorithm (22); and- obtaining a prediction of a propagation loss by a weighted sum of multiple evaluations of the trained machine learning algorithm (22).Furthermore, the invention relates to a computer program product, a computer-readable storage medium as well as to an electronic computing device.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model provides an auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching, and relates to the technical field of teaching robots. Comprising a robot body, a processing module, an interaction module and an excitation module are arranged on the robot body, the excitation module comprises a pushing assembly and an excitation box, the output end of the pushing assembly extends into the excitation box, the pushing assembly and the excitation box are both arranged in the robot, and a reward channel is arranged on the outer side wall of the lower portion of the robot body and communicates with the excitation box. The interaction module and the pushing assembly are electrically connected with the processing module; the auxiliary robot can arouse the enthusiasm of the children and activate the learning atmosphere of the children, and the learning time is longer.

title: Real-time handwriting interaction online auxiliary teaching system
applicants: BEIJING UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: The invention provides an online auxiliary teaching system for real-time handwriting interaction, and belongs to the technical field of human-computer interaction. The system comprises an extraction module used for performing hand skeleton extraction on a real-time live broadcast image captured by a camera by using a deep learning method to obtain hand key point coordinates; the gesture recognition module is used for carrying out gesture recognition through the hand key point coordinates and carrying out mode switching according to a gesture recognition result, and the modes comprise character input, basic graph drawing and sketch drawing; the character recognition module is used for recognizing handwritten characters input by a user and obtaining corresponding printed characters; the graph drawing module is used for identifying a basic graph drawn by a user and obtaining the basic graph after track smoothing; and the image generation module is used for performing image generation and visualization according to the sketch drawn by the user. By adopting the method and the device, the problem of blackboard writing missing in online classes can be solved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND COMPUTER PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are an information processing method, an information processing device, and a computer program that extract features of an intermediate layer reflecting fine features of input data and perform category discrimination of data to be discriminated. The information processing method includes: (a) a step of preparing, for each of a plurality of categories, a known characteristic spectrum group obtained when a plurality of pieces of teaching data are input to a vector neural network type machine learning model; and (b) a step in which the machine learning model and the known characteristic spectrum group are used to execute a category determination process for the data to be determined. Step (b) includes: (b1) a step for calculating a characteristic spectrum on the basis of the input of the discriminated data into the machine learning model; (b2) a step for calculating the degree of similarity by category between the feature spectrum and the known feature spectrum group for each of the plurality of categories; and (b3) a step for discriminating the category of the discriminated data on the basis of the degree of similarity by category.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching training trolley
applicants: SUZHOU QINGYAN CHELIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching training dolly comprising a frame structure, an upper layer automatic driving system, a chassis control system and walking wheels, the upper layer automatic driving system comprises a controller, a monitoring assembly and a signal transmission module, and the chassis control system comprises a steering engine and an encoder motor which are connected with the walking wheels. The frame structure is provided with a control panel connected with the steering engine and the encoder motor, and the control panel is connected with the battery assembly. The artificial intelligence teaching practical training trolley is mainly composed of an upper-layer automatic driving system and a chassis control system, and through cooperation of a lane line detection module, a path tracking module, an autonomous obstacle avoidance module and a traffic light detection module, the artificial intelligence trolley can realize a lane keeping ADAS function and an automatic driving function. And the real-time state of the vehicle can be checked and controlled through upper computer software.

title: System for counting quantity of game tokens
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to atleastpartiallyhave a specificcolorindicative ofavalue of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state ofthe chipas animage; animage analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color thatis presentintheimageanddiffers fromthe specificcolor; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to estimating one or more parameters on a system including a plurality of nodes. In one example, the system comprises: one or more learner nodes, each of which is configured for generating information related to a group of words for estimating the one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model; and a plurality of server nodes, each of which is configured for obtaining a plurality of sub-vectors each of which is a portion of a vector that represents a word in the group of words, updating the sub-vectors based at least partially on the information to generate a plurality of updated sub-vectors, and estimating at least one of the one or more parameters associated with the machine learning model based on the plurality of updated sub-vectors.

title: DIGITAL ELECTRONIC TEACHING DESK OF COMBINING LECTURE PROGRESS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FUNCTION AND REMOTE CONTROLLING BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS FUNCTION AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are an electronic teaching desk and an operation method thereof. According to various embodiments of the present invention, the operation method of the electronic teaching desk of the present invention comprises the following steps of: identifying an instructor based on a first control input being inputted; unlocking the electronic teaching desk and determining a designated lecture material, based on authority of an identified instructor; and outputting at least one object among the lecture materials based on a second control being inputted. An objective of the present invention is to provide an electronic apparatus processing data for a lecture and the operation method thereof.

title: DIGITAL ELECTRONIC TEACHING DESK WITH IMPROVED SECURITY OF COMBINING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FUNCTION AND INTERNET OF THINGS FUNCTION AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: Disclosed are an electronic teaching desk and an operation method thereof. According to various embodiments of the present invention, the operation method of the electronic teaching desk of the present invention comprises the following steps of: identifying an instructor based on a first control input being inputted; unlocking the electronic teaching desk and determining a designated lecture material, based on authority of the identified instructor; and outputting at least one object among the lecture materials based on a second control being inputted. An objective of the present invention is to provide an electronic apparatus processing data for a lecture, and the operation method thereof.

title: Natural language predicate on multi-chip circuit logic layout referring to Table 2 of "description" 003 for artificial intelligence semantic coding
abstract_text: Artificial intelligence semantic value. The platform, tools and methods for human communication should have been completed when human beings are created. If it is systematized, it will be fastest inspired by organs such as eyes, ears and tongue. In the sense of sound, it was God who unified the language. Until later, because of abandoning teaching, human language becomes confounded. However, the development of natural language has never been stopped for a moment. The use of natural language idioms is the most natural way of expression and communication, requiring no skills and any form. When the language becomes a civilization across generations, the use of idioms gradually develops towards secularization and regionalization. In the human natural language, the application of adverbs often adopts idioms. Adverbs are attached before and after verbs and nouns. In the expression of natural language in artificial intelligence, there exists discussion such as "interrogative adverbs" and "relational adverbs". For the relational word system of the predicate structure of "who-where-when-why-what", see the description in Table 1 of "claims" for details. Since the main sentences, clauses, and predicates of artificial intelligence are inseparable from the adverb grammar and adverbs also cannot be separated from the existing environment, they naturally become general grammar. "Who-where-when-why-what" are widely used in the daily-life natural language and involve the rules of life experience, so it is more convenient to use. There are no obstacles when communicating with each other, and it is easy to understand the original meaning. AI artificial intelligence has always used symbols. The coding in the program is used as a semantic expression and tool, and of course punctuation is often used. These are the conventions of AI program coding, and when relevant definitions are established they must be formalized in order to be used smoothly. For the above semantic coding, see AI semantic coding in Table 2 of "description" 003. The subject matter of the present invention is 004 "Natural language predicates on multi-chip circuit logic layout".

title: FITTING DETECTION METHOD, FITTING DETECTION DEVICE, AND FITTING DETECTION SYSTEM
abstract_text: A fitting detection method according to the present disclosure detects fitting, the fitting detection method comprising: acquiring first data indicating information generated from vibration; acquiring second data output from a trained model, by inputting the first data into the trained model in which machine learning has been performed using, as teaching data, at least information generated from vibration caused by normal fitting; determining, on the basis of the second data, whether the first data is related to the fitting; and determining, on the basis of the first data, whether or not the fitting was normally performed when the first data is related to the fitting.

title: Vocal music teaching system based on big data artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a vocal music teaching system based on big data artificial intelligence, which is applied to the vocal music teaching field, and comprises a combined room, a monitoring module, a playing module and a control module, the system is provided with the freely assembled combined room, after combination, external noise can be isolated, interference can be reduced, and monitoring effectiveness can be enhanced; meanwhile, when not in use, the device can be folded behind the mounting plate, so that air circulation is enhanced, and a wider visual field is achieved; the vibration sensor is arranged to be in contact with the eyebrow of the human body and monitor the vibration condition of the eyebrow during singing of a user so as to judge the resonance degree of the nasal cavity, and meanwhile, a winding rope of the second wearing unit tightly hoops the abdomen of the user, so that the abdomen can expand and contract when the user breathes; the encoder monitors the extension degree of the winding rope to analyze the breathing degree, and the structure principle is simple and effective; the data of the trainee and the teacher are compared and analyzed in real time and fed back, so that the trainee can immediately know the problem and make correction.

title: Learning system based on teaching data analysis
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching data analysis, and particularly relates to a learning system based on teaching data analysis. A learning system based on teaching data analysis comprises a login system, an intelligent question bank module, an intelligent homework module, an intelligent paper marking module and an intelligent analysis module, and the login system comprises a student login module, a teacher login module and a background management personnel login module and is used for performing login processing on students, teachers and background management personnel. Students enter the intelligent homework module and the intelligent question bank module through the student login module for information interaction processing. On the basis of daily big data acquisition and machine learning analysis technologies, functions of intelligent homework, annotation and paper marking, learning actual situation analysis, intelligent question bank and precise homework are integrated, an intelligent teaching solution is provided, and precise teaching, personalized learning, scientific evaluation, demonstration research and intelligent management are realized.

title: Teaching activity digitization system
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a teaching activity digital system, which analyzes student individual data types which can be collected by the teaching activity digital system, and constructs a corresponding student deep learning evaluation model according to the student individual data types. Generating a training sample for the first class of student individual data and the artificial evaluation quantification result thereof, training a student deep learning evaluation model by using the training sample, and generating a verification sample for the second class of student individual data different from the first class of students and the artificial evaluation quantification result thereof; and finding out data samples with relatively large error between student deep learning evaluation model scoring and manual scoring, and continuously correcting the model so as to obtain a stable student deep learning evaluation model.

title: Simulation teaching device
applicants: SHANGHAI DATANG MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS EQUIPMENT CO LTD
inventor_name: OTHER INVENTORS HAVE WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE MENTIONED
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a simulation teaching device, the device comprises a 5G simulation platform and a 5G intelligent trolley, the 5G simulation platform comprises a 5G simulation practice module and a 5G Internet of Vehicles scene simulation module, the 5G simulation practice module is used for providing simulation practice teaching of 5G knowledge, and the 5G Internet of Vehicles scene simulation module is in communication connection with the 5G intelligent trolley. And the 5G intelligent trolley is used for simulating a 5G Internet of Vehicles scene and controlling the operation of the 5G intelligent trolley so as to provide simulation practice teaching of 5G Internet of Vehicles knowledge, and engineering practice teaching of multidisciplinary knowledge such as 5G communication knowledge, artificial intelligence technology and Internet of Things technology with low cost can be realized.

title: Accompanying and nursing robot device and self-adaptive learning system and method
abstract_text: According to the accompanying and nursing robot device and the self-adaptive learning system and method, artificial intelligence, a visual recognition technology, a voice recognition and positioning navigation mobile technology, action planning and robot self-adaptive learning are utilized, objects and humans in an environment scene are intelligently recognized, the robot node communication principle is combined, voice instructions and voice query are achieved, and the aim of accompanying and nursing is achieved. And remote and autonomous control, autonomous object taking, milk feeding, food feeding and water feeding, accurate radar positioning and autonomous mobile navigation are realized. 3D printing record growth, infant language teaching, infant voice dialogue interaction, visual object recognition and infant object cognition teaching, infant action teaching, robot adaptive action learning and action interaction are realized. The growth of the infant is accompanied. Far-end and autonomous voice and video monitoring, accompanying and nursing are achieved, and the system is widely applied to families, infant nursing, senior homes, various nursing scenes and medical scenes.

title: Action data analysis method and system based on smart sports
abstract_text: According to the motion data analysis method and system based on smart sports provided by the invention, the precision and credible factors of the sports motion posture information in the target object posture detection record are improved by utilizing a thought of performing targeted motion normative recognition on the sports motion posture information with abnormal motion normative conclusion identifier annotation; analysis deviation caused by abnormal sports action posture information is avoided, high-quality AI model debugging can be carried out based on the optimized target object posture detection record, and instructive sports action correction and teaching can be carried out based on the optimized target object posture detection record.

title: Knowledge distillation method, device and product based on cascaded text matching model
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a knowledge distillation method and device based on a cascaded text matching model, electronic equipment, a storage medium and a computer program product, relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a deep learning technology, and can be used in search and recommendation scenes. According to the specific implementation scheme, in the process of training a teacher model, a teaching assistant model and a student model according to a training sample set, a first matching degree output by the teacher model, a second matching degree output by the teaching assistant model and a third matching degree output by the student model are determined; determining first distribution information of a first matching degree corresponding to a preset number of training samples in the training sample set, second distribution information of a second matching degree corresponding to the preset number of training samples and third distribution information of a third matching degree corresponding to the preset number of training samples in the training sample set; and according to the first distribution information, the second distribution information and the third distribution information, under the assistance of the teaching assistant model, performing knowledge distillation on the teacher model to obtain a trained student model. The accuracy of the obtained student model is improved.

title: Video recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a video recommendation method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a teaching video containing teaching courseware, and segmenting the teaching video to obtain multiple segments of sub-videos; obtaining a behavior index of an operation behavior of the user on each sub-video; according to the behavior indexes, obtaining the attention degree of the user to each sub-video; obtaining a user attention feature vector according to the video content and the attention degree; matching the recommendation attention feature vector of the to-be-recommended video with the user attention feature vector to obtain a recommendation list of the user; obtaining a feedback result of a user group corresponding to the user attention feature vector on the recommendation list; feedback differences of the behavior indexes are obtained according to different feedback results; the influence degree of each behavior index is obtained through feedback differences, and the recommendation list is dynamically adjusted through the influence degrees. The embodiment of the invention can reflect the real demand of the user and ensure the accuracy of video recommendation.

title: Intelligent automobile end-to-end lane line detection system and equipment based on auxiliary supervision and knowledge distillation
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent automobile end-to-end lane line detection system and equipment based on auxiliary supervision and knowledge distillation, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence and detection. The invention aims to solve the problem that the existing lane line detection algorithm does not have a detection method capable of giving consideration to both algorithm precision and calculation efficiency. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, extracting lane line features in an image by using a backbone network, decoding the features by using a polynomial decoder to obtain lane line polynomial model parameters, and adding a semantic segmentation branch for enhancing the feature extraction capability of the backbone network; meanwhile, a teaching module and a test module are provided, and information is transmitted to a polynomial decoder from a semantic segmentation decoder by a strategy similar to knowledge distillation, so that the detection precision of the polynomial decoder is improved; all structures of the model participate in image processing during model training; during model deployment, only the backbone network model and the polynomial decoder are deployed, and the requirement for the real-time performance of intelligent automobile lane line detection is met. The method is mainly used for lane line detection.

title: Scenario scene task editing system based on virtual reality technology and use method
applicants: BEIJING KONGTIAN HAOBANG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a script scene task editing system based on a virtual reality technology and a use method. The script scene task editing system comprises an aerospace science and education knowledge system knowledge base, a test question maintenance module, a virtual scene maintenance module, an AI intelligent system, a venue operation management system and a background big data analysis module. The invention relates to the technical field of virtual reality, in particular to a script scene task editing system based on the virtual reality technology and a using method, multi-mode teaching scenes and laboratories of the earth, the space and the like are constructed by using the virtual reality technology, flexible scene configuration is carried out by setting a plurality of task points, and the scene editing efficiency is improved. The learning requirements of different users are met; and through user portraits (age, gender, school, role, level and other basic information), the knowledge mastering degree of the user is intelligently judged through a science and education big data model, and an optimal learning interaction scene, a task principal line, knowledge points and courses are matched.

title: English speaking teaching method using interactive artificial intelligence avatar device and system therefor
abstract_text: In accordance with one embodiment of the present invention, a method for English speaking education using an interactive artificial intelligence avatar, includes the following steps of: receiving user input included in a first English sentence; performing a natural language understanding operation for the first English sentence; as a result of performing the natural language understanding operation, determining whether a preset intention category matched with a conversation intention included in the first English sentence exists; when the preset intention category matched with the conversion intention does not exist, generating at least one first natural language based on the first English sentence; when the preset intention category matched with the conversion intention exists, calling a template associated with the preset intention category, and generating at least one second natural language based on the called template; extracting an embedding value from the at least one first or second natural language, and extracting the first or second natural language based on the extracted embedding value; and outputting the extracted first or second natural language as a second English sentence which is a response to the first English sentence. Therefore, the present invention is capable of improving an English-speaking learning effect.

title: System for customized education information for education users
abstract_text: According to the present invention, provided is a server for providing education information tailored to education consumers, which includes: a data standardization unit which collects structured and unstructured data for provider content, and refines and transforms the data by applying global learning data standard technology; a data processing unit which processes and fuses standardized data; and a data analysis unit which provides an AI-based matching service by performing consumer prediction analysis, adaptive learning analysis, learning activity contribution analysis, learning path and resource analysis, and teaching method improvement analysis based on the input learning performance.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD AND CLASSIFICATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD
abstract_text: An image processing method according to the invention includes obtaining a ground truth image teaching a cell region occupied by a cell in an original image for each of a plurality of the original images obtained by bright-field imaging of the cell, generating a reverse image by reversing luminance of the original image at least for the cell region based on each original image, and constructing a classification model by performing machine learning using a set of the original image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image and a set of the reverse image and the ground truth image corresponding to the original image as a basis of the reverse image respectively as training data.

title: Shaftless artificial intelligence demonstration tool
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, and particularly discloses a shaftless artificial intelligence demonstration tool, comprising an arc-shaped support, the upper part of the arc-shaped support is provided with a threaded column, and the lower part of the arc-shaped support is provided with a mounting groove with an opening facing the threaded column; an upper mounting hole is formed in the upper part of the ball body, and a lower mounting hole is formed in the lower part of the ball body; the upper end of the upper rotary connecting piece is rotationally connected with the threaded column through a fastener, and the lower end of the upper rotary connecting piece is inserted into the upper mounting hole and detachably connected with the upper mounting hole; the lower end of the lower rotary connecting piece is inserted into the mounting groove, and the upper end of the lower rotary connecting piece is inserted into the lower mounting hole and is detachably connected with the lower mounting hole. According to the shaftless artificial intelligence demonstration tool provided by the utility model, the rotation of the ball body can be realized without inclining the rotating shaft, other parts can be stored in the internal space of the ball body, and the internal space of the ball body can be fully utilized.

title: Acoustic control lightening artificial intelligence demonstration tool
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, and particularly discloses a sound control lightening artificial intelligence demonstration tool comprising an arc-shaped support provided with a threaded column and a mounting groove; the ball body is provided with an upper mounting hole and a lower mounting hole; the surface of the ball body is covered by a plurality of LED packaging chips; the upper end of the upper rotary connecting piece is rotationally connected with the threaded column, and the lower end of the upper rotary connecting piece is detachably connected with the upper mounting hole; the lower end of the lower rotary connecting piece is inserted into the mounting groove, and the upper end of the lower rotary connecting piece is detachably connected with the lower mounting hole; the voice module is used for performing voice interaction with a user; and the light controller is used for controlling the working state change of each LED packaging chip according to the voice instruction received by the voice module. According to the artificial intelligence demonstration tool lighted by voice control, the visual effect of map patterns is variable, the ball body can rotate without inclining the rotating shaft, other parts can be stored in the internal space of the ball body, and the internal space of the ball body can be fully utilized.

title: Yoga teaching equipment capable of improving comfort degree based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of yoga teaching equipment, in particular to yoga teaching equipment capable of improving comfort based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a fixed bottom plate, the upper surface of the fixed bottom plate is fixedly connected with a supporting plate, the supporting plate is rotatably connected with a lying plate, and the lying plate is matched with the fixed bottom plate. Shoulder supporting blocks are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the upper surface of the lying plate, the lying plate is sleeved with a breathable rubber pad, the breathable rubber pad is matched with the shoulder supporting blocks, and protective handles are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the two sides of the lying plate; through mutual cooperation of structures of the air blowing assembly and the massage mechanism, the effect of increasing the sweat evaporation rate of people can be achieved, the massage effect can also be achieved, meanwhile, the effect of improving the comfort level of people is facilitated, a limiting rod drives a limiting sliding block on a positioning frame to do reciprocating motion in a supporting frame, and the comfort level of people is improved. Therefore, the working range of the fan impeller is enlarged, and evaporation of sweat on the back of a person is accelerated.

title: Collaborative learning noise label image classification method
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of deep learning, in particular to a collaborative learning noise tag image classification method, which is characterized in that on the basis of retaining collaborative training of a Co-teaching method, two improvements are carried out: firstly, a cross training mode is abandoned, a one-way data exchange mode is adopted, and secondly, a loss function of a data receiver network is modified, so that the noise tag image classification efficiency is improved. The loss functions of a data receiver and a data provider are different, and in combination with a symmetric cross entropy loss function and label smooth regularization, the influence of a noise label on image classification is suppressed through small loss training of a one-way data exchange pair; and robustness is improved through a symmetric cross entropy loss function, and over-fitting is prevented through label smooth regularization.

title: Novel skiing machine optical multimedia intelligent interaction system
applicants: SHANGHAI SHINUO WUYAO FITNESS SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: A novel skiing machine optical multimedia intelligent interaction system comprises a skiing machine, a position sensor, one or more light source generators and a pressure sensor, the position sensor is fixed above a skiing blanket, protective wallboards are arranged on the two sides of the skiing machine, and information transmission is accurately and efficiently achieved through an optical multimedia communication medium; multi-physical-quantity information is acquired, so that the acquisition requirements of various signs of the skier are comprehensively met; an intelligent data processing system and artificial intelligence data acquisition and analysis are realized, and functions of teaching, entertainment and the like are realized.

title: Japanese teaching system based on AI intelligence
abstract_text: The invention, which relates to the Japanese teaching field, discloses an AI-based intelligent Japanese teaching system comprising an AI teaching material and a question bank development subsystem. An AI online live teaching subsystem; an AI intelligent analysis teaching, learning and practicing data subsystem; and an AI intelligent teaching management subsystem. According to the invention, AI artificial intelligence is used as a leading teaching mode and a few high-level teachers are used as an auxiliary teaching mode, so that Japanese teaching efficiency is greatly improved, work pressure of the teachers is reduced, a large amount of teacher resource cost is reduced, Japanese teaching level is improved, balance of teaching quality of students is ensured, each student can enjoy high-quality teaching resources, and teaching experience of the students is improved. Through an AI video teaching mode, no limitation on teaching space exists, high-quality Japanese teaching can be conveniently carried out on more students at the same time, and accurate learning quality evaluation can be carried out through evaluation and analysis on the class attending states of the students.

title: Face recognition method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a human face recognition method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: inputting a target image into a predicted human face recognition model for human face recognition, and obtaining a human face recognition result corresponding to the target image; distilling the student pre-training model by adopting the teacher pre-training model, the isomorphic teaching-assistant model, the heterogeneous teaching-assistant model and the model weight set until a preset distillation ending condition is met; taking the student pre-training model meeting the distillation ending condition as a face recognition model; the isomorphic teaching-aiding model comprises at least two isomorphic teaching-aiding pre-training sub-models which are the same as the model class family of the teacher pre-training model, and the heterogeneous teaching-aiding model comprises at least two heterogeneous teaching-aiding pre-training sub-models which are different from the model class family of the teacher pre-training model. Therefore, model distillation is carried out in a teaching-assistant knowledge distillation mode, and the accuracy of model pre-training of students under the extreme compression condition is improved.

title: Game resource allocation method and device based on bilateral adaptation, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence technology, and discloses a game resource allocation method based on bilateral adaptation, which comprises the following steps: extracting a game release object from a game allocation demand, and constructing a semantic matrix of the game allocation demand; game levels matched with the semantic matrix are screened from the game level pool, and the game levels are combined into a first game frame according to the incidence relation between the game levels; obtaining user data of the game object, and screening out a game scene matched with the user data from a preset scene pool; and configuring the scene of the first game frame according to the scene data of the game scene to obtain a second game frame. In addition, the invention further relates to a block chain technology, and game configuration requirements can be stored in nodes of a block chain. The invention further provides a game resource allocation device and equipment based on bilateral adaptation and a medium. The problems that teaching game development is complex, and the matching degree of the developed game and the game object is low can be solved.

title: Teacher teaching quality report generation method and system based on knowledge graph, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher teaching quality report generation method and system based on a knowledge graph, and a medium, and can be applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence education. According to the method, a multi-layer circulating filtration map feature extractor, an extreme deep coding and decoding network and a multi-layer feed-forward feature coding converter are arranged in a teacher teaching quality generation model, and after a classroom teaching knowledge graph is constructed, the classroom teaching knowledge graph is input into the teacher teaching quality generation model; classroom characterization information of a classroom teaching knowledge graph is extracted through a multi-layer circulating filtration graph feature extractor to serve as a first feature matrix, and data refining and concentration are conducted on the first feature matrix through an extreme deep coding and decoding network to obtain a second feature matrix. And a teacher teaching quality report which is more in line with the actual classroom situation is generated according to the second feature matrix through a multi-layer feed-forward feature coding converter, namely, the accuracy of a teacher teaching evaluation result is effectively improved.

title: Information processing system, information processing method, and information processing apparatus
abstract_text: The present invention addresses the problem of making it easy to prepare a set of learning data used to secure the performance of a machine learning model. The invention relates to an information processing system, an information processing method, and an information processing apparatus. The information processing system acquires a set of learning data including input data and a tag of teaching data for the input data, learns a machine learning model by means of the set of learning data, inputs test data to the machine learning model learned by means of the set of learning data, and outputs the test data to the machine learning model. And an evaluation unit that receives the test data from the machine learning model, evaluates whether the performance of the machine learning model satisfies a specified condition on the basis of the output of the machine learning model to which the test data has been input, updates the set of learning data when it is evaluated that the performance of the machine learning model does not satisfy the specified condition, and re-learns the machine learning model by means of the updated set of learning data. The information processing system repeats updating, re-learning and evaluation of the data set according to the evaluation.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND FAULT ANALYZER
abstract_text: To enable a fault to be identified on the basis of an alarm indication irrespective of knowledge quantity regarding a communication facility or a line facility.SOLUTION: A machine learning device constructs a learning model for identifying a fault in a communication facility or a line facility from facility information acquired over a network. The machine learning device comprises: first input data acquisition means 111 for acquiring information pertaining to an alarm as facility information that occurs in a monitoring device 30 of the network as first input data; first label acquisition means 112 for acquiring the assessment result of a fault that occurs in correspondence to the alarm as a first level; and first learning model construction means 113 for performing supervised learning using a set of the first input data and the first label as teaching data and thereby constructing a first learning model for generating an assessment result that corresponds to the alarm occurring in the monitoring device 30.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: INK DISCRIMINATION METHOD AND INK DISCRIMINATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: To provide a discrimination method and a discrimination system that can accurately discriminate the type of ink.SOLUTION: An ink discrimination method creates a learned model by allowing machine learning using teaching data obtained by associating ink characteristic data of at least one of absorbance, transmittance, and reflectance observed by irradiating ink with light, and the type of the ink or attribute information on the ink including the type of the ink with each other, and based on output data of the learned model obtained by inputting ink observation data of at least one of the absorbance, transmittance, and reflectance observed by irradiating ink with light, discriminates the type of ink corresponding to the ink observation data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: Rural education information retrieval system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: A rural education information retrieval system based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the present invention comprises a volunteer terminal, a teaching terminal and a server, the volunteer terminal comprises a registration module, a login module, a teaching content entry module and a teaching information retrieval module, and the teaching information retrieval module comprises a first AI feedback unit. The first AI feedback unit is used for carrying out intelligent screening according to fields input by the teaching content input module and sending a screening result to the volunteer end; the teaching terminal comprises a teaching information issuing module and a volunteer information retrieval module, the volunteer information retrieval module comprises a second AI feedback unit, and the second AI feedback unit is used for carrying out intelligent screening according to fields input by the teaching information issuing module and sending a screening result to the teaching terminal; according to the method, the retrieval result is fed back into a specific numerical value, so that the wisher and the country supporting and teaching can select each other more conveniently.

title: Auxiliary decision-making method and device for minimally invasive surgery
applicants: CHENGDU YURUI INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an auxiliary decision making method and device for minimally invasive surgery, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. S2, training the artificial intelligence computer vision model by the three annotation databases to obtain an operation stage and abnormal event recognition model, a key anatomy processing state classification model and an organ lesion state classification model; s3, constructing a surgical decision model; S4, collecting a minimally invasive surgery video; and S5, importing the basic information of the patient and the three identification results into an operative decision-making model, and providing operative decision-making suggestions. An artificial intelligence computer model is adopted to automatically identify key operation elements such as an operation anatomical structure, an operation stage, a safe view exposure condition in an operation and an organ lesion state under the operation view, and the extracted multi-dimensional operation elements are matched with an operation type decision model and prompted in an image-text mode. And surgeons are effectively assisted to fully execute clinically related LC operation guidelines, and teaching services of resident doctors are provided.

title: Image quality improvement system and image quality improvement method
abstract_text: Provided are an image quality improvement system and an image quality improvement method for improving the image quality of a low quality image by machine learning, the image quality improvement system and the image quality improvement method being highly accurate, highly reliable, and enabling learning with appropriate teaching information even for a sample for which the image can easily change every time imaging is performed. This image quality improvement system improves the image quality of a low quality image, and is characterized by comprising: an image quality improvement unit that improves the image quality of a low quality image; a deformation prediction unit that predicts a deformation amount occurring between a first low quality image included in a series of input low quality images, and a second low quality image that is different from the first low quality image; and a deformation correction unit that corrects, on the basis of the deformation amount predicted by the deformation prediction unit, one of a first prediction image obtained by applying processing by the image quality improvement unit to the first low quality image, the second low quality image, or a second prediction image obtained by applying processing by the image quality improvement unit to the second low quality image. The image quality improvement system is further characterized by learning so as to reduce: the evaluation of a loss function between the first prediction image corrected by the deformation correction unit, and the second low quality image or the second prediction image; or the evaluation of a loss function between the first prediction image, and the second prediction image or the second low quality image corrected by the deformation correction unit.

title: Prediction of dynamic thermoelectric performance based on proxy model development and photovoltaic system
abstract_text: The invention discloses prediction of dynamic thermoelectric performance based on proxy model development and a photovoltaic system. The prediction comprises the following steps: S1, determining optimal operation under parameters; s2, quantifying uncertain parameters; s3, training and verifying a supervised machine learning model; s4, renewable energy generating capacity prediction under the multi-dimensional uncertainty parameters; s5, carrying out uncertainty analysis; and S6, sensitivity analysis. The S1 specifically comprises the following steps: S101, determination of uncertain parameters; s102, determining an optimal design under the parameters; and S103, determining the power generation quantity of the system, wherein the optimal design under the determined parameters in the S102 comprises a teaching stage, a learning stage and a learning result feedback stage. According to the method, a new universal uncertainty quantification method and a data driving model based on machine learning are provided for uncertainty analysis of the optimal regeneration system based on deterministic parameters, and the method is of great significance in promoting development of renewable energy sources and sustainable buildings.

title: Student classroom behavior identification method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of computer vision and behavior recognition, and discloses a student classroom behavior recognition method based on deep learning, comprising the following steps: S1, collecting student classroom videos, and making a data set; s2, performing data enhancement, and expanding a data set; s3, training the target detection network to obtain a student target detection model; s4, training the classification network to obtain a student classroom behavior classification model; and S5, image extraction is carried out on the classroom video according to a set interval frame number, each frame of image after extraction constructs a student target frame according to a target detection result, and each student target frame corresponds to one classroom behavior. The method can identify the classroom behaviors of students, is high in accuracy, can help teachers to review the classroom conditions, improves the teaching level, and improves the teaching mode. In addition, the invention also discloses a student classroom behavior recognition system based on deep learning.

title: Intelligent teaching auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG WEILONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching. Comprising a teacher terminal and a student terminal, the teacher terminal comprises a first display module, an English teaching starting instruction receiving module, an English word database, an English word examination module, an English word selection module, an English word extraction module, an English word output module and a statistics module; the student terminal comprises a second display module, an English word test instruction receiving module, a voice acquisition module, a character acquisition module, a test result output module, a micro expression acquisition module, an action acquisition module and an English word error collection target table processing module; and the English word error collection target table processing module is used for collecting target English words which are wrongly answered by the students and displaying the target English words through the second display module. The technical problem of low English learning efficiency of students due to the fact that a teacher cannot judge the learning progress of each student in a targeted manner when teaching all students in the prior art is solved.

title: Distributed artificial intelligence practice platform based on remote reasoning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a distributed artificial intelligence practice platform based on remote reasoning, which is characterized in that an artificial intelligence model is divided into a preprocessing component, a post-processing component and a reasoning component, the preprocessing component and the post-processing component are operated at an application end, and the reasoning component is operated at a model end arranged on neural network computing equipment; a plurality of application ends multiplex the reasoning component of one model end, or a plurality of application ends multiplex the reasoning components of a plurality of model ends through the integrated server, and reasoning of the artificial intelligence model is achieved. According to the method, the artificial intelligence application and the neural network computing equipment are separated, remote reuse of neural network computing power resources is achieved, the construction cost of an artificial intelligence practice platform is reduced, meanwhile, the flexibility of teaching practice can be improved, and therefore the artificial intelligence teaching quality is improved.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD THEREFOR, AND FILM THICKNESS MEASURING DEVICE AND METHOD THEREFOR
abstract_text: To provide a machine learning device and machine learning method that allow automatized film thickness measurement, as well as a film thickness measuring device and film thickness measurement method equipped with the device and method.SOLUTION: A machine learning device pertaining to the present invention comprises a training data acquisition unit 1 for acquiring training data, and a machine learning execution unit 32 for training a machine learning model on the basis of the training data. The machine learning model discriminates a grinding trace between a film portion and a member portion after the grinding trace is formed on a film surface by a spherical polishing method. The training data includes a film image in which the film is imaged so as to include the grinding trace and teaching data associated therewith, the teaching data including a first answer for the film portion and a second answer for the member portion. A film thickness measuring device D is equipped with this machine learning device, and includes an image acquisition unit 2 for acquiring a target image in which the film to be measured is imaged so as to include the grinding trace, and a film thickness processing unit 33 for obtaining a discrimination result image of the target image using the machine learning model having been trained by machine learning and thereby obtaining the film thickness.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: AI intelligent education robot based on wisdom education
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI intelligent education robot based on wisdom education. The AI intelligent education robot comprises an education robot body, a movable supporting mechanism and a pair of emergency supporting mechanisms. The moving supporting mechanism is arranged on the lower side of the education robot body and used for moving the education robot body, the moving supporting mechanism comprises a supporting table, a connecting piece is connected between the supporting table and the education robot body, a plurality of moving wheels are installed at the bottom of the supporting table, and an anti-inclination protection mechanism is installed in the supporting table; the pair of emergency supporting mechanisms is symmetrically installed on the supporting table. Through arrangement of the corresponding mechanisms, the stability of the intelligent education robot can be greatly improved, falling of the intelligent education robot caused by mistaken touch of students is avoided, the probability that internal or external parts of the intelligent education robot are damaged is further avoided, the operation stability of the intelligent education robot is guaranteed, and the intelligent education robot is convenient to use. Therefore, loss to schools can be avoided, and normal teaching activities of students can be guaranteed.

title: Robot grabbing method and device, electronic equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI SAKA ROBOT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides a robot grabbing method and device, electronic equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical field of robots. The method comprises the following steps: training a target object grabbed by a robot through a detection model, and determining target data of the target object; through the pose model, an initial grabbing pose set when the robot grabs the target object is determined according to the target data; and the initial grabbing pose set is screened, and a target grabbing pose is obtained, so that the robot grabs the target object according to the target grabbing pose. According to the method, the grabbed object and the grabbing pose can be trained by adopting the multiple deep learning neural network models, the multiple determined poses are screened, and the target grabbing pose is obtained to teach grabbing of the robot. The robot can teach grabbing of various objects of different types and positions, the application range of teaching is expanded, and the success rate of grabbing and sorting after teaching is improved.

title: Teacher-student real-time interaction system for practice course
abstract_text: According to the technical scheme, the teacher-student real-time interaction system comprises a teacher terminal and a student terminal, the interior of the teacher terminal comprises an all-in-one machine, and the teacher terminal and the student terminal are in communication connection. The teacher terminal further internally comprises an image system, a task arrangement module, a question module, a teaching log generation module, a processing system and an attendance system, the image system internally comprises an image acquisition module, an image recognition module and a face extraction module, and the image system acquires and recognizes images of students in the teaching process; through cooperative use of internal limbs of the processing system, an expression recognition module and a voice extraction module, effective judgment of the attention of students in a class attending process is realized, and through a deep learning module, in combination with classroom answering times, answering accuracy and homework completion degree of the students, learning suggestions are obtained, and correction by the students is facilitated.

title: Video teaching course intelligent generation method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a video teaching course intelligent generation method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: recording a preliminary video course for teaching of a lecturer through an intelligent terminal and an optical screen, the intelligent terminal is used for playing a course lecture, and the optical screen is used for carrying out the amplification projection of the course lecture; the optical screen is also used for receiving blackboard writing content written by a lecturer; based on deep learning, performing mask extraction on portrait information in the preliminary video course to obtain a lecturer portrait; based on deep learning, performing mask extraction on projection information in the preliminary video course to obtain blackboard writing content; synthesizing the blackboard-writing content and the course lectures to obtain a target lecture blackboard-writing; according to the method, the teacher portrait and the target lecture blackboard-writing are fused into the preset background, and the target video teaching course is generated, so that recording of high-quality teaching videos can be completed at home, the recording is not limited by a specific site any more, a certain recording cost is saved, and recording of the teaching videos by the teacher is effectively facilitated.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TEXT STRUCTURING VIA LANGUAGE MODELS
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for text processing. When a plurality of unstructured text strings are received, an input from a user for at least some of the plurality of unstructured text strings is received that identifies one or more structural elements. Training data are generated to include the plurality of unstructured text strings and the identified one or more structural elements associated with the at least some of the plurality of unstructured text strings. A conversion model is trained, via machine learning, based on the training data and one or more previously trained language models. The conversion model is for converting an input unstructured text string into a structured data record by identifying at least one structural data element from the raw unstructured text string.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD THEREFOR, AND FILM ADHESION EVALUATION DEVICE AND METHOD THEREFOR
abstract_text: To provide a machine learning device and machine learning method that enable automatization, as well as a film adhesion evaluation device and film adhesion evaluation method for evaluating the adhesion of a film and equipped with the device and method.SOLUTION: A machine learning device pertaining to the present invention comprises a training data acquisition unit 1 for acquiring training data, and a machine learning execution unit 32 for training a machine learning model on the basis of the training data. The training data includes an indentation image in which the indentation of Rockwell indentation test is imaged and a label, as teaching data, that represents the degree of adhesion of a film associated with the indentation image, the label being represented by a numerical value including decimal parts, the machine learning model outputting a label for the image that is inputted. A film adhesion evaluation device D is equipped with the machine learning device, and includes an image acquisition unit 2 for acquiring a target image obtained by imaging the film to be evaluated, where an indentation of Rockwell indentation test is formed, and evaluation processing units 33, 34 for inputting the target image to the machine learning model having been trained by machine learning and obtaining a label as the evaluation result.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Classroom teaching quality online continuous improvement system based on artificial intelligence technology
applicants: XIAN PENDII INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom teaching quality online continuous improvement system based on an artificial intelligence technology, which comprises a server, a class attending state management system, an educational administration management terminal, a mobile phone terminal and a teacher management terminal, and is characterized in that the system identifies the class attending state of students according to a plurality of cameras and a somatosensory sensor, counts the number of students who attend the class (sign in) and is late to leave early, and sends the class attending state to the server; the system can count names, student numbers and the like of students watching mobile phones, dozing, mutually chatting and loud serge, and can display the class attending states of the students, people counting conditions, the teaching speed of a teacher and the like on a multimedia display screen on a platform in real time, so that the class attending states of the students are dynamically tracked; and the teacher is prompted to adopt related interaction measures or change (improve) the teaching method in time, so that the method has certain positive significance in improving the teaching method of the teacher in real time and achieving the purpose of continuously improving the classroom teaching quality on line.

title: AI-based teaching management method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based teaching management method, device and equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining necessary subjects and selectable subjects in selected subjects, and the selectable subjects comprise at least one subject; obtaining an influence factor corresponding to at least one subject, and determining a subject selection value of each subject based on a preset subject prediction model and the influence factor; according to the sequence of the numerical values from large to small, selecting a preset number of subject selection numerical values from the at least one subject selection numerical value, determining a subject corresponding to the selected subject selection numerical value, and obtaining a self-selected subject; based on the required subjects and the optional subjects, generating a teaching management report for a manager and students to check, and providing a reference for teaching management of the manager; namely, through the influence factors of the subjects and the subject prediction model, reasonable and accurate references are provided for the target students to select the subjects, the self-selected subjects are determined, the teaching management report is generated, and references are provided for the managers to carry out teaching management, so that the teaching management efficiency is improved.

title: Personalized teaching method, device and equipment based on AI and readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based personalized teaching method, device and equipment and a readable storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a learning track of a student, and obtaining a learning personality recognition model; inputting the learning track to the learning personality recognition model to obtain a learning personality recognition result; wherein the learning personality recognition model is obtained by performing iterative training on an untrained learning personality recognition model based on a preset training data set; and based on the learning personality identification result, determining a personalized learning material of the student. According to the method and the device, the learning track is identified through the trained learning personality identification model with relatively high accuracy to obtain the learning personality identification result, so that the personalized learning material suitable for the student is determined according to the learning personality identification result, and the learning efficiency of the student when learning through the learning material is improved.

title: OBJECT DETECTION SYSTEM AND OBJECT DETECTION METHOD
abstract_text: The present invention comprises a capture device that captures propagation route information communicated between two or more wireless devices and that transmits the captured propagation route information to a first detection device and a second detection device, and a trained model generation device that generates a trained model for object detection in which the supervised machine learning is used. The first detection device detects an object between the wireless devices using the trained model generated by the trained model generation device. The second detection device detects the object with higher precision than the first detection device. The trained model generation device generates and updates the trained model used by the first detection device by using assessment data that includes the result of detection of the object by the second detection device as teaching data. This makes it possible to easily generate a trained model in which supervised machine learning is used without requiring time or manual effort.

title: Botany intelligent teaching instrument
applicants: SHENZHEN RICE LIGHT SCIENCE AND TECH SERVICE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a botany intelligent teaching instrument, and belongs to the field of botany artificial intelligence. Comprising a three-dimensional planter (1), an interaction screen (7) and a plant growth detection system, the three-dimensional planter (1) comprises a plant lamp (2), a plant table (3) and a supply disc (4); the plant growth detection system comprises an automatic control panel (5) and a shooting device (6); plants are planted in the three-dimensional planters, and the plant growth detection system controls the growth environment of the plants in the three-dimensional planters and monitors the growth state of the plants in the three-dimensional planters under the control of the interactive screen and feeds back a growth rotary table to the interactive screen; and the interactive screen can be used for man-machine interaction, setting a plant growth environment, displaying a plant growth state and presetting extended reading data. The automatic control panel controls the plant environment, and the shooting device collects the plant growth state. According to the utility model, the system is naturally moved into a classroom, and a user carries out planting independently or under guidance and directly participates in the whole natural growth process of plants, so that an online and offline fused situational teaching platform is created.

title: Artificial intelligence wisdom education platform and application thereof
applicants: GUANGDONG LIGHT INDUSTRY OCCUPATIONAL TECH COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence wisdom education platform and application thereof. The artificial intelligence wisdom education platform comprises an infrastructure layer, a support system layer, an application platform layer, a wisdom application layer and an access terminal layer. The access terminal layer provides access ports for different users; the smart application layer realizes smart education through multi-modal machine learning; the application platform layer is used for carrying out teaching in different modes and switching among different teaching modes; the support system layer digitizes the teaching process and realizes structured storage of the teaching process; the infrastructure layer establishes a hardware environment for intelligent education implementation and data acquisition. According to the invention, on the basis of a general multimedia classroom, characteristics and requirements in actual teaching are combined, and the teaching functions of the traditional classroom are systematically integrated according to the construction thought of'intelligent service for teaching and management ', and the constructed artificial intelligence education platform has the advantages of low cost, high integration, strong interaction, digital intelligence, large scale and reproducibility.

title: Teaching video automatic classification method and system based on different presentation modes
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a teaching video automatic classification method and system based on different presentation modes, which can accurately position information required by teaching video classification through three convolutional neural network models, two self-trained YOLOV4 target detection neural network models and a human body key point detection technology. The problem that the teaching video background and the character feature change are not obvious is solved, and the feature extraction accuracy is improved. The structure of the self-built convolutional neural network model is suitable for classification of Interview type and Head type teaching videos, the network depth is just appropriate compared with several classic video classification algorithms, and the computer hardware energy consumption is reduced. And other related image data sets are used as required training sets after being preprocessed, so that the bottleneck of a teaching video data set is broken through. A new teaching video classification mode is provided, and the accuracy and efficiency of teaching video classification are improved.

title: Big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform
applicants: PENGCHENG CRAFTSMAN JIANGSU INFORMATION SCIENCE AND TECH RESEARCH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching practical training, particularly relates to a big data artificial intelligence teaching practical training room platform, and provides the following scheme aiming at the problems that the angle adjustment operation of a display is tedious and the adjustment is inconvenient during teaching practical training: the big data artificial intelligence teaching practical training room platform comprises a working table and the display arranged on the top surface of the working table, the workbench further comprises a fixing frame, the fixing frame is fixed to the top face of the workbench, and the inner wall of the fixing frame is rotationally connected with an adjusting rod. The rotating wheel is rotated, so that the threaded sleeve drives the tooth-shaped block to slide in the sliding groove, the adjusting rod rotates on the fixing frame through the meshing transmission effect of the tooth-shaped block and the adjusting gear, the adjusting rod can drive the displayer to conduct angle adjusting treatment, operation is easy and convenient, and meanwhile through the effect of the supporting rod, the angle of the displayer can be adjusted conveniently. And the supporting block slides in the fixed rail, so that the display is supported through the supporting rod, and the placement stability of the display after angle adjustment is effectively improved.

title: Machine vision detection workbench
applicants: TURNIP AMP ROBOT INDUSTRIAL TECH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine vision teaching, in particular to a machine vision detection workbench. Comprising a metal plate workbench, and an appearance detection module, a conveying line module, a quick-change tool module, an electromagnetic valve group, a robot module, a material defect detection module, a three-color lamp assembly, a computer, an operation control module, a character detection module, a circuit module, a two-dimensional code recognition and size detection module and a visual positioning drawing module which are arranged on the metal plate workbench. Based on the four functions of visual mode recognition, visual positioning, size measurement and appearance detection of machine vision, electrical circuit personalized design is carried out at the same time, unit circuit control and gas circuit connection plug-and-play are achieved, cognitive learning of circuits and gas circuits by students is increased, and the learning efficiency is improved. The integrated application capability of students on existing machine vision technology products is improved, and the reform of professional talents in colleges and universities in training targets, course systems, teaching conditions, assessment and evaluation and teacher team construction under the condition of artificial intelligence + is promoted.

title: Campus AI education equipment capable of being remotely monitored
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education equipment, in particular to campus AI education equipment capable of being remotely monitored, which comprises a rack, an inverted-T-shaped upper sliding groove is formed in the inner wall of the upper end of the rack, a motor is embedded in the outer wall of the lower end of the rack, and a supporting plate is fixed to the outer wall of the side, away from the motor, of the lower end of the rack; a gear is fixed to the output end of the motor, a protection plate is arranged on the side, close to the gear, of the rack, and the outer wall of the side, away from the rack, of the protection plate is coated with a wear-resistant coating. The campus AI education equipment capable of being remotely monitored is provided with the protection plate, the protection plate can be automatically opened and closed through the arrangement of the controller, the protection plate can be opened in advance when a teacher gives a class, manual operation of the teacher is not needed, the wait time wasted when the teacher gives the class is shortened, and the protection plate is automatically closed when the teaching time is over; the display screen is prevented from being scratched due to the fact that a teacher forgets to close the protection plate after using the display screen, and the service life of the display screen is prolonged.

title: Multi-modal system for intelligently evaluating classroom rules of autism group courses
applicants: AFFILIATED THIRD HOSPITAL OF ZHONGSHAN UNIV
abstract_text: The invention discloses an infantile autism group course classroom rule intelligent evaluation multi-modal system, and the system comprises a fan-shaped teaching desk, a teaching chair, an intelligent positioning bracelet, and a voice recognition system.
