According to the system, the quiet and steady state data of children are obtained through end-to-end deep learning technology combination according to binaural positioning, stable weight information, two-hand horizontal position information and voice voiceprint information, and the information comprehensively evaluates whether the children have class rule violation behaviors such as leaving position, skilled operation and language stimulation in a multi-person group class. Therefore, children with different degrees of infantile autism can be assisted.

title: HAMED TD: TEACHING, AI-BASED DOCTOR FOR ALL
abstract_text: A system and method to teach all kind of professions (knowledge/experiences) to the clients, to propose best appropriate professions for each client, and to help watching and controlling people while learning/doing their professions/tasks to understand if they have been taught and learned well enough, and if their products/services are appropriate enough during/after making things or giving services.

title: COMPUTER ASSISTED LINGUISTIC TRAINING INCLUDING MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: A computer assists in training a user to speak with a target accent by determining improvable aspects of diagnostic input of a user speaking diagnostic phrases with the target accent. The computer selects, a focus phrase characterized by at least one of said improvable aspects. The computer records performance input of the user attempting to say the focus phrase in the target accent. The computer converts the performance input into output having a baseline voice of the and the target accent applied. The computer presents the output and determines teachable aspects of revised performance input from the user replicating the output. The computer converts selected aspects of the revised performance input into augmented teaching output in the user's voice with the target accent applied. The computer presents the augmented teaching output to the user.

title: ELECTRONIC TEACHING DESK OF VOICE RECOGNITION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND REMOTE CONTROLLING BASED ON INTERNET OF THINGS AND OPERATING METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: According to various embodiments of the present invention, disclosed are an electronic lecture desk and an operation method thereof comprising the following steps of: identifying a lecturer based on an inputted first control input; releasing a lock of the electronic lecture desk and determining designated lecture materials based on authorization of the identified lecturer; and outputting at least one object of the lecture materials based on an inputted second control input. The electronic lecture desk supports the lecturer to lecture without interruption and improves quality of a lecture.

title: Artificial Intelligence robot teaching apparatus and its control method
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a technology for controlling a joint robot, and more specifically, to an artificial intelligence robot training apparatus and a controlling method thereof, capable of training a control of a multi-joint robot without complex mathematics and educating students through an artificial intelligence-based modeling capable of controlling the multi-joint robot. To this end, the artificial intelligence robot training apparatus according to the present invention includes: a first joint robot which operates according to a pre-learned first DNN model when a target path value is inputted to a user terminal; a second joint robot which operates according to a pre-learned second DNN model when a target point value is calculated in the user terminal; and a pan tilt camera robot which photographs a target in an operation range region of the second joint robot, and transmits a target image to the user terminal.

title: Infant training system based on teaching
applicants: CHENGDU MIDDLE TECH INTELLIGENT ENTERPRISE MANAGEMENT CONSULTATION LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching-based baby training system, at least comprising a cloud server, the cloud server at least comprising a behavior feature extraction module and a deep learning training module, and the cloud server further comprising a behavior feature extraction module, the feature extraction module is used for extracting behavior feature parameters of an infant based on the specific mode established by the deep learning training module, and matching a corresponding action training unit, a thinking training unit and/or an emotion training unit based on the behavior feature parameters; and the deep learning training module selects the action training unit, the thinking training unit and/or the emotion training unit of which the coordination is within a set threshold range based on a specific mode of the infant to form an infant training scheme. According to the invention, a training scheme for helping infants to carry out personalized training can be provided for guardians, healthy growth of the infants is helped, good thinking habits and characters are developed, and emotion can be effectively controlled.

title: Method for automatically identifying student grouping information in school experiment teaching process
applicants: SICHUAN CUSTARD FLYING INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for automatically identifying student grouping information in a school experiment teaching process, and belongs to the technical field of school experiment teaching, and the method comprises the following steps: carrying out AI intelligent analysis on a monitoring video stream, and building an AI target detection model; for each experiment classroom, a certain number of grouping frames are predefined according to requirements, and the distance between each position vertex coordinate of each student and a judgment point of each predefined grouping frame is calculated; and determining groups of the students according to the distances between the positions of the students and the judgment points. Real-time analysis is carried out based on school video streams, and students are grouped. And other statistical information does not need to be acquired and processed to judge grouping, video streams are directly analyzed, students are directly grouped according to vision, the accuracy is higher, original video monitoring of a school can be directly accessed for analysis, and the expansibility is high. And a good tool and environment are provided for supervising experiment classes of students in schools.

title: Visual traditional Chinese medicine identification system based on hyperspectral imaging and AR (Augmented Reality) technology
applicants: CHINESE ACAD OF TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE SCIENCE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a traditional Chinese medicine visual identification system based on hyperspectral imaging and AR technology. The traditional Chinese medicine visual identification system comprises a traditional Chinese medicine model library, a medicinal plant identification and identification module, a medicinal plant whole growth cycle display module, a medicinal plant harvesting method display module, a medicinal plant processing method display module and a medicinal material storage display module. The method has the advantages that an artificial intelligence technology is utilized, and hyperspectral imaging and AR technologies are combined, so that a series of processes of medicinal plants from seed germination to medicine (traditional Chinese medicine decoction pieces) formation and the like are visually displayed; a user can personally learn and experience contents such as the historical background, the growth environment and the characteristics of each stage of plant growth of traditional Chinese medicinal materials and the processing technology of traditional Chinese medicine decoction pieces, so that the interest of learners can be greatly enhanced, the learning effect is improved, the defect of lack of traditional Chinese medicine practice teaching resources can be overcome, the teaching pressure of teachers is relieved, and the teaching efficiency is improved. Therefore, the professional literacy of students is improved, and the teaching cost investment is reduced to a great extent.

title: Behavior attitude identification method based on facial expression dynamic perception
applicants: WUHAN AVIATION DREDGING SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a behavior attitude recognition method based on facial expression dynamic perception, which comprises the following steps of: S1, preprocessing a facial image: detecting and positioning a human face through facial expression image facial positioning, performing facial cutting after finding an exact position of the human face in the image, thoroughly eliminating other interference information, and highlighting the human face in the image through image enhancement; s2, establishing a face time sequence feature evolution model; and S3, judging the answer attitude according to the facial dynamic time sequence characteristics. Facial expressions are analyzed through the artificial intelligence technology, behavior attitude recognition is achieved, the real inner feeling of a user can be effectively understood, the method can be widely applied to marriage relation prediction, communication negotiation, teaching evaluation and other services, especially for national security work, the real intention of the user can be found through analysis of the expressions of the user, and the experience of the user is improved. And illegal behaviors of dangerous persons can be stopped in time, and whether prisoners speak lie and violent behaviors can be well predicted, so that the state is protected to be long-term and safe.

title: Artificial intelligence education system based on education big data
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent education, and particularly relates to an artificial intelligence education system based on education big data, which comprises a student terminal and a server, a user verification module, a learning module, a manual module, an entertainment module, a feedback module and an analysis module are arranged in the student terminal, and the student terminal comprises a main body and a time module. The time module is used for controlling the working time of the learning module, the manual module and the entertainment module; by arranging the learning module and the entertainment module, the students can have a proper rest in the learning and education process, and work and rest are combined; the attention and operational ability of the students are improved by arranging the manual module, so that the learning ability of the students is improved; by testing the learning result, the attention and the operational ability of the student, the personal comprehensive level of the student is measured and compared with the level of the age, the personal characteristics of the student can be better judged, a teaching plan can be formulated in a targeted mode, and therefore the education effect is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching, in particular to an artificial intelligence interactive teaching system which comprises a registration module, a course selection module and an interactive learning module. The registration module comprises self-service registration operation equipment, and an information module is arranged in the self-service registration operation equipment; the information module is used for recording and storing student personal information data; the course selection module comprises an in-class course category column and an out-of-class course category column; the interactive learning module comprises an autonomous teacher selection column and a teacher dispensing column, the students select teachers for each course through the autonomous teacher selection column, the teachers dispense and select the teaching quantity of the students through the teacher dispensing column, and after dispensing, student teacher selection information is automatically input into personal information data; the interactive learning module comprises a student terminal and a teacher terminal, and each of the student terminal and the teacher terminal comprises a video module, an audio module and a recording module; and the recording module is used for automatically inputting data generated by the video module and the audio module into personal information data.

title: Teaching progress and achievement display informatization data visualization system and method
applicants: TIN FREE SCIENCE AND TECH VOCATIONAL COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a data visualization system and method for teaching progress and achievement display informatization. Comprising hardware and software; the hardware comprises a display end, a PC end and an input and output end; the software comprises a cloud server, a database, a man-machine interaction data visualization tool and an artificial intelligence algorithm; the display end comprises a multifunctional electronic display screen and a controller; the PC end is connected with the controller through a serial port, and information of the PC end is projected to the multifunctional electronic display screen; the input and output end comprises a keyboard, a mouse, a VR device, an audio input device and an audio output device which are electrically connected with the PC end or connected with the PC end through USB ports. The database is installed on the cloud server and used for storing and updating data; and the man-machine interaction data visualization tool is developed at a PC (Personal Computer) end in a web visualization mode. The method is suitable for visual display of teaching data, and is intelligent and efficient. The teaching progress and the teaching achievement are visually displayed in real time on line through the data visualization technology, the display degree is higher, and the teaching informatization degree is higher.

title: Dance posture recognition teaching equipment based on embedded artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model provides a dance posture recognition teaching device based on embedded artificial intelligence, which comprises a dance teaching rotating frame, a dance teaching video transmission display screen, a hollow aluminum cabinet, an artificial intelligence development board and a computer device, and is characterized in that the dance teaching video transmission display screen is embedded in the dance teaching rotating frame; and the middle part of the lower part of the dance teaching rotating frame is in bolted connection with a hollow aluminum cabinet. Through the arrangement of the dance posture recognition and acquisition camera, the lamp holder, the light supplementing lamp tube, the protective lampshade and the photosensitive sensor, when human body movement dance posture information is captured, if the photosensitive sensor detects that the illumination intensity is low, the information can be transmitted into the artificial intelligence development board through the photosensitive sensor, and the human body movement dance posture information is captured. Through information processing of the computer equipment, the lamp holder can drive the light supplementing lamp tube to be lightened, and auxiliary light supplementing operation can be carried out.

title: Classroom information management method and system based on group teaching
applicants: WUHAN KONGSHAN EDUCATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to a classroom information management method and system based on group teaching, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a plurality of teaching templates based on different education theories, and the teaching templates comprise interaction modes of teachers and students, and classroom information collection and processing methods; acquiring student information and teaching information participating in group teaching, and determining group division participating in group teaching and one or more teaching templates of each group according to the student information and the teaching information and input of teachers; the student information comprises subject scores, interest fields and organization ability level scores, and the teaching information comprises teaching targets and course resources; and based on the teaching template, determining an acquisition processing mode of classroom information of each group and each student in the group. Different teaching templates are constructed through different education theories, and grouping division, teaching information integration and information acquisition are carried out based on an artificial intelligence method, so that the accuracy, comprehensiveness and flexibility of classroom information are improved.

title: Big data artificial intelligence teaching training system
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching practical training, and discloses a big data artificial intelligence teaching practical training system, the lower end of a cabinet body is provided with an electric telescopic rod, the electric telescopic rod is connected with a supporting seat, and a rubber pad is pasted on the supporting seat; a host, a storage battery and a wireless communication module are installed in the cabinet body, and the wireless communication module is connected with the cloud server; a central control module is arranged in the host, is respectively connected with the basic test module, the teaching module, the practical training module, the image acquisition module, the image processing module, the image analysis module, the evaluation module, the suggestion generation module and the report generation module, and is used for controlling each module to work normally by utilizing a central processing unit; according to the artificial intelligence teaching practical training platform, the rotating mechanism is connected between the supporting column and the man-machine interaction shell, so that a user can conveniently adjust the artificial intelligence teaching practical training platform according to actual requirements in the teaching process, and the practicability of the artificial intelligence teaching practical training platform is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence robot capable of quickly identifying target
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence robot capable of rapidly recognizing a target, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the robot comprises a trunk, a head and a foot support mounted at the bottom of the trunk, a movable head support is arranged at the top of the trunk, the head is mounted on the head support, and a display screen is mounted on the front side of the head. A microphone, a voice recognition sensor and a main control computer are installed in the head, a camera shooting protection frame is fixed to the front face of the trunk, a video camera shooting sensor is installed on the camera shooting protection frame, an article containing plate is arranged under the video camera shooting sensor, and a main board and a loudspeaker are installed in the trunk. According to the robot, rapid target recognition and voice broadcasting are achieved, children can be assisted in recognizing daily use articles, the robot has the auxiliary functions of picture display, video explanation and the like, the children are efficiently assisted in cognizing things, interestingness is high, the learning fun of the children is stimulated, and the teaching effect is good.

title: CLASSIFICATION DEVICE, CLASSIFICATION METHOD, AND CLASSIFICATION PROGRAM
abstract_text: A classification device (10) includes: a classification unit (12) that performs classification by using a model (121) that is a model performing classification and is a deep learning model; and a preprocessing unit (11) that is provided prior to the classification unit (12), and selects an input to the model (121) by using a mask model (111) that minimizes a sum of a loss function and a magnitude of the input to the classification unit (12), the loss function evaluating a relationship between a label on an input from teaching data and an output of the model (121).

title: Machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a base, a rotary table, a clamping device, an object, a vertical frame, a rotating device, a main lifting device, a connecting seat, a camera I and a side synchronous lifting detection device, the object is arranged on the clamping device, the vertical frame is arranged on the base, the rotating device is arranged in the base and can drive the rotary table, the main lifting device is arranged on the upper portion of the vertical frame, the connecting base is connected with the main lifting device, the first camera is arranged at the lower end of the connecting base, and the second camera is arranged at the lower end of the connecting base. The side face synchronous lifting detection devices are arranged on the two sides of the connecting base. The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching platforms, and particularly relates to a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence, which can comprehensively shoot information of an object and is convenient in position adjustment.

title: TinyML-based children language early education implementation method and system
applicants: LTD COMPANY OF SHANDONG LANGTIDE INSTITUTE OF SCIENT RESEARCH
abstract_text: The invention discloses a TinyML-based children language early education implementation method and system, belongs to the technical field of machine learning, edge computing and data processing, and aims to solve the technical problem of how to achieve the purpose of children language teaching under the condition that the accompanying time of parents is limited. An edge computing device Raspberry Pi 4B is used to cooperate with a lightweight target detection model NanoDet-Plus, real-time input is performed through a portable camera, the lightweight target detection model NanoDet-Plus identifies furniture input into a video stream, an identification result is explained and described through a Markov model and an expert system, and the identification result is subjected to real-time detection. The edge computing device Raspberry Pi 4B plays the obtained text explanation through a loudspeaker, and the purpose of language teaching for children is achieved.

title: Unmanned driving teaching aid
abstract_text: The utility model provides an unmanned driving teaching aid which comprises a vehicle, the vehicle comprises a walking mechanism used for moving, a detection device and a controller, and the walking mechanism and the detection device are both electrically connected with the controller; and the fence is used for defining a target area, and the controller is arranged to detect the fence based on the detection device to obtain the pose information of the vehicle in the target area, and control the moving path of the walking mechanism based on the pose information. According to the unmanned driving teaching aid provided by the utility model, the fence is detected through the detection device of the vehicle, so that the moving path of the walking mechanism of the vehicle is controlled, unmanned driving of the vehicle is realized, simulation demonstration of the unmanned driving process can be realized, teaching through lively activities can be realized, and the teaching effect of an artificial intelligence theme can be improved.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: X-RAY MEASUREMENT DEVICE, X-RAY MEASUREMENT METHOD AND MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
abstract_text: To shorten time of a preliminary measurement (screening) prior to a full-fledged measurement in an X-ray measurement device.SOLUTION: In a preliminary measurement, a spectrum obtained by detection of a characteristic X-ray discharged from a preliminary measurement point is transmitted to a spectrum processing unit 20 via a noise filter part 22. In a full-fledged measurement, a spectrum obtained by detection of a characteristic X-ray discharged from a full-fledged measurement point bypasses the noise filter part 22, and is transmitted to the spectrum processing unit 20. The noise filter part 22 includes a machine learning filter consisting of a CNN and the like. In a learning process, teaching data is generated, using artificially generated noise.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: AI intelligent assignment system and method for physicochemical and biological laboratory scene
applicants: SHANGHAI TIN TRIPOD INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI intelligent assignment system and method for a physicochemical and student laboratory scene. The system comprises a teaching and examination module, and a terminal device, a video management module and an intelligent assignment module which are connected with the teaching and examination module. According to the invention, video management functions such as video recording, archiving and viewing in the operation process of students in the experiment operation process are realized, and meanwhile, the problem that one person and one professional teacher cannot score on site due to the lack of professional teachers in an experiment examination scene is solved; and evaluation standards are not uniform and not fair due to different scoring criteria and requirements of different professional teachers. In addition, by adopting AI intelligent score assignment, the standard uniformity and objectiveness during scoring can be realized, and meanwhile, the time cost and the labor cost are greatly saved.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED DETECTION OF BUILDING FOOTPRINTS
abstract_text: The disclosed computer-implemented method may include collecting a set of labels that label polygons within a training set of images as architectural structures. The method may also include creating a set of noisy labels with a predetermined degree of noise by distorting boundaries of a number of the polygons within the training set of images. Additionally, the method may include simultaneously training two neural networks by applying a co-teaching method to learn from the set of noisy labels. The method may also include extracting a preferential list of training data based on the two trained neural networks. Furthermore, the method may include training a machine learning model with the preferential list of training data. Finally, the method may include identifying one or more building footprints in a target image using the trained machine learning model. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

title: O2O Video English Class Operation O2O System Using Online Books and Crafts
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an online-to-offline (O2O) education system using online English teaching materials and offline craft tools and a method thereof. Specifically, the present invention reprocesses English teaching materials into online teaching materials to convert text data of teaching materials into voice data through AI voice technology to provide storytelling and provide craft kits corresponding to the corresponding teaching materials together to provide online education content and offline experience education content. An embodiment of the present invention includes a process of calculating and outputting feedback data corresponding to learner data in real time by reflecting action data of the learner and also includes an image data output device for an offline craft creating guideline. Learners can receive untact experience English learning by using both online and offline learning tools through the system in accordance with the present invention.

title: Action demonstration system suitable for physical education
abstract_text: The invention provides an action demonstration system suitable for physical education. The action demonstration system comprises artificial intelligence glasses, wearable gloves, a leg binding device and a data processing module, the artificial intelligence glasses, the wearable gloves and the leg binding device are worn on the body of an operator; an operator holds the basketball with a hand; the artificial intelligence glasses, the wearable gloves and the leg binding devices are all connected with the data processing module; the wearable glove includes a controller and a resistance band. The basic characteristics of the trainee are obtained in real time by arranging the wearable gloves, the artificial intelligence glasses and the leg binding device, and a teaching demonstration dynamic track is given to guide the trainee to carry out standard shooting training, so that the formation of wrong exercise habits and the time and energy cost of correction are avoided, and the training efficiency is greatly improved; by arranging a resistance belt, a basketball can be simulated, and the training efficiency is further improved; meanwhile, the power of the trainee is corrected in time through the controller, and the standardized shooting training effect is further improved.

title: Online education method and system based on artificial intelligence and big data analysis
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education method and system based on artificial intelligence and big data analysis, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining first teaching video information; obtaining first teaching content information and first classroom question information; obtaining first answer information and first answer expression information until the Nth answer information and the Nth answer expression information; inputting the first to Nth answer expression information into an expression analysis retrieval model to obtain a first expression set and a second expression set; obtaining a first answer set; inputting the answer into an answer error correction model to obtain a first correct answer set and a first wrong answer set; obtaining a first student set; and sending the first student set and the second student set to the first teacher, and performing error correction early warning of the concept response misunderstanding mode. The technical problems that in the prior art, education is conducted at a time, adaptive education of a self-defined teaching mode cannot be conducted based on the understanding ability and the learning speed of students, and then the online education quality is reduced are solved.

title: Rehabilitation teaching classroom system for children with autism and other developmental disorders
applicants: BEIJING CONCERN SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a rehabilitation teaching classroom system for children with autism and other developmental disorders, and the system comprises a login module which is used for carrying out the registration or login verification of a user who logs in the system; the teaching module is used for entering and displaying a user personal platform after login verification is passed, responding to lesson preparation operation of a user, obtaining and displaying a student list, establishing, storing and displaying a student case for each student in the student list, and performing teaching according to a child development evaluation report of the student and an input teaching target under the student case. An exclusive individual teaching plan is made through an AI algorithm, a teaching class schedule is automatically generated according to the exclusive individual teaching plan and user class schedule configuration, class condition information of students is recorded, scores of the students are checked, historical data are stored, and retrieval and display of the historical data are provided.

title: Industrial defect intelligent detection teaching and practical training device
applicants: CHONGQING HAIYUN JIESOON SCIENCE AND TECH
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence defect detection, and particularly relates to an industrial defect intelligent detection teaching practical training device which comprises FPGA intelligent edge computing equipment, a conveying belt mechanism, a visual detection mechanism, a sorting mechanism, a visual display module and an operation table mechanism. The system has the advantages that the system is small in occupied area, simple in structure and equipment, easy to operate, convenient to install and debug and low in cost, module assembling and system assembling can be carried out according to needs, sufficient space is provided for teaching, and the purposes of better carrying out demonstration, teaching and practical training in classrooms and laboratories can be achieved. In the aspect of teaching, the device supports FPGA teaching and artificial intelligence teaching, and can be used as competition equipment besides practical training teaching.

title: Virtual image online intelligent teaching method, platform, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent education, and particularly discloses a virtual image online intelligent teaching method, platform and device and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: generating a virtual image through a drawing rendering technology and a voice synthesis technology; the method comprises the following steps: collecting samples of questions and answers thereof related to teaching, and constructing the samples into a training set and a test set; constructing a neural network model through a machine learning algorithm, and performing iterative optimization on the neural network model through the training set and the test set to obtain an intelligent teacher module; outputting teaching content; outputting an interactive window, feeding back an operation result according to the input content collected by the interactive window, and detecting whether there is a problem in the input content; and if yes, obtaining a first answer to the question through the intelligent teacher module, and outputting the first answer through the virtual image. The embarrassment of face-to-face video learning of students and real teachers is avoided, and the students can perform interactive question answering with the intelligent teacher module through the interactive window in the class process.

title: System and method for automatic detection of building coverage
abstract_text: The invention relates to a system and a method for automatically detecting a building coverage area. A disclosed computer-implemented method may include collecting a set of tags that mark polygons within a training set of images as building structures. The method may also include creating a set of noisy tags having a predetermined degree of noise by warping boundaries of the plurality of polygons within the training set of images. Further, the method may include simultaneously training two neural networks by applying a mutual teaching method to learn from the noisy tag set. The method may also include extracting a priority list of training data based on the two trained neural networks. Further, the method may include training the machine learning model with the priority list of training data. Finally, the method may include identifying one or more building coverage areas in the target image using the trained machine learning model. Various other methods, systems, and computer readable media are also disclosed.

title: Intelligent elderly education system based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of falling protection education, and discloses a machine learning-based intelligent old people education system, which comprises a falling posture simulation area for simulating a living environment, a limb constraint module for falling protection, a falling instant release simulation module for falling control, and a traction module, the limb restraint module is suspended on the inner top of the falling posture simulation area through the traction modules, and the three traction modules are fixedly connected to the back of the limb restraint module and the shoulder top of the limb restraint module respectively; life obstacle landforms are simulated through the landform simulation unit on the falling posture simulation area, the traction release allowance of the three traction modules is utilized to control the heights of three points of limbs, dynamic simulation of falling rotation is formed, repeated exercise is performed, conditioned reflex is formed, and the old after teaching can be simulated in the subsequent life. And when a falling condition caused by an unpredictable accident occurs, a safety protection posture of falling can be kept due to conditioned reflex.

title: Intelligent welding system for hydraulic support structural member
applicants: MIDDLE COAL BEIJING COAL MINE MACHINERY LTD RESPONSIBILITY COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent welding system for a hydraulic support structural member, which is characterized in that on the basis of a complete mechanism of an existing hydraulic support structural member welding robot, the following modules are added to realize the functions of the intelligent welding system: a millimeter-level scanning laser modeling module is added and is used for automatically generating a three-dimensional model; a mechanical arm ultrasonic obstacle avoidance radar module is added and used for preventing collision during operation of the mechanical arm; a drawing AI recognition module is added, and autonomous comparison of a scanning model and a CAD drawing is achieved; and an autonomous programming module is added, and autonomous programming of the welding program is achieved through AI drawing comparison and generation model association. On the basis of an existing hydraulic support structural part welding robot, more functional modules are further integrated, and automatic teaching, automatic obstacle avoidance and automatic programming of a welding support connecting robot system are achieved. The development direction of the support welding robot tends to production practice, and an intelligent and unmanned feasible solution scheme is achieved.

title: Bimodal emotion classification method for guiding teaching
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a bimodal emotion classification method for guiding teaching. Emotion analysis is carried out on electroencephalogram signals and face image data of a subject through experiments, and a teaching mode which can motivate the enthusiasm of students is explored; comprising the following steps: collecting electroencephalogram signals and face video data when a subject watches different teaching videos; the two kinds of data are preprocessed and input into two classifiers, and an SVM neural network is adopted for electroencephalogram signal classification; a CNN neural network is used for face image classification; and finally, fusing the results of the two classifiers to obtain a final emotion classification result. Compared with a common emotion classification method at present, the method can improve the emotion recognition accuracy, can be used for guiding a teacher to design a teaching method, and improves the effectiveness of the teaching process.

title: Classroom student action recognition method and system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom student action recognition method and system based on deep learning in the technical field of action recognition. The method comprises the following steps: step S10, editing a captured classroom video to obtain a plurality of classroom sub-videos; step S20, sequentially detecting human faces in each class sub-video through a human face detection algorithm, and then editing the class sub-video into a plurality of human face sub-videos; step S30, respectively extracting static feature pictures and dynamic feature pictures of the human face sub-videos, and constructing a training data set based on the static feature pictures and the dynamic feature pictures; step S40, creating an action recognition model based on deep learning, and training the action recognition model by using the training data set; and S50, performing real-time action recognition on the classroom video captured by the camera by using the trained action recognition model. The method has the advantages that the actions of the students are accurately recognized in real time, the teaching strategy is adjusted in time, and the teaching quality is greatly improved.

title: Garbage classification mark for kindergarten teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a garbage classification mark for kindergarten teaching, which comprises a display panel and a system, a display is embedded in the front of the display panel, a sound receiver is arranged below the display, the sound receiver is fixed on the display panel through a screw, and a thermal switch is arranged in the middle of the right side of the display panel. A power interface is formed in the lower side of the loudspeaker; a controller is fixed to the upper portion of the left side in the display panel through a screw; a memory is arranged below the right side of the controller; a network interface is formed in the upper portion of the memory; the AI chip is arranged below the right side of the network interface, the AI chip, the memory and the network interface are all fixed on the inner wall of the display panel through screws, and the storage battery is arranged below the interior of the display panel; the garbage classification mark for kindergarten teaching has the advantages that classification is facilitated, interestingness is high, and content is convenient to replace.

title: Teaching training platform with artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching training platform with artificial intelligence, which comprises a base, a movable display blackboard arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base, a processing host fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top of the base, a first movable camera arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base, and a second movable camera arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base. A second movable camera is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the top of the base, and a third movable camera is arranged on the outer wall of the top of the base. Panoramic VR shooting can be carried out through the first mobile camera, the second mobile camera and the third mobile camera, so that the problem that specific operation and operation details cannot be seen due to the fact that the number of people in practice courses cannot be close to teachers can be solved, and the processing host can convert shot data and output the data to VR instruments of students. The first movable camera, the second movable camera and the third movable camera are the same in structure and different in position, the movable display blackboard can be used as a projection screen for offline teaching, and modern teaching is met.

title: OPHTHALMIC INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, OPHTHALMIC DEVICE, OPHTHALMIC INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: This ophthalmic information processing device includes a determiner and a detector. The determiner uses a disc hemorrhage determination model so as to determine the presence/absence of disc hemorrhaging in a frontal image of the fundus of an eye being examined, said model being obtained by machine learning using, as first teaching data, a plurality of fundus frontal images labeled to indicate the presence/absence of disc hemorrhaging. The detector uses a disc hemorrhage region detection model so as to detect a disc hemorrhage region depicted in a frontal image determined by the determiner as having disc hemorrhaging, said model being obtained by machine learning using, as second teaching data, a plurality of pairs of image groups in which a frontal image of a fundus and a disc hemorrhage region image that indicates a disc hemorrhage region depicted in the frontal image constitute a pair.

title: Teaching interaction device and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education, and discloses a teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence and a system thereof.The teaching interaction device comprises a writing board, a second vertical rod and a first vertical plate, the second vertical rod and the first vertical plate are oppositely distributed left and right, and the top ends of the second vertical rod and the first vertical plate are fixedly connected with shells correspondingly; a base is detachably connected to the interior of the shell, a camera is fixedly connected to the top end of the base, racks are fixedly connected to the rear surfaces of the interiors of the first vertical plate and the second vertical rod, and a gear is connected to the front surface of each rack in a meshed mode; the camera is held, the base is placed in the shell, the base is placed on the upper surface of the supporting plate, the camera is pressed downwards, the base moves downwards, at the moment, the spring is in a compressed state, the hand wheel is rotated with the hand, the L-shaped plates can be rotated to the base through rotation, the base is clamped through the two L-shaped plates, the camera can be prevented from moving, installation is easy, in addition, the camera is convenient to disassemble, and the working efficiency is improved. And tools are not needed.

title: Intelligent exercise guidance system and method based on visual AI
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent motion guidance system based on visual AI and a method thereof. The system comprises a human body data acquisition module, a motion sensing module, a motion guidance module, a data analysis module and a motion correction module. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring basic information, past motion data and physical conditions of a user body, and recording and storing the basic information data; receiving and recording behavior motion data; providing exercise guidance data and recording an exercise process image of the user; the behavior motion data and the image data are compared with motion guidance data, scoring is carried out according to differences, and whether the behavior action of the motion is standard or not is analyzed according to the score; and receiving an analysis result, and when the behavior actions of the human motion are different, correcting the behavior actions of the user and repeating teaching. According to the invention, exercise guidance is provided, actions are corrected, corresponding exercise plans are formulated in a targeted manner, and better exercise of exercisers is facilitated.

title: One-stop artificial intelligence talent training platform
applicants: SHANDONG COROUT INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of practical training platforms, and particularly relates to a one-stop artificial intelligence talent training practical training platform, which comprises a practical training platform main body, and the practical training platform main body comprises a teaching resource module. The teaching resource module comprises data preprocessing, model parameter adjusting, computing resource distributing, training task starting, training process monitoring and training result analyzing, and further comprises a connection assembly arranged on the surface of the training platform body, and the connection assembly comprises a connection plate, a spring, a triangular clamping block and a sliding block. An inserting groove is formed in the right surface of the training platform body, the connecting plate is arranged on the inner wall face of the inserting groove, and sliding grooves are symmetrically formed in the surface of the connecting plate; according to the practical training platform, the use area of the practical training platform can be adjusted, the practicability of the practical training platform is improved, the process of adjusting the height of the practical training platform body is convenient, practical trainees can stand for learning after sitting for a long time, and therefore the effects of protecting the waist and promoting blood circulation are achieved.

title: CROWDING PREDICTION SYSTEM
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide a crowding prediction system that can predict the crowding of persons that is to occur in the future. [Solution] A crowding prediction system 100 according to the present invention includes: a crowding data generation unit 120 that generates crowding data indicating the crowding of persons in a determined space; a crowding data selection unit 130 that selects crowding data; and an AI unit 160 that receives, as input data, crowding data selected by the crowding data selection unit 130 and uses, as teaching data, the crowding data selected by the crowding data selection unit 130 so as to perform learning of characteristics of crowding. The AI unit 160 receives, as input data, crowding data selected by the crowding data selection unit 130 and generates, by using a learning result, crowding prediction data for predicting the crowding of persons that is to occur in the future.

title: Trajectory stacking unit for practical training of teaching practical training robot
applicants: WEIFANG TAIMAO INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a trajectory stacking unit for teaching training robot training, which comprises a motion rail frame, a translational motion component and a multi-axis robot, a walking driving mechanism is fixedly mounted on the surface of the translational motion component, the translational motion component is slidably mounted on the surface of the motion rail frame, and the multi-axis robot is mounted on the motion rail frame. The output end of the walking driving mechanism is provided with meshing teeth matched with the surface of the movement rail frame, the input end of the translational movement assembly and the input end of the multi-axis robot are electrically connected with a controller, a numerical control operation system is arranged in the controller, and the input end of the controller is electrically connected with a numerical control operation screen and a sensor. According to the utility model, through arrangement of trajectory stacking control, ultrasonic ranging and material identification are used for sensing stacked articles, digital conversion, line-following feedback walking and path planning are carried out on the positions of the articles and the machine, and control operation is carried out according to the ultrasonic ranging and the material identification; and machine learning and self-adaptive operation intelligent control can be carried out through automatic sensing.

title: Multifunctional interactive massage teaching system
applicants: CHINESE ACAD OF TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE SCIENCE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multifunctional interactive traditional Chinese medicine massage teaching system which comprises an omnibearing motion capture module, a surrounding type display module, an intelligent touch holographic projection operation table, a multifunctional massage teaching module and a module comprehensive management analysis platform. An artificial intelligence technology, a virtual reality technology, a motion capture technology, an equipment networking technology and a traditional Chinese medical massage teaching mode are fused, and a standard Chinese medical massage manipulation is combined, so that enhanced real-time limb feeling and personalized training are provided for a Chinese medical massage user, manipulation real-time self-correction in a Chinese medical massage learning process is realized, and the traditional Chinese medical massage teaching effect is improved. And comprehensively and quantitatively evaluating the traditional Chinese medicine massage manipulation. The teaching system can realize periodical teaching of traditional Chinese medicine massage personnel from material selection to training to examination, is beneficial to inheritance of traditional Chinese medicine massage and improvement of clinical level of traditional Chinese medicine massage students, and shortens a traditional Chinese medicine massage talent training period.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device
applicants: HUNAN ENLIGHTENMENT GUEST CREATING HUMAN POWER RESOURCE LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence lecturing device, the upper end of the base is fixedly connected with four supporting rods, the upper ends of the four supporting rods are fixedly connected with a platform together, the upper end of the base is fixedly connected with a storage box, an opening and closing mechanism is arranged between the storage box and the bottom of the platform, and the platform is fixedly connected with the storage box. The opening and closing mechanism comprises two telescopic rods fixedly connected with the lower end of the platform, the two telescopic rods are jointly and fixedly connected with a cover plate, the lower end of the platform is fixedly connected with a fixing rod, the lower end of the fixing rod is fixedly connected with a first magnetic block, and the upper end of the cover plate is fixedly connected with a second magnetic block. The opposite surfaces of the first magnetic block and the second magnetic block have different magnetic poles. According to the Buddha statue teaching aid, when being used for teaching a Buddha statue, the Buddha statue can be clamped, the stability of the Buddha statue is improved, the Buddha statue is rotated through the motor, more people can watch the Buddha statue conveniently, and then articles can be stored through the storage box.

title: Platform for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: CHANGSHA CITY SOUTH WEEK MIDDLE SCHOOL
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a platform for artificial intelligence teaching, which belongs to the technical field of intelligent platforms and comprises a platform, a U-shaped handrail plate and a display screen, the U-shaped handrail plate and the display screen are mounted on the upper surface of the platform, a containing groove is formed in the upper surface of the platform, one end of the display screen is hinged in the containing groove, two sliding grooves are formed in the inner bottom surface of the containing groove, and the two sliding grooves are arranged in the containing groove. A sliding plate is slidably installed in the sliding groove, an electric push rod is installed on the front side face of the inner wall of the containing groove, a push plate is installed on an output shaft of the electric push rod, and two pushing plates are installed on the side face of the push plate; according to the platform for artificial intelligence teaching, an electric push rod and a second connecting plate are arranged, a push plate is driven by the electric push rod to move, so that the push plate drives a sliding plate to slide in a sliding groove, and one end of a display screen is moved upwards in cooperation with the hinged connection effect of the first connecting plate and the second connecting plate; and the display screen is inclined, so that the angle of the display screen is adjusted, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Cutting device and trained model generation method
abstract_text: A cutting device (1) characterized by having a work level acquisition unit (60b) that inputs surface information for a workpiece (2) acquired by a surface information acquisition unit (50) into a trained model and acquires a work level for the workpiece (2), wherein a control unit (60a) controls the operation of a drive unit (20) to perform cutting work on the workpiece (2) on the basis of the work level acquired by the work level acquisition unit (60b). A trained model generation method characterized by having a teaching data acquisition step for acquiring teaching data including metal surface information that is associated with a work level expressing the degree of completion of the cutting work, and a trained model generation step for, via machine learning using the teaching data, generating a trained model using the metal surface information as the input and the work level as the output.

title: Artificial intelligence garbage classification device
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence garbage classification device comprises a garbage classification operation table, three or more garbage storage boxes are arranged on one side of the garbage classification operation table, and a top plate is arranged on the top side of the garbage classification operation table; a garbage moving, taking and placing assembly used for pouring garbage into the garbage storage box and pressing the garbage in the garbage storage box downwards is arranged below the top plate, and a linear conveying assembly used for driving the garbage moving, taking and placing assembly to move is arranged on the lower side of the top plate. The garbage storage boxes are evenly distributed in the moving direction of the garbage moving taking and placing assembly, intelligent recognition and teaching demonstration of the category of garbage can be achieved through cooperation of a digital display control panel and an object recognition sensing unit, and automatic classification treatment of the garbage can be conveniently achieved through cooperation of the garbage moving taking and placing assembly and the linear transmission assembly.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DEEP ENRICHED NEURAL NETWORKS FOR TIME SERIES FORECASTING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. Upon receiving input data associated with a time series, hidden representations associated with the time series in a feature space are obtained and used to generate a query vector in a query space. Such generated query vector is then used to query relevant historic information related to the time series. The query vector and the relevant historic information are aggregated to generate at least one queried vector, which is aggregated with the hidden representations to generate enriched hidden representations that enhance the expressiveness of the hidden representations.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DEEP CUSTOMIZED NEURAL NETWORKS FOR TIME SERIES FORECASTING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning for time series via hierarchical learning. First, global model parameters of a base model are learned via deep learning for forecasting time series measurements of a plurality of time series. Based on the learned base model, target model parameters of a target model are obtained by customizing the base model, wherein the target model corresponds to a specific target time series from the plurality of time series for forecasting time series measurements of the specific target time series.

title: Four-axis mechanical arm clicking and position calibration method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU MINGMONTH INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH CO
abstract_text: The invention discloses a four-axis mechanical arm clicking and position calibration method based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps of: manufacturing a tool clamp, and enabling a tested screen to be in a horizontal position; according to key point identification, acquiring area information of the tested screen by using a camera; shooting the specified key point by using the camera at a fixed position, and converting a distance relationship according to the obtained size of the key point; and a reinforcement learning algorithm is used, the mechanical arm gradually and actively approaches the key points, and the relation between screen click effective feedback and mechanical arm pressure feedback serves as a reward function. After the method and the system are used, tedious teaching work does not need to be carried out, human input and human errors are reduced, mechanical arm clicking and mechanical arm intelligent lifting under cloud computing do not depend on manpower any more, and existing testing/running steps can be remotely input to places where manpower cannot reach.

title: TERMINAL FOR LANGUAGE LEARNING INCLUDING FREE TALKING OPTION BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND OPERATING METHOD
abstract_text: The present invention discloses a language learning terminal based on artificial intelligence provided with a free talking function, and an operating method thereof. The language learning terminal can provide a line question for a learner, generate a teaching query based on previously learned data when the question of the learner is exhausted, determine whether a question characteristic exists in the response of the learner, and continuously provide learner-led learning again.

title: ACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TUTORING SYSTEM THAT SUPPORT MANAGEMENT OF LEARNING OUTCOME
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence tutoring system for supporting management on learning results in a non-face-to-face environment by remotely connecting a first terminal of a learner with a second terminal of a teacher. The system includes: a control part building a network with the first and second terminals, the web and an external server to communicate therewith while acquiring information about at least one learning event among content consumption of the learner, a learning time, a solving time per problem, and whether an answer is correct or incorrect, from the first terminal to extract random learning analysis information, matching the extracted learning analysis information with pre-designated learning management data to generate random customizing information for guiding future learning of the learner and future teaching of the teacher, and outputting a preset notification signal in accordance with the customizing information; and notification parts provided in the first and second terminals to perform a visual display operation on a random screen in accordance with the notification signal output from the control part. Therefore, the present invention is capable of inducing a more optimized learning route while more easily supporting a management environment for learning results.

title: FISH COUNT CALCULATION METHOD, FISH COUNT CALCULATION PROGRAM, AND FISH COUNT CALCULATION DEVICE
abstract_text: In the present invention, an estimator for estimating the number of fish present in an underwater space is constructed by means of machine learning using, as teaching data, a plurality of data sets for learning that each include an echo image for learning, the echo image being based on received sound waves reflected by fish when sound waves are transmitted in an underwater space where fish are present, and the number of fish present in the underwater space in the echo image. The plurality of data sets for learning each include: an echo image for learning that is based on received sound waves reflected by fish when sound waves are transmitted in the underwater space where fish are present; and the number of fish present in the underwater space in the echo image. The estimator is used on an echo image generated on the basis of received sound waves reflected by an unknown number of fish present in the underwater space after transmitting sound waves in the underwater space, so as to calculate the number of said unknown number of fish present in the underwater space.

title: Nursing major artificial intelligence education system and method thereof
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of nursing major artificial intelligence teaching, and discloses a nursing major artificial intelligence education system and a method thereof.The nursing major artificial intelligence education system comprises a system main control module, and the system main control module comprises a course arrangement recording module and a practice operation module; the practice operation module comprises an operation stability measurement AI module, an environment measurement AI module and a system assistant AI module, and the stability measurement AI module comprises a module for measuring the stability degree of a practice operation arm and a module for measuring whether the heart rate is stable or not. Students can observe and compare their own defects through the system, accurately correct their own defects, strengthen learning, and quickly merge into the atmosphere of learning practice operation and autonomous learning in the later stage, thereby preventing the students from influencing the learning progress of basic specialty due to basic operations such as computers, assisting the students in deeper understanding of human body structure and nursing knowledge, and improving the learning efficiency. Learning is enhanced, and more and more learning misunderstanding caused by understanding difference of students learning according to a simple model is avoided.

title: Teenager robot and artificial intelligence extracurricular science popularization teaching experience interaction device
applicants: ZHENGZHOU FUYU SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teenager robot and artificial intelligence extracurricular science popularization teaching experience interaction device, which comprises a main body, one end of the surface of the main body is fixedly connected with a display I, the surface of the main body is provided with a control button, and the surface of the main body is fixedly connected with a loudspeaker. A trapezoidal block is fixedly connected to the middle of the surface of the bottom of a main body, an annular block is fixedly connected to the surface of the top of the main body, a first rectangular column is fixedly connected to the surface of the top of the annular block, and a first connecting seat is fixedly connected to the surface of the top of the first rectangular column. According to the science popularization teaching experience interaction device, through the electric push rod and the first rotating block, the problem that most of existing science popularization teaching experience interaction devices adopt cameras for shooting, but the cameras do not have the angle adjusting effect is solved, the electric push rod is started, the electric push rod pushes the rotating base to slide, the rotating base drives the first rotating block to rotate through the second rotating shaft, and the angle adjusting effect is achieved; the first rotating block pushes the camera device to rotate, and angle adjustment is facilitated.

title: Intelligent venue operation and management platform
applicants: JIANGSU SCIENTIFIC DREAM SCIENCE AND TECH CO
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent venue operation and management platform, which integrates technologies, collaboration, business, connection and data center capabilities, provides a collaborative comprehensive management and operation integrated support capability, constructs a unified work entrance, constructs whole-course, whole-domain and whole-end operation management and service capabilities for a science and technology venue, and provides a scientific and technological venue management platform. The purposes of personnel connection, business fusion and enabling management are achieved. The platform organically integrates positioning, 5G, IoT and AI technologies, expands more application scenes for new science and technology museums, and performs more diversified design in the aspects of propaganda and display, on-site experience, remote teaching, online interaction, in-museum service, intelligent management and the like. According to the overall construction content, a PC terminal and a mobile terminal serve as a display body, an offline large screen is used as an auxiliary, and interconnection and intercommunication and data flow of the overall system are achieved by supporting three network channels of a wired network, WIFI and a 5G network.

title: ACTIVE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TUTORING SYSTEM THAT SUPPORT TEACHING AND LEARNING AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING THE SAME
abstract_text: The present invention provides an artificial intelligence tutoring system that remotely connects a learner's first terminal and a teacher's second terminal to support teaching and learning in a non-face-to-face environment, the system including: a sensor unit for detecting first event information of the learner in real time; a control unit that communicates with the first and second terminals, a web, and an external server by establishing a network, obtains second event information of at least one of the learner's content consumption amount, learning time, and test result from the first terminal, and outputs a preset notification signal according to at least one piece of event information among the first and second event information; a notification unit provided in the first and second terminals and visually displaying the notification signal on an arbitrary screen according to the notification signal output from the control unit. The first event information is biometric information of the learner. Customized learning and teacher work support in a non-face-to-face environment are enabled, so that a more active and efficient teaching and learning environment can be provided.

title: System for processing foreign language learning task and method thereof
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a foreign language learning task processing system that allows teachers to create various types of task information, evaluate generated task performance information, and create/evaluate test information while conducting online classes, and a foreign language learning management method. The foreign language learning task processing system includes: a learning material generating part; a learning task generating part; a learning task transmission server; a task performance information management server.

title: Chess playing robot
applicants: SUZHOU YUNLING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The chess playing robot is composed of a carrying platform assembly, a chessboard module, a mechanical arm assembly, a machine vision assembly and a control system, the chessboard module, the mechanical arm assembly and the machine vision assembly are all located on the upper portion of the carrying platform assembly, and the chessboard module is used for placing chess pieces to be grabbed and the grabbed chess pieces; the mechanical arm assembly is used for grabbing and placing chess pieces at a fixed point, the machine vision assembly is used for identifying the colors and the positions of the chess pieces, and the control system is used for controlling the whole device. According to a deep learning method, the mechanical arm is used for replacing manual work to complete chess playing operation more intelligently and efficiently, the programming ability of students can be trained, teaching demonstration is facilitated, and the mechanical arm has the advantages of being simple in structure and convenient to use and maintain.

title: MOOC learning device based on AI learning
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a MOOC learning device based on AI learning, comprising a machine body, the upper side of the machine body is provided with a first boss and a second boss, the first boss is hinged with a protection plate, the second boss is hinged with a machine cover, the front side of the machine cover is fixedly embedded with a display screen, the upper side of the first boss is fixedly embedded with a handwriting board, and the upper side of the handwriting board is fixedly embedded with a keyboard. Wherein the writing board is flush with the first boss, drawers are embedded in the two sides of the machine body in a sliding mode, and at least drawing stationery is contained in the drawers. According to the MOOC learning device based on AI learning, online teaching can be supported through the display screen, notes can be recorded on the protection board in the teaching process, and therefore the learning efficiency is improved. After-class review of a user can be facilitated, the protective plate is opened, the handwriting board can support drawing with an electronic pen, online examination can be supported in cooperation with drawing stationery for application, the functions are diversified, different use requirements can be met, the structure is reasonable, the size is small, and carrying is convenient.

title: Intelligent curriculum prompting method and system, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING FUTURE GENE EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent course prompting method and system, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The intelligent curriculum prompting method provided by the invention comprises the following steps: providing a PPT demonstration window and a prompting window; the PPT courseware is demonstrated in the PPT demonstration window; acquiring explanation voice of an explainer; identifying keywords in the explanation voice, wherein the keywords comprise object keywords and operation keywords; according to an operation corresponding to the operation keyword, operating an object corresponding to the object keyword; and displaying an operation result in the prompt window. According to the technical scheme, the courseware content can be intelligently prompted according to the teaching scene.

title: Digital drawing teaching aid system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence digital drawing teaching aids, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based digital drawing teaching aid system, which comprises a processing unit, a drawing teaching aid database and a viewing unit, and is characterized in that the output end of the processing unit is in signal connection with the drawing teaching aid database, and the output end of the viewing unit is in signal connection with the drawing teaching aid database. The output end of the drawing teaching aid database is in signal connection with an accumulation processing unit, an artificial intelligence unit, a manual adding module and a secrecy unit. According to the digital drawing teaching aid system based on artificial intelligence, drawing teaching aids in reality can be uploaded through the data uploading module, then the recognition module recognizes the uploaded information, the uploaded information is separated and stored in the drawing teaching aid database through the classification module, and when the drawing teaching aids need to be used, login is performed through the login module; and then the drawing teaching aid database is extracted under the cooperation of the selection module, and finally the drawing teaching aid database is used through the display module and the display module, so that the flexibility of online drawing teaching is ensured.

title: AI-based experimental process evaluation method and device
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI-based experimental process evaluation method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence process evaluation, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: inputting preset wiring diagram information, and obtaining line wiring information and a wiring completion instruction; in response to the wiring completion instruction, determining whether wiring is correct based on preset wiring diagram information and line wiring information; if yes, obtaining first experiment image information, and performing facial expression recognition and behavior action recognition on the experiment image information; and if not, obtaining error information, and executing the steps of presetting wiring diagram information, obtaining line wiring information and a wiring completion instruction. Through the method and the device provided by the invention, the technical problems in the prior art that the wiring correctness of students cannot be automatically judged, facial expressions and behavior actions are difficult to recognize, and the experiment ability of the students cannot be fairly evaluated by teachers can be relieved, so that the experiment ability of the students can be comprehensively evaluated, and the teaching experiment effect can be known.

title: Student score prediction method and system, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: BEIJING NORMING DIACEAE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student score prediction method and system, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps of obtaining student data; pCA dimension reduction processing is carried out on the student data, and a student data collection table of principal components after dimension reduction is obtained; the student data collection table comprises a plurality of attribute values related to students; and performing orthogonal coding on each attribute value in the student data collection table to obtain first feature data, and inputting the first feature data into a trained score prediction model for prediction to obtain a student score prediction result corresponding to the student data. According to the method, the technical problem that the accuracy of the finally obtained prediction result is low due to the fact that the complexity of an existing model is too high and overfitting of the model is easily caused can be solved, a relatively accurate student score prediction result can be obtained based on the method, and teaching work can be better guided. The method can be widely applied to the technical field of artificial intelligence.

title: Novel skiing machine optical multimedia intelligent interaction system and method
applicants: SHANGHAI SHIHUUO FIVE UNIT FITNESS SERVICE LTD COMPANY
