abstract_text: A novel skiing machine optical multimedia intelligent interaction system and method comprises a skiing machine, a sonar or laser displacement sensor, one or more light source generators, a pressure sensor and an angle sensor, protective wallboards are arranged on the two sides of the skiing machine, and information transmission is accurately and efficiently achieved through an optical multimedia communication medium; the multi-physical-quantity information sensor is used for collecting, so that the collecting requirements of various signs of the skier are comprehensively met; an artificial intelligence data acquisition and analysis system and an intelligent data processing system meet the functions of teaching and entertainment and the like.

title: Intelligent lamp post practical training equipment applied to college teaching
applicants: ZHONGSHI WUHAN SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent lamp post practical training device applied to college teaching. The intelligent lamp post practical training device comprises an intelligent lamp post main body, a meteorological station, a charging pile, an intelligent all-in-one machine, a security monitoring camera, a parking space identification camera, a micro base station, a city inspection module, a data transmission line and a data processing display host. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that the practical training device of the Internet of Things, the practical training device of artificial intelligence and other practical training devices are integrated together, and data are transmitted to the data processing display host in real time by using a data transmission line or a wireless mode; the cloud data platform on the data processing display host can process and display the data of each training device in a centralized manner, and the source codes of the cloud data platform are all open, thereby meeting the requirements of basic experiments and engineering training of related professional knowledge points of colleges and universities.

title: Craniocerebral nuclear magnetic resonance image quality control method and system
applicants: SHANDONG CROWDYANG HEALTH SCIENCE AND TECH GROUP LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides a craniocerebral nuclear magnetic resonance image quality control method and system, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a craniocerebral nuclear magnetic resonance image, constructing a data set of the craniocerebral nuclear magnetic resonance image, and respectively marking images containing artifacts and images without artifacts in the data set; dividing the labeled data set into a training set and a test set according to a preset proportion; the method comprises the following steps: firstly, preprocessing a marked data set before training; training the training set data by adopting a ResNet network, and verifying through a test set to obtain a predicted quality control image; and comparing the predicted quality control image with the marked data set, and outputting a result of quality control of the craniocerebral nuclear magnetic resonance image. Based on the method, the invention further provides a brain nuclear magnetic resonance image quality control system. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is utilized to carry out quality control on the image so as to improve the image quality and meet the requirements of clinical diagnosis, scientific research and teaching.

title: Teaching mode pushing method and device based on AI technology
applicants: SHENZHEN CHINESE ROAD EDUCATION SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of the Internet, and discloses a teaching mode pushing method and device based on the AI technology, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the recognition of a historical classroom video, and obtaining the class features of a teacher and students; the method comprises the following steps: analyzing class features of students through machine learning, generating user portraits of the students satisfying a teaching mode, and analyzing satisfaction reasons; according to the student user portraits satisfying the teaching modes and the reasons satisfying the student user portraits, class features of teachers corresponding to the teaching modes are matched; and pushing the teaching features of the teachers corresponding to the teaching modes satisfying the different students to the teacher users. According to the AI technology-based teaching mode pushing method provided by the invention, different teaching modes can be selected according to conditions of different students, so that teaching for different students according to materials is realized, and batch, automatic and large-scale pushing of the teaching modes is realized.

title: Portrait contour intelligent drawing method based on cooperation of double mechanical arms
abstract_text: The invention discloses a portrait contour intelligent drawing method based on cooperation of double mechanical arms, and the method comprises the steps: inputting an original RGB color image into a deep learning face recognition model, and obtaining the pixel coordinate information of five sense organs; carrying out image preprocessing operation to obtain a binary image; a contour image is obtained through binary image contour extraction; dividing the contour image into a left part and a right part; performing pixel point arrangement on the left half contour image and the right half contour image to form a plurality of discontinuous track segments; the pixel coordinates are converted into coordinates under a mechanical arm tool coordinate system; mechanical arm posture information is added to the track section coordinates, and a series of tracks capable of being recognized by the mechanical arm are formed; performing non-interference double-arm drawing motion planning on the trajectory; the non-interference tracks are transmitted to the two mechanical arms through a TCP/IP protocol, and double-mechanical-arm collaborative portrait drawing is carried out. According to the method, the function of collaborative drawing of the double mechanical arms is achieved, the drawing efficiency is high, the effect is vivid, and display in education and teaching occasions is facilitated.

title: Practical teaching system and method for traditional wood carving process teaching major
applicants: ZHEJIANG TECHNICAL SCHOOL IN DONGYANG CITY
inventor_name: OTHER INVENTORS HAVE WAIVED THE RIGHT TO BE MENTIONED
abstract_text: The invention provides a traditional wood carving process teaching professional practical teaching system and method. The traditional wood carving process teaching specialty practice teaching system comprises theory teaching and practice teaching, and the theory teaching and the practice teaching are both provided with a wood carving process teaching stage. By using an artificial intelligence technology of AI intelligent 3D panoramic scanning and a new-generation information technology that works influence digital processing, dynamic panoramic image processing can be performed on works which are practiced and trained by students, so that the students can conveniently observe the training works of themselves and other students at a short distance through display equipment; meanwhile, a new generation of information technology in the display equipment is combined, online interaction between teachers and students can be achieved, the teachers can conveniently guide each student, meanwhile, the students can timely and automatically find problems existing in each process stage of the wood carving process, and the practical teaching quality of traditional wood carving process teaching can be improved.

title: Working method of virtual teaching system based on AI assistant
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of teaching application of virtual reality technology, and provides a working method of a virtual teaching system based on an AI assistant, and the method comprises the steps: (1) building a teaching scene data set; (2) generating an intelligent virtual avatar; and (3) virtual teaching based on the AI assistant. According to the invention, videos of a classroom environment and teaching activities are collected, diversified labels are adopted, a teaching scene data set is constructed, an intelligent virtual avatar is generated, a virtual teaching environment is perceived and understood, knowledge points are demonstrated in a visual mode in collaborative teaching, an AI test assistant is constructed, a training and assessment mode is supported, and an operation statistics, evaluation and feedback mechanism is created. According to the invention, intelligence generation in a virtual teaching system is facilitated, and deep fusion of artificial intelligence, virtual reality and education teaching is promoted.

title: Artificial intelligence experiment teaching equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI COMMERCIAL SOUP INTELLIGENT SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The embodiment of the utility model provides artificial intelligence experiment teaching equipment which comprises an operation panel, an artificial intelligence processing module and a sensor module, wherein the artificial intelligence processing module and the sensor module are fixed on the operation panel; wherein the artificial intelligence processing module and the sensor module are in communication connection, and each of the artificial intelligence processing module and the sensor module is composed of at least one hardware unit; the artificial intelligence processing module is used for acquiring to-be-processed data from the sensor module and performing artificial intelligence operation on the to-be-processed data; and the sensor module is used for performing data acquisition by using at least one sensor to obtain to-be-processed data, and transmitting the to-be-processed data to the artificial intelligence processing module. According to the equipment provided by the embodiment of the invention, students can be promoted to understand artificial intelligence related technical knowledge, and the practical ability and innovation ability of the students can be better promoted to be improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform, comprising a platform main body and a display screen, the right side of the platform main body is provided with the display screen, the left side of the platform main body is provided with a support frame, the lower part of the support frame is in bearing connection with a screw rod, one end of the screw rod is in key connection with a motor, and the screw rod is provided with a fixing block. And a movable plate is clamped below the fixed block, a movable block is installed at the top end of the fixed block, a round rod penetrates through one side of the movable block, the periphery of the round rod is sleeved with a belt, one end of the belt is arranged on a threaded rod, and a clamping block is arranged on the threaded rod. According to the artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform, when teaching experiment activities are carried out on the artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform, auxiliary equipment needing to be used can be placed between the two clamping blocks, then a handle is rotated to drive a round rod to rotate, and the round rod drives a threaded rod to rotate through a belt; and the threaded rod drives the clamping blocks to move oppositely to clamp the auxiliary equipment.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device for teaching
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence teaching device for teaching comprises a controller assembly, operation keys, a power connection plate, a loudspeaker, a display screen and a supporting base, the supporting base is arranged at the bottom of the controller assembly of the teaching device, the supporting base supports the controller assembly through a first connecting rod, and arc-shaped clamping teeth are arranged at the bottom of the first connecting rod; the bottoms of the arc-shaped clamping teeth are meshed with the movable toothed plate, movement of the first connecting rod is limited through the movable toothed plate, the height of the controller assembly and the height of the display screen can be adjusted by pulling the controller assembly upwards, the first connecting rod moves along with upward movement of the controller assembly, and the bottom of the controller assembly is supported through the first connecting rod; and the controller assembly can move downwards by pressing the push rod at the rear end of the supporting base, so that the height of the display screen can be conveniently adjusted according to the needs of a user.

title: Medical data mining and application system and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical data mining and application system and device, and relates to the technical field of medical data mining. The system comprises a B/S architecture-based data source, a data processing service device and a data application terminal, the data source is used for acquiring various original medical data and transmitting the original medical data to the data processing service device; and the data processing service device is used for receiving the data transmitted by the data source, storing, mining, desensitizing, protecting, encrypting and authenticating the data, and providing a data application service function to the outside. According to the medical data mining system, massive medical data can be systematically analyzed and processed by establishing the medical data mining system, and useful data information is retrieved from the medical data in a retrieval mining mode; and the requirements of scientific research, academic, monitoring, early warning, teaching, training, AI training, product research and development and the like of governments, scientific research institutions, scientific research groups/individuals and enterprises under the support of big data statistical analysis and big data mining can be met.

title: Intelligent teaching demonstration system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: AIBEBA JIANGSU ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching demonstration system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a teaching information collection module, a data processing center, an initial demonstration setting module, a demonstration obstacle testing module, and a teaching demonstration control module. All collected information is stored through the data processing center, the teaching demonstration mode is adjusted through the initial demonstration setting module according to the learning progress, abnormal conditions are monitored through the demonstration obstacle testing module in the demonstration process, whether a demonstration key area is shielded by walking of a person is analyzed through images, and the teaching demonstration is completed. Meanwhile, the sight focusing position of the student is estimated, the listening concentration degree of the student is analyzed, a demonstration picture is adjusted through the teaching demonstration control module, the student is reminded to pay attention to listening, the teaching efficiency is improved, and the learning effect difference of the student is reduced while the overall learning efficiency of the student is improved.

title: Deep learning-based course patrol supervision system
applicants: GUANGZHOU LEEG INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a supervisory course patrol system based on deep learning. The supervisory course patrol system comprises an Internet of Things management module, a data cloud storage module, an application service module and a supervisory management module, the Internet of Things management module is used for connecting the smart classroom and controlling the Internet of Things intercommunication of the physical machines in the room based on a deep learning convolutional neural network; the data cloud storage module is used for receiving and collecting a data module generated by internet-of-things intercommunication, converting the data module into data files in a specific format and storing the data files in a classified manner; and the application service module is used for classifying and forming a learning end and a teaching end based on a communication account and a customized teaching application program. According to the supervising and guiding class patrol system based on deep learning, supervisors can conveniently know teaching operation dynamic data in a classroom in a multi-dimensional and multi-angle mode, teaching decision data basis is provided for a teaching management department, unified scheduling of teaching daily operation is facilitated, unified scheduling and efficient execution of teaching guarantee work are achieved, and teaching efficiency is improved. And most of the existing problems are effectively solved, and high practical value is achieved.

title: Learning method of unit action deep learning model and robot control method using the same
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method that divides an action of an operator into a plurality of unit actions comprising approaching, aligning, grabbing an object, moving an object, placing down an object, inserting, and tightening, and acquires an image for a correct answer image and an additional learning from a demonstration comprising direct teaching and observation respectively for each unit action, thereby learning using the same. Therefore, the present invention is capable of allowing even complex tasks to be modeled quickly and accurately.

title: IMAGE QUALITY IMPROVEMENT SYSTEM AND IMAGE QUALITY IMPROVEMENT METHOD
abstract_text: Provided are an image quality improvement system and an image quality improvement method for improving the image quality of a low quality image by machine learning, the image quality improvement system and the image quality improvement method being highly accurate, highly reliable, and enabling learning with appropriate teaching information even for a sample for which the image can easily change every time imaging is performed. This image quality improvement system improves the image quality of a low quality image, and is characterized by comprising: an image quality improvement unit that improves the image quality of a low quality image; a deformation prediction unit that predicts a deformation amount occurring between a first low quality image included in a series of input low quality images, and a second low quality image that is different from the first low quality image; and a deformation correction unit that corrects, on the basis of the deformation amount predicted by the deformation prediction unit, one of a first prediction image obtained by applying processing by the image quality improvement unit to the first low quality image, the second low quality image, or a second prediction image obtained by applying processing by the image quality improvement unit to the second low quality image. The image quality improvement system is further characterized by learning so as to reduce: the evaluation of a loss function between the first prediction image corrected by the deformation correction unit, and the second low quality image or the second prediction image; or the evaluation of a loss function between the first prediction image, and the second prediction image or the second low quality image corrected by the deformation correction unit.

title: Teaching robot with charging protection structure
applicants: HEBEI ZONGCHENG TIANSHI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a teaching robot with a charging protection structure, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the teaching robot comprises a robot main body, the bottom of the robot main body is movably provided with moving wheels, the bottoms of the moving wheels are movably clamped with a base, the top of the base is provided with a charging mechanism, the charging mechanism comprises a charging panel, and the charging panel is provided with a charging protection structure. The interior of the charging panel is connected with a wire, and the output end of the wire is electrically connected with a plug. When the moving wheels move to the top of the base, the moving wheels can be exactly clamped with the grooves in the top of the base to prevent the robot body from deviating from the plug, when the robot body completely moves to the top of the base, the charging mechanism can be connected with the connector to facilitate charging of the robot body, and after calibration, the robot body can be charged conveniently. And the electric telescopic rod is started, so that the electric telescopic rod moves forwards, the plug is driven to move into the connector, and charging of the robot body is completed.

title: Blackboard device for junior high school teaching based on deep learning
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of blackboard devices for teaching, in particular to a blackboard device for junior high school teaching based on deep learning. The utility model aims to solve the technical problems of automatically wiping a blackboard and collecting dust. In order to solve the technical problems, the blackboard device for junior high school teaching based on deep learning is mainly composed of a wiping mechanism and a dust collecting mechanism, and through cooperation of a blackboard body, an electric sliding table, an electric push rod, a support, a wet-type wiping plate and other components, the dust collecting mechanism is used for collecting dust. The effects that the blackboard can be quickly wiped clean, no residual handwriting is left on the blackboard body are achieved, the classroom time of teachers is saved, through cooperation of a dust receiving box, a dust collecting box, a separation net, a dust suction pipe and a dust suction opening, dust generated when the blackboard is wiped is prevented from falling in front of a platform, and the blackboard is convenient to use. Therefore, the health of teachers and students is influenced, the effect of collecting dust is achieved, and the environment of the platform is cleaner.

title: Intelligent rocker arm supply device
applicants: SHANDONG PLANT PARK EDUCATIONAL EQUIPMENT STOCK LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent rocker arm supply device which comprises a main body, a moving device, a direction adjusting device and a feeding device, the moving device is arranged on the main body, the direction adjusting device is arranged on the moving device, and the feeding device is arranged on the direction adjusting device. The utility model belongs to the technical field of intelligent rocker arms, and particularly relates to an intelligent rocker arm supply device. The existing artificial intelligence science and technology level is displayed to students through the moving device, the direction adjusting device and the feeding device, and the problem that an intelligent rocker arm supply device in the current market is low in teaching efficiency is effectively solved.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
applicants: CHONGQING COMA CROWN SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device which comprises a base, the other side of the surface of the base is provided with a placing groove, the outer surface of the placing groove is provided with a push-pull moving door, the surfaces of the two sides of the base are fixedly connected with second fixed mounting plates, and the surface of the top of the base is fixedly connected with a fixed frame. A display is fixedly connected in the fixing frame, a camera is arranged in the middle of the top of the surface of the fixing frame, first fixing mounting plates are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the surface of the top of the fixing frame, a first fixing block is fixedly connected in the base, and a spring damping rod is fixedly connected to the surface of one side of the first fixing block; the tail end of the spring damping rod is fixedly connected with a second fixing block, the surface of the first fixing block is fixedly connected with a second loudspeaker, and the surface of the second fixing block is fixedly connected with a first loudspeaker. According to the utility model, the loudspeaker is fixedly connected with the spring damping rod, so that the vibration of the device in use is reduced.

title: AI intelligent teaching robot based on Internet of Things
applicants: FOSHAN SPECIAL LOVE ROBOT LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model provides an AI intelligent teaching robot based on the internet of things, relates to the teaching equipment technical field, and comprises a mobile pedestal, a machine seat and a machine body, the machine seat is internally provided with an internet of things controller, the outer side of the internet of things controller is provided with a protection structure, and the protection structure is provided with a protective cover. And high-frequency signal receivers are arranged in the machine base and located on the left side and the right side of the Internet of Things controller, and a display screen is arranged in the machine body. The AI intelligent teaching robot is convenient for students to learn, is fast in signal transmission, prevents the students from getting stuck during learning, prevents the students from being incapable of learning normally, can protect the Internet of Things controller to prevent the AI intelligent teaching robot from being damaged due to external impact, prolongs the service life of the AI intelligent teaching robot, and is convenient to use. And the display screen can be protected, the display screen is prevented from being damaged, and the service life of the AI intelligent teaching robot is further prolonged.

title: MODEL GENERATION DEVICE FOR VISUAL INSPECTION, AND VISUAL INSPECTION DEVICE
abstract_text: This model generation device generates, on the basis of an image of a normal product, a model to be used in a visual inspection. Said model generation device generates abnormal image data by carrying out image processing with respect to acquired normal image data, and on the basis of the content of the image processing at such time, generates label image data indicating an abnormal site. Next, teaching data is generated using the abnormal image data as input data and the normal image data and the label image data as output data, and a machine learning device is instructed to generate a learning model by carrying out machine learning based on the teaching data.

title: Botany intelligent teaching instrument and botany artificial intelligence planting method
applicants: SHENZHEN RICE LIGHT SCIENCE AND TECH SERVICE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a botany intelligent teaching instrument, and belongs to the field of botany artificial intelligence. Comprising a three-dimensional planter (1), an interaction screen (7) and a plant growth detection system, the three-dimensional planter (1) comprises a plant lamp (2), a plant table (3) and a supply disc (4); the plant growth detection system comprises an automatic control panel (5) and a shooting device (6); plants are planted in the three-dimensional planters, and the plant growth detection system controls the growth environment of the plants in the three-dimensional planters and monitors the growth state of the plants in the three-dimensional planters under the control of the interactive screen and feeds back a growth rotary table to the interactive screen; and the interactive screen can be used for man-machine interaction, setting a plant growth environment, displaying a plant growth state and presetting extended reading data. The automatic control panel controls the plant environment, and the shooting device collects the plant growth state. According to the invention, the system is naturally moved into a classroom, a user carries out planting independently or under guidance, and directly participates in the whole growth process of plants in a natural state, so that an online and offline fused situational teaching platform is created.

title: AI interactive teaching equipment
applicants: SHENZHEN FLAG CLOUD NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, in particular to AI interactive teaching equipment, which comprises a control box, a manipulator, a control panel, a support column, a spring, a support plate, a controller, a smoke sensor, an open fire sensor, an alarm, a small motor, a carbon dioxide fire extinguisher and an electric valve. When the teaching equipment is smoked and spontaneously combusted due to line faults and the smoke sensor detects smoke in the teaching equipment, the controller enables the alarm to give out alarm sound to remind a user, and when the open fire sensor detects open fire in the teaching equipment, the controller enables the alarm to give out alarm sound to remind the user. The controller controls the electric valve to work, carbon dioxide gas in the carbon dioxide fire extinguisher is released, fire extinguishing treatment is carried out, increase of the fire behavior is avoided, and the use safety of the equipment is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence and interactive teaching system based on electronic specialty
applicants: SHANGHAI ELECTRONIC INFORMATION OCCUPATIONAL TECH COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence and interactive teaching system based on electronic specialty, a teaching device body of the interactive teaching system is provided with a display module, a touch pen, a microphone, a loudspeaker and a handle provided with a vibration module, and the teaching device body is internally provided with a central processing unit, a teaching module, an analysis module and the like. A user selects a current learning subject for learning and answering through the display module, the user can input answers in any mode of the touch pen or the microphone, and the central processing unit can control the loudspeaker to make different sounds according to correct and wrong conditions of the answers and control the vibration module to enable the handle to vibrate at the same time. Therefore, the interaction function in the teaching process is realized, and the teaching effect is effectively improved. And the analysis module can analyze the difficulty level of the teaching test question according to the correct rate of the answer of the user to generate difficulty level information for evaluating the learning level, and performs intelligent adjustment, so that teaching according to the materials is realized, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: Groove cutting method, device, equipment and system based on 3D vision and medium
applicants: ENTROPY INTELLIGENCE SCIENCE AND TECH SHENZHEN LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a beveling method, device, equipment and system based on 3D vision and a medium. According to the method, a digital output state transmitted by a computer end is received, the next action is judged according to the digital output state, and when the next action continues to be executed, a beveling process is executed; the method comprises the steps of obtaining information of the number of groove lines to be cut, judging whether execution continues or not according to the information of the number of the groove lines to be cut, if execution continues, obtaining the type of the current groove line, selecting a corresponding target program according to the type of the current groove line, and conducting cutting operation according to the target program. And whether the current groove line is the last groove line to be cut or not is judged, cutting continues or cutting ends is selected according to the judgment result, automatic cutting, teaching-free and off-line programming-free can be achieved on the basis of workpiece drawing information, workpiece point cloud, software processing and a robot according to different workpieces and different positions, and the production efficiency is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence interactive teaching equipment based on education
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching equipment, and particularly discloses artificial intelligence interactive teaching equipment based on education, which comprises an education robot main body, an action mechanism is movably mounted on the lower surface of the education robot main body, and the action mechanism comprises a supporting main shell and side shells hinged to the two sides of the supporting main shell through hinges; the top of the side shell and the top of the supporting main shell are provided with grooves allowing the education robot body to be placed therein. Through the arranged action mechanism, when the education robot main body needs to move on the ground according to needs, the education robot main body can be placed in the grooves formed in the tops of the supporting main shell and the side shell, and after the communication interface is communicated with the socket, the education robot main body can control the action mechanism; when the education robot body does not need to move on the ground to interact with children, the education robot body can be taken out and placed on a table top cleanly for continuous use, and the education robot is suitable for different use scenes.

title: Autonomous controllable electric power artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: HANGZHOU TONGZHENG SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model provides an autonomous controllable electric power artificial intelligence teaching platform, which comprises a main shell, a lifting platform, a dustproof body, a multimedia computer, a lifting mechanism, a support column, an anti-skid ferrule, a PLC (Programmable Logic Controller), a position sensor and a control switch, and is characterized in that the lifting platform is arranged in the main shell, one side of the lifting platform is provided with the lifting mechanism, and the other side of the lifting platform is provided with the anti-skid ferrule; a multimedia computer is arranged at the upper end of the lifting mechanism, a supporting column is arranged on the lower portion of the main shell, and the lower end of the supporting column is connected with an anti-skid ferrule in a sleeved mode. Due to the arrangement of the main shell, the lifting table, the dustproof body and the lifting mechanism, operation is easy and convenient, dustproof measures are good, disassembly is convenient during maintenance, and the problem that teachers are very inconvenient to see teaching materials when giving lessons in a standing mode is solved.

title: Artificial intelligence type monitor
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of monitoring equipment, in particular to an artificial intelligence type monitor which comprises a mounting seat, a monitoring mechanism is mounted at the top of the mounting seat, a rotating rod is mounted at the center of the bottom of the mounting seat, and a fixing mechanism is mounted on the outer wall of the rotating rod and below the mounting seat. An electromagnet is installed at the position, corresponding to the rotating rod, of the bottom of the mounting base, a storage battery is installed in the rotating rod, a small controller is installed on the left side of the mounting base, and through the arrangement of the mounting base, the small controller and a monitoring mechanism, the problem that at present, when a teacher teaches, the classroom learning state of students cannot be judged, and the teaching efficiency is improved is solved. Such as careful learning, mobile phone playing, sleepiness, happiness, depression and the like, and the learning state and classroom quality of the students cannot be confirmed.

title: Programming automatic feedback method and system based on deep learning eye movement tracking
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of programming teaching, and particularly provides a programming automatic feedback method and system based on deep learning eye movement tracking, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, recognizing a programming source code based on a finite state automaton (FSM); s2, extracting semantic vector feature values through natural language processing (NLP); when programming errors are reported, the face is recognized through a CNN training model, eyeball behaviors are tracked, and therefore automatic feedback information conforming to the cognitive level is pushed in an optimized mode. By developing a compiler DaoPL of an FSM finite state automaton, a teacher can be helped to provide effective teaching support for a novice learner, and meanwhile, in combination with deep learning, eye movement detection is used for performing cognitive level judgment on the learner, so that pushing of automatic feedback information is optimized. According to the scheme, a computer teacher can further improve the teaching effect of programming courses, and meanwhile, the method can be popularized to the industrial circle to accelerate the development efficiency of enterprise software projects.

title: Teaching system based on artificial intelligence image recognition technology
applicants: ANHUI XINHUA MEDIA SHARE LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching system based on an artificial intelligence image recognition technology. The teaching system comprises an image input module, an AI recognition module, a teaching knowledge point input module, a modification and input module, a label and index module, a touch panel terminal, a data interaction module and a knowledge point display module. According to the invention, the AI technology and the image recognition technology are applied to a modern teaching system, and students sort out knowledge points in related teaching materials, so that related difficult points or ununderstood knowledge points in the teaching materials can be recognized; the image recognition technology and the AI technology are used for recognizing difficult points or ununderstood knowledge points on the paper textbook, and corresponding answers are finally obtained from the database through operation; the user does not need to spend time in sorting and manual input, the interaction experience is good, and the application effect is good.

title: Mecanum wheel robot for classroom education
abstract_text: The utility model provides a Mecanum wheel robot for classroom education, which comprises a bottom plate and a plurality of first sensor mounting plates, the first sensor mounting plates are arranged above the bottom plate and extend towards the direction away from the bottom plate, and the first sensor plates are provided with a plurality of first interfaces arranged at intervals; and the plurality of sensor modules are arranged on the first sensor mounting plate, third interfaces are arranged on the sensor modules, and the third interfaces are matched with the first interfaces. According to the Mecanum wheel robot provided by the utility model, the plurality of first sensor mounting plates are arranged, and the unified third interface is arranged on the plurality of sensor modules, so that the plurality of sensor modules can be mounted on any one of the first sensor mounting plates, the disassembly and the arbitrary combination are realized, the teaching and the explanation are convenient, and the practicability is high. The requirements of artificial intelligence education are met, and flexibility and operability are achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence robot based on Internet of Things
applicants: JIANGXI INFORMATION APPLICATION OCCUPATIONAL TECH COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence robot based on Internet of Things, which comprises a head and a body, the bottom of the body is fixedly connected with a base, the bottom edge of the base is provided with universal wheels, the inner side of the body is provided with a lifting shell, the upper end of the lifting shell is fixedly connected with a platform, the upper end of the platform is fixedly connected with a connecting column, and the connecting column is fixedly connected with a connecting rod. The head is fixedly connected to the upper end of the connecting column, a display screen is fixedly embedded in the front end of the head, a camera shooting mechanism is arranged on the front side of the bottom of the head, a microphone located below the display screen is arranged at the front end of the head, loudspeakers are arranged on the two side walls of the head, and a mounting plate is fixedly connected to the lower portion of the inner side of the body. The robot has the function of internet-of-things man-machine interaction, the auxiliary effect on teaching is good, the structure can be flexibly adjusted, the applicability is high, movement is convenient and fast, meanwhile, the buffering and anti-collision effects are achieved, and the probability that the robot is collided and damaged is reduced.

title: Visualization system and method for AI training teaching
applicants: CHENGDU POTENTIAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI training teaching visualization system, which comprises a visualization client, a server side and a training side, every two of the visualization client, the server side and the training side are in communication connection through a network, the training side is used for training to obtain a model file, and training model data and training result data are stored in the server side; the visual client comprises a model loading module, a rendering module, an action execution module, a type selection module and a mode selection module; the visual client is used for loading, rendering and executing the training model and presenting the training effect of the first training model of the current user; meanwhile, the invention further provides an AI training teaching visualization method applied to the system, through the system and the method, the training effect of the training model is visually displayed so that a user can visually know the training effect of the AI training model, AI education is not dull any more, and in the process, the AI education can be confronted with training models of other users, so that the training effect of the AI training model is improved. And the interestingness of AI education is increased.

title: Calligraphy teaching device using AI to assist teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a calligraphy teaching device using AI to assist teaching, comprising a writing desktop and a projector, one side of the top of the writing desktop is provided with a mainframe box, the front and back of the top of the writing desktop are provided with mounting shells, and the bottom of the writing desktop is provided with four groups of mounting frames; a projector is installed on one side of the mainframe box, and an adjusting projection lamp is installed on the back face of one side of the projector. A display screen is embedded in the upper portion of one side of the mainframe box, and a core processor is installed on one side of the display screen. According to the utility model, the projector is installed, the adjustable projection lamp on one side of the projector adjusts the angle up and down, then a calligraphy image in a computer is directly projected on a desktop, a writing brush is directly used for writing on the projected handwriting, a better learning effect can be achieved, and the writing brush is directly contacted with a paper surface for writing, so that the writing brush is convenient to use. And the auxiliary learning effect of the device can be greatly improved.

title: Artificial intelligence open class teaching evaluation device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence open lesson teaching evaluation device which comprises a photo recognition machine, a voiceprint collector, a base, a storage box and a controller. According to the utility model, the photo recognition machine, the voiceprint collector, the storage box, the controller, the positioning device and the transmission device are matched for use, the photo recognition machine can record the number of attendance people by recognizing human faces, the voiceprint collector can collect and analyze voiceprints of different people, and a plurality of controllers can be stored in the storage box; according to the artificial intelligence open lesson teaching evaluation device, multiple controllers are used for collection protection, and the problems that after a course is finished in the prior art, each student and an evaluation teacher often conduct satisfaction investigation, an existing investigation mode is too troublesome, evaluation results are inconvenient to collect, and time is wasted are solved. The method has the advantages that the satisfaction degree of curriculums can be evaluated through one controller, and the controller can be collected and protected.

title: Classroom student attention video analysis system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a classroom student attention video analysis system. According to the system, a knowledge point identification unit is used for numbering knowledge points corresponding to each moment to obtain a knowledge point numbering sequence; knowledge point scoring sequence: obtaining a knowledge point importance degree curve; the fatigue degree detection unit is used for obtaining a fatigue degree detection curve by combining regular fatigue and random fatigue; and the attention detection unit is used for obtaining an attention detection necessity curve corresponding to the current classroom by combining the knowledge point importance degree curve and the fatigue degree detection curve, and carrying out reasonable attention degree detection on each moment according to the attention detection necessity curve. The detection necessity is judged by combining the importance degree of knowledge points of classroom teaching and the fatigue state of the student, so that high pressure of the student is avoided, and the detection of the attention of the student is more humanized.

title: Novel artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: ASSISTANCE INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY IN WUTINESS CITY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine, and relates to the technical field of novel artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machines. The dust collector comprises an outer box body, lifting rods are fixedly connected to the two sides of the bottom in the outer box body, a dust collector is fixedly connected to the center of the bottom of the outer box body, guide rods are symmetrically welded to the front side of the upper portion of the outer box body, a screw is rotationally connected to the middle of the two guide rods, a first motor is arranged at one end of the screw, and a sliding block is connected to the screw in a threaded mode; a supporting rod is welded to one side of the sliding block, one side of the supporting rod is sleeved with a brush rod, and the end of the brush rod is rotationally connected with a pulley. Through the cooperation of the dust collector, the screw rod, the brush rod, the corrugated plate, the transmission mechanism and the screen, multi-angle adjustment, cleaning and placement of the screen are achieved, the screen cleaning device is suitable for more people, convenient and rapid to operate and small in limitation, the cleaning efficiency and the placement environment are improved, the propaganda and popularization efficiency is greatly improved, the service life is greatly prolonged, and the cleanliness is greatly improved.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: To effectively support teaching operation of a user for machine learning by display-outputting a plurality of learning images obtained by photographing a tissue specimen.SOLUTION: A method extracts a feature of an object in an image by image processing for each of a plurality of learning images obtained by photographing a tissue specimen, configures an image set by selecting a plurality of parts of images from among the learning images on the basis of the extracted features and a prescribed selection reference, outputs, to a display device, a display image in which a plurality of learning images contained in the image set are arranged in a same window, and accepts a teaching input from a user for at least one of the displayed learning image. Then, the method configures a plurality of image sets with mutually different combinations of learning images, displays the display images while switching the plurality of display images respectively corresponding to the plurality of image sets, and accepts a teaching input, thereby, causing one learning image to be contained into the plurality of image sets.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: DATA MANAGEMENT PROGRAM, DATA MANAGEMENT METHOD, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS
abstract_text: To provide a data management program for improving classification accuracy of machine learning, a data management method, and an information processing apparatus.SOLUTION: A data management program causes a computer to execute: clustering teaching data by using feature quantities of the teaching data in multiple pieces of learning data including the teaching data and teaching signals corresponding to the teaching data; and extracting a cluster of error candidates out of clusters generated by the clustering, on the basis of the number of types of the teaching signals corresponding to the teaching data included in the clusters and a standard deviation of the number of teaching signals for each type.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 9

title: VOICE OBJECTIVE EVALUATION DEVICE AND PROGRAM THEREFOR
abstract_text: To provide a voice objective evaluation device and a program therefor that make it possible to acquire a closer objective evaluation value by comparing a playback signal of a compressed encoded sound of an arbitrary voice encoding system with a playback signal of an uncompressed sound.SOLUTION: A voice objective evaluation device 1 according to the present patent comprises: an analysis unit 11 which inputs a playback signal of a compressed encoded sound as object of analysis of objective evaluation and a playback signal of an uncompressed sound corresponding thereto, segments the playback signals of the compressed encoded sound and uncompressed sound at intervals of a certain time, respectively, and at least calculates auditory distortion characteristic data represented by the ratio of a difference in energy and a masking quantity for every predetermined number of critical bands grouped for a difference frequency spectrum obtained by comparing the uncompressed sound and compressed encoded sound according to an auditory model for machine learning; and a recognition model unit 12 which is composed of a neural network having learnt objective evaluation value as teaching data in advance, and calculates objective evaluation value related to the compressed encoded sound based upon the auditory distortion characteristic data and then outputs it to the outside.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: TOTAL REFLECTION FLUORESCENT X-RAY ANALYSIS DEVICE AND INFERENCE METHOD
abstract_text: Provided are a total reflection fluorescent X-ray analysis device and a determination method that make it possible to easily and quickly determine whether or not there is contamination at a substrate by using a machine learning device. This total reflection fluorescent X-ray analysis device includes: a spectrum acquisition unit that irradiates a surface of a substrate with a primary X-ray at not more than a total reflection critical angle and acquires spectra each indicating a relation between energy and intensity of the emitted fluorescent X-ray; and a training unit which includes an inference unit for generating inference data regarding an element included in contamination at the surface of the substrate in accordance with input of the spectra and in which learning of the inference unit has been executed on the basis of teaching data that includes the spectra for learning and data regarding an element included in the contamination at the surface of the substrate used when the spectra for the learning are acquired and the inference data that is generated when the spectra for the learning are inputted to the inference unit.

title: Cable fault diagnosis teaching system based on virtual reality technology
applicants: NANNING POWER SUPPLY BUREAU OF GUANGXI POWER GRID LTD RESPONSIBILITY COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching system for cable fault diagnosis based on a virtual reality technology. The teaching system comprises a cloud database, a function realization module and a learning module. The cloud database is used for storing the existing cable fault diagnosis technology and operation method, real environment data and a three-dimensional virtual scene; the learning module is used for storing training teaching modes; and the function realization module is used for realizing virtual teaching of cable fault diagnosis in combination with the cloud database and the learning module. According to the invention, a virtual reality environment is used to prevent new students from directly contacting a fault environment with a certain risk; the artificial intelligence module is used for replacing the position of a traditional teacher to realize zero-error teaching anytime and anywhere; the real case data and the real-time data are used for establishing a three-dimensional virtual scene to achieve the purpose of training on-site judgment and execution, a three-dimensional teaching environment is provided for cable fault diagnosis technology students, and the problems that in the teaching process, the site is not enough, the cost is high, teachers are insufficient, timing is needed, the environment is dangerous, and the technology of the students is insufficient are solved.

title: Multi-language question answering method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-language question answering method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a question described by using a first language; extracting words and sentences included in the first language from the first language; the words and sentences are used as key words to conduct retrieval in preset content, the preset content is a text of teaching content of a teacher in the language course learned by the user last time, and each segment in the text corresponds to time information of teaching of the teacher; after a predetermined paragraph including words and sentences is retrieved in the text, time information corresponding to the predetermined paragraph is obtained; intercepting a multimedia fragment corresponding to the time information from a teacher teaching video recorded in the latest learning language course; and displaying the multimedia fragments as answers of the questions. Through the method and the device, the problem of low question answering efficiency caused by manual question answering by a teacher in network learning in the prior art is solved, so that the question answering efficiency is improved to a certain extent.

title: Artificial intelligence education device
applicants: SHANGHAI ARMOURED ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of education devices, in particular to an artificial intelligence education device which comprises a table, a first servo motor, a second servo motor and a control switch, the bottom end of the table is fixedly connected with a supporting column, the bottom end of the supporting column is fixedly connected with supporting legs, the upper end of the table is fixedly connected with a vertical plate, the lower portion of the left side of the vertical plate is fixedly connected with the first servo motor, and the lower portion of the left side of the vertical plate is fixedly connected with the second servo motor. A rotating shaft of the first servo motor penetrates through the vertical plate to be fixedly connected with a first rotating disc, the first rotating disc is in transmission connection with a second rotating disc through a belt, the second rotating disc is fixedly connected to one end of a rotating rod, and the other end of the rotating rod penetrates through the vertical plate and is fixedly connected with a mounting plate. According to the utility model, the clamping device is arranged, so that the display screen can be quickly clamped for use, display screens with different heights can be conveniently clamped, and the rotating device is arranged, so that the viewing angle of the display screen can be quickly rotated, a horizontal screen or a vertical screen can be selected to adapt to various types of teaching materials, and more comprehensive teaching can be conveniently carried out.

title: AI intelligent education robot for intelligent education
applicants: FOSHAN SPECIAL LOVE ROBOT LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The utility model provides an AI intelligent education robot for wisdom education, and relates to the technical field of intelligent education robots, the AI intelligent education robot for wisdom education comprises a first shell, a first groove is arranged in the first shell close to the top edge, a fixing frame is fixed on the inner bottom surface of the first groove, and a motor is fixed in the fixing frame. According to the utility model, the electric telescopic rod stretches and contracts to adjust the height of the projector, and then the motor drives the rotating rod to rotate, so that the movable ring drives the second shell to rotate to adjust the angle of the projector, the content projected by the projector is located at a proper position, and the requirement of all students for comfortable watching is met; meanwhile, the central processing unit is arranged in the teaching aid, content projection can be carried out according to sound instructions of teachers, the learning interestingness of the students is increased, and meanwhile the teaching pressure of the teachers is relieved.

title: Interactive foreign language teaching method and device
abstract_text: An interactive foreign language teaching method comprises an AI system and network resources, and comprises the following steps: S1, establishing a resource library based on the AI system and the network resources; s2, acquiring student information; s3, entering an interface; s4, interactive teaching comprises a low-grade module, a middle-grade module, a high-grade module and a one-to-one module; and S5, summarizing, judging and analyzing teaching contents of the low-grade module, the middle-grade module, the high-grade module and the one-to-one module, sorting and feeding back the teaching contents to a resource library. After the steps are adopted, the method has the following advantages that students can select proper low-grade, middle-grade and high-grade teaching or one-to-one teaching according to own requirements, progressive teaching is carried out, an AI system is adopted to carry out dialogue with the students, communication of words, grammar and sentences is carried out, correction is carried out at the same time, effective interaction is formed, and the teaching efficiency is improved. And the learning interest and teaching quality of students are improved.

title: Mixed-flow plate double-sided spraying method, device and system based on visual inspection and storage medium
applicants: AEROSPACE DEPARTMENT WORKER SHENZHEN GROUP LTD COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of double-sided spraying, and discloses a mixed-flow plate double-sided spraying method, device and system based on visual inspection and a storage medium. An image of a workpiece to be sprayed is collected, and the image of the workpiece to be sprayed is preprocessed; the preprocessed image is input into a UTransNet semantic segmentation model for target segmentation, and the contour of the workpiece to be sprayed is extracted; inputting the obtained profile diagram of the to-be-sprayed workpiece into a spraying track planning algorithm, and obtaining a spraying path of the to-be-sprayed workpiece in combination with a preset experience library containing a spray gun type, a process method, a teaching spraying path speed and an acceleration parameter; and the workpiece is sprayed according to the spraying path. In addition, the invention further discloses a double-sided spraying device and system corresponding to the double-sided spraying method. Compared with the prior art, through the visual system constructed and trained based on the deep learning neural network, recognition of geometric features and postures of the to-be-sprayed plate is completed, and the spraying path is intelligently generated.

title: Man-machine interaction system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a man-machine interaction system and method based on artificial intelligence. The man-machine interaction system comprises a file obtaining module, an instruction determining module, a control module and a projection module. The file acquisition module, the instruction determination module and the projection module are all connected with the control module; the file acquisition module is used for acquiring a file input by a user; the instruction determination module is used for analyzing a user instruction according to the interface tactile information; the control module is used for processing a to-be-arranged file according to the knowledge graph construction instruction to obtain a knowledge graph; and the control module is also used for controlling the projection module to project courseware or a knowledge graph on a curtain according to the projection starting instruction. The knowledge graph constructed through the control module can directly serve as a teaching material or serve as a basis for a teacher to make courseware, the time for the teacher to make the courseware can be shortened, meanwhile, the quality of the courseware is guaranteed, and especially when a teaching outline is changed, the knowledge point arrangement efficiency and accuracy can be greatly improved.

title: Intelligent teaching system based on computer and teaching method thereof
applicants: BEIJING BOER QINGCHENG SCIENCE AND TECH CO
abstract_text: An intelligent teaching system based on a computer comprises a teacher module, a data synchronization module, a student module and a display module. The teaching method of the intelligent teaching system based on the computer in the claim 1 comprises the following steps: S1, sending a teaching content information acquisition request to the teaching data synchronization module through the teacher module; s2, the teaching data synchronization module transmits preset teaching content information to the teacher module, transmits preset display information to the display module, and transmits preset learning information to the student module according to the teaching content information request; and S3, the display module displays and plays according to the display information. According to the invention, intelligent teaching under the Internet ring platform can be realized. The invention provides a brand-new intelligent teaching system method and thought based on computer software and hardware, the Internet and artificial intelligence technology are fully utilized, and the convenience and intelligence of teaching are improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence teaching device comprises a teaching bedplate, a main supporting block, a control cavity, a lifting supporting plate, a shielding plate, a base block, an adjusting supporting plate, a rotating rod and a display screen, a mounting groove with an upward opening is formed in the rear side of the interior of the base block, an electric telescopic rod is arranged in the mounting groove, a guide wheel is arranged at the telescopic end of the upper end of the electric telescopic rod, and the display screen is arranged in the guide wheel. The rear side in the adjusting support plate is provided with a rail groove with a downward opening and used in cooperation with the guide wheels, the lower end of the teaching table plate is provided with a control box on the other side of the main support block, the control box is internally provided with a driving motor, and the rotating end of the upper end of the driving motor is provided with a rotating support column. The upper end of the rotating supporting column extends to the upper side of the exterior of the teaching table plate and is provided with a display supporting plate, and an auxiliary supporting block used in cooperation with the main supporting block is arranged on the side, away from the main supporting block, of the lower end of the control box. Compared with the prior art, the utility model has the advantages that the display screen is adjustable, the dustproof effect is good, and artificial intelligence article display and explanation are facilitated.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching robot model structure
applicants: SHANGHAI ARMOURED ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence teaching robot model structure. The artificial intelligence teaching robot model structure comprises a cylinder body, a limiting groove and a limiting cylinder, the limiting groove is located in the cylinder body, and the limiting groove and the cylinder body are of an integrated structure. The limiting cylinder is arranged in the limiting groove, and the limiting cylinder is in sliding connection with the limiting groove; a sealing plate is arranged on the lower side of a limiting cylinder, and the sealing plate and the limiting cylinder are connected in a welding mode. The mounting holes are formed in the upper and lower sides of the left and right sides of the limiting cylinder respectively, and the mounting holes and the limiting cylinder are of an integrated structure; the fixing block is arranged in the limiting cylinder, and the fixing block is in sliding connection with the limiting cylinder; the fastening screws are arranged on the left side and the right side of the lower portion in the fixing block correspondingly, and the fastening screws are connected with the fixing block in a screwed mode. Through the improvement on the structure, the device has the advantages of shock absorption, drop resistance, stable structure and convenience in maintenance, so that the problems and defects in the existing device are effectively solved and overcome.

title: Multifunctional artificial intelligence training teaching robot equipment
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, and discloses multifunctional artificial intelligence training teaching robot equipment, which comprises a bottom plate, rollers are fixedly mounted at the bottom of the bottom plate, a robot equipment body is fixedly mounted at the top of the bottom plate, and a humidity sensor is fixedly mounted at the bottom of one side of the robot equipment body. A display screen is fixedly installed on one side of the top of the robot equipment body, a fixing cylinder is fixedly installed on the other side of the top of the robot equipment body, a water adding pipe is fixedly installed in the middle of the top end of the fixing cylinder, and atomizing nozzles are fixedly installed on the two sides of the top end of the fixing cylinder. Through cooperative arrangement of the atomizing nozzle, the water storage tank, the water pump, the first connecting pipe, the second connecting pipe and the shunt pipe, the space of a classroom can be humidified, so that the humidity in the classroom is improved, the environment in the classroom is prevented from being too dry, and the teaching environment is more comfortable.

title: Teaching device with intelligent man-machine interaction function
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field related to artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a teaching device with an intelligent man-machine interaction function, which comprises a shell, an illuminating lamp is arranged at the upper end of the shell, first fixing bolts are arranged on two sides of the illuminating lamp, an anti-skid pad is arranged below the outside of the first fixing bolts, and second fixing bolts are arranged on two sides of the anti-skid pad. A charging port is formed in the lower portion of the exterior of the second fixing bolt, telescopic springs are arranged on the two sides of the charging port, a limiting block is arranged on one side of each telescopic spring, a protection block is arranged on one side of each limiting block, and a sliding block is arranged in each protection block. According to the teaching method and device with the intelligent man-machine interaction function, an effective anti-skid purpose can be achieved for intelligent manufacturing by arranging an anti-skid pad and a second fixing bolt, the second fixing bolt is screwed clockwise to install the anti-skid pad, the friction force between the hand of a user and the intelligent device is increased, and slipping is prevented.

title: Data processing method and system based on AI correction and electronic equipment
applicants: GUANGDONG NATIONAL GRAIN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a data processing method and system based on AI correction and electronic equipment, paper answer carriers and student identities are in one-to-one correspondence through two-dimensional codes, the paper answer carriers can be homework every day or test papers of school organizations, and the paper answer carriers can be scanned or photographed and uploaded by students, so that the paper answer carriers and the student identities are in one-to-one correspondence. Paper answer carriers of all students in a class can be collected by a teacher and then are uniformly scanned or photographed and uploaded, AI correction is completed by using question template data of a cloud identification terminal, correction data is obtained, and statistics of mass teaching data is completed; the method comprises the steps of generating a corresponding wrong question book according to wrong question conditions of students, classes and grades, generating a correction book according to correction of the students on the wrong questions, providing consolidation exercise, generating an academic evaluation report, further generating teaching evaluation data of a school-level report, school learning conditions, class learning conditions and teaching statistics, and providing various teaching quality evaluation modes. And the method has application universality.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform, teaching method thereof and related device
applicants: ZHENGZHOU YUNHAI INFORMATION TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence teaching platform based on a container. The artificial intelligence teaching platform comprises a GPU server and a storage server, the storage server is provided with a preset operating system, a GPU driver and a container configuration module; the preset operating system is used for calling the container configuration module to configure containers with the same number as students to be taught and calling the GPU driver to divide GPU resources corresponding to the containers, and the containers are used for executing artificial intelligence teaching. According to the method, the containers with the same number as the students to be taught can be configured, and the GPU resources corresponding to the containers are divided, so that the problem of tense cluster resources is solved, a teaching process of dynamic interaction between teachers and the students can be effectively established, and customization of an AI teaching platform is realized. The invention further provides a container-based artificial intelligence teaching method, a computer readable storage medium and electronic equipment, which have the above beneficial effects.

title: Deep learning-based general education classroom answer rapid review method and device
applicants: WUHAN DONGXI HOPORAL INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a device for quickly reviewing answer in a general teaching classroom based on deep learning, and relates to the field of intelligent teaching, the method comprises the following steps: detecting student faces in a classroom based on a face recognition algorithm, determining student identities, and establishing a corresponding relation between the student identities and positions of students; based on a posture recognition algorithm, behavior postures of the students in the classroom are recognized, the students in a preset posture are obtained, and the positions of the students in the preset posture are recorded; recognizing the answer result content of the student in the preset posture through a character recognition algorithm to obtain an answer result; and according to the corresponding relationship between the student identity and the position of the student, establishing the corresponding relationship between the answer result and the student identity, and counting all answer results for review. According to the invention, automatic, rapid and accurate statistics of knowledge mastering conditions of all students in a classroom can be realized, and the result statistics cost is low.

title: Method for adjusting learning level and class grouping of intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia based on assessment result, computer and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an assessment result-based learning grade and class grouping adjustment method for intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia, a computer and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of cloud teaching. Firstly, a teacher initiates an assessment request to a teaching application layer; secondly, the students extract test papers from the test questions in the teaching application layer for examination; thirdly, the autonomous learning layer obtains test paper information T; thirdly, judging the test score of the student, and analyzing the score conditions of the associated knowledge and thematic; thirdly, the foreign language learning conditions of the students are portrayed, a reasonable teaching scheme is obtained through continuous correction of artificial intelligence, and a scientific learning plan is given; thirdly, the class model is updated regularly, and the students Si not in the confidence interval K are adjusted to classes with different difficulty levels; and finally, updating and executing the teaching scheme Mj (sigma Pi) and the learning plan Pi.

title: Electric train equipment maintenance practical training evaluation system based on artificial intelligence and knowledge graph
applicants: SICHUAN QI ENTHALPY SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract_text: The invention discloses an electric train equipment maintenance practical training evaluation system based on artificial intelligence and a knowledge graph, which is used for solving the problem of lack of examination resources in the existing electric train equipment maintenance practical training evaluation process. A sensing point camera; a GPU server cluster; a database server cluster and an application server cluster; provided is a large-screen display device. Core function units of the system comprise an intelligent model unit, an electric train maintenance knowledge graph unit, a maintenance rule engine unit and a three-dimensional simulation unit. The invention also comprises an electric train equipment practical training maintenance cabin during implementation. The problem that scoring is not objective enough due to the fact that subjectivity and evaluation experience of a teacher in the evaluation process are insufficient is solved, the problem that an offline maintenance practical training examination and an online teaching process cannot be organically fused is solved, and the problem that the maintenance practical training examination process cannot be effectively digitally simulated and recorded is solved.

title: Deep learning system for computational thinking cultivation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a deep learning system for computational thinking cultivation. The deep learning system comprises a situation task generation module, a teacher personalized teaching module, a student space creation module, a computational thinking space station, an information acquisition module and a student excellent work intelligent screening display module. The system is based on the idea of deep learning, a bridge between school education and social education is erected, students can learn and transfer and apply learned knowledge to practical questions, and the ability of solving the questions by applying subject knowledge is improved; the built-in real situation task generation provides good support for teachers to carry out information technology education, is close to the actual experience of students' life, is more beneficial to the divergent thinking of students, and more actively participates in the problem solving process. The system also records the whole process of solving the problem by the students and stores the learning activities of the problem solving process of the students, so that the calculation thinking development radar map of the students is generated, and the system is more scientific and reasonable.

title: Intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia teaching system and method, computer and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia teaching system and method, a computer and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of cloud teaching. Comprising a teacher surface, a student surface and a cloud surface.
