The teacher surface and the student surface are respectively connected with the cloud surface; the cloud surface comprises a teaching application layer, a data interaction layer, an autonomous learning layer and a cloud management layer; the teaching application layer is used for transmitting teaching contents in an audio-video form; the collection and the playing of image information between the teacher side and the student side are realized; the data interaction layer is used for storing teaching information, test paper, test paper answers and analysis results; the autonomous learning layer is used for the teacher to mine the learning characteristics and pronunciation defects of the students; and the cloud management layer is used for controlling and managing the system. The technical problem that unsupervised and deep learning cannot be realized in the prior art is solved.

title: Examination result-based learning plan making method for intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia, computer and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides an assessment result-based learning plan making method for intelligent cloud foreign language multimedia, a computer and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of cloud teaching. Firstly, a student performs an examination after an examination start prompt; secondly, the teaching application layer transmits pronunciations, shapes, character answer sheets and correct answers of the students during examination to the data interaction layer for storage; thirdly, comparing the audio track, the video lip image and the shape of the student multimedia answer sheet with the correct answer through the artificial intelligence module to give out a judgment result, and transmitting the judgment result to the data interaction layer for storage; thirdly, the teacher summarizes knowledge blind spots of the students and records the knowledge blind spots in a data interaction layer; and finally, providing contact frequency and contact content according to the learning forgetting big data of the students of the level, and selecting a real-time updated teacher's teaching plan and examination nodes according to the historical data of the student group.

title: AI robot for physics teaching experiment
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of experimental robots, in particular to an AI robot for physics teaching experiments, which comprises a machine base, a support is fixedly connected to the upper end of the machine base, a PLC control panel is arranged at the front end of the support, a sliding column is slidably connected to the machine base, an angle adjusting assembly is arranged on the sliding column, and the angle adjusting assembly is connected with the PLC control panel. The angle adjusting assembly is connected with a base in a matched mode, an empty groove is formed in the base, a mass point ejection assembly is arranged on the inner wall of the empty groove and connected with a mass point in a matched mode, the mass point ejection assembly comprises a first air cylinder and a vertical rod, the first air cylinder is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the empty groove, and the vertical rod is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the empty groove. According to the invention, the equipment can be switched between horizontal projectile motion and inclined projectile motion at any time, the operation is simple and easy, and the screw rod lifting equipment and the telescopic length of the second air cylinder are matched, so that the experiment can have different experimental measurement data, the number of experimental data research is increased, and convenience is provided for physics learning of students.

title: Table game teaching aid
abstract_text: A board game teaching aid is suitable for a mobile device and comprises a plurality of control cards, a plurality of map cards and a self-propelled mobile device. The mobile device executes a corresponding application program to establish a connection with the communication unit of the self-propelled mobile device, the application program comprises a supervised machine learning model, the mobile device captures a control card image of one of the control cards and inputs the control card image into the supervised learning model, and the supervised learning model is connected with the mobile device. And the control unit is used for generating a control card instruction corresponding to the control card image and transmitting the control card instruction to the communication unit of the self-propelled mobile device so as to control the driving unit of the self-propelled mobile device to enable the self-propelled mobile device to move or rotate.

title: Device for manufacturing solar cell stack, solar cell stack, and method for manufacturing solar cell stack
abstract_text: The present invention addresses the problem of providing an apparatus for manufacturing a solar cell stack that makes it easy for a person to feel good color balance when the person visually recognizes the solar cell stack. This device for manufacturing a solar cell stack is provided with: an arrangement operation unit (12) in which each solar cell is arranged; and a machine learning unit (20) in which solar cells are arranged in a planar manner, each solar cell having an anti-reflection film formed on a light receiving surface, and among the solar cells, there are solar cells in which color elements are varied due to differences in the thickness of the anti-reflection film or in the refractive index of the anti-reflection film. A machine learning unit (20) performs machine learning using, as teaching data, a correlation between the arrangement of each solar cell and a determination result that is a result of a person determining the color balance of the solar cell stack in the arrangement of the solar cells, and performs machine learning on the basis of the correlation between the arrangement of each solar cell and the determination result that is a result of the person determining the color balance of the solar cell stack in the arrangement of the solar cells. The machine learning unit (20) generates, on the basis of the information on the color elements of each solar cell, a solar cell arrangement model that is predicted to be determined to have good color balance in the solar cell stack when viewed by a person, and the arrangement operation unit (12) is configured so as to arrange each solar cell on the basis of the arrangement model.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MODEL-AGNOSTIC META-LEARNER FOR NOISY DATA WITH LABEL ERRORS
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. Machine learning is performed based on training data via a dual loop learning process that includes a first loop for data decoding learning and a second loop for label decoding learning. In the first loop, first parameters associated with decoding are updated to generate updated first parameters based on a first label, estimated via the decoding using the first parameters, and a second label, predicted via the label decoding using second parameters. In the second loop, the second parameters associated with the label decoding are updated to generate updated second parameters based on a third label, obtained via the decoding using the updated first parameters, and a ground truth label.

title: Self-adaptive electronic blackboard and whiteboard and self-adaptive intelligent electronic blackboard and whiteboard teaching system thereof
applicants: SHENZHEN QIANXIN TECH INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
abstract_text: A self-adaptive electronic blackboard whiteboard comprises an electronic blackboard whiteboard body, a servo lifting mechanism and a self-adaptive position controller. The servo lifting mechanism comprises a lifting device; the lifting device comprises two screw rods, a servo motor and a screw rod guide block; the lead screw guide block is installed on the lead screw and can move up and down along with forward and reverse rotation of the lead screw. The self-adaptive position control device comprises a plurality of self-adaptive position detection devices, a self-adaptive position controller and a servo lifting driving device. The self-adaptive position controller receives operator human body data transmitted by the self-adaptive position detection device to obtain position movement data, converts the position movement data into a control signal and transmits the control signal to the servo lifting driving device; the servo lifting driving device is electrically connected with the servo motor; and the servo lifting driving device drives the servo motor to realize self-adaptive position adjustment of the electronic whiteboard blackboard. According to the utility model, a man-machine interface system with an artificial intelligence attribute can be provided, the labor intensity of teachers is reduced, the teaching environment is improved, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: NEURAL NETWORK FOR OUTPUTTING A PARAMETERIZED 3D MODEL
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of machine-learning including obtaining an architecture for a neural network which is configured to take as an input a 2D sketch, and to output a 3D model represented by the 2D sketch. The 3D model is a parameterized 3D model defined by a set of parameters consisting of a first subset of one or more parameters and a second subset of one or more parameters. The neural network is configured to selectively output a value for the set and take as input a value for the first subset from a user and output a value for the second subset. The method of machine-learning also includes teaching the neural network.

title: VARIATIONAL AUTO-ENCODER FOR OUTPUTTING A 3D MODEL
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of machine-learning. The method includes obtaining a Variational Auto-encoder architecture for a neural network which is configured to take as an input a 2D sketch and a random variable, and to output a 3D model represented by the 2D sketch. The method of machine-learning also includes teaching the neural network.

title: FOREST MEASURING SYSTEM, COMPUTER PROGRAM, AND METHOD FOR GENERATING TRUNK DIAMETER ESTIMATION MODEL
abstract_text: To provide a technology which can more easily measure the crown and trunk of trees in a forest with good accuracy.SOLUTION: A forest measuring system (100) comprises: a data acquisition unit (10) for acquiring three-dimensional point cloud data obtained by forest measurement; a calculation unit (30) for calculating a tree height and a trunk diameter at a prescribed height on the basis of the tree crown point cloud, trunk point cloud, and ground surface point cloud included in the three-dimensional point cloud data; a storage unit (40) for storing, as a data set, the tree height and the trunk diameter at the prescribed height calculated for each tree; a model generation unit (50) for generating an estimation model by machine learning that uses a plurality of data sets stored in the storage unit as teaching data and assumes at least a tree height as input and a trunk diameter at a prescribed height as output; and a trunk diameter estimation unit (60) for estimating, from at least the inputted tree height, the trunk diameter at the prescribed height, using the estimation model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: METHOD FOR PREDICTING DEGRADATION OF MANHOLE PUMP
abstract_text: To provide a method for predicting degradation of a manhole pump, with which it is possible to calculate a remaining life of the manhole pump and appropriately determine time at which the manhole pump is renewed.SOLUTION: A decision tree analysis by AI with regard to an operating state of some manhole pump out of a manhole pump group is carried out using a determination result, as teaching data, of whether leading to a long life or a short life by a maintenance and management contractor and various other information, as analysis element data, pertaining to the some manhole pump, so as to select feature data, from among the various information, that is needed for assessing whether the operating state of the some manhole pump leads to a ling life or a short life and build a decision tree model. The feature data pertaining to a discretionary manhole pump out of the manhole pump group is inputted to the decision tree model, so as to estimate whether the operating state of the discretionary manhole pump leads to a long life or a short life.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Civil art teaching demonstration device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a civil art teaching demonstration device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a base, the upper surface of the base is fixedly connected with two supporting columns, the surfaces of the two supporting columns are fixedly connected with a fixed seat, the surface of the fixed seat is provided with a through hole, the inner wall of the through hole is rotatably connected with a rotating column through a bearing, and the rotating column is fixedly connected with the base. The end of the rotating column is fixedly connected with a mounting back plate, and a touch integrated screen is fixedly mounted on the surface of the mounting back plate. According to the civil art teaching demonstration device based on artificial intelligence, by arranging the fixed seat, the rotating column, the mounting back plate, the adjusting block, the limiting frame, the [-shaped plate, the limiting rod, the limiting slot and the compression spring, the touch integrated screen can be conveniently rotated by 90 degrees, a teacher can conveniently carry out demonstration and teaching, the adjustability of the teaching demonstration device is improved, and the teaching demonstration device is convenient to use. And a teacher can conveniently demonstrate and teach the folk art works in a horizontal screen or a vertical screen, so that the teaching diversity is improved.

title: Teaching training platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the related technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a teaching training platform based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a device main body, a spring box, a hydraulic box and a seat box, one side of the top of the front surface of the device main body is fixedly connected with a control panel, and one side of the bottom of the device main body is movably connected with the spring box. A hydraulic box is fixedly connected to one side of the bottom of the spring box, a socket is fixedly connected to one side of the outer wall of the front face of the device body, a drawer is connected to one side of the interior of the device body in an embedded mode, convenience of the device body is improved through the drawer, teaching of teaching personnel is facilitated, and the intelligent lifting mechanism can automatically adjust the height of the device body; the teaching practical training device is suitable for teaching practical training of people of different heights, the angle can be effectively adjusted, teaching practical training display is facilitated, the functionality of the device body is improved through the telescopic chair mechanism, the telescopic chair mechanism can be retracted into the device body when not used, space is saved, the telescopic chair mechanism is not prone to being lost, work of users is greatly facilitated, and the teaching practical training device can be widely popularized in a large scale.

title: Method and device for recognizing behaviors in classroom teaching video
applicants: BEIJING JINMAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and device for recognizing behaviors in a classroom teaching video. The method and device are used for solving the problem that data matched with a teaching scene cannot be directly generated through an existing independent AI technology. The method for recognizing the behaviors in the classroom teaching video comprises the steps of calling a multimedia AI data interface to process an input multimedia video to be recognized, and obtaining video face data and voice-to-text data which are recorded according to video time; matching the video face data with preset basic face data to obtain figure identity information marked with mirror appearance time; matching the video time of the voice-to-text data with the mirror appearance time of the character identity information to obtain spokesman identity information in the voice-to-text data; determining a behavior category represented by text content in the voice-to-text data; and obtaining a behavior statistical result according to the spokesman identity information and the behavior category. Behavior statistical data matched with the teaching scene is generated by effectively associating the face information and the voice data information in the video.

title: Online learning system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SUZHOU XINGU INDUSTRIAL PARK MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online learning system and method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of online learning. The system comprises an education providing unit which is used for providing education service for a user through a network by utilizing at least one teaching service module, where the teaching service module comprises: an artificial intelligence evaluation unit which is used for evaluating the interest of the user to obtain an evaluated interest result; the test sending unit that is used for sending a test to the user in each predetermined stage according to the interest result and prompting the user to send a test answer, and the test is related to the teaching service module; an evaluation unit for receiving an answer from the user via the network to evaluate it; and an evaluation sending unit for sending the evaluation result obtained by the evaluation unit to a user. The invention has the advantages of high intelligent degree and high efficiency.

title: Electronic teaching test box based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching experiment boxes, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based electronic teaching experiment box, which comprises a box body, the top end of the box body is movably provided with a sealing cover, the middle part of the inner top wall of the sealing cover is provided with a control panel, and the middle part of the inner bottom wall of the box body is provided with a hydraulic push rod. By opening the locking block, the sealing cover can be separated from the box body, the control panel can be exposed, the hydraulic push rod can be controlled through the control panel, the hydraulic push rod extends to upwards push the mounting frame to move, the electronic teaching board can be pushed out of the box body, and the driving motor is controlled through the control panel, so that the electronic teaching board can be pushed out of the box body. According to the electronic teaching board, the threaded rod can be driven to rotate, so that the threaded sleeve moves in the mounting frame, the fixed plate and the movable seat can be pushed to rotate in the mounting frame under the action of the supporting rod, and the inclination angle of the electronic teaching board can be adjusted, so that the electronic teaching board can be conveniently displayed to students.

title: AI intelligence-based ideological and political education teaching device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI intelligence-based ideological and political education teaching device in the technical field of teaching equipment, which comprises a display, a mounting seat, an AI camera, a clearance groove, an overturning unit and a lesson preparation content feedback assembly, the lesson preparation content feedback assembly comprises a cloud end and a PC end, the PC end is in communication connection with the cloud end, and the PC end is in communication connection with the display. The cloud is in communication connection with the display through a wireless network, and the AI camera is in communication connection with the cloud through the wireless network. The lesson preparation content on the PC end is sent to the cloud end, the face information is collected through the AI camera, the personal information is generated and fed back to the cloud end, and then the lesson preparation content is directly sent to the display to be displayed by the cloud end, so that storage equipment such as a USB flash disk does not need to be carried, the operation is simplified, the operation of the display is relatively convenient, and the user experience is improved. The AI camera is driven by the overturning unit to overturn upwards, so that the AI camera can be stored, and the situation that dust is accumulated on the AI camera, and consequently face recognition is difficult is avoided.

title: Dynamic real-time trainee catcher for artificial intelligence teaching device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a student dynamic real-time catcher for an artificial intelligence teaching device, which comprises a base, the outer surface of the base is fixedly connected with a first connecting lug, the inside of the first connecting lug is movably connected with a supporting rod, one end of the supporting rod is movably connected with a second connecting lug, and the other end of the supporting rod is movably connected with a third connecting lug. The lower surface of the second connecting lug is fixedly connected with a first suction cup. According to the dynamic real-time trainee catcher for the artificial intelligence teaching device, through the arrangement of the first suction cup, the second suction cup, the connecting rod and the spring, the first suction cup and the second suction cup can conduct adsorption at any position, punching installation is not needed, installation and fixation are convenient, the safety of the device is improved, and when shaking is generated, the trainee can be effectively trapped. The spring at the bottom of the connecting rod has buffering and damping effects, and the connecting rod slides up and down in the cylinder by utilizing the compressibility of the spring, so that the damping property of the device is improved, and the stability during capturing is ensured.

title: Teaching material multi-screen display device for artificial intelligence education
applicants: XIANGXI VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL COLLEGE FOR NAT
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching material multi-screen display device for artificial intelligence education, wherein the device comprises a mounting base, a lifting air cylinder, a display shell, a main display screen, a connecting block, an adjusting air cylinder, a rotating shaft, a storage motor, a first cleaning brush, an auxiliary display screen and a second cleaning brush; the inner bottom end of the mounting base is provided with the lifting air cylinder; and the output end of the lifting air cylinder is provided with a lifting plate. According to the teaching material multi-screen display device, the lifting air cylinder and the adjusting air cylinder are matched with each other, the height and angle of the main display screen can be conveniently adjusted in the using process of the device, and thus the practicability of the device is improved; through arrangement of the first cleaning brush and the second cleaning brush, the main display screen and the auxiliary display screen are cleaned respectively, so the display definition of teaching content is ensured, and the labor intensity of screen cleaning is relieved; and the auxiliary display screen can be conveniently stored behind the display shell through the storage motor, extra space does not need to be occupied when the device is not used, and thus the use experience of a user is improved.

title: Teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence, which relates to the technical field of network teaching. The system comprises a learning analysis module, a teaching analysis module, a teaching evaluation module and a training analysis module. The learning analysis module is used for inputting the feature data collected by the online monitoring module into a learning state evaluation model to obtain a learning state label; the teaching analysis module is used for acquiring learning state labels of all students in real time and analyzing teaching values, if the teaching values are smaller than a preset teaching threshold value, reminding information is generated and sent to a teacher end, and a teacher is reminded to change the teaching content or teaching mode of the current teaching course so that the teaching quality and efficiency are improved; the teaching evaluation module is used for comprehensively evaluating the teaching level of the teacher according to the teaching value with the timestamp stored in the database; and the training analysis module is used for acquiring training information of the students and carrying out progress coefficient analysis so as to suggest the students to change learning modes in time so that a better learning effect is achieved.

title: Teaching and lecturing device based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching and lecturing device based on an artificial intelligence technology, belonging to the field of teaching. According to the teaching and lecturing device, heat of the teaching and lecturing device is conducted to thermal expansion rubber through a heat conduction metal rod; the expanded thermal expansion rubber pushes a sealing plate, so the sealing plate is constantly far away from a connecting box, and finally, air in a classroom enters the inner cavity of the connecting box; after the air in the classroom enters the inner cavity of the connecting box, lamplight provides a sufficient light source, carbon dioxide in the air provides a carbon source, a cyanobacteria water solution carries a hydrogen donor, and finally, cyanobacteria carry out photosynthesis, so carbon dioxide in the air is converted into oxygen, an indoor carbon dioxide content is reduced, and meanwhile, oxygen is provided for the classroom, and the indoor carbon dioxide content can still be effectively reduced even if the doors and windows of the classroom are closed; and oxygen can be provided for indoor space where air does not circulate, and the class attending quality of students is greatly improved.

title: College vocal music teaching auxiliary tool based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college vocal music teaching auxiliary tool based on artificial intelligence. The college vocal music teaching auxiliary tool comprises a mounting top plate, a fixing frame, an electric push rod, a first motor, a second motor, a disc, an infrared sensor, an elastic connecting piece, a display screen, a frame, a connecting strip, a rectangular cover, a reinforcing strip, a sealing gasket and a mounting frame. The vocal music teaching auxiliary tool has the advantages that the vocal music teaching auxiliary tool is used for assisting vocal music teaching and providing display, music score display can be performed, teaching is facilitated, the display direction can be changed through rotation adjustment, and meanwhile lifting adjustment and height adjustment can be performed; furthermore, when the display screen is not used, the display screen can be turned over, the screen body of the display screen can be covered and protected, the sealing protection effect is achieved, and the dustproof protection effect is achieved.

title: Visual monitoring application system for classroom learning efficiency AI judgment
abstract_text: The invention provides a visual monitoring application system for classroom learning efficiency AI judgment, and relates to the technical field of visual monitoring, and the visual monitoring application system for classroom learning efficiency AI judgment comprises teaching personnel, a mobile terminal, learning personnel, an identity recognition module, a central control module, a data backup module, a feature recognition module and a prompt module. According to the invention, the feature recognition module captures and recognizes the facial features of a learner in real time, and transmits a facial feature picture to the central control module, and an intelligent judgment module can match the received facial feature picture with a pre-established face micro-expression model. Whether the learner is in a learning state or not is judged by analyzing the matching degree, and when the learner is distracted, the central control module can control the prompt module to prompt the distracted learner, so that the learning efficiency of the learner is effectively improved.

title: COMMUNITY TYPE AI PERSONNEL TRAINING SUPPORT SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a community type personnel training support system capable of forming a community and performing AI educations on a number of engineers without applying excessive load to specific personnel (teaching staff) who have learnt AI engineering.SOLUTION: A personnel training support system includes: a user interface server which provides a creation environment of a learning model of machine learning to a plurality of user terminals over a network and provides a plurality of learnt models created in the creation environment of the learning model of the machine learning to a scoring server; and the scoring server for scoring and ranking the plurality of learnt models.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Interactive touch all-in-one machine for intelligent space construction based on AI technology
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an interactive touch all-in-one machine for intelligent space construction based on the AI technology, which comprises an all-in-one machine, and a shell is arranged outside the all-in-one machine; the fixing block is fixedly installed at the top of the shell, a vertical sliding rail is arranged at the rear end of the fixing block, and a sliding block is arranged in the vertical sliding rail; and the supporting frame is installed below the all-in-one machine, supporting legs are connected to the lower portion of the supporting frame, and a containing plate is fixed to one sides of the supporting legs. Compared with an existing device, the interactive touch all-in-one machine for intelligent space construction based on the AI technology is convenient to move and adjust in the vertical direction through the use of the vertical sliding rail and the sliding block, angle adjustment of the all-in-one machine is facilitated, and therefore the interactive touch all-in-one machine is convenient to use in teaching and provides a good viewing field; the inclined supporting plate can slide and move in the axial direction of the horizontal sliding rail, the position angle adjustment of the all-in-one machine is achieved, the vertical sliding rail and the sliding block are matched for use, and therefore adjustment and use are convenient.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system, which comprises a personal information registration module, an interactive course selection module, an interactive teaching module, an after-class exercise module, a weekly test module, a knowledge point consolidation module and a learning progress adjustment module. The personal information registration module is connected with the interactive course selection module, the interactive course selection module is connected with the interactive teaching module, the interactive teaching module is connected with the after-class exercise module, the after-class exercise module is connected with the weekly test module, the weekly test module is respectively connected with the knowledge point consolidation module and the learning progress adjustment module, and the learning progress adjustment module is connected with the interactive teaching module. According to the invention, students can select required learning subjects, knowledge points can be consolidated in time after interactive learning is finished, the learning progress of the students can be adjusted in time after weekly tests, teachers can conveniently, efficiently and quickly master the learning progress and knowledge mastering conditions of the students, and the learning efficiency of the students is improved.

title: Motion assisting method and device and medium
applicants: PINGAN INTERNATIONAL SMART CITY TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of intelligent equipment and the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a motion assisting method and device and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a teaching video and standard attitude data corresponding to the teaching video; in the process that the target object moves according to the teaching video, collecting target three-dimensional image data of the target object through a camera device; performing attitude recognition processing on the target three-dimensional image data through the trained attitude data extraction model to obtain target attitude data of the target object; according to the target attitude data and the standard attitude data, determining a motion assistance scheme of the target object, wherein the motion assistance scheme is used for indicating attitude deviation of the target object; and outputting a motion assisting scheme to assist the target object in correcting the motion posture. By adopting the embodiment of the invention, the motion action of the target object can be accurately guided, and the training efficiency is improved.

title: Semiconductor probe card pin inserting method and device based on AOI and ultrasonic imaging
abstract_text: The invention discloses a semiconductor probe card insertion method and device based on AOI and ultrasonic imaging, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: (1) obtaining a standard pin insertion path, obtaining probe hole position deviation information of an upper section and a lower section of a probe card, and (2) correcting on the basis of the standard pin insertion path by combining the probe hole position deviation information so as to obtain an actual probe insertion hole path of each probe hole in the probe card; and (3) according to the adjusted actual probe jack path, inserting pins in sequence, and completing the pin insertion action. The device comprises an AOI image acquisition module, a three-dimensional image information acquisition module and a PC control module. According to the invention, an AOI image analysis method and a three-dimensional imaging method are adopted, an actual probe jack path is determined through a manual teaching or machine intelligent AI analysis method, and flexible movement of the probe is ensured; and a PC control module is adopted to carry out image analysis and path analysis, an iterative pin inserting path is continuously optimized, and the optimality of the pin inserting path is ensured.

title: METHOD FOR GENERATING TRAINED MODEL, METHOD FOR DETERMINING BASE SEQUENCE OF BIOMOLECULE, AND BIOMOLECULE MEASUREMENT DEVICE
abstract_text: Provided is a method for generating a trained model for the purpose of classifying blockade event data representing a nanopore blockade event in a biomolecule measurement device. The method includes generating a first trained model by using first teaching data to execute machine learning of a learning model. The first teaching data includes teaching blockade event data and teaching labels. The teaching labels indicate whether the teaching blockade event data is classified as good data or is classified as bad data. The first trained model is configured to classify the blockade event data as good data or bad data. In addition, a method for determining a base sequence of a biomolecule, and a biomolecule measurement device are provided.

title: Deep learning character recognition display screen convenient for angle adjustment
abstract_text: The utility model provides a deep learning character recognition display screen facilitating angle adjustment. The deep learning character recognition display screen comprises a U-shaped installation frame and a personal terminal installed in the installation frame. A base is arranged at the bottom of the mounting frame, an angle adjusting mechanism for performing multi-angle adjustment on the personal terminal is arranged between the top of the base and the bottom of the mounting frame, the base is arranged in a circular truncated cone shape, a height adjusting mechanism is mounted at the top of the base, and the angle adjusting mechanism is mounted at the top of the height adjusting mechanism; the height adjusting mechanism drives the personal terminal on the angle adjusting mechanism to ascend and descend in a rotating mode, the residual ball on the angle adjusting mechanism is arranged on the ball in a sleeving mode to rotate and locked through the bolt, multi-angle adjustment is achieved, finally, the personal terminal can be adjusted conveniently, and teaching can be conducted conveniently.

title: Remote extracurricular education teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a remote extracurricular education teaching device based on artificial intelligence, and the device comprises a workbench of a square structure, the bottom of the workbench is symmetrically provided with supporting plates, the bottoms of the supporting plates are symmetrically provided with universal wheels, the rear end surfaces of the supporting plates are fixedly provided with fixing plates, and the middle of each supporting plate is provided with a placement cavity. A containing cavity is formed in the workbench, a partition plate is arranged in the middle of the containing cavity and divides the containing cavity into a left containing cavity and a right containing cavity, a drawer is arranged in the inner cavity of the workbench, a second handle is installed on the drawer, and a containing groove is formed in the upper portion of the drawer. A heat dissipation structure is arranged behind the host, and when the device is used for a long time and the host generates heat, the motor is started and drives the fan blades to rotate to generate air flow to cool the host, so that the service life of the device is prolonged.

title: Artificial intelligence autonomous printing teaching archive printer
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of file printing machines, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence automatic printing teaching file printing machine, and provides the following scheme aiming at the problems that a keyboard and a pick-up part of an existing automatic printing teaching file printing machine are mostly directly exposed outside, and when an object falls, the automatic printing teaching file printing machine is easy to damage, the automatic printing teaching file printing machine comprises a printing machine main body, a box body is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, a base is fixedly arranged and mounted at the bottom of the box body, a prompt screen is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, a display screen is fixedly arranged on the shooting machine main body, two contraction grooves are formed in the box body, and a first protection plate and a second protection plate are slidably mounted in the two contraction grooves respectively; a gear is rotationally installed in the box body, two conveying wheels are rotationally installed in the box body, a keyboard and a part taking position can be protected, and damage to the shooting machine is reduced when the collision situation occurs or objects fall down.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching robot convenient to disassemble and assemble
applicants: QINZHOU DINGSHENG YINGBO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching robots, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence teaching robot convenient to disassemble and assemble, and aims to solve the problems that an artificial intelligence robot in the prior art is inconvenient to overhaul and maintain due to the fact that a chassis is inconvenient to disassemble and assemble and the disassembly takes a long time. The teaching robot comprises a teaching robot body and a chassis, a groove and two inserting grooves are formed in the bottom of the teaching robot body, clamping grooves are formed in the inner walls of the two sides of the groove, a sliding groove is formed in the top of the chassis, two sliding plates are slidably installed in the sliding groove, and clamping plates are fixedly installed at the tops of the sides, away from each other, of the two sliding plates. The two clamping plates are movably connected with the corresponding clamping grooves in a clamped mode, and transverse grooves are formed in the other sides of the two sliding plates. According to the utility model, the chassis of the artificial intelligence teaching robot is convenient to disassemble and assemble, so that the interior of the teaching robot is convenient to overhaul and maintain.

title: System and Method for Ensemble Expert Diversification and Control Thereof
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. A training sample is sent to an expert for training a model representative of the expert. A prediction is received, which is generated by the expert in accordance with the training sample and based on one or more parameters associated with the model. A metric with respect to the prediction characterizing the prediction received from the expert is analyzed. When the metric satisfies a first criterion, a ground truth label associated with the training sample is sent to the expert to facilitate the training.

title: System and Method for Ensemble Expert Diversification via Bidding and Control Thereof
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. A bid is received, from an expert during training, for a training sample with an amount within a level of available bidding currency associated with the expert. The training sample is used for training a model associated with the expert. It is determined whether the expert is among at least one winner selected based on bids from one or more experts. If the expert is among the at least one winner, the training sample is sent to the expert. The at least one winner is selected based on one or more criteria aiming at expert diversification.

title: System and Method for Ensemble Expert Diversification via Bidding
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. A check is performed on a level of available bidding currency for bidding a training sample that is used to train a model via machine learning. A bid in an amount within the available bidding currency is sent, to a source of the training sample, for the training sample. The training sample is received from the source when the bid is successful. A prediction is then generated in accordance with the training sample based on one or more parameters associated with the model and is sent to the source.

title: System and Method for Ensemble Expert Diversification
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for machine learning. A training sample is first received from a source. A prediction is generated according to the training sample and based on one or more parameters associated with a model. A metric characterizing the prediction is also determined. The prediction and the metric are transmitted to the source to facilitate a determination on whether a ground truth label for the training sample is to be provided. When the ground truth label is received from the source, the one or more parameters of the model are updated based on the prediction and the ground truth label.

title: Artificial intelligence training teaching robot model structure
applicants: SAFETY AND MORE ELECTROMECHANICAL MFG SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of models, and discloses an artificial intelligence training teaching robot model structure, which comprises a bottom plate, the top of the bottom plate is provided with a sliding chute, the right side of the bottom plate is provided with a first driving motor, and the right side of the inner wall of the sliding chute is rotatably connected with a first rotating column. According to the artificial intelligence training teaching robot model structure, by arranging a first driving motor, a threaded column, a first rotating column, a second rotating column, a moving plate, a fixed cylinder, an electric telescopic rod, a rotating box and a second driving motor, the purpose of automatically adjusting the transverse position, height and placement angle of the model body is achieved; and the labor intensity of workers is relieved, use of the workers is facilitated, and meanwhile, through cooperation of a second rotating column, a disc and a rotating handle, when a first driving motor is damaged, the transverse position of the model body can be manually adjusted.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine for Chinese teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine for Chinese teaching, which comprises a display, the left side and the right side of the bottom of the display are fixedly connected with supporting plates, the bottom of each supporting plate is provided with a containing groove, the inner cavity of each containing groove is slidably connected with a sliding plate, and the front side of each sliding plate is fixedly connected with a rack. According to the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine for Chinese teaching, gears are meshed with racks, so that the rotating rods rotate to drive the walking wheels to stretch out and draw back to enter the containing grooves, and the walking wheels can stretch out and draw back to move out of the containing grooves; therefore, the washer at the bottom of the supporting plate is in contact with the ground instead of the walking wheel, the contact area is enlarged, the sideslip situation caused by insufficient friction force is greatly reduced, the use safety is improved, and the walking wheel is convenient to store.

title: Electronic teaching test box based on artificial intelligence
applicants: THE TOURISM COLLEGE OF CHANGCHUN UNIV
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an electronic teaching test box based on artificial intelligence in the field of electronic instruments, which comprises a box body, a circuit board is fixedly connected inside the box body, a motor is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the circuit board, and fan blades are fixedly connected to the bottom end of an output shaft of the motor; ventilation openings are formed in the bottom end surface and the rear end surface of the box body; a box cover is rotatably connected to the rear side of the upper end of the box body, first synchronous wheels are symmetrically and fixedly connected to the left and right ends of the box cover, second synchronous wheels are symmetrically and rotatably connected to the left and right ends of the box body, and synchronous belts are engaged to the surfaces of the first synchronous wheels and the second synchronous wheels; an auxiliary mechanism for assisting the heat dissipation of the fan blades is arranged in the box body; and when the box cover is opened, all threaded rods can rotate to support the device, so that the ventilation opening in the bottom end of the device is in contact with more air, and the heat dissipation effect of the device is improved.

title: Machine vision detection teaching device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BAIKE RONGCHUANG SHANDONG TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a machine vision detection teaching device based on artificial intelligence. The machine vision detection teaching device comprises a material platform; the camera shooting telescopic rod structure is fixed at one end of the material platform and is perpendicular to the material platform; the depth vision camera is connected to the tail end of the camera shooting telescopic rod structure, and the position of the light supplementing source is matched with that of the depth vision camera. And the image processor is connected with the depth vision camera and is designed based on deep learning. According to the technical scheme of the utility model, the problem of large detection error of material images in the prior art can be solved.

title: Medical image automatic reading auxiliary analysis device and method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a medical image automatic reading auxiliary analysis device and method based on deep learning, relates to the technical field of medical image teaching, and aims to solve the problems that the consumed time is too long, manual operation is troublesome, optimal comparison data is inconvenient to take out and the teaching effect is poor during medical image film learning. One end of an image film conveying part is provided with a single film conveying part, the output end of the single film conveying part is in meshed connection with a film feeding part, one end of the film feeding part is located on the inner side of the image film conveying part, and the lower end of the output end of the image film conveying part is provided with an image film scanning part. Therefore, rapid and automatic film reading of the student can be realized, the optimal contrast image can be extracted by using the large database, rapid deep learning of the student is achieved, batch learning can be carried out in a short time, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: Novel machine learning method based on cross-media human common knowledge formation
abstract_text: The invention provides a novel machine learning method based on cross-media human common knowledge formation, and relates to the technical field of machine learning algorithms. The novel machine learning method comprises a deep recording learning module, a central processing module, a quick calling module, an information storage module, an operation module and an information transmission module; the deep recording learning module comprises a logic reasoning unit, an induction learning unit and an intuition pause unit; and the central processing module comprises a logic identification unit, a teaching example identification unit and a distributed processor. A novel model and method for mutual coordination and complementation of symbol logical reasoning, inductive learning and intuitive pause are established through an inductive learning unit, an intuitive pause unit and a logical reasoning unit, inconsistency analysis of cross-media knowledge is supported, learned knowledge is effectively induced through the inductive learning unit, simultaneous coordinated search between the instance space and the rule space is completed, the learning speed is increased, and the method is worthy of vigorous popularization.

title: Self-adaptive education method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a self-adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises a login module, an identity information acquisition module, a central controller, a teacher management end, and a student learning end. The identity information acquisition module comprises a name acquisition unit, a gender acquisition unit, an occupational acquisition unit, a grade acquisition unit, a class acquisition unit and a face image acquisition unit; the teacher management end comprises a class online people number management module, a teaching video recording module, a student learning progress management module, a student learning progress adjustment module, a difficult question receiving and replying module, an after-class homework approval module and a student learning evaluation module; the student learning end comprises a class group, a teaching video watching module, an after-class homework module, a grade student communication interaction module, an after-class learning investigation module and a difficult problem uploading module. According to the invention, a teacher can conveniently understand the learning condition of each student, and the teaching quality and efficiency are improved.

title: Holographic interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a holographic interactive teaching system. The holographic interactive teaching system comprises a main imaging module, a holographic imaging module and a teaching system; the physical resolution of the main imaging module is greater than or equal to 1920*1920, the imaging proportion is 1:1, and the imaging contrast ratio is greater than or equal to 1000:1; the light transmittance of a holographic imaging area of the holographic imaging module is larger than or equal to 65%, the reflective rate is larger than or equal to 30%, and a holographic image is visible under normal sunlight illuminance. Holographic imaging can be simultaneously watched all around, and the maximum visual angle of a single face is larger than or equal to 140 degrees. The volume of a holographic imaging area of the teaching system is larger than or equal to 500mm*500mm*250mm, group learning is supported, each group of touch screens should be integrally, tightly and fixedly connected with the teaching system, and each group of students participating in interactive learning can independently operate teaching software through the interactive touch screens without conflicts. Technical means such as artificial intelligence and big data are used as carriers to provide brand new learning for students, knowledge is converted from a plane to a three-dimensional mode, from a text to a window and from abstraction to concrete, and the students can form a better learning mode and method.

title: AI intelligent scoring system
applicants: SHANGHAI XIDING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI intelligent scoring system. The system comprises a data collection module records an experiment process through employing RGB cameras at different visual angles, and obtains scoring data; a data processing module which is used for carrying out frame division on the collected data and carrying out annotation screening and format processing on frame image data; a model building module which is used for carrying out classification and feature extraction on the collected frame image data and calculating an action classification result; and a result output module which is used for outputting the action classification result. According to the method, a double-channel video analysis neural network of the multi-frame video is utilized, the double-frame-rate video streams are processed at the same time, the features of the persons corresponding to the multiple frames of the video streams are subjected to local feature aggregation and classification, behaviors corresponding to the video clips are analyzed, intelligent scoring can be accurately and visually achieved, and the education teaching efficiency and experiment evaluation fairness are greatly improved.

title: AI camera for yoga teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI (artificial intelligence) camera for yoga teaching, relates to the field of AI cameras, and aims to solve the problems that learning cannot be effectively and accurately adjusted conveniently, the learning range is greatly limited and the teaching efficiency is high due to remote video teaching in the conventional yoga teaching. In order to solve the problems that some existing AI cameras capable of shooting in real time cannot conveniently and effectively adjust the position and the gravity center is easy to be unstable after adjustment, the utility model utility provides the following scheme that the AI camera comprises a sleeve, and the upper end and the lower end of the sleeve are rotationally sleeved with an upper cylinder and a lower cylinder respectively; the upper side and the lower side in the sleeve are fixedly connected with a first limiting screw and a second limiting screw respectively, the outer side of the first limiting screw is sleeved with a threaded cylinder in a threaded mode, and an AI camera is fixedly installed at the upper end of the threaded cylinder. According to the device, the body posture of a learner can be effectively judged through the AI camera when the learner learns, and meanwhile, the AI camera can be conveniently adjusted and is stable to use.

title: Artificial intelligence paperless desk
applicants: SHENZHEN WEILAI GROUP IND CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence paperless desk which comprises a desk body, a support and a base, the support is vertically and fixedly installed on the base, the desk body is arranged above the support, an installation frame is fixedly installed at the top end of the support, the desk body is fixed in the installation frame, an equipment groove is formed in the desk body, and an electric rod is fixedly installed in the equipment groove. The top end of the electric rod is provided with a rotating shaft seat, the top end of the rotating shaft seat is fixedly provided with a mounting shell, an electronic ink screen is detachably mounted in the mounting shell, and the other end of the mounting shell is rotationally connected with a rotating shaft. A controller is arranged on the desk and located on one side of the equipment groove. A cover plate is arranged on the desk, the cover plate is movably installed through a hinge, and a clamping groove matched with the cover plate is formed in the desk. Compared with traditional paper teaching, the desk has the advantages that books and pens are replaced by the electronic function, the intelligent degree is higher, the practicability is higher, and the interior of the desk can be prevented from being moist due to the fact that the drying pad is arranged in the cover plate.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, the auxiliary robot comprises a robot head, a learning illumination mechanism, a projection mechanism and a touch control screen, the middle part of the upper side of the robot head is movably provided with the learning illumination mechanism, and the lower part of the learning illumination mechanism is fixedly provided with the projection mechanism; a sensing module is arranged at the tail end of the arm part, and a touch control screen is arranged in the middle of the front face of the machine body. Various scenes are recognized through the system sensing device, the sensing module and the monitoring camera mechanism in the machine body, needed programs are edited through the touch control screen, corresponding instructions are completed, the teaching aid is not only used for assisting teaching, but also can broadcast weather conditions, listen to music and interact with children, learning interestingness is increased, and the teaching aid is suitable for popularization and application. The eye protection illuminating lamp not only provides illumination but also can protect eyesight during learning, the telescopic design is adopted, the occupied space is small, the projection mechanism is convenient to operate, and the space is saved.

title: Preaching platform based on artificial intelligence curriculum education
abstract_text: The utility model provides a preaching platform based on artificial intelligence curriculum education. The preaching platform comprises a base and a table, a cavity is formed in the base, a tooth groove frame is arranged in the cavity, a first lifting mechanism connected with the bottom end of the tooth groove frame is arranged in the cavity, a rotating shaft which is horizontally arranged and rotationally connected with the base is further arranged in the cavity, a gear meshed with groove teeth on the tooth groove frame is arranged on the rotating shaft, and the rotating shaft extends to the outer side of the base. A turntable is mounted at the outer side end of the base; the multifunctional teaching desk is simple in operation, the lifting device for driving the desk to ascend and descend is arranged, the teaching problem of teachers with different heights in the class process is effectively solved, and the teaching quality of the teachers is greatly improved.

title: Animation display device for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: XUZHOU YITAI AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the artificial intelligence teaching technology, particularly relates to an animation display device for artificial intelligence teaching, and aims to solve the problem of artificial intelligence teaching, and adopts the following scheme that the animation display device comprises a box body, a motor is fixedly mounted on the inner wall of the bottom of the box body, and a first bevel gear is fixedly mounted at one end of an output shaft of the motor; a threaded rod is rotatably mounted on the inner wall of the bottom of the box body, a rotating hole is formed in the inner wall of the top of the box body, the top end of the threaded rod penetrates through the rotating hole and extends out of the box body, the threaded rod is fixedly sleeved with a second bevel gear, the first bevel gear is meshed with the second bevel gear, and an output shaft of the motor is fixedly sleeved with a wire wheel; a sleeve is fixedly mounted at the top of the box body. The mobile display screen is reasonable in design, simple in structure and convenient to operate, the whole mobile display screen can be moved, the height of the display screen can be adjusted, the mobile display screen is suitable for various places, the display screen can be contracted, and the safety of the mobile display screen is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence voice processing teaching experiment device
applicants: JIANGSU XUELI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence voice processing teaching experiment device, which comprises a single circular PCB (printed circuit board), the circuit board is in a double-side layout with a front side and a back side, and the back side of the circuit board is provided with a dual-core 64-bit processor, a 32-bit single chip microcomputer, a USB (universal serial bus) downloading interface and a USB sound card interface; a plurality of silicon microphones, LEDs, a TFT color screen and keys are arranged on the front surface of the main body; one of the silicon microphones is arranged at the circle center of the circuit board, and the other silicon microphones are uniformly distributed in an annular array by taking the circle center as the center; the LEDs are uniformly distributed in an annular array by taking the circle center as the center; the silicon microphone, the LED, the TFT color screen and the key are electrically connected with the dual-core 64-bit processor; the dual-core 64-bit processor is connected with the 32-bit single chip microcomputer; the USB downloading interface is connected to the dual-core 64-bit processor; the USB sound card interface is connected to the 32-bit single-chip microcomputer through the USB switching circuit. The intelligent voice processing system is simple in structure, and can comprehensively and systematically display the intelligent voice processing process in a visual mode.

title: Robot grabbing data set establishing device and method based on teaching and deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a robot grabbing data set establishing device and method based on teaching and deep learning, and relates to the field of robots. The method comprises the steps: 1, adopting a demonstrator for demonstrating grabbing poses on a target object, extracting grabbing part point clouds from a scene according to grabbing space, and carrying out manual scoring and label data labeling while data are collected; 2, rapidly training a six-degree-of-freedom grabbing pose evaluation network by using the collected label data; 3, quickly collecting point cloud data of the actually captured scene by adopting a continuous frame shooting mode; and 4, sampling six-degree-of-freedom grabbing poses on the actually grabbed scene point cloud, and evaluating and scoring each sampling pose by using the trained six-degree-of-freedom grabbing pose evaluation network so as to complete automatic generation of a label of the scene point cloud. According to the method, the technical difficulty that the hardware cost and the time cost for generating and establishing the six-degree-of-freedom grabbed data set in the past are relatively high is solved.

title: Mixed enhanced intelligence-based intelligent evaluation system for college student projects
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of hybrid intelligence, in particular to a mixed enhanced intelligent-based intelligent evaluation system for college student projects, which comprises a student mutual evaluation module, an intelligent evaluation module and a teacher reevaluation module. According to the scheme, student mutual evaluation and teacher mutual evaluation are introduced into artificial intelligence evaluation, a human-in-the-loop hybrid enhanced intelligent evaluation system is formed, an advanced cognitive mechanism of subjective project evaluation by students and teachers is tightly coupled with an artificial intelligence model, and a feedback loop for improving the precise and efficient intelligent evaluation level of projects is formed. Therefore, the scheme helps teachers to share correction and review of subjective exercises through man-machine collaboration, and introduces cognitive models of students and teachers into an artificial intelligence model, so that man-machine collaboratively evaluates the subjective exercises; the problems that in the current teaching process, project type subjective question homework evaluation amount is large, efficiency is low, knowledge and skills of students cannot be fed back in time and finely, and a single evaluation mode with a teacher as a unique main body is adopted are effectively solved.

title: Multi-dimensional dynamic adaptive exercise recommendation method based on latent semantic model
abstract_text: The invention provides a multi-dimensional dynamic self-adaptive exercise recommendation method based on a latent semantic model. The method comprises the following steps: constructing and associating a subject knowledge graph and a subject knowledge question bank; forming the test questions of the subject knowledge question bank into a hierarchical question bank, and selecting basic test questions for testing; analyzing a testing result, and judging an expected reaction mode which the student most possibly has by using posterior probability so as to form a cognitive structure for the student; on the basis of the cognitive structure for the student, adding hidden factor items representing ignored attributes of the student by combining a logic regression algorithm in traditional machine learning and a latent semantic model in a matrix decomposition algorithm, and acquiring a final question prediction model by using a gradient descent method. According to the above technical scheme, hidden feature information is extracted from the answer conditions of the student based on the latent semantic algorithm, and a prediction model of the knowledge point mastering condition of the student can be effectively constructed; and adaptive feedback and personalized recommendation are combined, so the requirements of educating different students in different ways and teaching students in accordance of their aptitude are met.

title: Student learning condition analysis method based on artificial intelligence and teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student learning condition analysis method and teaching system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of computer teaching. The method comprises the steps of extracting the test scores of all students when a same course is learned; performing clustering division on the students according to the test results to obtain the preliminarily divided student categories; iteratively searching a new division standard sample according to the preliminarily divided student categories, and re-dividing the student categories to obtain the final student categories; and obtaining the learning conditions of all students according to the final student categories. According to the method and the system formed by the method, the learning conditions of the students are intelligently analyzed, the teachers and the students are helped to scientifically and deeply know the learning conditions, and the teachers are assisted to formulate and modify the teaching modes according to the intelligent analysis results.

title: Stethoscope with AI recognition function and loudspeaker function
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of medical instruments, in particular to a stethoscope with an AI recognition function and a loudspeaker function, which comprises a breath sound stethoscope main body and a rectangular shell, a sensing diaphragm is arranged at the bottom of the breath sound stethoscope main body; the bottom of the breath sound stethoscope main body is further fixedly connected with a base, and the section of the base is in an L shape. A breath sound recognition chip is arranged in the breath sound stethoscope main body; the breath sound stethoscope main body is sleeved with the rectangular shell, and the bottom of the rectangular shell is detachably connected to the top of the base. A switch button and an AI breath sound recognition button are arranged at the top of the rectangular shell; a player sound box is arranged on the outer side wall of the rectangular shell; the breath sound can be played out, clinical teaching is facilitated, AI can be started to recognize the breath sound and assist clinical diagnosis, and meanwhile, the breath sound can be continuously and dynamically detected after being attached to the body of a patient so as to monitor the clinical treatment effect.

title: Intelligent lifting experiment table
applicants: SHANGHAI XIDING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent lifting experiment table. The experiment table comprises an experiment table body and a detachable lifting cabinet, the outer walls of the left side and the right side of the detachable lifting cabinet are each provided with a handheld groove and an emergency stop switch, the upper surface of the detachable lifting cabinet is provided with a screen plate and a display screen, the left side of the upper surface of the detachable lifting cabinet is provided with a power socket, a first lifting rod and a second lifting rod are arranged on the upper surface of the detachable lifting cabinet, a first mounting rod is mounted at the upper end of the outer wall of the left side of the first lifting rod through a rotating arm, a first camera is arranged at the front end of the first mounting rod, two second cameras are arranged on the outer wall of the front side of the second lifting rod, a second mounting rod is mounted at the upper end of the second lifting rod through a rotating arm, and a third camera is arranged at the front end of the second mounting rod. The functionality of the experiment table is improved, the experiment table adapts to multiple modes, and the experiment table can be used for teaching and examination monitoring, recording and playing videos and carrying out AI score assignment on recording and playing results, the teaching effect of teachers is improved, examinees are monitored during examination, and the cheating phenomenon is eradicated.

title: Student experiment classroom behavior identification method based on top vision
abstract_text: The invention provides a student experiment classroom behavior identification method based on top vision, and mainly solves the problems of high workload and poor timeliness caused by manual information extraction in traditional behavior recognition. According to the implementation scheme, the method includes installing a camera vertically above the desktop of each experiment table, performing video sampling on behaviors of students during experiment, and performing image frame extraction and calibration on sampled video streams to obtain a data set; training a target detection network by using the data set to obtain a trained target detection model; inputting a student experiment classroom video into the trained target detection model to obtain a picture for framing the hands of the student; and classifying all pictures framing the student hands by using a deep learning classification model to generate a recognition result of the student hand behaviors. According to the invention, the data processing amount and the calculation amount are reduced, pictures of the hand behaviors and actions of the students can be accurately obtained and stored in a laboratory with dense equipment and scattered students, and the pictures can be extracted by teachers and can be used for experiment teaching.

title: Artificial intelligence multimedia teaching auxiliary device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence multimedia teaching auxiliary device which comprises a base, a first supporting table and a second supporting table are arranged on the top face of the base, and the first supporting table is arranged on the front face of the second supporting table. A projector is arranged on the top face of the first supporting table, a storage basket is arranged on the side face of the first supporting table, a storage drawer and a control switch are arranged on the front face of the first supporting table, and the control switch is arranged on one side of the storage drawer. According to the artificial intelligence multimedia teaching auxiliary device, the projector is arranged on the top surface of the first supporting table, the first hydraulic cylinder is arranged at the bottom end of the projector, the projector can be driven to move up and down through the first hydraulic cylinder, and therefore the height of the projector can be adjusted; the projector is mounted on the first supporting table, so that the projector can be controlled and overhauled conveniently; a storage basket is arranged on one side of the first supporting table, and small teaching aids used in the teaching process can be placed in the storage basket.

title: Intelligent device for teaching foreign languages
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent device for teaching foreign languages, which comprises a cover body worn by a teacher and used for shielding the mouth or face of the teacher, a voice conversion device, a loudspeaker and earphones, and is characterized in that the voice conversion device is used for respectively converting teaching statements selected by the teacher into native language voices and foreign language voices; the voice conversion device completes voice conversion by accessing an Internet third-party AI intelligent voice conversion platform; the loudspeaker is arranged on the cover body and is used for playing the foreign language voice for a learner to learn; the earphone is worn by a teacher and plays the native language voice for the teacher to understand and demonstrate. According to the utility model, teaching statements selected by a teacher are respectively converted into native language voices and foreign language voices of the teacher through the voice conversion device, the foreign language voices are played through the loudspeaker, and the native language voices are played through the earphone, so that ordinary people can also serve as the teacher to teach other people to learn foreign languages, and the efficiency and the learning effect are improved; and the learning cost is reduced.

title: Robot teaching aid for artificial intelligence education
applicants: SHAANXI WEIGUANGZHITA EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching aids, and discloses a robot teaching aid for artificial intelligence education, which comprises a base and an intelligent robot main body, the upper surface of the base is provided with a placement groove, the interior of the placement groove is provided with a rotating plate, and the lower surface of the rotating plate is rotatably arranged in the placement groove through a rotating column. A clamping mechanism used for fixing the rotating plate is arranged on the right side of the upper surface of the base, the intelligent robot body is fixedly installed on the upper surface of the rotating plate, a cover plate is arranged on the front side wall of the intelligent robot body, the lower side of the cover plate is hinged to the intelligent robot body, a groove is formed in the upper side of the cover plate, and the rotating plate is arranged in the groove. And a locking mechanism clamped with the intelligent robot main body is arranged in the groove. The intelligent robot is good in display effect, the structure of the intelligent robot body can be conveniently watched, and learning efficiency is improved.

title: Visual experiment equipment for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: SHAANXI LUOXIAONUO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching experiment appliances, and discloses visual experiment equipment for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a shell, two L-shaped plates are fixedly arranged on the upper surface of the shell, a screw rod and a sliding rod are respectively and rotatably arranged between the two L-shaped plates and the shell, a sliding plate is in threaded sleeve connection with the rod wall of the screw rod, and the sliding plate is in threaded sleeve connection with the sliding plate.
