The other end of the sliding plate is movably sleeved with the sliding rod, a visual experiment camera is fixedly arranged in the middle of the sliding plate, a first motor is arranged on the upper surface of the L-shaped plate on the left side, a through groove is formed in the middle of the upper surface of the shell, and a rotating seat is rotationally arranged in the through groove through a first rotating rod; a visual experiment workbench is fixedly arranged on the upper surface of the rotating seat, a protective shell is rotationally arranged on the lower surface of the rotating seat, and a second motor is arranged on the right side of the shell. According to the utility model, the lens can be automatically cleaned, and the lens can be shielded and protected.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device, and relates to the technical field of teaching. The artificial intelligence teaching device comprises a protective shell, a mounting box is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the protective shell, a moving device is fixedly connected to the outer wall of the bottom of the protective shell, a box door is hinged to the outer wall of one side of the protective shell, and a lifting device is fixedly connected to the bottom of the inner wall of the mounting box. One end of the lifting device is fixedly connected with a display device, and a mounting shell is arranged in the mounting box. When a first sliding block moves downwards to the boundary of a first sliding groove, the mounting shell is not driven to move downwards, the display device continues to move downwards, a clamping block is separated from the display device, the mounting shell is driven to shake up and down under the action of a first spring, and then a cleaning brush is driven to clean the display device. The display device is prevented from being damaged unintentionally when not in use, and the function of cleaning the display device is achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence technology teaching device
applicants: COLLEGE OF HUMANITIES & INFORMATION CHANGCHUN UNIV OF TECHNOLOGY
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence technology teaching device which comprises a fixed base, the top of the fixed base is fixedly connected with a teaching operation table, the top of the teaching operation table is obliquely arranged, the top of the teaching operation table is provided with a groove, the top of the teaching operation table is fixedly connected with an operation display screen, and the top of the operation display screen is provided with a display screen. A groove is formed in the teaching operation table, the operation display screen is arranged at the bottom of the groove, a first storage groove is formed in the teaching operation table, the first storage groove is communicated with the groove, a dust removal mechanism is arranged at the top of the operation display screen and comprises a dust removal brush, and the dust removal brush is arranged in the first storage groove. Dust is swept to the dust removal groove through the dust removal mechanism and is guided into the dust collection box through the dust removal groove, so that the dust on the surface of the operation display screen is cleaned and collected, the operation display screen cleaning and collecting device is simple and rapid to operate, dust cleaning and collecting can be integrated, and a user can conveniently and daily clean and maintain the operation display screen.

title: Courseware title making method and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a courseware title making method and device based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of performing courseware title extraction on a target course teaching video based on a preset title recognition rule and a title recognition model obtained by training to obtain a courseware title of the target course teaching video; based on a preset character recognition rule and a character recognition model obtained by training, carrying out keynote speaker recognition on the target course teaching video to obtain a keynote speaker name of the target course teaching video; and based on the obtained courseware title of the target course teaching video and the keynote speaker name of the target course teaching video, generating a title of the target course teaching video courseware containing the courseware title and the keynote speaker name. According to the invention, production of the teaching video courseware title can be automatically, intelligently and quickly realized, and the requirement of large-scale production of the teaching video courseware title is met.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device and method f
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence teaching device and method. The device comprises a teacher end, a communication module, and a student learning end. The teacher end comprises an image acquisition module, a sound acquisition module, a teaching video generation module, a data compression module, an after-class exercise packaging module, a data sending module I, a controller I, a data receiving module I and a data storage module I; and the student learning end comprises an identity information acquisition module, a controller II, a decompression module, a display module, a data receiving module II, a data sending module II, a data storage module II, an after-class exercise detection module and a learning question uploading module. According to the invention, the teacher end, the communication module and the student learning end are arranged, and the information of the teacher end and the student learning end is transmitted in real time through the communication module, so that the teacher can timely know the learning condition of the student, the student can timely upload the learning problem for inquiry, and the learning quality of the student is improved.

title: METHOD FOR INSPECTING SEMICONDUCTOR AND SEMICONDUCTOR INSPECTING DEVICE
abstract_text: This method for inspecting a semiconductor with an observation system 1 comprises: a step for acquiring a first pattern image that indicates a semiconductor device S pattern; a step for acquiring a second pattern image that indicates the semiconductor device S pattern, the image having a resolution different from that of the first pattern image; a step for learning by machine learning reconfiguration processing for the second pattern image using the first patten image as teaching data, then reconfiguring the second pattern image into a reconfigured image having a resolution different from that of the second pattern image, the reconfiguration performed using the reconfiguration processing based on the results of said learning; and a step for performing position adjustment on the basis of the first pattern image and an area, in the reconfigured image, calculated as having a high degree of certainty by the reconfiguration processing.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching, which relates to the technical field of teaching instruments and comprises a head shell, a body and a base, a tilt angle sensor is mounted in the middle of the top end in the base, vertical grooves are vertically formed in the periphery in the base at equal angles, and anti-toppling mechanisms are arranged in the vertical grooves. A body is vertically installed at the top end of the base, a single chip microcomputer is installed in the middle of the bottom end in the body, comfortable mechanisms are arranged at the upper ends of the two sides in the body, robot arms are arranged at the upper ends of the two sides of the body, and a head shell is installed in the middle of the top end of the body. A display screen is installed on the front face of the body below the head shell. By arranging the tilt angle sensor and the supporting legs, the motion trend that the body tilts due to external force is offset, damage caused by the fact that the body is prone to toppling due to stress is avoided, maintenance cost is reduced, and normal use of the robot is guaranteed.

title: - TEACHING-LEARNING INTERACTION METHOD BETWEEN USERS AND AI SYSTEMS FOR PERSONALIZED AI SERVICE DESIGN AND APPARATUS THEREFORE
abstract_text: Disclosed are a teaching-learning interaction method between a user and an artificial intelligence system for a personalized artificial intelligence service design and an apparatus thereof, which allow teaching of a user and learning of a system to be systematically circulated. According to one embodiment of the present invention, the teaching-learning interaction method between a user and an artificial intelligence system comprises: a step of determining a system design interaction for a direction of personalization of a service based on an input of the user; a step of performing teaching of the user and learning of the artificial intelligence system for the determined system design interaction; and a step of evaluating an improved system design interaction by results of the teaching and learning by the performing step.

title: Intelligent teaching method and system based on AI intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching method and system based on AI intelligence, and the system comprises a remote management system, a classroom AI comprehensive video system, a student terminal, a parent terminal and a teacher terminal, and the remote management system carries out the management of intelligent classroom teaching, the student terminal, the parent terminal and the teacher terminal through the Internet of Things. An AI teaching assistant is arranged in the teacher terminal. According to the invention, by timely feeding back the task completion condition of the student to the parent terminal and the teacher terminal, parents and teachers can play a timely supervision role, by adopting forced measures, when the error rate of the student exceeds a set threshold value or the task of the student is not completed, the current process cannot be ended, therefore, the learning of the students can be supervised and promoted in time, and the students with poor learning autonomy are forced to complete learning tasks, so that the learning effect is improved, and the purpose of supervising and promoting learning is achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine which comprises an equipment body, the equipment body is fixedly connected with two connecting blocks, the two connecting blocks are both rotatably connected with supporting rods, the bottom ends of the two supporting rods are both fixedly connected with supporting plates, the equipment body is fixedly connected with a pipeline, and the pipeline is fixedly connected with the equipment body. The dustproof curtain and the hooks are arranged, so that when the equipment body does not need to be used, the dustproof curtain can be pulled out of the pipeline through the hooks, then the drawer is retracted into the fixing sleeve, and when the dustproof curtain is completely pulled out of the pipeline and the drawer is also exactly retracted into the fixing sleeve, the hooks can be exactly hung in the grooves, so that the dustproof curtain is convenient to use. At the moment, the drawer cannot slide out of the fixing sleeve, the dustproof curtain is pulled flat due to the fact that the hook is clamped in the groove, a screen of the equipment body can be tightly protected, and therefore a large amount of dust is prevented from being attached to the surface of the equipment body when the equipment body is not used for a long time.

title: DATA GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE, AND DISCRIMINATOR GENERATION METHOD AND DEVICE
abstract_text: An aspect of a data generation device according to the present invention simulatively generates data that is used to prepare, by machine learning, a discriminator for detecting a peak observed in a signal waveform, said data generation device comprising: parameter frequency information acquisition units (31, 32) which find, from a plurality of signal waveforms collected only for the field where the object of machine learning is to prepare the discriminator, frequency information pertaining to predetermined shape parameters that characterize the shape of those signal waveforms; and a simulative waveform generation unit which uses the frequency information pertaining to the shape parameters to generate a simulative signal waveform that may include noise and overlapping of a plurality of peaks, wherein the data generation device provides the simulative signal waveform as data for training or evaluation in machine learning. This makes it possible to simulatively generate highly accurate teaching data.

title: Machine trolley temporary parking device for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: SHANGHAI WEILAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the field of artificial intelligence teaching, particularly relates to a machine trolley temporary parking device for artificial intelligence teaching, and aims to solve the problems that an existing temporary parking device cannot provide high-quality service when a machine trolley is parked, the machine trolley is inconvenient to maintain and charge, and the function is single. The parking device comprises a parking base, a supporting frame plate is fixedly installed at the top of the parking base, a connecting base is fixedly installed on one side of the supporting frame plate, a charging wire wheel is rotatably installed on the connecting base, a charging wire is wound around the charging wire wheel, a machine trolley charging head is fixedly installed at one end of the charging wire, and two moving holes are formed in one side of the supporting frame plate; and moving seats are mounted in the two moving holes in a sliding manner. The temporary parking device is reasonable in structure and convenient to operate, can provide rich services when the machine trolley is parked, and facilitates charging and automatic cleaning of the machine trolley.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND IMAGE PROCESSING APPARATUS
abstract_text: To obtain a machine learning device that can increase convenience for a user.SOLUTION: A machine learning device according to an embodiment of the present invention comprises: a dataset acquisition unit that acquires a dataset including medium data on a print medium on which an image is formed by an image forming apparatus; a teaching data acquisition unit that acquires teaching data including likelihood data indicating the likelihood of improvement in printing failure when an image including the printing failure is formed by the image forming apparatus; and a learning model creation unit that performs machine learning processing by using the medium data included in the dataset and the likelihood data included in the teaching data to create a learning model to which the medium data is input and from which the likelihood data is output.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 6

title: Vocational education network teaching system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a vocational education network teaching system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of network teaching. The system comprises a class allocation module, an image acquisition module, a data analysis module, a live teaching module and a processor. The class allocation module is used for performing learning gradient management on the students and allocating the students to corresponding classes for learning, thereby realizing teaching according to the materials and improving the teaching quality; the image acquisition module is used for controlling a camera of a student end to shoot the learning condition of the student through a network after the authentication is successful, and obtaining real-time video information of the student; the data analysis module is used for receiving and analyzing the real-time video information, acquiring attendance information and distraction values of the students and timely prompting the students to carefully take classes; the live broadcast teaching module is used for synchronizing live broadcast video data of the teacher side to the student side; according to the invention, repeated uploading of the same question can be avoided, the answering efficiency is improved, and the interaction with students is enhanced, so that the teaching quality is improved.

title: Immersive type transformer substation switching training behavior evaluation method and system
applicants: LUOHE POWER SUPPLY CO STATE GRID HENAN ELECTRIC POWER CO
abstract_text: The invention discloses an immersive type transformer substation switching training behavior evaluation method and system, and belongs to the technical field of transformer substation switching training application. A static scene during transformer substation switching training is constructed based on a training scene constructing module; training actions of operators are implanted into the static scene during transformer substation switching training through an operation task dynamic display module to realize static and dynamic virtual combination; deep learning pre-training and correction training are carried out through a score evaluation and action classification module to obtain a proper training behavior score evaluation model; action classification is performed on the training actions according to the proportion of operation errors based on the training behavior score evaluation model. The teaching personnel can perform targeted teaching according to the action classification, and meanwhile, the teaching personnel can identify frequent wrong actions of specific students and perform accurate training on the specific students.

title: Machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of experiment teaching, and discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a machine box, a main board is fixed on the rear surface in the machine box, and a screen is fixed on the front surface of the main board. The screen is fixed on the front surface of the mainboard, three LED lamps, a camera and a power indicator lamp are sequentially fixed on the front surface of the mainboard from left to right and located above the screen, and a memory module is fixed on the front surface of the mainboard and located below the screen, According to the utility model, the mainboard, the camera, the WIFI chip, the MIC interface, the TF card slot, the IO expansion interface, the Type-C interface, the 24PIN digital video port, the loudspeaker and the CPU are arranged; the experiment teaching platform can very easily and rapidly carry out various artificial intelligence experiment developments such as face recognition, object classification, voice recognition and the like by using Miyi graphical programming, meanwhile, the IO expansion interface enables a user to expand more and stronger artificial intelligence deep learning models according to needs, and more innovative applications are developed.

title: CONCRETE FLUIDITY ESTIMATION METHOD BY AI
abstract_text: To provide a concrete fluidity estimation method capable of estimating slumps and slump flows at high precision in all seasons.SOLUTION: Concrete fluidity is estimated by a neural network (14) with a multilayer structure. In advance, regarding plural pieces of concrete, their fundamental data, concrete fluidity data, e.g., slumps are obtained, and the fundamental data as input data and the fluidity data as teaching data are given to the neural network (14) so as to be learned. Then, concrete fundamental data in which fluidity data are unknown are inputted to the learned neural network (14), and fluidity data are estimated. In this invention, the fundamental data denote time sequence acoustic data sampled at a prescribed cycle from a sound in which plural pieces of concrete are kneaded by a mixer (4) or a sound in which they are charged to a hopper (5).SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Intelligent lamp post practical training equipment applied to college teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses intelligent lamp post practical training equipment applied to college teaching. The intelligent lamp post practical training equipment comprises an intelligent lamp post main body, a meteorological station, a charging pile, an intelligent all-in-one machine, a security monitoring camera, a parking space identification camera, a micro base station, a city inspection module, a data transmission line and a data processing display host. The beneficial effects of the invention are that the practical training equipment of the Internet of Things, the practical training equipment of artificial intelligence and other practical training equipment are fused together, and data is transmitted to the data processing display host in real time through a data transmission line or a wireless mode; and the cloud data platform on the data processing display host can process and display the data of each practical training equipment in a centralized manner, and the source codes of the cloud data platform are all open so as to meet the requirements of basic experiments and engineering training of related professional knowledge points of colleges and universities.

title: Method and system for generating natural language by using picture
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and system for generating a natural language by using a picture, which can generate a brand new ancient poem in real time under the condition of inputting a picture, assist teaching in combination with artificial intelligence, can effectively improve the interestingness of classroom teaching, and can make teaching intelligent and improve the interestingness in an education scene. The invention can be used in the education field, but is not limited to the education field, and is good in expandability.

title: Programming assignment automatic correction method and system, and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a programming assignment automatic correction method and system, and a medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a to-be-corrected programming assignment; inputting the programming assignment into a preset neural network model, and calculating and outputting feature data of the programming assignment; performing feature matching on the feature data of the programming assignment and a correct answer template set, and outputting corresponding confidence data; confirming a correction result of the programming assignment according to the confidence data. According to the embodiment of the invention, the feature data of the programming assignment is calculated through the neural network model, the feature data and correct answer templates are subjected to feature matching to obtain the corresponding confidence data, and the programming assignment is efficiently and automatically corrected in combination with the confidence data obtained by deep learning training and feature matching, so that the assignment correction efficiency in the programming teaching process is improved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR PROVIDING AI-BASED TEACHING MATERIAL CREATION SERVICE ACCORDING TO THE CHARACTERISTICS OF CROWDSOURCING-BASED PROJECTS
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method and a device for providing an artificial intelligence-based teaching material creation service in accordance with the characteristics of a crowdsourcing-based project. The method includes: a step of opening a project when work request information on the project is received from a requesting server; a step of extracting at least one work topic from the work request information on the open project; a step of designing a concept map indicating the relationship between the one or more one work topics; a step of generating a template for each of the one or more one work topics; a step of selecting at least one worker for each of the one or more one work topics based on the work request information and requesting work; a step of collecting at least one content generated based on the template from each of the one or more selected workers; and a step of transmitting to the requesting server a teaching material generated by combining by a preset method the content collected from the one or more selected workers.

title: FEDERATED TEACHER-STUDENT MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: A node for a federated machine learning system that comprises the node and one or more other nodes configured for the same machine learning task, the node comprising:a federated student machine learning network configured to update a machine learning model in dependence upon updated machine learning models of the one or more node;a teacher machine learning network;means for receiving unlabeled data;means for teaching, using supervised learning, at least the federated first machine learning network using the teacher machine learning network, wherein the teacher machine learning network is configured to receive the data and produce pseudo labels for supervised learning using the data and wherein the federated student machine learning network is configured to perform supervised learning in dependence upon the same received data and the pseudo-labels.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DYNAMIC LATENT VECTOR ALLOCATION
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, and computer programming product for dynamic vector allocation. Machine learning is conducted using training data constructed based on a target vector having a plurality of feature entries, wherein each of the plurality of feature entries is mapped from at least one original attribute from one or more original source vectors. A feature entry in the target vector is identified based on a first criterion associated with an assessment of the machine learning, for replacing the corresponding at least one original attribute from the one or more original source vectors. At least one alternative attribute from alternative source vectors based on a second criterion is determined, wherein the at least one alternative attribute is to be mapped to the feature entry of the target vector. The feature entry of the target vector is populated based on the at least one alternative attribute.

title: Electronic teaching desk with Artificial Intelligence module based on Voice Recognition
abstract_text: The objective of the present invention is to allow an electronic lecture desk to process user's voice recognition information and perform an artificial intelligence (AI) function. To this end, the present invention relates to an electronic lecture desk which includes a panel unit that makes touch recognition possible and a sensor unit that determines, when the panel unit is touched, a touch method and performs touch recognition according to the determined touch method. The electronic lecture desk comprises: a microphone array which receives a voice signal from an external sound source, separates the sound source from the voice signal, and removes noise from the sound source; a voice recognition engine which receives a voice signal that is an analog signal from which noise has been removed by the microphone array and converts the received voice signal into digital data that is a text signal; a database which repeatedly stores the received voice signal and the converted text signal; a command interpretation unit which receives the converted text signal from the voice recognition engine and interprets the received text signal as a command through machine learning using the database; and a control unit which performs query search or internal/external control function with an external cloud service according to the interpreted command. According to the present invention, the electronic lecture desk is able to perform a cloud search or control function based on artificial intelligence.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching sensor recognition device
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an artificial intelligence teaching sensor identification device, which comprises a circuit board and at least one ejector pin female seat, the circuit board is provided with a sensor identification circuit, the ejector pin female seat comprises at least one female seat pin, a female seat body and a connecting sleeve arranged on the outer side of the female seat body, the female seat body is arranged on the circuit board, and the connecting sleeve is arranged on the outer side of the female seat body. Each female seat pin is electrically connected with the sensor identification circuit and is arranged on the female seat body, the connecting sleeve is arranged around the outer side of the female seat body, one end of the connecting sleeve is connected with the female seat body through a first connecting part, the connecting sleeve and the female seat body are arranged at an interval, and a mounting groove is formed between the connecting sleeve and the female seat body; and a first magnetic attraction piece is arranged in the mounting groove. The first magnetic part is arranged on the ejector pin female seat, so that the connecting male head can be quickly mounted on the ejector pin female seat in a magnetic attraction manner, the pins on the connecting male head can be quickly connected with the female seat pins on the ejector pin female seat, and quick connection is realized.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device with protection function
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device with a protection function, which comprises a side frame, a fixed rod is fixedly connected to the inside of the side frame, a movable seat is slidably connected to the surface of the fixed rod, a connecting strip is rotatably connected to the side of the movable seat through a bearing, one end of the connecting strip is fixedly connected with a movable seat, and the other end of the connecting strip is fixedly connected with the movable seat. A sliding rod is slidably connected to the interior of the movable seat, one end of the sliding rod is fixedly connected to the top table, a bottom cabinet is fixedly connected to the bottom of the top table, and a fixing groove is formed in the top of the top table. Through the cooperation of the movable seat, the connecting strip, the connecting strip and the reset spring, the shaking caused by collision when the top table is used by a worker is effectively reduced, so that the situation that articles placed in the top table fall off due to shaking, unnecessary loss is caused, and the normal use condition of a user is influenced is avoided; and the normal teaching progress is delayed.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching machine trolley with line supporting mechanism
applicants: SHANGHAI WEILAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching equipment, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence teaching machine trolley with a line supporting mechanism, and aims to solve the problems that most of existing teaching devices lack a function of braking the whole device and lack a function of adjusting the angle of a display screen at the same time. According to the scheme, the device comprises a vehicle body, two first gears are rotationally installed in the vehicle body and meshed with each other, supporting rods are rotationally installed on the front sides of the first gears, and rolling wheels are rotationally installed at the top ends of the two supporting rods; the outer sides of the two rolling wheels are movably sleeved with the same hollow frame, and a supporting column is fixedly installed at the top of the hollow frame. The display screen is reasonable in design, the screw rod is manually rotated to drive the threaded cap to move in the vertical direction through the arranged screw rod, and therefore the display screen can be used at different angles, and different use functions are met.

title: Auxiliary artificial intelligence teaching aid
abstract_text: The auxiliary artificial intelligence teaching aid provided by the utility model is adjustable in height, thereby facilitating observation of students in the back row, and being good in teaching effect. The display stand comprises a bottom plate, rolling wheels are installed at the lower end of the bottom plate, an adjusting box with an opening in the upper end is installed at the upper end of the bottom plate, an adjusting sleeve in movable connection is installed in the adjusting box, a display stand mechanism is fixedly connected to the top of the adjusting sleeve, and an adjusting motor is fixedly installed at the bottom of the adjusting box; an output shaft of the adjusting motor is fixedly connected with an adjusting screw rod extending into the adjusting sleeve, and a threaded rack in threaded connection with the adjusting screw rod is arranged in the adjusting sleeve.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: HEFEI XINSILU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine which comprises a mounting frame, a mounting groove is formed in the surface of the front portion of the mounting frame, a flange is arranged on the edge of the front portion of the mounting groove, a batten is rotationally arranged on one side of the mounting frame, a positioning block is arranged at the top of the surface of the batten, and a first threading hole is formed in the bottom end in the mounting groove and penetrates through the mounting frame. Four adjusting rods are arranged on the rear portion of the mounting frame in a penetrating mode through threads, a mounting disc is rotationally arranged at one end of each adjusting rod, a spring, an embedded block and a first protection pad are arranged on one side of each mounting disc, second protection pads are arranged on the faces, opposite to the battens, of the other side wall of the interior of the mounting groove, and a mounting base is fixedly arranged at the bottom end of the mounting frame. According to the utility model, the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine can be conveniently clamped and limited, so that the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine can be conveniently extended for use and retracted for storage, the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine can be conveniently detached from the interior of the mounting frame for maintenance, and the use is more convenient.

title: Inclination sensor teaching aid
applicants: ZHEJIANG COOLMAKER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an inclination sensor teaching aid. The inclination sensor teaching aid comprises a power supply module, an acceleration sensor, a master control module and an indication module. The main control module is connected with the power supply module, the acceleration sensor and the indication module. The indication module is used for indicating the inclination direction. According to the inclination sensor teaching aid provided by the utility model, the indication module is used for indicating different inclination directions, and the inclination sensor teaching aid can be matched with the main controller with a card swiping programming function and is applied to artificial intelligence education of primary and secondary schools, so that primary and secondary school students can receive the perception of the inclination directions more intuitively and understand the principle of an inclination sensor better. And simple module display is adopted, so that the device can be conveniently mounted and carried.

title: TEACHING AND LEARNING PLATFORM
abstract_text: In one aspect, the present disclosure relates to a teaching platform comprising: an administrator hardware module comprising an Administrator User Interface (AUI) configured to allow an administrator user to operate the following: a profile module comprising: at least one administrator profile, and at least one class profile, a teaching application module comprising: a curriculum, a testing module, and a scheduler, and an artificial intelligence teacher module configured to operate the AUI upon the absence of an administrator user; and at least one student hardware module comprising a Student User Interface configured to allow a student user to operate the following: a learning application module comprising: a plurality of learning materials, a plurality of study materials, and a plurality of testing materials, a virtual tutor configured for virtual tutoring of the student user, and a communications module configured for communication between the at least one student user and the administrator user.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, PARTICLE SORTING SYSTEM, PROGRAM, AND PARTICLE SORTING METHOD
abstract_text: [Object] To provide an information processing apparatus, a particle sorting system, a program, and a particle sorting method that practice a spectral type analysis usable for sorting particles.[Solving Means] The information processing apparatus according to an aspect of the present technology includes: an analysis unit; a learning unit; and a discrimination unit. The analysis unit calculates fluorophore information indicating respective amounts of luminescence of a plurality of types of fluorophores on the basis of detection data indicating amounts of luminescence of fluorescence at respective wavelength bands, the fluorescence having been emitted from a particle irradiated with excitation light, discriminates whether or not to treat the particle as a process target in accordance with the fluorophore information, and generates teaching data by associating a result of the discrimination with the detection data. The learning unit applies a machine learning algorithm to the teaching data, learns a characteristic of the detection data discriminated as the process target, and generates dictionary data including a result of the learning. The discrimination unit discriminates whether or not the particle whose detection data has been acquired is the process target on the basis of the dictionary data when the detection data is supplied.

title: HYBRID LEARNING EDUCATION MODEL (HLEM)
abstract_text: The Hybrid Learning Education Model (HLEM) is provided with an objective to ensure that learning is accessible, affordable, inclusive, developmental to educate learners beyond boundaries. Over many decades, teaching and learning was largely restricted to physical schools purely through face-to-face learning. The COVID-19 pandemic & subsequent lockdowns totally disrupted teaching & learning due to school closures announced by all countries globally. Technology in classroom was seen as one of the supplementary learning tools in education. Physical Schools and educational institutions held governance of student teaching & learning. Home schooling was seen in the dim light of educational progress towards sustenance. While Design Learning (DL) and outcome-based approach gained prominence, the Design Learning (DL) methods have been comprehensively used in various regions, there by assisting in teaching, learning, evaluation, and outcome-based assessment. In this advancement, we present an outline of the HLEM through Parent campus and Home Campuses, essentially looking at it from a origin, initiation, screening and assessment perspectives.

title: Programming method, electronic equipment and computer readable storage medium
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent education, and provides a programming method, electronic equipment and a computer readable storage medium. The programming method comprises the following steps: control equipment enters a programming mode under the control of service equipment, and controlled equipment is indirectly controlled to execute corresponding operation through the service equipment; the control equipment enters an air mouse mode under the control of the controlled equipment, and the controlled equipment is directly controlled to execute corresponding operation. When the programming method is used for programming education or learning, a user can get rid of traditional single-machine operation, and directly or indirectly control the controlled equipment by adopting a preset control instruction through the control equipment based on an interaction mode among the above three pieces of equipment; and thus, the user can conveniently understand and use the artificial intelligence technology to solve actual problems in life and learning, teaching is achieved through lively activities, and interestingness is achieved.

title: Music online education demonstration method and system based on AR and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a music online education demonstration method and system based on AR and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a music score time sequence database of key states and strength at which keys are pressed down; obtaining the music score time sequence of a current teaching music score and the moment when keys start to be pressed down; establishing a finger displacement model according to a finger position change track at the moment when the keys start to be pressed under different strengths; obtaining a finger key track when the key is pressed, and obtaining a key time point according to the finger displacement model; determining a time period from the time when the key is pressed down to the time when the finger leaves the key by using the key time point; loading a time period from the time when all keys are pressed down to the time when the fingers leave the keys into a corresponding music score time sequence to obtain new music score data; and generating an AR special effect according to the new music score data for teaching demonstration. Frame-by-frame analysis is not needed after the finger displacement model is established, so that the operation amount of a processor is reduced; the generated special effect emphasizes the fingering, rhythm and strength of playing, and is helpful for students to learn more intuitively and effectively.

title: Interaction system based on artificial intelligence education
applicants: SHENZHEN LONGFEI EDUCATION DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based education interaction system, and the system comprises a user verification module which is used for verifying the identity of a user; a teaching end module which is connected with the user verification module and is used for recording and inputting teaching contents; a student end module which is connected with the teaching end module through an interaction module used for interaction and used for outputting teaching content, wherein the interaction module comprises a teaching interaction module and a teaching feedback module which are matched with each other, and the analysis module is connected with the teaching end module, the student end module and the interaction module. The control module is used for analyzing the teaching content, reading the student information stored in the storage module and controlling the number of times of teaching interaction according to the acquired data; and the storage module is respectively connected with the teaching end module, the student end module, the interaction module and the analysis module and is used for storing data. According to the invention, the corresponding teaching interaction times can be selected in a targeted manner, so that the learning efficiency of students is ensured, and the students can concentrate attention during learning through multiple teaching interactions.

title: Question and answer processing method and device and computer equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a question and answer processing method and a device and computer equipment, and the method comprises the steps: collecting question and answer information provided by a user in a process that a playing terminal outputs an explanation video file for to-be-explained content, such as a virtual network teaching process. According to the invention, based on artificial intelligence technology, the matching degree between the to-be-explained content contained in the explanation video file not output by the playing terminal and the question and answer information is detected firstly, so that when the playing terminal outputs the reply information for the question and answer information in a what mode is controlled according to the matching degree, that reply information fed back by a question and answer system is prevented from being directly output after the question and answer information is collected, influence on the explanation content output by the playing terminal is avoided, and the teaching quality is ensured while the question asking requirement of students is met.

title: Classroom audio and video intelligent note taking method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom audio and video intelligent note taking method. According to the method, image acquisition equipment is deployed in a classroom to shoot a teaching content display area, an artificial intelligence processing method is adopted to process the shot teaching content display area, so that portraits and sounds of teachers and students are desensitized; during content desensitization processing, knowledge key points involved in a teaching process are extracted, so that automatic segmentation of knowledge point video clips is achieved; and intelligent note taking intelligently matches the extracted knowledge points with a syllabus knowledge outline, a knowledge point intelligent retrieval engine is established, and the knowledge point intelligent retrieval engine is provided for question search knowledge points and corresponding knowledge point search explanation videos for application. According to the invention, on the basis of an artificial intelligence semantic recognition technology, desensitization processing is carried out on human portraits and sensitive voices appearing in a video, teaching content knowledge points in the video are automatically extracted, appearing positions of the knowledge points are automatically marked, and intelligent classroom audio and video note taking is realized.

title: Binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device
applicants: WEIHAI VOCATIONAL COLLEGE WEIHAI TECHNICAL COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device, and relates to the technical field of teaching devices. Particularly, the binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device comprises a robot body, a first gear and an adjusting screw rod, the lower part of the robot body is provided with a mounting plate block, the middle part of the mounting plate block is provided with a mounting inner groove, the adjusting screw rod is connected to the lower portions of the left end and the right end of an adjusting plate block, and a clamping rib is arranged on the lower wall of a detachable clamping plate. The binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device is provided with a positioning sliding frame and a threaded transmission rod, a robot body is conveniently driven to slide on the positioning sliding frame through rotation of the threaded transmission rod, so that accurate adjustment is carried out on the position of the robot body, and convenience is brought to use of a mechanical arm; and the device is further provided with the detachable clamping plate, clamping is conveniently carried out on products of different specifications by detaching and replacing the detachable clamping plate, adjustment is conveniently carried out on the clamping distance through the adjusting screw rod, and articles can be effectively prevented from falling off.

title: EVALUATION DEVICE FOR A TECHNICAL DEVICE, AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING AN EVALUATION DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention relates, inter alia, to a method for manufacturing an evaluation device (22) which operates on the basis of, or at least also on the basis of, artificial intelligence and which is suitable for use in a technical device (20) in which one or more measurement data sources transmit real measurement data (MDreal) to the evaluation device (22) for the purpose of evaluation, in which method the evaluation device (22) is taught in a teaching phase. According to the invention, the teaching phase comprises: a training step on the basis of simulated measurement data (MDsim) generated by means of simulation on the basis of a simulation model (SIM) of the technical device (20), and/or real measurement data (MDreal) generated by one or more real measurement data sources of the technical device (20); and a validation step in which the quality of the teaching phase is checked.

title: Software and hardware integrated artificial intelligence image recognition data processing method
applicants: BEIJING ZHONGYU SHENZHOU DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence data searching and publishing methods, and particularly relates to a software and hardware integrated artificial intelligence image recognition data processing method which specifically comprises the following steps: step 1, according to description of a knowledge base and according to an image annotation rule, marking image data by using an image marking tool, then selecting a common data enhancement method, enhancing the image data by using an image enhancement tool through combination of CPU (Central Processing Unit) hardware and GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) hardware, and helping a user to quickly start and realize an artificial intelligence project by constructing a software and hardware integrated data processing platform system. The time cost and the human resource cost for learning and applying the image recognition technology in the common industry and the business field are saved, rapid fusion of artificial intelligence and business is achieved, and the method can be widely applied to the fields of artificial intelligence image recognition scientific research, teaching, practical training, development, production and the like.

title: Network teaching method and system based on AI analysis
applicants: SHENZHEN BEICHEN EDUCATION TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a network teaching method and system based on AI analysis. The method and the system facilitate knowing of the class condition of students by teachers at the first time, help the teachers to know the mastering condition of the students in the class, and improve teaching interactivity and teaching effect. According to a specific implementation mode, the system comprises: a student terminal, which acquires real-time class attending information of a student user using the student terminal; and a teacher terminal, which is used for acquiring real-time class information of a teacher user using the teacher terminal and sending a request for acquiring student information carried by at least one student terminal, wherein after the student terminal obtains request information from the teacher terminal, the student terminal sends the requested student information to an AI analysis processing device, the AI analysis processing device carries out AI analysis processing on the student information sent by the student terminal to obtain an AI analysis result, the AI analysis result is sent to the teacher terminal through a wired network communication interface or a wireless network communication interface, and the teacher terminal receives and displays the received information.

title: Processing method and device of lip language recognition model, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to a processing method and device of a lip language recognition model, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method relates to a computer vision technology of artificial intelligence, the whole distillation process is divided into a student training stage and a master training stage which are alternately trained, and in the master training stage, a temporary training sample is utilized to update a student model updated by the previous alternate training again, the obtained temporary student model feeds back a current learning state to the master model through a verification sample, and the master model is guided to adaptively adjust teaching knowledge according to the current feedback; and, in addition, the master model is supervised by master training samples, and teaching content is adjusted through master identification loss determined by the master training samples. Then, the student model in a student training stage is trained, and repeated iteration is performed for multiple times to obtain a lip language recognition model according to the student model. According to the scheme, the teaching content can be flexibly adjusted while the knowledge accuracy of master model teaching is improved, and the knowledge distillation effect is improved.

title: Teaching mode of mission-complete and upgraded game type system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching mode of mission-complete and upgraded game type system, belongs to the field of artificial intelligence education, and relates to a management system for artificial intelligence internet standardized teaching. At present, the teaching mode that one teacher gives a lesson and multiple students listen to the lesson cannot meet the development requirements of the students at different levels, the teaching mode can well solve the problem, the students can autonomously select a proper mode for learning according to the actual conditions of the students, teaching is achieved through lively activities, and comprehensive development is achieved. Based on a mission-complete and upgraded online game, courses from primary schools to universities are integrated into the game mode, each course is set into a mission-complete upgrading mode from easy to difficult, and related personnel such as educational experts, psychologists, famous teaching teachers, backbone teachers and large-scale network game software designers need to be organized by educational departments. Through common research and development, the invention is reasonable, standardized and systematized as much as possible. According to the mode, adaptive teaching of self-learning of students is realized.

title: AI artificial intelligence education robot based on big data
applicants: AIGUO EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence education robot based on big data, and relates to the technical field of education equipment. The education robot comprises an education robot body and a protective shell, the education robot body is slidably connected to the interior of the protective shell, transmission round rods penetrating through the protective shell are fixed to the bottom ends of the two sides of the education robot body, transmission shafts are rotationally connected to the two sides of the protective shell, and transmission rails are arranged on the outer sides of the transmission shafts; the transmission rail is an elliptical rail obliquely arranged on the surface of the transmission shaft, the end, away from the education robot body, of the transmission round rod is slidably connected into the transmission rail, and a driven turbine is fixed to the lower end of the transmission shaft. According to the teaching robot, the teaching robot body can be effectively protected through cooperation of all accessories, so that the protection capacity of the device is greatly improved, knowledge points which are not mastered by a user can be analyzed through use information of the user through cooperation of all the modules, explanation is carried out according to the knowledge points which are not mastered by the user, and the teaching robot is convenient to use. Therefore, the learning effect and learning efficiency of the user are greatly improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine which comprises a teaching machine main body which is movably arranged in a teaching machine storage box and fixedly installed on a teaching machine supporting piece movably arranged in the teaching machine storage box. A lifting mechanism used for driving the teaching machine supporting piece to move in the vertical direction of the teaching machine body is further arranged in the teaching machine storage box. The teaching machine supporting piece is movably arranged on the buffering box, and a damping mechanism used for buffering and diluting the acting force borne by the teaching machine supporting piece in the vertical direction is further arranged in the buffering box. According to the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine, the teaching machine main body can be stored in the teaching machine storage box through the lifting mechanism, so that a large amount of dust can be prevented from being accumulated on the surface of the teaching machine main body, and the teaching machine main body is prevented from toppling due to external force collision; meanwhile, acting force borne by the teaching machine body during carrying and placing can be buffered and diluted through the damping mechanism, and electronic elements in the teaching machine body are prevented from being damaged.

title: Automatic evaluation method and system for artificial intelligence experiment platform
abstract_text: The invention provides an automatic evaluation method and system for an artificial intelligence experiment platform, and the automatic evaluation method for the artificial intelligence experiment platform comprises the steps: 1, selecting an evaluation rule according to an experiment task, and defining different evaluation times and different evaluation results according to the selected evaluation rule; step 2, if the selected evaluation rule is a self-defined evaluation rule, establishing an evaluation rule, establishing an evaluation environment, and then executing step 3; if the selected evaluation rule is any one of an evaluation rule for program result comparison, an experimental report evaluation rule based on deep learning semantic analysis and a model quality evaluation rule oriented to an artificial intelligence development process, executing the step 3; step 3, submitting an experimental task to be evaluated, and performing automatic evaluation according to the selected evaluation rule; and step 4, counting an automatic evaluation result. According to the invention, automatic correction of different types of experimental jobs in the aspect of artificial intelligence experimental teaching can be realized.

title: Chess playing robot and implementation method thereof
applicants: SUZHOU YUNLING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a chess playing robot and an implementation method thereof. The product is composed of a carrying platform assembly, a chessboard module, a mechanical arm assembly, a machine vision assembly and a control system, the chessboard module, the mechanical arm assembly and the machine vision assembly are all located on the upper portion of the carrying platform assembly, the chessboard module is used for placing chess pieces to be grabbed and the grabbed chess pieces, the mechanical arm assembly is used for grabbing and placing chess pieces at a fixed point, the machine vision assembly is used for identifying the colors and the positions of the chess pieces, and the control system is used for controlling the whole device. According to the invention, through a deep learning method, the mechanical arm is used for replacing manual work to complete chess playing operation more intelligently and efficiently, the programming ability of students can be trained, teaching demonstration is facilitated, and the product has the advantages of being simple in structure and convenient to use and maintain.

title: Remote wireless programming mainboard for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: TAISHUN HUAGONG QIMINGXING TRAINING SCHOOL CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a remote wireless programming mainboard for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a wireless programmer, a chip analog input reference capacitor and a programming mainboard body, the surface of the upper right corner of the wireless programmer is fixedly connected with a chip pin interface, and the lower portion of the chip pin interface is fixedly connected with a wireless programmer enabling pull-up resistor. The remote wireless programming mainboard for the artificial intelligence teaching is mainly composed of hardware, a server, a compiler, a programming platform and a plug-in, the hardware comprises a remote programming device, an avr function teaching board integrated with a remote programming function and a rapid programming device configurator, and the remote programming device mainly receives program data written by students through a wireless network, by programming the chip end through a serial port, the data in the chip is verifed, the avr function teaching board integrated with the remote programming function can support remote programming and wired programming, and the problem of an arduino programming board sold in the market is solved.

title: Teaching monitoring platform based on AI and big data
applicants: LIAONING EQUIPMENT MFG VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL COLLEGE
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching monitoring platform based on AI and big data. The teaching monitoring platform is characterized by comprising a big data platform, and student AI monitoring equipment, teacher AI monitoring equipment and courseware monitoring equipment which are in communication connection with the big data platform. The teaching monitoring platform based on the AI and the big data is provided for solving the problems existing in the existing teaching process, the teaching process is effectively monitored, a basis is provided for later improvement, and therefore the problem that students in class cannot concentrate on listening to the class is effectively solved. According to the scheme, data analysis is carried out on the collected data on the big data platform, and a specific analysis report can be made according to the analysis result to serve as a basis for evaluating the class attending scores of the students and the teaching scores of the teachers. Meanwhile, the scheme can also be used in an examination and is used for monitoring the answering state of the student so as to provide reference for later paper marking.

title: Programming homework correcting method, device and system based on deep learning and medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a programming homework correcting method, device and system based on deep learning and a medium. The method comprises the steps that a to-be-corrected programming homework is collected; inputting the programming homework to be corrected into a preset homework correction model for correct rate calculation; and comparing the calculated correct rate with a preset threshold value, and then outputting a correction result of the to-be-corrected programming job. According to the embodiment of the invention, the obtained programming homework is input into the homework correction model subjected to deep learning training for automatic correction, end-to-end programming homework automatic correction based on deep learning is realized, and the homework correction efficiency in the programming teaching process is effectively improved.

title: INSPECTION SYSTEM, TERMINAL DEVICE, INSPECTION METHOD, AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: An inspection system includes machine learning circuitry configured to determine whether each of objects belongs to a predetermined attribute based on feature data of each of the objects, feature data acquisition circuitry configured to acquire feature data of reevaluated objects which are determined to belong to the predetermined attribute without using the machine learning circuitry among excluded objects which are determined not to belong to the predetermined attribute by the machine learning circuitry, and parameter update circuitry configured to update a learning parameter of the machine learning circuitry based on teaching data including the acquired feature data acquired by the feature data acquisition circuitry.

title: Intelligent interactive teaching method for circuit experiment
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent interactive teaching method for a circuit experiment, and the method comprises the steps: introducing an intelligent AI robot in a circuit teaching experiment course to assist a teacher in carrying out the circuit experiment auxiliary teaching, and carrying out the intelligent interaction of various circuit experiment knowledge with students in a circuit experiment teaching process. Problems and confusion encountered by students in the circuit teaching experiment process are solved in time in a self-service mode, so that equivalently, multiple experiment teachers are configured in a circuit teaching experiment course, a written intelligent interaction program can be continuously updated, stored and called, the circuit experiment teaching quality and efficiency can be improved, and the teaching experiment management cost can be effectively controlled.

title: Music online education practice system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a music online education practice system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a student control style analysis module, which is used for obtaining the adaptation degree of a student to a control style according to the control style when the student sings along with a song, the control degree of the student to the control style and a target style, and obtaining accurate characteristics when the student sings along with the song; and an online education practice module, which is used for clustering the control styles of all the students determined by the student control style analysis module to obtain a plurality of types of control styles. According to the accurate features of the students during song singing, the accurate feature difference degree of all the students for each category of control style is obtained; and a reference style set is obtained and sent to a teacher according to the adaptation degree and the accurate feature difference degree of each category of control style. Compared with the prior art, the system not only helps students to obtain proper singing styles, but also helps teachers to formulate proper teaching schemes, so that the teaching efficiency of the teachers is improved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: An inference device (18) is configured to be accessible to a storage unit for storing a model that is constructed by machine learning using, as teaching data, information about a predetermined sound and a signal source of a brain wave of a first subject to whom the predetermined sound is presented, the model being configured to output information about sound inferred as would be recognized by the subject on the basis of the inputted signal source of the brain wave of the subject. The inference device (18) acquires a brain wave of a second subject to whom the predetermined sound is presented. The inference device (18) infers a signal source of the brain wave from among a plurality of regions of the brain of the second subject, on the basis of an aspect of the acquired brain wave. The inference device (18) inputs, to the model, information about the inferred signal source, and acquires information about sound that is outputted from the model and that is inferred as would be recognized by the second subject.

title: AI visual perception technology-based motion teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI visual perception technology-based motion teaching system, which comprises a pre-motion human body motion data acquisition system, an in-motion human body motion data comparison system and a post-motion human body motion data teaching system, wherein the pre-motion human body motion data acquisition system is used for acquiring motion data in motion teaching, the in-motion human body motion data comparison system is used for comparing standard motion data with the motion data of a beginner during motion during teaching, searching for non-standard motions and recording the non-standard motions, and the post-motion human body motion data teaching system is used for teaching the beginner again through the recorded non-standard motion data after the beginner motions, so that the beginner is corrected, and the motion action is standardized and standard so as to achieve improvement. According to the invention, the beginner is explained and guided in detail before motion, during motion and after motion, so that the beginner can understand each action in detail, and the motion requirement can be met in the shortest time.

title: Construction method and system of classroom teaching behavior event description model
abstract_text: The invention discloses a construction method and system of a classroom teaching behavior event description model. The construction method comprises the following steps: acquiring classroom teaching video data to be trained; dividing classroom teaching video data to be trained into a plurality of events according to the utterance of a teacher by using a voice activity detection technology; and performing multi-modal identification on all events by utilizing various artificial intelligence technologies, dividing the events into sub-events under multiple dimensions, establishing an event description model according to the sub-events, and describing various teaching behavior events of teachers in a classroom. According to the method, the classroom video is cut according to the voice, so that the integrity of the non-speech behavior of the teacher in each event can be ensured to the greatest extent; and by extracting generality among different events, a description model for uniformly describing all the events is established, so that not only can description of various teaching behaviors of teachers be completed, but also relevance among the events can be reflected, and the events are not isolated any more.

title: Intelligent voice assistant for AI learning
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent voice assistant for AI learning, which comprises a voice receiver for receiving voice made by a user; the memory is in transmission connection with the voice receiver so as to store data of the received voice; the central processing unit is electrically connected with the memory so as to decode the data stored in the memory; the data transmitter is in transmission connection with the control terminal so as to transmit the decoded data to the control terminal or receive the data sent by the control terminal; and the loudspeaker is electrically connected with the memory so as to play voice. Language interaction is achieved, and language processing sent by a user is optimized; the data transmitter is used for controlling the terminal server or other cloud platforms to carry out resource increase and deletion; feedback of a dictionary and teaching materials for translating words and sentences can be achieved in a voice mode.

title: SAFETY PROTECTION METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ROBOT, AND ROBOT
abstract_text: Provided are a safety protection method and apparatus for a robot, and a robot, which relate to the technical field of robots and artificial intelligence. The method comprises: acquiring operation data of an electric motor; if it is detected, according to the operation data, that the electric motor satisfies an overload triggering condition, executing an overload safety processing policy corresponding to the electric motor; when it is determined, according to the operation data, that the electric motor satisfies a collision detection condition, performing collision detection on the electric motor, wherein the collision detection condition is determined according to the overload triggering condition; and if it is detected that a collision occurs with the electric motor, executing a collision safety processing policy corresponding to the electric motor. The technical solution provided by the present application can be applied to consumer robots, such as a household robot used for accompanying and teaching children or accompanying elderly people, and robots, such as an industrial robot, a commercial robot and a specialized robot, and same can improve the safety protection capability of the applied robots.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AUTONOMOUS LEARNING OF CONTENTS USING A MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHM
abstract_text: A method of autonomous learning of contents using a machine learning model, wherein in the method includes processing a corpus of data using the machine learning model to extract insights including at least one of a key knowledge, a topic of knowledge, a plurality of key entities, or an associated cognitive ability, collectively referred to as meta-tags; creating associations between a plurality of sub-components of at least one of an existing content, an enriched content, or one or more meta-tags, using the machine learning model to generate a graph knowledge base; and automatically performing at least one of: 1) building the graph knowledge base or 2) enriching an existing knowledge base, using the machine learning model and the one or more meta-tags, wherein the graph knowledge base comprises at least a graph form of information, wherein the graph knowledge base enables automatic retrieval of organized content to be used for generating teaching material for the user based on the one or more meta-tags.

title: Method and Apparatus for Teaching Using a Machine Learning Algorithm
abstract_text: A method for teaching a student a selected content using a computer implemented machine learning algorithm. After the selected content has been presented, a query is presented to the student relating to that content. A correctness metric is developed as a function of the response of the student to the query. From the correctness metric, an inference is made of the comprehension by the student of that content. During this process, physiological indicia of the response of the student are used to develop a behavioral pattern. Using the pattern, additional content may be selected for presentation to the student. Over time, the machine learning algorithm is able iteratively to make improved inferences of the preferred learning method of the student as a function of the inferred comprehension of the student of each newly presented content.

title: Visual test equipment for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of visual test equipment for teaching, and discloses visual test equipment for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a bearing plate, a groove is formed in the top of the bearing plate, a first roller is rotatably connected to the inner wall of the groove, a first cylindrical connecting rod is slidably connected to the inner wall of the groove, and a second cylindrical connecting rod is slidably connected to the inner wall of the first cylindrical connecting rod. A first machine shell is fixedly connected to the back face of the first roller, a first groove is formed in the left side of the first machine shell, a first visual device is fixedly connected to the left side of the first machine shell, a first key groove is formed in the top of the first machine shell, a second roller is rotationally connected to the inner wall of the groove, and a second cylindrical connecting rod is slidably connected to the inner wall of the first roller. The back face of the second rolling wheel is fixedly connected with a second machine shell. According to the visual test equipment for artificial intelligence teaching, the effects that horizontal movement can be achieved, all-directional rotation observation is achieved, and equipment damage is reduced to a certain extent when the equipment falls off due to collision are achieved.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR RECOMMENDING TEACHING AND LEARNING DATA USING MACHING LEARNING
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a method for recommending teaching and learning data using machine learning, which increases convenience and satisfaction of a user who uses a platform service, and an apparatus thereof. According to the present invention, the method comprises the following steps: extracting and processing two or more pieces of information into a data frame when a plurality of users inquire about teaching learning data; extracting a representative value of each cluster; extracting information in a crawling method, processing the extracted information in a JSON format file format, and processing the processed information into a data feature data frame format; generating a data frame (d) including information for identifying data and an analysis result; generating a recommendation vector (f); and recommending a predetermined number of data on the basis of the recommendation vector.

title: Internet education video image screening and extracting method based on deep learning
applicants: JIANGSU XIFENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet education video image screening and extracting method based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of multimedia data retrieval, and the screening and extracting method comprises the following specific steps: 1, inputting of multimedia data to be detected; step 2, feature extraction; step 3, feature fusion; and step 4, screening and extracting; according to the internet education video image screening and extracting method, feature extraction and feature fusion are conducted on the multi-modal data through the deep learning technology, the multi-modal data are projected to the same public space, cross-modal retrieval of the multi-modal data is achieved through similarity calculation, compared with an existing single-modal retrieval method, the internet education video image screening and extracting method is beneficial to improving the screening precision and extraction efficiency of the multimedia materials, and therefore, the teacher can be helped to make the multimedia teaching plan, and the working efficiency of the teacher in making the multimedia teaching plan can be improved.

title: Classroom intelligent analysis method and system for helping teachers to retrospectively grow
