abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom intelligent analysis method and system for helping teachers to retrospectively grow. The method comprises the steps: carrying out the automatic detection and collection of the classroom voiceprint, facial expression, head posture and classroom gesture of the teachers, and the information of students watching a blackboard, and other non-speech behavior data based on the classroom teaching video of the teachers, and carrying out the automatic detection and collection of the classroom voiceprint, facial expression, head posture and classroom gesture of the teachers. The classroom behaviors of the teachers are comprehensively analyzed, the analysis results of the classroom voiceprints, classroom expressions, head postures and classroom gestures of the teachers are combined with the analysis results of the blackboard watching information of the students, and the analysis results of the teaching videos of the excellent teachers or the preset teaching standards of the excellent teachers are referred to; and by referring to historical records of previous classroom video analysis of the teacher, the performance condition of the teacher in the classroom teaching process and the direction in which the teacher needs to be improved are analyzed, so that the teacher is helped to carry out retrospective growth. According to the method, multiple artificial intelligence technologies are fused together, and the comprehensiveness and effectiveness of classroom non-speech behavior analysis of teachers are improved.

title: Self-adaptive electronic blackboard and whiteboard and self-adaptive intelligent electronic blackboard and whiteboard teaching system thereof
applicants: SHENZHEN QIANXIN TECH INDUSTRIAL CO LTD
abstract_text: A self-adaptive electronic blackboard and whiteboard comprises an electronic blackboard and whiteboard body, a servo lifting mechanism and a self-adaptive position control device; the servo lifting mechanism comprises a lifting device; the lifting device comprises two screw rods, a servo motor and a screw rod guide block; the lead screw guide block is installed on the lead screw and can move up and down along with forward and reverse rotation of the screw rods; and the self-adaptive position control device comprises a plurality of self-adaptive position detection devices, a self-adaptive position controller and a servo lifting driving device. The self-adaptive position controller receives operator human body data transmitted by the self-adaptive position detection devices to obtain position movement data, converts the position movement data into a control signal and transmits the control signal to the servo lifting driving device; the servo lifting driving device is electrically connected with the servo motor; and the servo lifting driving device drives the servo motor to realize self-adaptive position adjustment of the electronic whiteboard and blackboard. The man-machine interface system with the artificial intelligence attribute can be provided, the labor intensity of teachers is relieved, the teaching environment is improved, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Distributed Jupyterhub-based self-flow method and system and platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a distributed Jupyterhub-based self-flow method and system and a platform, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a Jupyterhub Single user mirror image by using Docker File, taking a mirror image library provided in a docker mirror image warehouse as a construction basis, and carrying out the modification of a configuration file; providing a front-end and back-end service interaction component of a self-process method based on Jupyterlab; redeploying a Jupyterhub mirror image by using a self-process method component based on the Jupyterlab, and integrating the component for performing the self-process method based on the Jupyterlab into the constructed Jupyterhub Single user mirror image, so that a user directly calls the self-process method; deploying a Jupyterhub Singleuser mirror image by using Kubernates, and persisting user data by deploying a PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride) component and a PV (Photovoltaic) component, so that a self-process method is realized. According to the invention, organic integration of teaching and practice is realized, and the invention has an outstanding application effect in teaching related to artificial intelligence courses in colleges and universities.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching machine trolley with camera blocking and protecting mechanism
applicants: QINZHOU DINGSHENG YINGBO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence teaching machine trolley with a camera blocking and protecting mechanism, and aims to solve the problem that the service life of a camera is shortened due to the fact that the existing camera is not provided with a blocking and protecting structure, the technical scheme includes that the artificial intelligence teaching machine trolley comprises a trolley body, and a mounting plate is fixedly mounted at the top of the trolley body. A blocking and protecting frame and a camera body are fixedly mounted on the front side of the mounting plate, the camera body is located in the blocking and protecting frame, two clamping plates are fixedly mounted at the top of the blocking and protecting frame, the same rotating shaft is rotatably mounted on the inner sides of the two clamping plates, a baffle is fixedly mounted on the outer side of the rotating shaft, the baffle is located on the front side of the camera body, and a connecting groove is formed in one side of the rotating shaft. The camera is reasonable in structural design, can play a good role in blocking and protecting the camera body through the joint cooperation of the baffle and the blocking and protecting frame when the camera is not used, facilitates the rotation and limiting fixation of the baffle, and is convenient to use.

title: Remote intelligent vehicle experiment platform based on AI
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI-based remote intelligent vehicle experiment platform, which comprises a local experiment end, a remote intelligent vehicle platform and a communication medium, and is characterized in that the local experiment end comprises a local experiment tool and a local debugger; the remote intelligent vehicle platform comprises a vehicle-mounted debugger, a vehicle-mounted controller, a vehicle-mounted driving unit, a vehicle-mounted signal acquisition unit, an intelligent vehicle body and a power supply system. According to the utility model, the vehicle body assembly vehicle-mounted controller and the local experiment tool of the intelligent vehicle are separated, and the vehicle body assembly and a necessary training map can be placed in a large-area special laboratory with conditions; an experimenter only needs to carry a portable local experiment tool and a local debugger to debug and control the intelligent vehicle at any place with network signals, an original closed-loop control data link is actually reserved, the local core controller can directly receive and send control instructions and feed back motion information and video data, wiring is simple, operation is convenient, and the intelligent vehicle can be debugged and controlled through the local core controller. And remote teaching and on-line experiments can be conveniently carried out.

title: FLUID LEAK DETECTION SYSTEM, FLUID LEAK DETECTOR AND TRAINING DEVICE
abstract_text: FIELD: fluid leak detection systems.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to a fluid leak detection system for detecting fluid leaks in buildings. A fluid leakage detection system comprising: a plurality of sensors provided in the building, which respectively detect detection target values ​​at their mounting positions; a fluid leak detection device that detects a fluid leak in a building by a leak state estimation algorithm used to estimate a fluid leak state in a building based on the detection target values ​​detected by the plurality of sensors; and a teaching unit that trains a leak state estimation algorithm, the fluid leak detecting device comprises: an actual measured value acquiring unit that obtains detection target value values ​​detected by the plurality of sensors; and a leakage state estimating unit that estimates the leakage state of a fluid in a building by an algorithm for estimating a leak condition based on distributions of detection target value values ​​obtained by the actual measured value obtaining unit, the teaching unit comprises: a teaching unit that trains an algorithm for evaluating a leak state by means of machine teaching unit, as training data, the values ​​of the detection target values ​​respectively detected by a plurality of sensors during a fluid leak from a predetermined position of the building; a structural data storage unit that stores structural data of a building; and a 3D flow simulator that simulates the behavior of a fluid in a building during fluid leakage from a predetermined position of a building by performing a 3D flow simulation based on the structural data of the building stored in the structural data storage unit, the teaching unit teaching the leak state estimation algorithm by machine learning, further using, as training data, the detection target values ​​calculated based on the result of the 3D flow simulation performed by the 3D flow simulator.EFFECT: accurate detection of fluid leakage conditions in buildings.17 cl, 7 dwg

title: Machine learning algorithm for teaching quality evaluation
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education and teaching, and discloses a machine learning algorithm for teaching quality assessment, comprising the following steps: S1, information of all teaching teachers is input into a storage module, and the storage module contains appearance, age, teaching age, gender, name and height of each teacher; S2, after the students, the parents and the teachers agree, a monitoring module is installed above the rear wall in the class, the monitoring module has a number, the number is the same as the name of the class, and the monitoring module is in a shutdown state for a long time; S3, the evaluation group controls the monitoring modules in one or more classes to be turned on, and the monitoring modules recognize teachers and match the teachers with the appearances in the storage module; and S4, when the teacher does not know the specific evaluation time, the monitoring module records the teaching picture of the teacher. The machine learning algorithm can comprehensively judge the teaching quality of the teacher under hard conditions, the evaluation is more accurate, the teaching pictures of the teacher are recorded, the teaching pictures of the same teacher are recorded for multiple times, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Multifunctional artificial intelligence practical training test system
applicants: ZHONGXING YAOWEI TECH JIANGSU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multifunctional artificial intelligence practical training test system which comprises a server, a mobile terminal, a practical training system and a storage module, the mobile terminal comprises a student terminal and a teacher terminal, the practical training system and the storage module are connected into the server, the practical training system and the storage module are mutually connected, and the mobile terminal is connected into the server through the Internet. A server, a mobile terminal, a practical training system and a storage module are adopted, a teacher can directly conduct basic course teaching based on the platform, a practical training environment is provided for students in combination with practical training items, and the learning conditions of all the students are obtained through the management function of the platform. Students do not need to build a complex system environment by themselves, and can obtain a complete knowledge system only by performing manual operation step by step according to prompts of experiment steps. The scheme follows a unified automatic resource management thought, which means that teaching resources of schools and enterprises in artificial intelligence knowledge system cultivation are fully utilized through a unified platform system.

title: Online precise teaching tutoring method and system based on artificial intelligence and big data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching tutoring, in particular to an online precise teaching tutoring method and system based on artificial intelligence and big data, and a storage medium. The system comprises a client, a wrong question collection unit, a question type integration unit, an online comment unit and an interactive discussion unit. According to the design of the invention, teaching question types are formulated according to the concluded wrong questions by adopting a precise question type synthesis algorithm, teaching tasks are issued to student clients of students, targeted teaching planning is carried out in combination with the conditions of the students, precise teaching tutoring can be carried out on the weak question types of the students, the practicability is higher, students can selectively check video analysis at learning errors of themselves, and can also check video analysis of question types which are not understood but replied, so that the students can more thoroughly understand question type solving methods, teaching planning is pertinently carried out on learning of the students, and learning progress is facilitated.

title: Classroom quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: HENAN INSTITUTE OF ADMINISTRATIVE MAN SCIENCE
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a classroom quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: according to classroom image data, obtaining a class attending state value and a classroom overall participation positive degree value of each student; calculating a teaching content redundancy degree value in the current evaluation time interval according to the voice information of the teacher; according to the teaching content redundancy degree value and the class attending state value of each student, calculating a class attending state threshold value of each student in the current evaluation time interval, and further determining an overall class attending state value in the current evaluation time interval; and according to the overall class attending state value and the overall class participation positive degree value, calculating a class quality score value in the current evaluation time interval. According to the method, the teaching content redundancy degree value is calculated by analyzing the voice information of the teacher, and the corresponding class attending state threshold values are determined for different students according to the teaching content redundancy degree value, so that the accuracy of a class quality evaluation result is effectively improved.

title: Ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of ancient poetry teaching, and particularly relates to an ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a base, an adjusting assembly, a control assembly and a display assembly, and is characterized in that the top of the outer side wall of the base is provided with the adjusting assembly, and the adjusting assembly is composed of a telescopic adjusting rod, a mounting plate and an electric turntable; the control assembly comprises a central processing unit, a wireless transmission module and a control panel, the overall height of the equipment is changed by adjusting the length of the telescopic adjusting rod, operation is simple, the electric rotary table can provide power, drive the display screen on the top of the electric rotary table to rotate and adjust the orientation of the display screen, students can watch conveniently, the applicability is high, and meanwhile the practicability is high. The projector is matched with the display screen, when the teaching aid is used indoors, students in the front row observe the display screen for learning, and students in the rear row can observe projection images of the projector for learning, so that the students in different positions can observe teaching images, the students can watch the teaching images conveniently, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Corn ear high-flux intelligent screening virtual simulation experiment system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a corn ear high-flux intelligent screening virtual simulation experiment system, and belongs to the technical field of virtual simulation. The system comprises a main interface guiding module, an artificial intelligence principle learning module, an artificial intelligence algorithm practice module and a corn ear screening virtual simulation module, wherein the main interface guiding module is linked with the other three modules so as to guide skipping among the modules; the artificial intelligence principle learning module comprises a biological neural network principle learning module and an artificial neural network principle learning module; the artificial intelligence algorithm practice module trains a network according to a neural network model and parameters and displays a training result; and the corn ear screening virtual simulation module displays a corn ear screening process in a three-dimensional scene. The system provided by the invention constructs a teaching experiment system with low cost, high availability and good effect, and can play an important role in artificial intelligence teaching, especially in the artificial intelligence teaching related to agriculture and machinery.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence big data
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching supplies, and particularly relates to a teaching device based on artificial intelligence big data, which comprises a desktop, a desk cavity and a slot are respectively arranged on the lower surface of the desktop, a teaching assembly is arranged on the upper surface of the desktop, and the teaching assembly comprises a mounting base contacted with the desktop. A fixing frame clamped with the table top is fixedly mounted on one side of the mounting base, a mounting groove is formed in the lower surface of the fixing frame, a reset spring is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of an inner cavity of the mounting groove, a fixing block is fixedly connected to the lower end of the reset spring, an inserting rod penetrating through the table top is fixedly mounted on the upper surface of the fixing block, and the inserting rod is inserted into the inserting groove. According to the utility model, the mounting base connected with the teaching assembly is clamped with the desktop through the fixing frame, and one end of the insertion rod is fixedly inserted into the insertion groove formed in the desktop under the elastic action of the reset spring, so that the firmness of mounting the teaching assembly is enhanced.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: To allow an optimal white balance gain (WBGain) to be set by using a classification category obtained by machine learning.SOLUTION: A teaching data storage unit 641 has stored teaching data including plural pieces of image data and category numbers of light sources. A machine learning unit 642 performs machine learning of criteria for determining categories of the light sources, and stores the learned criteria (classifier) in a related parameter storage unit 643. A light source identifying unit 644 performs category classification of an initial estimation vector with the classifier stored in the related parameter storage unit 643, and outputs categories of one or more light sources at a scene photographing a frame and data such as distance between the categories of the light sources and the initial estimation vector on a feature space to a white balance correction unit 65.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 7

title: Unit action deep learning model learning method using robot and robot control method using the same
abstract_text: An objective of the present invention is to effectively create a movement as needed without installing a separate jig-fixing part in a robot automation process. A method divides actions of a worker into N unit actions including approaching, holding, moving, inserting, and tightening to acquire a correct answer image from demonstrations including direct teaching and observation for each unit action, and uses the correct answer image and an image for additional learning inputted from a robot to learn. The robot includes: a robot module (10) gripping a target object, and including one or more robot arms (11) formed to be moved in multiple axes; a robot assistance module (20) including an assistance end effector (22) additionally gripping the target object; and a sensor module (30) photographing the robot module (10), the robot assistance module (20), and the target object to generate an image for additional learning including the angle and position of the robot module (10) and the robot assistance module (20).

title: Expansion blackboard for auxiliary teaching for adolescent artificial intelligence course education
applicants: GUANGDONG ZHIDAO INTELLIGENT INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an auxiliary teaching expansion blackboard for adolescent artificial intelligence curriculum education, which comprises a stainless steel frame, touch control film plates and a storage box, the touch control film plates are symmetrically arranged on one side of the stainless steel frame, the storage box is arranged on the outer side of the stainless steel frame, a pen rack is arranged on the inner side of the storage box, and the pen rack is connected with the stainless steel frame. A containing hole is integrally formed in the pen rack, idler wheels are arranged on the lower side of the storage box at equal intervals, and a handle is arranged outside the storage box. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that through the arrangement of the storage box, the handle, the roller, the pen rack, the placing hole, the anti-drop hanging rod and the limiting groove, a touch pen or a mark pen for writing can be stored in the placing hole in the pen rack in the storage box, so that the writing pen can be stored orderly and prevented from being lost, and the teaching process is ensured to be carried out smoothly.

title: Teaching mode analysis method based on big data
applicants: QST INNOVATIVE TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching mode analysis, in particular to a teaching mode analysis method based on big data. The method comprises the steps of building a network architecture of a teaching mode analysis system, acquiring and processing mass data, intelligently judging and identifying a teaching mode of a classroom, analyzing and evaluating the teaching mode, performing collision analysis on student scores, comprehensively evaluating and scoring the teaching mode, generating a comprehensive analysis report and the like. According to the design, teaching evaluation can be rapidly carried out, the workload of workers is reduced, and the teaching evaluation efficiency and accuracy are improved; according to the method, the teaching mode of the classroom can be automatically and accurately judged, and the applied teaching mode is scored for different classes or different subjects in combination with evaluation indexes in multiple aspects, so that the applicable teaching mode or a combination of multiple modes can be better explored; and teaching analysis is combined with the artificial intelligence technology, development of professional literacy of teachers is facilitated, and then the teaching quality is improved.

title: Accurate teaching device based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an accurate teaching device based on big data and artificial intelligence, which comprises a supporting panel, locking blocks are fixedly connected to the edge side of the top of the supporting panel, an operation panel is fixedly connected between the opposite surfaces of the locking blocks, a hollow inner cavity is formed in the operation panel, the top of the supporting panel is fixedly connected with a limiting block and a collecting block, the upper surface of the collecting block is fixedly connected with a dust suction hole, the bottom of the supporting panel is fixedly connected with a self-balancing device, and the bottom of the self-balancing device is fixedly connected with a bottom fixing plate. The device belongs to the technical field of education supplies, according to the accurate teaching device based on the big data and the artificial intelligence, the hollow inner cavity is formed in the bottom of the operation panel, when a teacher teaches, the situation that the paper is damaged due to the fact that the bottom operation panel is too hard is avoided, the integrity of the paper is guaranteed, and meanwhile the drying speed of the ink in the paper surface is increased.

title: Teaching and safety epidemic prevention visual intelligent management system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a visual intelligent management system for teaching and safety epidemic prevention. Comprising a power supply module, a network connector, a PC, an AI face camera, a human body temperature detector, a first DDC controller, an air conditioner unit, a second DDC controller, a lighting unit, a power distribution unit and a third DDC controller, wherein the AI face camera and the human body temperature detector are connected with the corresponding ends of the PC respectively; the air conditioner unit and the second DDC controller are connected with the corresponding end of the first DDC controller; the door magnet, the window magnet, the first LoRa wireless module and the second LoRa wireless module are respectively connected with corresponding ends of the third DDC controller. According to the utility model, the system has good visual exhibition; through technologies of face recognition and the like, campus safety is improved, temperature detection is automatically carried out, manpower is replaced, and the labor intensity of workers is reduced; data can be remotely transmitted through a wireless transmission technology, the data coverage range is large, the data statistics, analysis and matching difficulty is small, and the intelligent degree is high.

title: Portable multifunctional intelligent visual practical training platform
applicants: JIANGSU HUIBO ROBOTICS TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a portable multifunctional intelligent visual practical training platform, which integrates industrial application and teaching practical training, and can effectively solve the problem that skill talents are seriously vacant due to artificial intelligence development and industrial transformation and upgrading. One end of the teaching box body is rotatably connected with the lower end of the turning cover, a profiling vibration reduction plate is arranged in the teaching box body, the profiling vibration reduction plate is arranged on the inner bottom surface of the teaching box body through supporting legs, gaps are reserved between the profiling vibration reduction plate and the four inner walls of the teaching box body, a plurality of mutually separated grooves are formed in the profiling vibration reduction plate, and screw holes are formed in the bottom surfaces of the grooves. A teaching intelligent camera and a machine base are arranged in the teaching box body, the machine base is detachably connected to the profiling vibration reduction plate through screws, a telescopic rod is installed on the machine base, the top end of the telescopic rod is sleeved with an adjusting block, the adjusting block is fixed through a bolt, a horizontal hole is formed in the adjusting block in the direction perpendicular to the telescopic rod, and the adjusting rod penetrates through the horizontal hole and then is fixed through a bolt. The teaching intelligent camera is fixed to the end of the adjusting rod.

title: Internet education student comprehensive portrait label management system based on deep learning
applicants: JIANGSU XIFENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet education student comprehensive portrait label management system based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of intelligent teaching. The system includes a student identity recognition module, a learning data acquisition module, a learning label matching module, a student portrait generation module, an education scheme planning module, a teacher management module, a cloud management database and a data update feedback module. The management system can automatically generate the teaching scheme, does not need the manual making of the teacher, improves the working efficiency of the teacher, facilitates the teacher to check and analyze the student data, can update the teaching scheme in real time, prevents the reduction of the learning enthusiasm of the student caused by a single teaching mode, and improves the learning efficiency of the student.

title: Mobile display platform for adolescent artificial intelligence course education
applicants: GUANGZHOU HAIXIN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a mobile display platform for adolescent artificial intelligence course education, which comprises a support cabinet body and a lifting push rod, the middle part in the support cabinet body is fixedly connected with the lifting push rod, and the top end of the lifting push rod is fixedly connected with a rotary support frame. The lifting display stand has the advantages that small artificial intelligence equipment which is small and inconvenient to watch from a long distance can be placed on the lifting display stand, the lifting display stand can be controlled to do lifting and rotating motion through the actions of the lifting push rod and the rotating servo motor, students at a long distance can watch the equipment conveniently, and the working efficiency is improved. Meanwhile, the artificial intelligence equipment can be displayed in multiple directions, the teaching effect is improved, a folding displayer can rotate above a supporting rod solid and is fixed through attraction of an electromagnet block, the teaching requirement is met, and when not used, the folding displayer is folded and placed above the supporting cabinet body, so that the teaching effect is improved. Safety protection can be effectively provided for the folding display.

title: Teaching management and quality evaluation system based on big data and AI technology
applicants: QST INNOVATIVE TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching management, in particular to a teaching management and quality evaluation system based on big data and an AI technology. The system includes an infrastructure unit, a classroom analysis unit, a multi-layer data unit and a quality evaluation unit; wherein the infrastructure unit is used for providing and managing a construction foundation for supporting system operation; the classroom analysis unit is used for performing quality analysis management on the teaching video; the multi-layer data unit is used for comprehensively analyzing and managing campus teaching quality; and the quality evaluation unit is used for evaluating and forming a final analysis report. According to the design, classroom teaching videos can be comprehensively acquired, manpower and time are saved, and classroom teaching quality can be comprehensively and quickly evaluated; thus, data classification and statistics can be carried out according to actual requirements, the education workers can quickly and accurately find and improve problems existing in teachers and students, and the comprehensive quality and classroom quality of the teachers and the students in the campus are improved; therefore, a scientific and comprehensive decision basis can be provided for education decision makers.

title: QUALITY DETERMINATION SYSTEM, QUALITY DETERMINATION METHOD, SERVER, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: The present invention provides a quality determination system capable of determining the quality of inspection targets with higher accuracy, a quality determination method, a server, and a program.　A quality determination system 10a comprises: a teaching dataset generation unit 302 that classifies images containing a plurality of inspection target defects in accordance with defect-characterizing brightnesses, and generates a plurality of classified teaching datasets; a storage unit 460b that stores a plurality of machine learning models, which have been respectively constructed on the basis of the plurality of teaching datasets by a machine learning model construction service 80 for constructing machine learning models; a camera unit 460a that captures images of inspection targets; a determination unit 460c that determines the quality of each inspection target 14 imaged by the camera unit 460a on the basis of the plurality of machine learning models stored in the storage unit 460b; and an optimal model selection unit 306 that evaluates the determination results from the determination unit 460c, and selects an optimal machine learning model from among the plurality of machine learning models.

title: RAS (RETICULAR ACTIVATING SYSTEM)-OPEN MULTILINGUAL ENGLISH CONVERSATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: To solve problems that it is recently popular to learn English conversation as multilingual conversation learning and learners wish "to be able to speak English" and on-line English conversation learning and various English conversation schools spread, but there are many problems with foreign tutors and instructors that on-line learning providing companies employ and learning at various English conversation schools have problems with fees, booking, lesson hours, and learning hours for mastering English.SOLUTION: A system according to the present invention analyzes teaching material necessary for a learner through a computer system including a next-generation communication system, AI, a dedicated program, etc., and adds the teaching material to images such as still images, animations, etc. Further, various conversation techniques such as shadowing, overlapping, read and lookup, reading, dictation, scoring, a speech recognition function, etc., are used for the conversation learning when necessary so as to open a reticular activating system of the learner to improve conversation learning capability.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED DEEP MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to distributed deep machine learning on a cluster. In one example, a request is received for estimating one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model on a cluster including a plurality of nodes. A set of data is obtained to be used for estimating the one or more parameters. The set of data is divided into a plurality of sub-sets of data, each of which corresponds to one of the plurality of nodes. Each sub-set of data is allocated to a corresponding node for estimating values of the one or more parameters based on the sub-set of data. Estimated values of the one or more parameters obtained based on a corresponding sub-set of data allocated to the node, are received from each of the plurality of nodes. The one or more parameters of the machine learning model are estimated based on the estimated values of the one or more parameters generated by at least some of the plurality of nodes.

title: AI mirror household video teaching and body-building all-in-one machine
applicants: SHENZHEN CHENGXINGTIANXIA TECH COMMERCIAL DISPLAY CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI mirror surface household video teaching and body-building all-in-one machine. The all-in-one machine comprises an all-in-one machine housing, a mirror surface body used for carrying out mirror image display on a user individual, and a display module used for carrying out video information display. The mirror surface body comprises a glass layer installed on the front side of the all-in-one machine shell, a metal film layer with the bottom face covering the glass layer and a nanometer coating arranged on the top face of the metal film layer, all of which are distributed from inside to outside. According to the utility model, based on the nano coating sprayed on the surface of the mirror surface body, an oleophobic and hydrophobic effect can be achieved on the surface of the mirror surface body, that is, a user can quickly remove oil and water adhered to the surface of the mirror surface body through the cleaning cloth. And based on the integration of the metal film layer and the glass layer, the mirror surface has better light transmittance and reflectivity, so that a user mirror image with better quality and played video information can be reflected on the mirror surface body at the same time.

title: Robot intelligent tracking system for education
abstract_text: The invention discloses a robot intelligent tracking system for education. The system comprises a collector, an output device, a network module, a controller and a remote module. The controller is connected with the collector, the output device, the network module and the remote module; the controller comprises an analysis module, a teaching module, an input module and a power management module; the collector of the analysis module collects learning behaviors and voices of students for analysis, analyzes and judges the receiving and mastering degrees of the students on the knowledge points in combination with the learning basis and ability of the students, adjusts a teaching mode, sends a signal to the teaching module, focuses on strengthening the teaching of the knowledge points which are not mastered, and shorten the teaching time of mastered knowledge points; and the analysis module stores the learning mastering condition p'(rij=1|ai) of the student identity ui in a database block in the teaching module. The system has the characteristics of checking and repairing the leakage, teaching according to the materials, improving the teaching efficiency and improving the multi-angle problem thinking ability of students.

title: Online education course management method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: CHENGDU HEMENG TIANDI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online education course management method and system based on artificial intelligence. The artificial intelligence server sends a first instruction to the student terminal through the online teaching terminal; after the student passes the login verification of the student terminal, the student receives the first instruction, and the student terminal completes the student information verification and sends the student information to the artificial intelligence server; based on the received student information, the online teaching terminal intelligently matches a first course list and a second course list for each student and sends a second instruction to the student terminal; and the student terminal performs online course learning based on the selected course and feeds back semester course evaluation data. According to the invention, personalized online teaching content is provided for each student, and ordered management of online courses is realized.

title: Interactive teaching platform based on artificial intelligence for economics and management
abstract_text: The invention provides an interactive teaching platform based on artificial intelligence for economics and management, and relates to the technical field of teaching equipment for economics and management. The interactive teaching platform based on artificial intelligence for economics and management comprises a teaching platform body, wherein a storage groove is formed in the top of the teaching platform body, a lifting platform is installed at the top of the teaching platform body, an electric telescopic rod is fixedly installed in the middle of the bottom end of the storage groove, a limiting sliding groove is formed in the outer wall of the lifting table, a lifting sliding block is slidably installed in the limiting sliding groove, and the end, close to the teaching platform body, of the lifting sliding block extends into the storage groove and is fixedly provided with a display screen. The display screen can be stored and ejected, and meanwhile, the height of the display screen can be adjusted, so that the platform is more convenient to use.

title: Classroom attention determination method and device, equipment, storage medium and program product
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom attention determination method and device, electronic equipment, a computer readable storage medium and a computer program product, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence such as image processing, voice processing and deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: determining noisy degree distribution according to audio data in a classroom monitoring video; determining disorder degree distribution according to image data in the classroom monitoring video; determining classroom scenes corresponding to different time periods according to the noisy degree distribution and the confusion degree distribution; and determining classroom attention parameters corresponding to different types of classroom scenes according to the face orientation information in the image data. According to the method, the classroom scene types in different time periods are accurately determined by utilizing the characteristics of different types of scenes in the image and audio data in the offline classroom teaching process, so that the classroom attention in the type of scene is accurately determined as much as possible; and the influence of different scenes on classroom attention parameter evaluation is not ignored.

title: Vocal music teaching equipment with deep learning function
abstract_text: The invention provides vocal music teaching equipment with a deep learning function. The vocal music teaching equipment comprises an information input module, an information processing module, a deep learning module, a teaching plan forming module and a teaching plan outputting module which are sequentially in transmission connection. Compared with the prior art, the equipment has the beneficial effects that machine learning, a deep algorithm and intelligent output are realized, singing (playing) essentials of songs and music can be quickly mastered, a learner can be set and guided to singe (playing) according to a program, and compared with manual teaching, the equipment has the advantages of a large storage capacity, accurate task completion, and a fast new song mastering speed. According to the invention, defects of manpower can be overcome, teaching tasks can be completed with high quality, and teachers can be guided in turn to further improve self-cultivation and teaching levels.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment table
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment table. The experiment table comprises an experiment platform, an all-in-one machine touch control computer and a telescopic robot storage cabinet, the all-in-one machine touch control computer and the telescopic robot storage cabinet are both embedded in the experiment platform, and when the experiment table is used, the telescopic robot storage cabinet stretches out of the table top of the experiment platform; the telescopic robot storage cabinet and the robot in the telescopic robot storage cabinet are electrically connected with the all-in-one machine touch control computer. According to the utility model, the all-in-one machine touch control computer and the telescopic robot storage cabinet are embedded in the experiment platform, so that the integration level is improved, and the operation is convenient.

title: Teaching information acquisition equipment based on artificial intelligence and multiple sensors
applicants: HUNAN VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECH
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching information acquisition equipment, in particular to teaching information acquisition equipment based on artificial intelligence and multiple sensors, which comprises an acquisition table, horizontal columns are embedded on two sides of the bottom of the acquisition table, adjusting studs are fixed at corners of the acquisition table, a fixing rod is arranged above the acquisition table, and a plurality of sensors are arranged on the fixing rod. Fixing frames are fixed to the surfaces of the collecting table and the fixing rod, a supporting rod is arranged above the fixing rod, a camera is installed on the surface of one side of the supporting rod, a displayer is fixed to the surface of one side of the fixing rod, sliding grooves are formed in the two sides of the surface of the display screen, and cleaning plates are arranged between the adjacent sliding grooves; and cleaning cotton is fixed at the bottom of the cleaning plate. According to the utility model, not only is the phenomenon of inaccurate acquisition in the use process of the information acquisition equipment avoided, but also the phenomenon that the display screen is obscured in the use process of the information acquisition equipment is avoided, and the convenience degree of the information acquisition equipment in use is improved.

title: Integrated AI experimental skill examination device
applicants: SHANGHAI DAFENG LABORATORY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an integrated AI experimental skill examination device, which comprises a left camera shooting assembly, an AI all-in-one machine, a middle imaging fixing assembly, a right camera shooting assembly and a front camera shooting assembly, the front end of the middle imaging fixing assembly is connected with the AI all-in-one machine, the left camera shooting assembly is inserted into the left end of the middle imaging fixing assembly, and the right camera shooting assembly is inserted into the right end of the middle imaging fixing assembly. A right camera shooting assembly is inserted into the right end of the middle imaging fixing assembly, and a front camera shooting assembly is arranged on the front side of the middle imaging fixing assembly. Teaching content or examination questions are input into the AI all-in-one machine by a teacher, and the learning process and operation skills of students are recorded in all directions through the left camera shooting assembly, the middle imaging fixing assembly, the right camera shooting assembly and the front camera shooting assembly, so that the teaching work of the teacher is facilitated.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device, which comprises an intelligent loudspeaker box body, the lower end of the intelligent loudspeaker box body is fixedly connected with a connecting box through bolts, the inner surfaces of the left and right side walls of the connecting box are provided with slideways, and the interiors of the two slideways are slidably connected with a floating plate through pulleys. Hydraulic supporting rods which are symmetrically arranged are connected to the left end and the right end of the upper surface of the lower wall of the floating plate through rotating shafts, a mounting base is arranged behind the floating plate, the left end and the right end of the rear inner surface of a butt joint groove are connected with one ends of supporting rods which are bilaterally symmetrical through rotating shafts, and mounting screw hole positions are formed in the left end and the right end of the rear wall of the mounting base in a penetrating mode; a stabilizing spring is fixedly connected between the front inner surface of the mounting seat and the rear inner surface of the floating plate, and meanwhile, the AI teaching audio playing effect is ensured, and the actual use effect of the intelligent sound box is improved; the vibration is relatively small, and the service life is guaranteed.

title: Controller for artificial intelligence programming teaching
applicants: XUZHOU OXPONT ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a controller for artificial intelligence programming teaching. The controller for artificial intelligence programming teaching comprises a controller body, a separation blade structure and an anti-blocking interface structure, the anti-blocking interface structure is connected to the controller body, and the anti-blocking interface structure comprises a rotating shaft, a sleeve, a rotating baffle and a torsional spring. The rear end face of the bottom end of the controller body is provided with a plurality of evenly-arranged data line interfaces, the two side walls in each data line interface are provided with pasting grooves respectively, and the inner wall of the front end of each data line interface is provided with two symmetrically-arranged rotating baffles. The controller for artificial intelligence programming teaching provided by the utility model has the advantages that the rotating baffle plate is contacted and extruded with the two outer side walls of the plug, so that the plug insertion firmness is increased, the possibility of loosening and falling out is reduced, the baffle plate is restored to block the universal interface area under the rebound force of the torsional spring in the plug pulling-out process, and the maximum possibility of dust falling is reduced; therefore, the protection effect is achieved.

title: Minority culture education system based on AI technology
abstract_text: The invention relates to a minority culture education system based on AI technology. The system comprises a man-machine operation module, a culture acquisition module, an interaction module, a management module, a display module, an evaluation module and a central control module, and the man-machine operation module, the culture acquisition module, the interaction module, the management module, the display module and the evaluation module are respectively connected with the central control module. According to the system, a user can experience a real scene and has immersion, the learning interest is greatly enhanced, and interaction is realized; and a virtual environment helmet is adopted for teaching, a real scene can be experienced, the learning interest is greatly enhanced, and in addition, a user can conveniently know the learning effect and the learning degree of the user.

title: Classroom teaching quality recovery control method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention relates to a classroom teaching quality recovery control method based on deep learning, and the method specifically comprises the following steps: S1, extracting image information and audio information in a fixed time period as basic units through a video sampling mode based on a time slice; s2, inputting the basic unit into the classroom teaching detection model, and outputting facial expression information, limb movement information and language emotion information of the student; and S3, inputting the facial expression information, the body movement information and the language emotion information into the teaching activeness evaluation model, outputting an evaluation result, and calculating through a sliding window technology according to the evaluation result to obtain a classroom teaching hotspot map. Compared with the prior art, the invention has the advantages that a teacher can directly locate a time period with high classroom teaching quality and check the teaching state of the teacher, so that the teacher is better guided to understand the influence of a specific teaching mode on the teaching quality, the teaching method of the teacher is resumed, and the teaching ability is better improved.

title: Interactive remote teaching system and method
abstract_text: The invention provides an interactive remote teaching system and method, and relates to the technical field of remote teaching. The system comprises: a local learning terminal; a remote teaching terminal; and an information storage server is connected with the local learning terminal and the remote teaching terminal, wherein a plurality of practical training models and a plurality of man-machine interaction data are stored in the information storage server. The remote teaching terminal is used for collecting teaching data of a teacher based on the mixed reality technology and generating a three-dimensional teaching model corresponding to the teacher according to the teaching data. The local learning terminal is used for acquiring the three-dimensional teaching model, a practical training model and a man-machine interaction data through the information storage server and displaying the three-dimensional teaching model, the practical training model and the man-machine interaction data based on a mixed display technology. According to the system, a more specific real-time scene is displayed, virtual and actual synchronization is realized, and virtual-real three-dimensional visual AI information data transmission and presentation between teaching and learning are realized.

title: Question-based tutoring strategy providing method, system and device and medium
applicants: ZUOYEBANG EDUCATION TECH BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of image processing, is particularly suitable for photographing and question searching, and provides a question-based tutoring strategy providing method, system and device and a medium for the situation that an auxiliary guidance teaching strategy possibly does not correspond to question content in an input question image at present. The invention aims to solve the technical problem of how to more accurately provide corresponding tutoring strategies by processing image search questions through a computer. Therefore, according to the method disclosed by the invention, the matching degree of the searched text topic and the topic image is predicted by combining the text information of the topic image with the feature picture search of the image and through the modes of similarity calculation, a machine learning model, an image information matching degree and the like; and obtaining the question with the highest degree as a detection result so as to provide various corresponding tutoring strategies. Therefore, the specific image searching efficiency is improved, and a tutoring strategy can be accurately provided.

title: Multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education
applicants: ANHUI MANCHENG EDUCATION INVEST CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of internet education, and discloses a multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education, which comprises a box body, a group of loudspeakers are embedded along the outer wall of the box body, a servo motor is fixedly mounted in the middle of the inner wall of the upper end of the box body, and an output shaft of the servo motor penetrates through the upper end of the box body and is fixedly provided with a storage box. A box cover is hinged to the outer edge of the upper end of the storage box, a support is hinged to the inner wall of the bottom end of the storage box through a damping rotating shaft, and a monitor is hinged to the top end of the support through a damping rotating shaft. The sound box not only can be used for assisting teaching, but also can be used for remotely observing a classroom, so that response and command can be carried out in time when an emergency occurs in the classroom.

title: LEARNED MODEL GENERATION METHOD AND ROAD SURFACE PROPERTY DETERMINATION DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a learned model generation method and road surface property determination device that can accurately determine road surface properties at a low cost.SOLUTION: In a learned model generation method, a learned model is generated by learning road surface properties in advance by machine learning using sample data including data extracted from vibration information in at least one frequency band as teaching data. A road surface property determination device 1 includes: the learned model; and a determination unit 5 for determining road surface properties with respect to input new data of the same type as the sample data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Novel artificial intelligence education interaction device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel artificial intelligence education interaction device which comprises an intelligent education interaction device main body, an education device display main body, an education device writing platform, a leg placing frame, an education display screen, a face recognition camera, a loudspeaker, a microphone, an earphone jack, a USB jack, a capacitance writing board, a capacitance pen placing groove and a capacitance writing pen. The education display screen is a liquid crystal display touch screen, operation of a user is facilitated, unnecessary keys are reduced, homework is directly completed on the capacitance writing board through a capacitance writing pen, the homework does not need to be printed independently, students can complete the homework in time more conveniently, the concentration of the students can be distinguished through the face recognition camera, and the teaching efficiency is improved. When the concentration of the student is reduced, the student is reminded in time, the lecture listening efficiency of the student in class is guaranteed, a plurality of host heat dissipation holes are formed in the back face of the intelligent education interaction device body, a host is cooled in time, the situation that work of the host is affected by too high temperature is prevented, and the service life is prolonged.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
applicants: TIANJIN KEDUODUO TECH CONSULTING SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device which comprises a sound box body and a box body, a display screen is arranged on the front face of the sound box body, two sets of loudspeakers are symmetrically arranged on the two sides of the front face of the sound box body, and an inverted-T-shaped embedded block is arranged at the bottom of the sound box body. A partition plate is arranged in the box body, the side edge of the partition plate and the inner wall of the box body are bonded and fixed through sealant, a limiting ring is arranged at the bottom of the partition plate, sliding rods are connected between the two sides of the bottom of the limiting ring and the bottom end of the interior of the box body, and sliding plates are arranged on the sliding rods in a sliding mode. According to the AI intelligent sound equipment, the problems that most of existing AI intelligent sound equipment devices only adopt springs for shock absorption, the shock absorption effect is poor, meanwhile, the springs are prone to rusting when meeting water, the shock absorption performance of the rusted springs is greatly reduced, and the actual use effect of the intelligent sound equipment is reduced are solved.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot system
applicants: SHANXI SANYOUHE INTELLIGENCE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot system, and relates to the field of education robot systems. The system aims to solve the problems that an existing education robot system is limited in database, small in applicable crowd range, incapable of effectively utilizing big data and low in intelligent degree. The system comprises an education robot terminal, and the education robot terminal is connected with a question type analysis system, a user analysis system and a teaching data system. The user analysis system is connected with a crowd analysis system; the crowd analysis system is connected with an educational administration system big database, and the educational administration system big database is connected with a knowledge extraction system. The system can efficiently and quickly perform different education and teaching on various crowds, can accurately provide various required education and teaching materials for various different crowds through analysis of user crowds, and greatly improves the intelligence of the system; meanwhile, the system is connected with an educational administration system big database, so that the content characteristics of the database are greatly expanded.

title: Projection device for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of projection equipment, particularly relates to a projection device for artificial intelligence teaching, and provides the following scheme aiming at the problems that an existing projection device is tedious in operation in the installation process, inconvenient to overhaul, inconvenient to adjust angles according to needs and incapable of being effectively stored: the projection device comprises a box body, supporting legs are fixedly installed at the four corners of the bottom of the box body, a storage opening is formed in one side of the top of the box body, a sliding groove is formed in the box body, a sliding plate is slidably installed in the sliding groove, a connecting plate is fixedly installed on the top side of the sliding plate, a cover plate is arranged at the top of the box body, and the cover plate is rotationally connected with the connecting plate. And the cover plate is matched with the storage opening. According to the utility model, the design is reasonable, the angle of the projector body can be adjusted as required, and the projector is convenient to install, maintain and store, simple to operate and relatively convenient to use.

title: Behavior monitoring and analyzing system based on AI image recognition
abstract_text: The invention discloses a behavior monitoring and analysis system based on AI image recognition, which belongs to the technical field of behavior detection and analysis and comprises an image acquisition module, an image processing module, an image analysis module, a data storage module and a data analysis module, wherein the image acquisition module comprises a front image acquisition unit and a side image acquisition unit; the front image acquisition unit is used for acquiring front image data of indoor students in a sitting posture state during class; the side image acquisition unit is used for acquiring side image data of indoor students in a sitting posture state during class. According to the invention, the method can achieve the detection and recognition of the crossing and catching actions and the napping actions which affect the attending efficiency of students in the teaching process. According to the detection scheme, the hardware design requirement is low, the design cost is greatly reduced, the problems that in the prior art, the specific action detection effect of student behaviors is poor, and the data relevance is not high enough can be solved, and the system is worthy of popularization and use.

title: AUXILIARY TEACHING METHOD AND APPARATUS BASED ON KNOWLEDGE GRAPH, AND DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD [CN]
abstract_text: An auxiliary teaching method and apparatus based on a knowledge graph, and a device and a storage medium, which relate to the field of artificial intelligence, and can be applied to a smart education scenario, thereby promoting the construction of smart cities. The method comprises: extracting a key word and a knowledge point from a pre-stored knowledge base (S1); constructing a knowledge graph according to the key word and the knowledge point which are extracted from the knowledge base (S2); if wrong question text sent by a terminal is received, extracting, from the wrong question text, a key word to be queried (S3); and acquiring, from the knowledge graph, a knowledge point associated with the key word to be queried, so as to form a knowledge point set, and sending the knowledge point set to the terminal (S4).

title: INTELLIGENT ASSEMBLY CONTROL SYSTEM
abstract_text: Disclosed is an intelligent assembly control system, in particular, a fully-automatic precise measurement and intelligent assembly integrated system. The intelligent assembling control system comprises a mobile robot (8), a precise dual-frequency damping vibration-isolation optical platform (4), a five-degree-of-freedom electric sliding platform (5), a line laser scanner (3), a first deep learning camera (7), a second deep learning camera, a ball screw (2), a first mechanical arm (1), a second mechanical arm (8-1) and an upper computer. The system can automatically mount a mobile phone backplate wiring plug-in, such that a fully automatic workflow of dispatching, assembling and then measuring a component is realized, labor costs are saved on, the production efficiency is increased, and a drag teaching operation is realized.

title: Intelligent control method for multimedia teaching equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent control method for multimedia teaching equipment. The method comprises the steps: acquiring an indoor environment image and a portrait based on monitoring equipment, carrying out the recognition of a human body in the environment image and the portrait through employing an image enhancement algorithm and a recognition technology, and taking the recognized data as human body decision data; acquiring indoor real-time environment data based on the environment equipment, and taking the environment data as environment decision data; determining use data of the teaching equipment based on the use state of the indoor teaching equipment and the corresponding teaching arrangement, and taking the use data as equipment decision data; and training a preset tensorflow machine learning framework by using the human body decision data, the environment decision data and the equipment decision data to form an automatic control model to realize automatic control of the indoor electric equipment. Automatic control of the electric equipment in the multimedia classroom is achieved, manual operation is not needed any more, manual intervention is avoided, control efficiency is improved, and accidents are effectively reduced.

title: Adaptive learning system based on big data and deep learning and construction method thereof
applicants: BEIJING AIXUEXI BOLE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an adaptive learning system based on big data and deep learning and a construction method thereof. The system comprises a student module which is used for automatically recording a learning process, a learning behavior and a learning result of a learner; an intelligent analysis module which is used for performing learning behavior analysis according to the recorded learning data of the learner and the micro knowledge particles decomposed in the knowledge domain model, automatically evaluating the initial level, the learning target demand and the learning performance of the learner, and forming an associated knowledge graph; and a resource module which is used for feeding back the formed knowledge graph and learning evaluation to a learning recommendation system, and automatically recommending related learning contents, learning resources and learning paths interested by the learner. According to the adaptive learning system based on big data and deep learning and the construction method thereof provided by the invention, the purposes of personalized autonomous learning of students, precise teaching of teachers and compaction of basic subject knowledge can be realized.

title: Dancing motion evaluation system based on deep learning and attitude estimation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a dance motion evaluation system based on deep learning and attitude estimation. The system comprises a data acquisition unit, a Video Pose 3D joint point coordinate extraction module, a motion analysis neural network dance coding module and a dance evaluation module. The data acquisition unit shoots a dance video, the dance video is transmitted to an articulation point coordinate extraction module to extract articulation point coordinate data information, then coordinate data is coded through an action analysis neural network, finally, a dance evaluation module compares cosine similarity between a code and a standard action code, a calculation result is converted into an evaluation index, and the evaluation of the dance movement is completed. In the training process of the action analysis neural network, MMD NCA loss is used as a constraint index of the network, so that the error of a network coding result is reduced, and the accuracy and reliability of an evaluation result of the dance evaluation module are improved. The system can realize teaching and correction of dance actions, and effectively improves the dance level of dancers.

title: DRIVING ASSISTANCE DEVICE AND DRIVING ASSISTANCE METHOD
abstract_text: In a driving assistance device, a sensor acquisition unit (11) acquires an output result of a sensor (2) which is mounted in a vehicle (1). Using a machine learning algorithm which takes as an input the output result of the sensor (2) which is acquired by the sensor acquisition unit (11), a computation unit (14) computes an inference result for controlling the vehicle (1). A reliability estimation unit (12) derives a similarity between the output result which is acquired by the sensor acquisition unit (11) and teaching data which is used in learning by the machine learning algorithm, and on the basis of the similarity, estimates the reliability of the inference result which is computed by the computation unit (14). A control output unit (15) adds the reliability which is estimated by the reliability estimation unit (12) to the inference result which is computed by the computation unit (14) and outputs the result as vehicle control information.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: SHAANXI XINBADA INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching platform, which comprises a supporting main body, an artificial intelligence display, baffle plates, a take-up structure and an adjusting structure, the two sides of the top end of the supporting main body are welded with the baffle plates, the top end of the supporting main body is fixedly provided with a fixing plate, and the top end of the fixing plate is provided with a supporting table. An adjusting structure is fixed to the top end of the supporting table, a bottom plate is fixed to one side of the adjusting structure, a bearing frame is installed at the top end of the bottom plate, an artificial intelligence displayer is fixed to one side of the bearing frame, grooves are welded to the two ends of the two sides of the supporting body, and a take-up structure is fixed to one side of the surface of the supporting body. Door bodies are hinged to the two sides of the surface of the supporting body, a handle is installed on one side of the surface of each door body, and a drawer is fixed to one side of the top end of the supporting body. The practical degree of the teaching platform is enhanced, the use convenience of the teaching platform is improved, and mutual winding of the teaching platform in use is avoided.

title: Artificial intelligence washing machine
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence washing machine is provided with a multi-touch high-definition display screen and a high-fidelity sound system, clothes washing, music playing, video playing, game playing and child teaching can be achieved through the Internet and the cloud server, an operating user can be recognized, and the intelligent washing machine is convenient to use and high in practicability. If the user is a child, the user enters a child mode (locking a bin door, forbidding related clothes washing operations and the like), automatically loads common clothes washing modes and parameters of the user, can hear and speak (can understand a language of the user and can speak out a fault name), can inquire local current weather information, can analyze weather and can prompt the user whether the user is suitable for clothes washing today.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: HUNAN VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECH
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence teaching platform. The artificial intelligence teaching platform comprises a box body; the mounting groove is formed in the inner wall of the bottom of the box body; the two-way threaded rod is rotationally mounted on the inner walls of the two sides of the mounting groove, and the two ends of the two-way threaded rod extend out of the box body; the motor is fixedly mounted on the outer wall of one side of the box body, and an output shaft of the motor is fixedly connected with the bidirectional threaded rod; the two threaded blocks are arranged on the two-way threaded rod in a threaded and sleeving manner; the sliding plates are installed on the inner walls of the two sides of the box body in a sliding mode; the two sliding blocks are both installed at the bottom of the sliding plate in a sliding mode. The artificial intelligence teaching platform provided by the utility model has the advantages of simple operation, capability of writing while explaining, improved learning efficiency and good protective measures.

title: Practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: HUNAN VOCATIONAL COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECH
abstract_text: The utility model provides a practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching. The practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching comprises a protection frame. The movable plate is arranged in the protection frame; the two air cylinders are fixedly mounted at the top of the movable plate; the workbench is fixedly mounted on telescopic shafts of the two air cylinders; the control module is arranged at the top of the workbench; the article storage module is arranged at the top of the workbench; the cover plate mechanism is hinged to the top of the protection frame; and the four grooves are formed in the outer walls of the two sides of the protection frame. The practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching has the advantages of being convenient to disassemble and assemble and good in protection effect.

title: AI classroom auxiliary teaching appliance
applicants: HUNAN WEICHU YOUCAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI classroom auxiliary teaching aid which comprises a base and a supporting frame, two symmetrical side edges of the base extend upwards to be provided with fixing seats, movable grooves are formed in the side faces of the fixing seats in a penetrating mode, and rotating seats are arranged on the portions, located at the tops of the movable grooves, of the fixing seats in a protruding mode towards the interior of the base. First sawtooth-shaped bulges are distributed on the rotating seat in an array manner; the side face of the supporting frame is symmetrically provided with rotating shafts matched with the movable grooves, the rotating shafts are inserted into the movable grooves, the outer surfaces of the rotating shafts are provided with adjusting bases matched with the rotating bases, the portions, arranged in the movable grooves, of the rotating shafts are sleeved with clamping pieces, and the adjusting bases are provided with second sawtooth-shaped protrusions connected with the first sawtooth-shaped protrusions in a meshed mode. Therefore, the supporting frame is hinged to the base. According to the utility model, electronic elements can be conveniently placed, meanwhile, students are not influenced to take notes, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: WIND VELOCITY DATA USE METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a method for using wind velocity data in the training of deep learning that predicts a wind velocity distribution.SOLUTION: The present invention comprises: a loss function setting step for setting a loss function; an image conversion step for finding, from wind velocity data obtained in a wind tunnel test, a wind velocity distribution image where the pixel values of measurement point coordinates are made to be a value corresponding to wind velocity and the pixel values of coordinates of other than the measurement points are made to be a preliminarily set value; an image for control creation step for creating an error propagation control image where pixel values corresponding to the coordinates of measurement points of a teaching image are made to be 1 and the pixel values of coordinates corresponding to the coordinates of other than the measurement points are made to be 0; and a loss calculation step for calculating a loss from the teaching image, a prediction image, the error propagation control image and the loss function. In the loss calculation step, losses are calculated using the value derived by integrating the pixel values of the coordinates of the image for control for an error between the pixel values of coordinates of the teaching image and the pixel values of predicted values of deep learning.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: AI experiment teaching auxiliary equipment
abstract_text: The utility model discloses AI experiment teaching auxiliary equipment, comprising a support which is internally provided with a liftable camera, a display and a shading baffle plate; the teacher integration end controls the movement of the shading baffle plate and controls the on-off and movement of the camera and the display; and the server system is connected with the display and displays contents on the display, and the server system also performs video acquisition through the camera in real time. Therefore, the device disclosed by the utility model is ingenious in structure and diversified in function, and the hardware has hiding and automatic unfolding functions; operation of students can be observed repeatedly, and judgment accuracy is improved; contents such as experiment operation performed by students are more efficient, informationized and fair.
