title: CALIBRATION SYSTEM, INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM, ROBOT CONTROL SYSTEM, CALIBRATION METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, ROBOT CONTROL METHOD, CALIBRATION PROGRAM, INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM, CALIBRATION DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND ROBOT CONTROL DEVICE
abstract_text: A calibration device according to one aspect of the present invention generates first coordinate information, in a calibration system comprising a robot arm which includes, at a distal end, a grasping unit for gasping an object to be grasped, an imaging device, and the calibration device, on the basis of a learning model generated through machine learning of a plurality of pieces of teaching data each including an image of a captured virtual space containing a 3D model relating to the grasping unit and information indicating a position of the grasping unit contained in the virtual space and a captured image of the grasping unit captured from a predetermined direction, the first coordinate information indicating a position of the grasping unit in a captured-image coordinate system having the captured image as a reference. The calibration device carries out, on the basis of coordinate conversion information used for coordinate conversion processing of executing coordinate conversion of the first coordinate information to second coordinate information indicating a position of the grasping unit in a robot coordinate system having the robot arm as a reference, the coordinate conversion of the first coordinate information to the second coordinate information.

title: Portable test box for small industrial control system
applicants: BEIJING HUADIAN YUNBO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a portable test box for a small industrial control system. The test box comprises an upper computer, a touch screen, a controller, a switch, an industrial firewall, AI/AO equipment, DI/DO equipment, communication equipment and power generation equipment. The switch is connected with the upper computer, and a man-machine interaction interface is formed by the upper computer and the outside; the controller is connected with the switch and is used for controlling the switch to work; the touch screen is connected with the switch; and the industrial firewall is respectively connected with the switch and the communication equipment and is used for realizing connection between the switch and a network. The test box can meet the requirements of colleges, enterprises and research units for industrial control system learning, can enhance the requirements of the colleges, enterprises and research units for industrial control network security learning and operation, and is an open platform. The portable experiment box of the small industrial control system is based on a real hardware attack and defense platform environment, provides experiment practice operation for teaching training, and improves the practical operation ability of trainees.

title: CALIBRATION SYSTEM, INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM, ROBOT CONTROL SYSTEM, CALIBRATION METHOD, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, ROBOT CONTROL METHOD, CALIBRATION PROGRAM, INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM, CALIBRATION DEVICE, INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, AND ROBOT CONTROL DEVICE
abstract_text: A calibration device according to one aspect of the present invention generates first coordinate information, in a calibration system comprising a robot arm which includes, at a distal end, a grasping unit for gasping an object to be grasped, an imaging device, and the calibration device, on the basis of a learning model generated through machine learning of a plurality of pieces of teaching data each including an image of a captured virtual space containing a 3D model relating to the grasping unit and information indicating a position of the grasping unit contained in the virtual space and a captured image of the grasping unit captured from a predetermined direction, the first coordinate information indicating a position of the grasping unit in a captured-image coordinate system having the captured image as a reference. The calibration device carries out, on the basis of coordinate conversion information used for coordinate conversion processing of executing coordinate conversion of the first coordinate information to second coordinate information indicating a position of the grasping unit in a robot coordinate system having the robot arm as a reference, the coordinate conversion of the first coordinate information to the second coordinate information.

title: Ubiquitous-based training education portfolio system for managing learning activities and method thereof
abstract_text: Disclosed are a ubiquitous-based practice education portfolio system and a method thereof. In the system, through wired/wireless communication using a PC, a smartphone, and a tablet PC, theories in health care education fields, practice information records, teacher evaluations, learning history management by learner/practice performer of UBT/SBT tests and grades, P2P communication using messengers between a teacher and a learner/practice performer, practice management of individual students on a U-portfolio system, performance assessment scores and indexes are provided; a practice session is opened through practice session opening in a health care site or a practice site and a practice schedule and practice candidates are announced; in accordance with the practice schedule, a practice teacher uses his or her user terminal to underline an onsite practice record form written by the learner/practice performer or freely make feedback about the same through a text, a picture, a photo, and a voice record; practice site feedback content from the teacher is promptly captured to be transmitted to a main server and instant teacher feedback (emergency measure, prescription) transmitted to user terminals, evaluations of the teacher, UBT/SBT tests and grades, mutual learning between each student and the teacher in an aspect of administration management, a practice history of the learner/practice performer and an evaluation history/teaching history of the teacher are provided, and these data are systematically managed. The ubiquitous-based practice education portfolio system provides a cloud practice education management service (U-Portfolio) using artificial intelligence and bigdata with smart devices.

title: Training a User-System Dialog in a Task-Oriented Dialog System
abstract_text: Methods and systems are disclosed for improving dialog management for task-oriented dialog systems. The disclosed dialog builder leverages machine teaching processing to improve development of dialog managers. In this way, the dialog builder combines the strengths of both rule-based and machine-learned approaches to allow dialog authors to: (1) import a dialog graph developed using popular dialog composers, (2) convert the dialog graph to text-based training dialogs, (3) continuously improve the trained dialogs based on log dialogs, and (4) generate a corrected dialog for retraining the machine learning.

title: Intelligent magic cube robot
applicants: SHENZHEN QIANHAI GEZHI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent magic cube robot. Comprising a magnetic attraction substrate, a magic cube magnetic attraction position, an upper magnetic attraction position, a lower magnetic attraction position, a magnetic attraction circular groove, a plate connecting piece, an STM32 controller, a battery pack, an omnidirectional microphone array, a two-dimensional laser radar, a Raspberry Pi controller, a Jetson controller, a mechanical arm fixing base, a cooperative mechanical arm, an ultrasonic sensor, a miniature holder, a four-way wiring terminal, a depth camera, an infrared tracking sensor, a motor and wheels. The robot is exquisite and small in appearance, attractive, practical and high in modularization degree, is assembled in a secondary magic cube magnetic attraction mode, improves the convenience and expansibility of the robot, can rapidly build different practical application scenes according to practical content, improves the initiative of students in self-learning, stimulates the innovation ability of the students, and improves the teaching efficiency of the students. The progressive three-dimensional cultivation according to points, lines and planes is realized, and the multi-disciplinary crossed practical teaching requirements of the robot technology, artificial intelligence, the universal robot technology and the like are met.

title: CUTTING DEVICE AND TRAINED MODEL GENERATION METHOD
abstract_text: A cutting device (1) characterized by having a work level acquisition unit (60b) that inputs surface information for a workpiece (2) acquired by a surface information acquisition unit (50) into a trained model and acquires a work level for the workpiece (2), wherein a control unit (60a) controls the operation of a drive unit (20) to perform cutting work on the workpiece (2) on the basis of the work level acquired by the work level acquisition unit (60b). A trained model generation method characterized by having a teaching data acquisition step for acquiring teaching data including metal surface information that is associated with a work level expressing the degree of completion of the cutting work, and a trained model generation step for, via machine learning using the teaching data, generating a trained model using the metal surface information as the input and the work level as the output.

title: Human body posture recognition system and human body posture recognition evaluation method
applicants: NISSIN EDUCATION PRODUCTS KUNSHAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a human body posture recognition system and a human body posture recognition evaluation method. The system comprises a server, an oral cavity simulation teaching practice system, a physician chair, camera devices positioned on the left side, the right side and the rear side of the physician chair, and a display. The server performs data coding on the video set by the camera devices and converts the video into a computer image. Interference item elimination preprocessing is carried out on the image and then identifying through an artificial intelligence algorithm is performed to form a vector feature map; and the feature map and standard data are compared and analyzed, and then the comparison result is output to the display, wherein the display is used for displaying images, vector feature maps and analysis results in real time; during evaluation, human body posture detection and evaluation or student examination and evaluation can be carried out according to user input conditions. The system is connected with an oral cavity simulation teaching practice system, so that posture evaluation is carried out only in an effective time period, evaluation is more accurate, and a user can conveniently correct his/her posture in time; and the system and the method can also be used for posture evaluation and examination of students.

title: Student classroom behavior detection method based on deep learning
applicants: GUANGZHOU NINED DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student classroom behavior detection method based on deep learning, and relates to the technical field of behavior recognition, and the technical scheme is characterized by comprising the steps of S1, making a database; S2, dividing the original data set into a training set, a verification set and a test set according to a proportion, obtaining position information of students in the images by using a yolov3 detection algorithm, cutting student images by using Opencv according to the position information of the students, and uniformly zooming the images to 224 * 224; S3, expanding the training set in a data expansion mode; S4, taking the ResNet50 network structure as a pre-training model for training, performing fine adjustment on the network structure according to a verification result of the verification set, and performing training to obtain a classification model; and S5, testing the test set by using the trained model structure, observing the difference between the image classification condition and the actual condition, obtaining the classification effect of the model, and storing the classification result. The method can detect and identify the classroom behaviors of the students, can help teachers to master the class states of the students and adjust the teaching mode, and can be used as an important basis for teaching evaluation.

title: Children teaching guidance system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANXI SANYOUHE INTELLIGENCE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children teaching tutoring system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises an interaction module, a search engine, a gateway module, a question database, a sound database, a vocabulary database, a feedback module and an intonation module, and is characterized in that the interaction module is used for inputting to-be-retrieved information by a children user, the search engine performs related retrieval according to the input information, the gateway module assists the search engine to perform networking retrieval, the question database is used for providing question data needing to be searched, a business database is used for providing sound data needing to be searched, the vocabulary database is used for providing vocabularies needing to be learned, and the intonation module is matched with the vocabulary database and is used for performing pronunciation practice. And the feedback module feeds back according to a search result searched by the search engine. The switching of different types of input information can be achieved, the use of children at different stages can be met, pronunciation correction can be carried out, the functions are comprehensive, and the use effect is better.

title: AI camera device for shooting cooking teaching video
applicants: SHANGHAI BALANSTECH INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI camera device for shooting cooking teaching videos, which comprises a transverse plate, a body, a camera and a display screen, the bottom of the transverse plate is fixedly connected with a driving motor, the output end of the driving motor is fixedly connected with the body, one side of the interior of the body is provided with a cavity, and the display screen is fixedly connected with the cavity. A wireless transmission module is fixedly mounted at the upper end of one side of the inner wall of the cavity, an AI module is fixedly mounted on the inner wall of the cavity at the lower end of the wireless transmission module, a storage unit is fixedly mounted on the inner wall of the cavity below the AI module, and a camera is fixedly connected to the bottom of the mounting plate. According to the utility model, the intelligent camera is matched with the AI technology to monitor the state change of the food material per second, so as to guide a green hand to carry out each step of operation in real time and teach the green hand to quickly master the skill of each dish in a hand-by-hand manner.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: SHANDONG YINGSHENG ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching platform which comprises a platform shell, supporting columns are fixedly installed at the positions, close to the two sides, of the bottom of the platform shell, a base is fixedly installed at the bottom ends of the supporting columns, and a touch screen is embedded in the position, close to the middle, of the front surface of the platform shell. A camera is embedded in the position, close to the middle of the top, of the front surface of the platform shell, loudspeakers are embedded in the positions, close to the edges of the two sides, of the front surface of the platform shell, a dust removal mechanism is connected to the position, close to the outer side of the touch screen, of the front surface of the platform shell, and a heat dissipation plate is embedded in the position, close to the middle, of the rear surface of the platform shell; the heat dissipation plate is detachably connected with the platform shell through a locking pin. The artificial intelligence teaching platform provided by the utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching, can wipe the touch screen of the intelligent teaching platform, and can tighten the connecting line of the intelligent teaching platform.

title: Big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform
applicants: SHANDONG YINGSHENG ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a big data artificial intelligence teaching training room platform comprising a training platform, the bottom of the training platform is fixedly provided with a supporting seat, the front surface of the supporting seat is embedded with a storage box, the front surface of the storage box is fixedly provided with a handle close to the middle position, and the handle is fixedly provided with a handle. A practical training touch screen is embedded in the position, close to the middle, of the upper surface of the practical training platform, storage racks are fixedly installed on the positions, close to the two sides, of the upper surface of the practical training platform, supporting columns are fixedly installed on the positions, close to the edges, of the upper surface of the practical training platform, and an interaction machine shell is supported at the top ends of the supporting columns; and a rotating mechanism is connected between the supporting column and the interactive machine shell. The big data artificial intelligence teaching practical training room platform of the utility model belongs to the field of practical training related equipment, can conveniently rotate artificial intelligence teaching interaction equipment, and can clamp a connecting line of the artificial intelligence teaching practical training room platform.

title: AI intelligent drawing and writing board for English teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI intelligent drawing and writing board for English teaching. The AI intelligent drawing and writing board comprises a metal shell, a handwriting pen point, a handwriting pen column, a clamping plate, a magnet piece, a protective sleeve cover plate, a connecting strip, a switch, a volume key, a charging port, a USB socket, an SD card socket, a touch display screen, a camera, a fixed base, a loudspeaker, a heat dissipation port and a battery cover plate. The protective sleeve has the advantages that the protective sleeve cover plate protects the display screen from being damaged by sharp objects in the storage and carrying process, the magnet piece and the metal shell are fixed for use in a magnetic attraction mode, the handwriting pen can be fixed to the groove in the upper side of the metal shell through the clamping plate at the top, and the handwriting pen point at the top end of the bottom has an electronic induction function. The drawing and writing board can be directly used on a touch display screen, touch use is more accurate, the heat dissipation opening is connected with the cavity area of the internal operation processor, the drawing and writing board can dissipate heat in time in the use process, the battery cover plate is fixed through screws and detachably connected with the metal shell, and the service life of the built-in rechargeable battery is guaranteed.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching all-in-one machines, and discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine which comprises a shell, pulleys are fixedly installed at the lower end of the outer wall of the shell, connecting rods are fixedly installed on the lower sides of the left end and the right end of the inner wall of the shell, and two pairs of sliding sleeves are slidably connected to the left side and the right side of the outer wall of each connecting rod. Sliding blocks are fixedly mounted at the upper ends of the outer walls of the two pairs of sliding sleeves, rotating rods are rotationally connected to the upper ends of the outer walls of the two pairs of sliding blocks, and connecting springs are fixedly mounted on the opposite sides of each pair of rotating rods; through a fixing spring fixedly connected with the teaching all-in-one machine body and a fixing block, a rotating rod, a connecting spring and a sliding sleeve which are installed below the teaching all-in-one machine body, damage to a screen when an infant uses the all-in-one machine screen with great force can be reduced, and the distance between the infant and the screen can be measured through a distance measuring sensor. When the child is too close, the child can be reminded of leaning back through the screen of the all-in-one machine, and the body temperature of the child can be monitored through the infrared thermometer.

title: English teaching instrument based on AI technology
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an English teaching instrument based on AI technology, comprising a teaching instrument body, a mounting base plate and a voice input mechanism, the bottom of the teaching instrument body is bonded with the mounting base plate, one side of the top of the teaching instrument body is provided with a display screen, one side of the top of the teaching instrument body far away from the display screen is provided with a storage cavity, and the storage cavity is provided with a voice input mechanism. A remote control device is clamped to the side, away from the display screen, of an inner cavity of the storage cavity, a voice input mechanism is installed between the remote control device and the storage cavity, the voice input mechanism comprises a length adjusting plate and an adjusting seat which are connected between the remote control device and the storage cavity through hinges, and the adjusting seat is clamped to the top of the length adjusting plate. According to the English teaching instrument based on the AI technology, in the English teaching process, corresponding voice input and shooting equipment can be detached for use, so that the limitation of the teaching instrument body on the position is reduced, and the English teaching instrument can be used according to a teaching plan of AI sorting.

title: Multimedia teaching equipment based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of multimedia teaching, in particular to a multimedia teaching device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a plurality of square sheets which are distributed left and right, a pair of hinges which are distributed up and down is arranged between every two adjacent square sheets, and bolts are arranged between the upper ends and the lower ends of every two adjacent square sheets. The front end of each square piece is provided with an interactive electronic whiteboard, the rear end of each square piece is provided with a blackboard, the outer end of the square piece on the outermost side is rotationally connected with a cylinder, the connecting rod rotates on the base to switch the positions of the interactive electronic whiteboards and the blackboards on the front side and the rear side of the square pieces, and the unfolded square pieces are stabilized by locking the plug pins. According to the multimedia teaching equipment, the placing height of the square pieces can be conveniently adjusted by rotating the bolts, and when the multimedia teaching equipment does not need to be used, only the connecting rods and the supporting frame need to be taken down and the bolts need to be opened, so that the problems that the existing multimedia teaching equipment is inconvenient to carry outdoors and is too inconvenient in the teaching process are solved.

title: Teaching method accurate analysis system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching method accurate analysis system based on big data and artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of education and teaching, and provides the following scheme to solve the problem that an existing teaching effect is slow in feedback and unitary in analysis and evaluation standard, and not beneficial to the improvement in teaching quality and efficiency. The teaching method accurate analysis system comprises a control center, a teacher control end and a student feedback end, wherein the control center is connected with the teacher control end through a wireless network; the student feedback end comprises a desktop feedback module and an emotion feedback module; the teacher control end comprises a display module, a login module, an initiation module, a statistical module, an input module, a state modification module, a storage module and a preprocessing module; and the output end of the desktop feedback module is connected with the input end of the preprocessing module through Bluetooth. The teaching method of a teacher is rapidly, accurately and comprehensively analyzed in a big data and artificial intelligence interaction mode, the teacher can conveniently adjust the teaching method in time according to an analysis report, and the teaching quality and efficiency can be improved.

title: Development method of complete teaching device applied to relay protection training
abstract_text: The invention relates to a development method of a complete teaching device applied to relay protection training, and belongs to the technical field of relay protection training of a power system. The method comprises the steps of building an electric power big data storage and calculation platform, building a mode library of power grid operation modes, forming a training operation decision tree based on machine learning, achieving real-time training operation verification and error prevention and the like. According to the invention, the training robot can replace a teacher to form one-to-one training tutoring for students, and through combination with an analysis conclusion of identification data, the teaching adjustment direction is autonomously determined, training courseware is autonomously generated, student training records are automatically recorded, and through combination with a background big data analysis algorithm, the learning conditions of the trained students are effectively analyzed and judged; and popularization and application are easy.

title: DAMAGE PREDICTION APPARATUS, LEARNING MODEL, AND METHOD OF GENERATING LEARNING MODEL
abstract_text: To provide a damage prediction apparatus which predicts damage when external force is applied to a target structure without performing structure analysis every time.SOLUTION: A damage prediction apparatus comprises input means and output means. The input means accepts input including a map of degradation level distribution or soundness determination distribution in a beam structure obtained from inspection results of a target structure, a planar shape of the beam structure in the target structure, and unassumed external force applied to the target structure, as input date for prediction means utilizing a learnt model provided with teaching data to perform machine learning, the teaching data including input data and output data, the input data taking the map of degradation level distribution or soundness determination distribution in the beam structure of a pier or a bridge, the planar shape of the beam structure, and the external force applied to the beam structure, and the output data taking the information indicating damage condition of the beam structure obtained from a structure analysis result when the external force is applied to the beam structure, and the output means outputs information indicating damage condition predicted when unassumed external force is applied to the target structure.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: STORAGE AND AUTOMATED METADATA EXTRACTION USING MACHINE TEACHING
abstract_text: Techniques configuring a machine learning model include receiving, via a user interface configured to communicate with a machine learning model hosted on a collaborative computing platform, a selection of a file for input to the machine learning model, a selection of content in the file for input to the machine learning model, and instructions for applying the selected content to the machine learning model, which are sent to the machine learning model. As new files are uploaded to the selected directories of the collaborative computing platform, the machine learning model is applied to the uploaded files to classify the files and extract metadata. The extracted metadata and associated classification data are stored in data structures associated with the new files. The data structures are existing data structures of the collaborative computing platform.

title: INTERFACE FOR MACHINE TEACHING MODELING
abstract_text: Techniques configuring a machine learning model include instantiating a user interface configured to communicate with a machine learning model hosted on a collaborative computing platform. A selection of a file for input to the machine learning model, a selection of content in the file for input to the machine learning model, and instructions for applying the selected content to the machine learning model are received and sent to the machine learning model. A selection of one or more directories and an instruction to apply the machine learning model are sent to the machine learning model.

title: Course recommendation method and device based on attribution analysis, equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and provides a course recommendation method and device based on attribution analysis, equipment and a medium, which can determine the importance degree of each training course relative to a first state according to a target matrix and a total transfer rate of each training course, clarify the influence of each training course on a target to be achieved, and clarify teaching key points; a target training path is generated according to the importance degree of each training course relative to the first state, and a learning path with least nodes is generated according to the size of the effect of the training course relative to the target to be achieved, so that students are assisted in more effective training; while the learning efficiency is improved, the defect that the relevance between training and performance level is neglected due to the fact that a common recommendation system recommends courses according to historical watching habits and business rules is overcome. In addition, the invention further relates to a block chain technology, and the target training path can be stored in a block chain node.

title: quick imitation learning method, system and equipment for robot skill learning
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of robots and artificial intelligence, particularly relates to a quick imitation learning method, system and equipment for robot skill learning, and aims to solve the problems that teaching data collection of an existing robot is time-consuming and complex, and when a demonstrator provides suboptimal teaching, the robot cannot optimize the execution process, and the teaching efficiency is high. The operation efficiency of the robot is reduced, and the operation time is prolonged. The system method comprises the following steps: collecting original teaching data; in combination with a pre-trained evaluator, extracting key frame teaching data from the original teaching data set through a preset key frame extraction method; and based on the key frame teaching data, controlling the robot to reproduce teaching through the trained control strategy model. According to the method, the data collection process during robot imitation learning can be simplified, the teaching track is optimized based on the performance of the robot control strategy model, the data collection time and the robot operation time are shortened, the efficiency of robot imitation learning is effectively improved, and the operation time is shortened.

title: AI auxiliary teaching robot
applicants: SHANGHAI XIDING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An AI auxiliary teaching robot disclosed by the present invention comprises a base, the center of the upper surface of the base is movably provided with an upper mounting table top through a lifting mechanism, the rear side of the upper surface of the base is provided with a laser radar, and the front side in the base is provided with an anti-falling sensor. A control processing module, a communication module, a power module and an ultrasonic sensor are further arranged in the base, the communication module, the power module and the ultrasonic sensor are connected with the control processing module, the laser radar and the anti-falling sensor are connected with the control processing module, the control processing module is further electrically connected with two AI cameras, and the AI cameras are installed on the rear side of the loading table top. Each AI camera is a trinocular camera, and the laser radar, the anti-falling sensor, the communication module, the ultrasonic sensor and the AI camera are all connected with the power module. Aiming at a daily teaching application scene of a teacher, the system helps the teacher to complete teaching plans and automatically carry books, and assists the teacher in better classroom teaching, remote teaching and remote monitoring.

title: Artificial intelligence technology teaching device
applicants: CHUZHOU ZHENGSHAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence technology teaching device, which comprises a track joint strip, an intelligent teaching vehicle mechanism and a charging plug, the bottom end of a teaching vehicle box body is provided with a joint strip sensor and electric control rollers, interlayer plates are symmetrically arranged in the teaching vehicle box body, an intelligent control mechanism is arranged between the interlayer plates, and the intelligent control mechanism is connected with the intelligent teaching vehicle mechanism. A control monitoring panel is embedded in the upper portion of the teaching vehicle box body, rotary ball machine cameras are symmetrically arranged at the front end of the teaching vehicle box body through a multi-section telescopic rod and a lifting plate, and a charging socket is formed in the rear portion of the teaching vehicle box body. The track joint strip is matched with the joint strip inductor to control the teaching vehicle box body to move back and forth according to a preset line to be matched with the monitoring mechanism to achieve patrol monitoring, a monitoring picture is projected to the control monitoring panel to be watched by a teacher, and when small actions influencing classroom discipline are found, an alarm is given out for reminding. And meanwhile, the distribution mechanism can automatically distribute test papers during all-round examinations or examinations, and can replace teachers to carry out real-time invigilation inspection, so that the physical output of the teachers is greatly reduced.

title: Infrared positioning pen teaching system based on Bluetooth connection and application method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an infrared positioning pen teaching system based on Bluetooth connection and an application method. The teaching system comprises an infrared positioning pen, a plurality of Bluetooth receivers, an infrared camera, AI glasses and a teaching platform; the Bluetooth receivers and the infrared camera are connected with the teaching platform, the AI glasses are in communication connection with the teaching platform, a gyroscope and an accelerometer are arranged in the infrared positioning pen, and the infrared positioning pen is in paired connection with one of the Bluetooth receivers; the infrared positioning pen in the teaching system quickly sends data of the infrared positioning pen to the teaching platform through pairing connection with the Bluetooth receiver, and the AI glasses and the infrared camera are used for assistance, so an immersive 3D teaching effect can be realized, and the teaching quality and the teaching experience of students are greatly improved.

title: Learning state and effect judgment method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: 5184 VOCATIONAL EDUCATION CONSULTING GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a learning state and effect judgment method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a class state image of each student in a class in real time; obtaining a learning state of the student through artificial intelligence analysis, and obtaining a state result value of the student after the class is ended; counting the learning state variable quantity of the students in the whole class, judging whether the learning state variable quantity is in a credible interval of a preset change value: if yes, judging whether the state change of each student in the class meets a preset condition according to the state result value of each student and the learning state variable quantity of the students in the whole class: if yes, acquiring an analysis result input by the teacher for each student, and if not, intelligently analyzing the academic record of the student, and obtaining the learning effect change trend of the student. According to the invention, the learning state and learning effect change trend of the student can be provided for the teacher as an important reference basis for general teaching improvement or targeted teaching adjustment.

title: EXTRACTION SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: Provided is an extraction system which can suitably extract a workpiece by machine learning. The extraction system is provided with: a robot which has a hand; an acquisition unit which acquires a two-dimensional camera image of an area where a plurality of workpieces are present; a teaching unit which can display the two-dimensional camera image and teach an extraction position of a target workpiece to be extracted by the hand from among the plurality of workpieces; a learning unit which generates a learning model on the basis of the two-dimensional camera image and the taught extraction position; an inference unit which infers the extraction position of the target work on the basis of the learning model and the two-dimensional camera image; and a control unit which controls the robot to extract the target workpiece by means of the hand on the basis of the inferred extraction position.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform
applicants: SHANGHAI RUOPU IND DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment platform, which comprises a platform main body, a controller, a side plate, a placing plate, a fixing plate, a display screen, a power line and an auxiliary device, and is characterized in that the auxiliary device is arranged at the top of the placing plate, a clamping mechanism is arranged in the auxiliary device, and a transmission mechanism is arranged in the clamping mechanism; the transmission mechanism is driven by the motor, so that the two sets of clamping pieces at the top stably clamp the two sides of the auxiliary equipment, and the auxiliary equipment is stably fixed; and an independent motor is installed in the auxiliary device, the motor moves through a belt wheel, angle adjustment can be conducted on the clamping mechanism and the clamped equipment through a bearing piece, adjustment is convenient, and manual operation is reduced.

title: Sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a base, and a transmission device is arranged in the base. According to the sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching, through cooperation of a sound control controller, a motor, a first gear and a second gear, the sound control controller controls the motor to work according to different received and set voice signals, and therefore the problems that operation is not humanized enough, the function is single, and the teaching quality is affected are solved; through cooperation of a first threaded rod, a sleeve plate, a connecting plate and a circular plate, the function of adjusting the height of the sound control lamp is achieved, operation is easy, through cooperation of a second threaded rod, a bent plate and a triangular plate, the sound control lamp is protected, damage to the sound control lamp is prevented, and through cooperation of a protruding plate, a spring and a groove plate, when the groove plate moves upwards, the spring is stressed and extruded, the rubber pad is prevented from loosening, the connection stability is improved, normal use is ensured, and the practicability is improved.

title: Display device for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: MINMAO YIPIN ENTERPRISE MAN SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a display device for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a fixed shell, a double-shaft motor is fixedly connected to the center of the bottom of an inner cavity of the fixed shell, a rotating rod is fixedly connected to the output end of the double-shaft motor, and a driving bevel gear is fixedly sleeved on one side, far away from the double-shaft motor, of the surface of the rotating rod. Through cooperative use of the threaded cylinder, the first threaded rod, the bubble level, the mounting plate, the second threaded rod, the projector, the display screen, a damping rotating shaft, a fixed frame, a threaded column, a movable plate, a first threaded sleeve, a driving bevel gear, a rotating rod, a double-shaft motor and a second threaded sleeve, the problems that an existing display device is relatively single in display mode; the problems that teaching content cannot be displayed in various modes, students are prone to feeling tired in the teaching process, the learning interest of the students cannot be aroused, meanwhile, height adjustment cannot be carried out, and different-height display cannot be carried out are solved.

title: Visualization of a Machine Learning Confidence Score
abstract_text: A unique user interface for improving machine learning algorithms is described herein. The user interface comprises an icon with multiple visual indicators displaying the machine learning confidence score. When a mouse hovers over the icon, a set of icons are displayed to accept the teaching user's input. In addition, the words that drove the machine learning confidence score are highlighted with formatting so that the teaching user can understand what drove the machine learning confidence score.

title: Intelligent garbage classification management robot based on deep learning
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of robots, and discloses an intelligent garbage classification management robot based on deep learning, which comprises a bottom plate, at the top end of which garbage is classified and managed; the robot comprises a bottom plate, a robot body and a touch screen terminal, first supporting blocks are fixedly installed at the edges of the four corners of the top end of the bottom plate, connecting blocks are fixedly installed on the outer walls of the first supporting blocks, and the bottom end of the robot body is connected with the top ends of the first supporting blocks. According to the intelligent garbage classification management robot based on deep learning, by arranging the robot body and the touch screen terminal, a user can autonomously and deeply learn related knowledge of garbage classification through computer software in the touch screen terminal; computer software in the touch screen terminal can conveniently control the camera to recognize the garbage types in the hands of a user, the electric cylinder can be conveniently controlled to lift the sealing plate, the user is effectively prevented from putting the garbage into a wrong garbage can, use is convenient, and the teaching effect is good.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR AUTOMATED DETECTION OF BUILDING FOOTPRINTS
abstract_text: The disclosed computer-implemented method may include collecting a set of labels that label polygons within a training set of images as architectural structures. The method may also include creating a set of noisy labels with a predetermined degree of noise by distorting boundaries of a number of the polygons within the training set of images. Additionally, the method may include simultaneously training two neural networks by applying a co-teaching method to learn from the set of noisy labels. The method may also include extracting a preferential list of training data based on the two trained neural networks. Furthermore, the method may include training a machine learning model with the preferential list of training data. Finally, the method may include identifying one or more building footprints in a target image using the trained machine learning model. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

title: System and method for providing efficient online learning service for improving learning ability
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for providing an efficient online learning service for improving learning ability, which improves a student's practical learning ability, and a method thereof. According to the present invention, the system comprises: at least one student terminal having an application for providing a real-time learning service installed therein and accessing an online website by execution of the application to enable a student to request selected questions and an explanation lecture of the question, wherein a student member is confirmed through authentication information; at least one teaching terminal having an application for providing the real-time learning service installed therein and accessing the online website by execution of the application to provide a one-to-one real-time lecture to the student terminal when a request is received from a learning service providing server, wherein a teaching member is confirmed through authentication information; and the learning service server providing various online or offline book-related questions to the student terminal, providing the question selected by the student terminal and the explanation lecture on the selected question, and evaluating the student's understanding of the lecture during the explanation lecture to provide a one-to-one real-time lecture or deep learning to the student terminal by connecting the student terminal and the professor terminal according to an evaluation result.

title: TEACHING DATA GENERATION DEVICE, TEACHING DATA GENERATION METHOD, RECORDING DEVICE, AND RECORDING METHOD
abstract_text: A teaching data generation device according to the present invention comprises: an annotation input unit that receives an input of an annotation on second image data obtained by imaging a subject of observation; a reflection unit that reflects the annotation result onto first image data relating to the same subject of observation as the second image data and having a different imaging mode and/or display mode; and a teaching data generation unit that generates teaching data for creating an inference model by using the first image data and the annotation result reflected in the first image data. As a result, a teaching data generation device is provided that generates teaching data enabling highly accurate image determination by an AI on the basis of an image judged by a human.

title: SMART PENDANT
abstract_text: To solve such a problem that, in some cases, cost, time or troublesome is required more than expected when a user intends to operate a robot as expected by providing instruction information to the robot using a pendant.SOLUTION: A smart pendant for controlling a robot includes: a sensor input part for inputting necessary information into AI control; and an AI control unit for teaching a robot with AI control by referring to the information from the sensor input part.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Teacher and bearing teaching system and method integrating AI technology and video technology
applicants: NANJING DAJING TCM INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teacher and bearing teaching system and method integrating an AI technology and a video technology, and the system comprises a cloud server which is used for storing the related data of the teacher and bearing teaching system and enabling a user to access and log in a system platform through the Internet. The cloud server comprises a basic information management module, a theoretical learning and practice module, a video teaching and assessment module, an AI practical operation training module, an instant online communication module and a checkout test index module. Multi-dimensional, all-time and three-dimensional teaching with online and offline combination, theory and clinical combination and real person and AI intelligence combination is realized, and the inheritance efficiency and quality are greatly improved while the teaching pressure of both the teacher and the bearer is relieved.

title: Online continuous education resource allocation and management method based on artificial intelligence algorithm technology
applicants: HENGJI CULTURE INFORMATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online continuous education resource allocation and management method based on an artificial intelligence algorithm technology, and provides the following scheme for solving the problems that the fairness principle of education is violated, the allocation efficiency is poor and the allocation mode is not transparent enough. The method comprises the following steps: S1, a worker uploads student identity information and employment teacher identity information collected through each platform to an education system; s2, the education resource manager logs in the online continuous education platform to integrate the identity information of the teachers and the students; and S3, respectively issuing survey information questionnaires for the teacher and the students in an E-mail manner. Through connection of the resource information matching module, advantage teaching information published by a teacher and subjects to be improved by students are effectively and directly linked, and reasonable supply and demand balance is efficiently and bidirectionally matched for the teacher and the students, so that improvement of scores of the students is facilitated, and targeted teaching in the teaching process is enriched.

title: Knowledge tracking method based on test question heterogeneous graph representation and learner embedding
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of education big data mining, graph neural network and learner behavior modeling, and provides a knowledge tracking method based on test question heterogeneous graph representation and learner embedding, the method adopts a heterogeneous graph neural network technology in the deep learning field to represent multi-dimensional features of test questions, and meanwhile, complex learner characteristics are modeled in combination with a project reaction theory, and ability characteristics of learners are captured by adopting a clustering mode and the like; finally, the test question and learner mixed features are fused to a traditional knowledge tracking model, and knowledge tracking and learner performance prediction for different learner groups are achieved. According to the invention, the learning condition of the learner can be scientifically and comprehensively predicted, and the purpose of assisting the teacher in precise teaching is achieved.

title: Knowledge and skill dynamic diagnosis method oriented to space-time evolution
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of education data mining, and provides a knowledge and skill dynamic diagnosis method oriented to space-time evolution. The method comprises the following steps of: firstly, constructing a knowledge heterogeneous graph according to resource characteristics, and then dynamically updating the knowledge and skill state of a learner in time and space dimensions, therefore, the future performance of the learner is predicted, and the knowledge mastering condition of the learner is diagnosed. According to the method, a big data technology, deep learning and a natural language processing technology are comprehensively utilized, knowledge points of a learner are modeled from time and space, the knowledge state of the learner is influenced by introducing learning features and forgetting features, and a knowledge structure of the learner is updated by providing space-time cascade operation, the knowledge and skills of the learner can be diagnosed scientifically and comprehensively, future performance of the learner can be predicted, personalized recommendation practice can be performed on knowledge points with low skill mastery, and personalized teaching can be performed on knowledge points with poor performance in the future.

title: Gantry robot
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a gantry robot, which is lightweight and economical by using an aluminum profile, and recognizes an object or person through deep-learning to allow self-teaching. The gantry robot of the present invention includes: a plurality of vertical posts for supporting a body; a traveling beam positioned at an upper end of the posts; and a carriage provided on one side of the traveling beam to perform vertical or horizontal traveling. The traveling beam is formed of an aluminum profile. The gantry robot comprises a step in the traveling beam, and a linear module is mounted on the step. In addition, in accordance with the gantry robot, the linear module is formed of an aluminum profile. Also, the linear module has four bearing rollers mounted therein in a cross shape. In addition, the gantry robot is based on deep learning by using data collection and algorithm learning.

title: Teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence comprises a teaching display screen; a bearing plate is arranged at the bottom of the teaching display screen, the bearing plate is in threaded connection with the screw rod, and the bearing plate is in sliding connection with the guide rod; the first motor is connected with the screw rod; the top of the protection box is provided with an opening. The top of the teaching display screen is provided with a cover plate. The fixed box is arranged on the cover plate; a disc is arranged on the front surface of the fixed box; the rotating shaft is longitudinally arranged and penetrates through the disc, the pointer is arranged on the rotating shaft and located right in front of the disc, and the output end of the second motor is connected with the rotating shaft. The disc is provided with a student number identification ring, and the pointer points to the student number identification ring. And the control device is arranged on the protection box and is in control connection with the first motor and the second motor. According to the teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence, the teaching display screen can be stored to be prevented from being damaged, the classroom atmosphere can be adjusted, the learning interest of students can be stimulated, teaching is achieved through lively activities, operation is easy, functions are diversified, and practicability is achieved.

title: Obstacle position identification method for assisting autonomous positioning navigation AR teaching demonstration
applicants: TIANJIN JIAZI ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an obstacle position identification method for assisting autonomous positioning navigation AR teaching demonstration, wherein the method comprises the following steps: S1, a mobile robot unit constructs a virtual map of a real scene through a laser sensor, the real-time coordinates of an obstacle in the real scene are obtained, and the coordinate set of the virtual map, the real-time coordinates of the obstacle and the current coordinates of a robot are transmitted back to a comprehensive processing unit; and S2, the comprehensive processing unit selects a certain point in the virtual map as a target terminal point of the mobile robot unit, and transmits coordinates of the selected target terminal point to the mobile robot unit. The system has the beneficial effects that the system is flexible to deploy, high in safety, reusable and good in science popularization interaction experience feeling, and plays a significant role in promoting artificial intelligence scientific knowledge spreading, popularization and application; and along with continuous deepening and expansion of science popularization scenes in the future, a popular science product series fused by machine vision, a robot technology and an AR technology is continuously updated and iterated.

title: Open cultivation type online vocational education course system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an open cultivation type online vocational education course system. The system comprises a teacher terminal which is used for a teacher to log in the system, carry out online teaching, and upload teaching data; a student terminal which is used for enabling a student to log in the system, and carrying out knowledge learning, actual operation, online testing and communication and interpretation; a teaching module which is used for providing knowledge field division and constructing a virtual scene for online teaching of teachers and students; a detection module which is used for testing theoretical knowledge and actual operation of students; an analysis module which is used for analyzing the theoretical knowledge mastering condition and the practical operation ability of the students, finding out error-prone points of each student through big data analysis and AI data mining, and performing targeted education; and a central processing unit which is used for coordinating the above modules to work, calling corresponding data in each database within the authority of the data calling command by using the data calling command, and sending the control commands to the corresponding modules.

title: DEFORMATIONS BASIS LEARNING
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of machine-learning is described that obtains a dataset of 3D modeled objects. The method further Includes teaching a neural network. The neural network is configured to infer a deformation basis of an input 3D modeled object. This constitutes an improved method of machine-learning.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device
applicants: SHENZHEN LABPLUS SCIENCE AND EDUCATION CULTURE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device, which comprises an artificial intelligence camera module and a display screen, and the artificial intelligence camera module is electrically connected with the display screen. The display screen is provided with a front display interface and a rear display interface, and the artificial intelligence camera module is provided with an interface unit matched with the front display interface and the rear display interface; the artificial intelligence camera module is further provided with an input key, a power indicating lamp, a serial port unit, a light supplementing lamp, a reset key, a camera, a USB downloading unit and an SD card slot. According to the technical scheme, various machine vision capabilities such as face detection, digital recognition and image recognition can be realized, artificial intelligence project development and manufacturing are supported, and creativity can be quickly realized.

title: Test bed for artificial intelligence teaching and training
applicants: ANHUI QINGXIAO FANGTANG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a test bed for artificial intelligence teaching and training, which relates to the field of test beds and comprises two test bed bodies, the test bed bodies are symmetrically arranged and are integrally cubic, and the top surfaces and the bottom surfaces of the test bed bodies are square; a supporting column is arranged at the top of the test bed body, the supporting column is fixedly connected with the test bed body, and the top of the supporting column is connected with a display stand; the front part of the test bed body is provided with display ports, the interior of the test bed body is provided with a placing plate, the display ports are hinged through hinges, the rear part and the side surface of the test bed body are provided with fixing devices, and a rotating device is arranged below the test bed body. The problems that in the demonstration process, experiment instruments need to be carried, and sometimes, one person needs to carry many tools are solved.

title: SPEECH RECOGNITION DEVICE, ACOUSTIC MODEL LEARNING DEVICE, SPEECH RECOGNITION METHOD, AND COMPUTER-READABLE RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: A speech recognition device 20 comprises: a data acquisition unit 21 that acquires speech data that will serve as an object to be recognized and sensor data; and a speech recognition unit 22 that converts the acquired speech data to text data by applying the acquired speech data and the sensor data to an acoustic model that was constructed by adding an embedding vector, which was generated using sensor data associated with learning data, to the speech data, which will serve as the learning data, and teaching data, and performing machine learning.

title: AI-based automatic navigation teaching method and interactive system
applicants: SHANDONG SHUNSHI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computers, in particular to an AI-based automatic navigation teaching method and an interactive system. The AI-based automatic navigation teaching method comprises the steps that an interaction command is input to an interaction module, an automatic navigation module loads an AI navigation database and configures navigation directory data according to the interaction command, moreover, an execution module in the interaction module receives the interaction command, decodes the interaction command and obtains a deployment instruction, and a calling module calls a first navigation catalogue and a second navigation catalogue from an association module according to the deployment instruction, sends the first navigation catalogue to a first display device, and sends the second navigation catalogue to a second display device; an interaction configuration module sets the first display device and the second display device to enable the second display device or the first display device to synchronously display an associated target when any target in the first navigation directory or the second navigation directory is operated.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment equipment
applicants: GAOHUI QIANGXUE SOFTWARE HAINAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to artificial intelligence teaching experiment equipment which comprises a main control board. A central processing unit, a first neural network processor and a second neural network processor are arranged on the main control board; the first neural network processor and the second neural network processor are both in communication connection with the central processing unit; the video acquisition module, the sensor, the voice acquisition module and the voice generation equipment are all in communication connection with the central processing unit; the video acquisition module can acquire video data; the voice acquisition module acquires first voice data; the voice generation device generates second voice data; the sensor collects biological sign information; the central processing unit receives the video data, the first voice data, the second voice data and the biological sign information, and transmits the video data to the first neural network processor or/and the second neural network processor; and the first neural network processor or/and the second neural network processor cooperate with the central processing unit to carry out operation processing on the video data.

title: Augmented reality display method and system for teenager interactive safety education
applicants: DALIAN MILE HONGYE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an augmented reality display method and system for teenager interactive safety education, and the method comprises the steps: 1, calling a camera to continuously obtain real world images; 2, forming real world image feature data which can be recognized by an AR engine unit; 3, enabling the calculation unit to obtain the marked module from the storage unit and perform gray scale and hue processing on the marked module to obtain stored image feature data which can be identified by the AR engine unit; carrying out data matching on the stored image feature data and the real world image feature data; 4, enabling the calculation unit to output the matched data modules from the storage unit to a three-dimensional engine unit; and 5, carrying out machine learning, and updating the security knowledge module and the data module. According to the invention, the teaching and learning process can be effectively displayed and recorded, and the follow-up learning content can be improved in a targeted manner through artificial intelligence training.

title: Children music intelligent partner training method and system based on computer deep learning
applicants: NANJING QINTIAN CULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a child music intelligent partner training method and system based on computer deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: recording a track to obtain a training scheme and performing training; collecting and processing audio data and video data of a player; comparing the hand shape specification model with the video data, and comparing the standard musical sound structured data with the musical sound structured data of the player to obtain musical completeness evaluation and guidance suggestions; if the music completion degree evaluation reaches a preset standard, searching to obtain a recommended practice track, and performing emotion label identification; enabling the player to determining whether to practice the recommended practice track or not through the emotion label identification, and if not, executing the previous step again; and sending the audio data, the video data and the completion degree of the player to a teacher terminal and a parent terminal. The beneficial effects of the invention are that students can independently complete the practice of music tracks, the teaching quality of teachers is improved, and the students are helped to plan the purpose of practice music.

title: Practical training operation platform convenient for artificial intelligence manufacturing teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses a practical training operation platform convenient for artificial intelligence manufacturing teaching, which comprises a supporting table and supporting legs arranged at four corners of the lower end of the supporting table, and is characterized in that each supporting leg is provided with a height adjusting piece for adjusting the supporting height of the supporting leg; the left side of the upper end of the supporting table is provided with a teaching display screen used for displaying to-be-learned content through a support, a lifting cavity is formed in the middle of the supporting table, a movable plate used for supporting practical training equipment is arranged in the lifting cavity in a sliding fit mode, and a traction piece used for pulling the movable plate to ascend and descend is arranged in the supporting table; the inner wall of the upper end of the lifting cavity is provided with a pressing ring for pressing against the end surface of the movable plate, and a driving member for driving the height adjusting member and the traction piece is provided inside the supporting table, the device is designed for overcoming the defects of an existing device, the height of the device can be adjusted, in addition, supporting legs are arranged, the anti-seismic performance of the device is improved, the device is convenient to move, and the practicability is high.

title: Photovoltaic module power generation efficiency simulation device and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN DAOG TECH SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: According to a device and a method disclosed by the invention, a machine learning model can be trained through a certain amount of measurement results of the photovoltaic module, so that the quality of the photovoltaic module can be analyzed; and errors frequently made by the learner can be analyzed by recording the operation data of the learner in the teaching process. According to the device and the method, the working state of the photovoltaic module can be accurately, quickly and stably changed by accurately controlling one or more of the light intensity, the irradiation area and the irradiation angle which actually and effectively reach the surface of the photovoltaic cell by adopting an environment such as a manually controllable light source and a light field. The device and method also include detection and/or control of the temperature of the photovoltaic module. Therefore, the temperature can be accurately controlled, and the measurement accuracy is further improved.

title: Test paper-based lesson preparation method and device and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention provides a lesson preparation method and device based on test paper and a storage medium. The lesson preparation method comprises the steps of obtaining a test paper image of any test paper; extracting examination data in the examination paper image, wherein the examination data at least comprises examination paper knowledge point information and knowledge point right and wrong information; acquiring question data and/or knowledge point learning paths based on the test paper knowledge point information and the knowledge point right and wrong information; and generating lesson preparation data based on the question data and/or the knowledge point learning path. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, data extraction can be performed on the test paper based on image recognition and artificial intelligence technologies, corresponding questions and learning paths are generated according to the extracted data, and finally lesson preparation data is obtained. Different lesson preparation data is generated for each student according to the individual learning difference of the students reflected by the test paper, so that the workload of teachers is reduced, the lesson preparation efficiency is improved, and the teachers can apply more time to the improvement of teaching skills.

title: Online learning diagnosis method and device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN EAGLESOUL EDUCATION SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online learning diagnosis method and device based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps of collecting the test paper and homework data of a student through an OCR technology, taking the data as a first training set, training, and obtaining a first neural network model; taking the test paper or the homework, the total score of each corresponding knowledge point and the teaching suggestion as a second training set, and training to obtain a second neural network model; obtaining the answer content of the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework through the handwriting of an electronic pen, inputting the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework into the first neural network model in combination with the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework, and obtaining the total score of each knowledge point corresponding to the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework; inputting the total score of each knowledge point corresponding to the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework into the second neural network model to obtain the teaching suggestions of the to-be-analyzed test paper or homework. According to the present invention, the real mastering condition of students on each knowledge point can be quickly and accurately evaluated, and proper teaching suggestions are given, so that the time and energy of teachers are saved, and the students can be helped to quickly check the leakage and fill the vacancy, and the score is improved.

title: Sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a box body, the bottom of the inner cavity of the box body is provided with a rising structure, the two sides of the top of the inner cavity of the box body are fixedly connected with telescopic rods, the inner cavity of the box body is provided with a supporting plate, the two sides of the top of the supporting plate are fixedly connected with one ends of the telescopic rods, and the other ends of the telescopic rods are fixedly connected with the bottom of the box body. Worms are arranged on the two sides of the supporting plate in a penetrating mode, and two limiting blocks are fixedly connected to one side of the surface of each worm. The output shaft of the second motor on the left side rotates anticlockwise, the second motor on the right side rotates clockwise, the worm gear is driven to rotate, the two meshed worms extrude towards the middle while the worm gear rotates, the second motor is turned off after the sound control lamp is clamped, and then the sound control lamp can be fixed, so that the stability of the sound control lamp is enhanced; and the display is convenient in the teaching process and is not easy to fall down, so that the resource loss in the teaching process is reduced and the teaching use is convenient.

title: A novel method and system to enhance teaching learning and student evaluation process using ‘eDify’ mobile application
abstract_text: A novel method and system to enhance teaching learning and student evaluation process using 'eDify' mobile application Abstract: Nowadays educational institutions taking the advantage of new technologies in teaching learning process especially in the pandemic period where the conventional class room teaching is not possible. It is time to change their methods especially in case of Higher Educational Institutions(HEIs) to disseminate knowledge to the students. Already some of the Higher educational institutions over worldwide has adopted blended e-learning with video streaming servers in combination with platforms like moodle. There are some challenges with this particular method in terms of students accessing material and faculty interaction. In our invention the main focus was to develop a mobile application, "eDify," to enhance the video streaming server's existing infrastructure. Furthermore, usability analysis of the mobile application with the learning experience of the students. The current study would reveal the variables that are critical to effective technology-based learning of the students. The implications generated through the study would allow the institution involved in the study to effectively implement the variables required for enhanced teaching and learning with the use of a mobile application. The methodology used in the study was an exploratory study combined with a survey as a quantitative method through the mobile application. Various machine learning algorithms can be applied for studying how independent variables incorporated in the eDify mobile application are affecting the result of the teaching learning process. The Principal component analysis(PCA) and a range of regression analyses are conducted to test the relationships between the independent and the dependent variable "learning experience". With Principle component analysis results the evaluation parameters can be reduced for optimized results. Results suggest that the usability variables positively and significantly affect the learning experience's dependent variable. SHEET 5 OF 5 TOTAL NO. title: Intelligent campus construction physical education teaching management method and system based on artificial intelligence, and computer storage medium
applicants: WUHAN JIAYU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent campus construction physical education teaching management method and system based on artificial intelligence, and a computer storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: counting the number of pre-named students in various sporting event courses in a campus class, and comparing and screening various sporting event courses of which the number of pre-named students exceeds the standard; counting the number of enrollment students who have learned the corresponding course in various physics event courses with the number of enrollment students exceeding the standard, and comparing the number with the standard number of enrollment students of the corresponding physics event courses; if the number of the pre-named people is greater than the standard number of the enrollment students, counting academic records of the enrollment students who have learned the corresponding courses in various physics event courses with the number of the pre-named people exceeding the standard, and sequentially screening the academic records according to a sequence; and if the number of the pre-named students is smaller than the standard number of the enrollment students, performing statistics on the gender matching degree and the physique test value of each remaining enrollment student in each physics event course with the number of the pre-named students exceeding the standard, calculating the conformity matching coefficient of each remaining enrollment student in each physics event course with the number of the pre-named students exceeding the standard, and performing supplementation in sequence.

title: Lesson preparation method and device based on big data and storage medium
