abstract_text: The invention provides a lesson preparation method and device based on big data and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps of generating first lesson preparation data based on teaching data, the teaching data comprising current operation information and/or historical operation information of a teacher; and generating at least one second lesson preparation data based on the first lesson preparation data and learning data, wherein the learning data comprises current learning information and/or historical learning information of at least one student. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, different lesson preparation and learning data can be respectively obtained according to individual learning differences of students in an artificial intelligence mode in a teaching process, so that the lesson preparation labor force of teachers is reduced, and each student can have own learning scheme.

title: Information recommendation method and device, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an information recommendation method and device, computer equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The identity information of a target object is determined based on a face image, the historical interaction information of the target object is obtained according to the identity information, the first information recommendation strategy is obtained based on the historical interaction information, the first information recommendation strategy is called to carry out information recommendation on the target object, and the feature information of the target object in the information recommendation process is obtained. And the feature information is imported into a pre-trained emotion recognition model, a second information recommendation strategy is obtained based on an emotion recognition result of the target object, and the second information recommendation strategy is called to perform information recommendation for the target object. In addition, the invention also relates to a block chain technology, and the identity information can be stored in a block chain. Different information recommendation strategies are adopted for the target object according to the historical interaction information and the emotion recognition result in sequence, the user experience is improved, and intelligent auxiliary teaching is achieved.

title: Automobile brake drum robot spraying system and method
applicants: FUJIAN JINTAI MACHINERY MFG CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automobile brake drum robot spraying system and method. According to the automobile brake drum robot spraying system, a binary classifier automobile brake drum detection system based on machine learning can detect the position, shape and size information of a brake drum and can judge whether the brake drum on a station is missing or not, and the adaptability to environment changes is high; a six-dimensional torque sensor is additionally arranged at the tail end of a mechanical arm, manual dragging teaching of a spraying path can be achieved, the teaching difficulty is reduced, meanwhile, the stability and high efficiency of the spraying process can be guaranteed through a Kalman filtering-based teaching path optimization method, the spraying quality is improved, and the service life of equipment is prolonged; and the structural design of a mobile robot is adopted, on the premise that the movement precision is guaranteed, multi-station multi-brake-drum automatic spraying control is achieved, the spraying efficiency is improved, manual intervention is reduced, the whole spraying system meets the development requirements for automation and intelligence, and intelligent transformation and upgrading of enterprises and even the spraying industry are facilitated.

title: Teaching method and system based on artificial intelligence and virtual reality
applicants: UNICOM WOYUEDU TECH CULTURE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching method and system based on artificial intelligence and virtual reality. The method comprises the following steps: respectively synthesizing a virtual voice library and a virtual action library of a target person according to voice feature data and action feature data of the target person; obtaining a mapping relationship between the virtual voice library and the virtual action library; constructing a virtual character model of the target character based on the mapping relation; acquiring corresponding scene elements through preset teaching content; and synthesizing a virtual teaching scene based on the virtual character model and the scene elements, and sending the virtual teaching scene to the virtual reality equipment for display. According to the method, scene education is realized, the requirement of the user for quickly and conveniently acquiring learning information is met, the learning interest and learning enthusiasm of the user are enhanced, and the learning experience is improved.

title: MESSAGE OUTPUT APPARATUS, LEARNING APPARATUS, MESSAGE OUTPUT METHOD, LEARNING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are a message output apparatus, a learning apparatus, a message output method, a learning method, and a program that allow a user to feel as if communication is being performed. An input section inputs, to a learned machine learning model that has been learned using learning data that includes learning input data including a plurality of consecutive frames of learning images and teaching data including a message associated with the learning input data, target input data including at least a plurality of consecutive frames of target images. A message identification section identifies a message according to output produced when the target input data is input to the machine learning model. A message output section outputs the identified message.

title: SHOVEL AND SHOVEL ASSIST SYSTEM
abstract_text: A shovel includes a processor, and a memory storing program instructions that cause the processor to obtain environmental information around the shovel, and perform determination related to an object around the shovel based on the obtained environmental information, by using a learned model on which machine learning has been performed. The learned model is updated to an additionally learned model on which additional learning has been performed based on teaching information generated from the obtained environmental information. In a case where the learned model is updated, the processor performs the determination based on the obtained environmental information, by using the updated learned model.

title: Teaching training platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching practical training platform based on artificial intelligence, comprising a practical training platform, the lower end of the practical training platform is provided with four support sleeves distributed in a rectangular shape, the support sleeves are internally provided with hollow grooves, the hollow grooves are internally and slidably connected with moving blocks, the lower ends of the moving blocks are fixedly connected with hydraulic oil cylinders, and the hydraulic oil cylinders are fixedly connected with the lower ends of the moving blocks. The upper end of the moving block is fixedly connected with a supporting rod, the upper end of the supporting rod extends out of the hollow groove and is fixedly connected with the practical training platform, an operation cavity is formed in the practical training platform, a touch operation screen is arranged in the operation cavity, and a connecting mechanism is arranged between the touch operation screen and the practical training platform. The side wall of the training platform is fixedly connected with a servo motor, and the tail end of an output shaft of the servo motor is fixedly connected with a rotating rod. When the teaching practical training platform based on artificial intelligence is operated, the height of the practical training platform can be automatically adjusted, the teaching practical training platform is suitable for teaching practical training of people of different heights, the angle can be effectively adjusted, and teaching practical training display is facilitated.

title: Intelligent visual practical training platform
applicants: SHENZHEN QIANHAI GEZHI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent visual practical training platform, which comprises a base, a target assembly, a visual tracking assembly, rubber foot pads, an electric control cabinet, a power supply indicating lamp, an operation indicating lamp, an emergency stop button, a power supply interface and a USB (Universal Serial Bus) interface, the target assembly is composed of an arc-shaped installation support, a motor outer cover, a disc, a U-shaped motor support, a U-shaped photoelectric sensor, a driving motor, a rotating shaft, a rotating clamping strip, a full-color LED lamp strip, an electric sliding ring and an induction strip. According to the utility model, various track changes of the target are realized, track images are collected through the camera for real-time processing and the target is tracked, a static visual tracking mode and a dynamic visual tracking mode are provided, the moving track of the target is complex and changeable, the complexity of visual tracking is increased, basic teaching of machine vision is satisfied, and the teaching efficiency is improved. And multidisciplinary crossed practical teaching of artificial intelligence, machine vision technology, automatic control technology and the like can be conveniently carried out.

title: Classroom teaching quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom teaching quality evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: constructing a teacher network and a student network which are used for detecting the states of students in a classroom; training a teacher network, and obtaining effective information amount extracted by a feature extraction layer in the trained teacher network; calculating the importance degree of the feature extraction layer according to the effective information amount; using a teacher network to supervise and train a student network based on the importance degree of the feature extraction layer; and the trained student network is used to detect the student state in the classroom, and the classroom teaching quality is evaluated according to the student state. The operation of knowledge distillation is improved, so that the process of supervising and training the student network by the teacher network is more reasonable, and the detection requirements of human bodies with different scales in the acquired image can be met.

title: Real-time interactive teaching method and system and AI autonomous classroom platform
applicants: ZHEJIANG XUEHAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a real-time interactive teaching method, and the real-time interactive teaching method comprises the steps: receiving a micro-class task design request of a teacher, and generating a visual design page in a client; receiving a micro-class task adding instruction of a teacher in the visual design page, importing teaching resources and playing the teaching resources; under the condition that the dotting instruction is received, generating an interaction setting tool on a playing interface of the teaching resources; and adding interaction in the teaching resources according to the first interaction information, wherein the first interaction information is generated by a teacher based on an interaction setting tool, and comprises quick answer interaction, quick write interaction, quick selection interaction, research and reading interaction and resource interaction. Through the invention, the problem that online education products cannot deeply interact between teachers and students in related technologies is solved, learning conditions of the students and mastering conditions of knowledge points can be observed, teaching interaction between the teachers and the students is enhanced, teaching according to materials is realized to a great extent, and the classroom teaching effect is improved.

title: Abdominal percussion model for teaching
applicants: UNION HOSPITAL TONGJI MEDICAL COLLEGE HUAZHONG UNIV SCI & TECH
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an abdomen percussion model for teaching, which comprises a human body model and organ bags arranged in the human body model, pressure sensors are fixedly arranged at the upper ends of the organ bags, and the pressure sensors are connected with loudspeakers; an air pressure cavity used for loading air in the human body model is arranged in the human body model, an air pressure adjusting piece used for controlling air pressure of the air pressure cavity is arranged on the side portion of the human body model and connected with the air pressure cavity, and the other end, away from the human body model, of the air pressure adjusting piece is connected with an air pump. According to the utility model, the pressure sensor and the loudspeaker are arranged, when external percussion force is sensed in the air pressure cavity, percussion sound is emitted through the loudspeaker, deep learning of students on different percussion sounds at different parts is enhanced, and the air pressure adjusting part is arranged at the side part of the human body model to manually control the state of air in the air pressure cavity, so that the teaching efficiency is improved. By using the air pressure adjusting piece, opening and closing of the channel can be achieved by easily shifting the air pressure adjusting piece manually, and the air pressure adjusting piece is suitable for being used as a medical teaching repeated practice material.

title: Internet-based artificial intelligence desk teaching terminal
applicants: SHENZHEN WEILAI GROUP IND CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching equipment, in particular to an Internet-based artificial intelligence desk teaching terminal which comprises two bases, the top of each base is bolted with a fixing frame, the bottom of each base is fixedly provided with a non-slip mat, and the top of each fixing frame is bolted with a baffle; the Internet-based artificial intelligence desk teaching terminal provided by the invention has the advantages that the angle of the desk screen is convenient to adjust, the learning can be carried out without books, the burden of students can be relieved, the interestingness of teaching interaction is increased, and the learning effect of the students can be effectively improved, and the problems that at present, the students have more textbooks, the function of the desk is single, the teaching interaction is lacked, teachers cannot timely know the learning conditions of the students, so the learning efficiency of students is low are solved, the teachers are helped to quickly obtain learning effects of the students, and the improvement of teaching contents or teaching modes is facilitated.

title: Inorganic chemistry course teaching tutoring management method based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an inorganic chemistry course teaching tutoring management method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps that a teacher carries out decomposition of course teaching materials and learning requirements, and carries out recording of a live course on time; students register on a teaching system, enter the teaching system for learning, enter classes of courses according to course selection and class grouping results, check and read course tutoring teaching materials of each chapter according to requirements of course tutors, and perform live course learning on time; in the learning process, the students ask questions on site, the tutoring teacher answers the questions, online communication is achieved, the teacher arranges curriculum homework after class, the students complete the curriculum homework, and unit evaluation and scoring are conducted after curriculum chapter learning is finished; through collecting teacher teaching and student learning states, student after-class feedback and examination results, big data analysis is carried out, a good teaching mode, key knowledge content and difficult point knowledge content are summarized, teaching management is facilitated, a teaching scheme is optimized, and teaching quality is improved.

title: Online course generation system and device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides an online course generation system and device based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises: a virtual teacher image generation module which is used for extracting a virtual teacher image, carrying out the re-editing of a virtual teacher, and setting the character attributes of the virtual teacher; a courseware generation module which is used for extracting teaching contents and generating new courseware; a personalized audio generation module which is used for generating personalized audio conforming to character characters according to the new courseware, and the audio drives the virtual teacher to perform personification actions; and a teaching module which is used for synchronizing the new courseware and the new audio, so that the courseware content is adaptive to the audio, and the virtual teacher completes teaching by adopting the adaptive audio. According to the system and device, the virtual teacher image generation module, the courseware generation module and the teaching module are systematically integrated, a large number of teaching videos are analyzed by referring to the selection and preference of the user to generate the virtual teacher, the new courseware and the new audio, data are updated, the teaching quality of the virtual teacher is improved, and the online learning efficiency of the user is improved.

title: Rock slice microscopic image deep learning-based rock classification method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a rock slice microscopic image deep learning-based rock classification method, which comprises the following steps of: acquiring a rock slice microscopic image under a polarizing microscope as original data, expanding the data volume of the rock slice microscopic image by using a data enhancement technology, manufacturing a RockDataset data set, inputting the RockDataset into an improved ResNet50 model to carry out deep transfer learning training and parameter optimization, and finally, acquiring a high-precision rock classification and recognition deep learning model RockNet. The name and confidence of the rock type can be accurately predicted by applying the RockNet. Professional rock microscopic identification knowledge is not needed, the rock classification efficiency and accuracy (up to 98% or above) can be greatly improved, human errors are avoided, intelligence and automation of rock slice classification are promoted, and the method better serves geological teaching, scientific research and production.

title: Edge intelligent development suite for teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an edge intelligent development kit for teaching, and belongs to the field of teaching devices. The edge intelligent development suite for teaching comprises a display screen; the AI box is detachably connected to the display screen; wherein the AI box is internally provided with a main control board and a power supply part for providing power for the main control board; the fixing seat is detachably connected to the AI box; the camera part is rotationally connected to the fixed seat; wherein the camera part and the main control board are both in electric signal connection with the display screen; according to the utility model, the main control board, the display screen, the AI box and the wide-angle camera device are arranged, the functions are powerful, the interfaces are abundant, the design is simple, the devices are connected through threads, the structure is simple, the connection is stable, and the disassembly and assembly are convenient.

title: Oral English training method based on deep learning
applicants: JIANGSU XIFENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an oral English training method based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of English teaching. The training method comprises the following specific steps: (1) performing user registration and login and information protection; (2) judging the spoken language grade of the user; (3) setting a user expectation level; (4) collecting to-be-improved capability information; (5) sorting the data in the database; (6) specifying a learning plan; (7) collecting and correcting user defects; and (8) regularly updating the spoken language level of the user and intelligently making a learning plan; According to the method, the data stored in the database can be arranged in order, the probability of jamming during use of the user is reduced, the user experience is improved, disk resources are saved, time is saved, the learning plan of the user is intelligently modified, the user does not need to change the learning plan by himself, the oral English improving efficiency of the user is improved, and manpower is saved.

title: METHOD FOR OPERATING A VEHICLE
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for operating a vehicle comprising at least one electric machine designed as a drive unit, an internal combustion engine, and an electric energy storage system for the at least one electric machine designed as a drive unit. Using a method based on artificial intelligence, in particular an artificial neural network (NN1), in which the relationship between the efficiency of the internal combustion engine and the efficiency of the electric system, comprising the at least one electric machine designed as a drive unit and the electric energy storage system, is taken into consideration, an operating strategy (B) is determined for the vehicle, thereby optimizing the usage efficiency of the internal combustion engine and the electric system, and the vehicle is operated according to the operating strategy (B). The invention also relates to another method in addition thereto and to a method for teaching a neural network.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: TIANJIN KEDUODUO TECH CONSULTING SERVICE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine which comprises a machine body, a containing chamber is formed in the machine body, a display screen is arranged in the containing chamber, groove plates are arranged on the two sides of the inner wall of the containing chamber, sliding plates are fixedly connected to the two sides of the display screen, and a containing cavity is formed in a machine body shell. An inserting rod transversely penetrates through the interior of the containing cavity, one end of the inserting rod penetrates through a groove of the groove plate and then is fixedly connected with a trapezoidal block, clamping grooves are formed in the two sliding plates, the portion, located in the containing cavity, of the inserting rod is sleeved with a limiting plate, and the portion, located in the containing cavity, of the periphery of the inserting rod is sleeved with a spring. According to the teaching all-in-one machine, the display screen is movably arranged in the storage chamber, the display screen is stored in the storage chamber when the teaching all-in-one machine is idle, the display screen is protected through the machine body, the display screen is prevented from being collided when a student plays during logistics carrying or does not teach, the protection effect of the display screen is improved, and the probability that the display screen is collided is reduced.

title: Guiding robot for farming museum
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a navigation robot for a farming museum, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence equipment. A navigation robot for a farming museum comprises a box body, a motor and a driving motor, a display screen and a control panel are arranged at the front end of the box body, the control panel is arranged below the display screen, a sound outlet hole is formed in the rear end of the box body, a cross beam is fixedly installed at the rear end of the box body, a supporting frame is fixedly connected to the cross beam, and the supporting frame is fixedly connected to the motor. A head part is fixedly installed on the supporting frame, a camera is fixedly connected to the head part, mechanical arms are fixedly connected to the two sides of the box body, a plurality of connecting columns are fixedly connected to the bottom of the box body, a connecting shell is fixedly installed at the other ends of the connecting columns, and the motor is fixedly installed at the bottom of the connecting shell; the teaching aid can be used for explaining at a fixed point, is high in stability, and does not incline forwards or backwards or fall down.

title: Individual material teaching system
applicants: DONGGUAN ZHIJIE AUTOMATION MACHINE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education management, in particular to an individual material teaching system, which is used for investigating personal data of each enrollment student, knowing the preference, the advantages, the disadvantages and the character characteristics of each student, and combining different employment requirements of different occupations of an enterprise to realize individual material teaching. According to the invention, employment direction selection, professional selection and learning mode selection are carried out in combination with personal characteristics of students, and different assessment standards are established for different professional learning depth demands, so that the students can concentrate on learning in the skilled fields, and the employment demands of enterprises are combined to make the students more interested in learning. Students can learn according to corresponding requirements during school, professional deep learning is carried out according to different positions, and the students can better adapt to workplace life and requirements after graduation.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence laboratory
applicants: FUJIAN NEWLAND ERA HI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching device based on an artificial intelligence laboratory. The teaching device comprises a workbench and a dustproof cover. The dustproof cover is detachably arranged on the working table, an opening is formed in the side, facing the working table, of the dustproof cover, and a gasket is arranged on the opening; a mounting hole position for mounting a display is formed in the workbench, and the opening cover is arranged outside the mounting hole position; the first side, the second side and the third side of the mounting hole site are respectively provided with a positioning pin; the inner wall of the dustproof cover is provided with limiting assemblies in one-to-one correspondence with the positioning pins. The control end of the limiting assembly is located on the outer wall of the dust cover, and the limiting end of the limiting assembly is rotationally arranged on the inner wall of the dust cover. When the limiting end of the limiting assembly is buckled with the positioning pin, the gasket abuts against the workbench. The dustproof cover is convenient to disassemble and high in practicability.

title: Online teaching information pushing method based on interactive customization plan and system thereof
applicants: CHANGSHA DOUYA CULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online teaching information pushing method based on an interactive customization plan and system thereof, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the interactive customization data and training label information of a plurality of reference teaching objects, according to the interactive customization data of each reference teaching object, determining interaction intention features respectively corresponding to various interaction flow data of the reference teaching object under the interactive customization node responded by the reference teaching object, inputting the interaction intention features into a preset artificial intelligence learning network for transfer learning, and obtaining interest course decision information of the reference teaching object, and performing network convergence configuration on a preset artificial intelligence learning network according to the interest course decision information and the training label information to obtain an online teaching interest decision network. Therefore, depth features of various different interactive customization nodes can be learned, and online teaching information pushing on the target teaching object based on the online teaching interest decision network has higher prediction accuracy.

title: Learning behavior data mining method and system, storage medium and processing terminal
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a learning behavior data mining method and system, a storage medium and a processing terminal. The learning behavior data mining method comprises the steps that learning behavior data of students are collected in real time through an Elearn system, a series of operations are conducted on pdf teaching materials, and meanwhile operation information is uploaded to a server to be stored; serialization processing is carried out on the collected student learning behavior data, and the characteristics of the student learning behavior data are predicted by using a long-term and short-term attention network to obtain a student score prediction level; students are divided into excellent, good and qualified classes according to academic scores, a method based on vector quantization learning is used to supervise and cluster learning behavior data of the students with excellent and good grades, and excellent learning behaviors of the students are mined. The ELearn system is based on a design mode of Internet+artificial intelligence+education, the dependence of teaching on paper textbooks is eliminated, and the system can be accessed anytime and anywhere to carry out teaching and learning activities.

title: Fever management system for children with disabilities using deep learning method
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a fever management system for disabled children using a deep learning method. More specifically, according to the fever management system for disabled children using a deep learning method, in a management facility which manages disabled children, it is possible to determine the access status of disabled children entering and exiting the management facility. When only the fever state according to the physical condition of the disabled child entering and exiting the management facility is extracted and there is a disabled child in a high fever state, the fever management system informs teaching staff of the state of the disabled child and allows the teaching staff to take emergency measures quickly. To this end, the fever management system of the present invention includes a portable identifier (10), a heat sensing terminal (20), a management server (30), and a mobile app (40) for teaching staff.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching box
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and particularly provides an artificial intelligence teaching box, which comprises a box body, a box cover, a control mainboard, a chip seat, a universal meter module, a detection meter pen module, a first display screen and a second display screen, the box cover is hinged to the rear portion of the box body, the control mainboard is arranged in the box body, and the chip seat, the universal meter module, the first display screen and the detection meter pen module are all arranged above the box body and connected with the control mainboard. According to the utility model, through the above structure, the universal meter module and the detection meter pen module are arranged to realize the voltage and current acquisition function, and the chip seat is arranged to realize the external chip signal detection and acquisition function, so that the detection and acquisition functions of the universal meter module and the detection meter pen module can be realized, and the detection and acquisition functions of the universal meter module and the detection meter pen module can be realized. The problem that a modular and integrated teaching platform which can be used for primary and secondary school students does not exist in the prior art is solved.

title: PREDICTOR INTERACTIVE LEARNING SYSTEM, PREDICTOR INTERACTIVE LEARNING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: This predictor interactive learning system is provided with: a machine learning unit for performing machine learning of a predictor by teaching data and teaching labels that outputs a predicted value indicating the certainty of a prescribed intrinsic expression; an interest score calculation unit for obtaining, for each corpus word, an interest score by statistical data that relates to a corpus word that includes the predicted value of the predictor; an interactive learning unit frame unit for extracting a word by the interest score that constitutes the teaching data for the predictor that is used in the next learning; and a question-response unit for outputting a question of whether or not the extracted teaching data is an intrinsic expression the certainty of which is predicted by the predictor, and acquiring a teaching label that corresponds to the teaching data, as a response to the question. The machine learning unit performs machine learning of the predictor using the teaching data extracted by a teaching word extraction unit and the teaching label acquired by an interaction unit.

title: Voice-to-image generation method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a voice-to-image generation method and system, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a training data set, wherein the training data set comprises a Chinese corpus and an Oxford-102 flowers data set; preprocessing the Chinese corpus to obtain a spectrogram; training and optimizing an end-to-end convolutional neural network model by using the spectrogram; using the Oxford-102 flowers data set to train and optimize the deep convolutional generative adversarial network model; acquiring a voice signal of a teacher during teaching; preprocessing the voice signal to obtain a teaching spectrogram; inputting the teaching spectrogram into the optimized end-to-end convolutional neural network model to obtain a teaching text; and inputting a teaching text into the optimized deep convolutional generative adversarial network model to generate a teaching image. According to the invention, voice signals during teaching of a teacher in a classroom can be converted into images.

title: Provincial education quality management and control system based on artificial intelligence big data
applicants: ANHUI TINGFU TAIKE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a provincial education quality management and control system based on artificial intelligence big data, and relates to the technical field of big data analysis. The system comprises a data server, a quality control model, a Bluetooth device and an intelligent terminal. The data server comprises a database and a registration module. The quality control model is connected with the data server through the interaction module; the quality control model comprises an input object module, an education and teaching activity module, an internalization training module and a result output module. The quality control model is input by formulating the related characteristics of the input object, the expected output result is obtained by utilizing internalization training, the corresponding index copying model is constructed according to one or more diagnosis indexes, the education quality diagnosis information is generated and displayed through the intelligent terminal, and the accuracy and efficiency of education quality diagnosis are improved.

title: Artificial intelligence online teaching interaction method and system, storage medium and related equipment
applicants: SHANGHAI SQUIRREL CLASSROOM ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of online network education, in particular to an artificial intelligence online teaching interaction method and system, a storage medium and related equipment, and aims to know learning dynamics and learning effects of students in real time, quickly and timely monitor and remind the students, specifically manage and control learning behaviors of the students, the learning efficiency of students is improved, the teaching quality of teachers on online courses is improved, and the interaction between the students and the teachers is enhanced. The invention comprises the artificial intelligence online teaching interaction method, an artificial intelligence online teaching interaction server, an artificial intelligence online teaching interaction terminal, an artificial intelligence online teaching interaction system, a computer storage medium and computer equipment.

title: Provincial education teaching evaluation system based on artificial intelligence big data
applicants: ANHUI TINGFU TAIKE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a provincial education teaching evaluation system based on artificial intelligence big data, and relates to the technical field of big data analysis. The system comprises a database, a data acquisition unit, a query statistics unit, a comprehensive evaluation unit and a system maintenance unit, wherein the data acquisition unit comprises a data acquisition module, a data preprocessing module and a multi-source conversion module; the query statistics unit comprises a query module and a statistics module; the comprehensive evaluation unit comprises a decision tree module and a classification module; and the system maintenance unit comprises a user management module and a data management module. A large amount of data related to education and teaching and corresponding evaluation results are recorded through the system database, the decision tree algorithm is adopted to associate behaviors and results to construct the classification model, and the evaluation results are made for the preprocessed classification data according to the classification model, so that time and labor consumption of manual evaluation is avoided. And the education teaching evaluation accuracy and efficiency are improved.

title: Multifunctional intelligent glasses
abstract_text: The invention provides multifunctional intelligent glasses, which belongs to the technical field of glasses, and aims to solve the problems that existing glasses are single in function and cannot realize intelligent information interaction. Themultifunctional intelligent glasses comprise a glass frame and lenses, and the glass frame is provided with a camera module, a Bluetooth module, a bone conduction sound transmission module, a voice system module, a positioning module, an AR/VR module, a storage battery, a wireless charging module and a central processing unit module. The camera module, an optometry module, a Bluetooth module, a bone conduction sound transmission module, a voice system module, a positioning module, an AR/VR module, a storage battery, a wireless charging module and a central processing unit module are arranged on a glasses frame which accords with ergonomics and is manufactured through 3D printing, and visual system protection, artificial intelligence interaction, remote consultation guidance teaching and the like are achieved on the same glasses.

title: Multimedia teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: SHENZHEN ZHONGSHI LIHE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a multimedia teaching all-in-one machine, which comprises a support, a shell, a display screen and a storage box, the support is connected with the storage box, the center of the outer side of the storage box is connected with a button lock through a clamping groove, a storage groove is integrally formed in the inner side of the storage box, and the upper side of the storage box is provided with the shell. One side of the shell is connected with a display screen in a pressing mode through screws, and loudspeakers are symmetrically arranged on the upper side of the shell. The multimedia teaching all-in-one machine is further provided with an artificial intelligence module, a camera, a loudspeaker and a voice collector, so that the device can perform intelligent dialogue with students, the classroom teaching atmosphere is activated, the teaching effect is further improved, through arrangement of a balancing weight, after the bottom plate is placed on the ground, the lower side of the bottom plate has a good balancing weight effect, and the teaching effect is improved. And therefore, the stability of the bottom plate is greatly improved, and the all-in-one machine is prevented from being easily rollover and damaged.

title: Artificial intelligence teacher training workbench
applicants: ANHUI QINGXIAO FANGTANG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence teacher training workbench which comprises a bottom plate, a machine frame is fixed on the bottom plate, a writing board is fixed on the machine frame and used for writing and teaching, a classification groove is vertically fixed at the side end of one side of the writing board, the classification groove is divided into a plurality of independent storage areas through partition plates, the independent storage areas are used for being taken and stored conveniently, and therefore the teaching efficiency is improved. Meanwhile, a projection curtain is arranged on the front side of the writing board, an unfolding and folding mechanism is arranged on the writing board and used for unfolding and folding the projection curtain, and an automatic telescopic suction mechanism is arranged on the rear side of the writing board so that the writing board can automatically stretch out and be sucked to the wall body, and therefore the training workbench can be flexibly and automatically adjusted and stably sucked to the rear side wall body, and convenient and stable use is facilitated; therefore, high-efficiency and high-quality teaching training output is realized.

title: AI-based remote intelligent vehicle experiment platform and experiment method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based remote intelligent vehicle experiment platform and experiment method. The experiment platform comprises a local experiment end, a remote intelligent vehicle platform and a communication medium, and the local experiment end comprises a local experiment tool and a local debugger; wherein the remote intelligent vehicle platform comprises a vehicle-mounted debugger, a vehicle-mounted controller, a vehicle-mounted driving unit, a vehicle-mounted signal acquisition unit, an intelligent vehicle body and a power supply system. The vehicle body assembly vehicle-mounted controller and the local experiment tool of the intelligent vehicle are separated, the vehicle body assembly and a necessary training map can be placed in a large-area special laboratory with conditions, and an experimenter can debug and control the intelligent vehicle at any place with network signals only by carrying the portable local experiment tool and the local debugger. Therefore, the original closed-loop control data link is actually reserved, the local core controller can directly transmit and receive control instructions and feed back motion information and video data, wiring is simple, operation is convenient, and remote teaching and online experiments can be conveniently carried out.

title: Online education system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: QIANYI CHENGDU BIG DATA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education system based on artificial intelligence, belongs to the technical field of online education, and aims to solve the problem of how to improve the knowledge weakness of students and the problem that the students feel boring and have no attraction in the learning process. The system comprises a server, a pet module, a registration and login module, a storage module, a homework module, a heightening module, a live broadcast module and a course shopping mall module, the homework module comprises an arrangement unit, a reply unit, a correction unit, a language unit and an error question bank, voice content is input in homework by using the language unit, students are helped to further understand the homework content, and reference contents can be provided, the students can be helped to learn, knowledge weakness parts of the students can be improved in a targeted manner through a heightening module, teachers can be helped to more intuitively understand the knowledge weakness parts of the students according to the priority value Qi, teaching of the weakness parts of the students can be enhanced in a targeted manner, and comprehensive development of the students can be promoted.

title: Translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses a translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching, and belongs to the technical field of translation equipment. The translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching comprises a box body; a suction cup is fixedly arranged on the rear wall of a base; a threaded rod is inserted into a threaded seat; a rod groove is formed in the position, opposite to the threaded rod, of the front wall of the base; a limiting block is fixedly arranged on the bottom face of the rod groove; a limiting groove is formed in the position, opposite to the limiting block, of the bottom face of the threaded rod; a cavity is formed in the middle of the front wall of the box body; a box cover is hinged to the front end of the bottom face of the cavity through a hinge shaft; the hinge shaft is symmetrically sleeved with two torsion springs; a U-shaped pull rod is fixedly arranged at the upper end of the front wall of the box cover; two inserting blocks are symmetrically inserted into the two sides of the box body; inserting grooves are formed in the positions, opposite to the inner side ends of the inserting blocks, of the outer wall of the box cover; two extension springs are symmetrically and fixedly arranged between the inner side walls of the rear ends of the inserting blocks and the outer wall of the box body; and a storage assembly is arranged in the cavity. According to the translation device for artificial intelligence interactive teaching, students and teachers can store and use a translation pen main body conveniently, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: FEDERATED TEACHER-STUDENT MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: A node for a federated machine learning system that comprises the node and one or more other nodes configured for the same machine learning task, the node comprising:a federated student machine learning network configured to update a machine learning model in dependence upon updated machine learning models of the one ormore node;a teacher machine learning network;means for receiving unlabeled data;means for teaching, using supervised learning, at least the federated first machine learning network using the teacher machine learning network, wherein the teacher machine learning network is configured to receive the data and produce pseudo labels for supervised learning using the data and wherein the federated student machine learning network is configured to perform supervised learning in dependence upon the same received data and the pseudo-labels.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching control system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, in particular to an artificial intelligence teaching control system. Comprising a signal input module, a signal processing module, a signal output module and an expansion module, the signal input module is connected with the signal processing module through a PH2.0 fool-proof interface, the signal processing module is connected with the signal output module through a PH2.0 fool-proof interface, the signal processing module is connected with the expansion module through a PH2.0 fool-proof interface, and the signal output module is connected with the expansion module through a PH2.0 fool-proof interface. The expansion module comprises an expansion bag, an expansion device and a Lego standard piece. The expansion device and the Lego standard piece are connected with the expansion bag through a PH2.0 fool-proof interface. According to the system, the building efficiency of an artificial intelligence hardware platform can be effectively improved, and function expansion in the artificial intelligence teaching process can be met.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, in particular to an artificial intelligence teaching device. Which comprises a device body, a main processing module is arranged on the device body, a co-processing module is mounted in the device body, and is characterized in that the main processing module and the co-processing module are in interactive communication, a steering engine module and a mounting bracket are arranged on the device body, the main processing module is mounted on the steering engine module, and the co-processing module is mounted on the mounting bracket. The device body is further provided with a sensing module, a communication module and a motor module, and the sensing module, the communication module and the motor driving module are all electrically connected with the co-processing module. According to the device, hardware of an Android mobile phone is used as hardware resources of artificial intelligence, and high economical efficiency and function expansion are achieved.

title: English teaching interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an English teaching interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: calculating the pronunciation complementation characteristics of any two students, taking the pronunciation complementation characteristics as the size of a node, constructing a first graph data structure, determining sets corresponding to all maximal cliques, extracting students belonging to a plurality of sets at the same time to form a set X, reconstructing, after the students in the set X are removed, a second graph data structure, obtaining a set Y, calculating the fitness of the students and the set Y, obtaining a grouping set of each student in the set X, selecting an element at random from each grouping set to form a grouping strategy, calculating the sum of the fitness of the multiple elements in the grouping strategy, selecting the grouping strategy corresponding to the maximum value of the sum of the fitness as an optimal grouping strategy, and formulating a corresponding teaching interaction strategy. According to the scheme, the students can be better grouped, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Platform management system for smart campus
applicants: HUBEI CHUXUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a smart campus platform management system, which comprises an application module, a basic platform and a user control module, wherein the application module comprises an intelligent office unit, a teaching quality monitoring unit, an intelligent course selection and arrangement unit, an intelligent course arrangement unit, a school book course selection unit, an examination management unit, a personalized learning unit and an artificial intelligence academic early warning unit; the basic platform comprises a student information unit and a teacher information unit; the user control module is divided into a manager module, a teacher user module, a student user module and a parent user module, and the user control module is used through the basic platform and controls the application module. The teaching efficiency of teachers and the learning efficiency of students are improved, and use is more convenient.

title: REAL TIME MONITORING OF CLASSWORK: “TELESCRIPTSCORRECTION”
abstract_text: REAL TIME MONITORING OF CLASSWORK: "TELESCRIPTSCORRECTION": This invention discloses the Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things based device "REAL TIME MONITORING OF CLASSWORK: "TELESCRIPTSCORRECTION" (100) interchangeably called 'telescriptcorrector' wherein the device provides the expedient solution to the lack of one to one correction by the teacher on the hardcopy of notebook (107) at the student site (110) during online teaching. The 'telescriptcorrector' empower the real time monitoring of and editing on the notebooks of students. The 'telescriptcorrector' exploit the collaborative competence of Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence. REAL TIME MONITORING OF CLASSWORK: "TELESCRIPTSCORRECTION" Scanner with Hardcopy of Compute r or high resolution notebook (107) hand held touch camera (101) sc reen (105) Telecorrector Robotic arm Switch button pen (102) (103) Pen or Pencil (106) Pen to write on touch screen (104) Student Site Teacher site Data (108) Data (108) Cloud Storage (112) CludCursor (113) Artificial Intelligence based Algorithm (109)

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DYNAMIC ROBOT CONFIGURATION FOR ENHANCED DIGITAL EXPERIENCES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for configuring an animatronic device. Information is received about performance of a user exhibited in a dialogue between the user and an animatronic device which conducts the dialogue with the user in accordance with a configuration. The effectiveness of the configuration with respect to the user is assessed based on the information about the performance of the user and is used for machine learning at least one model, which is then used to adjust the configuration to generate an updated configuration for the animatronic device to use to continue the dialogue.

title: Intelligent home control device based on deep learning
applicants: GUANGDONG VOCATIONAL COLLEGE POST AND TELECOM
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent home control device based on deep learning, which comprises a device main body, a middle movable part of the device main body is provided with a lifting panel, and the bottom surface of the lifting panel is fixedly provided with two lifting columns. The bottom end of the lifting stand column is movably inserted into the device body, a threaded sleeve is arranged on the outer side of the bottom end of the lifting stand column, sleeve turbines are fixedly installed on the outer surface of the threaded sleeve, a lifting worm is installed on one sides of the two sleeve turbines, and a transmission gear is fixedly installed on the outer side of the middle of the lifting worm. A lifting motor gear is installed below the transmission gear, and a lifting motor is fixed to one end of the lifting motor gear. According to the intelligent household control device, by installing the rotating panel, the connecting supporting rod, the adjusting sliding block and the adjusting screw rod, a user can conveniently and clearly display components in the intelligent household control device, teaching is facilitated, students can watch the components conveniently, and the teaching quality is effectively improved.

title: AI-based teaching promotion technology implementation method
applicants: SHANGHAI SHENRUI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based teaching promotion technology implementation method. The AI-based teaching promotion technology implementation method comprises the following specific steps: step 1, a client program is started and run; step 2, a client program collects a current student learning state picture through a camera; step 3, the client program identifies the state picture through a CNN model and analyzes the current learning state of the student; step 4, the client main body supervises the student through loudspeaker voice; according to the AI-based teaching improvement technology implementation method, the current learning attitude of the student can be supervised in real time, the student with the poor learning attitude can be reminded, effective correction can be made, teachers and parents can know the learning state and the improvement scheme of the student after the curriculum is finished, and the purposes that network teaching is no longer blind, students do not have problems controlled in learning any more, education expenditure can be saved, the use mode is simple, and use is convenient.

title: Visual positioning error detection method and device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a visual positioning error detection method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a physical positioning pose true value of an object determined according to information collected by a physical positioning part under a first timestamp in a positioning process, and obtaining a visual positioning pose prediction value of the object predicted according to visual information collected by a visual positioning part; obtaining a physical teaching pose true value of the object determined according to the information collected by the physical positioning component under a second timestamp corresponding to the first timestamp in the teaching process, and obtaining a visual teaching pose prediction value of the object predicted according to the visual information collected by the visual positioning component; calculating a conversion relation between the physical positioning pose truth value and the physical teaching pose truth value; and detecting a positioning error of the visual positioning pose predicted value according to the conversion relation and the visual teaching pose predicted value. The scheme provided by the embodiment of the invention can be applied to detecting the visual positioning error in an unknown environment.

title: Tabletop game teaching aid including a plurality of control cards, a plurality of map cards and a self-propelled moving device
abstract_text: Disclosed is a tabletop game teaching aid suitable for a mobile device, which includes a plurality of control cards, a plurality of map cards and a self-propelled moving device. The mobile device executes a corresponding application program to establish a connection with a communication unit of the self-propelled moving device, the application program includes a supervised machine learning model, and the mobile device retrieves one of control card images from the control cards, and inputs the control card image into the supervised machine learning model to generate a control card command corresponding to the control card, then transmit the control card command to the communication unit of the self-propelled moving device, so as to control a drive unit of the self-propelled moving device to move or rotate.

title: Comprehensive teaching management system
applicants: DONGGUAN ZHIJIE AUTOMATION MACHINE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education, in particular to a comprehensive teaching management system, which is used for promoting learning of students through an individual material teaching system during the school, and knowing the preference, the advantages, the disadvantages and the character characteristics of each student, enabling employment direction selection, specialty selection and learning mode selection by combining different employment demands of different occupations of enterprises and personal characteristics of the students, and establishing different assessment standards are established; thus, the students can concentrate on learning in the skilled field, meanwhile, the employment demands of the enterprise are combined, the students can learn according to corresponding requirements during school, and professional deep learning can be carried out according to different positions. The students carry out personal vocational literacy improvement through a vocational literacy improvement system, the comprehensive ability of the students is improved, the students are more suitable for the requirements of enterprises after graduation, the students can obtain related assistance through the support service system after graduation, the students can better adapt to the society, and the students are helped to grow.

title: Intelligent digital education AI classroom big data management system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent digital education AI classroom big data management system, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching. The system comprises a background login module, a password input module, a judgment module, a teaching plan import module, a learning content generation module, a learning database, a display module, a test paper generation test module, a test question bank, an evaluation module, an information input module, a video monitoring module, a data integration module, a storage module and a feedback module. According to the invention, a teaching scheme can be prevented from being introduced disorderly, so the teaching scheme is ensured to be pure, the learning content can be managed, the AI classroom big data management is comprehensive, the teaching aiding purpose can be achieved, the teaching effect can be improved, the evaluation of students and teachers can be objective, the data reference value of the management system can be improved, and wide popularization is facilitated. Parents can conveniently master learning conditions of students in real time, and teachers can conveniently improve teaching methods.

title: Online course teaching quality evaluation method and device
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an online course teaching quality evaluation method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining video data of an online course, wherein the video data comprises a to-be-evaluated object; performing artificial intelligence processing on the video data to obtain multiple pieces of feature data; inputting the plurality of feature data into a pre-trained evaluation model; and obtaining an evaluation result obtained by the evaluation model based on the multiple pieces of feature data. According to the implementation scheme, the class process of the to-be-evaluated object is subjected to datamation processing, multiple pieces of feature data are extracted based on the class video data, the evaluation result of the to-be-evaluated object is obtained in combination with the pre-trained evaluation model. The method is high in efficiency and high in applicability. Based on the control of the training data of the model and the appropriate selection of the training model, the accuracy of the evaluation result can also be ensured.

title: Red party building base audio-visual device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a red party building base audio-visual device based on artificial intelligence, which comprises an audio-visual device body, a display screen is arranged at the upper end of the audio-visual device body, and control keys are respectively arranged below the display screen. The red party building base audio-visual device based on artificial intelligence improves the service level and party building work efficiency, improves the result of the informatization and intelligence level of party building work, has the characteristics of openness, interactivity, convenience and the like, and has the advantages of real-time updating, large information amount, wide coverage, rapid propagation, comprehensive functions, low cost and the like; the device is novel in appearance, complies with the trend of the times, integrates efficient, convenient and scientific means such as the Internet, a mobile terminal and a remote education system, innovatively carries out college grassroots party building work from multiple angles and multiple fields, innovates teaching content, improves the teaching effect, and is suitable for popularization and application. And the working quality of college grassroots party construction is further enhanced and improved.

title: Automatic driving experiment teaching method, vehicle model and system
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence experiment teaching, in particular to an automatic driving experiment teaching method, a vehicle model and a system. The experiment teaching system comprises an experiment teaching vehicle model, a road model, a training server and a terminal device. In a data acquisition mode, the terminal device is used for providing a user control instruction; the experiment teaching vehicle model is used for collecting image information and sensor data in a moving process; and the training server is used for training a machine learning model through training data. In an automatic driving mode, the training server is used for providing a trained machine learning model; and the experiment teaching vehicle model is used for simulating automatic driving in the road model through the trained machine learning model. The system simulates the implementation process of automatic driving through the vehicle model, the road model and the like, and is beneficial for students to comprehensively learn and understand the specific application of the system.

title: Big data and artificial intelligence teaching training platform based on computer
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a big data and artificial intelligence teaching training platform based on a computer, which comprises a cabinet body, a working table top and supporting rods, the bottom of the cabinet body is fixedly provided with walking wheels, the two sides of the bottom of the cabinet body are fixedly provided with supporting blocks through screws, the top of the cabinet body is fixedly provided with the working table top, and the working table top is fixedly provided with the supporting rods. A push rod is fixedly installed on one side of the working table top, a sliding rod and a supporting rod are sequentially and fixedly installed on the top of the working table top, a transverse gear is rotatably installed in the first installation cavity through a longitudinal gear, and a manual control rotating disc connected with the longitudinal gear is fixedly installed on the front face of the first installation cavity. And a screw rod extending into the first mounting cavity is fixedly mounted in the second mounting cavity. According to the utility model, through the walking wheels, the screw rods, the supporting blocks and the push rods, the artificial intelligence teaching practical training platform can meet the operation requirements of a user for moving back and forth in different operation places, and the application range of the practical training platform is widened.

title: Visual teaching aid for animal breeding teaching
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of remote teaching, and particularly relates to a visual teaching aid for animal breeding teaching, which comprises a cloud processor, a data acquisition module and VR glasses, the cloud processor is electrically connected with the data acquisition module through a wireless transmission module, the wireless transmission module is electrically connected with the VR glasses, and the data acquisition module is electrically connected with the VR glasses. Breeding scenes of a farm are shot in real time through the remote shooting and recording module, shot data are transmitted to the VR glasses in real time through the wireless transmission module for practical training teaching, the VR glasses are effectively combined with artificial intelligence and virtual reality of the cloud processor, and real-time dynamic connection between a school theory classroom and an enterprise farm is achieved. Visual teaching of factory real scenes is achieved, situational teaching and project teaching are facilitated, seamless joint of production practice and classroom teaching is achieved, the practicability and effectiveness of teaching are improved, and the outgoing practice cost and the risk in the practice period are reduced.

title: IDENTIFICATION DEVICE, PROCESSING DEVICE, PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: An identification device that identifies types of paper sheets, the device being such that: a plurality of parameters, including a parameter pertaining to the characteristics of the paper sheets, are acquired by a sensor; and the type of paper sheet is identified on the basis of the result of the plurality of parameters acquired by the sensor being inputted to an estimation model obtained through machine learning in which parameters that correspond to parameters acquired by the sensor and include a first parameter and a second parameter, which are sorted according to whether there is a tendency for the value of the parameter to change due to prescribed factors, are used as input data, and in which the type of paper sheet in instances where these parameters are obtained are used as teaching data. The estimation model includes a first partial model to which the first parameter is inputted, a second partial model to which the second parameter is inputted, and a third partial model that outputs a result pertaining to the type of the paper sheet on the basis of the output of the first partial model and the output of the second partial model.

title: Artificial intelligence command device for vocal music teaching based on VR technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence command device for vocal music teaching based on a VR technology, which comprises a central processing unit and a wireless receiving module, two output ends of the central processing unit are respectively connected with an image display module and a loudspeaker, the input end of the central processing unit is connected with a microphone, and the wireless receiving module is bidirectionally connected with the central processing unit. The invention relates to the technical field of VR. According to the artificial intelligence command device for vocal music teaching based on the VR technology, the image display module is used for playing vocal music related videos to provide learning and reference for students, and the wireless receiving module is used for transmitting sound data generated when the students watch images, and a vocal music side test module is used for testing and judging the pronunciation of the student and judging whether the pronunciation of the student is standard or not, so that the vocal music teaching effect is improved, the student can master knowledge related to vocal music more quickly, and the practicability of the artificial intelligence is improved.

title: Multifunctional media intelligent teaching platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent teaching equipment, and provides a multifunctional media intelligent teaching platform based on artificial intelligence. The teaching platform comprises a table body, a multimedia display and a loudspeaker microphone, the table body is a hollow structure, and a plurality of partition plates for dividing the internal space of the table body into an accommodating cavity, a host cavity, a platform storage cavity and a mounting cavity are arranged in the table body; and a lifting mechanism capable of driving a multimedia displayer to ascend and descend is arranged in the accommodating cavity, a protection mechanism capable of covering the loudspeaker microphone is arranged at the top of the table body, a rolling mechanism capable of covering the accommodating cavity is further arranged in the accommodating cavity, an extension table sliding with the table storage cavity is arranged in the table storage cavity, and the extension table is divided into an upper cavity and a lower cavity. A placing mechanism is arranged in the upper cavity, and a linkage mechanism capable of enabling the extension table to slide out of the table body is arranged at the inner bottom of the table storage cavity. The multifunctional media intelligent teaching platform based on artificial intelligence provided by the invention meets dual-purpose requirements of modern teaching, has multiple functions, and improves the practicability of equipment.

title: Artificial intelligence-based vocational education teaching resource management method and system
abstract_text: The invention provides a vocational education teaching resource management method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a main classification set; obtaining titles of courseware to be classified and obtaining main categories corresponding to the titles; obtaining an area average proportion of an image region of the courseware to be classified and an area average proportion of a text region, and obtaining image-text features of the courseware to be classified; identifying text information and image information in the courseware to be classified to obtain themes in the theme set corresponding to the main classification involved in the courseware to be classified, and obtaining relevancy between each theme and the courseware to be classified and distribution characteristics of each theme; establishing a feature matrix of the courseware according to the graphic and text features of the courseware to be classified, the relevancy between the courseware and the themes and the distribution features of the themes, and classifying the style of the courseware to be classified according to the feature matrix. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, the problem that teaching materials suitable for teachers and students are inconvenient to query due to non-detailed classification of the teaching materials can be solved.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, DATA PROCESSING SYSTEM, MACHINE LEARNING METHOD, AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: A machine learning device according to an embodiment may include: a state variable acquisition unit that acquires first and second state variable datasets including print results performed at first and second printing speeds respectively by an image formation apparatus; a teaching data acquisition unit that acquires first and second teaching data corresponding to the first and second printing speeds; and a learned model generation unit that generates a first learned model by performing machine learning based on the first state variable dataset and the first teaching data, and generates a second learned model by performing machine learning based on the second state variable dataset and the second teaching data. Each of the first and second state variable datasets includes: feature value information; medium information; and first control information. Each of the first and second teaching data includes: second control information; and a print defect value.

title: INTERACTIVE OBJECT SELECTION
abstract_text: A computer-implemented method of machine-learning including obtaining a dataset of 3D point clouds. Each 3D point cloud includes at least one object. Each 3D point cloud is equipped with a specification of one or more graphical user-interactions each representing a respective selection operation of a same object in the 3D point cloud. The method further includes teaching, based on the dataset, a neural network configured for segmenting an input 3D point cloud including an object. The segmenting is based on the input 3D point cloud and on a specification of one or more input graphical user-interactions each representing a respective selection operation of the object in the 3D point cloud.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR GENERATING PERSONALIZED ASSIGNMENT ASSETS FOR FOREIGN LANGUAGES
abstract_text: Methods and systems are provided for personalizing foreign language instruction. In particular, the systems and methods provided apply artificial intelligence to novel tasks related to teaching foreign languages such as detecting skill levels of users, generating personalized course curriculums for individual users based on the learning goals and initial skill level of a user, generating custom assignment assets for those goals based on current strengths, weakness, generating content for custom questions for those assignment assets, and dynamically tracking and updating the skill level of the user during the course.

title: Multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education
applicants: HUBEI UNIV OF TECHNOLOGY ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY COLLEGE
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education, which comprises a protective shell, a sound box main body and a loudspeaker, the sound box main body is placed in the upper end of the protective shell, the right end of the protective shell is provided with a limiting groove, the left end of the protective shell is hinged with a sealing plate, the left end of the sealing plate is embedded with a limiting strip, and the limiting strip is connected with the loudspeaker. A storage frame is placed in the lower end of the protective shell, a partition plate is fixedly connected to the back of the storage frame, a limiting rod is integrally connected to the front lower end of the protective shell, a mounting plate is fixedly connected to the right end of the protective shell, and a winding roller is rotatably connected to the inner end of the mounting plate; and a cable is connected to the winding roller in a winding mode, a worm gear is fixedly connected to the front end of the winding roller, and the lower end of the worm gear makes contact with the worm. According to the multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education, cable scattering is prevented, dust prevention and protection are carried out on the sound box, and teaching articles are convenient to store.

title: Vocational education teaching auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence and big data
abstract_text: The invention provides a vocational education aided teaching system based on artificial intelligence and big data.
