The vocational education aided teaching system comprises an image acquisition module, a student posture confidence acquisition module, a student posture abnormity judgment module and a student violation recognition module; wherein the image acquisition module is used for acquiring images of students in a classroom, the student posture confidence acquisition module is used for acquiring confidence of the students according to postures of the students in the images, and the student posture abnormality judgment module is used for judging whether the postures of the students are abnormal or not according to the confidence of the students. The student violation identification module is used for judging whether the student violates a rule according to whether the posture of the student is abnormal. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, the problem of poor accuracy of a result of judging whether the student violates the rule or not in the prior art can be solved.

title: Personalized online interactive education method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SUZHOU XINGXIN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personalized online interactive education method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: a user client is in communication connection with a cloud platform, a user watches a teaching video of a content library of the cloud platform through the client, and the client sends a learning label corresponding to the teaching video to a learning capability evaluation module of the cloud platform. The method has sufficient interactivity, can individually recommend learning routes, improves the teaching effect, and reduces the strict degree of participation time requirements of learners and teachers.

title: Virtual campus multi-dimensional electronic fence and student activity management system
applicants: CHENGDU MUYUNREN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual campus multi-dimensional electronic fence and student activity management system, and belongs to the technical field of computers and artificial intelligence. Te system comprises a virtual campus multi-dimensional electronic fence part and a student activity management system part. According to the virtual campus multi-dimensional electronic fence, the time period position and altitude information of in-campus activities of students are collected through a special student mobile terminal, and the electronic fence divided into time periods, scenes, sites, buildings, floors and rooms is intelligently constructed by combining the terminal and using the school, the teaching class, the class schedule, the work and rest time table and the like where the students are located. The student activity management system comprises a special student mobile terminal, a conventional campus activity module, a school function module, a parent function module and an off-campus activity virtual electronic fence module; when the terminal student user makes an unconventional campus activity in a school, the system sends alarm information to the school function module and the parent function module.; when the terminal student user exceeds/enters the out-of-school activity virtual electronic fence module forbidding range/forbidding place set by the parents in the out-of-school activity, the system sends alarm information to the parent function module. According to the invention, late arrival, early leaving, class evasion, learning evasion, emergencies and the like of students can be intervened in time by families and schools, the students can be limited to be forbidden to go out of or go into the forbidden range and forbidden place set by parents in activities outside the schools, and the growth safety and life safety of the students and children are effectively guaranteed.

title: Teaching system based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and storage medium
applicants: QINGDAO HAIKE INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education, and discloses a teaching system based on artificial intelligence, computer equipment and a storage medium. The teaching system based on artificial intelligence comprises a user identity registration and login module, a user level selection module, a central control module, a preliminary evaluation module, a learning weak point determination module, a teaching module, an image acquisition module, an image analysis module, a learning monitoring module, a learning process scoring module, an evaluation module, a teaching evaluation module and a teaching adjustment module. According to the invention, the learning state of the student is automatically determined according to the facial expression of the student based on the preset artificial intelligence algorithm model by obtaining the influence of the learning state of the student on the facial image information; learning contents of the students are determined according to information such as learning states of the students, so that the students can learn conveniently and efficiently; evaluation and teaching quality evaluation are carried out for learning of students, and adaptive evaluation of teaching can be carried out.

title: Omnibearing multifunctional intelligent programming teaching system based on artificial intelligence driving
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching systems, in particular to an omnibearing multifunctional intelligent programming teaching system based on artificial intelligence driving, which comprises a course teaching module used for playing teaching materials of programming knowledge to students; a knowledge test module which is used for providing programming knowledge test questions for investigating the understanding and mastering degree of the students on the content principle of the learned programming knowledge; a scene application module used for providing scene application test questions for investigating the application, practice and problem solving capabilities of the students on the learned programming knowledge; an automatic scoring module used for automatically scoring programming knowledge test questions and scene application test questions made by the students; a personalized feedback module used for providing an instant feedback report for the students according to an automatic scoring result of the automatic scoring module; and a personalized content pushing module used for recommending personalized learning contents to the students. The omnibearing multifunctional intelligent programming teaching system based on artificial intelligence driving has the advantage of omni-directional and multifunctional programming teaching.

title: Artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system, and the system comprises a teaching interaction end which is used for receiving a learning task triggered by a student, and transmitting a triggering instruction to a cloud end; and the cloud end which is used for receiving the trigger instruction of the teaching interaction end and performing verification according to the trigger instruction of the teaching interaction end, and issuing a teaching task execution instruction to the teaching interaction end according to the verification result, wherein the teaching interaction end executes the teaching task according to the teaching task execution instruction. The invention provides an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system, which is used for providing a one-to-one intelligent online education system, so that one-to-one tutoring and teaching can be performed on students in an online education process, and a teaching mode is adjusted in time according to learning conditions of the students by utilizing an artificial intelligence mode. And the purpose of intelligently performing classroom questioning and tutoring on the students is achieved.

title: Video information acquisition method and image processing system for teaching evaluation
applicants: NANJING BAILUNSI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a video information acquisition method and an image processing system for teaching evaluation. The method comprises the steps: obtaining video data in a real-time scene in an application process through video information acquisition equipment, and transmitting the video data to a data storage server through compression after the video data passes through a temporary cache region; constructing a teaching evaluation index system; acquiring corresponding video data stored in the data storage server according to user terminal requirements; extracting data features in the corresponding video data; fusing the various data features, classifying teaching evaluation behaviors, and obtaining a final evaluation result; and intelligently recommending a matched course according to the final evaluation result. According to the method, the features of artificial intelligence and the theory of teaching behavior analysis are combined, teaching data are automatically collected and coded by using an intelligent technology, classroom teaching behaviors are more comprehensively identified, classroom teaching is automatically analyzed and visually presented, and powerful support is provided for improving the teaching quality.

title: High-voltage substation analogue simulation training operation system based on VR
applicants: SHIJIAZHUANG POWER SUPPLY BRANCH CO STATE GRID HEBEI ELECTRIC POWER CO
abstract_text: The invention discloses a high-voltage substation analogue simulation training operation system based on VR. In the invention, the system environment has three basic characteristics of immersion, interactivity and conception. The courseware is made by using a virtual technology, so that the power transformation operation and maintenance personnel can safely operate in a virtual experiment environment and can also repeatedly perform multiple times of training, the training quality and efficiency are effectively improved, and the power transformation operation and maintenance personnel are helped to quickly improve professional skills; the development depth, breadth and fineness of VR training curriculum development are expanded, and according to the VR curriculum development requirements of'emphasizing effect, strong teaching, multiple functions and systematization ', intelligent substation power transformation operation and maintenance technology improvement is taken as an entry point, modern information technologies such as computer graphics and images, three-dimensional simulation, virtual reality, data analysis and artificial intelligence are fused with adult education technologies and power enterprise talent training practices, and a new mode of talent training of high-end learning experience and focusing on exploration of VR skills is created.

title: Power distribution teaching device with industrial artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG ZHANHANG AUTOMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a power distribution teaching device with industrial artificial intelligence. The device comprises a platform layer, a network layer and a sensing layer. The platform layer is used for carrying out safety monitoring on field equipment and analyzing equipment operation states, electric energy efficiency and energy-saving measures through centralized processing of information; the network layer is used for sending related control information of the platform layer to the sensing layer, receiving information transmitted by the sensing layer and uploading the information to the platform layer through a wired or wireless communication network and a concentrator; and the sensing layer is used for completing collection of field electric power parameters and state parameters, performing signal processing and enabling objects to be connected through a network through a sensing recognition technology. Teaching diversification is realized, and students are enabled to deeply understand professional knowledge while practical skills of the students are cultivated.

title: Intelligent auxiliary method and system for improving safety of laparoscopic cholecystectomy
applicants: CHENGDU YURUI INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent auxiliary method and system for improving the safety of laparoscopic cholecystectomy, and the method comprises the steps: inputting an image collected in real time into an artificial intelligence computer model through a laparoscope for processing, and obtaining the quantitative data of operation elements; inputting the operation elements into the safe operation model for analysis, and outputting a guidance element anatomical structure real-time mark and a CVS real-time score for reducing the iatrogenic biliary tract injury; and a surgeon performs a surgical operation according to the indication of the anatomical structure real-time mark and the CVS real-time score. The system is used in combination with a laparoscope machine used in the current market, intelligent evaluation and feedback of important intraoperative anatomical information and CVS completion conditions are provided, hospitalized doctors and specialist doctors can be helped to establish intraoperative safe operation consciousness in teaching hospitals, and standardized surgical skills are cultivated; in primary hospitals or areas with underdeveloped medical treatment, expert technology output can be achieved, and local doctors are assisted in safely and efficiently completing the operation.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device and use method
applicants: JIAXING MUXING ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device and a use method, and the device comprises a device body which is internally provided with a mainboard. A sound card module, a communication module, a camera module and storage modules are installed on the main board, and the sound card module is connected with a microphone through a sound card connecting line; the number of the storage modules is at least two. The sound card module is connected with a power amplifier circuit module, and the power amplifier circuit module is connected with a loudspeaker through a power amplifier circuit module connecting line; the camera module comprises an RGB-D camera; and one end part of the main board is connected with a connecting interface. The problems that an existing ROS operation system is complex in installation and a driver cannot be recognized or is difficult to install can be solved, a user can immediately use the system environment of artificial intelligence teaching, the development time of the user is saved, and conditions are created for popular education of artificial intelligence related education courses and the like of schools; and the situation that the teaching environment cannot be constructed due to different hardware systems is avoided.

title: Visualization of a machine learning confidence score and rationale
abstract_text: A unique user interface for improving machine learning algorithms is described herein. The user interface comprises an icon with multiple visual indicators displaying the machine learning confidence score. When a mouse hovers over the icon, a set of icons are displayed to accept the teaching user's input. In addition, the words that drove the machine learning confidence score are highlighted with formatting so that the teaching user can understand what drove the machine learning confidence score.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention, which relates to the teaching system field, discloses an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system comprising a box body and an intelligent AI multimedia panel. Through cooperative use of a box body, an electric telescopic rod, an intelligent AI multimedia panel, an audio recognition unit, a face recognition unit, a feature recognition module, a control instruction module, a central processing unit, a storage module, a data processing module and a feedback module, the device can be operated through voice through the audio recognition unit, and through arrangement of the face recognition unit, the identity of a user can be identified, the system AI automatically matches the related learning data stored in the storage module, the data processing module can process the learning data, the learning data is compared with historical data stored in the storage module, and the system AI automatically performs voice evaluation and feeds back to the user, so that the user can learn the teaching weak spot in a targeted manner. And weak points of learning contents are consolidated and deepened, so that the teaching effect is improved.

title: Teaching system for intelligently assisting in practicing training course categories
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching system for intelligently assisting in practicing training course categories, and the system comprises: a course setting and experiment arrangement module which is used for enabling a teacher to arrange resources of related teaching courses and course related experiments and scoring criteria through network resources; an experiment report uploading and submitting module which is used for enabling the students to upload the experiment reports of the learned courses in the form of documents or pictures within the specified time; an experiment report auxiliary correction module which is used for performing auxiliary correction on the experiment report submitted by the student; an auxiliary score evaluation module which is used for giving an auxiliary score of the experiment report submitted by the student; and a teacher scoring module which is used for the teacher to score the experiment report submitted by the student. Practical training courses are combined with intelligent equipment, operation is easy, the system is suitable for different users, and teaching resources are saved. In the invention, a machine learning algorithm is used to carry out auxiliary scoring on different types of homework, and a problem of correcting the homework by a teacher is solved so that teaching pressure is reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence classroom intelligent voice teaching device and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence classroom intelligent voice teaching device and a use method thereof. The device comprises a shell, a connecting rod is fixedly installed at the upper end of the shell, a sound box is fixedly installed at the right end of the shell, a sound outlet hole is formed in the front end of the sound box, a clamping groove is fixedly formed in the right end of the sound box, a connecting piece is fixedly mounted below the clamping groove, a clamping block is fixedly mounted at the right end of the shell, a connecting groove is formed in the left side of the clamping block, and a fixing disc is fixedly mounted on the left side of the connecting groove. a clamping groove is formed in the left side of the shell, a connecting piece is fixedly installed below the clamping groove, a clamping block is fixedly installed at the right end of the shell, a connecting groove is formed in the left side of the clamping block, and a fixing disc is fixedly installed on the left side of the connecting groove. A projector is adopted for projection, so that the overall structure is small and exquisite, and transportation is convenient. The detachable sound box is arranged and can be placed at a proper position according to actual conditions, and all students can clearly hear played content. An anti-interference magnetic ring is installed, and the sound box can be prevented from being affected by electromagnetic equipment. Intelligent voice teaching is carried out in a touch control and voice double-interaction mode.

title: Intelligent beauty mirror
abstract_text: The intelligent beauty mirror comprises a support and a mirror body, the mirror body is installed on the support, the mirror body comprises a shell, a display device, a camera, an integrated circuit board, a communication device and a central processing unit, the display device is fixedly installed on the shell and connected with the integrated circuit board through a circuit, and the integrated circuit board is arranged in the shell. The communication device and the central processing unit are arranged on the integrated circuit board; the display device comprises a high-light-transmission mirror surface and a touch screen, the touch screen is arranged on the back of the high-light-transmission mirror surface, the camera is arranged between the high-light-transmission mirror surface and the touch screen, the camera is connected with the central processing unit, and the central processing unit is connected with the communication device. The makeup mirror has the advantages that the makeup mirror is provided with the mirror surface and the touch screen at the same time, the mirror surface is used as a traditional mirror surface at ordinary times, after the touch screen is started, operation can be directly carried out on the screen according to system instructions, and the makeup mirror is internally provided with a processing chip and a 5G terminal and intelligently provides teaching videos, makeup guidance, AR virtual simulation, AI makeup design and the like.

title: Teaching quality evaluation system based on AI and big data analysis
applicants: CHONGQING HUITON SMART TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a teaching quality evaluation system based on AI and big data analysis, and the system comprises: a data collection module which is used for collecting video data and audio data in a classroom; the data processing module that is used for processing the collected video data and audio data to obtain evaluation data, and the evaluation data comprises the number of people, actions, expressions and speech content; the student class state evaluation module that is used for generating a student class state evaluation result according to the evaluation data; the teacher class state evaluation module that is used for generating a teacher class state evaluation result according to the evaluation data; the data uploading module that is used for acquiring other education results, and the other education results comprise examination scores; and the comprehensive quality evaluation module that is used for comprehensively evaluating the teaching quality according to the student class state evaluation result, the teacher class state evaluation result and other education results. The invention has the effect of improving the accuracy of teaching quality evaluation.

title: Novel artificial intelligence programming teaching aid
applicants: SHANGHAI CHENGMIAO INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a novel artificial intelligence programming teaching aid. The novel artificial intelligence programming teaching aid comprises a lampshade, a light source, a lamp pole, a base and a main control board. The light source is installed in the lampshade, the lampshade is connected with the lamp pole, and the main control board is arranged in the base. The main control board is provided with a voltage stabilizer, a crystal oscillator, a reset button, a RESET pin, a 3.3V pin, a 5V pin, a GND grounding pin, a Vin pin, a micro-controller, an ICSP, a power supply LED indicating lamp, a TX pin, an RX pin and an AREF analog reference, and the main control board is also provided with a digital interface which support an external sensor and an analog interface. According to the invention, the control panel is of an open structure and can be externally connected with various different peripherals, so that the application range is expanded, and the control panel is not limited to limited functions.

title: Machine teaching method and system based on review mechanism
abstract_text: The machine teaching method based on the review mechanism is realized through a method in the field of artificial intelligence, and comprises a machine teaching framework introducing the review mechanism, a learner model applied to the machine teaching framework and a teaching algorithm designed by applying the learner model. According to the machine teaching framework, a review mechanism is introduced into a traditional learner teaching framework, and the initiative of learners during learning is exerted; according to the learner model, influence factors A (si), B (si) and C (si) are introduced, and a strategy for the learners to select examples is designed, so that the learners' 'capable of implementing review behaviors' 'under a new learning framework are modeled; the teaching algorithm is based on a greedy algorithm, and a set of special teaching algorithm is provided for the learner model capable of making decisions autonomously. By means of the scheme, the effect that the error rate is lower than that of a traditional machine teaching method when a learner answers similar questions after learning the same number of teaching examples is achieved.

title: Tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence. The tourism management teaching device comprises the following components: a first camera; a soundproof box, which is arranged at the rear end of a classroom and comprises a box body; a rotating column, which is vertically arranged in the middle of the interior of the box body and comprises a bottom column and a back plate which are connected; a gyroscope sensor, which is arranged on the rotating column; an annular induction area, which is arranged at the bottom of the box body; VR glasses, which are arranged in the box body; a microphone, which is arranged on the VR glasses; a second camera, which is arranged above a door; a button I, which is arranged on the outer side wall of the door of the box body; a button II and a button III, which are respectively arranged in the box body; a projector; and a host. According to the tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence, the host, the projector and the projection screen are all original multimedia teaching equipment, the tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence can be upgraded only by adding some other equipment on the basis of the original multimedia teaching equipment, and the tourism management teaching device based on artificial intelligence is simple in structure and practical.

title: Quantitative evaluation system and method for teaching skills of normal school students
abstract_text: The invention discloses a quantitative evaluation system and method for teaching skills of normal school students, and belongs to the technical field of educational training. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a teacher evaluation database; detecting the teacher state in real time through hardware; converting the teacher state into an evaluation data value; and comparing the evaluation data value with the teacher evaluation database for scoring, and comprehensively scoring and evaluating the teaching of the teacher to obtain an evaluation result of the classroom performance of the teacher. An objective evaluation system can be constructed by utilizing big data processing, an intelligent teacher and a real classroom are virtualized by combining artificial intelligence and a modern sensing technology, trainees adopt an immersive autonomous training method, the problems of high training time and space cost, insufficient guidance teacher resources, lack of objective evaluation and the like are effectively solved, in addition, grading standard-reaching training can be achieved, the purpose of accurate individual training is achieved, the training efficiency is effectively improved, and then the quality of normal school student training is improved.

title: Teaching device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching tools, and provides a teaching device based on artificial intelligence. The teaching device comprises a movable base, a measuring assembly, a mounting plate, a box body, a blackboard overturning assembly, a shooting and recording assembly, a cleaning assembly and two lifting adjusting assemblies. The outer wall of the front side of the movable base is fixedly connected with a writing table. A transparent plate and a control processor are arranged at the top of the box body. The blackboard overturning assembly is installed in the box body, the shooting and recording assembly is arranged at the top end of the box body, the cleaning assembly is arranged beside the blackboard overturning assembly, and the measuring assembly, the lifting adjusting assemblies, the blackboard overturning assembly, the shooting and recording assembly and the cleaning assembly are all connected with the control processor. According to the teaching device, the height of a writing board is intelligently adjusted according to the heights of different users, meanwhile, the writing board can be continuously used by different users, the users do not need to wait when the writing board is cleaned and erased, and the time for a teacher to inspect the learning condition of students is shortened.

title: SHAPE MEASURING METHOD AND DEVICE USING FOCUS IMAGE GROUP BY MICROSCOPE
abstract_text: To provide a shape measuring method with which it is possible to estimate a minute shape of the order of submicrons quickly at low cost.SOLUTION: The shape measuring method comprises: an imaging step for imaging a plurality of images changing the height of rugged surface of an inspection object or a focal plane in the depth direction while keeping an imaging range and imaging condition intact; an image stacking step for inputting the plurality of images and stacking the images one on another in conformity with a change pitch of the focal plane; a cross-sectional image synthesizing step for synthesizing the cross-sectional images from the stacked image data that correspond to a face cut at a prescribed position of the inspection object; a cross-sectional shape estimation step for estimating a cross-sectional shape on a face cut at the prescribed position of the inspection object, using an image recognition model based on machine learning in which a combination of the cross-sectional image and the cross-sectional data obtained from the shape information of the actually measured inspection object is used as teaching data; and a surface shape estimation step for linking the cross-sectional shapes estimated by the image recognition model and estimating the surface shape of the inspection object from the cross-sectional images corresponding to the cut face having been moved in the normal direction.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: RECORDING DEVICE, SYSTEM, CONTROL METHOD AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To accurately estimate degrees of deterioration in performance of a liquid absorption member and notify a user of information concerning timing of replacing the liquid absorption member.SOLUTION: A recording device according to one embodiment of the present invention comprises: a liquid absorption member that absorbs liquid components from an ink image formed on a transfer body; first obtaining means that obtains inference information that can be obtained by input of information concerning the liquid absorption member to a learned model obtained by machine learning using teaching data including at least the information concerning the liquid absorption member; and first notifying means that notifies a user of timing for replacing the liquid absorption member, on the basis of the obtained inference information.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 8

title: Artificial intelligence laboratory teaching equipment
abstract_text: The utility model relates to artificial intelligence laboratory teaching equipment, which comprises an experiment equipment main body, a controller, a USBKEY, an authentication module and an equipment management center, and is characterized in that the experiment equipment main body is electrically connected with the controller; the controller is integrated with a processor; the processor is electrically connected with the authentication module; the authentication module is provided with a USB interface; and the equipment management center is electrically connected with the processor. The artificial intelligence laboratory teaching equipment can perform identity authentication quickly, and is high in safety performance, concise and convenient to operate.

title: Preschool education display device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a preschool education display device which comprises a table body, a rising and falling plate, a display screen fixedly arranged on the rising and falling plate and a lifting device used for lifting the rising and falling plate. A mistaken opening prevention system for the preschool education display device comprises a sensing system, a control system and a feedback system. According to the preschool education display teaching aid, through arrangement of the display screen, teachers can be effectively helped to display various works on the display screen by means of the Internet, and meanwhile, the preschool education display teaching aid is further integrated with security and protection systems of the Internet, the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence, so that the safety performance of preschool education when the display teaching aid is used can be improved.

title: Web front-end teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHENJIANG YOUZHIHAOBO INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a Web front-end teaching interaction system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a Web front-end management center server, a client login module, a communication module, a network connection module and a voice processing module, the Web front-end management center server comprises a database module, the database module is used for storing student information, teacher information, teaching audio and video and image-text data and learning test question data, the communication module is a wireless communication module, the communication module, the management center server and the client login module are electrically connected through the network connection module, the database module comprises a student personal information unit, a course appointment unit, a learning track unit and a learning state supervision unit, and the student personal information unit, the course appointment unit and the learning track unit are respectively connected with the database module. More selection conditions are obtained through online video, voice and text communication, and the learning initiative of students is improved.

title: Teaching live broadcast device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching live broadcast device based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of multimedia teaching. A teaching live broadcast device based on artificial intelligence comprises a live broadcast table, two outer live broadcast screens are arranged on the upper side of a fixing block in an up-down structure, two intelligent live broadcast display bodies are symmetrically arranged on the front sides of the outer live broadcast screens, and two adjusting hand wheels C are symmetrically arranged on the outer walls of the upper sides of the outer live broadcast screens; the lower end of the adjusting hand wheel C penetrates through the outer wall of the outer live broadcast screen, extends into the outer live broadcast screen and is coaxially connected with a worm B. Two worm gears B are symmetrically arranged on the upper side and the lower side in the outer live broadcast screen, two inner live broadcast screens are symmetrically arranged in the outer live broadcast screen, and the inner live broadcast screens and the outer live broadcast screens can be used at the same time through close fit of structural parts. The situation that one intelligent live broadcast display main body can only log in one platform client to carry out live broadcast teaching and a live broadcast platform is single is avoided, and meanwhile, the situation that a teacher needs to change a platform to carry out live broadcast, needs to carry out live broadcast on the same teaching content again, reduces the efficiency and effect and increases the labor force is avoided.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment table
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment table. The experiment table comprises an experiment platform, an all-in-one machine touch control computer and a telescopic robot storage cabinet, wherein the all-in-one machine touch control computer and the telescopic robot storage cabinet are both embedded in the experiment platform, and when the experiment table is used, the telescopic robot storage cabinet stretches out of the table top of the experiment platform; the telescopic robot storage cabinet and the robot in the telescopic robot storage cabinet are electrically connected with the all-in-one machine touch control computer. The all-in-one machine touch control computer and the telescopic robot storage cabinet are embedded in the experiment platform, the integration degree is improved, and operation is convenient.

title: AI APPEARANCE INSPECTION METHOD, DEVICE FOR SAME, AND PROGRAM FOR USE IN COMPUTER
abstract_text: The present invention addresses the problem that, in settings where the appearance of precision components is inspected, in addition to the high precision that is required as a matter of course, the amount of time required in order to allow an AI appearance inspection device to learn also increases in association with an increase in the number of varieties of the components.　Provided is an AI appearance inspection method comprising a pre-processing step for learning in which a difference image (teaching data) between a reference image prepared in advance and a teaching image of a component for which the appearance is to be inspected is produced as data representing a normal instance of the component for which the appearance is to be inspected, an input step for learning in which the difference image (teaching data) is inputted to an AI appearance inspection unit, an AI processing step for learning in which the AI appearance inspection unit is caused to process the inputted difference image (teaching data) and to learn the relationship between a difference image (normal instance) and a difference image (abnormal instance), a pre-processing step for inspection in which a difference image (inspection data) between the reference image and an actually captured image of the component for which the appearance is to be inspected is produced, an input step for inspection in which the difference image (inspection data) is inputted to an AI appearance inspection device that has finished learning, and an AI processing step for inspection in which the AI appearance processing unit that has finished learning is caused to process the inputted difference image (inspection data) and to specify a first relationship for the inputted difference image (inspection data).

title: 4 * 90-degree panoramic shooting network camera
applicants: NENGLAI SHANGHAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a 4 * 90-degree panoramic shooting network camera, which is characterized in that a fixing device is in butt joint with the bottom of a cover shell through a telescopic rod, the cover shell is in a cuboid shape, four windows are arranged on the outer wall of the cover shell, a camera and an image sensor are arranged in each window, and the camera and the image sensor are connected with each other. The four cameras and the image sensor are distributed on the horizontal plane in the circumferential direction at equal intervals, the included angle between every two adjacent cameras and the image sensor is 90 degrees, the three cameras are started at the same time for photographing, then pictures are uploaded to the server, the pictures are synthesized into a panoramic picture through an algorithm in the server, and the panoramic picture is obtained. The number of students in the pictures is displayed through artificial intelligence, then the number of students is transmitted to a control end where a teacher is located, roll call is carried out under the condition that teaching of the teacher is not affected, equipment communicates with a server through a data network, and the high efficiency of offline teaching of the students is guaranteed.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching robot model structure
applicants: HUIYUAN EDUCATION TECH SHANDONG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching robot model structure which comprises a model body, the bottom end of the model body is fixedly connected with a rotating shaft, the surface of the rotating shaft is fixedly provided with a bearing A. The bottom end of the bearing A is fixedly connected with a sliding block A, and the bottom end of the sliding block A is slidably connected with a sliding rail A. A sliding rail B is fixedly connected to the bottom end of the sliding rail A, a sliding block B is slidably connected to the top end of the sliding rail B, a fixing plate is fixedly connected to the right side end of the sliding rail B, a screw hole is fixedly formed in the fixing plate, and a screw rod is in threaded connection with the inner side wall of the screw hole; and the left side end of the screw rod is fixedly connected with a rotating block, and the surface of the rotating block is fixedly provided with a bearing B. The model can be conveniently fixed on a platform for people to visit, the model can move and rotate left and right, and the practicability of the model is greatly improved.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
applicants: HUIYUAN EDUCATION TECH SHANDONG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device which comprises a base, the left side of the top end of the base is fixedly connected with a large bearing, the interior of the large bearing is rotatably connected with a rotating shaft, the base is fixedly connected with a supporting table in front of the large bearing, and the top end of the supporting table is fixedly provided with a motor. A connecting plate is fixedly connected to the surface of the rotating shaft, a soft chair is fixedly connected to the top end of the connecting plate, a balancing weight is fixedly connected to the right side of the top end of the base, sliding rods are fixedly connected to the two sides of the middle of the top end of the balancing weight, sliding blocks are slidably connected to the outer side walls of the sliding rods, and a sound box is fixedly mounted between the sliding blocks; a spring is fixedly installed between the bottom end of the sound box and the balancing weight, and the top end of the sliding rod is fixedly connected with a supporting plate A. When people use the chair, the angle of the chair can be flexibly adjusted, the comfort degree is higher, and the damping structure is installed around the sound box, so that noise can be well eliminated.

title: Practical training equipment
applicants: GUANGZHOU JIAXIN ELECTRIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a practical training device which comprises a grabbing device and a temporary storage device, the grabbing device comprises a mechanical arm, a suction nozzle, a clamping jaw, a first recognizer and a second recognizer, the temporary storage device comprises a bottom plate, a pusher, a collection box and at least one temporary storage frame, and the bottom plate is used for blocking the bottom of the temporary storage frame. The grabbing device photographs and positions materials to be grabbed through a first recognizer, picks up the materials through a suction nozzle or a clamping jaw according to the types of the materials, places the materials in a recognition area, photographs different detection faces of the materials through a rotating second recognizer to collect data, and places the materials in a temporary storage frame in a temporary storage device after data collection is completed. And the pusher pushes the temporary storage frame to move, so that the materials fall into the collecting box from the temporary storage frame. The AI teaching machine replaces manual operation, mechanical feeding and discharging are achieved, and the AI teaching machine can be widely applied to the technical field of AI teaching.

title: Virtual teaching method and device and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING RAINIER NETWORK SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a virtual teaching method and device and electronic equipment. The method is applied to a virtual teaching system, the virtual teaching system comprises a plurality of deep learning models, and the deep learning models are obtained based on teaching text data training. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring virtual teaching data, wherein the virtual teaching data comprises teaching types, and the teaching types comprise a question and answer type, a correction type and a guidance type; vectorizing the virtual teaching data to obtain vector data; and inputting the vector data into a deep learning model corresponding to the teaching type, and outputting a calculation result. In the mode, the virtual teaching system can process the virtual teaching data based on a machine learning mode, and a teacher does not need to correct the virtual teaching data, so that the teaching cost and the learning cost can be reduced, and the accuracy and the efficiency of virtual teaching are improved.

title: Quantitative evaluation system for teaching state of normal school students
abstract_text: The invention discloses a quantitative evaluation system for a teaching state of normal school students, and belongs to the technical field of educational training. The system comprises a cloud server, a virtual classroom, a man-machine interaction device, a language detection module, a blackboard-writing detection module and a teaching posture detection module, wherein the man-machine interaction device, the language detection module, the blackboard-writing detection module and the teaching posture detection module are installed in the virtual classroom. The cloud server comprises a data acquisition module, a data processing module and a data comparison module, and the man-machine interaction equipment is connected with the data comparison module through a network, so that an objective evaluation system can be constructed by utilizing big data processing, and an intelligent teacher and a real classroom are virtualized by combining artificial intelligence and a modern sensing technology; the immersive autonomous training method is adopted by trainees, while the problems of high training time and space cost, insufficient teacher guiding resources, lack of objective evaluation and the like are effectively solved, grading up-to-standard training can be achieved, the purpose of accurate individual training is achieved, the training efficiency is effectively improved, and then the quality of normal school student training is improved.

title: business methods and systems using artificial intelligence learning platforms
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a business method and system using an artificial intelligence learning platform. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the business system using an artificial intelligence learning platform, comprises: a plurality of terminals used by at least a part of a student and a parent; a content providing server for providing content related to learning of the student; a service providing server for providing an education server with an on-line commerce function related to the learning of the student; and an education server for establishing a network with the terminals, the content providing server, and the service providing server, and providing at least a part of the terminals with the content and at least a part of an application related to the content. The online commerce function of the service providing server is provided for the education server in response to an online commerce connection request of the education server, between the service providing server and the education server. The online commerce function supports book purchases, textbook, camp teaching aid, tools, and a promotional product, and only the first content satisfying a certain standard among the contents provided by the content providing server is provided for at least a part of the terminals. The education server can provide the content providing server with analysis information related to the learning of the student. Accordingly, an effective learning plan is established.

title: Online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of online education, and discloses an online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence. The online education man-machine interaction system based on artificial intelligence comprises an image acquisition module, a voice data acquisition module, a gesture data acquisition module, an action data acquisition module, a data processing module, a central control module, an image feature extraction module, a command recognition module, a command execution module, a user learning state judgment module, a knowledge point extraction module, a feedback module, an evaluation module, a data storage module and an update display module. According to the online education man-machine interaction method based on artificial intelligence provided by the invention, the learning state of the user can be comprehensively mastered, and meanwhile, the teaching quality of a teacher can be effectively evaluated and supervised; the learning state of the user is monitored and fed back to the teacher in time; in addition, command recognition can be automatically carried out, the intelligent level is improved, and then the learning efficiency of the user is improved.

title: Teaching display device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention is suitable for the field of computers, and provides a teaching display device based on artificial intelligence. The device comprises: a loudspeaker module used for receiving a sound file, analyzing the sound file and extracting keyword information; a processing module used for receiving keyword information, extracting corresponding cognitive image information from an image library according to the keyword information, and extracting corresponding associated picture information according to the cognitive image information; and a display module applied to the display screen and used for receiving the cognitive image information and the associated picture information and displaying corresponding cognitive images and associated pictures on the screen. Firstly, keywords in a sound file are extracted, cognitive image information in an image library is matched through the keywords, and then associated image information is called according to the cognitive image information, so that a user can recognize similar objects while singly recognizing objects in a cognitive image, and the teaching effect of adopting the design is improved.

title: MATLAB-based GUI sound synthesis device
abstract_text: The invention relates to a GUI sound synthesis device based on MATLAB, which comprises a parameter debugging unit and a batch generation unit, and is characterized in that the parameter debugging unit is used for carrying out parameter adjustment on the frequency, amplitude, period and mode of synthesized sound through a GUI system so as to achieve an expected effect, and carrying out 1/3 octave analysis and simulation frequency shift on a sound signal; on the premise that other parameters are fixed, the frequency or the period is used as a variable, and a series of sound files are generated in batches at a fixed step length, so that the requirements of subsequent subjective and objective evaluation work are met. The device can be applied to teaching, and students can understand related knowledge of digital signal processing more deeply through visual interface operation; in actual production, a warning tone designer can obtain a warning tone source to be evaluated more conveniently and quickly, and the warning tone source can be adjusted; a training set of a machine learning related algorithm can be quickly generated, the workload of early-stage preparation is reduced, and the required cost and manpower are reduced.

title: Playing data identification method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a playing data identification method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method specifically comprises the steps of obtaining target playing data generated in the process of playing a target track by a target user, and then comparing the target playing data with the standard playing data of the target track. If the different playing data different from the standard playing data exists in the target playing data, the different playing data is displayed in the display interface, so that the target user can find wrong playing skills occurring in the playing process from the displayed different playing data in time, correct the wrong playing skills in time and strengthen practice in time, so that thepractice efficiency and the playing ability are improved. On the other hand, wrong playing skills can be sent to a professional teacher, so that the professional teacher can carry out targeted guidance, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Teacher blackboard writing action recognition method based on multi-granularity convolutional neural network pruning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher blackboard writing action recognition method based on multi-granularity convolutional neural network pruning, and belongs to the field of deep learning. According to the method, in combination with the practical application of classroom boutique course intelligent recording in intelligent education, multi-granularity convolutional neural network pruning is applied to a human body action recognition algorithm, so that the processing speed of the human body action recognition algorithm is improved. The teaching blackboard writing action recognition algorithm is divided into three steps: OpenPose feature extraction, coordinate normalization and BP neural network classification. Besides, in an OpenPose algorithm, a multi-granularity convolutional neural network pruning framework based on a filter level and a connection level is used to compress a backbone network of OpenPose, a corresponding training strategy is designed and realized, and combination of two types of pruning methods is realized. A final experiment result shows that the accuracy and the speed of network pruning completely meet the requirements of practical application.

title: Intelligent teaching system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent teaching system based on deep learning, and the system comprises a learning record obtaining module which is used for obtaining learning records from a database, and the related information comprises student numbers, test question numbers, related knowledge points, answering results, and answering time; and a scene coding module which is used for summarizing, summarizing and coding past learning records and current scenes of the students to obtain general codes. A learning sequence coding module which is used for coding previous learning sequences of the knowledge points by the students to obtain knowledge point answering codes; a neural network training module which is used for training a neural network according to the general bracket codes and the knowledge point answer codes; a prediction module which is used for predicting the answering result of the student in a given scene; and a learning scheduling module which is used for recommending learning contents to the students according to prediction of the answering results of the students.

title: Media stream pushing method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
applicants: BEIJING DA MI TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a media stream pushing method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment, and belongs to the field of online education. According to the embodiment of the invention, when a course starts, the room number of a virtual classroom associated with the course is determined; an AI teacher media stream is generated according to the class materials associated with the room number; an AI teacher media stream is pushed to student terminals in the virtual classroom through a stream pushing server; a microphone connection request of a first student terminal is received, wherein the microphone connection request carries an identifier of the second student terminal; the first student terminal and the second student terminal are located in the virtual classroom; the first student media stream and the second student media stream are pushed to student terminals in the virtual classroom through a stream pushing server, wherein the first student media stream is from the first student terminal, and the second student media stream is from the second student terminal, and according to the embodiment of the invention, interaction between teachers and students and between students can be realized, and the authenticity and the teaching effect of teaching are improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education anti-province robot capable of overcoming discrimination and prejudice
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence education anti-province robot capable of overcoming discrimination and prejudice, which comprises a data generation supplement step; a model retraining step; and a model prediction step. According to the method, the system and the robot, the problem of data imbalance of different types of users is solved by generating more data based on the big data and the artificial intelligence model, so that the defects of artificial intelligence prejudice, discrimination and the like caused by data imbalance can be avoided; meanwhile, user data are predicted and compared through a plurality of artificial intelligence models to find problems earlier, and manual review is performed, so that the problems existing in artificial intelligence application can be found earlier and faster, and correction and remediation can be performed as soon as possible; according to the two aspects, artificial intelligence can be subjected to anti-provincial operation on two levels of data and an algorithm model, great significance is achieved in many fields of artificial intelligence application, for example, teaching accidents and negative effects caused by discrimination, prejudice and the like of artificial intelligence can be greatly reduced or even avoided when the method is applied to the education field.

title: ELECTRONIC DEVICE FOR PROVIDING A FEEDBACK FOR A SPECIVIC MOTION USING A MACHINE LEARNING MODEL A AND MACHINE LEARNING MODEL AND METHOD FOR OPERATING THEREOF
abstract_text: According to an embodiment of the present application, a method for operating an electronic device comprises: a step of performing machine learning by using information on a plurality of skeletons associated with a specific motion of an expert and/or professional athlete related to a particular sport, information about a plurality of angular velocities associated with the specific motion, and/or multiple evaluation information related to the specific motion, accumulated in a server from the server, as training data; a step of setting to output first evaluation levels for a plurality of characteristics associated with the specific motion, executing a program, and receiving information on a second angular velocity for the specific motion of a user of the electronic device from a swing practice device based on the execution of the program; a step of photographing the specific motion of the user based on the execution of the program, and acquiring information on a second joint during the specific motion of the user based on a plurality of images acquired based on the performance of the photographing; a step of displaying a 3D graphic user interface (GUI) including a 3D animation object based on the information on the second angular velocity and/or the information on the second joint; and a step of displaying information on second evaluation levels for the plurality of characteristics associated with the specific motion output from a machine learning model on the 3D graphical user interface. The present invention provides an electronic device and the method for operating the electronic device, to enable accurate teaching of a specific motion (e.g., golf swing) in a non-face-to-face manner.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive foreign language teaching translation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive foreign language teaching translation system, and belongs to the technical field of foreign language teaching. The system is used for interactive teaching in a foreign language teaching classroom based on an artificial intelligence technology, and comprises a user interface module, a translation module, a knowledge base module and a management debugging module; the user interface module is used for a teacher to input to-be-translated manuscript contents; the knowledge base module is used for storing dictionaries, various rule libraries and instance libraries required during translation; the translation module is used for translating the manuscript content to be translated; and the management debugging module is used for debugging and upgrading the system. According to the artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive foreign language teaching translation system, the translation performance of the system is trained through translated sentences stored in the system and related information of the sentences and creating corresponding historical information between translated texts, the artificial intelligence self-adaptive learning ability is embodied, and the translation effectiveness and accuracy of the translation system are improved.

title: Machine learning teaching method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a machine learning teaching method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The machine learning teaching method comprises the following steps: receiving a machine learning teaching instruction input by a user; selecting a target machine learning model from the at least two candidate machine learning models according to the machine learning teaching instruction, wherein the at least two candidate machine learning models are pre-configured according to a classification result obtained by standardizing the artificial intelligence teaching scene; and performing artificial intelligence teaching based on the target machine learning model. The teaching scene is standardized, the machine learning model is trained in advance, the operation steps of teaching participants are simplified, the operation difficulty of the teaching participants is reduced, and the timeliness of machine learning teaching work is improved; and each candidate machine learning model is trained for each type of recognition objects, so that the training complexity is reduced, the model quality is improved, the certainty of machine learning teaching work is further improved, and the teaching effect is ensured.

title: Student experiment auxiliary guidance system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: A student experiment auxiliary guidance system based on artificial intelligence disclosed by the present invention comprises a microprocessor, the microprocessor is connected with a keyboard, a card reader, a microphone, a display, a loudspeaker, a face recognition device and a fingerprint recognition device, the microprocessor and the peripheral devices are installed on an experiment box, the microprocessor is arranged inside the experiment box, and the microphone and the loudspeaker are arranged at the left front part of the experiment box. According to the invention, the same student can be supported to repeatedly operate and learn a certain experiment so as to continuously correct errors. In addition, the overall experiment operation skills of the same experiment, the same class and different students can be analyzed and evaluated through big data, and improvement of the experiment teaching quality is facilitated.

title: Online and offline combined multi-dimensional teaching AI (Artificial Intelligence) classroom system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online and offline combined multi-dimensional teaching AI (Artificial Intelligence) school system. The system comprises hardware teaching preparation deployment, wherein the whole system needs a set of playing host and an AI analysis host; full-angle intelligent identification: based on a 4D full-angle skeleton detection technology, information such as a face, an expression, a behavior and a posture of a single individual in a video being accurately identified in a multi-camera full-angle manner; audio and video two-dimensional teaching content integration: using corresponding audios to assist video stream analysis through an autonomous voice-assisted video two-dimensional recognition analysis method; individual learning condition analysis of students: collecting and analyzing classroom and learning data of each student; and education and teaching evaluation model construction: cooperating with famous schools, and establishing a plurality of intelligent evaluation models. The system has the advantages of intelligent analysis, intelligent classification, intelligent processing, reasonable design and effective improvement of the learning effect.

title: Multi-modal sentiment analysis method and system based on AI deep learning
applicants: FUJIAN TIANQUAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a multi-modal sentiment analysis method based on AI deep learning. The method comprises the steps: S1, establishing sentiment models for different types of users; S2, capturing class reaction and gesture actions of the student through a camera/camera, wherein the student wears a sensor and collects physiological data through the sensor; S3, inputting the acquired picture data and physiological data into a computer, analyzing the emotion change of the student through multi-modal emotion to obtain the intention to be expressed by the emotion change of the student, and determining whether the attention of the student is transferred or not; and S4, receiving the feedback report, and obtaining the learning interest condition of the student. According to the invention, the teaching scheme can be adjusted according to the interest condition of students, personalized homework arrangement and tutoring are realized, and the requirements of the students are met.

title: School classroom student learning behavior tracking analysis method based on big data and artificial intelligence and cloud management platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a school classroom student learning behavior tracking analysis method based on big data and artificial intelligence and a cloud management platform, and the method comprises the steps: collecting image information of each student in a classroom, carrying out image preprocessing and feature extraction of the image information of each student, comparing with the features of different behavior types of the students to determine behavior type features of the students and human face deflection angles, counting and evaluation coefficients of each student learning behavior in different subjects, and the corresponding learning behavior levels and students interest in each subject and displaying the above. The invention has the characteristics of high intelligence and high reliability, which reduces labor costs. The efficiency of analyzing subject interestingness and student learning behavior levels is greatly improved, different teachers can solve and improve problems in a targeted manner according to evaluation results, and the teaching efficiency of the teachers and the learning receiving efficiency of the students are enhanced.

title: Internet of vehicles teaching operation platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an Internet of Vehicles teaching operation platform based on artificial intelligence, which belongs to the technical field of Internet of Vehicles teaching use equipment. An Internet of Vehicles teaching operation platform based on artificial intelligence comprises an operation table, an entrance and exit is formed in the top surface of the operation table in a penetrating mode, a placement cavity is formed in the operation table, a placement plate is arranged in the entrance and exit, two adjusting assemblies are connected to the rear wall of a moving plate in a bilateral symmetry mode, a motor is fixedly arranged on the bottom surface of the left side of the placement cavity, and the output end of the motor is connected with a threaded rod. A guide rod is welded to the bottom face of the right side of the placement cavity, a host is placed on the bottom face of the right side of the placement cavity, a motor is arranged and used for driving a threaded rod to rotate, a display screen on the placement plate can be moved out of the interior of the operation table, teaching is facilitated, and after use, the motor can rotate in the reverse direction to drive the threaded rod to rotate; and the display screen can be driven by the placement plate to be retracted into the placement cavity, so that the display screen is prevented from being exposed, dust accumulation and damage by insects and mice.

title: SEVERITY ASSESSMENT DEVICE AND MODEL GENERATION DEVICE
abstract_text: The present invention provides a severity evaluation apparatus that enables optimum distribution of medical resources to provide optimized medical care. A model generation apparatus 10 has a teaching data acquisition unit 31 operable to acquire teaching data 90 labeled with disease information indicative of a level of disease of a body region for a CT image and a model generation unit 32 operable to generate a disease information model 50 configured to output disease information in response to an input of a CT image with machine learning that uses the teaching data 90. The severity evaluation apparatus 20 has a measurement data acquisition unit 41 operable to acquire CT images 60 of a patient, a disease information acquisition unit 42 operable to acquire disease information 70 from each of the CT images 60 with use of the disease information model 50, and a severity calculation unit 43 operable to calculate a severity 75 of the patient based on the disease information 70 acquired by the disease information acquisition unit 42.

title: A DISEASE ESTIMATION SYSTEM AND METHOD ACCORDING TO GENE EXPRESSION VALUES
abstract_text: The present invention is a disease estimation system (100) comprising a processor unit (110) which receives the gene expression values of an individual associated with gene descriptors, wherein said processor unit (110) is configured to realize the steps of transforming the gene expression value of each gene descriptor into binary base and dividing each gene expression value transformed into binary base to a first part, a second part and a third part, forming one each gene expression pixel (210) for each gene expression value such that the first part is the value of the red component, the second part is the value of the green component and the third part is the value of the blue component, forming a gene expression image (200) comprising the gene expression pixels for said individual, accessing a memory unit comprising a deep learning model formed by teaching the reference gene expression images of the individuals in at least one first class and in at least one second class, receiving the gene expression image (200) as input to the deep learning model and classifying said gene expression image (200).

title: AI education learning desk for intelligent education campus
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI education and learning desk for an intelligent education campus, relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching aids, and aims to solve the problems that existing intelligent education and learning desks cannot be conveniently spliced together, cannot be fixed and cannot be always kept in a tidy state when in use, and the AI education learning desk comprises a main body, a baffle, side plates and bottom pieces. The main body is an intelligent education learning desk body and is of an inverted-U-shaped structure. And the baffle is mounted behind the top end of the main body. The bottom pieces are used for being installed at the two ends of the bottom of the main body, so that when multiple desks are used, the bottom pieces and the connecting plates can be connected together, the front ends of the connecting plates can be inserted into the fixing grooves to be limited and fixed, then the multiple desks can be stably connected at the same time when used at the same time, and after the desks are assembled, large-amplitude inclination or displacement does not occur after the desk is used for a long time, so that the desk can be kept tidy.

title: Intelligent evaluation and training system for teaching skills of teachers and students
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent evaluation and training system for teaching skills of teachers and students, and belongs to the technical field of education and training. The system comprises a cloud server, a virtual classroom, human-computer interaction equipment, a language detection module, a blackboard-writing detection module and a teaching posture detection module, wherein the human-computer interaction equipment, the language detection module, the blackboard-writing detection module and the teaching posture detection module are installed in the virtual classroom. The cloud server comprises a data acquisition module, a data processing module and a data comparison module; the man-machine interaction device is connected with the data comparison module through a network, an objective evaluation system can be constructed by utilizing big data processing, and an intelligent teacher and a real classroom are virtualized by combining artificial intelligence and modern sensing technologies; an immersive autonomous training method is adopted for trainees, the problems that the training time and space cost is high, resources for instructing teachers are insufficient, and objective evaluation is lacked are effectively solved, meanwhile, graded standard training can be achieved, the purpose of individual accurate training is achieved, the training efficiency is effectively improved, and then the training quality of teachers, paradigms and students is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence teaching platform, and relates to the field of teaching platforms. The artificial intelligence teaching platform comprises a multimedia platform, an extension platform, a PLC and a control switch, a display is arranged at the top of the multimedia platform, a display containing groove is formed in the multimedia platform, a roller shutter is arranged in the display containing groove, a driven shaft is arranged at the bottom of the roller shutter, and a transmission box is fixedly connected to the bottom of the multimedia platform. A square hole is formed in the transmission case, a reel is arranged in the transmission case, a rotating shaft is fixedly connected to one side of the reel, and an adjusting structure is arranged between the multimedia platform and the extending platform. The length of the artificial intelligence teaching platform can be adjusted relatively, teaching work can be carried out conveniently, a teacher can write and tutoring on the platform, the problem that a traditional teaching platform is not convenient to carry into a classroom due to the length problem is solved, and the teaching platform can avoid the problem and improve the teaching efficiency. And the trafficability during carrying is higher.

title: Unmanned aerial vehicle teaching aid based on artificial intelligence exploration
applicants: JIANGSU WEISIMAI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle teaching aid based on artificial intelligence exploration, comprising an unmanned aerial vehicle, the bottom end of the unmanned aerial vehicle is fixedly connected with a connecting plate, the bottom end of the connecting plate is provided with a mounting device, two sides of the top end of the mounting device are fixedly connected with dovetail strips, and two sides of the bottom end of the connecting plate are provided with dovetail grooves matched with the dovetail strips. The dovetail strip slides in the dovetail groove, sliding grooves are formed in the two sides of the front surface of the connecting plate correspondingly, sliding blocks are connected in the sliding grooves in a sliding mode, connecting grooves communicated with the sliding grooves are formed in the inner sides of the sliding grooves, first mounting grooves communicated with the connecting grooves are formed in the inner sides of the connecting grooves, and clamping grooves are formed in one sides of the top ends of the dovetail strip. A clamping block is arranged in the first mounting groove in a penetrating mode, and the bottom end of the clamping block extends into the clamping groove. The dovetail strips are additionally arranged on the two sides of the top end of the mounting equipment, the mounting equipment does not need to be fixed through bolts, and connection between the dovetail strips and the unmanned aerial vehicle is facilitated.

title: Intelligent teaching management system
applicants: TIANJIN HUAXUAN TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent teaching management system which comprises an intelligent teaching subsystem, an intelligent question bank subsystem, an open platform subsystem and a mobile terminal management subsystem.
