The intelligent teaching subsystem comprises one or more of a teaching unit, a teaching material self-making unit, a virtual experiment teaching unit, an AI teaching analysis unit, a student growth file unit and a homework auxiliary correction unit; the intelligent question bank subsystem comprises a question bank building unit and/or a trend learning report unit; the open platform subsystem comprises an API docking unit and/or an open laboratory unit; the mobile terminal management subsystem comprises one or more of an electronic all-purpose card unit and/or a mobile positioning unit. The management system can customize scenarized Internet of Things equipment application, is beneficial to comprehensive management and control of energy conservation, safety and the like, is quick and convenient, and is beneficial to college management.

title: Online vocational education teaching system based on artificial intelligence and big data
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an online vocational education teaching system based on artificial intelligence and big data. The system comprises a state acquisition module, a correlation acquisition module, a synchronism acquisition module, a reason analysis module and a teaching strategy adjustment module. The state acquisition module is used for acquiring a teaching state of a teacher and a learning state of students; the correlation acquisition module is used for acquiring correlation among students of the class; the synchronism acquisition module is used for acquiring uncarefully students in the current teaching state of the teacher; the reason analysis module is used for obtaining reasons of uncarefully learning of the uncarefully students according to the similar students corresponding to the uncarefully students; and the teaching strategy adjusting module is used for adjusting the teaching strategy of the teacher according to the uncareful reasons. According to the system, the correlation between students and the synchronism between students and teachers are considered, and the teaching strategy of teachers is adjusted in time according to the reason why students are not carefully learned, so that the quality of online education is improved.

title: Teaching video selection method, device and equipment and readable storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI LIULISHUO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching video selection method. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sound signal, wherein the sound signal is a sound emitted by a user for the teaching video; inputting the sound signal into a deep learning network, and scoring the sound signal by using the deep learning network to obtain a score corresponding to the sound signal; and determining a target video corresponding to the score in a video database; the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sound signal, performing scoring processing on the sound signal by utilizing a deep learning network to obtain a corresponding score, and determining a target video corresponding to the score in a video database, namely judging the learning condition of a user according to the acquired sound signal and the score obtained by scoring processing, so as to perform targeted teaching on the user; the problem that an existing video teaching technology is poor in teaching effect is solved. In addition, the invention also provides a teaching video selection device, equipment and a computer readable storage medium, which also have the above beneficial effects.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: An information processing device (100) is provided with: an acquisition unit (153) that acquires a machine learning model which has been subjected to reinforcement learning on the basis of a plurality of rewards weighted by the respective weights of the rewards such that the model outputs, upon input of first state information indicative of a first state, first behavior information indicative of a first behavior corresponding to the first state; a reception unit (151) that receives teaching data, which is a combination of second state information indicative of a second state and second behavior information indicative of a second behavior corresponding to the second state; and a display unit (156) that displays information pertaining to the reward weights estimated by training the machine learning model, in which the reward weights are used as connection coefficients of a part of the machine learning model, such that the model outputs the second behavior information included in the teaching data upon input of the second state information included in the teaching data and of values based on the reward weights.

title: User teaching material processing capability automatic identification method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-source data fusion-based user teaching material processing capability automatic identification method and system. The method comprises the following steps: S1, pre-defining attributes of user teaching material processing capacity and characteristic variables contained in each attribute, wherein the attributes comprise richness, diversity, availability, usefulness and timeliness; s2, collecting user data from the teaching platform, and calculating a teaching material processing capability matrix of each user according to the user data; s3, acquiring sample data of the user set; s4, constructing a regression model based on multiple machine learning methods, training the regression model by utilizing the sample data, and determining an optimal regression model; and S5, dynamically identifying the processing capacity of the user teaching material by using the trained optimal regression model. According to the invention, intelligent automatic identification of user teaching material processing and processing capabilities can be achieved.

title: Internet-based pig farm visualization device
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet-based pig farm visualization device, which relates to the field of teaching equipment, and comprises a video receiving unit, a temperature receiving unit, a humidity receiving unit, a network transmission module, a processor module, a storage module, a teaching module, a VR module, a non-VR module, a demonstration module, an operation module, an evaluation module and a visualization component; and through cooperative use of the naked eye 3D display, the network transmission module, the teaching module and the VR module, knowledge on the upper plane of a book is converted into three-dimensional, immersive and interactive display content by utilizing artificial intelligence, virtual reality and other technologies, the learning interest of students is stimulated, and the learning efficiency of the students is improved. The problems of irreversibility, high practical training risk coefficient, high practical training consumable consumption and the like in the professional practical training process are effectively solved, the professional practical training teaching effect is improved, real-time dynamic connection between a school theoretical classroom and an enterprise farm is realized, visual teaching of factory scenes is realized, the practicability and effectiveness of teaching are improved, and the outgoing practice cost and the risk in the practice period are reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence teaching platform effectively solves the problem that the height of an existing teaching platform is inconvenient to adjust. The device comprises a box body, a rectangular cylinder with a downward opening is arranged at the upper end of the box body, a left-right axial roller is rotationally connected in the rectangular cylinder, a front-back through rectangular groove in the vertical direction is formed in the front end of the rectangular cylinder, a supporting block located below the roller and in the front-back direction is slidably connected in the rectangular groove, and the front end of the supporting block extends out of the rectangular groove; a left-right axial rotatable winding column is arranged in the rectangular cylinder and connected with the supporting block through a connecting belt, the connecting belt is in contact with the outer edge face of the rolling wheel, a vertical axial cylinder with an upward opening is arranged in the box body, a top column is coaxially connected in the cylinder in a sliding mode, and the upper end of the top column penetrates through the box body and is fixedly connected with the supporting block. The left end of the cylinder is provided with a buffer pipe which is located below the top column and is left-right axial; the device is simple in structure, novel in concept, convenient to use and high in practicability.

title: Examination table
applicants: SHANGHAI DAFENG LABORATORY EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an examination table which comprises a table body and a liftable back plate installed on the back face of the table body through sliding rails, a push rod motor is arranged to push the back plate to ascend and descend, and a camera and a display screen which can be connected with a remote computer and a storage are arranged on the back plate and used for displaying examination questions, shooting the examination process, achieving AI automatic recognition and interacting with teachers. The backboard can be used as a common teaching table after being lowered. The utility model is used in the field of experimental apparatuses or examinations, can realize remote teaching, invigilation, scoring and summarization, and improves the examination and invigilation efficiency.

title: Chinese choice question interference item generation method based on free text
abstract_text: The invention discloses a free text-based Chinese choice question interference item generation method, which comprises the following steps of: 1-1) preprocessing a text to analyze a core keyword; 1-2) selecting information sentences; 1-3) generating a correct answer; 1-4) generating a question stem; 1-5) expanding correct answers; 1-6) generating an interference item: carrying out expansion word vectorization on the basis of a vector space model, and calculating the weight of each expansion word in a vector space by using a TF-IDF method; expressing the text with a word text matrix by using an LSI model, converting a high-dimensional sparse matrix into a low-dimensional text vector and a word vector by using singular value decomposition, and calculating the semantic similarity between the extension word and the triad in the knowledge graph by using a cosine similarity method in combination with the spatial weight of the extension word vector; screening out interference items; 1-7) generating a choice question by combining question stems and disturbance terms according to the method. The generation speed is high, the occupied resources are few, the difficulty is high, and the method is suitable for standardized teaching and machine learning.

title: College classroom teaching effect intelligent evaluation method
abstract_text: The invention provides a college classroom teaching effect intelligent evaluation method, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining various dynamic data of college classroom teaching, and building a prior probability model; S2, establishing a college classroom teaching effect intelligent dynamic evaluation model; and S3, establishing an intelligent feedback system in combination with the prior probability model in the step S1 and the intelligent dynamic evaluation model in the step S2, and pushing a customized culture scheme on the basis of personalized data of students. By means of fusion innovation of an artificial intelligence technology, a VR technology, a data calculation technology, a 5G technology and an Internet of Things technology, evaluation data are comprehensive, evaluation system indexes can be quantified, evaluation results are diversified, education evaluation is promoted to enter a new development stage, and a new intelligent trend is embodied or education returns to nature.

title: Teaching evaluation method and device based on micro-expression recognition, electronic equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a teaching evaluation method and device based on micro-expression recognition, electronic equipment and a medium. The method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of face videos, and segmenting each face video into a plurality of video segments based on pixel differences; extracting a target micro-expression image sequence based on the video clip by using a time interpolation model, the number of frames of target micro-expression images in different target micro-expression image sequences being the same; extracting a feature vector sequence of the target micro-expression image sequence by using a CNN neural network; utilizing an attention mechanism to train an LSTM network based on the feature vector sequence to obtain a micro-expression classification model; and using the micro-expression classification model to carry out micro-expression classification on the facial video of the student in teaching, and calculating a teaching score according to a classification result. The teaching score is calculated based on the target evaluation degree, and the teaching evaluation result is more accurate.

title: Classroom desk detection method based on machine learning
applicants: NANJING LANZ INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom desk detection method based on machine learning. The classroom desk detection method comprises the following steps: step 1, detecting a bounding box of a desk in an image; 2, detecting all straight lines of the classroom desk; and 3, calculating the main direction of the classroom by using a straight line. 4, performing affine transformation on the bounding box in the main direction; 5, performing affine transformation on the original image by utilizing the main direction; step 6, executing a clustering algorithm on the bounding box; 7, calculating a clustering center difference value and a threshold value, and combining specific clusters; 8, taking the bounding boxes of the continuous multiple rows of desks out; 9, calculating a regional bounding box; step 10, drawing the regional bounding box on the image; and step 11, performing inverse affine transformation on the image. The classroom desk position can be automatically and intelligently positioned to a certain extent, and subsequent classroom condition analysis, such as statistics of the student seating rate, analysis of the interest degree of students in a classroom and improvement of the teaching method, is facilitated.

title: Method and system for applying Chinese-English mixed speech synthesis technology to Chinese language teaching
applicants: XIAN ZHANGSHANG SHENGTANG NETWORK INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of speech, and discloses an application method and system of a Chinese-English mixed speech synthesis technology in Chinese language teaching. The method comprises the steps: searching complex symbols in Chinese, carrying out the sentence segmentation, segmenting long sentences, carrying out the successive reasoning, and splicing results. According to the method, foreign words in daily Chinese sessions are searched by adopting a method of combining Chinese and English models, a large number of Arabic numerals are converted into corresponding Chinese characters by preprocessing original data, then model reasoning is performed, and actual tests show that after preprocessing, the accuracy of numeric pronunciation in Chinese long sentences reaches 90% or above, and the Chinese long sentences are more accurate. According to the Chinese girl speech synthesis system designed by the company in the teaching scene, the audio production efficiency in a complex session scene in a Chinese language teaching link is effectively improved, and a traditional manual recording mode can be effectively replaced; an artificial intelligence technology is introduced into English teaching by American stock listed companies' fluency speaking ', so that the audio content production efficiency in a teaching scene is effectively improved.

title: Unmanned teaching aid kit based on deep learning
applicants: SHAANXI SHANXIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an unmanned teaching aid suite based on deep learning, which comprises a plurality of unmanned trolley suites and a cloud server, the plurality of unmanned trolley suites are connected with the cloud server, each unmanned trolley suites comprises an unmanned trolley body and an external control module which are connected with each other, and the external control module is connected with the unmanned trolley body. Wherein the unmanned trolley body comprises a driving unit, and the external control module is connected with the driving unit; wherein the unmanned trolley body is provided with an unmanned system, the unmanned system comprises a raspberry pi, a single chip microcomputer and an image acquisition unit, the raspberry pi is respectively connected with the single chip microcomputer, the image acquisition unit, an external control module and a cloud server, and the single chip microcomputer is connected with the driving unit. According to the unmanned teaching aid kit based on deep learning, the unmanned system is combined with the unmanned trolley body, so that low-age user groups or non-field related people can understand artificial intelligence and unmanned driving to a certain extent.

title: Artificial intelligence factory teaching experiment platform
applicants: SHENZHEN GUANGZHI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence factory teaching experiment platform, and relates to the field of teaching supplies. The platform comprises a table; the device further comprises a storage module, a carrying module, a sorting module and a machining module. The storage module comprises a stereoscopic warehouse and a conveying device, is arranged on the table and is used for storing materials; the carrying module is connected with a track arranged on the table in a sliding manner, comprises a carrying trolley and a sorting trolley, and is used for carrying materials; the sorting module is connected with the carrying trolley and the sorting trolley and used for sorting materials. The machining module comprises a machining transfer device and a laser engraving machine, and the machining transfer device and the laser engraving machine are both connected with the carrying trolley and the sorting trolley and used for machining the materials; and the work of storage, transportation, distribution, processing and sorting of the materials can be simultaneously realized, the occupied area is small, and the energy consumption is low.

title: AI education method for intelligent education campus
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI education method for an intelligent education campus, and relates to the technical field of teaching office. The AI education method for the intelligent education campus is realized based on AI education equipment for the intelligent education campus, and then AI education of the intelligent education campus is realized. The AI education equipment for the intelligent education campus comprises a mounting base; the right end surface of the mounting base is fixedly connected with a group of rotary driving pieces; the two pairs of telescopic supporting pieces located on the lower portion of a telescopic mounting base are jointly connected with a set of telescopic parts; and the two groups of telescopic parts are symmetrically arranged. A teaching curtain can be unfolded or folded, the teaching curtain is convenient to use when unfolded, the occupied space is reduced when folded, the teaching curtain is prevented from being contaminated by dust, meanwhile, the stability of the teaching curtain is better guaranteed through two-way supporting of the teaching curtain, and curtain swinging caused by influences of wind power and the like is effectively reduced.

title: Data analyzer
abstract_text: The present invention repeats a series of processes multiple times that include dividing given labeled teaching data into data for model construction and data for model verification, constructing a machine learning model using the data for model construction, and applying this model to the data for model verification and identifying a sample (S2-S5). When the data for model construction changes, the machine learning model that is constructed may change, yet exact identification with high probability should still be possible, so that there is high probability for a mislabeled sample that the original label and the identification result do not match and misidentification results. When the number of times this misidentification occurs is counted for each sample and a misidentification rate is obtained, it is found that a misidentification rate is relatively high for mislabeled samples, so a mislabeled sample is specified on the basis of the misidentification rate (S6-S7). Thus, it is possible to improve the performance of identifying a machine learning model by detecting a sample with high accuracy that is included in the teaching data and very likely to have been mislabeled.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PREDICTIVE ENGAGEMENT
abstract_text: A machine learning (ML) process can include teaching, with a teaching set, a first ML algorithm to generate one or more machine -predicted results. One or more weights can be generated based on the one or more machine-predicted results and the teaching set. A second ML algorithm can be generated based on the one or more weights. Via the second ML algorithm, one or more machine-learned results can be generated. A description of one or more candidates can be received. Based on the one or more machine-learned results, a respective likelihood of interest in a CCG class of positions for each of the one or more candidates can be generated. A respective communication can be transmitted to each of a subset of the one or more candidates open to the respective likelihood of interest in the CCG class of positions for the subset above a threshold.

title: Method for intelligently extracting quality and ability characteristics of higher vocational students
abstract_text: The invention provides a method for intelligently extracting quality and ability characteristics of higher vocational students, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. According to the method, vocational education is tightly combined with a machine vision system, natural language processing, machine learning, computer information processing and the like, so that learning behaviors and action understanding of students are combined, language expression of the students is combined with natural language processing, and quality ability characteristics are extracted; a machine vision system, natural language processing, machine learning, computer information processing and the like are introduced into the field of vocational technology education, and input signals are provided for constructing a quality ability intelligent evaluation system which can be widely applied to various teaching places and all students in vocational technology education.

title: AI education equipment for smart education campus
abstract_text: The invention discloses AI education equipment for a smart education campus, relates to the technical field of teaching office, and solves problems that an existing projection curtain is liable to be affected by wind power in use to cause curtain shaking and affect the projection effect, the projection curtain can only be unfolded up and down in use, the curtain is arranged as a transverse screen, and when vertical screen projection is needed, the use requirement can not be met. The equipment comprises a mounting base, the right end surface of the mounting base is fixedly connected with a group of rotary driving pieces; two pairs of telescopic supporting pieces located on the lower portion of a telescopic mounting base are jointly connected with a set of telescopic components. And the two groups of telescopic components are symmetrically arranged. The teaching curtain can be unfolded or folded, the teaching curtain is convenient to use when unfolded, the occupied space is reduced when folded, the teaching curtain is prevented from being contaminated by dust, meanwhile, the stability of the teaching curtain is better guaranteed through two-way supporting of the teaching curtain, and curtain swinging caused by influences of wind power and the like is effectively reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence demonstrator
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence demonstrator, and relates to the field of industrial demonstration. The demonstrator comprises a demonstrator shell. A display screen, a camera and function keys are arranged at the front end of the demonstrator shell. An AI visual function module, a power supply device and a processor are arranged in the demonstrator shell. The processor is connected with the display screen, the function keys and the power supply device. And the camera is connected with the processor through the AI visual function module. The artificial intelligence demonstrator is suitable for industrial teaching scenes, can solve the problem of poor teaching operation precision, and achieves the effects of improving the operation precision and improving the applicability of the demonstrator.

title: Video playback method and device based on buried point behavior, computer equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a video playback method and device based on buried point behaviors, computer equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: extracting a picture frame sequence in a teaching video according to the attributes of the teaching video, and recognizing a plurality of key picture frames in the picture frame sequence according to preset marks in the picture frames; recognizing knowledge points in each key picture frame, and generating a knowledge point storage time sequence according to the storage time of each key picture frame in the teaching video and the corresponding knowledge points; acquiring point burying behavior data of a user in the teaching video playing process; recognizing knowledge points needing to be played back according to the point burying behavior data and the knowledge point storage time sequence; and playing back the teaching video according to the knowledge points needing to be played back. The knowledge points needing to be played back are rapidly determined based on the point burying behaviors of the user, the playback efficiency of the teaching video is high, the actual requirements of the user are met, and the video playback effect is good.

title: MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEMS AND METHODS FOR PREDICTIVE ENGAGEMENT
abstract_text: A machine learning (ML) process can include teaching, with a teaching set, a first ML algorithm to generate one or more machine-predicted results. One or more weights can be generated based on the one or more machine-predicted results and the teaching set. A second ML algorithm can be generated based on the one or more weights. Via the second ML algorithm, one or more machine-learned results can be generated. A description of one or more candidates can be received. Based on the one or more machine-learned results, a respective likelihood of interest in a CCG class of positions for each of the one or more candidates can be generated. A respective communication can be transmitted to each of a subset of the one or more candidates open to the respective likelihood of interest in the CCG class of positions for the subset above a threshold.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR AI BASED SKILL LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for facilitating skill learning. Multimedia data in different modalities are received, wherein such data are recorded based on a performance exhibiting a skill. The data in each of the modalities are analyzed to extract information exhibited in the performance that is relevant to the skill and is used to generate an animated tutoring script. Such generated animated tutoring script is then archived for future access to enable a skill learning session in an augmented reality.

title: Method for inspecting semiconductor and semiconductor inspecting device
abstract_text: This method for inspecting a semiconductor with an observation system 1 comprises: a step for acquiring a first pattern image that indicates a semiconductor device S pattern; a step for acquiring a second pattern image that indicates the semiconductor device S pattern, the image having a resolution different from that of the first pattern image; a step for learning by machine learning reconfiguration processing for the second pattern image using the first pattern image as teaching data, then reconfiguring the second pattern image into a reconfigured image having a resolution different from that of the second pattern image, the reconfiguration performed using the reconfiguration processing based on the results of said learning; and a step for performing position adjustment on the basis of the first pattern image and an area, in the reconfigured image, calculated as having a high degree of certainty by the reconfiguration processing.

title: Multifunctional artificial intelligence teaching robot equipment
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching, in particular to a multifunctional artificial intelligence teaching robot device, which aims at solving the existing problems and comprises a robot body and a data storage module, a cavity is formed in the robot body, and a rectangular hole is formed in the inner wall of the top side of the cavity. Two vertical rods are fixedly installed on the bottom side of the data storage module, first small holes are formed in one sides of the two vertical rods, two L-shaped rods are installed on the inner wall of the bottom side of the cavityin a sliding mode, and the L-shaped rods are matched with the first small holes; the defect that in the prior art, a data storage module on the robot body is inconvenient to replace is overcome, people can mount and dismount the data storage module by rotating the two iron rods, the damaged data storage module can be replaced in time, operation is easy and convenient, and the requirements of people are met.

title: Teaching mode analysis method and system
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching mode analysis method and system, and the method comprises the steps: detecting an activity sound in a classroom audio, and marking the start time and end time of eachsection of activity sound; cutting the teaching audio according to the start time and the end time of each section of activity sound to obtain a plurality of sections of activity audios; based on thecombined Mel cepstrum feature MFCC vector, extracting different speaker features and durations of different speakers in each section of activity audios; based on a pre-trained universal background model UBM, distinguishing different speaker features into teacher speaking and student speaking, and determining corresponding teacher speaking duration and student speaking duration; and according to the proportion of the speaking duration of the teacher in the total classroom duration, judging whether the classroom teaching mode is a practice-type classroom, a teaching-type classroom or a mixed-type classroom. Interactive utterance data of teachers and students in class are extracted from class audios by adopting an artificial intelligence technology, and teaching modes of the teachers in class are analyzed.

title: QUALITY DETERMINATION SYSTEM, SERVER AND QUALITY DETERMINATION METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a quality determination system, a server, and a program capable of determining the quality of a component of a transport machine, even when an Internet communication speed is limited.SOLUTION: A quality determination system 10 includes: a server 30 that processes an image of a component 14 of a transport machine taken in advance, and creates teaching data for constructing a machine learning model; a machine learning model reception unit 402 that downloads a machine learning model constructed by a machine learning model construction service 80; an imaging unit 60 that captures an image of the component 14 of the transport machine in a pre-shipment inspection process; and a transmission unit 408 that transmits operation information relating to the operating state of the imaging unit 60. The imaging unit 60 includes: a storage unit 604 that stores the machine learning model downloaded by the machine learning model reception unit 402; and a determination unit 606 that determines the quality of the component 14 of the transport machine on the basis of the machine learning model stored in the storage unit 604. The transmission unit 408 transmits the operation information to the server 30.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Multifunctional triangle learning teaching aid
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multifunctional triangle learning teaching aid which comprises a flat plate, a protractor arranged on the flat plate and four strip-shaped enclosing parts with the same length. A grid formed by arranging a plurality of squares is formed on the surface of the flat plate, and the four strip-shaped enclosing parts are sequentially and movably connected end to end to forma rhombus. Any one of the four strip-shaped enclosing parts is used as a fixed enclosing part, the fixed enclosing part is overlapped with the grid lines of the grid, and the end part of one end of the fixed enclosing part is overlapped with the vertex of the grid to form an intersection point; the other one of the four strip-shaped enclosing parts is used as a movable enclosing part, and the endpart of one end of the movable enclosing part is overlapped with the intersection point; meanwhile, the central point of the protractor coincides with the intersection point. The teaching aid organically integrates a plurality of common auxiliary learning tools in daily life to form a multifunctional trigonometric enlightenment and deep learning teaching aid, and can better help primary and secondary school students to learn, understand and master the essence and connotation of triangles.

title: Machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence, which structurally comprises a workbench, and is characterized in that an auxiliary mechanism is arranged at the upper end of a fixed plate, a first handle is rotated, and a limiting ball is in running fit with a first fixed block, so that a sliding block slides at the front end of a base; the fixing device is arranged in the middle of the front end of the limiting rod, and the second handle is rotated clockwise, so that the threaded rod is matched with the shell, and the pressing plateis used for fixing the connecting rod at the rear end of the camera, so that the angle of the camera is adjusted, the adjusting process is simplified, and the delay of experiment teaching time is avoided. The advantage of avoiding displacement in the rotating process is achieved.

title: System and method for assisting teachers and students to communicate after online education live broadcast
abstract_text: The invention discloses a system and a method for assisting teachers and students to communicate with each other after online education live broadcast. A live broadcast classroom module is used for allowing teachers and students to complete online live broadcast classroom teaching and learning; an instant messaging module is used for performing two-party instant messaging or multi-party instant messaging; an AI module identifies the content sent by the student side and sends the content to the server side, and the server side searches in a database and judges whether the knowledge problem anda corresponding solution exist in the database or not; if yes, the server side feeds back the solution to the AI module, the AI module sends the solution to the student side, and otherwise, the AI module forwards the content sent to the teacher by the student to the teacher side to be checked by the teacher side; and the AI module is also used for carrying out pornography authentication, terrorismidentification and government-related detection on the content sent by the student terminal in multi-party instant messaging. According to the invention, communication between students and teachers in online live broadcast education can be promoted, and the user stickiness is enhanced.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device applied to Buddhist field
applicants: MOZI SHENZHEN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the Buddhist field, particularly relates to an artificial intelligence teaching device applied to the Buddhist field, aims to solve the problems of low artificial intelligence performance and few functions of the conventional teaching device in the Buddhist field, and provides the following scheme: the artificial intelligence teaching device comprises a body, a base, amain control module, a voice interaction module, a camera module, an audio output module and a power supply module, wherein the appearance of the body is the sign of a Buddhist image, the base is used for fixing the body, the main control module is used for performing management control on data operation and other modules corresponding to the artificial intelligence teaching device used in the Buddhist field, the voice interaction module is used for acquiring audio information and voice interaction of a user, and the camera module is used for acquiring voice information and voice interactionof the user. And the audio output module is used for playing audio information for a user, and is high in automation degree, convenient to control, diverse in function and high in practicability.

title: Display board for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The display board comprises a working table, an operation platform and a lifter, supporting legs are fixedly connected to the periphery of the bottom end of the working table, non-slip mats are arranged at the bottoms of the supporting legs, a projector is arranged at the top end of the working table, the operation platform is embedded in the surface of the working table, and a display screen is arranged on one side of the operation platform. The lifter is fixedly connected with the display area, so that a user can conveniently lift or lower the small supporting column in the large supportingcolumn by rotating the fixator, and then the height of the display area is lifted or lowered, the bottom plate is arranged on one side of the working table, the lifter is arranged at the top end of the bottom plate, and the display plate body is fixedly connected to the top end of the lifter; one side of the display board body is fixedly connected with a display board shell, the display board bodyis located on one side of the working table, an adjusting button is arranged on one side of the display board shell, an LED lamp shell is embedded in the surface of the display board body, an LED lamp is arranged in the LED lamp shell, and a display area is arranged at the bottom of the display board body.

title: Method, device and equipment for photographing entity building blocks to realize programming
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method, device and equipment for photographing entity building blocks to realize programming, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a building block string image comprising an entity building block string, uploading the building block string image to a cloud, and enabling entity building block patterns of the entity building block string to be in one-to-one correspondence with virtual building block patterns in a building block library in graphical programming; decomposing the building block string image into a plurality of building block images through the cloud; identifying the plurality of building block images through a deep learning model to obtain corresponding virtual building block information in all building block images; and obtaining virtual building block information returned by the cloud, calling the corresponding virtual building blocks in the graphical programming program, and completing programming after splicing the virtual building blocks. According to the embodiment of the invention, in a programming teaching scene of an official school or an educational institution, a child user can learn graphical programming through the entity building blocks, a program can be quickly operated to check a result, and the programming experience of the child user is met.

title: Online and offline combined smart life research system based on big data technology
applicants: BEIJING LEXUE HUIJIAO TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education and teaching, in particular to an online and offline combined smart life research system based on a big data technology, which integrates an XR technology, a fusion communication technology, an AI technology and the big data technology, combines education and life scenes, and realizes online learning, online interaction and online assessment. Online learning experience is realized, through knowledge way investigation, online map learning, interactive accompanying type learning guidance, star value reward issuing and right exchange, thelearning interest of students is stimulated, and the interestingness, effectiveness and continuity of learning are realized. Through the business mode of intelligent life research, the system supportsthe development of industrial resources in a region into a social classroom, can meet the demands of students for insufficient comprehensive practical activity courses and lack of practice, also canreduce the cost of practical education, and achieves the regional, socialized and public welfare of practical research education. A social quality education curriculum system for comprehensive development of German-wisdom physical exhaustion is realized, and comprehensive development of students is promoted.

title: Expression and posture fused bimodal teaching evaluation method and device and storage medium
applicants: SHUNDE GRADUATE SCHOOL UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY BEIJING
abstract_text: The invention discloses an expression and posture fused bimodal teaching evaluation method and device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the video data of a student, and carrying out the preprocessing of the video data; respectively extracting facial expression features and body posture features contained in each image frame through a preset deep learning model; fusing the facial expression features and the body posture features belonging to the same image frame to obtain a fusion feature of each image frame, and obtaining the emotional state of the student according to the fusion feature sequence corresponding to the continuous image frames; and obtaining the learning state of the student based on the emotion state mapping of the student through a preset association coordinate system of the emotion and the learning state, thereby carrying out teaching evaluation through the obtained learning state. Teaching evaluation is carried out by dynamically analyzing facial expressions and body postures of students in a teaching scene, and teaching evaluation can be carried out more accurately.

title: Auxiliary teaching method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an auxiliary teaching method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps that a teaching terminal collects an image of a user in real time through a camera in a teaching operation process of the user, and uploads the image of the user to a cloud server, so as to enable the cloud server to recognize the image of the user, issuing a control instruction to the teaching terminal; and the teaching terminal receives the control instruction and performs non-inductive assistance on the current teaching operation of the user according to the control instruction.

title: Intelligent teaching auxiliary method and system based on AI and IoT
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching auxiliary method and system based on AI and IoT, and the method comprises the steps that a teaching system carries out the behavior data collection of auser, and comprises a teaching system, a camera, and at least one IOT module; the teaching system sends the user behavior data to a cloud server, so that the cloud server analyzes the user behavior data, identifies a behavior mode of the user, and issues a control instruction to the teaching system according to the user behavior mode; and the teaching system receives the control instruction and carries out non-inductive teaching assistance on the user according to the control instruction.

title: Textbook-free child teaching method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a textbook-free child teaching method, which comprises the following steps that: S1, educational toys are integrated and classified, and the classified educational toys correspond to corresponding educational purposes, learning values and using methods; S2, child guiding verbal skills are summarized and organized; S3, the behavioral habits of children are observed, the characters, interests and hobbies of the children are known, and possible behaviors of the children are listed; S4, educational toys and operation orders corresponding to the educational toys are put intouse; S5, a teacher observes the learning conditions of the children and fills in an observation record table; S6, whether the teaching objective is achieved or not is judged according to the performances of the children and the receipts of the operation orders; and S7, if the teaching objective is achieved, the teacher fills in an information sheet, and if the teaching objective is not achieved,the teacher guides the children and fills in an information sheet. The method has the advantages that the theory is combined with the reality, the effectiveness of regional guidance is improved, and deep learning of children is supported.

title: 3 * 120-degree panoramic shooting network camera
applicants: NENGLAI SHANGHAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a 3 * 120-degree panoramic shooting network camera which comprises a housing and a fixing device, the fixing device is in butt joint with the bottom of the housing througha telescopic rod, the housing is in a triangular prism shape, three windows are formed in the outer wall of the housing, a camera and an image sensor are arranged in each window, and the fixing deviceis in butt joint with the bottom of the housing through a telescopic rod. The three cameras and the image sensor are distributed at equal intervals in the circumferential direction on the horizontalplane, and the included angle between every two adjacent cameras and the image sensor is 120 degrees; according to the equipment, the three cameras are simultaneously started to take pictures, then the pictures are uploaded to the server, the pictures are synthesized into a panoramic picture through an algorithm in the server, the number of students in the picture is displayed through artificial intelligence, the number of the students is transmitted to a control end where a teacher is located, roll calling is carried out under the condition that the teaching of the teacher is not affected, and the teaching efficiency is improved. And the equipment communicates with the server by using a data network, so that the high efficiency of offline teaching of the student is ensured.

title: Sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: JIANGSU KAILEYING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching. The sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching comprises a mounting frame, a connecting frame, a radiator, a wiper and a body; a mounting groove is formed in the mounting frame; an inductor is mounted on the left outer side of the mounting device; a connector is mounted at the lower end part of the mounting device; sliding blocks are connected through a connecting spring; the connecting spring is mounted at the end part of the connecting frame; a limiting groove is formed outside a limiting block; acontact power source is mounted below the connector; a rotating groove is formed in the tail end of the connecting frame; and the rotating shaft is mounted at the end part of a protection frame. Thesound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching is provided with the connecting frame and the protection frame; through the arrangement of the parts, under the cooperation effect of the connecting frame and the protection frame, a bulb can be protected, and the situation that the bulb is broken due to foreign objects and cannot be used is prevented; and due to the structural characteristicof the mounting frame, normal use of an intelligent lamp cannot be influenced by the mounting frame and the protection frame.

title: Deep learning-based artificial intelligence system
applicants: XIAN MIKEZHIYI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of auxiliary teaching aids, and discloses a deep learning-based artificial intelligence system, which comprises a fixed frame, and the fixed frame is mounted on a vertical wall through a mounting mechanism, the upper end outside the fixed frame is fixedly connected with a driving motor, and the output end of the driving motor is fixedly connected with ascrew rod; wherein the screw rod is rotatably connected with the fixing frame through two bearings, the screw rod is sleeved with a threaded sleeve, the threaded sleeve is in threaded connection withthe screw rod, an artificial intelligence display main body is fixedly connected to the side wall of the threaded sleeve, and a stabilizing mechanism is arranged between the artificial intelligence display main body and the vertical side walls of the two sides in the fixing frame. The stabilizing mechanism comprises two stabilizing plates, the two stabilizing plates are symmetrically and fixedlyconnected to the side wall in the fixing frame, and limiting grooves are formed in the side walls of the stabilizing plates. According to the invention, students cannot hit, and the artificial intelligence display main body can be well protected.

title: Ultrasonic big data management method and system
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of big data medical treatment, in particular to an ultrasonic big data management method and system, and the system comprises an image sensor, the output end of the image sensor is unidirectionally and electrically connected with an image input module, and the output end of the image input module is unidirectionally and electrically connected with an information editing module. The output end of the information editing module is unidirectionally and electrically connected with an image retrieval module, and the output end of the image retrieval module is bidirectionally and electrically connected with an image analysis module. According to the ultrasonic big data management method and system, existing image data subjected to circling and commenting by doctors is compared and stored, and meanwhile, data fed back by big data is subjected to comparative teaching and misdiagnosis prompt through artificial intelligence; the system effectively achieves the teaching and popularization of medical knowledge for users through the combination of big data and artificial intelligence, and achieves the teaching and prompt of low-annual-capital doctortraining and medical students.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching device, method and equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching device, method and equipment and a storage medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching. The artificial intelligence teaching device comprises an artificial intelligence learning module, a model control module, a resource scheduling module and a display processing module. The artificial intelligence learning module comprises at least one of the following sub-modules: a digital recognition learning sub-module, a voice recognition learning sub-module, a face recognition learning sub-module, a two-dimensional 2D human body posture estimation learning sub-module and a three-dimensional 3D human body posture estimation learning sub-module. And each sub-module in the artificial intelligence learning module is used for providing a processing function of a neural network model based on man-machine interaction. By utilizing the embodiment of the invention, the education and teaching work of artificialintelligence can be intuitively and conveniently carried out.

title: CCD linear image intelligent automobile
applicants: QINGDAO ZHUOHANG RUIZHI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of intelligent automobiles, and particularly relates to a CCD linear image intelligent automobile which comprises an automobile body, a steering unit,a sensing unit and a PLC, the steering unit is installed in the automobile body and used for controlling steering of the automobile body, and the sensing unit is used for sensing a black guide line. The PLC is connected with the sensing unit and the steering unit and is used for controlling the vehicle body to track along a black guide line; a steering engine is used as a steering unit, two directcurrent motors are used as power units, a CCD linear image sensor is used as a sensing unit, rapid tracking along a black guide line can be achieved, C language programming is used, and teaching andlearning of automobile knowledge, an automatic driving principle, an image recognition principle, an artificial intelligence control algorithm and other knowledge can be completed.

title: Automatic teaching device based on artificial intelligence control
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an automatic teaching device based on artificial intelligence control, comprising a device main body, a chute arranged in the middle of the inner cavity of the device mainbody, a sliding plate movably clamped in the chute, a first touch control display screen fixedly connected to the upper end surface of the sliding plate, and a host groove arranged in the lower part of the inner cavity of the device main body. A micro processor and a storage module are fixedly connected to the middle of an inner cavity of the main machine groove, a cooling fan is fixedly connectedto the left portion of the inner cavity of the main machine groove, a separation grid is fixedly connected to the left end of the main machine groove, a wiring board is fixedly connected to the rearend of the device body, and various wiring ports are formed in the wiring board. A rotating shaft is fixedly connected to the upper end of the device body through a rotating shaft base, a display panel is fixedly connected to the upper end of the rotating shaft, a second touch display screen is fixedly connected to the front end face of the display panel, and a camera module is further fixedly connected to the upper portion of the front end face of the display panel. The device is rich in function and practical, and has a certain popularization value.

title: Visual intelligent teaching platform for animal breeding
abstract_text: The invention discloses a visual intelligent teaching platform for animal breeding. The platform comprises a placement platform, wherein the bottom of the placement platform is fixedly connected witha plurality of vertical installation bases, the top of the placement platform is fixedly connected with an installation frame, and the interior of the installation frame is slidingly connected with atext description display screen and a real-time state monitoring screen; rubber strips are fixedly connected to the ends of the same sides of the text description display screen and the real-time state monitoring screen, and a sound receiving device located on the side face of the mounting frame is fixedly connected to the top of the containing table. According to the respiration simulator, the arrangement of the real-time state monitoring screen can achieve the real-time watching of a farm field video, and the arrangement of the sound receiving equipment can receive the farm field sound in real time, and thereby a large number of current practical training expenses and a large practical training risk coefficient are achieved, and the emerging technologies of artificial intelligence and virtual reality are effectively employed; and real-time dynamic connection between the school theory class and the enterprise farm is realized.

title: Internet precision teaching method and system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet precision teaching method and system based on big data and artificial intelligence, relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching, and the method is characterized by searching historical network footprint data of a user in real time, and obtaining interest and hobby field information of the user after data classification and data analysis; matching corresponding knowledge point courses from a pre-constructed course database; extracting knowledge point information in the knowledge point course, matching an example total set associated with the knowledge point information, and selecting an example subset matched with the hobby and interest field information; and generating an example link, embedding the example link into a position corresponding to the knowledge point information in the knowledge point course, and obtaining the internet precision teaching course after updating. According to the method, the teaching examples capable of reflecting the teaching thought are constructed in combination with the fields which students are really interested in and knowledge point information, attraction to the students can be continuously kept through the teaching examples, and meanwhile, the working intensity of teaching personnel can be reduced.

title: Practical and convenient artificial intelligence teaching platform
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a practical and convenient artificial intelligence teaching platform, comprising a base and an operation platform arranged at the top of the base, the front surface of thebase is rotatably connected with two front doors, the two sides of the operation platform are respectively provided with a side supporting plate, the two sides of the operation platform are respectively fixed with two rotating seats, and the rotating seats are fixedly connected with the two rotating seats. The bottom ends of the side supporting plates are rotationally connected with the rotating seat, and two supporting block grooves are formed in the surfaces of the two sides of the machine base correspondingly; by arranging the rotating seat, the supporting block groove, the retractable supporting block, the first spring chamber, the abutting block, the limiting clamping head, the limiting clamping groove, the pull rod and the pull block, the side supporting plate can be directly rotatedand retracted when not used, so that the situation that the side supporting plate extends out to occupy the space on the two sides of the platform is avoided, and when the side supporting plate needsto be used again subsequently, the space is saved. The side supporting plate only needs to be unfolded in a rotating mode and supported through the foldable supporting blocks, and therefore the sidesupporting plate is more practical and convenient to use in the actual using process.

title: Method for establishing, issuing and preventing counterfeiting of boutique question bank based on three-dimensional teaching material and teaching system thereof
applicants: BEIJING GUANGYI SANWEN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for establishing, issuing and preventing counterfeiting of a boutique question bank based on a three-dimensional teaching material and a teaching system thereof, andaims to provide a digital content management system for teaching material publishing, combine paper books with digital resources, and push out a large number of exercise banks comparable with printingpublishing quality. A user can check AR, VR, H5 and other digitalized resource contents by scanning a book with mobile equipment, an online and offline hybrid teaching and learning data support platform is provided, and big data and AI technologies are applied to realize teaching according to materials and learning thousands of people for thousands of times in teaching, and a multi-dimensional holographic three-dimensional learning-assisting and teaching-assisting solution for serving higher education is truly formed.

title: Artificial intelligence (AI) teaching product device
applicants: JIANGSU KAILEYING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence (AI) teaching product device which comprises universal wheels, an electric motor, a dust collector, a main body and a writing zone. A supporting frame is connected to the upper parts of the universal wheels; the main body is installed in the supporting frame; connecting bolts are installed on the supporting frame; a loudspeaker box is installed atthe front end of the main body; a display screen is installed at the front end of the main body; a dust receiving box is installed above the main body; an illuminating lamp is installed at the lowerend of the main body; the writing zone is installed at the rear end of the main body; a cover plate is connected to the rear end of the main body; the electric motor is installed in the main body; thedust collector is installed in the main body; and meanwhile, a scraping strip is connected to the rear end of the main body. According to the AI teaching product device, the universal wheels, the supporting frame and the connecting bolts are arranged, and when the device is used, the device can be conveyed to a proper position through cooperation of the universal wheels and the supporting frame,so that limitation is removed; and meanwhile, the connecting bolts can be used for switching the display screen and the writing zone for the device.

title: Visual experiment equipment for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The embodiment of the utility model provides a visual experiment device for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a main control part, the main control part comprises a main control systemboard and a main control suite, the main control system board is provided with an NPU, a CPU processor, a memory and storage module and a data interface, the data interface comprises a plurality of USB ports, and the main control suite comprises an AI calculation rod. One of the plurality of USB ports is in communication connection with an AI calculation rod; the system further comprises a visualexperiment special suite, the NPU and/or AI calculation rod can at least perform operation processing on visual data acquired by the visual experiment special suite, and the memory and storage modulecan at least support artificial intelligence experiment operation processing and data storage. According to the utility model, the main control part is provided with the NPU and the AI computing rod,so that the computing power of experimental equipment is greatly improved, and the processing performance is improved; meanwhile, different visual modules can be adopted to enrich experiment scenes through the external visual experiment special suite.

title: QUALITY DETERMINATION SYSTEM, SERVER AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are a quality determination system, a server, and a program which can determine the quality of a component of a transport machine, even when the internet communication environment is constrained.　A quality determination system 10 comprises: a server 30 that processes an image of a transport machine component 14 imaged in advance, and creates teaching data for constructing a machine learning model; a machine learning model reception unit 402 that downloads a machine learning model constructed by a machine learning model construction service 80; an imaging unit 60 that captures an image of the transport machine component 14 in a pre-shipment inspection process; and a transmission unit 408 that transmits operation information relating to the operating state of the imaging unit 60. The imaging unit 60 includes: a storage unit 604 that stores the machine learning model downloaded by the machine learning model reception unit 402; and a determination unit 606 that determines the quality of the transport machine component 14 on the basis of the machine learning model stored in the storage unit 604. The transmission unit 408 transmits the operation information to the server 30.

title: TRAINING A USER-SYSTEM DIALOG IN A TASK-ORIENTED DIALOG SYSTEM
abstract_text: Methods and systems are disclosed for improving dialog management for task-oriented dialog systems. The disclosed dialog builder leverages machine teaching processing to improve development of dialog managers. In this way, the dialog builder combines the strengths of both rule-based and machine-learned approaches to allow dialog authors to: (1) import a dialog graph developed using popular dialog composers, (2) convert the dialog graph to text-based training dialogs, (3) continuously improve the trained dialogs based on log dialogs, and (4) generate a corrected dialog for retraining the machine learning.

title: MONITORING CAMERA AND DETECTION METHOD
applicants: PANASONIC I PRO SENSING SOLUTIONS CO LTD
abstract_text: To enable a user to flexibly set a detection target desired to detect to a monitoring camera.SOLUTION: A monitoring camera provided with artificial intelligence comprises: a sound collection unit; a communication unit which receives a parameter teaching an event of a detection target; and a processing unit which constructs the artificial intelligence based on the parameter and uses the constructed artificial intelligence to detect the event of the detection target from a sound collected by the sound collection unit.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 30

title: Software and hardware combined artificial intelligence education learning system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a software and hardware combined artificial intelligence education learning system. The system comprises graphical programming software based on block secondary development, ahardware platform customized for artificial intelligence education and a learning platform used for storing user information and assisting teaching management. The graphical programming software comprises a graphical programming Web end program and a Python server end program. According to the method, storage and loading of a single function definition programming block and display and hiding of afunction definition body are set, function blocks spliced by a user before can be loaded at any time when a project is needed, and function body definitions are hidden during graphical programming ofa complex program, so that a programming area is concise, and the user experience is better; programming blocks can be automatically generated, more artificial intelligence application cases can be conveniently developed on the system, and the expandability is high; python codes generated by software are directly operated and set to be self-started through an interface button, and creation of physical creative works of students is facilitated.

title: AI-based multi-source financial management comprehensive teaching simulation system
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI-based multi-source financial management comprehensive teaching simulation system, which comprises an AI server, an intelligent communication gateway, data comprehensiveexhibition stands, simulation control terminals, identity authentication terminals and a communication network, and is characterized in that each data comprehensive exhibition stand is intelligently connected with a plurality of simulation control terminals through the gateway to form a teaching work group, wherein each teaching work group is connected with the AI server through the intelligent communication gateway, and in the simulation control terminals, each simulation control terminal is connected with one identity authentication terminal. The teaching method comprises two steps of systemconfiguration, teaching simulation and the like. On one hand, the installation and maintenance convenience of the equipment and the universality during application are greatly improved, on the otherhand, the use and maintenance cost is effectively reduced, and on the other hand, the system has good networking operation capability and good system expansion capability, and realizes comprehensive management of students, thereby greatly expanding ways and means of related teaching information display in teaching activities.

title: 7DOF two-wheeled multi-pose robot
applicants: TIANJIN UNIV OF TECHNOLOGY AND EDUCATION CHINA VOCATIONAL TRAINING INSTRUCTOR TRAINING CENTER
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a 7DOF two-wheel multi-posture robot. The 7DOF two-wheel multi-posture robot comprises a vehicle body, a left wheel, a right wheel, a pair of wheel power mechanisms and apair of wheel steering mechanisms, the pair of wheel power mechanisms and the pair of wheel steering mechanisms are symmetrically installed on the left side and the right side of the vehicle body respectively, the pair of wheel power mechanisms can be fixedly connected with the left wheel and the right wheel respectively and drive the left wheel and the right wheel to move, and the wheel steeringmechanisms control steering of the left wheel and the right wheel respectively. Therefore, the left wheel and the right wheel can realize coaxial balance bike type motion, and can also realize bike type motion with two parallel wheel planes. Movement with seven degrees of freedom is achieved, the functions of experiments, teaching, scientific research and the like are integrated, and the functionsof transportation, rescue, riding instead of walking, entertainment and the like on specific occasions can be completed. Meanwhile, the system can be used as a typical teaching and scientific research experiment platform and a research carrier of subjects such as intelligent control, artificial intelligence and robots, and can be used for detecting the effectiveness of various intelligent algorithms.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: ANHUI YUNTAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine comprises an intelligent machine body, a supporting rod, a base, a cleaning assembly, a heat dissipation assembly, a moving assembly and a driving air cylinder. The driving air cylinder and the heat dissipation assembly are arranged on the supporting rod. The lower end of the intelligent machine main body is rotationally connected with a piston rod of the driving cylinder; the cleaning assembly is arranged at the display end of the intelligent machine body. The base is rotationally arranged at the bottom end of the supporting rod; the moving assembly is arranged on the base. The intelligent machine is provided with the cleaning assembly, the intelligent machine body is rapidly cleaned, cleaning is convenient, and the cleaning effect isgood; the heat dissipation assembly is arranged, and the heat dissipation fan supplies air while moving, so that the air supply range is enlarged, and the heat dissipation speed is increased; a moving assembly is arranged, so that the threaded rod moves up and down along the mounting plate, moving wheels make contact with the ground or get away from the ground, moving and transporting are convenient, and using is flexible.

title: Auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: JIANGSU ZHIKU ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an auxiliary robot for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a robot body, a sensor is arranged outside the robot body, a processor is arranged inside the robotbody, a hinge base is arranged on the front surface of the robot body, a display screen is hinged to the hinge base, and a limiting device is arranged at the hinge position. A loudspeaker is arrangedoutside the robot body, a mounting seat is arranged on the lower surface of the robot body, two universal wheels are rotatably connected to the lower surface of the mounting seat, and the display andthe loudspeaker output corresponding reply information to meet the early education function. The display angle of the display is adjustable, so that the requirements of different users for differentviewing angles are met; the robot body is driven by the lower driving device to move together, the function of turning around when encountering obstacles is achieved, the function is completely achieved through a traditional mechanical structure, a child can play with the robot body after learning for a period of time, and the purpose of teaching through lively activities is achieved.

title: Auxiliary teaching method, device and equipment based on knowledge graph and storage medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an auxiliary teaching method, device and equipment based on a knowledge graph, and a storage medium, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and canbe applied to a smart education scene, thereby promoting the construction of a smart city. The method comprises the steps of extracting keywords and knowledge points from a pre-stored knowledge base to construct a knowledge graph; if the wrong question text sent by the terminal is received, extracting a keyword to be queried from the wrong question text; and obtaining knowledge points associated with the to-be-queried keyword from the knowledge graph to form a knowledge point set, and sending the knowledge point set to a terminal. By constructing the knowledge graph, after the to-be-queried keyword extracted from the wrong question text is obtained, the associated knowledge points can be searched from the knowledge graph to form the knowledge point set, so that weak knowledge points of students can be quickly and accurately counted for teachers, and the teachers can quickly know the learning conditions of the students; therefore, a teaching plan can be made more accurately.

title: VR teaching multimedia demonstration platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a VR teaching multimedia demonstration platform based on artificial intelligence. The VR teaching multimedia demonstration platform comprises a storage box, a connecting frameand supporting sleeves, the connecting frame is movably connected to the middle position of the interior of the storage box, in addition, movable spiral sleeves are fixedly connected to the two sidesof the connecting frame, fixing supporting rods are fixedly connected to the two sides of the bottom end of the storage box, the supporting sleeves are arranged outside the fixing supporting rods, placement plates are fixedly connected to the middle positions of the two sides of the interior of the storage box, and a control panel is arranged in the middle position of one side of the exterior of the storage box. According to the VR teaching multimedia demonstration platform, through fixed spiral sleeves fixedly connected to one sides of the bottom ends of the supporting sleeves, rotating rodson the two sides can be rotated to drive second spiral rods to rotate in the fixed spiral sleeves, so that the second spiral rods can drive supporting bases to move in the fixed spiral sleeves, so that the supporting bases on the two sides can slowly make contact with the ground, so that the demonstration platform can be stably placed on the ground, and therefore the stability of the platform during use is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: JIANGSU KAILEYING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine. The artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine comprises a base body, electric telescopic rods, check blocks, aservo motor and a displayer, wherein an adjustable supporting base is arranged at the lower end of the base body, a handle fixing base is arranged on the front face of the base body, the handle fixing base is connected to an anti-skid handle, the electric telescopic rods are connected to the upper end of the base body, and a motor box body is fixed to the upper ends of the electric telescopic rods, a groove is formed inside the motor box body, and the check blocks are arranged in the groove. The artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine is provided with the electric telescopic rods,a rotating shaft, the servo motor, a first gear and a second gear, so that the angle and height of the machine are convenient to adjust, and the working principle of the machine is that a remote controller is operated to start the servo motor in the motor box body, the servo motor drives the first gear to rotate, the first gear drives the second gear to rotate, the rotating shaft rotates, a rotating base rotates, the displayer rotates, the electric telescopic rods can be controlled to ascend and descend by operating the remote controller, and therefore the height of the displayer is controlled.

title: Mobile device for teaching in artificial intelligence aspect
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching moving device for artificial intelligence, which belongs to the technical field of teaching moving devices and comprises a shell, a sliding groove is formed in the lower surface of the inner wall of the shell, two sliding blocks are connected into the sliding groove in a sliding mode, and threaded cylinders are fixedly connected to the upper surfaces of the two sliding blocks.
