The left end of the threaded rod is sleeved with a first bearing, the first bearing is connected to the left side face of the inner wall of the shell in a clamped mode, and the upper surfaces of the two threaded cylinders are movably connected with the bottom ends of a first supporting rod and a second supporting rod through first pin shafts correspondingly. According to the moving device for teaching in the artificial intelligence aspect, through mutual cooperation of a torsion block, a threaded rod, a threaded cylinder, a placement shell and intelligent teaching equipment,a worker can conveniently adjust the height of the device, and when the worker carries out teaching, the height of the device is matched with the height of the worker, so that the teaching efficiencyis improved. And workers can conveniently use the device.

title: Robot teaching aid for artificial intelligence education of primary and secondary school students
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a robot teaching aid for artificial intelligence education of primary and secondary school students, which comprises a supporting structure, a control module, a driving module, a sensor module and an actuator module which are respectively and detachably fixed on the supporting structure. Wherein the control module at least comprises one or more of a computer programmingcontroller, a macro instruction programming controller and a macro instruction programming download board, the control module is electrically connected with the driving module and the sensor module respectively, and the driving module is fixedly connected with the actuator module. According to the utility model, a plurality of programming control panels such as a computer programming controller,a macro instruction programming controller and a macro instruction programming download board are arranged, and the programming control panels are not limited to a single programming mode any more.

title: Classroom teaching device based on artificial intelligence analysis
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a classroom teaching device based on artificial intelligence analysis, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence teaching. The classroom teaching device based onartificial intelligence analysis comprises a fixing base, a transmission shaft base and a rectangular plate, the fixing base is connected with the fixing plate, the fixing plate is connected with theconnecting shaft base, the connecting shaft base is connected with the rotating plate, the rotating plate is connected with the dust shielding cover, and the fixing base is provided with a sliding groove, a sliding groove connecting bearing, a bearing connecting lead screw and a clamping sliding block of the sliding groove. The side wall of the lead screw is sleeved with the sliding block, the sliding block is connected with the second rotating shaft seat, the second rotating shaft seat is connected with the connecting strip, the rotating plate is connected with the first rotating shaft seat,the connecting strip is connected with the first rotating shaft seat, the first transmission mechanism is arranged between the transmission shaft seat and the lead screw, and the second transmission mechanism is arranged between the rectangular plate and the transmission shaft seat. According to the classroom teaching device based on artificial intelligence analysis, the projection effect of the projector is guaranteed, students can watch projection information on the curtain conveniently, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Low-voltage centralized meter reading autonomous operation and maintenance AI simulation platform
applicants: HENAN NENGCHUANG ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a low-voltage centralized meter reading autonomous operation and maintenance AI simulation platform, and the platform comprises a bearing part, a line electric leakage simulation module, a meter box housing live-line simulation module, a multi-meter fault simulation module, and a low-voltage distribution box which supplies power to all modules. The bearing part is a rectangular cylinder, the side walls, perpendicular to a horizontal plane, of the cylinder body are sequentially provided with a first side wall, a second side wall, a third side wall and a fourth side wallof an installation line electric leakage simulation module, a meter box shell electrification simulation module, a multi-meter fault simulation module and a power supply low-voltage distribution box,and a cavity for laying the wires of each module and the wires of the low-voltage distribution box is arranged in the column body. According to the invention, each module is supported by the column body, so that simulation teaching and operation use are facilitated; and meanwhile, all the modules are integrated on independent surfaces, so that the simulation experiment teaching efficiency can be improved in subsequent simulation operation, the simulation operation of the three simulation modules can be carried out at the same time, and efficient and high-quality simulation is guaranteed.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
applicants: JIANGXI TAIDE INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education robot, relates to the technical field of intelligent education, and solves the technical problems that an existing education robot cannot update learning materials in time and cannot customize a learning plan according to learning records of children. According to the education robot, a learning planning module is arranged, the result mean value is obtained according to the learning curve and the learning records of the learning materials, the learning efficiency of children is analyzed according to the historical learning records ofchildren, and the teaching efficiency of the education robot can be improved; a cloud server is arranged, firmware versions and learning materials of the education robot are updated through the cloudserver, the working efficiency of the education robot is guaranteed, and meanwhile the learning quality of children can be improved; the education robot is provided with the fault detection module, and the fault detection module performs fault analysis on hardware equipment and a built-in sensor, generates an early warning signal and sends the early warning signal to an intelligent terminal of auser, so the user can discover fault information of the education robot in time, and learning of children is prevented from being affected.

title: Energy efficiency artificial intelligence online analysis system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an energy efficiency artificial intelligence online analysis system which comprises an analysis body. The analysis body comprises an acquisition module, and the acquisition module is used for acquiring teaching evaluation of students on teachers and generating specific numerical values. According to the invention, data information output ends of a plurality of student terminals are connected with an input end of an arrangement module, and the arrangement module carries out the averaging of the collected data, forms a final data numerical value, is used for collecting the teaching evaluation of students for teachers, and generates the specific numerical value.

title: Simulation device for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The invention discloses a simulation device for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a mainframe box, a manipulator, support legs, an electric push rod and a piston bin, a support block is hinged to the bottom of the outer side of the piston bin, the push rod end of the electric push rod is slidably connected in the piston bin, a piston is mounted at the push rod end, and a slider isslidably connected to the side wall of the piston bin. A connecting rod is hinged between the sliding block and the supporting block, a compression spring is pressed between the sliding block and thesupporting table, and a limiting mechanism for the push rod end of the electric push rod is arranged in the piston bin. The manipulator is covered with a protective cover, the supporting blocks drivenby the electric push rods are additionally arranged on the supporting legs, the supporting blocks can be put down through the electric push rods when the equipment moves to a display position, the whole equipment is jacked up to enable the moving wheels to be away from the ground, the mainframe box is positioned more stably, the supporting blocks and the moving wheels are installed on the supporting legs, space is saved, and maintenance is convenient. The protective cover is additionally arranged on the manipulator, so that protective and dustproof effects can be effectively achieved in after-class time, and the manipulator is prevented from being damaged or being in poor contact.

title: INSPECTION DEVICE
abstract_text: An inspection device inspects of goods that include plural articles that sometimes overlap each other. An X-ray inspection device irradiates goods containing plural articles having a predetermined shape and inspects the goods on the basis of inspection images obtained from radiation that has passed through the goods or radiation that has reflected off the goods. The X-ray inspection device includes a storage component, a learning component, and an inspection component. The storage component stores, as teaching images, at least the inspection images of the goods that are in a state in which the plural articles overlap each other. The learning component acquires, by machine learning using the teaching images stored in the storage component, features relating to the goods that are in a state in which the plural articles overlap each other. The inspection component inspects the goods using the features that the learning component has acquired.

title: TEACHING DATA GENERATION DEVICE, TEACHING DATA GENERATION PROGRAM, AND TEACHING DATA GENERATION METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a teaching data generation device, a teaching data generation program and a teaching data generation method for enhancing the safety and rapidity of an endoscopic surgery realizing low invasion property.SOLUTION: The teaching data generation device for generating teaching data used for machine learning comprises: a moving image operation unit which performs playback, rewinding playback, and stop of image data displayed on a display unit; a data processing unit which gives annotation to the image data displayed on the display unit; and a generation unit which edits the image data given the annotation and generates teaching data. The data processing unit gives annotation to an organ exposed in image data played back and displayed, and gives annotation to a portion where the organ is not exposed in image data rewound-played back and displayed and where the organ was exposed in image data prior to rewinding playback.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 9

title: IMAGE RECOGNITION DEVICE, IMAGE RECOGNITION METHOD, AND IMAGE RECOGNITION PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are an image recognition device, an image recognition method, and an image recognition program that require few teaching images when learning is carried out, and that have a high recognition accuracy and have a low calculation load, due to the use of state information of an imaging device at the time of imaging.　The image recognition device includes: a recognition unit which is a machine learning model trained on the basis of teaching images captured by an imaging device in a first state expressed by first state information; an input image acquisition unit that acquires an input image captured by the imaging device in a second state, and second state information expressing the second state; and an image conversion unit that, on the basis of the second state information, generates a converted image by applying, to the input image, conversion processing so as to approach the image captured in the first state.

title: Virtual reality intelligent teaching cloud platform based on 5G technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual reality intelligent teaching cloud platform based on the 5G technology, and particularly relates to an intelligent teaching cloud platform based on the 5G technology,the big data technology, the cloud computing technology, the artificial intelligence technology and the virtual reality and augmented reality technology. The platform comprises a teacher end system,a student end system and a cloud course library system. The platform adopts a four-layer structure design, and comprises a cloud service layer, a data layer, a business logic layer and a presentationlayer. According to the invention, the virtual reality technology and the 5G technology are combined, under the promotion of 5G, images transmitted by the VR intelligent teaching cloud platform are clearer, the processing results of the cloud course library and the cloud server can be transmitted to the user terminal in real time through the bandwidth and speed of 5G, and the image quality and experience of VR are greatly improved. Through a brand-new 5G + VR teaching mode, teachers and students in different classes and even in different schools can be gathered in the same virtual space to carry out immersive interactive virtual learning, so that the teaching efficiency is further improved.

title: School building site selection method and device
abstract_text: The invention provides a school building site selection method and device, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence AIs, and the method comprises the steps of obtaining the address information of at least two to-be-built schools; after the at least two to-be-built schools are introduced, respectively calculating the overall burden pressure level of the schools in the school district range to which the to-be-built schools belong, and wherein the overall burden pressure level represents the difference between the inventory of the teaching resources of the schools and the appeals for the teaching resources; and selecting one of the addresses of the at least two schools to be built as a final school building address, wherein the overall burden pressure level, calculated according tothe final school building address, of the schools in the school district range is lower than the overall burden pressure level, calculated according to the addresses of the other schools to be built,of the schools in the school district range. According to the technical scheme, when the address of the newly-built school is planned, the burden pressure of the newly-built school on the adjacent school is fully considered, so that the site selection of the newly-built school is more scientific and reasonable.

title: Specific personality dialogue robot training method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a training robot system and method with specific personality and dialogue functions. The virtual robot corresponds to fivefactors in the big five personality factor model, namely camber, followability, responsibility, neurology and openness. Based on psychological sample examples, intelligent natural language processingis performed on language samples of mental patients of each personality, and a language prediction model with a specific personality is established by using a deep learning technology. And then a candidate answer group is extracted from a retrieval document set retrieved according to the user question by adopting an IFIDF calculation method, a standard answer is selected from the candidate answergroup by adopting a correlation similarity calculation method, and thus feeding back the standard answer to the user. And a direct and interactive virtual robot with specific personality is provided for psychological teaching and simulation training.

title: Skill learning practical training education system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU CHUANGSHE FUTURE EDUCATION DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a skill learning practical training education system based on artificial intelligence, wherein the system comprises a login authentication module, a learning information obtaining module, a resource matching module, a skill learning module, and a learning result evaluation module. The learning results of learners are evaluated by means of evaluation, so the learners can timely and quickly know the mastering condition of the learning knowledge after learning, and the learning misunderstanding of the learners can be conveniently exposed through evaluation, so that the skill education personnel can better carry out targeted explanation and guidance for the learning misunderstanding of the learners; besides, through targeted explanation and guidance, the learning misunderstanding of the learners is further reinforced and consolidated in a teaching aiding manner, so that the learners do not have knowledge misunderstanding after skill learning, the learning quality isensured, and meanwhile, the learners can fully master the skill knowledge.

title: STORAGE AND AUTOMATED METADATA EXTRACTION USING MACHINE TEACHING
abstract_text: Techniques configuring a machine learning model include receiving, via a user interface configured to communicate with a machine learning model hosted on a collaborative computing platform, a selection of a file for input to the machine learning model, a selection of content in the file for input to the machine learning model, and instructions for applying the selected content to the machine learning model, which are sent to the machine learning model. As new files are uploaded to the selected directories of the collaborative computing platform, the machine learning model is applied to the uploaded files to classify the files and extract metadata. The extracted metadata and associated classification data are stored in data structures associated with the new files. The data structures are existing data structures of the collaborative computing platform.

title: INTERFACE FOR MACHINE TEACHING MODELING
abstract_text: Techniques configuring a machine learning model include instantiating a user interface configured to communicate with a machine learning model hosted on a collaborative computing platform. A selection of a file for input to the machine learning model, a selection of content in the file for input to the machine learning model, and instructions for applying the selected content to the machine learning model are received and sent to the machine learning model. A selection of one or more directories and an instruction to apply the machine learning model are sent to the machine learning model.

title: Intelligent children programming teaching system

title: Training robot system and method under fine classification negative symptom background
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, and relates to a training robot system and method under a fine classification negative symptom background. The virtual robot correspondsto five factors in the big five personality factor model, namely extroversion, agreeableness, responsibility, nervousness and openness. Intelligent natural language processing is performed on the patient language sample of each personality based on the sample instances of the fine-graded (negative symptoms and scores are greater than or equal to 2) patients, and a language prediction model with specific personality is established by using a deep learning technology. Then, a candidate answer group is extracted from a retrieval document set retrieved according to the user question by adopting anIF-IDF calculation method, a standard answer is selected from the candidate answer group by adopting a correlation similarity calculation method, and the standard answer is fed back to the user. A direct and interactive virtual robot with a specific personality refined score (negative symptom) background is provided for psychological teaching and simulation training.

title: Training robot system and method with depressive disorder characteristics

Based on the sample instance of the depressive disorder patient, intelligent natural language processing is performed on the patient language sample of each personality, and a language prediction model with a specific personality is established by using a deep learning technology. Then, a candidate answer group is extracted from a retrieval document set retrieved according to the user question by adopting an IF-IDF calculation method, a standard answer is selected from the candidate answer group by adopting a correlation similarity calculation method, and the standard answer is fed back to the user. A direct and interactive virtual robot with a depressive disorder background with a specific personality is provided for psychological teaching and simulation training.

title: Training robot system and method under positive symptom refined classification background

The virtualrobot corresponds to five factors in the big five personality factor model, namely extroversion, agreeableness, responsibility, nervousness and openness. The method includes: performing intelligent natural language processing on the patient language sample of each personality based on the sample instances of the refined (positive symptoms, scores are greater than or equal to 2) patients, and establishing a language prediction model with specific personality by using a deep learning technology; and then extracting a candidate answer group from a retrieval document set retrieved according to theuser question by adopting an IF-IDF calculation method, selecting a standard answer from the candidate answer group by adopting a correlation similarity calculation method, and feeding back the standard answer to the user. A direct and interactive virtual robot with a specific personality refined score (positive symptom) background is provided for psychological teaching and simulation training.

title: Classroom attendance method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: MAANSHAN NINGJU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom attendance method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of classroom intelligent attendance. The system comprises a high-definition camera which shoots a plurality of panoramic images regularly and transmits the panoramic images to a multimedia console; an image separation module which separates the panoramic images to obtain a plurality of single head portraits; a face recognition module in the multimedia console which recognizes the single head portraits to obtain student identities to form a panoramic attendance table; and a comparison screening module which acquires a suspected absence list according to the face recognition attendance table, the panoramic attendance table and the attendance roll call table. The suspected absence list is acquired through thecomparison screening module according to the face recognition attendance table, the panoramic attendance table and the attendance roll call table, theattendance checking efficiency of classroom teaching management is improved, the attendance checking time is saved, and the teaching management quality is improved while students are prevented from escaping classes.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to estimating one or more parameters on a system including a plurality of nodes. In one example, the system comprises: one or more learner nodes, each of which is configured for generating information related to a group of words for estimating the one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model; and a plurality of server nodes, each of which is configured for obtaining a plurality of sub-vectors each of which is a portion of a vector that represents a word in the group of words, updating the sub-vectors based at least partially on the information to generate a plurality of updated sub-vectors, and estimating at least one of the one or more parameters associated with the machine learning model based on the plurality of updated sub-vectors.

title: Teaching application system and method based on AI software system and medium

In addition, the invention further discloses a teaching applicationmethod, and the teaching application method is used for teaching through the teaching application system. In addition, the invention further discloses a computer readable storage medium in which a computer program is stored, and the teaching application method is realized when the computer program is processed and executed.

title: Video highlight processing method and device for explanation synchronization, computer equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides an explanation synchronization video highlight processing method and device, computer equipment and a medium, andthe method comprises the steps: extracting a picture frame sequence and a voice text sequence in a teaching video according to the attributes of the teaching video; identifying a plurality of key picture frames according to preset marks in the picture frames, and segmenting the voice text sequence according to the plurality of key picture frames to obtain a plurality of voice text segments; determining the occurrence position of each picture text in each key picture frame in the corresponding key picture frame; matching a target voice text corresponding to each picture text from the voice textfragment; generating a highlight position time sequence table according to the appearing position of each picture text in each key picture frame and the time of the corresponding target voice text; and performing highlight rendering on files in the teaching video based on a highlight position time sequence table. According to the invention, the file in the video and the explanation progress are synchronously highlighted and followed, and the video processing efficiency is high.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system, and the system comprises an interactive teaching module used for realizing interactive teaching in a modethat a teaching video is played and carries a dynamic dialogue and realizing real-time tracking of a learning progress; a learning obstacle point detection module which is used for calling the corresponding learning condition detection test questions and the learning obstacle point detection model to realize detection of learning obstacle points of the user according to the real-time learning progress so as to obtain the learning obstacle points of the user; a learning material configuration module which is used for realizing configuration of learning materials of the user according to the learning obstacle points obtained through detection, wherein each learning obstacle point corresponds to one group of learning materials; and a learning task generation module which is used for generating a corresponding learning task according to the learning material corresponding to each learning obstacle point. According to the invention, the learning data of students can be collected in real time, and the learning conditions of students can be evaluated, thereby correspondingly adjusting the subsequent learning contents and paths, achieving the personalized learning of thousands of persons,and greatly improving the learning efficiency.

title: Object recognition auxiliary device for university teaching based on machine learning

The object recognition auxiliary device for university teaching based on machinelearning is convenient to use and diverse in function, and has good development prospects.

title: Network online education system
applicants: GUANGDONG HENGDIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD

title: Teaching interaction method, device and equipment based on AI portrait segmentation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching interaction method, device and equipment based on AI portrait segmentation. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a teacher image; processing the acquired teacher image through an AI technology to obtain a portrait area corresponding to the teacher; obtaining course content of the current live broadcast course, and matching corresponding materialsaccording to the course content; filling the background area of the teacher image with the material to generate a target teacher image; and performing stream pushing on the target teacher image in a live streaming form. According to the embodiment of the invention, the background area in the teacher image can be replaced according to the course content in the online education scene, and the watching experience and teaching interestingness of students are improved.

title: Teaching resource recommendation model training method
applicants: EDUCLOUD ZHI DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching resource recommendation model training method. The method comprises the steps: S1, selecting a certain number of subject teachers to which target resources T belongfor recommendation; s2, collecting behavior data of each subject teacher for the target resource, and training a machine learning model ExtraModel; s3, recommending the target resources according to the model in the step S2; s4, continuing to train the model; and S5, repeating the steps S3 and S4 for a period of time T1, and ending after the time is ended.The invention relates to the technical field of online education. According to the teaching resource recommendation model training method, an existing recommendation model can effectively support smooth release of new resources, the exposurerate of the new resources can be rapidly increased, the good resources can be rapidly screened out, a benign resource updating mechanism can be established, The purpose of enhancing the recommendationcapability of new teaching resources in a basic model through auxiliary model training based on a specified data set is well achieved.

title: Online education course sharing distribution platform based on artificial intelligence

After a user logs in the teaching platform through mobile equipment, course learning corresponding to the user can be searched for through search navigation; the user can freely select a learning mode by arranging an online live broadcast module and an offline question answering module; the user can watch the course live broadcast through the network, and can also learn and discuss with other users through the offline question answering module to communicate with others for difficult questions, communication experience and communication success to realize self-adaptive learning, so that the learning interestingness is greatly improved, and the learning efficiency of the user is improved.

title: Online student learning behavior recognition system based on artificial intelligence technology
applicants: HUNAN GREAT WALL TECH INFORMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online student learning behavior recognition system based on an artificial intelligence technology. The online student learning behavior recognition system based on the artificial intelligence technology comprises a human body expression recognition system or/and a human body behavior recognition system, the human body expression recognition system recognizes micro expressions including tiredness and fatigue of students, and the human body behavior recognition system recognizes behaviors including sleepiness, inattention of sight and poor eyesight of the students. Thehuman body expression recognition system or/and the human body behavior recognition system recognize the learning state of the student through the deep learning neural network and output the learningstate effect of the student. The system can achieve the automatic recognition of the learning state of the students in the online class, and provides data support for the evaluation of the teaching effect of teachers.

title: Cell Image Analysis Apparatus, Cell Image Analysis System, Method of Generating Training Data, Method of Generating Trained Model, Training Data Generation Program, and Method of Producing Training Data
abstract_text: A cell image analysis apparatus that can achieve less time and effort for labeling for generation of teaching data than in a conventional example is provided. The cell image analysis apparatus includes an image obtaining unit that obtains a cell image including a removal target that is obtained by a microscope for observation of a cell, a teaching data generator that specifies a removal target region including the removal target within the cell image by performing predetermined image processing and generates as teaching data for machine learning, a label image that represents a location of the removal target region in the cell image, and a training data set generator that generates a set of the cell image and the label image as a training data set to be used in machine learning.

title: Education and teaching evaluation system based on artificial intelligence blackboard and evaluation method thereof

A large amount of data related to education and teaching and corresponding evaluation results are recorded through the system database, the decision tree algorithm is adopted to associate behaviors and results to construct the classification model, and the evaluation results are made for the preprocessed classification data according to the classification model, so that time and labor consumption of manual evaluation is avoided, and the educationand teaching evaluation accuracy and efficiency are improved.

According to the recording and broadcasting system, under the condition that the existing decoration environment and equipment are not damaged, a common cameraand a recording and broadcasting machine can rapidly support AI teaching analysis in a seamless mode.

title: BASE STATION, ROADSIDE DEVICE, TRAFFIC COMMUNICATION SYSTEM, TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT METHOD, AND TEACHING DATA GENERATION METHOD
abstract_text: This base station which is used in a traffic communication system is provided with: a communication unit that receives, by wireless communication, information transmitted from a vehicle traveling along a road; and a control unit that, on the basis of the information received by the communication unit, identifies a travel behavior that includes a travel path of the vehicle on the road. The control unit executes a first process for carrying out statistical or machine learning with regard to the identified travel behavior for each of a plurality of vehicles traveling along the road and a second process for making a determination regarding the presence of a traffic obstruction on the road, as well as the position of the traffic obstruction, on the basis of the result of the first process.

title: AUTOMATED WAREHOUSE OPTIMIZATION SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention comprises: a model generation means that generates, through machine learning, a learned model for defining a logistics process scenario for optimizing specific pieces of logistics process scale information from among logistics process score values, there being used, as teaching data, a past logistics process scenario that chronologically defines how all devices constituting a logistics system should operate in order to optimize, for logistics orders received in a given period, specific logistics process scale information accompanying processing of the logistics orders by the logistics system, and there also being used, as the teaching data, referenced logistics process scale information obtained by combining at least one from among throughput information, process time information, power consumption information, delivered-order number information, information pertaining to the number of personnel required for a process, and process number information per unit time for a special article to be processed that includes a cell component, these pieces of information being obtained as a result of operation according to the past logistics process scenario; a logistics order process reception means that receives all logistics orders in the given period; a past logistics process scenario acquisition means that acquires the past logistics process scenario that defined chronological behavior pertaining to all of the devices with respect to the logistics orders received by the logistics order process reception means; a scale information specification means by which desired scale information is specified from among the logistics process scale information; and a processing means that, on the basis of the past logistics process scenario acquired by the past logistics process scenario acquisition means and scale information specified by the scale information specification means, outputs a logistics process scenario using the learned model generated by the model generation means, the logistics process scenario chronologically defining how all of the devices constituting the logistics system should operate in order to optimize the scale information.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DYNAMIC ROBOT CONFIGURATION FOR ENHANCED DIGITAL EXPERIENCES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for configuring an animatronic device. Information is received about performance of a user exhibited in a dialogue between the user and an animatronic device which conducts the dialogue with the user in accordance with a configuration. The effectiveness of the configuration with respect to the user is assessed based on theinformation about the performance of the user and is used for machine learning at least one model, which is then used to adjust the configuration to generate an updated configuration for the animatronic device to use to continue the dialogue.

title: LEARNING DEVICE, INFERENCE DEVICE, LEARNING METHOD, PROGRAM, AND INFERENCE METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a learning device with which efficient machine learning can be realized.SOLUTION: Provided is a learning device for learning a set value in a machine learning model on the basis of prescribed image data for learning, the learning device comprising: an inversion unit for inverting the image data for learning of at least some of channels; an input unit for inputting the inverted data to the machine learning model; an output unit capable of comparing the inverted data of the data outputted from the machine learning model with teaching data and/or capable of comparing the data outputted from the machine learning model with the inverted data of teaching data; and a learning process execution unit for learning a set value in accordance with a result of comparison.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: An educational big data analysis method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: Abstract The invention discloses an educational big data analysis method based on artificial intelligence, which comprises the following steps: Si, carrying out entrance examinations for freshmen, constructing a learning evaluation model based on the college entrance examination scores of the freshmen, and constructing a comprehensive evaluation model for freshmen according to the basic information of the freshmen; S2, based on the courses carried out by schools, constructing a teacher curriculum model by the basic information of the teaching teachers of the courses; S3, constructing a neutron network model based on the freshmen comprehensive evaluation model and the teacher curriculum model, and constructing a convolution neural network model based on the forward propagation and reverse propagation of the neutron network model; S4, based on the convolution neural network model, a teaching model is constructed. Based on the teaching model, the freshmen and teachers are evaluated for teaching examination, and the teaching organization is adjusted according to the evaluation results, which provides a basis for training skilled talents. title: Adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI WANXIN JINZHI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent education, in particular to an adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a central processing module, an education cloud platform, an intelligent classroom, a teacher terminal and a student terminal, and is characterized in that the central processing module is connected with the education cloud platform, the intelligent classroom, the teacher terminal and the student terminal respectively. According to the invention, the interest type selected by the student can be used as the main body learning direction, thestudent is more interested in the learning process, and the multimedia teaching and modern network combined mode is adopted, so that the student can reasonably arrange learning and life, the education quality, efficiency and intelligent level of the self-adaptive education system are improved, and the adaptive education system is worthy of popularization.

title: ONLINE STEREO 3D-VISUALIZATION SYSTEM OF THE SOLAR ATMOSPHERE USING DEEP LEARNING
applicants: INST ZA KOSMICHESKI IZSLEDVANIA I TEHNOLOGII BAN [BG]
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an online stereo 3D visualization system of the solar atmosphere using deep learning. As for a certain part of the solar atmosphere, the data coming from observation satellites and ground-based devices are not available or are partially available. The utility model provides simulation of this part of the solar atmosphere, in order to visualize the entire solar atmosphere in an online stereo 3D environment. Deep learning is used in order to implement the simulation, as it is hardware implemented through graphics processing units - GPUs (GPUs) and field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs). The system for online stereo 3D-visualization of the solar atmosphere, as shown in Fig. 1 receives input information through the input data interface unit (1) relating to the solar atmosphere. This data is processed continuously and in real time by a neural network learning unit using GRU hardware (2), as the latter creates and continuously improves the current neural network model (3). At the same time, the FGA-based output machine (4) simulates the state of the entire solar atmosphere based on the current neural network model (3) and the information received from the input data interface unit (1) relating to the solar atmosphere. The simulated state of the entire solar atmosphere enters a server to generate a 3D model of the solar atmosphere (5), which is connected to the Internet. The user workstations, representing personal devices with a web interface(7I...7n), are connected to the server (5) via the Internet environment. The application is in online stereo 3D-visualization of the solar atmosphere aimed at teaching Solar-terrestrial Physics to students and PhD students at universities and research institutes. The system is also applicable in science activities with students at school.

title: Online teaching system integrating artificial intelligence and virtual reality technologies
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online teaching system integrating artificial intelligence and virtual reality technologies. The online teaching system comprises the following steps of S1, personal information input and course arrangement of teachers, S2, personal registration and information perfection of students, S3, virtual shared teaching, S4, teacher-student interaction and S5, academic testing.According to the online teaching system integrating the artificial intelligence and the virtual reality technology, students can simulate the environment of a real classroom through the virtual VR shared teaching subsystem, teachers and students can perform virtual classroom teaching through the VR shared teaching subsystem, and the teaching efficiency of the teachers and the learning efficiency of the students are improved. Due to the existence of AI artificial intelligence, an initial user can better understand and guide the system, and the situation that the initial user cannot operate anduse the system is avoided.

title: Teaching outline generation method and device, storage medium and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching outline generation method and device, a storage medium and electronic equipment, belongs to the technical field of information processing, and relates to artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a teaching video to be processed, extracting teaching point information from the teaching video according to a guide language in voice data of the teaching video, and generating a teaching outline according to the extracted teaching point information. According to the method, the teaching point information is extracted by identifying the guide language in the voice data of the teaching video, and the teaching outline is generated according to the teaching point information, so the teaching outline is automatically generated according to the video content of online education; compared with the prior art that teachers need to manually customize the outline for each course when generating the teaching outline for the online education courseware, a large amount of time can be saved, and the efficiency of formulating the teaching outline is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence-based lecturer dynamic evaluation method and device and computer equiment
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an Artificial intelligence-based lecturer dynamic evaluation method and device and computer equiment. The method comprises the following steps: receiving teaching video information from a lecturer terminal in real time, intercepting to obtain teaching image information and teaching audio information, obtaining a feature image set from the teaching image information according to an image obtaining model, obtaining type quantification information of each type of image features in the feature image set according to an image feature quantification model, and acquiring audioquantitative information of the teaching beverage information according to the audio feature quantitative model, acquiring type feature quantitative information and a comprehensive evaluation score corresponding to the audio feature quantitative information according to a comprehensive scoring rule, and feeding back the information to the lecturer terminal in real time. The invention is based onthe intelligent decision technology, belongs to the field of artificial intelligence, can achieve the omnibearing comprehensive scoring of the lecturer based on the teaching image information and theteaching audio information, obtains the comprehensive evaluation score, achieves the real-time feedback, and can achieve the accurate and real-time dynamic evaluation of the lecturer for remote videotraining.

title: Unmanned examination and intelligent scoring method applied to CPR examination of doctors
abstract_text: The invention discloses an unmanned examination and intelligent scoring method applied to CPR examination of doctors. The method is characterized by comprising the steps that S1, setting an examination link, examination key points of the examination link and scoring standards corresponding to the examination key points; wherein the assessment link comprises a pre-operation preparation link, an in-operation link and a post-operation judgment link; S2, acquiring operation action video and audio information of an examinee, and uploading the operation action video and audio information to a server; S3, sending the received video and audio information to an AI intelligent scoring system by the server, and performing intelligent scoring on actions and audios of an operator according to scoring standards corresponding to the assessment key points; and S4, pushing the total scoring result of the examination to a display for display by the server. The speech recognition function of artificial intelligence is fused into spoken recognition of CPR simulation training teaching, whether terms of an operator are correct or not can be recognized in real time, the spoken quality can be effectivelyfed back to trainees in real time, and the trainees can quickly correct the defects of themselves.

title: Artificial intelligence education teaching evaluation method and system based on Internet of Things system, and computer readable storage medium
applicants: NANTONG XINJU COMPUTER INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence education teaching evaluation method based on an Internet of Things system. The method comprises the following steps: enabling a first mobile terminal to collect the information used for artificial intelligence education teaching evaluation; monitoring, by the second mobile terminal, the third mobile terminal and the fourth mobile terminal, the synchronization signal and the system information sent by the base station; in response to monitoring the synchronization signal and the system information sent by the base station, determining, by thesecond mobile terminal, a PRACH resource for sending a random access preamble based at least in part on the system information, and determining, by the second mobile terminal, a PUSCH resource for sending data based at least in part on the system information; and in response to monitoring the synchronization signal and the system information sent by the base station, determining, by the third mobile terminal, a PRACH resource for sending the random access preamble based at least in part on the system information, and determining, by the third mobile terminal, a PUSCH resource for sending the data based at least in part on the system information.

title: MACHINE LEARNING METHOD AND MOBILE ROBOT
abstract_text: The invention provides a machine learning method and a mobile robot. The machine learning method of a neural network for causing a computer to function as a path of a mobile robot to be output to a destination based on provided map information and detected moving object information learns using teacher data accumulated by repeating the following steps: a first arrangement step of arranging a stationary first obstacle and a moving second obstacle in a virtual space; a second arrangement step of arranging a current position and a destination of a mobile robot in the virtual space; a movement step of making the second obstacle move in accordance with a predetermined condition; and a reception step of receiving, from a user, a designation of a moving path for the mobile robot to go to the destination from the current position while avoiding the stationary first obstacle and the moving second obstacle, in which learning is performed using teaching data accumulated by repeatedly executing the above steps.

title: IMAGE DISCRIMINATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD, IMAGE DISCRIMINATION MODEL, AND IMAGE DISCRIMINATION METHOD
abstract_text: To make it possible to determine with sufficient accuracy whether or not a printed image output from a printing device is a defective image (true defective image).SOLUTION: A method for constructing an image discrimination model that discriminates whether a printed image is a good image or a defective image includes a step (S710) of determining whether the printed image is a high-density image or a low-density image, a step (S721, S722) of creating teaching data by combining pseudo-defective data with image data to be synthesized according to determination results, and a step (S750) of performing machine learning. Regarding pseudo-defective data synthesis, for a printed image that has been determined to be a high-density image, low-density pseudo-defective data is combined with the image data to be synthesized, and for a printed image that has been determined to be a low-density image, high-density pseudo-defective data is combined with the image data to be synthesized.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 9

title: Abnormality determination support apparatus
abstract_text: An abnormality determination support apparatus includes an analysis object data creation section, a primary determination section, and a secondary determination section. The analysis object data creation section acquires, from a data collection device of a manufacturing facility, time series signals indicative of at least one of the state of the manufacturing facility and the quality of the manufactured products, and then extracts analysis object data from the time series signals. The primary determination section applies a plurality of different analytical methods to the extracted analysis object data to thereby derive a plurality of primary determination results from common analysis object data. The secondary determination section has a machine learning device, the teaching signals learned by which are composed of pairs of the primary determination results obtained by the primary determination section and an abnormality determination result serving as a correct answer and a reason of the abnormality corresponding to the primary determination results. The secondary determination section inputs the plurality of primary determination results obtained by the primary determination section from the common analysis object data into the machine learning device, and then outputs the secondary determination results output from the machine learning device and speculated reasons of abnormality as determination materials.

title: Intelligent digital education AI classroom big data management platform and device
applicants: SHENZHEN CITY AIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent digital education AI classroom big data management platform and device. The intelligent digital education AI classroom big data management platform comprises anevaluation function system, an acquisition and storage system, an algorithm analysis system, a result database and a feedback system which are connected with one another; the evaluation function system is used for classifying and sorting information related to classroom behaviors of teachers and students; the acquisition and storage system is used for acquiring data sorted by the evaluation function system, converting the data into big data, storing the big data and transmitting the big data to the algorithm analysis system; the algorithm analysis system is used for analyzing the big data, generating visual data and transmitting the visual data to the result database; the result database is used for transmitting the visual data to the feedback system; the feedback system is used for generating different evaluation information according to the visual data and sending the evaluation information to the designated teachers and students; advantages of artificial intelligence applied to theeducation industry, such as auxiliary teaching, teaching according to materials, multi-party participation and low education cost, are realized.

title: Student attitude identification method and device based on artificial intelligence, and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student attitude identification method and device based on artificial intelligence, and computer equipment. The method includes: receiving client video information from a plurality of clients in real time, intercepting and obtaining client image information and client audio information, obtaining a feature image set from a client image containing a single living body, andobtaining corresponding behavior features from a client image not containing the single living body; according to the image feature quantification model, obtaining type feature quantification information of each client in the multiple types of image features, obtaining an audio judgment result of client audio information; according to an attitude identification rule, obtaining attitude type information of each client video information, and feeding back the attitude type information to the lecturer terminal. The method and device are based on an intelligent decision technology, belong to the field of artificial intelligence, and can accurately identify the learning attitude of each student in real time based on the client video information collected by the client, so that a teacher can comprehensively and quickly master the learning attitude of each student during teaching, and the teaching quality can be greatly improved.

title: METHOD FOR BUILDING IMAGE DETERMINATION MODEL, IMAGE DETERMINATION MODEL, AND IMAGE DETERMINATION METHOD
abstract_text: A method for building an image determination model that determines whether a print image is a good image or a failure image includes a step of determining whether the print image is a high-density image or a low-density image; a step of generating teaching data by combining pseudo-failure data with to-be-combined image data, based on a result of the determination; and a step of performing machine learning. Regarding the combining of the pseudo-failure data, for a print image determined to be the high-density image, low-density pseudo-failure data is combined with to-be-combined image data, and for a print image determined to be the low-density image, high-density pseudo-failure data is combined with to-be-combined image data.

title: MACHINE LEARNING METHOD AND MOBILE ROBOT
abstract_text: A neural network machine learning method includes a first arrangement step of arranging a stationary first obstacle and a moving second obstacle in a virtual space, a second arrangement step of arranging a current position and a destination of a mobile robot in the virtual space, a movement step of making the second obstacle move in accordance with a predetermined condition, and a reception step of receiving, from a user, a designation of a moving path for the mobile robot to go to the destination from the current position while avoiding the stationary first obstacle and the moving second obstacle. Learning is performed using teaching data accumulated by repeatedly executing the above steps.

title: AI experiment teaching auxiliary equipment and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses AI experiment teaching auxiliary equipment and method, and the equipment comprises a support which is internally provided with a liftable camera, a display, and a shading baffle plate; a teacher integrated terminal which controls the movement of the shading baffle and controls the on-off and movement of the camera and the display; and a server system which is connected withthe display and displays content on the display, and also performs video acquisition in real time through the camera. Therefore, the equipment is ingenious in structure and diverse in function, and hardware has hiding performance and an automatic unfolding function; the operation of students can be observed repeatedly, and the judgment accuracy is improved; and the experiment operation and othercontents carried out by students are more efficient, informationized and fair.

title: Campus social relation big data analysis system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of computer vision, in particular to an artificial intelligence-based campus social relationship big data analysis system, which comprises a data acquisition system, a data management system and a big data analysis system which are connected in sequence, and solves the problems that the network characteristics established by the traditional social relationship research system are not obvious, and the social relation intimacy cannot be accurately obtained. According to the invention, the social relation of students is constructed through an artificial intelligence method, so that an auxiliary means is provided for teaching researchers, and an auxiliary decision-making means is provided for teaching managers; besides, regional collection and management are carried out for classrooms and campuses, the method is more reasonable and flexible, the social network features are more obvious, and meanwhile, the intra-cluster attention is introduced into the social network, so that the data reliability is greatly improved.

title: Artificial intelligence robot for child motion teaching and using method thereof
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence robot for child motion teaching and a using method thereof. The artificial intelligence robot for child motion teaching comprises: a central processing module and a storage module, a project selection module which is used for selecting a corresponding teaching project by a user; a teaching module which is used for playing corresponding teaching courses through the display module; and an acquisition module which is used for acquiring the posture of the user following the motion. According to the artificial intelligence robot for child motion teaching and the using method thereof, by arranging the motion intelligent robot, a learning motion course can be selected according to hobbies and interests of children, the teaching range is wide, thechildren can learn along with the robot, posture errors can be pointed out and corrected, meanwhile, correct postures can be praised, Through voice encouragement and teaching in the form of a robot, the learning interest of children is increased, and the physical health of children is improved.

title: Mechanical arm imitation learning method based on task embedded network
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and robot control, and particularly relates to a mechanical arm imitation learning method based on a task embedded network, which comprises the following steps: creating a teaching task data set; constructing a task embedding network, and learning a task prototype of a teaching task; constructing a deep neural network, and outputting anaction value of the mechanical arm by taking the spliced mechanical arm teaching task demonstration video as input; performing joint training on the constructed task embedding network and the deep neural network to obtain a teaching task model; and in combination with the built mechanical arm virtual simulation environment, taking the teaching task model as a control strategy of the mechanical arm to guide the mechanical arm to complete simulation of a teaching task. The defects that an existing imitation learning method needs a large number of training sets and trial and error, the accuracyis low, enough generalization ability is lacked, and teaching tasks learned previously are prone to being forgotten can be overcome.

title: Intelligent recommendation method based on teaching big data and server
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent recommendation based on teaching big data, and relates to an intelligent recommendation method based on teaching big data and a server. According to the invention, statistical data of adata project is divided into a series of label clustering data in advance, and then teaching is carried out on each piece of label clustering data throughthe target behavior analysis deep learning network to establish portrait classification, so as to identify the teaching established portrait type to which each piece of label clustering data belongs;further, the accuracy of teaching recommendation strategy updating is improved, the portrait classification result established for teaching is further obtained, the label clustering data meeting the preset portrait template is detected to exist in the label clustering data, it can be rapidly determined that the target data item may be a teaching recommendation strategy item with reference significance, and the teaching recommendation strategy item is more accurate; and after the targeted strategy is updated, the subsequent low-confidence teaching recommendation data volume is reduced, and theteaching recommendation pertinence is improved.

title: Method and device for controlling remote teaching classroom through AI
applicants: SHANGHAI SAILIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a method for controlling a remote teaching classroom through AI. The method comprises the following steps: connecting a first terminal to at least one second terminal to realize audio and video interaction between the first terminal and the at least one second terminal; sending a teacher video picture shot by the first terminal to at least one second terminal for playing, and sending a student video picture shot by the at least one second terminal to the first terminal for playing; identifying behavior characteristics in a student video picture shot bythe at least one second terminal; scoring the lecture attending behaviors of the corresponding students based on the identified behavior characteristics; and sending feedback information to the students whose listening behavior scores exceed a predetermined threshold. According to the method provided by the invention, real-time interaction can be carried out between a main teacher in a remote classroom and students in class, and the application cost is reduced. In addition, the embodiment of the invention provides a device for controlling the remote teaching classroom by the AI.

title: Extracurricular learning tutoring system based on deep learning and knowledge graph and implementation method
applicants: ZHEJIANG YOUJIAO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an extracurricular learning tutoring system based on deep learning and a knowledge graph and an implementation method, and belongs to the technical field of tutoring learning,and the method comprises the following steps: 1, carrying out the resource labeling of learning resources and questions, labeling students, teachers and other communities, and forming the knowledge graph; step 2, enabling students to perform preview, review and review, and watch resources online; enabling the students do homework, study and exam and do questions online; and step 3, collecting learning process and result data of students, collecting learning behavior data of student communities, performing diagnosis analysis based on the cognitive model and the knowledge structure, generating student learning condition reports and student portraits, adding the student learning condition reports and the student portraits into the knowledge graph, further perfecting labels of learning resources, questions, students, teachers and communities, and strengthening the knowledge graph. According to the invention, a student cognitive competence model is introduced in a teaching practice evaluation process of extracurricular learning of students, and extracurricular personalized learning guidance is provided for primary and secondary school students by adopting deep learning and knowledge graph technologies.

title: Teaching knowledge point graph system based on network swarm intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of intelligent teaching, particularly relates to a teaching knowledge point graph system based on network swarm intelligence, and aims to solve the problems of single knowledge point source, poor diversity, repeated knowledge creation and uneven knowledge point quality of an existing teaching knowledge point system. The method comprises the following steps: automatically extracting teaching plan keywords, inputting the teaching plan keywords into a teaching knowledge point map exploration module, and interactively exploring retrieved information bya user: if satisfactory knowledge is found, directly updating a teaching plan; and if not, supplementing knowledge in a man-machine cooperation mode. The man-machine cooperation means that the user and the AI knowledge producer construct new knowledge at the same time and fuse the new knowledge, and the new knowledge is cooperatively created by combining the capabilities of the user and the AI. And the intelligent expert recommendation system recommends experts to participate in verification of the newly constructed knowledge by analyzing the knowledge and the evaluation data of the user, andintegrates the new knowledge with the teaching knowledge point graph. The invention has the advantages of multiple knowledge point sources, high quality and less knowledge repeated creation.

title: Educational resource remote sharing system for hierarchical distribution of educational targets
applicants: HENAN UNIV OF FINANCE AND ECONOMICS
abstract_text: The invention discloses an educational resource remote sharing system for hierarchical distribution of educational targets, which comprises a high-quality educational resource sharing management platform, a teaching resource acquisition module, a teaching resource grade evaluation module, a student user terminal, a student user grading tracking evaluation module, and a teaching resource extractionmodule. The systems uses trained artificial intelligence for carrying out teaching level grade evaluation on the collected teaching resource data, selects high-quality teaching resource data according to the evaluation grade and stores the same in a database for corresponding classification, establishes personal files for student users, carries out comprehensive evaluation according to the learning quality and the learning progress;, realizes promotion control through a reasonable algorithm, and updates the learning state and the corresponding level of the student user in real time. The system achieves the intelligent processing, records the learning progresses and effects of different student users, and achieves the intelligent distribution of the most suitable high-quality teaching resources for different student users.

title: Intelligent course scheduling system and method
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHANGXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching management, and relates to an intelligent course scheduling system and method, in particular to an intelligent course scheduling system and method based on a machine learning algorithm, and the system comprises a teacher information management module, a student information management module, a sales information management module, a course information management module and a model selection module. According to the method, historical data of teachers, students, sales and the like are obtained, a machine learning training model is adoptedto fit and match the matching degree between the students and the teachers, a latest prediction model is obtained by combining prediction data splicing according to model offline training data, the prediction model is an iterative decision tree model, and finally, a course scheduling result obtained according to the prediction model is output. According to the invention, proper teachers can be arranged for students in an optimal mode, and the problems of difficult course arrangement, low efficiency and course arrangement conflict in the prior art are solved.

title: Classroom behavior analysis method and system, and electronic equipment
applicants: HUNAN WEICHU YOUCAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom behavior analysis method which is applied to multimedia classroom teaching. Classroom recording and broadcasting, non-inductive human face attendance checking and classroom behavior analysis are realized through an artificial intelligence technology and a big data technology. The method comprises the following steps of S10, collecting biological information of teachers and students in a teaching process in real time while classroom videos are recorded, wherein the biological information includes behavior data, position data, expression data and body movementdata; S20, performing multi-dimensional analysis according to the biological information and generating a classroom quality report; and S30, sending a recorded classroom video and a generated classroom quality report to cloud for storage. Compared with the prior art, the classroom behavior analysis method provided by the invention has the advantages that time and labor are saved, a obtained sample size is large, and discovery of a general teaching rule is facilitated. The invention further provides a classroom behavior analysis system and electronic equipment.

title: IMRM- Class Monitoring System: IoT and AI-Based Real Time Class Monitoring and Faculty and their Course Materials Availability
abstract_text: Our invention "IMRM- Class Monitoring System:" is an educational system which adapts at all educational content to a learning style of a student provides substantially immediate and effective teachers tracking, student tracking, academy data tracking feedback of student performance to parents, and incentivizes each participant in the students' education to use the system. For example, the intelligent educational system interactive educational lessons and exercises to a student to determine the student's learning style or modality and also the educational system adapts the presentation to the modality. The invented teaching technology is also providing homework curriculum and educational content based on, for example, the student current educational needs or scholastic exercises. The educational system provides rewards to teachers, students, and parents for using the system. For example, the education system enables parents to accumulate a fund for college education and the fund may be increased through rewards for using cash back credit cards, purchasing goods online, lottery-style awards, use of the online education system, or the like. The invented teaching technology is also tracking a motion of a teachers, students by obtaining two types of measurements associated with the motion of the body, one of the types including acoustic measurement. The invented teaching technology is an estimate of either an orientation or a position of the body is updated based on one of the two types of measurement, for example based on inertial measurement. The invented teaching technology is a mobile teacher tracking system is provided for tracking the removal and use of specific teachers within a group checked out from storage between the time the teachers are checked out and the replacement of the teachers in the storage. The system includes a system controller and a storage unit that receive and store a series of teacher carriers therein and each teacher carrier includes a series of teacher holders in which id tags for the group of teachers checked out of the storage are received. The invented teaching technology is a teacher carrier monitors the time each teacher is removed from the teacher carrier which information is thereafter communicated to the system controller. title: IOTM- Class Monitoring System: IoT and AI based Monitoring System for Faculty and their Course Materials Availability
abstract_text: Our Invention "IOTM- Class Monitoring System" is an image such as a depth image of a scene may be received, observed, or captured by a device and also a grid of voxels may then be generated based on the depth image such that the depth image may be down sampled. The invented technology also includes in the grid of voxels may also be removed to isolate one or more voxels associated with a foreground object such as a Teachers, students, director or human target and a location or position of one or more extremities of the isolated human target may be determined and a model may be adjusted based on the location or position of the one or more extremities. The invented technology also online education and the system of the invention includes an educator provider system and at least one student system connected via a network means, such as the Internet, for bidirectional communication there between. The educator provider system is capable of transmitting, and the at least one student system is capable of receiving, at least one lesson for education purposes. The invented technology the lesson is interactive and includes at least one audio file used to control the pace of the presentation of the lesson to a student attheatleastonestudentsystem and the educator provider system also includes a mechanism for generating a lesson completion record and/or an electronic certificate of completion after a student has completed the lesson. The lesson completion record and/or electronic certificate may be transmitted to the at least one student system and/or to an education authority system, indicating and providing proof to the student and/or the education authority, respectively, that the student has completed the lesson. The method of the invention, the pace of the presentation of the lesson to a student is controlled by playing of the at least one audio file at the at least one student system and in another embodiment of the method of the present invention, the lesson completion record and/or electronic certificate of completion is transmitted by the educator provider system and received by the student system at which the student completed the lesson and/or the education authority that has an interest in completion of the lesson by the student. By the use of the system and method of the invention, an education authority can be assured that a student attends the online lesson for the requisite minimum time period, and that the student satisfactorily completes the lesson.
