title: Personalized distance education system based on deep learning and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personalized distance education system based on deep learning and a method. The system involves a teacher side, a distance education side, a student side, a personalized question bank analysis module, a student concentration degree detection module and a student information base, wherein the student side is connected with the distance education side through a network learning platform; the teacher side is used for teacher live broadcasting or recorded broadcasting teaching, the student side is used for student learning, and the distance education side is used for assisting teacher teaching; and the personalized question bank analysis module is used for carrying out statistics according to the learning progress of students, learning error questions and high-frequency error points loaded by a question bank and pushing corresponding questions for each student. and the student concentration degree detection module is used for sending visual images into a deep learning framework so as to analyze the concentration degree of the learners. According to the personalized distance education system based on deep learning and the method, the personalized question bankanalysis module is added on the basis of a traditional high-efficiency distance education management system, so that self-adaptive adaptation to different user sides and different learning purposes isrealized, and the purpose of intelligent teaching is achieved.

title: Practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching, and relates to the technical field of practical training platforms, in particular to a practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching, which comprises a control panel and a storage box, an artificial intelligence control module is detachably connected inside a fixed frame, a demonstration board is arranged inside the control panel, and the artificial intelligence control module is detachably connected with the storage box. The bottom of the demonstration board is fixedly connectedwith a moving device, and the bottom of the storage box is fixedly connected with movable wheels. According to the practical training platform for artificial intelligence teaching, through the arrangement of the fixed frame and the buckles, the purpose of conveniently cleaning and maintaining the artificial intelligence control module is achieved, through the arrangement of the ventilation and heat dissipation device, the purpose of improving the heat dissipation performance of the device is achieved, and through the arrangement of the movable device, the practicability is high. The demonstration effect can be better displayed, the dustproof purpose is achieved through the arrangement of the movable door, and the purpose of facilitating teaching is achieved through the arrangement of the movable wheels and the stretching drawers.

title: Teaching research and development method and platform based on children education
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching research and development method and platform based on children education, and relates to the field of children education. The teaching research and development methodbased on child education comprises the following steps that the age of a child is obtained, the age of the child is inputted into an education training model to determine the characteristics of the child, and the education training model is obtained by using multiple sets of child data through machine learning training; wherein each group of data of the children data comprises the children age and the children characteristics, and the teaching content is analyzed according to the children characteristics. In addition, the invention also provides a teaching research and development platform based on children education, the platform comprises a characteristic acquisition module, a capability analysis module, a personality analysis module, a motivation analysis module and a teaching analysismodule, wherein the characteristic acquisition module is used for inputting the characteristics of children. The method is advantaged in that teaching contents of children of different ages can be conveniently researched and developed, and children are helped to quickly adapt to the fast pace mode of learning and life.

title: AI intelligent education system based on big data and working method thereof
applicants: SUZHOU SHANGXINBAO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI intelligent education system based on big data and a working method thereof. The AI intelligent education system comprises a teaching management system and a cloud datacenter. The teaching management system comprises a course supervision module, a dynamic extraction module and a data management module. The course supervision module is used for obtaining a teaching plan; the dynamic extraction module is used for extracting teaching behaviors of teachers; the data management module is used for uploading the teaching progress to the course supervision module, and the course supervision module enables the teaching behaviors extracted by the dynamic extraction module to correspond to the teaching progress uploaded by the data management module and updates a corresponding teaching plan. The teaching management system shares the teaching plan with the cloud data center, and if other teaching management centers need remote teaching, the teaching management system provides teaching behaviors corresponding to the teaching plan for the other teaching management centers through the cloud data center.

title: Intelligent card based on artificial intelligence and teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent card based on artificial intelligence and a teaching system. The intelligent card can autonomously select related chapter contents needing to be learned on a cloud service platform, and teaching material contents of each subject and electronic edition contents of teaching auxiliary exercises are input on the cloud service platform in advance; the intelligentcard is used for selecting electronic exercises of associated chapter class hours and associated subject knowledge points, and gathering the selected exercises automatically on a platform; and after typesetting and various settings are confirmed to be correct, a handwriting box containing student names, two-dimensional codes and student number handwriting boxes can be automatically generated by carrying out intelligent type setting and adjusting the printing format intelligently. And the intelligent card is suitable for intelligent card electronic edition files with A4 layouts. The problems that in the existing teaching process, teachers cannot accurately master the teaching situation, and personalized teaching schemes cannot be generated are solved.

title: SEF: Smart Educational Framework: Smart AI-IoT based educator monitoring and content availability alert system
abstract_text: Our invention "SEF: Smart Educational Framework" is related to educational system QoS assurance, and based on Al-loT blended mode technology. The smart monitoring system is to check the educator's active presence, the relevance of the delivery, and notification on the availability of the e-content. This will lead to a new path towards the quality of classroom learning, maximum resource utilization, and automated education quality monitoring. The educational environment/system that includes all educational QoS delivery parameters in view of teaching & learning style, provides significantly real-time, effective, and reliable teacher's & student's tracking, contents feedback & alert, and will assure the active participation of each stakeholder. The intelligent educational system interactive educational lessons and exercises to a student to determine the student's learning style, and towards the modality of presentation. The educational system has auto up-gradation & system promotion through rewards to all stakeholders of the system i.e. educator, student, and parents, on system usage. For example, the system enables parents to hoard funds for college education and increase that using several schemes for live and warm involvement. The educational system will assure QoS, by detecting the relevance of the presented material with the agenda. The educational system, an auto educator allocation/ re-allocation and notification on the same. title: Probing and analyzing electromagnetic tracking trolley
applicants: QINGDAO ZHUOHANG RUIZHI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of detection and analysis electromagnetic tracking trolleys, and particularly relates to a detection and analysis electromagnetic tracking trolley which comprises a trolley body, a rear driving wheel, a placement plate, a storage battery, a front driving wheel, a mounting shell and a steering engine, the placement plate is mounted at the bottom of the trolley body, and the storage battery is arranged in the space between the placement plate and the rear driving wheel. The placement plate is fixedly connected with the storage battery, two groupsof rear driving wheels are arranged on one side of the bottom surface of the trolley body, and each group of rear driving wheels are driven by a direct current motor arranged on the trolley body; a steering engine is adopted as a steering unit, two direct-current motors are adopted as power units, an electromagnetic sensor is adopted as a sensing unit, rapid tracking along a copper wire with electromagnetic signals can be achieved, patterning and Python programming are supported, entering is easy and fast, and teaching learning of knowledge such as automobile knowledge, an automatic driving principle and an artificial intelligence control algorithm can be completed.

title: NCS SYSTEM FOR EVALUATING MANAGEMENT OF NCS BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a system for operating and managing national competency standards (NCS) based on artificial intelligence (AI), which comprises: a terminal of a student; an enterprise resource planning (ERP) unit having an ERP program installed therein to input, store, update, and output information required for operating a teaching institution to operate the teaching institution; an NCS evaluation verification unit providing an evaluation item generated based on NSC information to the terminal and receiving information input to the terminal based on the evaluation item by the student to generate and manage scores of the student; and a learning management unit receiving the evaluation item and the scores from the NSC evaluation and verification unit, using an AI engine to analyze the evaluation item and the scores to extract an incorrect answer pattern and an incorrect answer tendency to generate feedback information, and transferring the feedback information to the ERP program. According to the present invention, the ERP of the teaching institution can integrally manage an NCS operation process. Accordingly, business in accordance with the NCS operation process can be efficiently processed, thereby providing an effect of significantly increasing an NCS operation evaluation score of the teaching institution.

title: METHOD FOR INSPECTING SEMICONDUCTOR AND SEMICONDUCTOR INSPECTING DEVICE
abstract_text: This method for inspecting a semiconductor with an observation system 1 comprises: a step for acquiring a first pattern image that indicates a semiconductor device S pattern; a step for acquiring a second pattern image that indicates the semiconductor device S pattern, the image having a resolution different from that of the first pattern image; a step for learning by machine learning reconfiguration processing for the second pattern image using the first patten image as teaching data, then reconfiguring the second pattern image into a reconfigured image having a resolution different from that of the second pattern image, the reconfiguration performed using the reconfiguration processing based on the results of said learning; and a step for performing position adjustment on the basis of the first pattern image and an area, in the reconfigured image, calculated as having a high degree of certainty by the reconfiguration processing.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING SYSTEM, APPARATUS, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To predict destinations of members attached with wireless devices, such as medical staff members.SOLUTION: An information processing system comprises: a current position acquisition unit that acquires identification information on wireless devices and information for specifying the positions of the wireless devices; a learned model storage unit that stores a learned model having performed machine learning of the positions of members attached with the wireless devices and destinations of the members attached with the wireless devices as teaching data; an inference unit that infers the destinations of the members attached with the wireless devices from the positions of the wireless devices based on the learned model; and a notification unit that notifies a notification terminal of the inferred destinations.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: AIoT teaching robot
abstract_text: A robot for programming teaching, including a robot shell, a programmable control board, an emoticons panel, two DC motors, a line following sensor, and three wheels, is designed. The robot is equipped with the programmable control board, which provides the ability to interconnect the robot with the personal computer. The robot supports artificial intelligence (AI) functions and Internet of Things (IoT) functions. Meanwhile, the robot also provides graphical programming environment, Python programming environment and Arduino programming environment.

title: Intelligent educational administration supervision equipment
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of campus management, in particular to an intelligent educational administration supervision device which comprises an embedded device and an information base which are connected through the Internet, and the embedded device comprises an image acquisition module, a processing module, a communication module, a storage module, a key module and a playing module. Wherein the image acquisition module adopts an image sensor, the processing module comprises a human body posture recognition unit and a human face recognition unit, the processing module adopts an AI chip, the communication module adopts a functional chip with WIFI and Bluetooth at the same time, the storage module adopts a storage card, and the information base comprises a student human face information base and a personal information base corresponding to a human face. According to the utility model, the intelligent AI chip is combined with the embedded equipment, so that educational administration management can be carried out according to classroom teaching conditions, and teachers can know the learning conditions of students and carry out teaching better according to personal care.

title: Method for computer-aided training of answering questions in K12 teaching
applicants: BOHUI EDUCATION TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for solving questions through computer-aided training in K12 teaching, and the method comprises the following steps: S10, enabling a system to generate a knowledge point score matrix when a student uses the method for the first time, and enabling each to-be-mastered knowledge point of the student to correspond to one score and one mastering level; S20, pushing thequestions according to the specified knowledge points; S30, after students submit answers, performing fuzzification processing on the answering process by the system, and meanwhile, verifying final answers to the answers by the system; S40, according to the answering result of the student, adding or subtracting scores of knowledge points involved in question answering of the student; if the scoreis higher than a set upgrading and downgrading threshold value, upgrading and downgrading the mastery grade of the student at the knowledge point; and S50, pushing the difficulty questions corresponding to the knowledge point mastering levels according to the knowledge point mastering levels specified by the students, and repeatedly training the knowledge points until the mastering levels of the knowledge points reach a preset target. Through the AI auxiliary function, the work of repeatedly marking test papers is omitted for teachers, time is saved, and better teaching is achieved.

title: ABNORMALITY DETERMINATION ASSISTANCE DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention provides an abnormality determination support device. The abnormality determination support device includes an analysis target data creation unit, a primary determination unit, and a secondary determination unit. The analysis target data creation unit acquires a time-series signal indicating at least one of the state of the manufacturing equipment and the product quality from a dataacquisition device of the manufacturing equipment, and extracts analysis target data from the time-series signal. The primary determination unit derives a plurality of primary determination results from the common data to be analyzed by applying a plurality of different analysis methods to the extracted data to be analyzed. The secondary determination unit has a machine learning device that learns, as a teaching signal, a primary determination result obtained by the primary determination unit, an abnormality determination result which is a positive solution corresponding to the primary determination result, and an abnormality cause. And a secondary determination unit that inputs a plurality of primary determination results obtained from the common data to be analyzed in the primary determination unit to the machine learning device, and outputs the secondary determination results output from the machine learning device and the estimated abnormality cause as determination materials.

title: Teenager robot and artificial intelligence extracurricular science popularization teaching experience interaction equipment
applicants: HEFEI SIYECAO PHOTOELECTRIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses teenager robot and artificial intelligence extracurricular science popularization teaching experience interaction equipment which comprises a fixed table, a plurality of fixed piles are fixed on the top surface of the fixed table close to the edge of the fixed table, an anti-falling ring is fixed at one end of each fixed pile far away from the fixed table, and a movablehole which extends from the top surface to the bottom of the fixed table and has the maximum inner diameter of 1.5 m is formed in the fixed table. A buffer sleeve wraps the outer wall of the anti-falling ring, a movable arm of an arc-shaped structure is hinged to one end opening of a notch of the anti-falling ring, the radius of the movable arm is consistent with that of the anti-falling ring, afixed frame is installed in the movable hole, rotating holes are formed in the outer wall of the fixed frame, rotating balls are installed in the rotating holes, and a closed anti-skid sleeve wraps the fixed frame. Limiting holes are formed in the inner walls of the movable holes, steel balls are installed in the limiting holes, and the outer walls of the steel balls are attached to the anti-skidsleeves. Through the cooperative use of the devices, the interaction range of the robot interaction equipment can be expanded, the experience feeling and the substitution feeling are improved, and thepurpose of improving the teaching quality is achieved.

title: X-RAY IMAGING DEVICE AND METHOD FOR AVOIDING CONTACT WITH OBSTACLE FOR X-RAY IMAGING DEVICE
abstract_text: This X-ray imaging device (100) is configured to distinguish between an X-ray imaging device body (100a) and an obstacle (400) in the vicinity of the X-ray imaging device body (100a) in detected objects (P) identified on the basis of a parallax image (32), on the basis of an image of the X-ray imaging device body (100a) in a visible image (31) which is identified on the basis of learning results of machine learning to identify the X-ray imaging device body (100a) on the basis of a plurality of visible images for teaching (30a).

title: Learning route dynamic planning method and device
applicants: BEIJING GAOSIBOLE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a learning route dynamic planning method and device. The method comprises the following steps: comprehensively evaluating the history learning process, knowledge point mastery degree and learning ability of students; recommending an optimal learning path to the students according to the knowledge graph and the comprehensive evaluation result; enabling a pre-trained AI teacher module to give prediction of mastery situation probability distribution of students for examination questions; and recommending proper after-class exercises to the students according to the prediction result. According to the learning route dynamic planning method and device, the optimal learning route is planned from huge teaching resources according to the ability of students, reasonable questions are pushed, and learning of related knowledge points is completed.

title: Artificial intelligence education service platform
abstract_text: The artificial intelligence education service platform provided by the embodiment of the invention comprises a background management system, a robot, a teacher terminal and a management applet. The robot is used for collecting object information, reporting data to the background management system according to the object information and receiving an instruction issued by the background management system. The teacher terminal is used for reporting data to the background management system and receiving data push of the background management system. The parent terminal is used for interacting information with the teacher terminal. The management applet is used for cooperating with the teacher terminal and sending information to the parent terminal. The management applet is also used for reporting data to the background management system and receiving an instruction issued by the background management system. Through interactive cooperative work of the background management system, the robot, the teacher terminal and the management applet, the quality of teaching life and the management efficiency of schools can be improved, and the requirements of schools, teachers, parents and students are met.

title: Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of experiment boxes for Internet of Vehicles teaching, and particularly discloses an Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box based on artificial intelligence. The Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box comprises a box body, wherein an inner cavity of the box body is divided into a module installation groove and a module fixing groove through a supporting partition plate, and the module installation groove is located in the outer side of the module fixing groove. According to the Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box provided by the embodiment of the invention, a first heat dissipation vent hole, a second heat dissipation vent hole, a first blowing assembly and a second blowing assembly are arranged; the air flowability in the box body can be improved; heat generated when the module works can be dissipated to the outside of the box body in time, the heat dissipation effect on the module is further improved,the occurrence of a blockage condition of the module due to high temperature during working is greatly reduced, the problem of burnout of components in the module possibly caused by high temperatureis avoided, and the use value of the Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box is improved.

title: Robot demonstration teaching method based on meta-imitation learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a robot demonstration teaching method based on meta-imitation learning, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining arobot demonstration teaching task set; constructing a network structure model and obtaining a self-adaptive target loss function; in the meta-training stage, learning and optimizing a loss function and initialization values and parameters of the loss function by using an algorithm I; in the meta-test stage, learning the trajectory demonstrated by the expert by using an algorithm II to obtain a learning strategy; taking the expert demonstration track as input, in combination with a learning strategy, generating a robot imitation track by utilizing the network structure model, and mapping the robot imitation track to the action of the robot in combination with the robot state information. According to the method, a new scene can be rapidly generalized from a small number of demonstration examples given by expert demonstration, specific task engineering does not need to be carried out, and the robot can self-learn strategies irrelevant to tasks according to the expert demonstration, so that a track is generated, and one-time demonstration and rapid teaching are realized.

title: AI-based display system of sand table simulation teaching system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI-based display system of a sand table simulation teaching system. Simulation sand table, the simulation sand table comprises a display module, a voice input and control module, a light control module, an information integration module, a cloud processing module and an Internet of Things system. The Internet of Things system is connected with the cloud processing module through a network. The cloud processing module is connected with the information integration module through a network; the information integration module is electrically connected with a voice input and control module and a light control module; the information integration module is also connected with a power supply, and the information integration module is also electrically connected witha display module. By using the system of the utility model, a problem that traditional engineering management college student practical training is out of practice can be effectively solved, and the system is low in price and easy to popularize.

title: Portable artificial intelligence online education device
applicants: TIANJIN GONGXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a portable artificial intelligence online education device. The computer case comprises a case body, a case cover, a keyboard and mouse box and a drawing board box, the boxcover is hinged to the surface of the upper end of the box body through a hinge. The number of the hinges is two; a camera, a display screen, a control panel and a switch are fixedly installed on thesurface of the lower end of the box cover. The camera is electrically connected with the interior of the display screen through a wire. The control panel, the switch and the interior of the display screen are electrically connected through wires. A box cover is hinged to the upper surface of a box body; a display, a camera, a control panel and a switch are respectively mounted on the surface of the lower end of the box cover; according to the teaching device, a learner can observe the learning condition of the learner in time through the camera, the learner can learn the content taught by thelearner more visually through the display screen, and the whole device can be controlled to be started and stopped through the control panel and the switch.

title: Teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: According to the teaching interaction device based on artificial intelligence provided by the invention, the problem that the learning condition of each student cannot be checked due to very limited classroom time is solved; the device comprises a shell, a display frame is arranged on the front side surface of the shell; driving boxes are fixedly mounted at left and right ends of the bottom of theshell; power rollers are rotationally installed at the left and right ends in the shell. A power belt wheel is mounted in the middle of the two power rollers; a power belt is connected between the two power belt wheels; a plurality of connecting clamping grooves are fixed to the outer surface of the power belt, the connecting clamping grooves are connected with display devices in a clamped mode,the display devices are connected with a switching driving device, a writing board located on the front side of the display frame is rotationally installed on the front side face of the shell, the writing boards are connected with a writing driving device, and a scanning device is installed at the top of the shell; the device can meet the after-class learning interaction of teachers and students,is clear in design thought, simple in structure, small in occupied space and high in practicability, and provides great convenience for teachers to accurately master the learning conditions of students.

title: Classroom teaching speech-behavior big data synchronous analysis system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a speech-behavior big data analysis system for classroom teaching. The invention discloses a system for detecting and analyzing behavior characteristics of a teaching subject through an intelligent monitoring video. Corresponding codes, thresholds and standards are set at a terminal of the system. Comprehensive evaluation is carried out on teacher teaching through face recognition, body shape recognition and voice recognition; evaluation contents comprise a course understanding level, a course presentation level, a teacher performance level, a teacher-student cooperation level and a teacher-student harvest level, i.e., an artificial intelligence system is used to rapidly evaluate and analyze the speech and behaviors of teachers and students in classroom teaching andthen obtain data, and teacher classroom teaching information can be rapidly collected.

title: New optional course-scheduling system for college entrance examination
abstract_text: The invention provides a new optional course-scheduling system for college entrance examination, which comprises an online course selection subsystem, an intelligent division subsystem, an optional course-scheduling subsystem, a network reading evaluation subsystem, a teaching evaluation subsystem, a teaching resource subsystem and an optional course-scheduling device. The system is reasonable indesign and uses AI and various teaching and planning methods. Under the condition of limited resources, various resource constraint conditions faced in new course-scheduling for college entrance examination can be met to the maximum extent, intelligent class division and accurate course-scheduling are achieved, the problem of selection, scheduling, management and evaluation of course-scheduling teaching is solved for middle school users under a new college entrance examination system, the problem of education resource configuration is solved for regional managers, and a digital campus system can be integrated. The invention can meet needs of users and can be widely applied to high school schools carrying out course selection and class shift teaching, and can also be widely applied to general course scheduling of schools at all levels such as all primary schools, junior high schools, junior high schools and colleges.

title: Classroom concentration degree detection method and device
applicants: DONGYUN RUILIAN WUHAN COMPUTING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom concentration degree detection method and device. The method comprises the steps that firstly, posture data and facial expression data of all students in a currentclassroom scene are acquired based on a concentration degree recognition model; generating an attitude optimization reference in real time based on the attitude data of each student; generating an expression optimization reference in real time based on the facial expression data of each student; and finally, calculating an initial concentration degree evaluation value of each student based on theposture optimization benchmark, the expression optimization benchmark and the posture data and the facial expression data corresponding to each student, and screening out target students whose initialconcentration degree evaluation values do not meet a preset condition. According to the invention, the student concentration degree in various different classroom scenes can be analyzed and detected,accurate concentration degree analysis is carried out on each student in the current classroom scene through an artificial intelligence technology, and finally, an accurate and objective student concentration degree detection result is automatically generated, so that the teaching experience is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence voice electromagnetic gun experimental instrument
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence voice electromagnetic gun experimental instrument, which is characterized by mainly comprising an electromagnetic gun main body, a support base,a support rotating steering engine, a sensor, a single chip microcomputer, an artificial intelligence voice control system and a power supply, the electromagnetic gun main body is mounted on the supporting base through the supporting rotary steering engine; a sensor is arranged at the front part of the rotating steering engine; a single-chip microcomputer, an artificial intelligence voice controlsystem and a power source are further installed on the supporting base. The single-chip microcomputer is connected with the electromagnetic gun body, the sensor and the artificial intelligence voice control system through communication lines. And the rotating steering engine is an automatically controlled rotating steering engine and is connected with the sensor and the electromagnetic gun main body through communication lines. According to the utility model, the artificial intelligence voice technology is used to realize voice and automatic intelligent control of electromagnetic gun rotation,target and cannon opening, the learning interest and learning efficiency of teenagers for electromagnetic gun and artificial intelligence voice control are greatly improved, and the experiment perception and experiment teaching effect are improved.

title: TRAINING METHOD FOR MACHINE LEARNING MODEL, DATA GENERATION DEVICE, AND PRELEARNED MACHINE LEARNING MODEL
abstract_text: The present invention provides technology for adjusting the progress state of learning of a machine learning model. A training method comprises: a first step for inputting first input data to a first machine learning model and thereby causing first output data that corresponds to the first input data to be outputted, the first machine learning model being a model for executing a computation process, on the first input data, that uses a plurality of first computation parameters and outputting the first output data; and a second step for adjusting a plurality of first computation parameters using the first output data and teaching data, the teaching data indicating a desired value for the first output data that corresponds to the first input data. The first machine learning model is trained by repeating the first and second steps multiple times. The second step includes a variation step for causing the value used for adjusting the plurality of first computation parameters to vary using a random number.

title: Quick classroom attendance checking method and system for image pre-judgment based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI TIANDA NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a quick classroom attendance checking method and system for image pre-judgment based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of teaching attendance checking. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a fingerprint clock-in attendance table; enabling the high-definition camera to shoot a panoramic image of a student; separating the student panoramic images to obtain student monomer head portraits; performing face recognition on the single head portrait of the student to obtain a student identity; comparing the plurality of student identities with the student information table to obtain a suspected absence list; and confirming an absent list or an early quit list according to the suspected absent list and confirming a classroom attendance table. According to the invention, after fingerprint clock-in is carried out through the fingerprint identifier, the fingerprint clock-in attendance table is transmitted to the multimedia console;a plurality of student panoramic images are shot at regular time through a high-definition camera, and the student panoramic images are identified to obtain student identities; and finally, accordingto the suspected absence list, manual roll call is carried out to confirm the absence or early exit list and confirm a classroom attendance table. The attendance efficiency of classroom teaching management is improved, the time is saved, and the teaching management quality is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence Internet e-commerce learning device
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence internet e-commerce learning device which comprises a learning end and a teaching end, an account management module and a cloud database are arrangedbetween the learning end and the teaching end, the learning end is connected with the account management module through a network, the account management module is connected with the cloud database through the Internet. The cloud database is connected with the teaching terminal, the teaching terminal edits e-commerce teaching materials and transmits the e-commerce teaching materials to the clouddatabase, and the learning terminal obtains teaching data of the cloud database through the Internet for learning. The teaching course is edited through the teaching terminal and transmitted to the Internet database, the learning terminal obtains the teaching materials of the Internet database through the set account so as to perform learning, and one teaching course can be transmitted to the multiple teaching terminals through the Internet so as to facilitate popularization and promotion of teaching and have popularization and application values.

title: Experimental examination intelligent scoring system based on AI vision
abstract_text: An experimental examination intelligent scoring system based on AI vision comprises a student terminal (1), a teacher terminal (2) and a server terminal (3), and the server terminal (3) comprises an algorithm module (4) and a database (5); during specific application, the system further comprises a first user and a second user, the first user is a student, and the second user is a teacher; whereinthe algorithm module (4) runs on the server side (3), the database (5) is stored in the server side (3) for the algorithm module (4) to call, and the server side (3) comprises a cloud server; etc. The system can be applied to teaching and examination scenes of physico-chemical student experiments in middle schools, and solves the problems that students receive different information in the teaching scenes, teachers are low in correction efficiency in the examination scenes, and scoring standards are different. In addition, the actions of the students can be detected through an algorithm when the students practice experiment operation autonomously, effective guidance and timely feedback are provided, and the self-learning effect is improved.

title: 7DOF two-wheel multi-pose robot
applicants: TIANJIN VOCATIONAL AND TECHNICAL NORMAL UNIV CHINA VOCATIONAL TRAINING INSTRUCTOR TRAINING CENTER
abstract_text: The invention relates to a seven-degree-of-freedom two-wheel multi-pose mobile robot which comprises a vehicle body, a left wheel, a right wheel, a pair of wheel power mechanisms and a pair of wheel steering mechanisms. The pair of wheel power mechanisms and the pair of wheel steering mechanisms are symmetrically installed on the left side and the right side of the vehicle body respectively, the pair of wheel power mechanisms can be fixedly connected with the left wheel and the right wheel respectively and drive the left wheel and the right wheel to move, and the wheel steering mechanisms control steering of the left wheel and the right wheel respectively. The left wheel and the right wheel can realize coaxial balance vehicle type movement and also can realize bicycle type movement with two parallel wheel planes; seven-degree-of-freedom movement is achieved, the functions of experiments, teaching, scientific research and the like are integrated, and the functions of transportation, rescue, riding instead of walking, entertainment and the like on specific occasions can be achieved; meanwhile, the system can be used as a typical teaching and scientific research experiment platform and a research carrier for intelligent control, artificial intelligence, robots and other subjects, and can be used for checking the effectiveness of various intelligent algorithms.

title: METHOD FOR TRAINING MACHINE LEARNING MODEL, DATA CREATION DEVICE, AND LEARNED MACHINE LEARNING MODEL
abstract_text: To provide a technology that adjusts the state of advance of learning of a machine learning model.SOLUTION: A training method includes: a first step of inputting first input data to a first machine learning model to output first output data corresponding to the first input data, wherein the first machine learning model is a model for executing operation processing using a plurality of first operation parameters on the first input data to output the first output data; and a second step of adjusting the plurality of first operation parameters by using the first output data and teaching data, wherein the teaching data indicates a target value of the first output data corresponding to the first input data. By repeating the first step and the second step a plurality of times, the first machine learning model is trained. The second step includes a variation step of varying, by using random numbers, a value used for the adjustment of the plurality of first operation parameters.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 12

title: METHOD FOR TRAINING MACHINE LEARNING MODEL, DATA CREATION DEVICE, AND LEARNED MACHINE LEARNING MODEL
abstract_text: To create, by using a machine learning model, data on which the feature of input data is appropriately reflected.SOLUTION: A training method includes: a first step of inputting input data to a first machine learning model to output false data; a second step of inputting a plurality of data pairs including a real data pair and a false data pair to a second machine learning model to output a plurality of pieces of identification data; a third step of adjusting an operation parameter of the second machine learning model by using the identification data and teaching data indicating target values of the identification data; a fourth step of executing processing with an encoder of the first machine learning model on the false data to create feature data; and a fifth step of adjusting an operation parameter of the first machine learning model by using the identification data, the teaching data, feature data of the input data, and feature data of the false data. By repeating the first step through the fifth step a plurality of times, the first machine learning model and the second machine learning model are trained in parallel.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 9

title: Foreign language translation practice device
abstract_text: The foreign language translation practice device comprises a mounting plate, self-locking universal wheels are arranged at the four corners of the bottom wall of the mounting plate, mounting rods aresymmetrically and fixedly connected to the middle positions of the two sides of the top wall of the mounting plate, and a mounting box is arranged between the side walls of the opposite sides above the two mounting rods; a computer is fixedly mounted in the mounting box, and a display is fixedly mounted on one side of the front side wall of the mounting box. The self-locking universal wheels are arranged at the bottom of the device body, the moving performance is good, the computer is arranged, the whole device is high in intelligent degree, besides the input mode of the control panel, the voice receiving mechanism and the visual receiving mechanism are arranged, various input modes can be achieved in cooperation with the AI function of the computer, and the blackboard and chalk box mechanism is arranged on the back of the device. The space utilization rate is increased, the traditional teaching aid capability is achieved, and the whole device is good in functionality and practicability.

title: PATTERN EDGE DETECTION METHOD
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a pattern edge detection method which is applicable to a semiconductor inspection device for carrying out a pattern inspection using pattern design data. This method involves: generating an image of a pattern; detecting an edge of the pattern in the image on the basis of a reference pattern generated from pattern design data; repeating the generation of the image of the pattern and the detection of the edge of the pattern in the image and creating candidate teaching data formed from a plurality of images and a plurality of corresponding pattern edges; determining the teaching data by excluding, from the candidate teaching data, pattern edges which satisfy a predetermined disqualification condition and the images corresponding thereto; using the teaching data to generate an edge detection model by machine learning; generating an image of another pattern; and using the edge detection model to detect an edge of the other pattern in the image.

title: Remote education system based on visual recognition
abstract_text: A remote education system based on visual recognition is used for remote video education. The system is composed of a camera combination, a communication network and a database. The method is characterized by comprising the following steps; camera combination, the system comprises a camera specially used for shooting postures, a camera specially used for shooting myopia and a camera specially usedfor shooting a homework plane and a homework scene, information shot by the cameras is transmitted to a database in real time, and non-standard postures and actions of students are reminded in time through operation and comparison of artificial intelligence so as to be corrected in time. The complete homework process is tracked and shot, and the mastery degree of students for different question types, different knowledge points and different subjects is evaluated in combination with the homework result and consumed time. In combination with comparison and analysis of multi-dimensional parameters such as posture, myopia, time and environment and in combination with personality and characteristics of students, some targeted teaching schemes can be provided, and teaching according to materials is achieved. Therefore, myopia can be prevented, and physical and psychological health can be facilitated.

title: Artificial intelligence education robot
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and discloses an artificial intelligence education robot which comprises a box body, a touch panel is fixedly installed at the bottom end of the front face of the box body, a shell is fixedly connected to the top end of the front face of the box body, and voice modules are fixedly installed at the left end and the right end of the rear side wall of an inner cavity of the shell. A processing module is fixedly installed in the middle of the rear side wall of an inner cavity of the shell, a fixing column is fixedly connected to the rear side wall of the inner cavity of the shell, an outer cover is fixedly connected to the front face of the shell, and a fixing screw is in threaded connection with the front face of theouter cover. According to the artificial intelligence education robot, teaching videos or teaching documents are displayed through the display screen installed on the front face of the machine head, teaching voices are transmitted to learners through the loudspeaker in the shell, selection and control can be conducted by clicking the touch panel, man-machine interaction is achieved through the microphone, and when moving is needed, the brake is turned on to enable the rolling wheels to roll; therefore, the robot can be conveniently moved.

title: Accurate teaching method based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI BROAD WISE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a precise teaching method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of big data teaching. The teaching method comprises the steps of pre-class testing, learning condition collection, wrong question explanation, gold sentence interpretation, structure presentation, new class teaching, summary recording, note checking and homework assignment. The teaching method is carried out through a system program. According to the invention, a classroom is divided into nine links by fusing a big data accurate teaching system in the classroom, and each link is tightly connected to form a closed loop, so that a new teacher can be effectively helped to quickly master the rhythm of the classroom and know which links need to be carried out in one class, the classroom quality and after-class supervision are effectively ensured, and normal and orderly class is ensured.

title: ROBOT SYSTEM AND ROBOT CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: A robot system includes a robot, an image acquisition part, an image prediction part, and an operation controller. The image acquisition part acquires a current image captured by a robot camera arranged to move with the end effector. The image prediction part predicts a next image to be captured by the robot camera based on a teaching image model and the current image. The teaching image model is constructed by a machine learning of teaching image which is predicted to capture by the robot camera while the movable part performs an adjustment operation. The operation controller calculates the command value for operating the movable part so that the image captured by the robot camera approaches the next image, and controls the movable part based on the command value.

title: Electronic Zheng with artificial intelligence algorithm
abstract_text: The invention provides an electronic Zheng with an artificial intelligence algorithm. Vibration and pressing of strings are captured through an electronic sensor, and sound is triggered in an electronic data mode, so the limitation of an existing electro-acoustic Zheng mainly based on pickup and sound amplification is broken through, and comprehensive digitization of Zheng musical instruments is achieved. According to the brand-new electronic Zheng, the pitches of the strings can be replaced immediately through a computer technology; tracking, analyzing and learning of preference fingering ofa player are carried out in an artificial intelligence operation mode, fingering conforming is made to the artistic thought of the player in real time, and a sound instruction of the player is triggered; the background accompaniment sound can be automatically analyzed and matched according to the sound layer relationship played by the player, music creation teaching is assisted, and the immediateplaying ability of the player is stimulated and cultivated; most audio working software on the market is compatible, so that the electronic Zheng becomes a tool for electronic music creation; and an open source data transmission protocol function is provided, man-machine interaction design is supported, and multiple data transmission modes are provided.

title: AI technology-based intelligent high-definition network camera for smart classroom
applicants: SHENZHEN WEIKU INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of cameras. The utility model discloses an AI technology-based intelligent high-definition network camera for a smart classroom. The camera comprises acamera body, a first electric pan-tilt, a second electric pan-tilt, a support column and a wall-mounted bracket, the first electric holder is arranged at the upper end part of the supporting column in a manner of rotating along the vertical direction; the lower end wall of the camera body is connected with the first electric holder; the second electric holder is rotatably arranged at the front end of the wall-mounted support in the horizontal direction, the lower end of the supporting column is connected with the second electric holder, a high-definition camera module, an infrared LED lamp, aphotosensitive sensor and a microphone are arranged at the front end of the camera body, and an intelligent chip and a wireless WIFI module are arranged in the camera body. According to the technicalscheme of the utility model, the real-time condition in the intelligent classroom can be remotely monitored, the whole-process live shooting of the classroom can be completed while the classroom normalization teaching is carried out, the labor investment is reduced, and the practicability is strong.

title: Artificial intelligence graphical programming teaching platform and method
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence graphical programming teaching platform and method. The teaching platform comprises: a Jetson Nano system operation module which is used for operating a Jetson Nano system; a teaching storage module which is used for storing a basic artificial intelligence algorithm; a teaching calling module which is used for calling from the teaching storage module according to a first instruction based on the Jetson Nano system and assisting a user in mastering and learning the basic artificial intelligence algorithm; an automatic driving algorithm supportlibrary which is used for storing an automatic driving algorithm; an automatic driving extension module which is used for calling the automatic driving algorithm from an automatic driving algorithm support library according to a second instruction based on the Jetson Nano system, and assisting the user to learn to complete lane recognition, automatic obstacle avoidance, driving decision, instantpositioning and map construction; and an integrated development module which is used for manufacturing works on the basis of the running Jetson Nano system and an integrated development environment according to the third instruction. Therefore, students can experience a complete calculation processing flow at the terminal.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING METHOD, AND MACHINE LEARNING PROGRAM
abstract_text: This machine learning device makes it possible to generate numerical data with a high learning efficiency when numerical data is used as teaching data. The machine learning device includes a normalization unit that: acquires a plurality of pieces of numerical data indicating a plurality of numeric values which are in accordance with a prescribed arrangement; calculates, for each piece of numerical data, a numerical range of the plurality of numeric values indicated by the numerical data; and on the basis of the numerical range defined by the maximum numeric value and the minimum numeric value, from among the numerical range corresponding to a portion or all of the numerical data, normalizes the plurality of numeric values included in the numerical data. The machine learning device also includes a learning unit that generates or updates a learning model according to machine learning using, as teaching data, the numerical data indicating the normalized plurality of numeric values.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING METHOD, AND MACHINE LEARNING PROGRAM
abstract_text: This machine learning device is capable of preventing decreased estimation precision for a learning model even when there is a large difference among a plurality of pieces of numerical value data used as teaching data. This machine learning device comprises: a normalization unit which acquires a plurality of pieces of numerical value data indicating a plurality of numerical values which conform to a prescribed arrangement, computes for each piece of numerical value data a numerical value range of plurality of numerical values indicated by each piece of numerical value data, and normalizes the plurality of numerical values included in each piece of numerical value data on the basis of the numerical value range defined by the largest numerical value and the smallest numerical value from among the numerical value ranges corresponding to the numerical value data in whole or in part; and a learning unit which generates or updates a learning model by machine learning using numerical value data indicating the normalized plurality of numerical values as teaching data.

title: Winding condition generation device, winding device, winding defect level predicted value generation device, winding condition calculation method, winding method, and winding defect level predicted value generation method
abstract_text: Provided are a winding condition generation device, a winding device, a winding defect level predicted value generation device, a winding condition calculation method, a winding method, and a windingdefect level predicted value generation method that enable formation of a winding condition that matches with an actual result. This winding condition generation device is provided with an input unit,an output unit, and a condition calculation unit, wherein: the condition calculation unit is provided with a learning model produced by machine learning using, as teaching data, a combination of a winding condition and a winding parameter used when a winding web satisfying a target winding quality is produced, and uses the learning model to calculate the winding condition of a new winding web from the winding parameter of the new winding web inputted from the input unit; and the output unit outputs the winding condition. The winding parameter includes the width of a web, the speed of conveying the web, and the winding length of the web. The winding condition includes the tension of the web at the time of start of winding of the web and the tension of the web at the time of end of windingof the web.

title: Vocational education adaptive learning system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI ZHIYUN ZHIXUN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence-based vocational education adaptive learning system, which comprises an online learning system and an online learning condition management system connected with the online learning system, wherein the online learning system comprises a subject knowledge point model, a teaching method combination model, an examination memory model and a login entry model, the online learning condition management system comprises a self-evaluation module, a learning record module, an examination assistant checking management module and an intelligent notification module, the examination assistant checking management module builds a query system according to various examination requirements to help examinees to quickly query whether own examination application conditions meet requirements, and the intelligent notification module directionally publishes the examination application conditions, learning content update, examination arrangement, industry hotspot information and other notifications of each subject to a specified medium. In the system, learners can carry out systematic and targeted learning, after learning is completed, self-evaluation is carried out through the online learning condition management system, and comprehensive understanding is carried out on the self-learning condition.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment box
applicants: BEIJING ZHONGZIWANJIA EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model aims to provide a novel water-saving toilet bowl. Convenient use, the artificial intelligence teaching experiment box can realize modular and integrated teaching; the storage box comprises a box body and a box cover hinged to the rear side of the box body. A mainboard is installed in the box body. The main board is provided with an MCU and a universal peripheral module. A displayscreen is fixedly mounted on the inner side of the box cover; a daughter board chip is further included, a chip seat is mounted on the mainboard; the chip seat is correspondingly connected with a pinof the MCU; the daughter board chip can be inserted into the chip seat so as to realize communication with the MCU. The box body and the box cover are hinged through a damping rotating shaft. Whereinthe box body is connected with the front end of the box cover through a buckle, the four corners of the box cover are sleeved with rubber covered edges, the number of the daughter board chips is three, and the types of the three daughter board chips are the minimum system modules of a C51 single-chip microcomputer, an Arduino and an STM32 respectively.

title: Electronic teaching test box based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an electronic teaching test box based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of retractable teaching test boxes. The device comprises a bottom plate, a first side plate is hinged to one end of the bottom plate. A cover plate is hinged to the other end of the side plate I; a first box body is fixedly connected to the top of the bottom plate, sliding rails are symmetrically arranged on the two sides and one side face of the top end of the first box body, a frame and a stud are fixedly connected to the bottom end in the first box body, a secondbox body is arranged on the upper portion of the first box body, and sliding blocks are arranged on the two sides of the bottom end and the two sides of one end of the second box body. According to the utility model, through the cooperation of the box body I, the box body II, the slide rails, the slide blocks, the frame and the studs, the test box can be unfolded and lowered in height when in use,so that the sight is not influenced in the class process, the class efficiency is improved, the circuit board is protected more tightly, and the heat dissipation performance is improved.

title: Exercise and fitness posture scoring and teaching device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an exercise and fitness posture scoring and teaching device. The device comprises a base, a support frame, an intelligent teaching system, a display screen, a display screen connecting piece and a power supply, one end of the support frame is fixedly connected with the base; the other end is connected with one end of the display screen connecting piece; the other end ofthe display screen connecting piece is fixedly connected with the display screen; wherein the intelligent teaching system is electrically connected with the power supply and the display screen, the intelligent teaching system comprises a video acquisition device and a raspberry Pi system, the raspberry Pi system and the video acquisition device, and the raspberry Pi system edits a trained convolutional neural network with deep learning ability and a neural network model with a three-dimensional reconstruction function. According to the utility model, intelligent scoring and teaching are provided for people loving sports, and the user experience is improved.

title: Interactive teaching system based on PC
abstract_text: The invention discloses an interactive teaching system based on a PC. The system comprises an information acquisition module, an artificial intelligence processing module and an information feedback module, the information acquisition module is used for acquiring and storing facial and eyeball information of a student, the artificial intelligence processing module is used for carrying out artificial intelligence analysis on data collected by the information collection module and calculating the collected data by constructing an eyeball movement model and a face recognition model to obtain a calculation result, and the information feedback module is used for receiving the artificial intelligence analysis result and knowing the learning state of students. According to the invention, the teacher terminal and the student terminals are connected by using a novel technology, the teaching process is realized anytime and anywhere, and through the application of eyeball recognition and face recognition technologies, the classroom interaction frequency between teachers and students is increased, the learning interestingness of students is improved, and the teaching content is richer.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING APPARATUS, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: The invention provides an image processing apparatus, a machine learning device, and an image processing method, which can be used to estimate the occurrence of the abnormality in the device. The image processing apparatus includes: a memory configured to store a machine-learned model produced by performing machine learning using teaching data associating image data generated by reading a documentby an image reading device with device abnormality information on abnormality of the image reading device; and when the image reading device reads a document, a processor configured to obtain the device abnormality information based on generated image data and the machine-learned model.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DRIVEN AUTOMATED COMPANION
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for an automated dialogue companion. Multimodal input data associated with a user engaged in a dialogue of a certain topic in a dialogue scene are first received and used to extract features representing a state of the user and relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A current state of the dialogue characterizing the context of the dialogue is generated based on the state of the user and the relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A response communication for the user is determined based on a dialogue tree corresponding to the dialogue of the certain topic, the current state of the dialogue, and utilities learned based on historic dialogue data and the current state of the dialogue.

title: AI interactive auxiliary learning system and learning method
abstract_text: The invention provides an AI interactive auxiliary learning system. The AI interactive auxiliary learning system comprises an input unit, a flexible wearable data acquisition unit, a cloud processingunit, a learning evaluation feedback unit, an information transmission verification and identity verification unit and AR auxiliary learning glasses, wherein the input unit is used for wirelessly transmitting an image to the AR auxiliary learning glasses through an AR video processing system; the flexible wearable data acquisition unit is used for acquiring physiological parameters and posture parameters of a student and determining the listening interest state and the physical state of the student according to related parameter signals; the information transmission verification and identity verification unit is used for performing encryption and decryption operation on data transmission and performing student identity verification; the AR auxiliary learning glasses are used for assistingin interactive teaching. Correspondingly, an AI interactive auxiliary learning method is provided, and personalized learning strategy adjustment and immersive teaching experience can be carried out onstudents.

title: Teaching live broadcast method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching live broadcast method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps that a teaching terminal builds communication with a plurality of learningterminals through a cloud server, the teaching terminal is used for collecting a teaching video of a teacher, and the learning terminals are used for receiving the teaching video and providing playing for student users; after a live broadcast instruction is received, the teaching terminal starts live broadcast and distributes live broadcast videos to the plurality of learning terminals through the cloud server; the cloud server performs semantic recognition on the voice information in the video in real time, and synchronously displays the voice information on a plurality of learning terminalsin a caption form; the learning terminal collects face images of students in real time through a built-in camera and uploads the face images to the cloud server; and the cloud server carries out fatigue degree identification on the student user based on the face image, generates an early warning instruction when the fatigue degree exceeds a threshold value, and sends the early warning instructionto the teaching terminal and the learning terminal, so that the teaching terminal and the learning terminal carry out fatigue early warning operation respectively.

title: English pronunciation self-checking system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an English pronunciation self-checking system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a control host, a storage module, a touch screen, a control button panel,a voice signal output module and a voice acquisition module. The storage module, the touch screen, the control button panel, the voice signal output module and the voice acquisition module are in signal connection with the control host. The control host calls an English word database from the storage module and displays a certain English word in the English word database on the touch screen according to a preset display sequence, a student reads the English word, and the control host controls the voice signal output module to output the standard pronunciation of the English word. By comparingthe actual pronunciation with the standard pronunciation, the student can self-check the pronunciation condition of the English word and correct own pronunciation errors according to the standard pronunciation, so that the learning efficiency is improved. The workload of teachers can be reduced, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: LASER WELDING CONTROL DEVICE
abstract_text: To stabilize welding quality of an object in a good condition.SOLUTION: A laser welding control device comprises: a photographing part that photographs a processed site irradiated with a laser beam outputted from an irradiation part, in an object subjected to laser welding; a coincidence-degree calculating part that calculates a degree of coincidence between a welded state of the processed site and a welded state of a teaching image, by comparing a photographed image photographed by the photographing part with the teaching image for each welded state obtained by machine learning; and a laser control part that feed-back controls output of the laser beam irradiated by the irradiation part, on the basis of the degree of coincidence calculated by the coincidence-degree calculating part and target degree of coincidence based on a target welded state.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 6

title: Industrial Internet teaching practical training platform
applicants: ANHUI TECHNICAL COLLEGE MECHANICAL & ELECTRICAL ENG
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an industrial Internet teaching practical training platform which comprises a feeding sorting assembly, a nut conveying belt, a feeding box assembly, a weighing device, a control cabinet, a main control computer, a touch screen, a packaging assembly and a finished product stacking assembly. According to the technical scheme provided by the utility model, the feeding andsorting assembly is used for sorting excellent and bad nuts by utilizing an artificial intelligence algorithm on the basis of visual images captured by the industrial camera; by setting a weight in the system, nuts are loaded into the material receiving box in the weighing device, when the material receiving box reaches the specified weight, material supply to the material receiving box is stopped, and meanwhile, the material receiving box is conveyed to the finished product conveying belt for packaging and stacking operation. According to the technical scheme, the automation level is high, manual operation is not needed in the whole process, the working procedures of accurate sorting, automatic weighing, intelligent packaging, stacking and the like are achieved, and the production efficiency is high.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING APPARATUS, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: An image processing apparatus includes: a memory configured to store a machine-learned model produced by performing machine learning using teaching data associating image data generated by reading a document by an image reading device with device abnormality information on abnormality of the image reading device; and when the image reading device reads a document, a processor configured to obtain the device abnormality information based on generated image data and the machine-learned model.

title: Calligraphy teaching device utilizing AI-assisted teaching
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of calligraphy teaching and further discloses a calligraphy teaching device utilizing AI-assisted teaching. The device comprises a copying display unit anda teaching display unit. The teaching display unit comprises stand columns, an intelligent AI camera, a control circuit board, a laser designator, a teaching display screen and a shell. The number ofthe stand columns is two; the top of each stand column is fixedly connected with the intelligent AI camera; the shell is fixedly connected between the two stand columns; and the laser designator is fixedly connected to the vertical center line of the upper surface of the shell. The intelligent AI camera is used for shooting pen wielding conditions of a practicer and stroke completion levels of the practicer in real time when the practicer copies, feeding shooting results back to a central control computer in a circuit board in real time, and evaluating the completion levels of the practicer by a teaching program running on the central control computer by using AI so as to judge whether to continue to display the next stroke or practice unqualified strokes again.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching training platform
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching practical training platform. The device comprises a base, universal wheels, a first shell and a second shell, universal wheels are fixedly connected to the four corners of the bottom end of the base correspondingly. Adjusting structures are fixedly connected to the two sides of the top end of the base. A second shell is fixedly connected between one sides of the adjusting structures; a first shell is movably hinged to the bottom of one end of the second shell; a fixing structure is fixedly connected to the inner side between the second shell and one end of the first shell, a touch screen is arranged in the position between the second shell and one end of the first shell, heat dissipation holes are evenly formed in one end of the second shell, and a concentrator is fixedly connected to the bottom of one side of one end of the second shell. According to the utility model, the concentrator is fixedly connected to the bottom of one side of one end of the second shell, so that the service life of the device is prevented from being shortened due to winding damage caused by overlong wires, passing people are prevented from being stumbled, and the safety of the device is improved.

title: VR simulation device for virtual reality teaching environment for killing actual combat
abstract_text: The invention discloses a VR simulation device for a virtual reality teaching environment for killing actual combat, and the device consists of 3DSMAX software, a simulation module, a computer, motionsensing equipment, and a processing module, and the 3DSMAX software is used for constructing a virtual scene for killing, and creating a virtual reality environment for killing. The simulation moduleis used for simulating the action of a killer; the computer is used for realizing three-dimensional animation simulation for a piercer, and visually reproducing standard technical actions, pierce confrontation score evaluation and artificial intelligence confrontation of the piercer in various pierce environments; the beneficial effects of the invention are that: under the guidance of the teaching theory of the construction subjects and the stabbing subjects, experience of a large number of researchers for killing teaching through interactive media is summarized; virtual reality interaction emerging technology is fully utilized to promote puncture teaching, and a virtual reality puncture interaction design which is based on student puncture ability cultivation, meets the requirement of students for mastering skill puncture basic technologies and promotes the students to think about the spirit of the stabbing sword is constructed.

title: Online audio discussion guiding method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING JINDI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online audio discussion guiding method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of online teaching. The method comprises the processes of mutualfamiliarity and connection, heuristic question import, speaking time reminding, speaking proportion reminding, guide summary and review. The online audio discussion guiding method based on artificialintelligence can also be a subject discussion party or a reading party. According to the online audio discussion guiding method based on artificial intelligence, conference service is discussed on anonline theme guided by the audio based on artificial intelligence, the availability of the form is greatly improved, mutual assistance discussion and excitation are not limited to a certain circle layer any more, and as an infrastructure, wisdom of each person is truly converged through the theme. According to the method, artificial intelligence is combined, the atmosphere creation capability of virtual reality is provided, a relative standard conference form is provided, people can determine activity expectation more easily, and knowledge can be produced and spread rapidly through accessed voice recognition.

title: GROUND SURFACE DISPLACEMENT ESTIMATION METHOD
