abstract_text: To provide a displacement amount estimation method for estimating the displacement when the displacement of the ground surface is not measured in a chemical injection method, an information processing device, a construction management method, and a ground improvement body with liquefaction countermeasures.SOLUTION: An information processing device 30 generates teaching data based on data on chemical injection in a first target area and data on displacement of a ground surface, performs machine learning on the teaching data to generate an artificial intelligence model 33, and estimates the displacement of the ground surface of a second target area based on the artificial intelligence model 35. The data on the chemical injection includes positions of chemical injection points during the chemical injection, the injection rate of the chemical and the amount of the injected chemical, and positions of chemical injection completion point where the chemical injection is completed, at each of multiple points in the past ground improvement work. The data on displacement includes a position of a displacement measuring point for measuring a ground surface displacement and a measured displacement amount data indicating the measured value of the displacement amount of the displacement measuring point at the above time point.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: Artificial intelligence English learning device convenient to operate
applicants: FUJIAN JIUZHOU YUSHENG TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence English learning device convenient to operate. The learning device comprises a base, a power interface, a placement groove, a mounting piece, a learning device main body, an auxiliary learning device and a bearing device, the auxiliary learning device is mounted at the right end of the top of the base; the auxiliary learning device is internally provided with a fixing plate, the fixing plate is provided with a fixing mechanism, the fixing mechanism can fix some paper or some reference materials, a user can write and record conveniently, teaching assistance is effectively carried out in the English learning process, and the learning efficiency is improved; a bearing device is mounted at the front end in the base; a bottom pad can be pulledout of the bearing device; the bottom pad can support the hands of a user, comfort is provided for the user when the user records and uses the learning device, and a stabilizing mechanism is installedin the bottom pad and can be tightly fixed to a table top, so that the overall stability of the device is improved, and English learning of the user is effectively assisted.

title: Electric power network safety intelligent teaching system based on learner portraits
abstract_text: The invention discloses an electric power network safety intelligent teaching system based on learner portraits. The system comprises a teaching management module, a teaching data acquisition module,a semi-physical simulation module, an artificial intelligence algorithm module, a portrait acquisition and depiction module, a theory teaching module, a training teaching module and a teaching assessment module. The teaching management module is electrically connected with the teaching data acquisition module, the semi-physical simulation module, the artificial intelligence algorithm module, the portrait acquisition and depiction module, the theory teaching module, the training teaching module and the teaching assessment module. Wherein the teaching data acquisition module is electrically connected with the theory teaching module, the training teaching module and the teaching assessment module, the semi-physical simulation module is electrically connected with the training teaching moduleand the teaching assessment module, and the artificial intelligence algorithm module is electrically connected with the portrait acquisition and depiction module. According to the invention, the teaching practicality is improved, diversified training effects are realized, the learning effect of learners is effectively and dynamically evaluated, and the learning efficiency is greatly improved.

title: Label-collecting device, label collection method, and label-collecting program
abstract_text: The label-collecting device is provided with an acquisition unit for acquiring teaching labels for teaching data used in machine learning, a learning processing unit for executing the machine learningof a model on the basis of the teaching data that includes the acquired teaching labels, an accuracy detection unit for detecting the accuracy of the model, and a presentation processing unit for presenting the accuracy. The acquisition unit acquires updated teaching data.

title: LEARNING METHOD, LEARNING DEVICE, AND NON-TRANSITORY COMPUTER-READABLE STORAGE MEDIUM FOR STORING LEARNING PROGRAM
abstract_text: A machine learning device includes: a model generator configured to generate a machine learning model by using first training data that includes image data, the image data including a target to be recognized and a label indicating the target to be recognized; a teaching data generator configured to generate second training data indicating a changed variation in characteristics related to the target to be recognized, based on recognition degrees at which the target to be recognized is recognized from verification data items when the image data is input as the verification data items to the generated machine learning model; and a learning executor configured to execute machine learning by inputting the generated second training data to the generated machine learning, model.

title: Medical image remote teaching method, device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: INST OF MEDICAL INFORMATION CHINESE ACADEMY OF MEDICAL SCIENCES
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of medical image annotation teaching, in particular to a medical image remote teaching method, a device, equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps of marking a medical image by a student on line; performing teaching evaluation on the annotation results of the students by a teaching expert on line; training the teaching evaluation artificial intelligence model according to an expert teaching evaluation labeling result; and performing image annotation teaching by using the teaching evaluation artificial intelligence model. According to the medical image remote teaching method, the device, the equipment, the storage medium disclosed by the invention, the experience of experts is better applied, and the teaching quality of image marking is ensured; and meanwhile, artificial intelligence of image annotation teaching is realized, and the working intensity of teaching doctors is reduced.

title: Method and system for automatically selecting and zooming specific area of medical material by AI
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and system for automatically selecting and zooming a specific region of a medical material by AI, and the method comprises the following steps: dividing the medical material into a plurality of regions, marking the regions, and sequentially carrying out the zooming of all region images at different proportions; extracting an LBP feature and a wavelet moment featureof the zoomed regional image, and carrying out secondary annotation on the regional image; and if a signal for selecting and zooming the specific area of the medical material is received, displayingthe zoomed area image and the secondary annotation of the area image according to a set proportion. According to the invention, the specific area of the medical material can be zoomed, the fineness ofthe specific area of the medical material is improved, and auxiliary propaganda and teaching in the medical knowledge propaganda and teaching process are facilitated.

title: Information processing device, machine learning device, and information processing method
abstract_text: An information processing device, a machine learning device, and an information processing method are provided, which adopt manuscripts in a wide range as generation targets of file names. The information processing device includes a storage section that stores a machine-learned model subjected to machine learning using teaching data in which at least one of an image included in read data of a document read by a scanner, a character string included in the read data, and a layout of the read data that is included in the read data is associated with a file name of the read data; and a controllerthat generates the file name of the read data using the machine-learned model and at least one of the image, the character string, and the layout that are included in the read data.

title: AUTOMATION SYSTEM AND AUTOMATION METHOD FOR ROBOT WELDING
abstract_text: The present invention provides an automation system and an automation method for robot welding, which can automatically recognize a stirrup welding pointer with various sizes and welding positions without teaching a robot, can control a robot welder to move to the automatically recognized welding pointer and can recognize whether a robot welding state is good or bad. To achieve the purpose, the automation system for robot welding according to the present invention comprises: a production unit enabling a robot to automatically weld a predetermined form with a predetermined stirrup; a vision unit deep-learning welding pointer information on a predetermined size and a predetermined welding position of the welding pointer for welding the form with the stirrup; and a programmable logic control (PLC) unit providing the stirrup to the form based on the welding pointer information learned by the vision unit.

title: Self-adaptive situational artificial intelligence teaching system, method and device
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of electronic teaching, particularly relates to a self-adaptive situational artificial intelligence teaching system, a method and a device, and aims to solve the problems of low artificial intelligence knowledge explanation and application learning efficiency, difficulty in knowledge conversion and low enthusiasm of students in a conventional mode. The self-adaptive situational artificial intelligence teaching system comprises a student evaluation module, a situation interaction module and a learning management module, wherein the situation interaction moduleevaluates students and generates learning condition files of the students according to evaluation results; the situation interaction module generates situation practice games according to the learning condition files; and the learning management module generates learning reports and updates the learning condition files according to operation time and operation steps of the students for solving problems in the situation interaction module. According to the self-adaptive situational artificial intelligence teaching system, the method and the device, the substitution feeling and experience feeling of students are enhanced through a situation interaction mode, the learning plan is adjusted according to the problem solving time and operation steps of the students, the self-adaptive ability ofthe teaching system is enhanced, and personalized teaching is realized.

title: AI learning pen device
applicants: SHENZHEN CITY TRUEASY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an AI learning pen device. The AI learning pen device comprises a main control chip, a storage module, a power supply module, a loudspeaker module, a key module and a voicereceiving module, language interaction is realized through combination of the voice receiving module and an audio encoding and decoding chip in the main control chip, and front-end language processingis optimized; resource addition and deletion with a cloud server or a cloud platform are realized through the wireless communication module; english teaching materials, dictionaries and picture bookdata can be added; meanwhile, the spoken language evaluation function of the pingfei is transplanted and comprises the following reading function, the scoring function and the correcting function; synchronous teaching material listening, pronunciation evaluation and correction, one-key word reciting and Chinese-English translation can be realized; meanwhile, the pen has a paper writing function, and the refill can be replaced at any time; the utility model provides a portable intelligent AI learning pen device.

title: English listening and reading training robot based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to an English listening and reading training robot based on artificial intelligence. The English listening and reading training robot comprises a robot main body structure, a control module, a touch screen, a student card sensing module, a listening training control key, a reading training control key, a loudspeaker and a microphone. When a student card is close to the student card sensing module, the student card sensing module reads student grade information in the student card and performs corresponding control in combination with a received listening training instruction or reading training instruction, participation of a teacher in the whole course is not needed, the work and teaching burden of the teacher is reduced, the teacher can have more time to carry out other related teaching tutoring, and the teaching efficiency is improved; moreover, the English listening and reading training robot can realize learning of students at any time and improve the learning efficiency, and standard pronunciation of English words is set in the English listening and reading training robot regardless of listening training or reading training, so that the English listeningand reading ability of the students is prevented from being influenced by the English level of teachers themselves.

title: Artificial intelligence English teaching system
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence English teaching system. The artificial intelligence English teaching system comprises a teacher-side host and a student-side host, wherein the teacher-side host comprises an English teaching starting instruction receiving module, an English word database, an English word sub-database extraction module, a first display module, an English word selection module, an English word output module, an English word assessment module and a first voice signal output module; and the student-side host comprises an English word receiving module, a second display module, an English word test instruction receiving module, a voice acquisition module, a text acquisition module, an English word verification instruction receiving module, a second voice signal output module and a verification result output module. Through adopting the artificial intelligence English teaching system, students can self-check the learning situation of English words, the learning efficiency is improved, the workload of teachers is reduced, the teaching efficiency is improved, and the learning progress and efficiency of the students are not affected by the English abilityand teaching ability of the teachers any more.

title: Teaching system for children education
applicants: LANGFANG ZHENGUIGU EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching system for children education. The system comprises a cloud server, a creation system, a teaching game system, a cartoon teaching system and an intelligent AI systemare arranged in the cloud server, the creation system internally comprises a voice inspiring module, an innovation video library, an innovation training module and a drawing innovation module, a teaching game library is arranged in the teaching game system, and a cartoon teaching library is arranged in the cartoon teaching system. According to the invention, the creation system, the voice inspiring module, the innovation video library, the innovation training module and the drawing innovation module are arranged, hobbies of different children can be met, the creative ability of children is cultivated from multiple aspects, the innovative ability of children is stimulated, development of intelligence of children is facilitated, children can comprehensively develop, by arranging the teaching game system and the animation teaching system, children can learn in games and animation, and the learning impression of children can be deepened.

title: DRIVING ASSISTANCE DEVICE AND DRIVING ASSISTANCE METHOD
abstract_text: A sensor acquisition unit (11) acquires an output result of a sensor (2) which is mounted in a vehicle (1). Using a machine learning algorithm which takes as an input the output result of the sensor (2) which is acquired by the sensor acquisition unit (11), a computation unit (14) computes an inference result for controlling the vehicle (1). A reliability estimation unit (12) derives a similarity between the output result which is acquired by the sensor acquisition unit (11) and teaching data which is used in learning by the machine learning algorithm, and on the basis of the similarity, estimates the reliability of the inference result which is computed by the computation unit (14). A control output unit (15) adds the reliability which is estimated by the reliability estimation unit (12) to the inference result which is computed by the computation unit (14) and outputs the result as vehicle control information.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: An information processing device includes a storage section that stores a machine-learned model subjected to machine learning using teaching data in which at least one of an image included in read data of a document read by a scanner, a character string included in the read data, and a layout of the read data that is included in the read data is associated with a file name of the read data, and a controller that generates the file name of the read data using the machine-learned model and at least one of the image, the character string, and the layout that are included in the read data.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: Rock climbing action evaluation system based on deep learning and attitude estimation
applicants: CHANGZHOU ZHONGHUAN INTERNET INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a rock climbing action evaluation system based on deep learning and attitude estimation, and relates to the technical field of computer processing. The system comprises a dataacquisition module, a target tracking module, Alpha Pose and a neural network algorithm, and evaluation steps comprises the following steps: acquiring a picture of a rock climber through the data acquisition module, and inputting the picture into the target tracking module; using the target tracking module for tracking a target in the image by using YOLO; processing the tracked target informationby AlphaPose to form a human skeleton diagram and coordinate data of human joints; and inputting skeleton coordinate data for training by adopting a neural network algorithm so as to obtain correct judgment. Through AlphaPose and a neural network algorithm, rock climbing postures of a rock climber can be subjected to teaching, correction and the like, rock climbing accidents caused by wrong rock climbing postures of the rock climber are avoided, and rock climbing safety of the rock climber can be improved.

title: Intelligent role position supplementing method based on multi-person cooperative assembly
applicants: CHENGDU AIRCRAFT IND GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent role position supplementing method based on multi-person cooperative assembly. The intelligent role position supplementing method comprises two parts of multi-person cooperative assembly and intelligent role position supplementing based on multi-person cooperative assembly. According to the intelligent role position supplementing method, the multi-person cooperative assembling role intelligent complementing provides AI virtual role complementing for trainees; in terms of definition of the AI role, a collaboration function can be provided for collaborationpersonnel in assembly process simulation, and a demonstration teaching task can also be provided in early-stage demonstration simulation teaching; and through repeated simulation training, personnellearning cost is reduced, and assembly process cognition is improved.

title: Multi-scene multi-subject identity behavior emotion recognition and analysis method and intelligent supervision system
applicants: CAPITAL UNIV OF ECONOMICS AND BUSINESS
abstract_text: A multi-scene multi-subject identity behavior emotion recognition and analysis method and an intelligent supervision system can be applied to the fields of intelligent video monitoring, intelligent attendance checking, intelligent teaching and the like, and the intelligent supervision system comprises a video acquisition device, a front-end intelligent control detection early warning device, a rear-end intelligent control detection early warning server, a monitoring management terminal and the like. According to the multi-scene multi-subject identity behavior emotion recognition and analysis method and the intelligent supervision system, video image acquisition and analysis based on an artificial intelligence technology and user behavior acquisition and analysis are combined, and multi-angle and multi-dimensional intelligent analysis and monitoring early warning of emotion states, contents and the like are realized. Aiming at the field of mood and efficiency monitoring of multiple subjects in multiple scenes, and different requirements in the fields of intelligent classrooms, intelligent teaching and the like can be met, and teachers can know the learning conditions of all studentsin time, and questions of the students can be fed back and answered, and the teaching progress and speed can be adjusted.

title: FAILURE TIME ESTIMATION DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND FAILURE TIME ESTIMATION METHOD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a failure time estimation device, a machine learning device, and a failure time estimation method, which can estimate failure time of a printer. The failure time estimation device includes: a memory configured to store a machine-learned model obtained by performing machine learning using teaching data associating printer information including at least one of operation history of a printer, state information indicating a current state, and a print result image indicating a print result with failure time of the printer; and a controller configured to obtain the printer information and estimate the failure time of the printer using the obtained printer information and the machine-learned model.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system based on graphic programming
applicants: BEIJING MARTIAN VISION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence teaching system based on graphic programming. The artificial intelligence teaching system comprises a programming terminal, a cloud server and embedded equipment, the programming terminal performs graphical programming to generate a neural network model and configures basic parameters of a neural network, and the programming terminal transmits the basic parameters of the neural network to the cloud server; the cloud server receives the basic parameters of the neural network, processes the basic parameters and generates a trained network model; and the embedded device receives the trained network model through the Internet, and performs operation processing on the trained network model to obtain a corresponding operation result. Complex programming is simplified to achieve the purposes of quickly building the neural network, quickly operating the model and checking the operation result of the neural network, teenager students can complete complex program design without writing or only needing to write fewer program codes, and learning efficiency and learning fun are improved.

title: AR Chinese character recognition system based on multimedia application scene
applicants: SHANGHAI XIANJIAN CULTURE MEDIA CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of AR teaching equipment, and specifically discloses an AR Chinese character recognition system based on a multimedia application scene. The system comprises a processing circuit module, a database module, a training module, an AR identification module, a character error correction module and a multimedia playing module, and the database module, the training module, the AR identification module, the character error correction module and the multimedia playing module are connected with the processing circuit module. According to the system, writing teaching and error correction are initiated; in each important teaching block, AR technology is used for teaching assistance, scene reproduction is used as a core, the ability of students to recognize,remember and exam is improved, AI reading error correction and intelligent judgment scoring functions are added to correct writing and reading of students, the ability of students to write and read is improved, and thus the teaching effect is improved.

title: FAILURE TIME ESTIMATION DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND FAILURE TIME ESTIMATION METHOD
abstract_text: A failure time estimation device includes: a memory configured to store a machine-learned model obtained by performing machine learning using teaching data associating printer information including at least one of operation history of a printer, state information indicating a current state, and a print result image indicating a print result with failure time of the printer; and a controller configured to obtain the printer information and estimate the failure time of the printer using the obtained printer information and the machine-learned model.

title: Classroom teaching timely reinforcement capability evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom teaching timely reinforcement capability evaluation method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: 1, video collection: collecting an image through a video collection module, and inputting the collected image into a step 2; 2, walking route recognition; 3, walking route coding; 4, timely strengthening capability evaluation; and 5, evaluation result output. The beneficial effects of the invention are that the method achieves the recognition of the behaviors of a teacher in a classroom through an artificial intelligence image recognition technology, captures the walking route of the teacher, carries out the coding of the walking route of the teacher, carries out the calibration of the codes, and trains a timelyreinforcement capability intelligent evaluation model. Through the model and extraction of teacher walking route information, intelligent evaluation and timely reinforcement capability are carried out, and the problem of automation of teaching timely reinforcement capability evaluation is solved.

title: Internet of Vehicles teaching operation platform based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: An Internet of Vehicles teaching operation platform based on artificial intelligence comprises a table body, a fixing plate, a PC and a function module installed at the front end of the fixing plate.A voltage stabilizing circuit, a control circuit, a jacking mechanism and a prompting circuit are further included. A front storage bin and a lifting bin are arranged below the tabletop; the jacking mechanism comprises an electric push rod, guide rods, guide pipes, permanent magnets and reed pipes, the two guide pipes are installed on the left side and the right side in the lifting bin respectively, and the two guide rods are sleeved with the two guide pipes respectively; the guide rod and a plunger rod of the electric push rod are mounted below the fixed plate; the lower end of the electric push rod is mounted in the lifting bin; an open slot is formed in the desktop at the rear side end of the lifting bin, the permanent magnet is mounted at the side end of one limiting plate, and the tworeed switches are respectively mounted at the upper and lower ends of the middle of one side in the lifting bin; the voltage stabilizing circuit is connected with the control circuit, the jacking mechanism, the prompting circuit and the reed switch through wires. According to the utility model, one-key full-intelligent control can be realized, the desktop space is enlarged, and operation of otherpractical training projects is facilitated.

title: Programmable voice intelligent teaching aid
applicants: ZHEJIANG KUGE CHUANGKE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a programmable voice intelligent teaching aid. The teaching aid comprises a WiFi module, a voice recording and playing module, a server, an external flash module and a maincontroller. The WiFi module is in communication with the server through a TCP. The WiFi module is communicated with the voice recording and playing module through i2s; the WiFi module is communicatedwith the external flash module through an SPI. And the WiFi module communicates with the main controller through a UART. The beneficial effects of the utility model are that the utility model provides a programmable voice intelligent teaching aid in the field of artificial intelligence voice.

title: Internet of Things intelligent shopping mall shopping system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: INNER MONGOLIA ZHICHENG INTERNET OF THINGS CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an Internet of Things intelligent mall shopping system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a cloud platform and a robot, and is characterized in that the robot comprises a microphone and a loudspeaker, the cloud platform comprises a voice-text conversion processor and a payment processor, the microphone and the loudspeaker are connected with the voice conversion processor, and the voice-text conversion processor is connected with the payment processor. According to the scheme, whole-course voice browsing, voice shopping cart adding, voice commentchecking, voice ordering and other operations can be conveniently carried out on the user; the Internet of Things shopping mall robot shopping platform provides the optimal shopping and delivery scheme for the user, can perform Internet of Things shopping mall operation teaching on the user, performs statistics on the proficiency of using the robot by the user, and integrates multiple functions into a whole and achieves one-stop artificial intelligence.

title: Teaching video analysis method and device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching video analysis method and device, and the method comprises the steps that an analysis task is obtained, and a corresponding task process is distributed to each tasktype value carried by the analysis task; when the starting time specified by the analysis task is reached, each task process obtains classroom AI data at the current moment from the teaching video every other preset duration; when the end time specified by the analysis task arrives, each task process merges all the acquired classroom AI data, sets a corresponding task type value and sends the tasktype value to the application service process; and the application service process processes all the classroom AI data sent by each task process according to the task type value to obtain the teaching type of the teacher. The multi-dimensional classroom AI data of the teaching video is automatically extracted by using different types of task processes, and the extracted multi-dimensional classroom AI data is analyzed by the application service process after the end to obtain the teaching type of the teacher, so that the automation degree and efficiency of data processing are enhanced, and time and labor are saved.

title: Teaching interaction method based on artificial intelligence, terminal and storage medium
applicants: SHENZHEN KONKA ELECT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching interaction method based on artificial intelligence, a terminal and a storage medium. The teaching interaction method based on artificial intelligence comprises thesteps of acquiring the writing content input by a learning end; identifying the written content through an AI algorithm, and judging whether the written content is correct or not; when the writing content is wrong, performing comment analysis based on the writing content, and feeding back the correct content and the commented and analyzed writing content to the learning end. The AI technology is applied to the whiteboard teaching system, the written content input by students is recognized through the AI algorithm, automatic error correction is conducted on the written content, automatic comment analysis is conducted on the basis of wrong content, the interactivity in the teaching process is improved, the teaching mode is optimized, and the learning interest is improved.

title: Art AI evaluation platform and use method thereof
applicants: CHONGQING YUNJUN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of art AI evaluation platforms, and particularly to an art AI evaluation platform and a use method thereof. The system comprises an evaluation system, a network server and a remote interactive teaching system. The evaluation system comprises a curriculum work evaluation module and a singleton work evaluation module. The curriculum work evaluation modulecomprises a curriculum evaluation data receiving unit, a curriculum standard data storage unit, a curriculum comparison unit, a curriculum evaluation analysis unit, a feedback integration unit and anevaluation result notification unit. The platform can be used in the course learning result evaluation of an art interactive teaching platform. Other single-case art work of the user can be evaluatedby independent use. The learning effect of the user can be evaluated in real time and fed back to the student user quickly, meanwhile, the learning result can be fed back to related tutoring teachers, the teachers can make a next step of judgment and operation conveniently, and the related tutoring teachers can remind the student user to correct errors through the remote interactive teaching system according to requirements.

title: AI education projection equipment for intelligent education campus
applicants: YANTAI LUDA ENV IMPACT ASSESSMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses AI education projection equipment for a smart education campus, relates to the technical field of smart education, and solves the problems that currently used projection equipment is large in size and inconvenient if being applied to classrooms, and general projection is mainly performed through a projector and a curtain. The AI education projection equipment for the smarteducation campus comprises a mounting plate, vertical frame structures are arranged on the two sides of the mounting plate, and lead screws are rotationally arranged on the inner sides and the outer sides of vertical frames through bearings; upper connecting rods are rotationally arranged at the tops of the inner sides of the mounting plate vertical frames through rotating shafts; lower connectingrods are rotationally arranged at the bottoms of the upper connecting rods through connecting shafts; by arrangement of a beveled edge blackboard and a beveled edge curtain, dual functions are provided for projection equipment, the beveled edge blackboard and the beveled edge curtain can be used as blackboards for teaching during normal use, the positions of the beveled edge blackboard and the beveled edge curtain can be converted, convenience is provided for projection, meanwhile, the size is normal, occupied space is small, transportation is convenient, and mass production and marketing canbe achieved.

title: AI artificial intelligence teaching product device
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an AI artificial intelligence teaching product device. The intelligent sound equipment comprises an intelligent sound equipment body for artificial intelligence teaching, adisplay screen is arranged on the front surface of the intelligent sound body; loudspeakers are arranged on the two sides of the display screen respectively, a storage box is arranged on the upper portion of the intelligent sound box body, a damping mechanism is arranged on the bottom side of the intelligent sound box body and comprises a damping base arranged below the intelligent sound box body, a damping groove is formed in the top of the damping base, and a connecting block is installed in the damping groove in a sliding mode in the vertical direction. The utility model discloses an intelligent sound box body used for AI artificial intelligence teaching. The AI teaching audio playing device has good damping performance, reduces vibration noise, reduces audio noisy phenomena, can guarantee the effect after AI teaching audio playing, avoids the situation that normal teaching is affected due to the fact that the vibration noise of the whole device is too large, and also solves the problem that the service life cannot be guaranteed due to the fact that vibration is too large.

title: LEARNING DEVICE AND DETERMINATION DEVICE
abstract_text: Provided is a learning device comprising: an input unit for inputting teaching determination target data, teaching determination result data that indicates the result of determination made on the teaching determination target data, and teaching determination ground data that indicates the grounds of result of determination made on the teaching determination target data; a determination learning unit which, when determination target data is inputted by performing first machine learning to learn a relationship between the teaching determination target data and the teaching determination result data, generates a determination inference model for outputting determination inference data that indicates the result of determination made on the determination target data; and a ground learning unit which, when determination target data is inputted by performing second machine learning to learn a relationship between the teaching determination target data and the teaching determination ground data, generates a ground inference model for outputting ground inference data that indicates the grounds of result of determination made on the determination target data.

title: English text aided teaching method and system based on AI vision
applicants: SHANGHAI LIGHTEN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of English textbook auxiliary teaching, and provides an English text aided teaching method and system based on AI vision, and the method comprises the steps: with English textbooks as indexes, building a teaching knowledge base of the English textbooks, and storing the teaching knowledge base in a cloud database; performing data interaction with a clouddatabase through intelligent equipment, obtaining indexes of English textbooks in the teaching knowledge base, and selecting the English textbook to be learned from the index of the English textbook.Sentences needing to be confused are recognized on the English textbooks through AI equipment, communication with the intelligent equipment is conducted, the intelligent equipment obtains related knowledge points corresponding to the sentences needing to be confused from a teaching knowledge base, and the related knowledge points are displayed on the intelligent equipment in a mode including a display screen and voice. The invention can correspond to the texts and can display the content of English sentence analysis in the display dequipment by simply pointing out the content in the text through gestures during learning.

title: Concentration degree detection method, terminal device and system
abstract_text: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a concentration degree detection method, terminal equipment and a concentration degree detection system, theconcentration degree detection system comprises the terminal equipment, a central control platform and a server; the central control platform is used for controlling the server to configure online content; the server is used for transmitting the online content to the terminal equipment under the control of the central control platform; the terminal device is used for receiving and displaying theonline content, collecting image data of a viewer, and calculating concentration degree information of the viewer according to the image data; and the terminal equipment is also used for uploading theconcentration degree information to the central control platform through the server. Teaching and monitoring are simultaneously completed by one set of system so that the technical problem of singleequipment function in the related technology can be solved.

title: College computer basic knowledge problem solving method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a college computer basic knowledge problem solving method based on deep learning. An existing university computer basic knowledge graph and an NTN model are used for generatingan inference data set containing all basic knowledge points; then, a PCANET network and a GRU network are used for generating an incomplete knowledge graph corresponding to the problem; and then theapproximate sub-graph closest to the incomplete knowledge graph in the knowledge graph is matched by using a PSQUERY algorithm, inferring is performed to obtain a missing part in the incomplete knowledge graph by using a TransE method, and finally inferring is performed to obtain a part which is a correct result. And the manpower consumption is reduced, and the question solving efficiency is improved. The method is easy to implement, and answers can be generated in batches. According to the invention, the efficiency of students learning the class by themselves is improved, and the burden of teachers in teaching the class is reduced.

title: Sight tracking student classroom myopia prevention system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sight tracking student classroom myopia prevention system. The myopia prevention system for the student classroom comprises an identification part and a reminding part, wherein the identification part comprises a light source, distance image sensing equipment, a control module and a connecting module 1; the reminding part comprises a connecting module 2 and an alarm device. According to the invention, artificial intelligence is used to identify students and desks, the distance between sight focuses and eyes is calculated, a three-dimensional reconstruction method is used to determine the phenomena of head inclination, head lowering and the like of students in class, and a seat independent alarm method is provided, so that the teaching of teachers and the listeningand speaking of other students are not influenced.

title: Standard courseware generation system and method for artificial intelligence learning mode
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a standard courseware generation system and method for an artificial intelligence learning mode. According to the standard courseware generation system and method for the artificial intelligence learning mode, knowledge source data can be processed according to teaching course categories and teaching course schedules so that the knowledge source data is subjected to modularconversion to generate a plurality of teaching courseware modules which can be freely matched and combined; and finally, the plurality of teaching courseware modules are edited and combined accordingto actual requirements to finally obtain corresponding standard courseware, so that the education and teaching quality and efficiency are improved to the greatest extent, and standardization of education and teaching materials is realized.

title: Myopia prevention system for student classroom
abstract_text: The invention discloses a myopia prevention system for a student classroom. The system comprises an identification part and a prompt part. The myopia prevention system for the student classroom employs an artificial intelligence method to judge the phenomena of head inclination and head lowering of students in class, provides an independent alarm method, and does not affect the teaching of teachers and the listening and speaking of other students.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching translation system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching translation system. The system comprises a mobile terminal, a receiving terminal and a multimedia interaction terminal. The mobile terminal comprises a microphone and a portable translation machine. The portable translation machine comprises a cuboid-shaped translation machine shell, a mainboard is installed in the shell. The mainboard comprises a control unit, a voice input unit, a character input unit, a display unit, a wireless transmitting unit, a voice playing unit and a key selection unit. A display screen, control keys and a voice player are arranged on the translation machine shell, a WiFi device and a Bluetooth device are installed on the inner top face of the translation machine shell, a storagebattery is arranged on the right side of the main board, and the storage battery is electrically connected with the main board, the display screen, the voice player, the WiFi device and the Bluetoothdevice. The device is convenient to carry, can be independently used, can also be matched with multimedia equipment for use, and can realize multifunctional translation.

title: ROBOT SYSTEM AND ROBOT CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: A robot system (1) comprises a robot (10), an image acquisition unit (21), an image prediction unit (22), and a movement control unit (24). The image acquisition unit (21) acquires a current image, which is an image captured by a robot camera (31) disposed so as to move with an end effector (13). The image prediction unit (22) performs processing to predict a next image, which is the image that the robot camera (31) should capture next, on the basis of the current image and a teaching image model that is constructed by performing machine learning wherein a teaching image is the image that therobot camera (31) is expected to capture when an adjustment action is performed by a mobile unit (12). The movement control unit (24) calculates a command value for moving the mobile unit (12) so theimage captured by the robot camera (31) approximates the next image and controls the mobile unit (12) on the basis of the command value.

title: Artificial intelligence interaction experiment box
applicants: SHENZHEN LABPLUS SCIENCE AND EDUCATION CULTURE CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence interaction experiment box. The artificial intelligence interaction experiment box comprises a shell and a PCB, the PCB circuit board is detachably installed in the outer shell. A microphone array, a camera, a main control chip, an interaction key and a sensor are integrated on the PCB; and the microphone array, the camera, the interaction keyand the sensor are respectively connected with the main control chip. According to the technical scheme of the utility model, the hardware possibly required by the experiment is integrated onto the PCB circuit board. The shell can protect the PCB, early-stage debugging is not needed, hardware loss is avoided due to the hardware integration mode, teaching management and storage can be facilitated,learning can be conducted immediately when the box is opened, learning can be conducted immediately when the box is closed, and time is given to teaching activities.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching equipment
applicants: GUANGZHOU CAREER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the field of network teaching, in particular to artificial intelligence teaching equipment, which comprises a camera for capturing eyeballs, a control unit, a memory, a networking module, a display and a remote access terminal, the control unit is respectively connected with the camera, the memory, the networking module and the display; wherein the camera is used for sending eyeball capturing data to the control unit and storing the eyeball capturing data in the memory, the networking module is used for uploading the eyeball capturing data to the Internet, and theremote access terminal accesses the eyeball data in the memory through the Internet; the display is an electronic ink screen; the learning state of the child is automatically judged by capturing the time and posture of the eyeballs of the child staying on the screen and comparing the time and posture with the data in the memory, and the learning state is uploaded to the network, so that a remote access terminal can access the learning state conveniently, and parents and teachers can monitor the learning state of the child conveniently; and the eyes of children can be effectively protected by using the electronic ink screen.

title: Service person selecting device and machine learning method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a service personnel selection device and a machine learning method, which can easily select dispatched service personnel. A service person selecting device includes a storagethat stores a machine-learned model subjected to machine learning using teaching data in which service person selection information, which is at least one of error information of a printing device, estimated required time period information of service persons that is related to estimated required time periods up to times when the service persons perform a task of maintaining the printing device inwhich an error has occurred, skill information of the service persons, and held component information of the service persons, is associated with a service person dispatched to maintain the printing device in which the error has occurred, and a controller that acquires the service person selection information and uses the acquired service person selection information and the machine-learned modelto select a service person to be dispatched to maintain the printing device in which the error has occurred upon the occurrence of the error in the printing device.

title: Man-machine interactive Go game robot for automatic chess piece supplying and reset
applicants: WENZHOU KEPUHUI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a man-machine interactive Go game robot for automatic chess piece supplying and reset. The robot comprises a parallel mechanical arm and tail end grabbing assembly for grabbingchess pieces, an industrial camera for shooting a chessboard and recording game conditions in real time, the chessboard, a display screen for realizing man-machine interaction, a control core board for starting and setting, a chess piece box assembly for recovering and automatically supplying the chess pieces, an outlet for supplying the chess pieces and a shell. The robot has the following advantages and effects that a man-machine game is realized through an AI technology and mechanical equipment, and the mechanical device can perform automatic chess piece supplying and resetting, intelligence and automation degrees are high , operation is convenient, and the robot can be applied to teaching work and is convenient to popularize.

title: Method for realizing educational psychology analysis by extracting facial information of students based on image big data
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for realizing educational psychology analysis by extracting facial information of students based on image big data. Image features are obtained through a deep learningalgorithm, so that data analysis and recognition are realized, the accuracy of reading the facial expressions of students is improved, and teachers are helped to read the facial expressions of the students and obtain psychological changes of the students so as to give psychological guidance. The method comprises the following steps of preprocessing an image to obtain pure data information, extracting image features, analyzing image feature information from local information extraction, global information extraction to global texture image feature extraction, fusing the image information, carrying out deep learning on student expressions and situations, and obtaining emotion change conditions reflected by the images. Psychological teachers can actively learn and know changes of expressionsand situations of students, the teachers are helped to accurately and comprehensively master the overall situation of students in classes, and the improvement of classroom teaching quality is promoted.

title: Intelligent medical skill teaching monitoring system based on human body posture recognition
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent medical skill teaching monitoring system based on human body posture recognition. The system is composed of a video acquisition module, a video comparison module, a result statistics module, a result pushing module and a background server, wherein the video acquisition module is connected with the video comparison module, the video comparison module is connected with the result statistics module, the result statistics module is connected with the result pushing module, and the background server is connected with the video acquisition module, the video comparison module, the result statistics module and the result pushing module. The video acquisition module is composed of a plurality of high-definition cameras, and the high-definition cameras are installed on an experiment table operation site. According to the invention, teachers can conveniently carry out medical skill deep teaching based on artificial intelligence, students can conveniently carry out medical skill deep autonomous learning based on artificial intelligence, teachers and students can conveniently, objectively and timely obtain teaching feedback information, the teaching quality is improved, and the development of medical skills of students is promoted.

title: Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching experiment boxes. The utility model relates to a teaching experiment box, in particular to an internet-of-vehicles teaching experiment boxbased on artificial intelligence. An existing experiment box for Internet of Vehicles teaching is poor in heat dissipation function. The module cannot be effectively cooled; the problem that articlesare inconvenient to classify and store is solved. Proposed now is the following scheme, the device comprises a box body, a circuit board and a touch display screen, wherein a plurality of modules arearranged on the circuit board, a circuit board storage cavity is formed in the box body, the circuit board is fixedly arranged in the circuit board storage cavity, the touch display screen is rotationally installed at the top of the box body, a groove is formed in the top of the box body, a storage box is fixedly connected in the groove, and a plurality of classification plates are installed in the storage box in a sliding mode. According to the utility model, the circuit board and modules on the circuit board can be effectively cooled, articles can be conveniently classified and stored, the classification distance can be adjusted, and the storage rack can be suitable for placing articles with different sizes.

title: SERVICE PERSON SELECTING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
abstract_text: A service person selecting device includes a storage that stores a machine-learned model subjected to machine learning using teaching data in which service person selection information, which is at least one of error information of a printing device, estimated required time period information of service persons that is related to estimated required time periods up to times when the service persons perform a task of maintaining the printing device in which an error has occurred, skill information of the service persons, and held component information of the service persons, is associated with a service person dispatched to maintain the printing device in which the error has occurred, and a controller that acquires the service person selection information and uses the acquired service person selection information and the machine-learned model to select a service person to be dispatched to maintain the printing device in which the error has occurred upon the occurrence of the error in the printing device.

title: PERSONALIZED AND ADAPTIVE MATH LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A personalized and adaptive automated math learning system and method based on personal attributes, structured prediction, and reinforcement learning is disclosed. The personalization is achieved by data mining the personal attributes and creating competency clusters. The lesson plan and course is designed based on learners' competency levels to teach the subject matter in the shortest possible time. The adaptive automated machine learning method can change teaching methods and formats to become more interactive. After completion of the course, learners are expected to achieve expert competency.

title: Five-star golden law calligraphy grid
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a five-star golden law calligraphy grid, and relates to a new Chinese character writing method and a carrier for realizing the method, so that the five-star golden law calligraphy grid is suitable for writing of various books, basic strokes of Chinese characters can be found according to scientific rules, writing is more standard, and calligraphy practicing is more efficient. From the aspect of academic value, the traditional calligraphy practicing mode with extremely low reference rate of the traditional calligraphy grid is improved, and the calligraphy practicingproblem of primary and secondary school students and broad calligraphy enthusiasts is solved. From the aspect of teaching, the calligraphy teaching aid can be widely applied to industrial production and development and application of artificial intelligence calligraphy auxiliary tools according to evidences. Each cell comprises a rectangular frame, a short oblique line, a long oblique line, a vertical line and points, and is characterized in that the short oblique lines are connected to form a pentagram, the symmetry axis of the pentagram is the long oblique line and the vertical line and intersects at one point, e: f = 0.618, d: c = 0.649, b: a = 0.618, and the gold ratio is attached; the angle A, the angle B, the angle C, the angle D and the angle E are 48 degrees; wherein the cells arefive-star golden law calligraphy cells, and the five-star golden law calligraphy cell paper is formed by combining N cells.

title: Internet of Things suite teaching aid
applicants: GUIZHOU GUIFU HUARONG SCIENT TEACHING EQUIPMENTS CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an Internet of Things suite teaching aid, which comprises a microcomputer, a network control module, a base and a protection box, and is characterized in that the microcomputer comprises an education APP terminal, a wireless network card, a touch screen display and a radiator; the radiator is connected with the touch screen display and dissipates heat all the time after the microcomputer is started on the left side of the touch screen display; the network control module comprises an intelligent gateway, a cloud server and a wireless router, and the wireless routeris arranged on the left side of the microcomputer; a wireless router is embedded in the intelligent gateway, the intelligent gateway is in communication connection with the cloud server through the wireless router, and the cloud server is in wireless communication connection with the microcomputer through a wireless network card; an artificial intelligence voice module is arranged in the educationAPP terminal and is used for receiving data, displaying courseware and performing voice query; the microcomputer, the network control module and the base are all arranged in the protection box, and the protection box is made of tempered plastic. The utility model designs a microcomputer with the assistance of a teaching APP terminal and an artificial intelligence voice module, thereby facilitating the voice query of students and saving time.

title: Classroom behavior detection method based on improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom behavior detection method based on an improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions, and the method comprises the steps: arranging a camera in front of a desk, and detecting the classroom behaviors of students in real time; and recognizing facial information and upper body skeleton information through an artificial intelligence model, taking whether key points can be recognized or not and the distance between the key points as main judgment conditions, serving changes of micro-expressions as auxiliary judgment conditions, if a certain student does notmeet the condition for a period of time, judging that the examination behavior of the student is abnormal. Besides, through the video stream of one class, the possible stage of abnormal behaviors ofstudents is found out and analyzed, and innovation and reform of teaching are realized. Interference factors are reduced through machine vision recognition, equipment is simplified, and meanwhile theinvention further provides a corresponding data analyzing and processing system. According to the invention, the network model is further optimized through adoption of methods such as residual network, weight trimming and the like. According to the invention, self-service classroom behavior detection and feedback are realized, the test efficiency is high, and the accuracy can reach 95%.

title: Examination behavior detection method based on improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions
abstract_text: The invention discloses an examination behavior detection method based on an improved Openpose model and facial micro-expressions, and the method comprises the steps: arranging a camera in front of adesk, and detecting the examination behaviors of students in real time; recognizing facial information and upper body skeleton information through an artificial intelligence model, serving whether keypoints can be recognized or not and the distance between the key points as main judgment conditions, serving changes of micro-expressions as auxiliary judgment conditions, and if a certain student does not meet the condition for a period of time, judging that the examination behavior of the student is abnormal. Besides, through the video stream of one class, the possible stage of abnormal behaviors of students is found out and analyzed, and innovation and reform of teaching are realized. Interference factors are reduced by means of machine vision recognition, equipment is simplified, and a network model is further optimized by means of a residual network, weight trimming and the like. Compared with a traditional mode, self-service examination behavior detection and feedback are achieved,the test efficiency is high, the accuracy can reach 95%, and the method can be applied to general examination detection.

title: Big data and artificial intelligence teaching training environment and resource integration method based on solid state disk
applicants: GUANGZHOU TAIDI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a big data and artificial intelligence teaching training environment and resource integration method based on a solid state disk. Firstly, an operating system is installed in asolid state disk; an integrated main program running environment is deployed in the operating system; then, a big data and artificial intelligence teaching training software environment is built on anoperating system of the solid state disk through a virtual machine method or a container method, finally, a set of teaching training software environment and course resource integrated main program is developed, and the integrated main program is installed on the operating system in the solid state disk. According to the technical scheme provided by the invention, big data and artificial intelligence teaching training complex software environment and rich resources are integrated on a solid state disk system; a user can synchronously check course resources and an operation practical trainingenvironment through an integrated main program, and the problems that software environment configuration is tedious, complex and non-standardized, course resources and the software environment are separated, and the software environment is inconvenient to carry in big data and artificial intelligence teaching practical training are solved.

title: Student learning ability evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: YUANMENG SHARE EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student learning ability evaluation method based on artificial intelligenceinvention, andn specifically relates to the technical field of learning testing. A server for receiving and processing data is included, the output end of the server is connected with a knowledge point example learning module for students to learn current knowledge points, a question setting modulefor giving test questions corresponding to the knowledge points, an answering module for the students to answer questions corresponding to the test questions, and a comprehensive evaluation module for evaluating answering and time consumption of the students. The output end of the question setting module is connected with a test question switching module for automatically switching test questions. According to the invention, answer right and wrong judgment is carried out through the right and wrong judgment module, the answer timing module carries out answer time timing, the answer evaluationmodule carries out answer ability evaluation conveniently, the time consumption evaluation module carries out time consumption ability evaluation conveniently, the comprehensive evaluation module carries out evaluation on knowledge learning ability of students conveniently, the evaluation accuracy is high, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: This information processing device: acquires speech data and teaching vibration data produced on the basis of the speech data, the teaching vibration data being used for causing a vibration device to vibrate; executes machine learning using the speech data and the teaching vibration data as inputs; and generates learned model data used for converting a speech waveform to a vibration waveform.

title: Machine learning visualization
abstract_text: A unique user interface for improving machine learning algorithms is described herein. The user interface comprises an icon with multiple visual indicators displaying the machine learning confidence score. When a mouse hovers over the icon, a set of icons are displayed to accept the teaching user's input. In addition, the words that drove the machine learning confidence score are highlighted with formatting so that the teaching user can understand what drove the machine learning confidence score.

title: PRINTER, MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
abstract_text: A printer includes: a memory configured to store a machine-learned model obtained by machine learning using teaching data associating at least one of reflectance of a print medium, transmittance of the print medium, and image data obtained by capturing an image of a surface of the print medium with a type of the print medium; and a print controller configured to determine a type of a print medium using at least one of reflectance of the print medium, transmittance of the print medium, and image data obtained by capturing an image of a surface of the print medium and the machine-learned model.

title: Off-line voice recognition programming trolley control system
applicants: HEILONGJIANG JUXIN WISDOM TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an off-line voice recognition programming trolley control system, relates to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools, and aims to solve the problems that trolley type teaching auxiliary equipment has few integrated sensors and does not have off-line voice recognition and customized audio playing functions. The voice recognition module is arranged to recognize voice and convert the voice into electric signals in real time to be input into the circuit controller module, and the circuit controller module recognizes voice instructions to control the trolley to play MP3 tracks, drives the motor to drive the trolley to move, measures illumination intensity and the like. Infrared or wireless remote control over the trolley is achieved through the infrared signal receiving module or the wireless communication module, and therefore the trolley is controlled to play MP3 tracks, move and the like. And the lithiumbattery supplies power to the whole system. The robot is applied to the field of artificial intelligence education robot competitions in middle and primary schools.

title: Programmable trolley supporting artificial intelligence teaching experiment
applicants: WUXI SHENFAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of education equipment, and discloses a programmable trolley supporting an artificial intelligence teaching experiment. The programmable trolley comprisesa trolley body, a PLC is arranged at the top of the trolley body, a fixing block is installed at the bottom end of the side face of the PLC, limiting holes are formed in the surface of the fixing block, a groove is formed in the top of the trolley body, and a fixing rod is arranged in the groove. According to the programmable trolley supporting the artificial intelligence teaching experiment, as the limiting hole, a limiting bolt and the PLC are arranged, the advantages of being convenient to assemble and improving the independent creative function of students are achieved, the mounting rate is effectively improved, access can be carried out from a host or a tablet computer through HTTP/SSH/VNC, programs are written through Scratch, Python or Jupyter, the programmable trolley is suitable for courses such as voices, images and unmanned driving and supports artificial intelligence application and implementation of independent creativity of students, the programmable trolley is mainly used for students to learn artificial intelligence, a teaching experiment environment is arranged in the programmable trolley, and learning is facilitated.

title: Classroom code scanning teaching evaluation data validity analysis method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom code scanning teaching evaluation data validity analysis method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting classroom code scanning teaching evaluation data, and obtaining a teaching evaluation data set; preprocessing the teaching evaluation data set to obtain a marked teaching evaluation data set, and dividing the marked teaching evaluation data set into a training set, a verification set and a test set; training the deep neural network by using the training set to obtain a plurality of candidate deep neural network models; testingthe candidate deep neural network models by using the test set, and finally screening out the deep neural network model with the best effect. The invention innovatively provides a new thought of applying a deep learning algorithm to teaching evaluation data analysis, deep learning is applied to solving the problem of judging the effectiveness of teaching evaluation data for the first time, and deep features of attributes of teachers, courses and students related to the effectiveness of teaching evaluation data are learned by means of a deep neural network.

title: Non-inductive commenting system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: CHONGQING JUNMAO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching evaluation systems, and in particular, relates to a non-inductive commenting system based on artificial intelligence, wherein the system comprises a voice acquisition module for acquiring voice of a user, a voice recognition processing module and a voice command module; the voice recognition processing module is used for recognizing the voice acquired by the voice acquisition module, converting the voice into characters and recognizing comment elements; the identified comment elements are distinguished, the system is awakened when the comment elements are awakening commands, and a voice command of a user is sent to the voice command module; and the voice command module is used for receiving the voice command sent by the voice recognition processing module. The system completely meets the requirements of school education and teaching evaluation, has the advantages of simplicity, convenience, comprehensive evaluation, intelligent identification, powerful functions, high system response speed and quick deployment, and is suitable for various platforms such as computers, electronic whiteboards, intelligent phones and intelligentrobot systems.

title: Teaching auxiliary system based on AI analysis
applicants: SHANGHAI LINZHAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of auxiliary teaching, in particular to a teaching auxiliary system based on AI analysis. The system comprises an examination system and a background system. A terminal control system is arranged in the examination system, the terminal control system is electrically connected with a display screen and input equipment, an information processing module isarranged in the background system, the information processing module is electrically connected with a core scheduling system, and the core scheduling system is connected into an AI module, a questionbank/label bank and student archives/historical records. A modern technical means is utilized, traditional examination questions are electronized, labeled and digitized through analysis of AI data, and the advantages of big data analysis are utilized as much as possible to get rid of the problems of difficult fluctuation, examination point coverage deviation and the like of manual question setting. Meanwhile, targeted learning effect evaluation is generated according to different characteristics of each student, and results are stored and recorded for a long time, so that convenience is brought to tracking and targeted tutoring of teachers.

title: Artificial intelligence robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence robot. The device comprises a body, a voice receiving module, a micro-processing chip, a voice playing module and a word library module, whereina head part is arranged above the body; a loudspeaker is mounted below the front surface of the head part; a telescopic device is mounted in the head part; a fan is mounted at the output end of the telescopic device; a human-computer interaction interface is mounted in the middle of the front surface of the body; a microphone is mounted at one corner of the front surface of the body; the voice receiving module is mounted in a position, corresponding to the microphone, in the body; according to the utility model, English reading sounds of students can be recorded; according to the English pronunciation teaching aid, the English pronunciation teaching aid is provided with the telescopic fan, the fan can blow air, people feel comfortable, the fan can be lifted up when the English pronunciation teaching aid is used, the fan can be retracted into the head when the English pronunciation teaching aid is not used, and the English pronunciation teaching aid is high in functionality.

title: Autism intervention teaching course automatic tracking method and system
applicants: BEIJING FUMI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an autism intervention teaching course automatic tracking method and system. The method comprises steps of receiving archive information of an evaluation object to train archive information and teaching data of past evaluation objects through a machine learning algorithm; establishing a teaching plan model, inputting the archive information of the evaluation object into theteaching plan model obtained by training to obtain a teaching plan of the evaluation object, inputting teaching data into the teaching plan model after the evaluation object learns through the teaching plan, and proposing a teaching plan updating suggestion. According to the invention, courses conforming to the evaluation object can be selected according to the archive information of the evaluation object after being learned by the teaching plan model, and the teaching plan is correspondingly adjusted according to the teaching data in the subsequent teaching process, so that the teaching courses are more suitable for the evaluation object, the matching degree of a demand side and a supply side is improved, and the treatment effect is improved.

title: Human-computer interaction implementation method integrating artificial intelligence and Web3D
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of human-computer interaction, and discloses a human-computer interaction implementation method integrating artificial intelligence and Web3D, which realizes more intelligent, natural and harmonious interaction between human and machines and improves the interaction effect.
