The method comprises the following steps: a, collecting the action content set by a standard to make a data set; b, training a deep action recognition model by adopting the data set; c, applying the deep action recognition model to a server; d, constructing a three-dimensional world on the web side based on WebGL and Three.js frameworks, and establishing a scene required by an education course and a corresponding teaching model; e, enabling the web side to collect the interaction action of the user and transmit the interaction action to the server; f, enabling the server to perform action recognition based on the deep action recognition model, and feed back a recognitionresult to the web side; and g, enabling the web side to complete operation control on the scene and the corresponding teaching model according to the action recognition result.

title: Intelligent education platform based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHANGAO INFORMATION TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of wisdom education, and provides an intelligent education platform based on artificial intelligence. The platform is established by adopting a B/S three-layer architecture, and mainly comprises an information management system and a comprehensive education system, wherein the comprehensive education system is divided into a student terminal and a teacher terminal, and is presented on a corresponding platform home page through interaction, the teacher terminal comprises an online lesson preparation module, a homework management module and a behaviormanagement module, the behavior management module comprises an online attendance unit and a concentration degree recognition unit, the student terminal comprises an online homework module and an online learning module, and the student terminal and the teacher terminal are jointly provided with a forum communication module and a campus announcement module. The invention aims to provide the informationized intelligent education platform which improves the education management level, efficiently integrates teaching resources and improves the information application capability of teachers and students.

title: Crowd feature deep learning method
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of crowd feature testing. The invention particularly relates to a crowd feature deep learning method. The method comprises: establishing a multi-crowd feature classification database, and further comprises the following steps: 1) comparing the multi-crowd feature database with a database classification model to form twelve behavior types with six opposite dimensions, and constructing the multi-crowd feature classification database to judge crowd behavior trends; 2) comparing the effective identification behavior characteristics with a multi-crowd characteristic database, determining the crowd characteristic type of the target person, and updating the multi-crowd characteristic database; 3) according to different application scenarios of the user, optimizing the crowd feature database by applying a deep learning model to form a deep learning database adapted to the user; and 4) matching corresponding service modes according to different behavior characteristics of the crowd. Behavior characteristic data support is provided for social activities, thereby enabling various propaganda and marketing actions, job place selection and service mode matching in terms of human teaching.

title: Natural phenomenon teaching demonstration model
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching equipment, particularly relates to a natural phenomenon teaching demonstration model. The model includes a model body and a refrigerating device, a sanddust device, a tornado device, a water storage tank and a power system that are located in all cavities of the model body respectively. All the devices are operated through a microcomputer controller,some natural phenomena can be visually demonstrated, understanding of the natural phenomena and principles of the natural phenomena by pupils is facilitated, the acceptance degree is high, and deep learning of related knowledge points in the middle school stage is facilitated.

title: EXTERIOR APPEARANCE INSPECTION SYSTEM, CALCULATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND CALCULATION MODEL CONSTRUCTION PROGRAM
abstract_text: To provide a calculation model for performing efficient exterior appearance inspection utilizing artificial intelligence even when a user lacks knowledge or experience about artificial intelligence.SOLUTION: When constructing a calculation model to be used for exterior appearance inspection of a target object from a plurality of initial calculation models, one initial calculation model is selected, a set of image data obtained by imaging the target object from a plurality of directions is input to the selected initial calculation model to calculate an output value, and a weighting of each layer of the initial calculation model is sequentially changed and learned so that a difference between teaching data and the output value will be small. When the difference is not converged even after learning of the initial calculation model is repeated a prescribed number of times, a layer structure of the initial calculation model is sequentially changed to evolve the initial calculation model. When the difference is not converged to a prescribed threshold or less even after the evolved initial calculation model is learned, other initial calculation model is selected, and when the difference is converged to the threshold or less, the initial calculation model at the time is registered as a calculation model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, DISPLAY METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To provide an information processing device, a display method and a program for presenting information that enables what particulars affect the evaluation of a person to be grasped.SOLUTION: An information processing device (evaluation device 20) comprises: a learning model storage unit 220 for storing at least nonstandard data in text format and standard data in other than text format pertaining to a person; an evaluation information storage unit 232 for storing evaluation on a person; a learning processing unit 211 for creating a first prediction model by machine learning in which word data relating to a word included in the nonstandard data is input data and evaluation is teaching data, and creating a second prediction model by machine learning in which a calculated value calculated by applying the nonstandard data to the first prediction model and the standard data are input data; and a contribution degree output unit (important word output unit 213) for extracting the degree of contribution to evaluation per nonstandard data and standard data from the second prediction model and outputting the extracted degree of contribution.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 4

title: Campus intelligent service system based on AI +
applicants: SUZHOU BOYUTE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus intelligent service system based on AI +, and the system is characterized in that the system comprises an information and safety management subsystem, a teaching office subsystem, and a comprehensive analysis subsystem, and the information and safety management subsystem, the teaching office subsystem, and the comprehensive analysis subsystem are connected with thesame server; the information and safety management subsystem collects campus safety information and transmits the campus safety information to the server. The teaching office subsystem assists teachers in teaching, and the comprehensive analysis subsystem performs comprehensive analysis and evaluation on behaviors of students. And the campus is managed through the information and safety management subsystem, the teaching office subsystem and the comprehensive analysis subsystem, and multiple factors are comprehensively considered in the result, so that the judgment result of management decision, teaching evaluation and learning evaluation is more objective, and the influence of human factors is eliminated.

title: Video learning effect evaluation method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: DREAM SHARING EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video learning effect evaluation method based on artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the field of digital learning, and the method comprises the steps: comprehensive testing before learning, wrong question arrangement, video adjustment, information recording playing, in-class testing, judgment model building, score judgment, and single-person learning result model building. According to the invention, process records of all users are collected and include data such as online visual evaluation watching time and playback times, after-learning test difficulty question answering accuracy and answering time, and the like, and the data are used as training data sources after a new teaching video is online, whether the teaching video is appropriate or not is predicted through the collected user data by taking the ability result of the user after the test as the classification basis, so that whether the video has the effect of improving the learning effect or not is evaluated.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: An information processing device for acquiring a plurality of reference images obtained by imaging an object that is to be reproduced, acquiring a plurality of converted images obtained by enlarging or shrinking each of the plurality of reference images, executing machine learning using a plurality of images to be learned, as teaching data, that include the plurality of converted images, and generating pre-learned data that is used for generating a reproduction image that represents the appearance of the object.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD
abstract_text: An estimation unit provides an estimation result using a trained model generated by machine learning which is trained using training data that includes input data representing document data about documents read from a plurality of MFPs and teaching data representing collected setting data about each of the documents read from the plurality of MFPs. A setting unit transmits, for a particular document read by the MFP, an estimation request to the estimation apparatus along with document data about the document read by the MFP, and receives the estimation result, and sets an output setting of the document based on the received estimation result.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: This chip recognition learning system 10 is provided with: a game recording device 11 which records, as an image, a state of chips W stacked on a game table 4 by means of a camera 212; a chip determination device 12 which includes an artificial intelligence device 12a that analyzes the image of the recorded state of the chips W and determines the number and types of the chips W which are bet by a player C; and a teaching device 13 which teaches by inputting as teaching data, to the artificial intelligence device 12a, the image which is used for the determination by the chip determination device 12 and the number and types of chips W of a correct answer for an error, when it is determined that a determination result from the chip determination device 12 has the error.

title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLING POSITION OF ROBOT
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a robot position control apparatus and a method thereof. More specifically, in regard to a robot equipped with a camera and a working tool capable of performing work such as welding, cutting, assembly, pick & place and the like, if the camera is dislocated during operation or the displacement of a teaching point is caused by the position displacement of an object, a two-dimensional image of a work target material is obtained through the camera to be vision-processed or an artificial intelligence (AI) function is used to determine a teaching point reflecting displacement, a distance sensor is used to sense a distance to the corresponding teaching point, an end point of the working tool is accurately moved to the new corresponding teaching point and moved to maintain the sensed distance so as to correct the displacement. Therefore, there is no need for new calibration or new robot teaching with respect to the camera.

title: Text processing method and device based on machine learning, computer equipment and medium
applicants: PING AN INT SMART CITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a text processing method and device based on machine learning, computer equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining to-be-processed answer data, carrying out the preprocessing of the to-be-processed answer data, and obtaining standard answer data; inputting standard question information in the standard answer data into a preset answer classification model to obtain question types of the standard question information; inputting the standard material information, the standard question information and the corresponding question type into a presettarget machine reading understanding model for prediction, obtaining initial answer information, wherein the target machine reading understanding model is obtained through training by adopting a convolutional neural network-pre-training language model; determining final evaluation data from the plurality of pieces of evaluation data information according to the problem solving thought information,and recording the final evaluation data and the problem solving thought information as target answer information in a preset integration mode. The accuracy of answers obtained through machine readingis improved, and the effect of assisting in teaching/learning is achieved in the true sense.

title: Bone marrow cell morphology artificial intelligence simulation teaching system and method thereof
applicants: 2ND AF HOSP ARMY MEDICAL UNIV OF PLA
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of image recognition, and particularly relates to a bone marrow cell morphology artificial intelligence simulation teaching system and method. The system comprises a microscope, a CCD camera, a computer system, a memory, and a display. The computer system comprises a cell information unit, a cell identification unit and a cell information display unit;the cell identification unit comprises an image acquisition module, an image preprocessing module, an image segmentation module, a cell delineation module, a feature extraction module, a feature selection identification module, a classification identification module and an information extraction module. According to the invention, under a cell learning state, an artificial intelligence cell identification mode is started, under the conditions of clicking a target cell and carrying out learning guidance help seeking, the cell is clicked, the system prompts the name of the cell and reports real-time detection data like name, size, texture, shape, color and other features, the confusion of students is solved, the learning interest of students is greatly improved, and the teaching efficiency of cell morphology teaching can also be improved.

title: Picture book or teaching material visual identification method and device based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING GUANGNIAN WUXIAN SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a picture book or teaching material visual identification method based on artificial intelligence, wherein the method comprises the steps: 1, collecting a to-be-identified content image, and carrying out the image identification of inner page image data; 2, determining the type of the current to-be-identified content in combination with the clarity of the inside page image data, and entering a corresponding algorithm identification mode which comprises an optical character identification mode and an image feature identification mode; and step 3, in the corresponding algorithm identification mode, feeding back multi-modal identification result data to the user. According to the invention, different identification modes can be adopted for content identification according to different to-be-identified contents, so that the adaptive book range is wide; moreover, the finger-reading recognition process can be carried out through the finger-reading instruction of the user, so that the user can read conveniently, and the reading experience is further improved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ENSEMBLE VEHICLE CONTROL PREDICTION IN AUTONOMOUS DRIVING VEHICLES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementation of human- like vehicle control for an autonomous vehicle. Recorded human driving data are first received, which include vehicle state data, vehicle control data, and environment data. For each piece of recorded human driving data, a vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal is generated in accordance with a vehicle kinematic model based on a corresponding vehicle state and vehicle control data of the piece of recorded human driving data. A human-like vehicle control model is obtained, via machine learning, based on the recorded human driving data as well as the vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal generated based on vehicle kinematic model. Such derived human-like vehicle control model isto be used to generate a human-like vehicle control signal with respect to a target motion of an autonomous vehicle to achieve human-like vehicle control behavior.

title: Determining gas leak flow rate in a wellbore environment
abstract_text: An estimated gas leak flow rate can be determined using a teaching set of concentration profiles, a regression model implemented by a machine-learning subsystem, and a subset of attributes measured within an environment. The teaching set of concentration profiles can include gas flow rates associated with relevant attributes. The regression model can be transformed into a gas leak flow regression model via the machine-learning subsystem using the teaching set. The subset of attributes measured within the environment can be applied to the gas leak flow regression model to determine other attributes absent from the subset of attributes and an estimated gas flow rate for the environment. A gas leak attenuation action can be performed in response to the estimated gas flow rate.

title: Intelligent multimedia classroom based on network
applicants: ZHENGZHOU TETONG NETWORK ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent multimedia classroom based on a network. Multimedia classroom, a fixing frame is installed on one side of the interior of the multimedia classroom through bolts. A blackboard is mounted on one side of the fixing frame through bolts; a network display screen is mounted on one side of the fixed frame through a bolt; a teacher's desk is arranged in the multimedia classroom; a computer is mounted in the teacher's desk through bolts; a placing table is installed at the top of the teacher's desk through bolts, an AI control loudspeaker box is arranged on one side of the top of the placing table, two fixing plates are installed on one side of the interior of the multimedia classroom through bolts, projection cloth is wound between the two fixing plates through a rotating shaft, and a motor is installed on one side of one fixing plate through bolts. According to the utility model, a teacher can conveniently carry out voice control on electrical equipment in the multimedia classroom, so that the teaching quality is improved, the teaching efficiency of the teacher is improved, the teacher is prevented from walking back and forth to a computer to carry out operation, and the multimedia classroom is more intelligent.

title: Voice teaching device and system
abstract_text: The utility model provides a voice teaching device and a voice teaching system. The system comprises a microphone, a voice artificial intelligence chip, a micro-control unit and an enable switch, thevoice artificial intelligence chip is used for receiving a voice signal of a user through the microphone, extracting keywords from the voice signal through the voice artificial intelligence chip, sending a control instruction to a control target through the micro-control unit according to the keywords, and controlling the micro-control unit 13 to output the control instruction to the control target through the enable switch. According to the voice teaching device, a voice information input method is adopted to replace keys and a touch panel, and meanwhile, a loudspeaker is adopted as an information output method to replace a display screen and an indicator lamp, so that voice-based human-computer interaction is realized, the teaching operation difficulty is simplified, the teaching efficiency is improved, and the size and the cost of the teaching device are reduced to a certain extent.

title: Novel artificial intelligence projection device based on deep learning
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of projectors, and particularly relates to a novel artificial intelligence projection device based on deep learning, which comprises a base and an intelligent projector, a fixed plate is fixedly connected in the base, an electric push rod is fixedly connected to the central position of the fixed plate, and the electric push rod is electrically connected with an external power supply; when the projector is used for projection teaching. The matching plate is pulled upwards from the through groove; leaking through slots, at the moment, the placingframe is pushed upwards through an electric push rod; projection teaching can be started through the intelligent projector in the placing rack; after teaching is completed, the electric push rod is controlled to contract to enable the intelligent projector to enter the mounting table again; and then the matching plate is rotated into the through groove again, at the moment, the matching plate andthe operation table are located on the same plane, it is not affected that teachers normally place textbooks and write on the operation table, and according to the scheme, space occupation is reduced,and meanwhile the intelligent projector can be conveniently taken out, debugged and maintained.

title: Internet precision teaching tutoring management system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG CHUANGKE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an internet precision teaching tutoring management system based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the system comprises: a plurality of student terminals which are used for obtaining the learning videos of students for a preset course, and analyzing the learning bias of the students based on the learning videos; teacher terminals which are used for acquiring teaching videos of teachers and analyzing teaching characteristics of the teachers based on the teaching videos; and a server which is in communication connection with the teacher terminals and the studentterminals. According to the internet precision teaching tutoring management system based on big data and artificial intelligence, based on the learning preference of each student and the teaching characteristics of each teacher, the grades of students and teachers, and the areas of students and teachers, the student terminals and the teacher terminals are paired one by one, so that accurate teaching guidance is realized, and learning materials suitable for students can be selected from education big data according to knowledge graph screens of the students.

title: Teaching system and intelligent mirror adopting teaching system
applicants: SICHUAN ZIYOUJIAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching system and an intelligent mirror adopting the teaching system, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. When the teaching system is used for learning themotion action, a user does not need to wear hardware equipment, and learning is carried out by watching an image video played by the display module; meanwhile, the system captures limb information ofthe user through the camera module, the limb information is processed through the central control module, and then whether actions made by the user are standard or not and related suggestions are visually fed back through the display module. The user adjusts the action according to the information fed back by the system, so the standard degree and the professional degree of the sports action areimproved. The teaching system is installed in the mirror, the basic requirement of a user for the mirror can be guaranteed, when the camera module captures the action of the user, the user can conformto the mirror surface and adjust the action of the user according to the mirror surface, and the standard degree and the professional degree of the movement action of the user can be conveniently improved.

title: Virtual standard patient simulation system based on AI
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual standard patient simulation system based on AI. According to the invention, an inquiry question proposed by a user for a virtual standard patient is recognized and input into a standard model of a disease, and an answer corresponding to the inquiry question is obtained; in the process of simulation diagnosis, the operation time and operation steps of the user arerecorded, correlation calculation is conducted on the operation time, the operation steps and disease parameters; and when a disease parameter calculation result reaches a critical value, an emergencyevent caused by intervention is generated, changed disease parameters are input into the standard model of the disease, and the disease is allowed to enter a next pathological process. According to the invention, artificial intelligence and medical simulation teaching are organically combined; on one hand, voice inquiry can be realized, a clinical real inquiry environment is simulated, and the learning interest of students is increased; and on the other hand, the change of the disease course of the virtual patient is randomly simulated, so students learn to deal with emergencies occurring inthe diagnosis and treatment process, a clinical real situation is better simulated, and the clinical diagnosis and treatment ability of the students can be improved.

title: English online teaching device convenient for operation demonstration
abstract_text: The invention provides an English online teaching device convenient for operation demonstration. The device comprises a cabinet, two grooves are formed in the top of the cabinet; sliding blocks are arranged in the two grooves; the top of the sliding block is fixedly connected with the bottom end of first electric telescopic rods through a hinge, telescopic ends of the two first electric telescopicrods are fixedly connected with two sides of the bottom end of a placement panel; a plurality of keys are fixed in the middle of the top end of the cabinet; servo motors are fixedly mounted on the two sides of the cabinet correspondingly, the output ends of the two servo motors are arranged in the cabinet and are fixedly connected with the middle part of the rotating wheel; one side of the rotating wheel is arranged on the outer side of the cabinet; according to the scheme, by arranging an AI intelligent camera and the imaging projector, data information is projected to a teaching blackboard,teaching display is facilitated, the teaching quality is improved, key points needing to be learned in class can be displayed for a long time, and the English learning interest of children is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence adaptive interactive teaching system, and specifically relates to the field of electronic teaching. The system comprises a self-adaptive teaching device and a server. The output ends of the audio acquisition unit and the image acquisition unit are respectively coupled with a voice recognition module and an eye movement trajectory tracking unit; the output end of the voice recognition module and the output end of the eye movement trajectory tracking unit are in electric signal connection with a voice control module, an eye movement control module and an audio acquisition unit respectively, the output end of the image acquisition unit is electrically connected with an audio and video generation unit, and the output end of the audio and videogeneration unit is electrically connected with an instruction generation unit. According to the invention, interaction is carried out in a brand-new interaction mode; the novel eye movement control module and the voice control module are used for helping a user to pay more attention to learning, and the teaching institution effect is improved; compared with traditional keyboard and mouse control,voice control and eye movement instruction control are simpler, attention of students is not likely to be distracted, the teaching effect is improved, and the students are helped to learn.

title: Teaching device for education management
abstract_text: The utility model discloses and belongs to the technical field of teaching devices. The utility model relates to a teaching device for education management. The cabinet comprises a cabinet body, a display screen, a data box and a voice interaction box, supporting rods are arranged on the left side wall and the right side wall of the top of the cabinet body. External equipment can transmit teachingdata to the controller through the WIFI module. The information is transmitted to a display screen or a loudspeaker for playing through a controller; the device can receive teaching data transmittedby external equipment in real time; a user can shout a voice instruction; the voice recognition module is used for recognizing the voice instruction; the recognized voice instruction is transmitted tothe voice AI server through the controller and the Internet module; after the voice AI server receives the voice instruction, teaching materials are called from the database and are played through the display screen and the loudspeaker again, so that the device has the functions of voice control and voice information query, and the practicability is further improved.

title: Personalized driver training system
applicants: GUANGZHOU YINGZHUO ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a personalized driver training system by utilizing an Internet of Things sensor, an image processing technology and an artificial intelligence technology. Driver label, allocating teaching plans according to tags, in the training process, a sensor and an image processing module in an edge calculation module in the personalized driver training system capture positions ofhands, eyes and the like of a driver; unreasonable actions are reminded, guided and corrected; the cloud computing module is used for uploading the driver training record and the training track to thecloud to analyze a proper and efficient teaching plan and optimize the benchmark teaching plan; a driver can check training information and a coach of the driver from the student mobile phone terminal and check training records and examination scores of the driver from the coach mobile phone terminal, comments can be made to each time of training, and driver error statistics and the like can be checked. According to the utility model, the learning efficiency in driver training can be improved, the examination passing rate can be improved, and the teaching time can be shortened.

title: Industrial robot intelligent storing and taking cabinet for teaching
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an industrial robot intelligent access cabinet for teaching, which comprises an intelligent access cabinet, a PLC and an industrial robot, and is characterized in that thePLC is connected with the industrial robot through a Profinet bus; the industrial robot is provided with a mechanical arm, the tail end of the mechanical arm is provided with a clamp, the clamp is provided with an RFID controller, and the RFID controller is connected with a PLC through a Profinet bus. The intelligent access cabinet is provided with storage grids, and RFID electronic tags are installed in the storage grids. By means of the industrial robot intelligent storing and taking cabinet for teaching, practical training contents in the aspects of robot system integration, industrial field bus, PLC programming, artificial intelligence AI, RFID and the like are fused with theoretical teaching and practical teaching, students can comprehensively learn the intelligent manufacturing technology, and the complex engineering problem solving capacity of the students is improved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MACHINE-LEARNING
abstract_text: The invention relates to a system and a method for machine-learning. A processing system includes a receiving circuit 1 for receiving an input signal from an externally connected sensor, an expected signal generating circuit 4 for automatically generating a teaching signal for use in the learning circuit 5, a learning circuit 5 for calculating a weight value, a bias value, and the like of the neural network model to form an expected signal from the teaching signal generated by the expected signal generating circuit 4 and the signal from the receiving circuit 1, an inference circuit 2 for performing signal processing based on a learned model of the neural network model generated by the learning circuit 5, and a validity verification circuit 3' for performing similarity calculation between an output signal of the inference circuit 2 and an expected signal for comparison.

title: Chinese reading comprehension intelligent test and intelligent tutoring system and method
applicants: SHENZHEN MUSTARD SEED TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a Chinese reading comprehension intelligent test and intelligent tutoring system and method. The system is an application of emerging technologies such as the Internet and artificial intelligence in the field of Chinese reading comprehension teaching and evaluation. The system comprises an intelligent question selection subsystem based on a Chinese reading comprehension ability model, an automatic Chinese reading comprehension evaluation subsystem based on artificial intelligence, a personalized and hierarchical tutoring subsystem for Chinese reading comprehension, anda Chinese reading comprehension teaching auxiliary subsystem based on data mining. The system can intelligently select questions according to the reading ability of learners, and can automatically score and evaluate Chinese reading understanding questions, including subjective questions; and on the basis of accurately mastering the specific reading comprehension learning condition of each learner,targeted and individual intelligent tutoring is further implemented, so that individual teaching of Chinese reading comprehension is realized. In addition, the system can also provide assistance foroffline teaching through the generated data.

title: Higher vocational Chinese practical teaching device and usage method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a higher vocational Chinese practical teaching device and a usage method thereof. The device comprises a box body, a display screen and an AI chip, the display screen is embedded in the middle of the box body, the rear end of the display screen is connected with a shell through a clamping groove, a circuit board is connected into the shell through a bolt, a controller is welded to the middle of the circuit board, the AI chip is arranged on one side of the controller, and the AI chip is welded to the circuit board. Beneficial effects are that: the method is suitable forlarge-scale production; the device is novel in structure and convenient to operate, through arrangement of the display screen, the AI chip, the controller and the memory, intelligent interaction of the device can be provided, the device has a teaching simulation function, the teaching practice atmosphere of the device is improved, visitors can be better integrated into the teaching environment forpractice teaching, and the practice effect of the visitors is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence ultrasonic auxiliary system and application thereof
applicants: UNIV SICHUAN WEST CHINA 2ND UNIV HOSPITAL
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of ultrasonic medical images, and provides an artificial intelligence ultrasonic auxiliary system and application thereof. The system is mainly applied to an ultrasonic machine, an image system and telemedicine. The artificial intelligence ultrasonic auxiliary system comprises an image collection module. The system comprises an image transmission module, an imageframing module, an automatic classification module, an automatic film selection module, a teaching auxiliary module, a film reading prompt module and a quality control analysis module, realizes automatic classification of cases, automatically selects a standard section for negative cases, and provides functions of automatic film reading prompt, teaching assistance, quality control analysis and the like for suspected cases. After an ultrasonic auxiliary system based on artificial intelligence is implanted into an ultrasonic machine, an image information system and a remote medical system, doctors with low annual resources can quickly start, and the defect of basic medical resources is overcome.

title: DETERMINING GAS LEAK FLOW RATE IN A WELLBORE ENVIRONMENT
abstract_text: An estimated gas leak flow rate can be determined using a teaching set of concentration profiles, a regression model implemented by a machine-learning subsystem, and a subset of attributes measured within an environment. The teaching set of concentration profiles can include gas flow rates associated with relevant attributes. The regression model can be transformed into a gas leak flow regression model via the machine-learning subsystem using the teaching set. The subset of attributes measured within the environment can be applied to the gas leak flow regression model to determine other attributes absent from the subset of attributes and an estimated gas flow rate for the environment. A gas leak attenuation action can be performed in response to the estimated gas flow rate.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE AND VISUAL INSPECTION DEVICE
abstract_text: To improve inspection accuracy when visually inspecting an inspection object using a learning model.SOLUTION: A symmetrical part image is extracted from an image for learning that is obtained by imaging the same type of an object as an inspection object, and the symmetrical part image is halved in a symmetrical direction to generate divided images, the divided images being further inverted to generate inverted images. One of the divided images and an inverted image from the other of the divided images obtained by inversion are acquired as teaching data for one side of the symmetrical part of the inspection object. Also, the other of the divided images and an inverted image from the one of the divided images obtained by inversion are acquired as teaching data for the other side of the symmetrical part of the inspection object. Then, machine learning is executed on the basis of the acquired teaching data, and a learning model used for the visual inspection of the inspection object is generated thereby.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MACHINE-LEARNING
abstract_text: A processing system includes a receiving circuit 1 for receiving an input signal from an externally connected sensor, an expected signal generating circuit 4 for automatically generating a teaching signal for use in the learning circuit 5, a learning circuit 5 for calculating a weight value, a bias value, and the like of the neural network model to form an expected signal from the teaching signal generated by the expected signal generating circuit 4 and the signal from the receiving circuit 1, an inference circuit 2 for performing signal processing based on a learned model of the neural network model generated by the learning circuit 5, and a validity verification circuit 3′ for performing similarity calculation between an output signal of the inference circuit 2 and an expected signal for comparison.

title: Networked teaching data analysis method and system based on multiple modes
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of data processing, and discloses a networked teaching data analysis method and system based on multiple modes, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the feature screening through employing a maximum information coefficient MIC, and removing irrelevant factors; after MIC analysis is used for feature screening, screened features form a featurespace again, a random forest is used for regression, and a final evaluation model is obtained; a method of combining a learning analysis technology and a data mining algorithm is adopted; according to the method, learning ability data, physiological data and learning behavior data generated when students learn on a theoretical course online learning platform are integrated and analyzed, a theoretical online course learning effect evaluation model is established, the learning effect of the students is evaluated, and an evaluation result is output in the forms of graphs, numbers and the like byapplying a visualization technology. According to the invention, a machine learning technology is utilized to establish a multi-modal information fusion theoretical course evaluation system, and theoretical and technical method support is provided for an online course learning process.

title: MACHINE LEARNING METHOD AND MOBILE ROBOT
abstract_text: A neural network machine learning method include: a first arrangement step of arranging a stationary first obstacle and a moving second obstacle in a virtual space; a second arrangement step of arranging a current position and a destination of a mobile robot (100) in the virtual space; a movement step of making the second obstacle move in accordance with a predetermined condition; and a reception step of receiving, from a user, a designation of a moving path for the mobile robot (100) to go to the destination from the current position while avoiding the stationary first obstacle and the moving second obstacle, in which learning is performed using teaching data accumulated by repeatedly executing the above steps.

title: DEEP LEARNING BASED RF DIRECTION FINDER SUPPORT SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a RF direction finder support system which presents a method for direction finding and enabling the user to reach the target faster by means of teaching a system using a deep learning based software evaluation method of reflections from natural or artificial surface features.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching aid
applicants: CHANGZHOU STEM EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides an artificial intelligence teaching aid, which comprises an image acquisition module, an audio processing module, a storage module, an external control module, an external interface module, a power supply module and a main control chip, the audio processing module is used for processing audios; the storage module is used for storing the image acquired by the image acquisition module or the audio processed by the audio processing module; the external control module is used for burning a program; the external interface module is used for externally connecting other modules; the power supply module is used for providing electric energy for the image acquisition module, the audio processing module, the storage module, the external control module and the external interface module; wherein the main control chip is used for receiving or outputting a control command, and the image acquisition module, the audio processing module, the storage module, the external control module, the external interface module and the power supply module are connected with the main control chip, so that the blank of integrated artificial intelligence teaching aids on the market is filled, and the concept of artificial intelligence is easily understood by primary and secondary school students.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching quality evaluation system
applicants: SHANGHAI JIESHI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching quality evaluation system, which belongs to the field of teaching equipment and comprises a data acquisition module, edge computing intelligent hardware, a cloud computing platform and a user terminal. The data acquisition module is a camera; the edge computing intelligent hardware comprises an embedded processor and a neural computing rod which are electrically connected; the cloud computing platform comprises a database and a data processing module which are electrically connected; the user terminal is a smart phone or a personal computer; the embedded processor is electrically connected with the data acquisition module and the data database; and the embedded processor and the data processing module are electrically connected with the user terminal. The system is reasonable in design, can effectively improve the data processing speed, and achieves the real-time teaching quality evaluation.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with memory function
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a memory function. The device comprises a circuit board, a box body, a liquid crystal display screen and a protective shell, fixing shells are welded to the two sides of the bottom end in the box body, lead screws are rotatably arranged at the top ends of the fixing shells, a rotary disc is installed on the edgeof one side of a connecting rod, a handle is installed on one side of the rotary disc, and threaded cylinders are fixed to the outer sides of the lead screws. According to the utility model, the camera, the microphone, the video processing module and the audio processing module are installed, so that the terminal module has a memory function; the education content of the teacher is recorded through the camera and the microphone; according to the utility model, the video processing module and the audio processing module are used for processing, and the processed data is stored in the storage module, so that when a teacher gives a class next time, the last part of the content explained by the teacher in the last class can be directly positioned, and the teacher can know the teaching progressin time, thereby facilitating the better teaching work.

title: Sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of teaching equipment. The utility model relates to a lamp, in particular to a sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching. The problem that in the prior art, an artificial intelligence teaching product is not beneficial to teaching is solved. The utility model provides a sound control lamp for artificial intelligence teaching. The soundcontrol lamp comprises a lighting device, a supporting base, a first steering engine, a first supporting arm, a second steering engine, a second supporting arm, a sound control controller and a thirdsteering engine, and the sound control controller controls the first steering engine, the second steering engine and the third steering engine to act by receiving external sound signals and converting the external sound signals into corresponding control instructions. The control program of the sound control lamp can be written by students, the structure assembly can be autonomously completed bythe students, the enthusiasm of the students is aroused, the understanding of the students on artificial intelligence is strengthened and deepened, the combination of software and hardware is realized, the logical thinking ability and the operational ability of the students are fully exercised, and the teaching through lively activities is realized.

title: Education evaluation software implementation method based on big data and AI analysis
applicants: SHANDONG AICHENGSHI NETWORK INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention particularly relates to an education evaluation software implementation method based on big data and AI analysis. In the education evaluation software implementation method based on bigdata and AI analysis, big data analysis and data visualization technologies are adopted, the thought of front-end and rear-end separation and micro-service is combined; on the basis of interactive software, the mastering condition of students on knowledge points is objectively evaluated by means of behavior feedback information of the students in the tested process, so that teaching personnel areassisted to carry out targeted teaching on the students, and meanwhile, the academic development track of the students is effectively predicted by means of an AI analysis technology. By adopting the education evaluation software implementation method based on big data and AI analysis, efficient utilization of development resources is realized, the development process is low in coupling, the mastering condition of knowledge points by a tested user can be analyzed, teaching personnel can be assisted in teaching according to materials, teaching results can be objectively and efficiently evaluated, and the development track of students can be partially predicted by means of AI analysis.

title: Optical input playing system and artificial intelligence method for audio and optical communication
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of intelligent music education, optical communication and teaching, in particular to an optical input playing system and an artificial intelligence method for audioand optical communication. The system comprises an illumination password sending device which is a color-changing lamp, can emit light with different colors and light with different intensities and isin communication connection with an illumination generation control part; the illumination generation control part is in communication connection with a PLC programmable system; and the system also includes a light playing part, which can be in communication with the illumination password sending device. The light intensity, the light color and the illumination time of light contrasted by a lamplight headlamp or an optical coupling intelligent pad for lamplight playing correspond to syllables by utilizing a sound-light corresponding method; the light playing part can perform light analysis and decoding after obtaining the light emitted by the light password sending device, the decoded system is analyzed to correspond to syllables 'vertical coordinates N and horizontal coordinates N 'TN' of the central control part, the syllables are automatically output through a loudspeaker box, and the loudspeaker box is a peripheral; and the plurality of syllables are continuously and sequentiallyoutput to form the music.

title: Man-machine collaboration tool delivery system and method based on teaching learning
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and robot control, and particularly relates to a man-machine collaboration tool delivery system and method based on teaching learning. Theman-machine collaboration tool delivery system includes a mechanical arm, motion capture system positioning points and a PC upper computer. The mechanical arm is a multi-axis mechanical arm with a motion control function, the motion capture system positioning points are attached to a tool and hands of users, a motion capture system is used for obtaining the position of a positioning point, so asto obtain the position of the tool and the hands, and the PC upper computer and the mechanical arm can communicate in real time. The man-machine collaboration tool delivery system is built, based on tail end position data of the mechanical arm collected in the teaching process, the PC upper computer establishes a teaching data set, generates a trajectory probability model, and generates a new trajectory probability model for the change of wrist positions of the users, and the mechanical arm completes a tool delivery task together with people under a control instruction of the PC upper computerto meet the requirements of dynamic trajectory planning.

title: Children go chess teaching interconnection management system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a children go chess teaching interconnection management system, which comprises a student terminal, and is characterized in that the student terminal comprises a login module,an exercise practice module, an AI game module and a real-person chess playing module; the login module is used for account login, logout, registration and password modification; the exercise practicemodule is used for accessing an exercise database in the cloud server, and is used for realizing simulation practice, submitting answers and judging whether exercises are correct or wrong; the AI pair training module is used for being connected with an intelligent AI in the cloud server; the real-person chess playing module is used for matching and connecting other users; the student end furthercomprises an insertion module, and the insertion module is used for prompting the quality information of the user in the chess piece falling process of the AI playing module or the real-person chess playing module; children can practice exercises, practice AI, play chess by real persons and teach through lively activities through the student terminals, can learn by themselves on the student terminals, and can be guided to be more attention by inserting different information prompts in the chess playing process, so that the ideas of strong, weak, wrong and big are transmitted to the children ina relaxed mode.

title: AI intelligent online playing system
abstract_text: The utility model provides an AI intelligent online playing system. The AI intelligent online playing system comprises a cloud server; a playing device, wherein the playing device is connected with the cloud server; and a control device, wherein the control device is connected with the cloud server. The AI intelligent on-line playing system provided by the utility model has the advantages that theuse is convenient, the operation is simple, and the most suitable audio course can be intelligently selected and pushed to users according to different users, thereby achieving the purpose of teaching by people.

title: FRACTURE SURFACE ANALYZER, LEARNED MODEL GENERATING DEVICE, FRACTURE SURFACE ANALYSIS METHOD, FRACTURE SURFACE ANALYZER PROGRAM AND LEARNED MODEL
abstract_text: To facilitate identification of a possible fracture cause of a resin molding body from a fracture surface image of the resin molding body.SOLUTION: A fracture surface analyzer 1 includes an acquisition section 11 for acquiring a target fracture surface image formed by imaging a fracture surface of a resin molding body to be analyzed and an analyzing section 13 for identifying a possible fracture cause of the resin molding body by inputting the target fracture surface image into a learned model generated by machine learning using a fracture surface image and a label of a possible fracture cause as teaching data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Remote training video generation method and device, equipment and storage medium
applicants: PING AN LIFE INSURANCE CO CHINA LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The invention discloses a method for generating a remote training video. A teaching video of a teacher and a training participation video of students are collected in real time, the video segmentation is performed based on an image segmentation model, an independent picture is extracted, element content and position information of the element content in an original picture are extracted from the picture, a picture frame of a synthesized video is constructed according to the position information, and a video stream is synthesized into a new training video based on the picture frame so as to obtain an AI lecture hall video. The invention further provides a remote training video generation device, training equipment anda computer-readable storage medium. According to the invention, both parties can observe the teaching and listening states in real time, the interactivity is improved, and the training content can bequickly and accurately transmitted.

title: Man-machine intelligent connection personalized precision self-adaptive interactive teaching system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a man-machine intelligent connection personalized precision self-adaptive interactive teaching system, and belongs to the technical field of big data, artificial intelligence and intelligent connection. Concise and efficient learning content and method guidance precisely matching with learning demands can be pushed to students; study conditions and targeted teaching suggestions of students are pushed to teachers, and the teachers perform personalized precise guidance according to difficulties and deficiencies of the students. The difficult problem to be solved urgentlyin teaching is pushed to experts, so that the experts can take effective teaching strategy measures in time review; a learning condition data report based on big data, artificial intelligence and theintelligent networking technology is pushed for supervisors and leaders, the supervisors and leaders can master the teaching condition of the jurisdiction in real time, decisions are made in a targeted mode, and healthy and sustainable development of jurisdiction education is guaranteed; student academic conditions can be pushed to schools, team owners and guardians according to agreements, cooperation of students, teachers, experts, supervisors, schools, leaders, monitoring and intelligent equipment is achieved, the talent cultivation speed is increased, and the talent cultivation quality isimproved.

title: Multimedia teaching plan making method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching, and discloses a multimedia teaching plan making method and system based on artificial intelligence, and the generated teaching plan meets the requirements of a teaching outline, and meets the learning demands of a specific teaching group. The method comprises the steps: importing target teaching resources, and selecting corresponding teaching stagesand teaching groups; analyzing the target teaching resources to determine keywords of the target teaching resources, and determining general knowledge points, key knowledge points and difficult knowledge points of the target teaching resources according to teaching stages and teaching groups; matching a multimedia resource with the strongest correlation with the target teaching resource from a multimedia resource library according to the keyword to serve as a pre-class preview part; according to the general knowledge points, matching corresponding analysis content from a knowledge point analysis resource library to serve as an in-class explanation part, and matching explanation examples from a test question resource library for each key knowledge point and each difficult knowledge point; and extracting exercises from the test question resource library as an after-class practice part according to the general knowledge points, the key knowledge points and the difficult knowledge points based on a preset test paper template.

title: Robot demonstration programming method based on fingertip identification and hand motion tracking
abstract_text: The invention discloses a robot demonstration programming method based on fingertip identification and hand motion tracking, and relates to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the steps of 1: completing hardware environment building of a demonstration programming system, and completing a teaching task through hand demonstration, 2: identifying the position and the postureof a human hand in a teaching process through machine vision, calculating a teaching movement track of the human hand in a robot coordinate system through coordinate transformation, and smoothing a teaching path by using a particle filtering algorithm; 3: identifying human gestures through machine vision, planning different actions according to the gestures or indicating the end and the start ofa demonstration process; and 4: finishing the teaching task by the robot in the same posture through repeatedly utilizing the teaching path and human gestures obtained by visual identification. The simple and efficient method is provided for teaching of the industrial robot, the use threshold of the industrial robot is lowered, and the programming efficiency is greatly improved.

title: Intelligent scoring system and method for convex lens imaging principle experiment
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent scoring system and method for a convex lens imaging principle experiment. The system comprises a physical test table, the physical test table comprises supporting columns, a test table plate and a test table top. The test table plate is mounted on the supporting columns; the test table top is arranged over the rear end of the test table plate; a deep learningserver, a physical convex lens experimental instrument and a network camera are arranged on the physical test table; the deep learning server is connected with the network camera and an operation terminal in the same local area network. The invention belongs to the technical field of education middle school experiment teaching and examination. A trained deep learning model is used; according to the unmanned intelligent scoring system for the physical convex lens imaging principle experiment, a deep learning neural network model and a camera calibration technology are utilized, and an experiment algorithm formulated according to examination operation specifications specified by the Ministry of Education is matched, so that unmanned intelligent scoring of the physical convex lens experimentis realized.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine
applicants: XIAN GUOSHUN MECH AND ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of intelligent teaching. The utility model further discloses an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine. Protective cabinet, wherein two wheels are fixedly mounted on each of the left side and the right side of the bottom of the protection cabinet, a protection cavity is formed in the protection cabinet, electric push rods are fixedly mounted on the left side and the right side of the bottom of the protection cavity, the tops of the two electric push rods are fixedly connected with an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine, and a top cover is rotatably connected to the rear side of the top of the protection cabinet. Artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine, the problems that an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine on the current market generally has a large display screen; protective device, the problems that an artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine breaks down or is damaged due to the fact that students play and collide with a displayer before teaching, losses are brought to a user, meanwhile, the teaching progress can be delayed, a screen can be contaminated by a large amount of dust and fingerprints after the artificial intelligence teaching all-in-one machine is used, and the next using and watching experience is poor are solved.

title: DRUG IDENTIFICATION DEVICE, DRUG IDENTIFICATION METHOD, AND DRUG IDENTIFICATION PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are a drug identification device, a drug identification method, and a drug identification program with which the amount of teaching data can be significantly reduced when identifying a drug by machine learning. The drug identification device is equipped with: an image acquisition unit for acquiring a plurality of images of a drug for which the illumination direction of light illuminating a surface of the drug differs; an image processing unit for generating drug images (27A, 27B) for which an enhancement process, in which markings applied to the drug are enhanced on the basis of the plurality of images, has been carried out on drug images (25A, 25B); a feature amount calculation unit for calculating a feature amount of the drug images (27A, 27B); and a deduction unit (40) for deducing, on the basis of the feature amounts of the drug images (27A, 27B), which registered drug a drug is closest to.

title: Intelligent education robot system and control method
abstract_text: According to an example embodiment of the invention, provided are an intelligent education robot system and a control method. The system comprises a robot body and a controller, wherein the controlleris provided with a robot operating system, a map and navigation module, a voice library, a face recognition system, an expression posture feature library, a course resource library, an intelligent question answering system, a machine learning and expert system, a teaching mode library and a student feature library; the robot operating system is used for scheduling and executing teaching tasks; the course resource library comprises multimedia courseware, an exercise library and a voice library, is developed by a teacher before a course starts, and is input into a robot memory; the intelligentquestion answering system is used for communicating with students in the robot teaching process and answering various questions raised by the students; the machine learning and expert system is used for continuous learning, experience accumulation and teaching strategy adjustment decision of a robot in the teaching process. Therefore, a complex teaching function can be realized, and map positioning and navigation can be realized.

title: Robot, face recognition teaching method thereof and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a robot, a face recognition teaching method thereof and a storage medium. The embodiment of the invention provides a face recognition teaching method applied to a robot, the method including the steps of inputting a plurality of face images of a user as a training data set; loading a training model set by the user as a pre-training model; then carrying out transfer learning training on the training data set based on the pre-training model; obtaining a trained model, and displaying a training result of the trained model, importing the pre-trained model into a test data set; and performing validity test on the trained model through a preset classification algorithm, obtaining a face recognition resultof the trained model and displaying the face recognition result of the trained model. The robot can continuously interact with the user in the process of training the face recognition function of therobot, so that a good teaching demonstration effect of a machine learning algorithm can be achieved, and the user experience is improved.

title: Innovation ability evaluation system for artificial intelligence education
abstract_text: The invention discloses an innovation ability evaluation system for artificial intelligence education. The system comprises a test question data storage module, a teacher and student teaching terminalmodule and an innovation ability score storage module. The teacher and student teaching terminal module is connected with a service robot module. The test question data storage module is connected with the service robot module; the service robot module is connected with a subject basic knowledge evaluation system, an interdisciplinary knowledge application evaluation system, a scientific method capability evaluation system and a logical thinking capability evaluation system. The subject basic knowledge evaluation system, the interdisciplinary knowledge application evaluation system, the scientific method capability evaluation system and the logical thinking capability evaluation system are connected with the score recording system. According to the invention, students can visually understand their own advantages and weakness, teachers can conveniently carry out special training for the characteristics of each student, and students can carry out testing, training and learning at any time, so that great convenience is brought to teaching.

title: Personalized exercises recommendation method and system, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The application discloses a personalized exercises recommendation method and system, computer equipment and a storage medium. The personalized exercises recommendation method comprises the steps: determining a student set with the same development level to which a user belongs for a predetermined knowledge point cluster; predicting a predicted score rate of each test question by the user accordingto an actual score rate of each test question under a knowledge point cluster by other students in the student set; calculating the difference between the actual score rate and the predicted score rate of each test question by the user; carrying out priority ranking on the test questions according to the difference values under the condition that the higher the actual score rate is, the higher the priority of the test questions is; and carrying out exercises recommendation according to the test questions sorted according to the priorities. The big data and artificial intelligence technology is used, the mastering condition of the students for various test questions under the current knowledge point cluster is judged according to the difference between the students and the crowd of the same level, and then the practice content is recommended in a targeted mode, so that teaching according to materials is truly achieved, and the students are effectively helped improve the learning efficiency.

title: AI-based sand table simulation teaching system and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI-based sand table simulation teaching system and a use method thereof. The system comprises a simulation sand table; the simulation sand table comprises a display module,a voice input and control module, a light control module, an information integration module, a cloud processing module and an Internet of Things system; the Internet of Things system is connected withthe cloud processing module through a network; the cloud processing module is connected with the information integration module through a network; the information integration module is electrically connected with the voice input and control module and the light control module; the information integration module is also connected with a power supply; and the information integration module is alsoelectrically connected with the display module. Thus, the problem that traditional engineering management school student practical training is out of practice can be effectively solved, and the systemis low in price and easy to popularize.

title: Programmable voice intelligent teaching aid
applicants: ZHEJIANG COOGER MAKER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a programmable voice intelligent teaching aid which comprises a WiFi module, a voice recording and playing module, a server, an external flash module and a main controller; theWiFi module is in communication with the server through a TCP; the WiFi module is communicated with the voice recording and playing module through i2s; the WiFi module is communicated with the external flash module through an SPI; and the WiFi module is communicated with the main controller through a UART. The programmable voice intelligent teaching aid has the beneficial effect that the programmable voice intelligent teaching aid in the field of artificial intelligence voice is provided.

title: Internet precision teaching tutoring management system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet precision teaching tutoring management system based on big data and artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to the technical field of education management. The internet precision teaching tutoring management system comprises a server; the connection end of the server is connected with a login module, and the connection end of the login module is connected with an education system and a management system. According to the internet precision teaching tutoring management system, the education system is adopted; the education system comprises a coursemodule, a teacher module, a classroom module, an examination module and a homework module. A user can inquire the teaching course arrangement of a school through the course module; video data of a public class performed by a teacher can be watched by using the classroom module, so that the user can know the teaching ability of teachers in the school, and parents of the students can know the data of the teachers in the school more visually by watching the teacher module; compared with the prior art, the advantages are that the management of the school is more transparent, and the parents of thestudents can know the school more visually.

title: Teaching behavior analysis system and analysis method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of teaching behavior analysis, and discloses a teaching behavior analysis system and analysis method based on artificial intelligence, which are used for realizing data operation and processing and controlling a main control module of each module to work normally through a main control computer. The teaching video acquisition module is connected with the main control module and is used for acquiring teaching video data through camera shooting; and the teaching behavior identification module is connected with the main control module and is used for identifying the teaching behavior of the teaching video through an identification program. The classroom teaching behavior cloud model is constructed by taking the speech and the activity behavior of the behavior subject as basic units through the teaching interaction analysis module, the cloud model quantitative analysis method for the classroom teaching interaction behavior is provided, and a foundation is laid for finely describing teaching interaction behavior characteristics; meanwhile, evaluation difference caused by personal evaluation is avoided through the teaching quality evaluation module, so that evaluation of the teaching design quality has more basis and credibility.

title: Data analysis and data pushing method based on knowledge graph
abstract_text: The invention provides a data analysis and data pushing method based on a knowledge graph. The method comprises the following steps of introducing a knowledge graph entity label technology, and makinglearning preference or learning mastery degree analysis on learning behavior information and learning feedback information of a user, so that personalized pushing of teaching material information isperformed according to an analysis result, and the purpose of a better pushing effect is achieved. Meanwhile, the entity label information is used as an API trigger point. Learning behavior information and learning feedback information of the user and entity label information corresponding to the learning behavior information are acquired by identifying API content triggered by the user in an application program scene. More complete user behavior data can be collected in a complex environment, so that large-scale complete annotation data is obtained, the method is easily combined with a deep learning algorithm, entity label information can be vectorized on the basis of a knowledge graph, and the algorithm is more accurate.

title: VR teacher assisted multi-person cooperative training assessment system
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a VR teacher assisted multi-person cooperative training assessment system. Through the system, teachers can timely interfere with or stop students who have misoperation in VR simulation training, correct operation steps are demonstrated and explained in time through a line switching module, demonstration in a VR world is truly achieved, students can find problems at the first time and get a slightly correct operation mode at the first time, and the effect of simulation training is improved. Meanwhile, the system can achieve the intelligent scoring of the students through an AI teaching and examination system at the cloud end, and provides targeted training and examination projects according to the scores of the daily operation of the students and the insufficient training. In addition, the system breaks through the traditional VR single-person simulation training, and realizes multi-person interactive simulation training in a VR world in the true sense, and the system is wide in application range and can be applied to various training and assessment systems.

title: EXCAVATOR AND EXCAVATOR ASSISTING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A technique that can improve the accuracy of determining an object around a shovel under various environmental conditions, based on environmental information around the shovel, is provided. A shovel 100 according to one embodiment of the present invention includes an image capturing device 70 configured to obtain a captured image as environmental information around the shovel 100 and a determining unit 344 configured to perform determination related to an object around the shovel 100 based on the captured image obtained by the image capturing device 70, using a learned model LM on which machine learning has been performed. The learned model ML is updated to an additionally learned model on which additional learning has been performed based on teaching information generated from the captured image of surroundings, obtained by at least one of the shovel 100 or another shovel.
