The determining unit 344 performs the determination based on the captured image obtained by the image capturing device 70, in a case where the learned model has been updated, by using the updated learned model.

title: Portable comprehensive intelligent interactive fitness system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a portable comprehensive intelligent interactive fitness system which is characterized by comprising portable comprehensive intelligent fitness equipment, at least one mobile terminal and external audio and video equipment, the portable comprehensive intelligent fitness equipment comprises a complete assembly, a data acquisition sensing module and a wireless communication module, the data acquisition sensing module and the wireless communication module are arranged in the complete assembly, and the complete assembly is used for mutually matching and simulating various fitness equipment and is matched with a mobile terminal and external audio and video equipment to construct various immersive fitness scenes for a user. The device is convenient to carry; various fitness modes can be realized through combination and matching of the external members; according to the system, the user can know exercise data during exercise in real time, meanwhile, teaching videoscan be played for audio interaction fitness during fitness, the fitness action of the user can be corrected through the AI algorithm correction module, the fitness mode and the Internet of Things technology are combined, the user is actively guided to conduct more professional and more efficient fitness training, and scientific fitness is achieved.

title: Keyboard and electronic equipment
abstract_text: The utility model provides a keyboard and electronic equipment. the keyboard consists of a physical keyboard, a touch screen virtual keyboard and a handwriting pen, mathematization special symbols aremapped on the touch screen virtual keyboard. A special symbol table is clicked in a touch mode instead of a mouse, a touch screen is matched with a handwriting pen and handwriting recognition software to complete mathematical formula handwriting input, efficient operation digitization is achieved in combination with microphone array and voice interaction, and a basic interaction solution is provided for AI self-adaptive teaching.

title: Artificial intelligence image acquisition equipment for teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence image acquisition device for teaching. Characterized in that it is characterized in that it comprises, the device comprises an object placing table, a collecting device and a supporting pipe, the collecting device is arranged above the object placing table through a supporting rod. Wherein the acquisition device comprises a class and a bottomshell; wherein a main control board is arranged in the acquisition device, a button is connected to the main control board, a camera and an LED light supplementing lamp are arranged below the main control board, an LED lamp is arranged at the front part of the acquisition device, the LED lamp is electrically connected with the main control board, a loudspeaker is also arranged in the acquisition device, and the loudspeaker is electrically connected with the main control board. Compared with the prior art, the whole equipment is lamp-shaped, small in size and convenient to use and transport. The camera device of the utility model can shoot various articles daily used by children, and is small and convenient. The object placing table is suitable for placing various books, and the design of the erasing board is convenient for children to directly shoot and upload pictures after erasing the pictures.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, DATA PROCESSING SYSTEM, PRINTING SYSTEM, MACHINE LEARNING METHOD, AND DATA PROCESSING METHOD
abstract_text: A machine learning device includes a state variable acquiring section, a teaching data acquiring section, and a learned model generating section. The state variable acquiring section acquires, as state variables: feature information that is information regarding a feature of an actual printed matter on which printing has been actually performed by an image forming apparatus; medium information that is information regarding a print medium used in the actual printed matter; and first control information that is information regarding control performed when the actual printed matter has been outputted. The teaching data acquiring section acquires, as teaching data, second control information that is information regarding control that causes the feature information to fall within a predetermined threshold. The learned model generating section generates a learned model by performing machine learning on the basis of the pieces of information acquired by the state variable acquiring section and the teaching data.

title: Artificial intelligence control teaching system and use method thereof
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence control teaching system comprises a server, an application module, a storage module and N mobile terminals. The application module and the storage module are respectively connected with the server, the storage module is connected with the application module through data communication, and the mobile terminals are connected with the server through the Internet. The serversends an instruction to the mobile terminals through the application module, performs data acquisition, compares the data with the data on the inner side of the storage end and makes a judgment; theapplication module is used for face recognition, attendance checking, in-class analysis, teaching interaction, login and automatic channel matching. The use method of the teaching system comprises theuse methods of an attendance unit, a verification unit, a detection unit, a course channel matching unit, an in-class state analysis unit, a teaching interaction unit, a course recording unit and a monitoring unit. By using the teaching system, students can be subjected to intelligent attendance checking and in-class state analysis, so that the integrity of teaching process data is ensured, the students can learn repeatedly, and the teaching effect is improved.

title: Video editing system for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a video editing system for artificial intelligence teaching. According to the video editing system, different editing processes in a video editing process are completed in sequence by setting an editing source material determination module, a source material content learning determination module, a video editing mode determination module and a video editing execution module;each functional module in the video editing system can complete the determination and intelligent screening of editing source materials and the editing and synthesis of the source materials accordingto a preset working mode, and finally obtains a needed teaching video, thereby improving the interactivity and diversity of artificial intelligence teaching.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, PARTICLE SORTING SYSTEM, PROGRAM, AND PARTICLE SORTING METHOD
abstract_text: [Solving Means] The information processing apparatus according to an aspect of the present technology includes: an analysis unit; a learning unit; and a discrimination unit. The analysis unit calculates fluorophore information indicating respective amounts of luminescence of a plurality of types of fluorophores on the basis of detection data indicating amounts of luminescence of fluorescence at respective wavelength bands, the fluorescence having been emitted from a particle irradiated with excitation light, discriminates whether or not to treat the particle as a process target in accordance with the fluorophore information, and generates teaching data by associating a result of the discrimination with the detection data. The learning unit applies a machine learning algorithm to the teaching data, learns a characteristic of the detection data discriminated as the process target, and generates dictionary data including a result of the learning. The discrimination unit discriminates whether or not the particle whose detection data has been acquired is the process target on the basis of the dictionary data when the detection data is supplied.

title: Embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform
applicants: JIANGSU XUELI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform. The device comprises a core board, a carrier board and an expansion board, the beneficial effects of the utility model are that: the utility model discloses reach is: the beneficial effect is: The embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform carrier plate and the expansion plate are fixed on a transparentacrylic plate through buckles and then are fixed through an aluminum profile support, so that the embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform is placed perpendicular to a table top, and the core plate, the carrier plate and the expansion plate of the embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform are electrically connected through corresponding connectors. In this way, related experiments can be completed on the fixing support, and parts of components can be taken down through the buckles to be freely combined to carry out the related experiments. Therefore, the components of the experiment platform can be organically combined to form a complete set of artificial intelligence teaching system instead of traditional single independent single-item equipment. On the other hand,the embedded artificial intelligence experiment platform provides rich teaching resources.

title: Machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence. The device comprises an operation table, a threaded rod is rotationally installed on the surface of the operation table, a limiting block is welded to the upper end of the threaded rod, a first fluted disc is arranged on the surface of the threaded rod, a first motor is installed on the inner side of the operation table, a second fluted disc is installed on a rotating shaft of the first motor, and the surface of the second fluted disc is in engaged connection with the first fluted disc.The utility model discloses a machine vision experiment teaching platform based on artificial intelligence. ADJUSTING HIGH SPEED CAMERA TIME, the second motor drives the mounting shaft to rotate in alinkage manner; in the rotating process of the mounting shaft, the third fluted disc is engaged with the rack port to drive the mounting frame to move along the horizontal rod to adjust the horizontalposition of the high-speed camera; the threaded rod is driven to rotate through linkage of the first motor, and the horizontal rod is slidably mounted on the inner side of the limiting rod, so that the horizontal rod is driven to move up and down along the limiting rod in the rotating process of the threaded rod to adjust the vertical height of the high-speed camera.

title: Classroom behavior identification method and device
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of classroom behavior identification, and particularly relates to a classroom behavior identification method and device. The method comprises the followingsteps: encoding according to different classroom behaviors to form an encoding table; collecting classroom behaviors, labeling the classroom behaviors according to the coding table to form multi-modal training data, and performing feature extraction and feature splitting on the training data; optimizing and compressing the extracted and split features, and based on a deep learning technology, performing training by using multi-modal training data to obtain a classroom teaching behavior identification model; automatically identifying and digitalizing classroom teaching behaviors by using the identification model, giving a multilayer identification result of the neural network, and performing integrating by using an integrated optimization algorithm to achieve acquisition of classroom teaching behavior data; through data acquisition of a large number of courses, obtaining classroom teaching behaviors and an interactive norm system, constructing a system automatic comparison norm, and generating a monitoring result. According to the method, the teaching data can be efficiently and accurately acquired and monitored.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching sensor fixing structure
applicants: GUANGZHOU F R O ELECTRONIC TECH INC LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching sensor fixing structure. The device comprises a sensor assembly and an experiment node assembly which are assembled together, and is characterized in that two sides of the sensor assembly are respectively provided with a base, each base is provided with a first magnet and a positioning boss, the experiment node assembly is internallyprovided with a positioning hole matched with the positioning boss, and the positioning hole is internally provided with a second magnet; one S pole of each of the two first magnets faces downwards, and the other S pole of each of the two first magnets faces upwards; and one S pole of each of the two second magnets faces downwards, and the other S pole of each of the two second magnets faces upwards. According to the utility model, the positioning bosses on the two sides of the sensor assembly are matched with the positioning holes in the experiment node assembly; and meanwhile, the principlethat the same poles of the first magnet and the second magnet repel each other and the opposite poles attract each other is utilized to achieve fixation and reverse assembly prevention of the sensor assembly, the design is reasonable, the structure is simple, reliable and durable, and rapid assembly and disassembly can be achieved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experiment node structure capable of being quickly disassembled and assembled
applicants: GUANGZHOU F R O ELECTRONIC TECH INC LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experiment node structure capable of being rapidly assembled and disassembled. The device is characterized by comprising one or more experiment nodes, one or more communication connecting plates and a fixing plate, the communication connecting plates are installed below the fixing plate, and the experiment nodes are installed above the fixing plate and correspond to the communication connecting plates in a one-to-one mode; the experiment nodes and the corresponding communication connecting plates are attracted and fixed through magnetic force, and signal connection and electric connection are conducted through the POGO PIN female bases and the POGO PIN male bases which are paired. During practical application, the communication connecting plate is fixed at the bottom of the fixing plate firstly, then the experimental nodes are adsorbed and mounted on the upper surface of the fixing plate according to needs, the whole mounting structure is of a modular and easy-to-dismount structural design, the experimental nodes are flexible and quick to replace, and the teaching experiment efficiency can be greatly improved.

title: Teaching course recommendation method of education platform
applicants: HENAN DECHUANG EDUCATION INFORMATION CONSULTING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching course recommendation method of an education platform and belongs to the technical field of teaching platforms. The method comprises the steps: 1, collecting the attribute data of a user, and pouring the attribute data into a Redis layer; 2, according to the step 1, carrying out user purchase prediction through a machine learning algorithm; 3, acquiring real-timeclick data of a user, pushing the acquired real-time click data to a real-time data layer, calculating an online real-time correlation matrix through a streaming data processing method, and pushing the online real-time correlation matrix into the Reids layer; and 4, obtaining a recommendation result through a collaborative filtering algorithm according to the step 1 and the step 3. The problems that when an existing recommendation engine is used on the education platform, the recommendation accuracy is not high, the association degree of recommended products is not high, and on the contrary,troubles are caused to users are solved.

title: Family education robot and working method thereof
applicants: HENAN ZHIYE TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching robots, and in particular, relates to a family education robot and a working method thereof. The family education robot comprises a robot body, the robotbody is provided with an identification module used for identifying the writing condition of students; a data center is arranged in the robot body, and the data center is used for storing question bank data and recording usual answer data of the students, a transmission module used for transmitting and implanting data is further arranged in the robot, and a machine learning module used for autonomously learning according to writing records of the students is arranged in the robot. According to the invention, massive question bank data is stored in the data center; question bank homework suitable for the students can be generated according to grades, interests or specialties of the students; the answer result of the students is compared with the correct result through the recognition module, and after a period of time, the robot can generate a corresponding annual interest report and a speciality report according to the answer history record of the students, so that parents can be assisted in mining and discovering interest points and speciality points of children.

title: Radiotherapy body position fixing and treatment implementation virtual simulation teaching experiment method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a radiotherapy body position fixing and treatment implementation virtual simulation teaching experiment method. The virtual simulation teaching experiment comprises applicationarchitecture and platform architecture. The platform architecture is a rear-end architecture of the application architecture. The application architecture comprises an application layer and a universal layer, the application layer is used for scene construction and figure construction and is applied to virtual equipment and virtual environment, and the universal layer is used for theoretical knowledge learning, experiment teaching management, experiment resource management, teaching interaction communication, intelligent error correction guidance, experiment result correction, experiment report management and teaching effect evaluation. An offline teaching mode and an online teaching mode are adopted, three teaching links of classroom teaching, practical training teaching and after-classpreviewing and reviewing are involved, technical means of three-dimensional modeling, 3D printing, virtual reality, augmented reality, artificial intelligence, big data and the like are introduced, the principle that reality is superior to virtual process is persisted, and radiotherapy high-quality digital education resources and a co-construction sharing environment are constructed.

title: Subject 2 intelligent training system and method based on virtual reality
applicants: ZHUHAI CHAOFAN SHIJIE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a subject 2 intelligent training system and method based on virtual reality, and relate to the technical field of virtual reality, and the system and method are used for realizing that through presetting teaching contents, an intelligent AI judges whether user operation conforms to corresponding rules or not according to the teaching contents, and generates corresponding operation guidance when operation behaviors of a user do not conform to teaching regulations. The beneficial effects of the invention are that the method carries out the teaching according to the presetteaching contents, provides the corresponding guide identification, enables a user to know a current error point while reducing the learning difficulty, timely provides a correction method, reduces the learning cost, and improves the driving learning efficiency.

title: Mobile artificial intelligence teaching machine
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mobile artificial intelligence teaching machine. The machine comprises a device main body, an embedded rod and a device base, wherein the bottom of the device main body is fixedly connected with the embedded rod, the bottom of the embedded rod is fixedly connected with a limiting plate, the periphery of the embedded rod is fixedly connected with a nested rod, one side ofthe top of the nested rod is connected with a limiting pin in a nesting mode, the other side of the bottom of the nested rod is fixedly connected with a positioning plate, the middle part of the positioning plate is connected with a positioning pin in a nesting mode, and the bottom end of the nested rod is connected with a bearing in a nested mode. The bearing improves the flexibility of the device main body, and a protective shell plays a protective role on the device main body, so that the service life of the device main body is prolonged; and a convenient placement groove improves the convenience of the device main body, a cushion pad avoids the abrasion in the device, a movable mechanism enables teaching personnel to move the device easily, the convenience of the device is further improved, the use of the artificial intelligence teaching machine is suitable, and the machine has the wide development prospect in the future.

title: Cloud game teaching interaction method, system, device and computer readable storage medium thereof
applicants: CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a cloud game teaching interaction method, a system, a device and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: a learning client acquires a cloud game teaching interactive video with an AI game role control track from the cloud game server; wherein the cloud game teaching interactive video is a cloud game teaching interactive video with an AIgame role control track, which is formed by separating an image from an operation in a video generated by the cloud game server based on an operation record of a teacher; the learning client selectsa specified AI game role in the cloud game teaching interaction video to perform a real person replacement mode; and the learning client triggers the cloud game server to synchronously start the cloudgame teaching interaction video, so that the cloud game server takes the actual operation of the learning client and the operation record of the unreplaced AI game role as game pictures output by thelearning client. According to the method, learners can be assisted in game interaction practice, and the experience of learners is improved.

title: Portable comprehensive intelligent interactive fitness system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a portable comprehensive intelligent interactive fitness system. The system comprises a portable comprehensive intelligent fitness instrument, a data acquisition sensing module, a mobile terminal, an app, an external audio and video device and a wireless communication module. The invention further discloses a portable comprehensive intelligent interaction fitness method. The device is convenient to carry, various immersive fitness modes can be achieved through combination and matching of the external members, and a data ecological chain is composed of the app of the mobile terminal, the wireless communication module, the data acquisition sensing module and the external audio and video device, so that the exercise data of the user can be collected and displayed in real time in the exercise process of the user; and moreover, according to the system, the user can know exercise data during exercise in real time, teaching videos can be played for audio interaction fitness during fitness, the fitness action of the user can be corrected through an AI algorithm correction module, the fitness mode and the Internet of Things technology are combined, the user is helpedto conduct more professional and more efficient fitness training, and scientific fitness is achieved.

title: Binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device
applicants: BEIJING DASHENG ZHILIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device. The system comprises a high-performance computer, a mechanical arm, a PLC and a material conveying belt, the mechanical arm is connected with a high-performance computer through a mechanical arm controller; an image acquisition device and an ultrasonic probe are arranged at the grabbing end of the mechanical arm; the image acquisition device is connected with the high-performance computer through the image preprocessor; the ultrasonic probe is connected with the high-performance computer through the single-chip microcomputer system. The material conveying belt is driven by a servo motor conveying device; an in-place detection sensor is arranged on the material conveying belt; the servo motor conveying device and the in-place detection sensor are connected with the high-performance computer through the PLC. The key point of the utility model lies in facing practical application and solving practical problems, a plurality of teaching knowledge points are fused, the application type teaching requirements of a plurality of science and engineering majors can be completely satisfied, and theteaching process is enabled to be closer to the practical work scene.

title: LEARNING DATA CREATION METHOD, MACHINE LEARNING MODEL GENERATION METHOD, LEARNING DATA CREATION DEVICE, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: With the present invention, using first data recording a first real subject and second data recording a second subject which is generated by a simulator, is positioned in alignment with the first subject, and corresponds to the first subject, one or a plurality of computers executes appending information based on the second data and/or information generated by the simulator to the first data as teaching information.

title: Wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: GANSU DANDELION INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal. The device comprises a limiting frame, a single-chip microcomputer, a display screen, a main frame and a cooling fan. Two heat dissipation fans are embedded in one side of the interior of the main frame; a mounting groove is formed in the other side of the interior of the main frame; lED light supplementing lamps are mounted on the inner side wall of the mounting groove at equal intervals; a display screen is fixed in the mounting groove in one side of the LED light supplementing lamp; a limiting frame is mounted at the edge of the main frame on the outer side of the display screen; a wireless receiver is embedded in one side of the bottom of the limiting frame, a voice player is fixed to the other side of the bottom of the limiting frame, a high-definition camera is installed in the center of the top of the limiting frame, and illumination sensors are fixed to the positions, on the two sidesof the high-definition camera, of the top of the limiting frame. According to the utility model, the working environment of the online education terminal is improved, the teaching effect of the onlineeducation terminal is improved, and accidental falling of the online education terminal is avoided.

title: Industrial Internet teaching practical training platform
applicants: ANHUI TECHNICAL COLLEGE MECHANICAL & ELECTRICAL ENG
abstract_text: The invention discloses an industrial Internet teaching practical training platform. The platform comprises a feeding and sorting component, a nut conveying belt, a feeding box component, a weighing device, a control cabinet, a master control computer, a touch screen, a packaging component and a finished product stacking component. According to the technical scheme, good and bad nuts are separatedby the feeding and sorting component through the artificial intelligence algorithm on the basis of visual images captured by an industrial camera, weight is set in the system, the nuts are containedin a receiving box in the weighing device, when the receiving box reaches the designated weight, material supply to the receiving box is stopped, and meanwhile, the receiving box is conveyed onto a finished product conveying belt for packaging and stacking operations. According to the technical scheme, the platform is high in automation level, manual operation is not required in the whole process,and the platform has the procedures such as accurate sorting, automatic weighing, intelligent packaging, stacking and the like and is high in production efficiency.

title: Knowledge graph construction method and system and storage medium
applicants: GUANGDONG YIXUETONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a knowledge graph construction method and system and a storage medium. The method comprises the steps: collecting initial learning data, storing the initial learning data in alearning resource database, and carrying out the ontology term extraction and marking of the initial learning data according to a subject teaching outline and teaching materials; inputting the relationship and sequence between each meta-knowledge point, constructing a directed subject knowledge graph through an ontology editor, generating an OWL file, and storing the OWL file in a learning systemin the form of a triple; updating and inputting the learning process state data of the user in real time, and performing multi-knowledge-point modeling on the learning process state data of the user through a DKT algorithm to obtain a learning and mastering state of the user; According to the learning and mastering state of the user, mining the relationship among the knowledge points, and dynamically updating the subject knowledge graph. According to the method, the DKT is tracked based on deep learning, so that a multi-knowledge-point modeling scene is effectively solved, the latest knowledgemastering state of a learner is accurately detected, the knowledge graph is constructed, and the internal relation of knowledge points is obtained.

title: Study room seat state detection method based on deep learning, and seat management system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a study room seat state detection method based on deep learning, and a seat management system, relates to the technical field of teaching resource management, and adopts a computer vision mode to replace a traditional hardware dot matrix and the like to realize seat use condition detection so as to reduce the use of hardware resources. A target detection algorithm based ondeep learning is adopted for object detection, and the detection precision is higher than that of a traditional target detection algorithm; the seat occupation can be judged under the condition of notincreasing any additional hardware; not only can the attendance rate of the study room be obtained, but also the use condition of each seat can be obtained; the system is unconscious, unforced and humanized; the system not only can facilitate students, but also can facilitate managers to provide data support for researchers at the aspect.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR LEARNING SCENE EMBEDDINGS VIA VISUAL SEMANTICS AND APPLICATION THEREOF
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, and programming for responding to an image related query. Information related to each of a plurality of images is received, wherein the information represents concepts co-existing in the image. Visual semantics for each of the plurality of images are created based on the information related thereto. Representations of scenes of the plurality of images are obtained via machine learning, based on the visual semantics of the plurality of images, wherein the representations capture concepts associated with the scenes.

title: Multifunctional public safety emergency guarantee management shelter system
applicants: CHONGQING HOUDUN SECURITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model provides a multifunctional public safety emergency guarantee management shelter system. The multifunctional public safety emergency guarantee management shelter system comprises an emergency guarantee big data platform, at least one multifunctional public safety emergency guarantee management shelter and at least one mobile terminal, when emergency materials are obtained, a dooropening instruction can be sent through a mobile terminal APP to obtain the emergency materials, and the system is more intelligent; whether kinetic energy and environmental data in the cabin are abnormal or not and whether meteorological data outside the cabin are abnormal or not can be monitored through sensors, an alarm is given when abnormity occurs, and 24-hour unattended intelligent operation is achieved. Display of preset propaganda training data can be provided through the display screen, and field safety knowledge teaching can be carried out; in addition, the AI intelligent video monitor can be used for checking field video monitoring data, checking attendance of field teaching through face recognition, counting the number of people watching propaganda training data of the displayscreen and staying time, making a distribution report according to a preset evaluation model, and supporting an evaluation result through data.

title: Dialogue design method in artificial intelligence English teaching interactive courseware and implementation thereof
applicants: SUZHOU MITEXI SAIER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a dialogue design method in artificial intelligence English teaching interactive courseware and implementation thereof. According to the dialogue design method, dialogues are designed or entered in a fixed dialog box through Chinese or English, and the dialogues are translated into English through one key after the dialogues are designed, and the dialogues are read throughartificial intelligence, and reading audio files are cached locally. The dialogue implementation (practice) comprises the following steps: firstly, allocating roles to dialogues, and allocating the dialogues to a robot for reading or a learner for reading. Conversation intervals and speech rates may be adjusted. Conversations may be recorded and played back. Recording audio files can be sent to anartificial intelligence scoring system for scoring and error correction.

title: Artificial intelligence English teaching interaction courseware design system
applicants: SUZHOU MITEXI SAIER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence English teaching interaction courseware design system. The design system firstly establishes a personal portal for a learner to complete login management and courseware management. Then an artificial intelligence English teaching interaction courseware design method is provided, and the method helps a user to quickly, simply and vividly create artificial intelligence English interaction teaching courseware through templates, function frames and function keys. Through a retrieval function, rich courseware making materials are obtained from an internal library or the Internet. When the English teaching aid is used after being manufactured, the functions of artificial intelligence translation, reading, natural language recognition, retrievaland the like are fully utilized, and whole-course artificial intelligence interactive English teaching is realized.

title: Basketball shooting hand type video analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a basketball shooting hand shape video analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a hand detection system, a gesture key point detectionsystem and a hand shape analysis system. The hand detection system records a detection frame for detecting and positioning the hands of the trainee in each frame of image of the video in the trainingstate; the gesture key point detection system processes the image, detected by the hand detection system, in the hand position detection frame to obtain a joint point of the hand; and the hand shape analysis system performs action analysis according to the gesture key points obtained by the gesture key point detection system, and performs comparative analysis with preset gesture key point information of standard gestures. The analysis method comprises the steps of video acquisition, hand detection system operation, gesture key point detection system operation and hand shape analysis system operation. According to the invention, a user can provide feedback about whether the shooting hand shape is standard or not without extra manpower during shooting training, and the difference between thewrong hand shape and the correct hand shape is pointed out, so that the shooter can still obtain the teaching feedback of the shooting hand shape without a coach.

title: Multidisciplinary interactive teaching system and teaching method based on multidimensional data analysis
abstract_text: The invention relates to a multidisciplinary interactive teaching system based on multidimensional data analysis, which comprises an AI-based data processing server, an intelligent gateway and teaching terminals, and is characterized in that the AI-based data processing server is respectively connected with the plurality of teaching terminals through the intelligent gateway. The teaching method comprises five steps of system networking, identity prefabrication, teaching prefabrication, teaching activities and system updating. On one hand, the system has good networking operation capability andgood system expansion capability, the working efficiency of comprehensive allocation and management operation of knowledge points and teaching resources of different subjects is greatly improved, andthe labor intensity and the cost are reduced; and on the other hand, the richness and comprehensiveness of knowledge point contents in teaching activity development are greatly improved, and meanwhile, various types of teaching resources can be effectively compatible to synchronously participate in the teaching activity, so that the efficiency and knowledge comprehensiveness of the teaching activity are greatly improved, students can fully and comprehensively master knowledge points, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence auxiliary integrated system for medical education
applicants: UNION HOSPITAL TONGJI MEDICAL COLLEGE HUAZHONG UNIV SCI & TECH
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence auxiliary integration system for medical education, and the system comprises: a man-machine interaction unit which is used for user login and interface operation; a central processing unit which is used for interpreting an instruction of interface operation and processing data; a case generation unit which is used for generating specific teachingcases; an intelligent learning module which is used for learning data of a doctor processing result, continuously learning and optimizing an artificial intelligence system algorithm and improving theaccuracy of artificial intelligence processing; a learning unit which is a learning data storage module used for student clinical practice skill and thinking training and used for storing teaching cases and student assessment data; and a database which is used for storing the case information of the patient and the identity information of interface login. By arranging the case generation unit, thecase generation unit can collect and organize the patient information of the patient and classify the patient information according to different levels and different medical stages, so that studentscan learn systematically and conveniently, and the learning efficiency of the medical students is improved.

title: Teacher recommendation method and device
applicants: BEIJING MININGLAMP SOFTWARE SYSTEM CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teacher recommendation method and device, and relates to the technical field of machine learning, in particular to a teacher recommendation method and device. The teacher recommendation method comprises the steps of obtaining feature information of students to construct corresponding student portraits, wherein feature information of students comprises feature information of student learning, social contact and differences; training the student portraits through a teaching feature rule model to obtain teacher features required by the students, and recommending teachersaccording to the teacher features and preset rules. According to the invention, proper teachers can be recommended to students, and teaching according to materials is realized, thereby achieving the purpose of maximum utilization of teacher resources.

title: Artificial intelligence method for modern Chinese component analysis
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for analyzing modern Chinese sentence components by using artificial intelligence. The design purpose is to enable a computer to decompose a text into phrases and words layer by layer according to grammatical specifications and divide the phrases and words into subjects, predicates, objects and the like (as shown in Figure 1 of the abstract). The method is characterized by comprising the following steps: 1, establishing and calling a word bank and segmenting a text into phrases, sentences and words; 2, performing operable setting for one word having multiple properties; 3, setting fixed or determined phrase attributes which must be preset; 4, establishing a habit usage lexicon and a calling rule; 5, judging phrase composition; 6, performing phrase composition calculation and design of a recording module; 7, designing specific usage methods such as a preposition structure, a verb-guest structure, a joint phrase, a character phrase and the like; and 8, dividing sentence components and setting a division function library according to the composition mode of phrases and words. The technology based on the method is suitable for the fields of education and teaching, news editing, text processing, remote diagnosis, robot man-machine conversation and the like.

title: Method and system for imitating and learning 3D spatial space action of robot
abstract_text: The invention provides a method and system for imitating and learning the 3D spatial space action of a robot, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence and robots. The invention designs a robot 3D spatial action imitating and learning method based on a series-parallel stacked BP neural network. AN imitating and learning mechanism is applied to a robot learning system. In the process framework of the imitating and learning mechanism, the teaching information generated by a robot arm is transmitted to a series-parallel stacked BP neural network model representing a motion strategy for training and learning. By learning a corresponding relationship between a state characteristic matrix set of motion and the action characteristic matrix set of motion, not only can the teaching action be reproduced, but also an action behavior can be generalized. For different tasks, the method is not required to perform separate action planning and has high intelligence.

title: Artificial intelligence assisted graphical programming teaching method and system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence assisted graphical programming teaching method and system. The method comprises the following steps: extracting a code model based on a graphical code block; obtaining a target function model; obtaining the shortest difference distance between the code model and the target function model; calculating the change of the shortest difference distancegenerated by adding or deleting each code block, and generating a modification scheme according to the reduction direction of the change of the shortest difference distance; performing code modification according to the modification scheme until the shortest difference distance is zero; and achieving the teaching process of the method through the system. According to the invention, the original complex English code programming language is converted into the graphical instruction module, so that the method and system are suitable for different age levels, the obstacle of a programming learner to program understanding is reduced, the creativity of the programming learner is reserved, and the programming learner can learn programming easily and happily.

title: DATA ANALYZER
abstract_text: The present invention repeats a series of processes multiple times that include dividing given labeled teaching data into data for model construction and data for model verification, constructing a machine learning model using the data for model construction, and applying this model to the data for model verification and identifying a sample (S2-S5). When the data for model construction changes, the machine learning model that is constructed may change, yet exact identification with high probability should still be possible, so that there is high probability for a mislabeled sample that the original label and the identification result do not match and misidentification results. When the number of times this misidentification occurs is counted for each sample and a misidentification rate is obtained, it is found that a misidentification rate is relatively high for mislabeled samples, so a mislabeled sample is specified on the basis of the misidentification rate (S6-S7). Thus, it is possible to improve the performance of identifying a machine learning model by detecting a sample with high accuracy that is included in the teaching data and very likely to have been mislabeled.

title: CLASSROOM ASSISTANCE SYSTEM
abstract_text: Systems and methods involving machine learning functionality in a classroom setting are described to aid a teacher in certain teaching and administrative tasks. The classroom assistance system involves member devices used by students and at least one moderator device used by a teacher and may further involve an administrator device used by an administrator and a server. The member devices may display media content. The moderator device may include an image/audio input device and may execute machine learning engines running machine learning models that generate results indicative of student behavior, student comprehension and the appropriateness of media content. The teacher, using the moderator device, may provide feedback regarding the results. The member device may generate more than one type of result and one result may provide feedback with respect to the other result. Feedback may be used to train the machine learning model and generate improved models.

title: Student clock-in and class state detection system based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student clock-in and class state detection system based on deep learning, and relates to the field of deep learning technology application. The invention provides a student clock-in and class state detection system based on deep learning in order to accurately detect clock-in conditions and class states of students in real time. The student clock-in and class state detection system comprises a data acquisition subsystem, a detection subsystem and a storage and visualization subsystem, wherein the position of a human face is found in a picture or a video through a human face detection network, and then human face recognition, fatigue detection and expression recognition are carried out respectively, and the identity and the class state of a student are determined;and finally, the data is output, so that teachers and parents can conveniently master the conditions of students in real time and give corresponding guidance, and the teaching quality is improved. According to the student clock-in and class state detection system, identities and expressions of students can be detected in real time at the same time to judge class states of the students, and the student clock-in and class state detection system has the advantages of simple network structure, low calculation amount and high accuracy of a detection system.

title: Agent mode and implementation of artificial intelligence English teaching
applicants: SUZHOU MIT CSAIL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an agent mode and implementation of artificial intelligence English teaching. A proxy server is added between a learner and an artificial intelligence platform. Communication, function conversion and data transmission between learners and artificial intelligence are realized through the proxy server. The proxy server integrates an interface interacting with the artificial intelligence platform and provides an interface interacting with learner application software. Therefore, through the agent mode, different artificial intelligence platforms can be used in artificial intelligence English teaching.

title: Novel interactive video producing and broadcasting device for teaching
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel interactive video producing and broadcasting device for teaching. The device comprises a device main body, a workbench, a computer, a video processing equipment placement area and a display screen fixing frame, common video processing devices such as a non-coding card, a compression card, a decoding card, a recording and broadcasting card, a streaming media cardand an AI intelligent signal detection device are arranged in a video processing device placement area; the video production requirements can be met; functions and differences of all devices are explained for students; a video recorder is placed in the video recorder placement cabinet; adjusting the shooting angle; the adapter can be connected with the display screen through the patch cord; a computer picture of a teacher is displayed on the display screen; in addition, the teacher can also move the video recorder and align the lens of the video recorder with the access port of the video processing equipment, and through actual operation demonstration, the cognition of the students to the equipment is improved, so that the teaching quality is improved, and popularization and promotion arefacilitated.

title: Basic multidisciplinary teaching resource comprehensive management system and management method based on AI
abstract_text: The invention relates to a basic multidisciplinary teaching resource comprehensive management system based on AI. The system comprises a data processing server based on AI, an intelligent gateway, a teaching resource hardware management library, a teaching resource software management library, a teaching syllabus editing terminal and a teaching terminal, and the data processing server based on AIis separately connected with the teaching resource hardware management library, the teaching resource software management library, the teaching syllabus editing terminal and the teaching terminal through the intelligent gateway. A management method thereof includes five steps of system networking, system prefabrication, teaching prefabrication, teaching activity and resource recovery. According tothe system and the method, on one hand, allocation of various different teaching resources is greatly improved, and the work efficiency of operation is managed; on the other hand, the development efficiency of teaching activity is improved, and phenomena of influence on development of normal teaching activity due to insufficient teaching resources and high vacancy rate of teaching equipment and waste of teaching resources caused by insufficient allocation precision of the teaching resources are effectively prevented.

title: Sports and fitness posture scoring and teaching device and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a sports and fitness posture scoring and teaching device and method. The device is used for realizing the method. The device comprises a base, a support frame, an intelligent teaching system, a display screen, a display screen connecting piece and a power supply, wherein one end of the support frame is fixedly connected to the base while the other end of the support frame is connected to one end of the display screen connecting piece; the other end of the display screen connecting piece is fixedly connected to the display screen; the intelligent teaching system is electrically connected to the power supply and the display screen respectively; the intelligent teaching system comprises a video acquisition device and a raspberry pi system; and the raspberry pi system edits a convolutional neural network with deep learning capability and completed training and a neural network model with a three-dimensional reconstruction function. According to the device and the method, intelligent scoring and teaching are provided for sports people, and the user experience is improved.

title: ABNORMALITY DIAGNOSIS SYSTEM, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided are an abnormality diagnosis system, method, and program capable of accurately diagnosing the classification of an abnormality cause under diagnosis. In the present invention, a diagnosis unit comprises a data processing unit for, upon receiving data output from an object of diagnosis, generating preprocessed data in which noise, which consists of features other than features that make it possible to identify the category of an abnormality cause from the data, has been attenuated and an abnormality cause identification unit for, upon receiving the preprocessed data, identifying the category of an abnormality cause under diagnosis on the basis of a diagnosis model for outputting the classification of an abnormality cause under diagnosis. The diagnosis model is a machine learning model. A learning unit comprises a diagnosis model learning unit for generating a diagnosis model through machine learning and a noise attenuation unit for generating attenuated data in which the aforementioned noise has been removed from learning data for the diagnosis model machine learning. The learning data is either simulated data simulating abnormalities in the object of diagnosis or real data indicating abnormalities in the object of diagnosis. The diagnosis model learning unit generates a diagnosis model through machine learning by using the attenuated data as the learning data and using abnormality cause classifications as teaching data.

title: DISCRIMINABLE DATA SORTING SYSTEM, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: A first learning data generation unit 91 applies teaching data including a label indicating discrimination results to a reference discriminant model and generates first learning data that uses, as a positive example, teaching data in which the label and discrimination results from the discriminant model match and uses, as a negative example, teaching data in which the label and the discrimination results from the discriminant model differ. A first model learning unit 92 uses the generated first learning data and generates a first hierarchical mixed model by using heterogeneous machine learning. A first score calculation unit 93 calculates a first score for each leaf node in the generated first hierarchical mixed model, said first score being the ratio of data correctly determined as positive examples of first learning data among the first learning data classified to that leaf node.

title: Teaching training method and platform based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching training method based on big data and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps of designing a teaching scheme which is implemented in a computer-assisted mode in a teaching process according to preset ideas of educational science, psychology and game science, and providing a teaching mode which gives priority to learning, practice, interaction, game and testing. Compared with traditional teaching, the method in the invention improves the learning efficiency, stimulates the learning interest, and assists in improving the learning effect.

title: Intelligent device based on homework tutoring and correcting
applicants: MOZI SHENZHEN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent device based on homework tutoring and correcting. The intelligent device comprises a homework tutoring device, an artificial intelligence homework management system and a mobile terminal. By means of the intelligent device, a student can simply and quickly find the corresponding analysis and description on a difficult problem when doing homework, and can carry out home answer self-check, homework correction and scoring through the intelligent device; meanwhile, the repeated labor and time of a teacher are greatly saved; the homework tutoring device can identify intra-curricular and extracurricular teaching materials; the student does not need to look at a screen at all time; meanwhile, the technical display content which is beneficial for protecting eyesight is adopted, and the eyes are protected; and in addition, the intelligent device also performs artificial intelligence analysis specific to the conditions of student individuals, class groups,school groups, zones, times, knowledge points and the like, gives corresponding expert suggestions, is more accurate and more comprehensive than manual analysis, and is more conducive to improvement of student personal achievements, and teaching quality and level improvement of teachers.

title: Piano music score difficulty identification method based on lifting decision tree
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of machine learning, higher accuracy and stability of piano music score difficulty level identification are obtained, reliable piano difficulty information is provided for piano teaching and student learning, and the user experience of a music score website is improved. The technical scheme adopted by the invention is as follows. According to the piano music score difficulty identification method based on the lifting decision tree, a learning algorithm xgboost model of a multi-classification lifting decision tree based on grid search is established, accuracydetection and optimization are performed on the established model by using a test set, and piano music score difficulty is classified by using the optimized model; wherein the decision tree is used asa primary function, the XGBoost model is composed of a plurality of decision trees, the later decision tree fits the previous residual error, and the finally obtained prediction value is the sum of test results of all decision trees. The method is mainly applied to piano music score difficulty automatic identification occasions.

title: SMART SOFTWARE-DEFINED NETWORK (SDN) SWITCH
applicants: ARGELA YAZILIM VE BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI SAN VE TIC A S [TR]
abstract_text: A new component is provided within a switch that ‘learns’ from the messages between the switch and the controller regarding how to behave like a controller under different network conditions and how to optimize the switch flow tables by implementing techniques like aggregation to save memory space, wherein the new component can act as a ‘proxy controller’ that resides within the switch. This new component can be activated when a specific trigger happens, wherein the trigger is programmable into the switch. After the trigger is active, the proxy/local controller starts undertaking some or all of the roles of the controller until the trigger is deactivated. Because different types of triggers can be programmed, the new component can have one or more of the control functions. The teaching of the new component (which can be a hardware chip or software) is performed outside the switch using machine-learning techniques (e.g. deep learning).

title: Business model based on AI interactive 3D courseware generation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a business model based on an AI interaction 3D courseware generation system, and the business model comprises a database which stores element information, courseware information and a commodity model, and the commodity model comprises a purchase link of a commodity corresponding to the commodity model; an AI interactive 3D courseware generation system is executed through acomputer to call information in a database to generate 3D animation courseware, and a user can click a commodity model to purchase commodities when looking up the 3D animation courseware. According tothe invention, through the business mode, consumption is promoted; the application of the 3D animation teaching software is also improved; therefore, more exquisite 3D animation software is promotedto be manufactured, different three-dimensional learning modes are generated for students, boring textbook knowledge learning is avoided, knowledge learning is achieved when the students watch animations, the learning enthusiasm is improved, and the 3D animation software can be combined with VR and other equipment to achieve immersive learning modes.

title: School student behavior big data analysis system
applicants: TIANJIN HUARUAN INNOVATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a school student behavior big data analysis system. The system comprises an intelligent analysis system as well as a peripheral acquisition device, a wireless transmission system, a storage system, a multidirectional alarm system and an audio acquisition system which are all connected with the intelligent analysis system; the interior of the peripheral acquisition device ismainly divided into a behavior recognition system and a face recognition system which are connected with the intelligent analysis system; and the multidirectional alarm system comprises a sound alarmsystem and a light alarm system which are connected with the intelligent analysis system. According to the school student behavior big data analysis system provided by the invention, by means of Internet of Things and AI identification technologies and the peripheral acquisition device, an auxiliary teaching system for recording the classroom behaviors of students is built; the classroom behaviors of the students are recorded by the peripheral acquisition device; fire early warning is performed by an infrared thermal radiation probe; classroom explanation of teachers is assisted by the audioacquisition system; and therefore, the teachers are assisted to improve classroom teaching quality.

title: Image analysis including targeted preprocessing
abstract_text: Disclosed is a system (1) for recognizing features (21) or objects (22) in an input image (2), comprising at least one preprocessing module (3) which is in the form of an AI module and is configured to generate at least one intermediate image (4, 4a, 4b) from the input image (2) by means of a parameterized internal processing chain (31), and comprising at least one analysis module (5, 5a, 5b) configured to recognize (51, 51a, 51b) the desired feature (21) or object (22) in the intermediate image (4). Also disclosed is a method (100) for teaching a system (1) according to one of claims 1 to 12,involving the following steps: * feeding (110) a plurality of learning input images (9, 2) to the system (1); * comparing (120) the result (10, 51) supplied by the analysis module (5) for each learning input image (9, 2) with a learning value (11) for the result (10, 51); feeding back (130) a discrepancy (12) between the result (10) and the learning value (11) to an input (32) of the preprocessing module (3), and/or adjusting (140) the parameters of the internal processing chain (31) of the preprocessing module (3) in order to reduce (150) the discrepancy (12). Further disclosed is an associated computer program product.

title: System and method for making learning plan through artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a system and a method for making a learning plan through artificial intelligence. The method comprises: a computing system performing evaluation test on a user to determine anevaluation test result; analyzing the evaluation test result by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine based on the plurality of parameters to determine an analysis result; selecting at least one teaching material and/or at least one examination material from the memory by the AI engine based on the analysis result; providing at least one learning suggestion by the AI engine based on the analysisresult; correlating the at least one teaching material and/or the at least one examination material, the at least one learning suggestion and the user information with each other through an AI engine;and making a learning plan for the user.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
applicants: TIANGONG CHUANZHI BEIJING EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching platform. The trolley comprises a trolley body, a mainboard shell frame, a mainboard, a mounting piece and an air cooling heat dissipation device, the mainboard is arranged on a chassis of the trolley body through the mainboard shell frame, the mainboard shell frame comprises two plate frames which are connected through a supporting column and located above and below the mainboard respectively, an embedding hole is formed in the chassis, and the lower end of the supporting column is embedded into the embedding hole; the two plateframes are each of a cavity shell structure, the two air outlet ends of the air cooling heat dissipation device are communicated with inner cavities of the two plate frames respectively, and the lowerplate face, located above the main plate, of each plate frame and the upper plate face, located below the main plate, of each plate frame are each provided with a plurality of air outlet holes in a linear array. The artificial intelligence teaching platform provided by the utility model is simple in structure, easy to assemble and good in air cooling effect, and the use safety of the artificial intelligence teaching platform is ensured.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching display device based on Internet
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching display device based on the Internet. The device comprises a bottom frame, a wheel carrier, a shell and a transparent protective door, an antiskid wear-resistant pad is arranged below the bottom frame; an electric telescopic rod is arranged in the bottom frame, the wheel carrier is arranged below the electric telescopic rod, damping supporting legs are arranged below the wheel carrier, universal wheels are arranged below the damping supporting legs, the shell is arranged above the bottom frame, a storage battery is arranged in theshell, and a circuit board is arranged above the storage battery. Beneficial effects are that: the method is suitable for large-scale production; the projector support is simple in structure and reasonable in design, the electric telescopic rods can drive the universal wheels to ascend and descend, the projector support can move and can be stably fixed, the transparent protective door plays a role in protecting a projector, when the projector support is not used, the transparent protective door can prevent dust from entering the projector, and the folding support facilitates adjustment of theinclination angle of the projector.

title: IMAGE-BASED SYSTEM MONITORING
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for monitoring the integrity of a cyber-physical system (1), in which • - image data are captured (S4) for at least one component (2, 4, 6) of the cyber-physical system (1), which carries out movements during ongoing operation, by means of at least one imaging method, • - operating data (14) relating to the cyber-physical system (1) are estimated (S5) by resorting to the captured image data, wherein the estimated operating data (14) comprise, in particular, estimated process data and/or estimated configuration data and/or estimated manufacturing data, • - actual operating data (15) relating to the cyber-physical system (1), which comprise, in particular, actual process data and/or actual configuration data and/or actual manufacturing data, are provided and/or determined (S6), • - the operating data (14) estimated by resorting to the image data and the actual operating data (15) are compared (S7), and • - the integrity of the cyber-physical system to be monitored is assessed on the basis of the comparison. The invention also relates to a method for teaching artificial intelligence, taught artificial intelligence, an integrity monitoring system (7), a computer program and a computer-readable medium.

title: Education big data analysis system
applicants: BEIJING PRIME HUAXIA INTERNATIONAL EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of education big data analysis, in particular to an education big data analysis system, which comprises an education data acquisition module, an education data arrangement module, an education data mining module and an education data analysis module. According to the invention, student academic scores are used as data sources; data mining techniques are used to provide an efficient processing mode for reasonable and effective utilization of education big data; the invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence and application of statistics and relates to management and the use of the database are related; the education big data analysis system is applied to student score analysis, and enable the data to be more timely; multiple courses in the score database are selected as research objects more simply and clearly, whether a certain course affects the opening of other courses or not is found out, reference is provided for later course arrangement of school teaching teachers, a basis is provided for later course selection of students, and the system can be deployed in management centers of colleges and universities and has the advantagesof complete functions, reliable performance and the like.

title: GPU scheduling method and system for artificial intelligence teaching and scientific research platform
applicants: HUBEI MEI HE YI SI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a GPU scheduling method and system for an artificial intelligence teaching and scientific research platform. The method comprises the steps that project personnel of the platform are divided into a plurality of groups; one GPU resource container and at least one CPU resource container are allocated to each group, and the number of the CPU resource containers obtained by eachgroup is the same as the number of members in the group; the CPU resource containers obtained by each group are distributed to each member in the group one by one; and the members of each group are controlled to use the GPU resources obtained by the group in sequence. Project personnel of the platform are grouped; according to the method, multiple members in each group share one GPU resource, themembers in the group use the GPU resources of the group in sequence, and compared with a traditional use method, on the premise that the number of project personnel is the same, only a smaller numberof GPU resources are needed, so that the hardware cost of the platform is reduced, and meanwhile, the use efficiency of the GPU resources is also improved.

title: COMPONENT INSPECTION METHOD AND INSPECTION SYSTEM
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide a component inspection method and a component inspection system with which it is possible to easily detect abnormalities that occur irregularly in images which are of to-be-inspected components having a definite shape and which are captured from a fixed position. [Solution] Provided are an inspection method and an inspection system, both comprising: by using a neural network, reading normal image data as teaching data so as to carry out machine learning on the data by using an autoencoder; constructing a model (inspection model) of the normal image data, from which only a normal image is to be accurately reconstructed; then, inputting a to-be-inspected image data set to said inspection model, and comparing, by using the autoencoder, the inputted to-be-inspected image data set with a reconstructed image data set; and determining the presence of an abnormality in the case where both image data sets are different to the extent of not being considered to be identical.

title: COGNITIVE TOOL FOR TEACHING GENERLIZATION OF OBJECTS TO A PERSON
abstract_text: Provided are systems, methods, and media for teaching generalization of an object. An example method includes obtaining a set of traits of an object recognized by a person in an input image, in which a subset of traits are traits fixated on by the person when recognizing the object in the input image. Executing a machine learning algorithm to generate a set of generalized images of the object. Each generalized image is generated with at least one trait of being modified, in which the set of generalized images are ordered in a sequence based on proximity of each of the generalized images to the input image. Presenting at least a first generalized image to the person in accordance with the sequence. Modifying the order of the generalized images in the sequence in response to detecting from feedback that the person does not recognize the object in the first generalized image.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching management system and method based on Baidu smart classroom
applicants: ANHUI BAIQUANDUXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching management system and method based on a Baidu smart classroom, and is used for solving the problems that in the process of learning programming of existing students, original compiled codes are not intuitive and intuitive teaching materials of artificial intelligence teaching are less, so that the students are difficult to get started andthe interest of the students is low. The system comprises a graphical programming module, a server, a database, a brain test module, a data acquisition module, a student login module, a user login module, a learning answer module and a programming collection module. According to the artificial intelligence teaching management system and the method based on the Baidu smart classroom provided by the invention, the students call an AI program by operating an integrated and encapsulated function block, so that the students have a more intuitive understanding of programming, so that the students learn AI programming in a relaxed and interesting environment; by ordering questions of the students and programs that are failed to be executed, teachers can answer the questions in a reasonable order; and teaching programs are collected and reasonably screened, teaching materials in teaching are enriched conveniently, and better teaching is provided for the students.

title: Ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence. The ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence comprises a controller, an identity confirmation unit, a display screen, an ancient poetry appreciation module, an ancient poetry translation module, a comparison module, a sound recording module, a communication module, a game module and a storage module. The ancient poetry teaching system based on artificial intelligence fulfills the individualized teaching aim by arrangedvoice identification module and face scanning module so as to fulfill the aim of regulating the teaching progress according to different progresses of each student, fulfills the aims of communicationand interaction among the students by electrical connection between the arranged communication module and the outside in a WIFI/3G/4G mode, and enables the students to remember ancient poetries in games by the arranged game module so as to increase interestingness of the students in the learning process, thereby fulfilling the aims of parsing the creation background of ancient poetries and creation styles of authors and having interestingness.

title: Motion teaching system based on AI visual perception technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a motion teaching system based on an AI visual perception technology, which belongs to the technical field of visual perception and comprises a course compiling and publishingsubsystem and a motion learning subsystem, and the course compiling and publishing subsystem comprises a demonstration action perception module, a course compiling module and a course publishing module. According to the invention, an AI visual perception technology is utilized, so that; facilities such as a sensor and a power supply worn on the body can be avoided; an action video of a demonstrator is analyzed and processed in advance; recording and calculating relative spatial positions, bending torsional pendulum angles and speeds of the limbs and each part of the related props; and then thesame analysis and processing are carried out on the real-time video of the action of the imitator, the analysis and processing are compared, the teaching rhythm and method are adjusted according to the comparison result, the teaching requirements and control commands of the imitator are monitored and responded, and the problems of no interactivity and no real-time evaluation of self-learning carried out through the video in the prior art are solved.

title: Modular artificial intelligence programing teaching aid
abstract_text: The invention relates to a modular artificial intelligence programing teaching aid, and belongs to the field of programming education. The teaching aid comprises hardware modules and a 3D creative design module, wherein the hardware modules comprise a resistor, an inductor, a nonpolar capacitor, an electrolytic capacitor, a cell, a button cell, a diode, a triode, a thermistor, a photosensor, a mechanical switch, an electromagnetic switch, a buzzer, a reed switch, an infrared transmission module, an infrared receiving module, an ultrasonic transmission module, an ultrasonic receiving module, aradar detection module, a loudspeaker, a servo motor, a motor, an LED, a Nixie tube, an LED display module and a PCB; the hardware modules are separated, and independently used; a welding spot and a welding pad of a relatively large size are embedded into a port of each module, and the two modules can be firmly connected by slightly bonding the welding pads with conductive double-faced adhesive tapes.
