Students only need to sequentially connect the modules needed by circuits according to different application occasions; and development on innovation capacities of the students is facilitated.

title: Classroom behavior detection method, system and device and storage medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU HISON COMPUTER TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom behavior detection method, system and device and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-processed image set, and preprocessing theimage set through a preset algorithm, so as to obtain a preset proportion of positive/negative sample images; performing feature extraction on the obtained positive/negative sample image to generate apositive/negative sample feature map; performing classification processing on the obtained positive/negative sample feature map to generate a positive/negative sample prediction box; and matching thepositive/negative sample prediction box in combination with the loss function and a preset real box set, and outputting a detection result after matching succeeds. Accurate identification of classroom behaviors is realized, the detection precision and timeliness of target behaviors are improved, dependence on hardware setting is reduced, the result is simple, a training set is easy to make, and further popularization and application of a target detection algorithm based on deep learning in the field of teaching are facilitated. The method can be widely applied to the technical field of computer vision processing.

title: Somatosensory interaction system based on 3D vision
applicants: FOSHAN INSTITUTE OF INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT TECH
abstract_text: The invention discloses a somatosensory interaction system based on 3D vision. The somatosensory interaction system comprises a main machine, a slave machine and a polished object. The main machine comprises a handheld polishing device, a 3D body sensing device, a control cabinet and a teaching device, wherein the handheld polishing device and the 3D body sensing device are connected with the control cabinet. The control cabinet controls the teaching device. The handheld polishing device is used for grinding the polished object, the 3D body sensing device collects human action information, anda machine vision system and a deep learning system are arranged in the control cabinet and used for carrying out optimization processing on information of the handheld grinding device and the 3D bodysensing device. The slave machine comprises a mechanical arm, the mechanical arm comprises a control system and a mechanical structure, and the control system receives and processes the information of the control cabinet and drives the mechanical mechanism to work. According to the somatosensory interaction system based on 3D vision, 3D reconstruction is carried out on a model through the handheld grinding device and the 3D body sensing device, the motion track is directly generated on the model, the teaching is simpler, and the safety and the health of workers are guaranteed.

title: AI interactive 3D courseware generation system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI interactive 3D courseware generation system, which comprises a database, and is characterized in that element information and courseware information are stored in the database; a courseware making program is executed through a computer, and execution and display of the courseware making program specifically comprise the following steps that (1) creating courseware; (2) importing a script; (3) building a scene; (4) performing courseware recording: starting to record content according to courseware content, recording is obtained by changing element information, andAR graph recognition and superposition and AI multilingual speech semantic recognition technologies can be superposed in the recording process; and (5) storing and playing. According to the system, ARgraph recognition and superposition and AI multilingual speech semantic recognition technologies are used; a teacher can promote situational deduction of teaching contents of courseware according toa small event, does not need to be more professional and brain-friendly on the animation technology level, does not need to focus on complex use logic steps of software, and can easily and quickly make high-quality 3D courseware.

title: Ultrasound-assisted muscle recognition method and system and auxiliary injection device
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of precision injection, and particularly relates to an ultrasound-assisted muscle recognition method and system and an auxiliary injection device. Good curative effects are achieved when creotoxin is applied to myodystony and other diseases, the method of applying creotoxin is currently one of the first choices to relieve muscle spasms such as stroke, cerebral palsy, brain trauma and spinal cord injury in the fields of neuromedicine and rehabilitation medicine. An ultrasound and myoelectric stimulated precise creotoxin treatment technology becomes ahot research direction for creotoxin treatment. Because muscle boundaries in ultrasound image are not clear, a high probability of injection errors still exists, and the contour of target muscle is marked by using an image recognition technology, so that the accuracy of injection can be effectively improved. The invention provides a constructing method for recognizing a muscle model through ultrasound, a deep learning model is trained by acquiring ultrasound images of muscles of known individuals to realize the recognition effects on muscle contours of unknown individuals, the accuracy of injection is improved, and the ultrasound-assisted muscle recognition method and system and the auxiliary injection device are of great significance in aspects of clinical treatment and teaching.

title: Matching method and device for online teaching resources, equipment and medium
applicants: BAIDU ONLINE NETWORK TECHNOLOGY BEIJING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online teaching resource matching method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. According to the specific implementation scheme, identifying and determining candidate training objects and candidate teaching objects according to watching history records of a user for multimedia content in the electronic equipment; pushingan online teaching matching request to the candidate training object and the candidate teaching object, and determining a formal training object and a formal teaching object according to a feedback result; and performing online teaching matching according to the attributes and states of the formal training object and the formal teaching object. According to the embodiment of the invention, the bidirectional screening of the user is carried out through the multimedia watching record of the user in the electronic equipment; the training object and the teaching object are determined and teachingmatching is performed so that the technical problem that online teaching resources are difficult to match with the required object can be overcome, and thus the technical effects of automatically matching the teaching resources for the training object and enhancing the resource matching efficiency and accuracy can be achieved.

title: AI+ digital campus construction scheme research
abstract_text: Along with rapid development of the Internet and continuous maturity of a human-computer interaction technology, a human body biological recognition technology and a VR technology, the technologies are embodied in science and technology, business, financial industry, intelligent field, education industry and the like, and a good foundation is laid for providing modern technical support and a new digitized campus pattern for digital campus construction. In order to build a more perfect education and teaching environment adapting to future development and a school management system adapting to future development, the invention proposes that an AI+ digital campus is built based on AI, man-machine interaction, VR, big data and the Internet of Things.

title: Winding condition generation device, winding device, winding defect level predicted value generation device, winding condition calculation method, winding method, and winding defect level predicted value generation method
abstract_text: Provided are a winding condition generation device, a winding device, a winding defect level predicted value generation device, a winding condition calculation method, a winding method, and a winding defect level predicted value generation method that enable formation of a winding condition that matches with an actual result. This winding condition generation device is provided with an input unit, an output unit, and a condition calculation unit, wherein: the condition calculation unit is provided with a learning model produced by machine learning using, as teaching data, a combination of a winding condition and a winding parameter used when a winding web satisfying a target winding quality is produced, and uses the learning model to calculate the winding condition of a new winding web from the winding parameter of the new winding web inputted from the input unit; and the output unit outputs the winding condition. The winding parameter includes the width of a web, the speed of conveying the web, and the winding length of the web. The winding condition includes the tension of the web at the time of start of winding of the web and the tension of the web at the time of end of winding of the web.

title: Artificial intelligence auto matching beauty service system
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence (AI) automatic matching beauty service system which provides a virtual make-up service if a customer inputs a face image, processes a reservation by matching the customer with a corresponding artist, and allows the artist to provide a visiting service so as to provide a beauty service by storing and managing satisfaction of the customer and a beauty service result of the artist as history information. By using the beauty service result, evaluation of the artist, an AI automatic matching service, a make-up teaching service including make-up practice, and make-up product curation can be provided.

title: Virtual Make-up Beauty Service System
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a virtual make-up beauty service system which provides a virtual make-up service if a customer inputs a face image, processes a reservation by matching the customer with a corresponding artist so as to allow the artist to provide a visiting service, thereby providing a beauty service by storing and managing satisfaction of the customer and a beauty service result of the artist as history information. By using the beauty service result, evaluation of the artist, an artificial intelligence (AI) automatic matching service, a make-up teaching service including make-up practice, and make-up product curation can be provided.

title: Makeup Beauty Service System
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a beauty service system. According to the present invention, the artist provides a beauty service by visiting a customer, and recording and managing customer satisfaction and a result of providing the beauty service. Therefore, by using the result of providing the beauty service, artist evaluation, a makeup teaching service including an AI automatic matching service and makeup practice, and makeup product curation can be provided.

title: Teaching enlightenment animation display device for artificial intelligence teaching
abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching enlightenment. The teaching enlightenment animation display device for artificial intelligence teaching comprises a display frame, side arms are fixedly connected to the left side and the right side of the display frame, a top cover plate is in threaded connection with the top of the display frame, a bottom cover plate is in threaded connection with the bottom of the display frame, and a mounting frame is fixedly connected to the top of the top cover plate. The rotary motor is controlled by the control device to output; driving a main drum to rotate, the main drum drives the driving gear to rotate; the driving geardrives the driven gear to rotate through the transmission gear; the driven gear drives the auxiliary winding drum, so that the main winding drum and the auxiliary winding drum rotate synchronously, the animation adhesive tape is driven to move at a high speed, a user can see coherent animations in the display window, the user can rotate manually through the fixing column, interest of children canbe improved conveniently, the animation adhesive tape can be replaced at any time, and the education range is wider.

title: English composition automatic marking method based on test paper
applicants: ANHUI SEPTNET EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic English composition marking method based on test paper, and relates to research and application of artificial intelligence (AI) related technologies in the field of education, in particular to teaching examination and personalized learning of students. The method comprises the following steps: analyzing an English composition by utilizing stanfordcorenlp and nltk, then performing feature extraction and classification sentence by sentence by adopting a machine learning algorithm XGBoost, and finally detecting grammar error points and some recommended expressions. The method has the advantages of helping to explore some grammatical errors existing in English compositions of students and the defects of the students in English expression so as to promote the improvement of the writing level of the students. The automatic marking process of the English composition mainly comprises the following steps: inputting the composition, automatically marking thecomposition, and generating a marking report. The method is reasonable in design, convenient to use and good in effect.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: An image processing device has an extraction unit that extracts image data by using a predetermined sliding window in an original image; a learning unit that generates a prediction model by performing machine learning on learning data including the image data by using a teaching signal representing classification of the image data; and a select unit that selects, out of other image data different from the image data, another image data in which an error in classification based on the prediction model is larger than a predetermined threshold and adds the selected another image data to the learning data, and the learning unit updates the prediction model by repeating the machine learning in the learning data in which the another image data is added.

title: Paper homework AI marking system based on printing and scanning all-in-one machine
applicants: WUHAN LEJIAZHI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a paper homework AI marking system based on a printing and scanning all-in-one machine, and the system comprises the printing and scanning all-in-one machine which consists ofa scanning module and a printing module, and the scanning module carries out the scanning of paper homework of a student, and converts the paper homework into a digital signal; the printing module isused for printing a personal job report, and the printing and scanning all-in-one machine is electrically connected with a cloud server through the communication module; and the cloud server is electrically connected with a display, a memory, an AI review and a teacher terminal. The printing and scanning all-in-one machine can scan any paper homework of students; after scanning, the homework is uploaded to a cloud server, AI automatic reviewing and manual intervention reviewing are carried out, and a homework learning situation report is generated and fed back to parents and teachers; based onthe wrong questions of the students, the wrong questions are automatically pushed to the students for personalized practice. In the whole process, parents participate in the process, and students arehelped to form good learning habits; a teacher can provide data support for teaching of major difficulties in class according to the homework learning situation report, and teaching efficiency of theteacher is improved and burden of the teacher is reduced.

title: Native language-level English learning system based on intelligent identification + virtual reality environment
abstract_text: The invention discloses a native language-level English learning system based on an intelligent identification + virtual reality environment. The native language-level English learning system comprises seven working modules of a central control unit, a native language-level scene activity module, a function operation module -V0, a digital equipment display, VR glasses, a sounder and a sound collector; through the function operation module -V0, a target instruction is input to the central control unit to intelligently regulate and control each unit module, so that students can efficiently interact and learn in the English native language level environment; the problem that the basic English, comprising oral English level is weak caused by absence of the English native language environment and the dummy type educational mode which not emphases language application can be solved; the single artificial intelligence teaching provided by the invention does not need a teacher to be accompanied, and the system is simple and interesting in operation; the native language-level interactive learning effect can be realized to the maximum extent; and the contextual role dialog, the role interchange and the super-strong segment repeat strengthening functions are achieved, so that English learning can be conducted in the native language level lively and practically, and the native language-level English application capability can be realized without going abroad.

title: Intelligent college preference recommendation system
applicants: SHANDONG YUNZHIYUAN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent college preference recommendation system which is characterized by comprising a database, a sampling editing module, a voluntary analysis module, an assignment recommendation module and a scheme matching module. In the present invention, the intelligent college preference recommendation system integrates college archiving lines and professional admission scores of provincial enrollment examination hospitals over the years, combines the integrated college archiving lines and professional admission scores with Professional Classification of People's Republic of China, is very clear in the structure of the scale, meanwhile, adopts an original artificial intelligence algorithm to combine data and college characteristics together, carries out key recommendation from the teaching level, regional economy, local influence, employment advantages and enrollment trend of colleges and universities, provides more scientific and accurate college entrance examination voluntary reporting plans for users authoritatively, safely and efficiently, obtains advantages and disadvantages of all voluntary recommendation schemes through analysis, helps the users to judge feasibility of the voluntary recommendation schemes, and independently displays the advantages and disadvantages of the voluntary recommendation schemes one by one.

title: Programming education robot
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a programming education robot, and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises a robot body and an education platform server. The output end of the control mainboard is in communication connection with a storage module, a man-machine interaction module, an LED display module, a face recognition module, a palm line collection module, a direct-current motor control module, an audio player, a communication module, a power management module and a sensor unit which are located in the robot body. The storage module is provided with a Bluetooth interface and a USB interface; the communication module is in communication connection with the education platform server. According to the utility model, the education robot is remotely updated and upgraded through the programming client, the sensor collects and processes the environment, the multiple identification modules authenticate the identity authority of a user, the USB interface and the Bluetooth interface of the storage module realize the transmission of teaching materials, and the teaching efficiency and the practicability of the education robot are improved.

title: CHIP RECOGNITION LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: This chip recognition learning system 10 is provided with: a game recording device 11 which records, as an image, a state of chips W stacked on a game table 4 by means of a camera 212; a chip determination device 12 which includes an artificial intelligence device 12a that analyzes the image of the recorded state of the chips W and determines the number and types of the chips W which are bet by aplayer C; and a teaching device 13 which teaches by inputting as teaching data, to the artificial intelligence device 12a, the image which is used for the determination by the chip determination device 12 and the number and types of chips W of a correct answer for an error, when it is determined that a determination result from the chip determination device 12 has the error.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide machine learning technology which can make a more accurate output estimation while using a random forest. [Solution] Provided is a machine learning device which uses a plurality of decision trees generated on the basis of a prescribed learning target data set, said machine learning device comprising: an input data acquisition unit which acquires prescribed input data; a decision tree output generation unit that generates decision tree outputs, which are the output from each of the decision trees, on the basis of the input data; and a parameter update unit which, on the basis of prescribed teaching data corresponding to at least the decision tree outputs and the input data, updates parameters of an output network that is connected to the output stage of each of the decision trees and that generates an estimated output.

title: Paper personalized homework arrangement and review system
applicants: WUHAN LEZHIJIA EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a paper personalized homework arrangement and reviewing system. The system comprises a modeling module, a homework arrangement module, a cloud server and a reviewing module, the modeling module comprises a teacher terminal, a teacher logs in through the teacher terminal, divides students into multiple levels according to the learning levels of the students, establishes different user models according to different levels, and arranges different question types under the same knowledge point to be distributed to the students at different levels through an AI algorithm. Theinvention relates to the technical field of teaching systems. The invention discloses a paper personalized homework arrangement and review system. The system can be divided into a plurality of levelsaccording to the learning conditions of students, can carry out homework arrangement according to different levels, can improve the pertinence of homework arrangement, improves the learning efficiency of students, can greatly improve the marking efficiency through AI marking, avoids the traditional teacher marking, saves the work time and intensity of teachers, and improves the teaching efficiency of teachers.

title: Online teaching student grouping method and device
applicants: SHANGHAI FUAN NETWORK INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online teaching student grouping method and device, and the method comprises a first process and a second process, and the first process comprises the steps: inputting the basic information of students; acquiring student comprehensive test information, and constructing student feature information to form a student archive database; and the second process comprises the steps of reading a student data set from the student archive database, pre-grouping based on the student basic information, re-grouping the student characteristic information, outputting a student grouping result, and carrying out teaching course arrangement by educational administration personnel according to the grouping result. According to the online teaching student grouping method and device based on the machine learning technology, compared with a method based on artificial experience, the student grouping speed can be increased, a group with better learning generality is formed, and thelearning effect of students in the same group is improved.

title: Training platform for artificial intelligence teaching
applicants: BEIJING BEIKE RONGZHI CLOUD COMPUTING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a training platform for artificial intelligence teaching. The training platform comprises a data storage layer module, a business logic layer module and an access layer module,wherein the data storage layer module is configured to provide a data query interface and a storage interface for the training platform for artificial intelligence teaching; the business logic layermodule is configured to adopt the data query interface and the storage interface provided by the data storage layer module to organize a business logic relationship of the artificial intelligence training platform and manage infrastructure resources, a training example life cycle, teaching courses and training courses; and the access layer module is configured to abstractly display high-level business data provided by the business logic layer module on a user graphic interface of the training platform and receive an operation instruction of a user through the user graphic interface so as to control each business through the graphic interface.

title: DEEP LEARNING IN BIPARTITE MEMRISTIVE NETWORKS
abstract_text: A bipartite memristive network and method of teaching such a network is described herein. In one example case, the memristive network can include a number of nanofibers, wherein each nanofiber comprises a metallic core and a memristive shell. The memristive network can also include a number of electrodes deposited upon the nanofibers. A first set of the number of electrodes can include input electrodes in the memristive network, and a second set of the number of electrodes can include output electrodes in the memristive network. The memristive network can be embodied as a bipartite memristivenetwork and trained according to the method of teaching described herein.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD, AND STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: Provided is an image processing device having an acquisition unit that acquires an image for learning used for machine learning; a target region setting unit that sets, to the image, a target region including a detection target; a detection region setting unit that sets, to the image, a detection region in which a teaching signal is required to be set; and a teaching signal setting unit that sets, to the detection region, a teaching signal that may take three or more values in accordance with a relevance between the detection region and the target region.

title: Big data-based volunteer filling intelligent planning system
applicants: SHANDONG YUNZHIYUAN EDUCATION TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data-based volunteer filling intelligent planning system. The system comprises a database, a sampling processing module, a volunteer planning module, an intelligent recommendation module and a list display module. In the present invention, according to the voluntary reporting intelligent planning system, college archive lines and professional admission scores of a provincial enrollment examination room over the years are integrated. The system is combined with Professional Classification of People's Republic of China. data and model fitting are almost perfect. Thestructure of the scale is very clear and completely conforms to theoretical model. Meanwhile, an original artificial intelligence algorithm is adopted so that data and college characteristics are combined. The college entrance examination voluntary reporting method and system provide more scientific and accurate college entrance examination voluntary reporting plans for users authoritatively, safely and efficiently, also avoid the conflict phenomenon of examinees during voluntary reporting, fundamentally avoid the dead archives of the examinees, and lay a foundation for voluntary reporting of the examinees.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching robot with tumbler structure design

abstract_text: The utility model relates to the technical field of teaching robots. The utility model relates to a teaching robot, in particular to an artificial intelligence teaching robot with tumbler structure design. Robot comprising robot body, the robot body is composed of a head part, a body part and a bearing part. The bearing part is in threaded connection with the body part; housing with semicircular bearing part, a heavy block is placed in the base; the inner wall of the body part is fixedly connected with a first supporting plate and a second supporting plate; the first supporting plate is provided with a stepping motor. An output shaft of the stepping motor is fixedly connected with one end of the screw rod; the lead screw is in clearance fit with a lead screw nut; the lead screw nut is in bolted connection with a push plate; the push plate is fixedly connected with supporting columns; the five-point supporting robot has the advantages that by means of the lead screw transmission principle, the supporting columns are pushed by the push plate to extend out of the bearing part, the bottommost end of the supporting block and the bottommost end of the bearing part are located on the samehorizontal plane, five-point supporting is achieved, the robot body can be stably placed on the bearing surface, and transportation is convenient.

title: Multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education
applicants: IFLYTEK SOUTH CHINA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE GUANGZHOU CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a multifunctional intelligent sound box for AI education, and the sound box comprises a housing, a display screen, and a loudspeaker. Wherein the display screen is embeddedin the outer wall of the shell, the number of the loudspeakers is two, the two loudspeakers are embedded in the outer wall of the shell and located on the two sides of the display screen respectively, foot pads are pasted to the bottom of the shell at equal intervals, rectangular tempered plates are arranged at the upper ends of the foot pads, and hemispherical rubber pads are arranged at the lower ends of the foot pads. According to the utility model, the intelligent sound box adopts the storage box with an embedded structure; the storage box can perform telescopic movement under the supportof the lifting rod; therefore, the storage box can be conveniently moved out of the shell; and the related teaching tools of the AI education are stored and processed through the storage plate, the phenomenon that the teaching tools of the AI education are lost is avoided, meanwhile, through cooperation with sealing protection of the sliding cover, the connecting insertion holes of the intelligent sound box can be sealed and protected, and then the use safety of the intelligent sound box is enhanced.

title: Classroom quality evaluation system and method based on deep learning target detection
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom quality evaluation system and method based on deep learning target detection, and the system comprises: a data obtaining module which is used for obtaining a real-time monitoring video stream of a classroom and a corresponding timestamp; a video preprocessing module that is used for preprocessing the real-time monitoring video stream; a detection and calculationmodule that is used for inputting a pre-trained video frame into the model according to the preprocessed real-time monitoring video stream so as to detect the attendance number and/or the head-up number of classroom monitoring video pictures; and a statistical evaluation module that is used for generating an evaluation result according to the attendance number and/or the head-up number. Accordingto the system, the deep learning target detection model is used for obtaining the real-time attendance condition and the head-up rate of a classroom; the multi-scale features are detected by using the feature pyramid to improve the detection effect, so that the good balance between the calculated amount and the accuracy is realized, the situation of the whole class can be counted, the teaching mode adjustment of teachers is facilitated, and the optimal teaching effect is realized.

title: ELECTRONIC MICROSCOPE AND EVALUATION METHOD
abstract_text: To provide an electronic microscope that is able to reduce unnecessary photographing.SOLUTION: An electronic microscope 100 for acquiring an electronic microscope image of a sample buried in a thin film formed in a hole by freezing a sample liquid on a support film provided with a plurality of holes, comprises: a learning unit 22 that performs machine learning using, as teaching data, data including: a learning hole image formed from an electronic microscope image of the support film as a learning target and including a hole and an area around the hole; and an evaluation value of a state of the thin film in the learning hole image; and that generates an evaluation model for evaluating the state of the thin film; and an evaluation unit 24 that forms, from the electronic microscope image of the support film serving as an evaluation target, a hole image for evaluation including the hole and the area around the hole and evaluates the state of the thin film in the hole image for evaluation by using the evaluation model.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: Teaching evaluation method and device, medium and electronic device
applicants: BEIJING BYTEDANCE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching evaluation method and device, a medium and an electronic device. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring a group of first teaching images of a teacher to be evaluated, which are acquired in sequence; sequentially inputting the first teaching images into a first network model with the optimized parameters, and obtaining an evaluation type of each first teaching image; and based on a preset evaluation rule and the evaluation type of each first teaching image, evaluating the group of first teaching images, and obtaining a teaching evaluation resultof the to-be-evaluated teacher. According to the embodiment of the invention, the first teaching images of the teacher to be evaluated is subjected to evaluation type classification by using a machinelearning model, and the evaluation result is obtained by analyzing the evaluation type, so that the evaluation objectivity is ensured. Meanwhile, the machine learning model is adopted, so that the evaluation type can be continuously adjusted and optimized according to the actual evaluation requirements, and the evaluation flexibility is improved.

title: Background data management system based on live broadcast teaching cloud
applicants: GEJU BUSINESS EDUCATION TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a background data management system based on live broadcast teaching cloud. The system comprises an AI emotion analysis module, an AI intelligent auditing module, an AI multi-language real-time subtitle module and an AI course shorthand module. And the AI emotion analysis module is used for identifying facial emotions and body characteristics of the students. And the AI intelligent auditing module is used for monitoring and auditing uncivilized and illegal information from massive big data samples and filtering the information. And the AI multilingual real-time subtitlemodule is used for carrying out live broadcast teaching on the whole world and projecting multilingual real-time subtitles on screens of various places in the live broadcast process. And the AI course shorthand module is used for recording teaching courses in the live broadcast teaching process. According to the system, cross-operator and cross-terminal high-quality and high-stability audio and video live broadcast can be performed in live broadcast interactive teaching, a real classroom is simulated, and the requirements of teacher-student interaction and life-student interaction are met.

title: College data increment management system based on block chain
abstract_text: The invention provides a college data increment governance system based on a block chain. The college data increment governance system comprises a data source, a data acquisition layer, a data governance layer, a data storage layer and a data analysis and retrieval layer, wherein the data source comprises but is not limited to service system data, teaching data, machine data and medical data; thedata acquisition layer acquires various data of a data source through an acquisition tool; a multi-source heterogeneous data normalization module of the data governance layer performs normalization conversion on various acquired data and stores the data in a data storage layer; the incremental auditing module carries out pre-auditing management on newly-added unaudited data, the data fingerprint module encrypts the audited data and extracts the data fingerprint of the data, and the authoritative data module generates a random public and private key pair, decrypts the audited data and verifiesthe data fingerprint. By implementing the method and the system, data privacy protection is realized by adopting asymmetric encryption and data fingerprints, intelligent visual management of the datais realized through interactive design, and deep learning is introduced to reduce manual participation degree and auditing workload.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching appliance applied to art field
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching aid applied to the art field. The teaching desk comprises a teaching desk body and movable plates. Connecting rods are arranged on the two sides of the teaching desk main body; a movable plate is arranged on one side; sliding positioning grooves are formed in the surfaces of the two sides of the movable plate; a video player is arranged on the surface of the movable plate; an upper glass plate is arranged on the upper end surface of the teaching desk main body; a plurality of fixing blocks are arranged on the surface of the upperglass plate; a sliding rod is arranged on one side of the fixed block; a plurality of sliding blocks are arranged on the surface of the sliding rod; a spring rope is arranged on one side of the sliding block; a drawing paper pressing plate is arranged on one side of the spring rope; an infrared sensor is arranged on the surface of one side of the teaching desk body, by arranging a voice player anda video player, teaching explanation can be carried out through the voice player and the video player, students can carry out financing understanding again through the voice player and the video player after listening to explanation of teachers, and the teaching quality is greatly improved.

title: Online education teaching intervention method
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, discloses an online education teaching intervention method, optimizes a core learning link of online education, and solves theproblems of poor learning experience and learning effect in online education. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, forming existing course learning data F-data through course learner data accumulation in a certain period; constructing and training a DNN score prediction model based on the effective features obtained by the feature engineering; and the trained stage score prediction model being used to predict scores of learners who newly join the course, and performing early warning on learners who potentially fail to complete the course. By matching the completed course learnerswhose personality characteristics and learning behaviors are most similar to those of the learners, the learning behavior difference between the learners is compared, the problems of the learners incourse learning are analyzed, and adaptive personalized teaching intervention strategies are designed and implemented. The method is suitable for online education.

title: Memory type laser pointer for campus teaching based on cloud server
applicants: HANGZHOU XHIPO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a memory type laser pointer for campus teaching based on a cloud server and belongs to computer peripheral equipment design and manufacturing technologies. According to the memory type laser pointer for campus teaching based on the cloud server, it can be realized that teaching staff can share the pointer equipped on a teaching computer, the pointer is usually inserted to the computer for wireless charging, and when in class, the pointer can be pulled down for use by unlocking with fingerprint, thereby facilitating the teaching staff to carry out classroom teaching without carrying the pointer and a U disk, such that not only can the security during use of the pointer be improved, but also an AI identification request is sent by using fingerprint identification so as to complete download and transmission of courseware from the cloud server; the teaching staff can directly access the pointer by using the computer, after the pointer is returned, a storage functioncan be selected to facilitate seamless joint of a lesson during next teaching, or by default, the courseware is automatically deleted to reduce the storage space and improve the confidentiality of the courseware information, and great convenience is provided for teaching of the teaching staff.

title: DISASTER STATE DETERMINATION SYSTEM AND DISASTER DETERMINATION FLIGHT SYSTEM
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide a disaster state determination system and a disaster determination flight system for determining in real time a disaster state from a disaster video after occurrence of a disaster. [Solution] A disaster state determination system 100 according to the present invention includes: a recording unit 110 that records teaching data 140 indicating an artificially generated disaster state; a deep learning unit 120 that learns the disaster state by using the teaching data 140 recorded in the recording unit 110; and a display unit 130 that, through determination of the disaster state of a disaster video 300 after occurrence of a disaster by the deep learning unit 120, displays disaster map data 240. A disaster determination flight system 700 includes the disaster state determination system 100, and a flying object 520 that has an imaging device 510 mounted thereon and that can transmit the disaster video.

title: Personalized driver training system and teaching method thereof
applicants: GUANGZHOU YINGZHUO ELECTRONIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a personalized driver training system and a teaching method thereof by utilizing an internet of things sensor, an image processing technology and an artificial intelligence technology. A driver label is imparted, and according to the label, a teaching plan is distributed; in the training process, a sensor and an image processing module in an edge calculation module in the personalized driver training system are used for carrying out position capturing of hands, eyes and the like of the driver, and reminding and guiding to correct unreasonable actions; a driver training record and a training track are uploaded to the cloud to analyze an appropriate and efficient teaching plan and optimize a benchmark teaching plan through a cloud end calculation module; the driver cancheck the training information of the driver from a student mobile phone terminal; the training record and the examination score of the driver can be checked from a coach mobile phone terminal; and the training can be commented each time, and the error statistics of the driver and the like can be checked. According to the system, the learning efficiency in driver training can be improved, the examination passing rate can be improved, and the teaching time can be shortened.

title: Artificial intelligence driverless course teaching aid
applicants: BEIJING QC MAKER EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching aids. The invention further discloses an artificial intelligence driverless course teaching aid that comprises an intelligent trolley body; a driving module, a camera and a battery are embedded and fixed on the intelligent trolley body; the intelligent trolley body uses a raspberry pi carrying a Linux system as a control center. A deep learning related algorithm image identification code is embedded in the intelligent trolley body; the driving module, the camera and the battery are connected with the Raspberry Piin the intelligent trolley body; an image recognition technology is embedded into the intelligent trolley; teachers can use the teaching aid to simulate a real unmanned scene; students are helped to understand the basic principle of a deep learning algorithm in image recognition; codes in the intelligent trolley simplify a large number of bottom layer codes, explanation is conducted according to functional modules, so teaching of teachers and understanding, application and use of modular program codes of students can be facilitated, map data collection, training and testing are achieved, and the intelligent driverless course teaching aid can automatically run along a map setting route.

title: Augmented reality intelligent teaching system based on 5G communication
applicants: GUANGZHOU AI DEA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an augmented reality intelligent teaching system based on 5G communication. Based on 5G network, data is transmitted so that advantages of high speed and no delay are acquired.Sound information and face image information of students are obtained through an information obtaining device. A preset artificial intelligence algorithm model can automatically determine the learning state of the students according to sound and the facial expressions of the students. An AR display device is controlled to display a three-dimensional figure model and a three-dimensional learning scene to push related learning contents to the students. Through the above technical scheme, the students can directly communicate with the three-dimensional animation model; high interest. Meanwhile,the AR scene experience is good. The students can have more excellent learning immersion. The learning efficiency of the students is improved while the interestingness is improved. In addition, the artificial intelligence algorithm model can enable the students to achieve a convenient and efficient learning effect, and the self-adaptive learning algorithm enables the artificial intelligence algorithm model to be continuously self-optimized along with training.

title: Teaching scene speaker conversion detection system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching scene speaker conversion detection system. The teaching scene speaker conversion detection system comprises a voice input module, a VAD module, a sound feature extraction module, a speaker recognition module and an output module. According to the detection system, the voice audio data in a classroom are processed through a voice signal processing and deep learning method, and are divided into audio sections of different speakers, so that the manpower and material resources and time for teaching evaluation and post-class review are saved; and an educational method is facilitated and optimized, and more reasonable learning materials are provided.

title: Desktop interactive learning device and system based on image recognition
applicants: SHENZHEN VISION TALK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a desktop interactive learning system based on image recognition. The desktop interactive learning system comprises a mobile terminal, a camera adapter and a supporting base, the bottom of the mobile terminal is placed in the first groove or the second groove of the supporting base, the top of the mobile terminal is placed in the groove of the camera adapter, the mobileterminal makes contact with the arc-shaped top of the groove, the mobile terminal is attached to the side wall of the groove, and a camera of the mobile terminal is opposite to the reflective mirrorin position. Through the reflective mirror, the camera of the vertically-placed mobile terminal can obtain an image on a desktop, image recognition or character recognition is carried out on the obtained image information, and the recognized information is played in a voice or screen display mode. The device can adapt to different types of mobile terminals, is good in universality, can obtain a desktop image through a front camera of the mobile terminal, carries out desktop interactive learning, and achieves desktop interactive teaching through artificial intelligence.

title: Campus management system and method
applicants: BEIJING H3C COMMUNICATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus management system and method, and the system comprises: an image collection device which collects the image information of a school person; a server which comprises anidentity recognition module which stores a trained first artificial intelligence model and carries out the recognition of the image information, and obtains the identity information of a school person;a behavior recognition module which is used for recognizing behavior data of the school personnel according to the image information and the identity information of the school personnel; a classification module which is used for storing the trained second artificial intelligence model and classifying the students in school by utilizing the identity information of the students in school and the behavior data of the students in school; and an output module which outputs a corresponding management strategy according to the classification result. By combining an artificial intelligence technology, the behavior data of the school personnel is truly, reliably, real-timely and efficiently acquired; student school conditions are classified through an artificial intelligence technology, data support is provided for teaching quality improvement and campus security, and a campus management strategy is reasonably and accurately formulated and implemented for school staffs.

title: Artificial intelligence aided teaching method in children programming education
applicants: BOHUI EDUCATION TECH SHANGHAI CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence aided teaching method in children programming education. The method mainly comprises the following steps: implementing the steps; S10, initializing asystem and generating AI auxiliary data AIData; S20, student behavior detection and marked data generation; S30, performing student behavior identification and AIInput data generation; S40, distributing AIInput data to each AI module and performing identification; and S50, performing data rationality judgment and completing auxiliary teaching; and S31, the guidance module decomposing the prompt data and the S51 learning interface control module performing instruction decomposition. According to the invention, students can carry out self-learning in an immersive environment, and the learning efficiency is improved. Through the auxiliary function of the AI teacher, the effect similar to online one-to-one live broadcast can be achieved by recording and broadcasting video courses. The problemof resource shortage of high-quality teachers is effectively relieved. The teaching radius of an offline teacher is effectively expanded. In combination with background big data learning, a prompt strategy which can be continuously learned and optimized is provided for the front-end AI module, an exclusive intelligent teaching assistant teacher is provided for each student, and then self-adaptiveteaching is achieved.

title: Multiplayer scenario education system based on virtual-reality and artificial intelligence technology
applicants: GUANGHE SPACE BEIJING TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention provides a multiplayer scenario education system based on virtual-reality and artificial intelligence technology. The system comprises a back-end server, a VR all-in-one machine and a stereo sound effect headphone; the VR all-in-one machine is connected with the back-end server and the stereo sound effect headphone; a VR application client is arranged in the VR all-in-one machine, the VR application client comprises an interaction scenario module and a course module; the course module comprises different series of course content; the interactive scenario moduleis used for performing scenario interaction on the course module by a teacher side and a student side. The virtual-reality technology and the artificial intelligent technology are combined with the advanced teaching conception through the system disclosed by the embodiment of the system, the multiplayer strong interaction experience is enhanced through the scenario education between the teacher and the student.

title: Novel peep-proof intelligent lifting experiment table
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel peep-proof intelligent lifting experiment table. The desk comprises a desk body structure, a lifting structure and a control structure, modern artificial intelligence technology, the client is connected with the motor controller through the wireless sensor; the motor controller controls the numerical control motor to enable the T-shaped screw to drive the lifting baffle to ascend and descend. Normally, the elevating baffle plate is in a hidden state to facilitate teaching of teachers. When the laboratory is in an examination state; the client sends an examination mode instruction; at the moment, the lifting baffle automatically rises, clicking'confirm 'when the examinee exits from the examination system; client issues regular mode instructions, at the moment, the lifting baffle automatically descends, so that the left, right and front sides of the experiment table are blocked, the examined students cannot peep the experiment operation behaviors of the left, right and front sides of the experiment table, the examination students are prevented from peeping and plagiarism, an operation instruction is output to mechanical hardware by a client in combination with an examination system, and the purpose of man-machine control is achieved.

title: Listening and reading training robot for English teaching based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN JUNDATONG OFFICE INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a listening and reading training robot for English teaching based on artificial intelligence; the listening and reading training robot comprises a host, a fixed plate, a cable, an earphone frame, a pronouncing mechanism and two sound listening mechanisms, wherein each sound listening mechanism comprises an earmuff, an air extraction assembly, a telescopic shell, a telescopic assembly, an earplug, a sliding rod and a plurality of keys; the pronouncing mechanism comprises a bracket, a fixed rod, a microphone, a shell, a filtering assembly and a disinfecting assembly; andthe disinfecting assembly comprises a cover plate, an ultraviolet lamp tube and a rotating assembly. According to the listening and reading training robot for English teaching based on artificial intelligence, air in the earmuff is extracted from the sound listening mechanisms, external noise is prevented from interfering hearing training of a user, and the wearing fastening degree of the earmuffis guaranteed; moreover, the filtering assembly in the pronouncing mechanism is used for preventing saliva of the user from spraying on the microphone; and the disinfecting assembly is used for sterilizing and disinfecting the filtering assembly, the cleaning of the pronouncing mechanism is guaranteed, and the user is convenient to use, so that the practicability of the equipment is improved.

title: Information processing device, information processing method, and computer-readable storage medium
abstract_text: Provided is an information processing device, comprising: an acquisition unit which acquires first teaching data which includes data and labels for target task learning, and second teaching data whichincludes data and labels for watermark detection; and a learning means which, on the basis of the first teaching data and the second teaching data, generates a model parameter which configures a machine learning model for detecting the target task and the watermark.

title: Deep learning in bipartite memristive networks
abstract_text: A bipartite memristive network and method of teaching such a network is described herein. In one example case, the memristive network can include a number of nanofibers, wherein each nanofiber comprises a metallic core and a memristive shell. The memristive network can also include a number of electrodes deposited upon the nanofibers. A first set of the number of electrodes can include input electrodes in the memristive network, and a second set of the number of electrodes can include output electrodes in the memristive network. The memristive network can be embodied as a bipartite memristive network and trained according to the method of teaching described herein.

title: Automatic teaching design operating system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic teaching design operating system, which comprises a parameter input module, an educational administration system, a teaching target acquisition module, a teachingstrategy acquisition module, a teaching scheme acquisition module, an output display module and a central processing unit for controlling and coordinating the work of all the parts. Through big data and an artificial intelligence technology, each module of teaching design is respectively built into a database, and the database is continuously expanded and updated in operation. The system can automatically generate a teaching design scheme according to teaching requirements of teachers, and performs correction according to different characteristics of learners and teachers to form a personalized optimal scheme. According to the system, the burden of teachers is reduced, the working efficiency is improved, and the product quality is ensured. In addition, in the process of applying the system, teachers are supported by the information technology, the latest knowledge and a problem solving method are learned from a large number of cases provided by the system, and the professional development of teachers is promoted.

title: Teaching interaction system based on gesture recognition
applicants: HANGZHOU XUELIANGSHOU NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching interaction systems, and further discloses a teaching interaction system based on gesture recognition. The system comprises a teaching system,a database, a server and user equipment. The output end of the teaching system is electrically connected with the input end of the database, the output end of the database is electrically connected with the input end of the server, the output end of the server is electrically connected with the input end of the teaching system, and the input end of the server is electrically connected with the output end of a power supply module. According to the teaching interaction system based on gesture recognition, students can be photographed through the image collector. Gesture extraction and recognition can be performed on student images of the image collector through the gesture recognizer. The extracted gestures can be processed through the AI processor, so that students can convert the gesturesinto signals, the feedback module feeds back the signals to the teaching system through the Internet, the students do not need to manually operate the controller, and feedback operation is facilitated.

title: Recommendation method based on artificial intelligence and related equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to keyword matching in the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a recommendation method based on artificial intelligence and related equipment, which areapplied to an electronic device comprising a touch display screen. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring teaching information of a target object; inputting the teaching information intoa teaching item recommendation model for processing, and outputting N target teaching items corresponding to the teaching information, the teaching item recommendation model being used for recommending at least one teaching item suitable for the target object, and N being an integer greater than or equal to 1; and displaying the N target teaching items on a touch display screen. By adopting the embodiment of the invention, the accuracy and efficiency of educational project recommendation can be improved.

title: Interaction method based on real objects and gestures and computer equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides an interaction method based on a real object and a gesture. The interaction method comprises the steps that S1, a picture containing the gesture and the real object is acquiredthrough a camera; S2, a first gesture in the picture and a real object associated with the gesture are recognized through a deep learning algorithm; and S3, the next instruction is executed accordingto the identification result. The invention further provides computer equipment capable of executing the method. According to the method, while the gesture is recognized, a real object associated withthe gesture also needs to be recognized, and a corresponding instruction is executed according to a recognition result; and a voice instruction and a further gesture action can be combined to executea more complex instruction. The method can be widely applied to the fields of machine teaching, business demonstration, VR/AR, robots and the like, the operation is very convenient and efficient, andthe user experience is greatly improved.

title: IMAGING DEVICE AND INSPECTION SYSTEM USING IMAGING DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide an inspection system for using an imaging device and determining whether or not an inspection object has a defect.SOLUTION: Provided is an inspection system comprising a conveyance path for conveying an inspection object and defect determination means for determining whether or not the conveyed inspection object has a defect, in which the defect determination means includes: a detection sensor for detecting the inspection object in the conveyance path; first imaging means for imaging the inspection object on the basis of detection by the detection sensor; second imaging means for imaging the inspection object from a second imaging direction different from a first imaging direction; third image generation means for associating the first and the second images and generating an omnidirectional image of the inspection object as a third image; and an artificial intelligence program for determining from the third image whether or not the inspection object has a defect on the basis of a learned model having been taught by machine learning using learning data generated by defect criterion data for teaching an inspection object model image of the inspection object where a defect exists that a defect exists in the inspection object.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: Legal intelligence credit business: a business operation mode of artificial intelligence + legal affairs + business affairs
abstract_text: The present invention discloses a business operation mode based on artificial-intelligence+legal-affairs+business-affairs. AI is the empowerment, legal-affairs' main-body, business-affairs' framework. AI characteristics lie-in two-learning or two-experts, including Internet-of-human, Internet-of-things, Internet-of-intelligence; applying AI computer-program to control or improve business-quality. AI+legal-affairs innovation lies-in new-brain or new-procedures, using contract to authorize AI's basic-role in judicial-affairs. Identification or adjudication is made by deep-learning and reinforcement-learning, both priorities accept. Experts separately verify evidence or fact, video-trial, mediate then arbitrate. Expert-database complements expert-system each-other, explains algorithm, and promotes reconciliation. Financial-experts control credit-limit and perform-contract through guarantee insurance. AI+legal-affairs+business-affairs characteristics lie-in two-lines or two-supports, applying AI to verify the credit of excellent business-subjects or business-quality, and control to improve business-process. To improve business-quality, focuses are on AI-health, AI-teaching, AI-traffic, or other public-services.

title: Artificial intelligence system-IT hardware project teaching innovation experiment application platform
applicants: SHENZHEN SIDAO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence system-IT hardware project teaching innovation experiment application platform. The desk comprises a first supporting column, a second supportingcolumn and a desk body, movable grooves are formed in inner cavities of the first supporting column and the second supporting column, a motor is fixedly connected to the bottom of an inner cavity ofeach movable groove, a threaded rod is fixedly connected to an output shaft of each motor, and a supporting rod is slidably connected to an inner cavity of each movable groove. According to the utility model, the motor is started; the threaded rod can be driven to rotate; under the limiting action of the sliding groove and the pulley, the supporting rod is rotated; the threaded rod can drive the supporting rod to adjust the height; the electric push rod is started, so that the projector and the sound box can extend out of the desk body during video teaching, teaching of teachers can be facilitated, through the arrangement of the storage battery, constraint of a power line can be avoided, and the practicability of the desk is improved.

title: Multi-person interactive teaching display method based on augmented reality and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of interactive teaching, and particularly relates to a multi-person interactive teaching display method based on augmented reality and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of outputting data by a Ki device on a K1 sub-system via interactive control of Ki or outputting data by a Ki audio output unit via a voice recognition engine on anS1 device, and processing data by an AI engine in an S1 main system in combination with all data in a problem data module, a teaching plan data module, a user data component, a basic data module anda recognizable image module existing in an S1 database; forming self-defined answer data, score data, self-defined recognizable images and self-defined problem data corresponding to the Ki device; andstoring the data into the S1 database. The teaching content can be more vivid and interesting, the immersion experience is achieved, and the real-time interaction of multiple poles such as teachers,students and supervisors and multiple terminals also can be achieved.

title: Blockly and Raspberry Pi-based online graphical programming system and usage method thereof
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of programming teaching in middle and primary schools, and relates to artificial intelligence and maker teaching, in particular to a Blockly and Raspberry Pi-based online graphical programming system and a usage method thereof. The invention discloses a Blockly and Raspberry Pi-based online graphical programming system and a usage method thereof. The system comprises a Raspberry Pi development board, an external electronic device, a display device, a power supply module, a cloud server, a Blockly-based online graphical programming platform and a client program installed on the Raspberry Pi. According to the method, the traditional programming can be simplified into a graphic block splicing process, an extra PC is not needed, only one Raspberry Pi development board, necessary input and output equipment and an external electronic equipment unit are needed, and the programming threshold and cost are greatly reduced.

title: Intonation evaluation method based on Deep Conventional Neural Network DCNN and CTC algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intonation evaluation method based on a Deep Conventional Neural Network DCNN and a CTC algorithm. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, a deep learning networkmodel is trained; secondly, recognition of notes in audio data is tested; thirdly, recognition of pitch in the audio data is tested; and fourthly, recognition of rhythm in the audio data is tested. According to the method in the invention, the notes in a test melody are recognized and segmented through the deep learning method, then, the feature information of the pitch and duration of each noteis extracted for each segmented note, and the feature information is compared and analyzed with a standard audio band so as to give an evaluation result and achieve the purpose of music teaching; andmeanwhile, a visual mark of the image is given, so that a relatively reliable and comprehensive intonation evaluation solution can be provided for effective development of music basic teaching, and the audio quality is evaluated.

title: Virtual simulation system for insulation test of electrical device based on multi-person collaboration
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual simulation system for an insulation test of an electrical device based on multi-person collaboration. The system includes: a server functional module, used for establishing a transmission control protocol (TCP)/ user datagram protocol (UDP) data transfer protocol and a socket communication protocol by using a local area network mode to ensure real-time connectionand response of data; an artificial intelligence (AI) management module, used for selecting a test project and the number of persons in a test, managing the test project and the number of persons in the test, and analyzing a test result; a simulation training module, used for establishing simulation training and simulation assessment of an insulation test of the electrical device by simulating anenvironment of the electrical test and a test process; and a data security module, used for encrypting transfer of data by using an asymmetric encryption method, so as to reduce data delay and data errors caused by data perturbation. The system solves the technical problem that a simulation test of an electrical device, which often emphasizes teaching and simulation of a test process and is different from a test operated by multiple persons in practice to a certain extent, is a conventional teaching mode, and other technical problems.

title: Informationized multimedia classroom
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an informatization multimedia classroom which comprises a classroom wall body, a desk and a first sound box, the first sound box is arranged on the inner side of the classroom wall body, the desk is arranged on one side of the first sound box, a seat is arranged on one side of the desk, and a computer is arranged on the upper side of the desk. Beneficial effects are that: the method is suitable for large-scale production; according to the utility model, the AI voice control box, the button, the microphone, the processor, the storage battery, the infrared remote controller and the infrared receiving head are arranged; according to the multimedia teaching system, the multimedia equipment can be controlled by teachers through voice, the teaching requirements of theteachers are met, the multimedia teaching end is in network connection wirelessly through the arranged wireless network transmitter, the consumption of network cables is reduced, and the input cost of a classroom is reduced.

title: Teacher teaching quality evaluation system based on student learning harvest
abstract_text: A teacher teaching quality evaluation system based on student learning harvest comprises a theoretical module used for carding and constructing a theoretical model of correlation between student learning participation degree and harvest degree and teacher teaching quality so as to form a student teaching evaluation theoretical framework related to teacher teaching quality evaluation; an executionmodule which is used for determining specific content corresponding to the theoretical framework according to the theoretical framework; a correction module which is used for calibrating and correcting the theoretical framework by an expert group consisting of higher education experts, efficient management personnel, efficient teachers and efficient students; an empirical module which is used forproviding empirical support for the theoretical framework; a reference module which is used for compiling a teaching quality evaluation use manual of higher education teachers; a network module whichis used for uploading the theoretical framework to a network and automatically and randomly generating an evaluation tool by utilizing computer artificial intelligence. A mode of combining theories and evidences is adopted, and based on the learning participation degree of students, reliable evaluation of courses and teaching quality is realized.

title: INDUSTRIAL FIELD PRODUCTION MANAGEMENT SYSTEM THROUGH VISUALIZATION AND ANALYSIS OF DATA INTERLOCKED TO CYBER PHYSICAL SYSTEM
abstract_text: The present invention relates to an industrial field production management system through visualization and analysis of data linked to a digital virtual field. The industrial field production management system compares a pseudo image, generated by teaching artificial intelligence a visual image generated by using data which are collected on the basis of location and time and created by a plan through desktop analysis in a digital virtual field implemented by a computer, with a visual industrial field monitoring data image generated by using all industrial field monitoring data which are obtained at any time in an actual industrial field, determines that there is an abnormal event when a difference between both images is higher than or equal to an arbitrarily set level so as to reproduce information on process delay, quality deterioration, and accident risk by reflecting quantitative values in risk information classified according to types of risks and the classification of degrees of the risks for an industrial field where the abnormal event is found, performs risk recalculation and process analysis based on the reproduced information on process delay, quality deterioration, and accident risk and reflects the results in the digital virtual field, and teaches artificial intelligence the performed risk recalculation and process analysis to be applied to other cases in any similar fields.

title: Limb training method, device and equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: Embodiments of the invention provide a limb training method, device and equipment and a storage medium; the method comprises the following steps that a training project of a user is obtained, an artificial intelligence AI virtual coach corresponding to the training project is obtained, and the AI virtual coach is used for guiding the limb actions of the user; the limb actions of the user are acquired according to a camera on terminal equipment; and limb action training is carried out on the user according to the AI virtual coach and the limb actions of the user. Therefore, the limb training method provided by the embodiments of the invention is applied to the teaching and training scenes of limb actions, and the cost is greatly lowered.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS A chip recognition system (10) in which a chip (W) is configured to at least partially have a specific color (121) indicative of a value of the chip (W) includes: a recording device (11) that uses a camera (212) and records a state of the chip (W) as an image; an image analysis device (14) that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color (121) and a reference color (4a) that is present in the image and differs from the specific color (121); and a recognition device (12) at least including an artificial intelligence device (12a) that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device (14) and specifies the specific color (121) of the chip (W), wherein the artificial intelligence device (12a) of the recognition device (12) has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip (W) and the reference color (121) irradiated with different illumination intensities. Fig. 1

title: PATTERN EDGE DETECTION METHOD
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a pattern edge detection method which is applicable to a semiconductor inspection device for carrying out a pattern inspection using pattern design data. This method involves: generating an image of a pattern; detecting an edge of the pattern in the image on the basis of a reference pattern generated from pattern design data; repeating the generation of the image of the pattern and the detection of the edge of the pattern in the image and creating candidate teaching data formed from a plurality of images and a plurality of corresponding pattern edges; determining the teaching data by excluding, from the candidate teaching data, pattern edges which satisfy a predetermined disqualification condition and the images corresponding thereto; using the teaching data to generate an edge detection model by machine learning; generating an image of another pattern; and using the edge detection model to detect an edge of the other pattern in the image.

title: WINDING CONDITION GENERATION DEVICE, WINDING DEVICE, WINDING DEFECT LEVEL PREDICTED VALUE GENERATION DEVICE, WINDING CONDITION CALCULATION METHOD, WINDING METHOD, AND WINDING DEFECT LEVEL PREDICTED VALUE GENERATION METHOD
abstract_text: Provided are a winding condition generation device, a winding device, a winding defect level predicted value generation device, a winding condition calculation method, a winding method, and a winding defect level predicted value generation method that enable formation of a winding condition that matches with an actual result.
