This winding condition generation device is provided with an input unit, an output unit, and a condition calculation unit, wherein: the condition calculation unit is provided with a learning model produced by machine learning using, as teaching data, a combination of a winding condition and a winding parameter used when a winding web satisfying a target winding quality is produced, and uses the learning model to calculate the winding condition of a new winding web from the winding parameter of the new winding web inputted from the input unit; and the output unit outputs the winding condition. The winding parameter includes the width of a web, the speed of conveying the web, and the winding length of the web. The winding condition includes the tension of the web at the time of start of winding of the web and the tension of the web at the time of end of winding of the web.

title: Robot system and robot control method
abstract_text: A robot system (1) comprises a robot (10), an image acquisition unit (21), an image prediction unit (22), and a movement control unit (24). The image acquisition unit (21) acquires a current image, which is an image captured by a robot camera (31) disposed so as to move with an end effector (13). The image prediction unit (22) performs processing to predict a next image, which is the image that the robot camera (31) should capture next, on the basis of the current image and a teaching image model that is constructed by performing machine learning wherein a teaching image is the image that the robot camera (31) is expected to capture when an adjustment action is performed by a mobile unit (12). The movement control unit (24) calculates a command value for moving the mobile unit (12) so the image captured by the robot camera (31) approximates the next image and controls the mobile unit (12) on the basis of the command value.

title: Artificial intelligence autonomous operation system of teaching assistant robot
applicants: HEFEI ALATIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence autonomous operation system of a teaching assistant robot. The artificial intelligence autonomous operation system comprises a lesson preparation PGCplatform, a deep learning engine special for lesson preparation, a robot autonomous operation and voice control module, a child learning result module and a dialogue learning engine; the lesson preparation PGC platform is used for lesson preparation and inputting the class content, the deep learning engine special for lesson preparation is used for learning the data content input by the lesson preparation PGC platform, the dialogue learning engine is used for interacting the data content input by the lesson preparation PGC platform, the robot autonomous operation and voice control module can operate the robot through voice control at any interface, the robot conducts the corresponding action, and child learning result evaluating is used for evaluating the learning situation of students. The artificial intelligence autonomous operation system assists teachers, thus the lesson preparation time before the class is shortened by 60%, the richness of the content in the class is increased by50%, the work amount after the class is reduced by 60%, thus the individual student is concerned, complete data of 360-degree individual learning situation map is achieved, individual development analysis is achieved, and the teachers are liberated.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system based on Bayesian model and artificial intelligence teaching data processing method based on Bayesian model
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching system based on a Bayesian model and an artificial intelligence teaching data processing method based on a Bayesian model. The artificial intelligence teaching system comprises a database, a screening module, an updating module, a calculating module and an archiving module, wherein the database is used for reading question-doing records of the students and forming and storing sequences of knowledge points; the screening module is used for extracting the sequence with the highest question-doing record accuracy rate/the average value ofa plurality of sequences with the highest accuracy rate from the database module; the updating module is used for inputting question-doing records in the past 24 hours into the EP model every 24 hours, updating BKT parameters of knowledge points corresponding to questions and storing the BKT parameters into a database; the calculating module is used for calling the stop _ Poly model, taking out BKT parameters corresponding to the knowledge points from the database, and calculating mastery values of the knowledge points based on the BKT parameters and historical question records of the knowledge points; and the archiving module is used for recording the mastered value. According to the invention, the training time can be shortened, and the question-doing amount is reduced, and the question-doing efficiency is improved, and the teaching strategy is optimized.

title: Wearable system and teaching method applied to same
abstract_text: The invention provides a wearable system and a teaching method applied to the same. According to artificial intelligence glasses, through dynamic automatic focusing of a mixed reality function, real object positioning of a teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory on a knife and pen acting object is achieved, and thus an operator follows the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory to conduct imitating learning; and wearable gloves synchronously operate together with the artificial intelligence glasses to control the knife and pen action of the operator and the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory to be in focusing coincidence and keep consistent in speed so as to guide the operator to follow the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory to conduct imitating learning. The operator is assisted in learning through the artificial intelligence glasses and the wearable gloves, and thus the learning efficiency of the operator is improved.

title: Intelligent English test paper score recognition and input method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence teaching, and relates to an intelligent English test paper score recognition and input method. The method comprises the following steps: 1) accurately extracting a candidate area containing test paper scores from a collected test paper graph; 2) extracting a plurality of straight lines from the candidate area, and forming a rectangular frame by crossing the plurality of straight lines to form a score area on the test paper; 3) establishing an accurate mapping relation between the collection device and the test paper image; 4) automatically segmenting the handwritten numbers in the outer contour of the test paper score from the candidate region according to the image registration result, and extracting a plurality of sub-regions only containing the handwritten numbers; 5) accurately identifying the handwritten numbers from the extracted sub-regions, summarizing and analyzing the handwritten numbers, and recording the handwritten numbers into the computer according to a specific sequence The method is simple in device, and can improve the recording efficiency, reduce the burden of teachers, reduce the manual recording errors, and save time and labor.

title: INDOOR AEROBIC EXERCISE DEVICE AND EXERCISE SYSTEM
abstract_text: To provide an indoor aerobic exercise device that has a data analysis function, is not bored by a changing scenery in the execution in the interior of a room, and can expect form improvement.SOLUTION: An indoor aerobic exercise device includes: a sensor 100; a photographing device 20; an input device 9 for inputting self-evaluation data of a user; a learning unit for making machine learning of exercise data, exterior appearance data, self-evaluation data; a display control unit for controlling reproduction and/or expansion/reduction of an outside video; and a recognition unit for performing various processing. A numerical model using at least the exercise data as teaching data and performing the machine learning of the teaching data is used for determination of the evaluation result of the current run being the result of the user's run. The reproduction of the outside video synchronizes the reproduction speed of the outside video with the traveling speed of the user on the basis of the photographing speed of the outside video analyzed from the GPS data of the outside video, and thereby the expansion and reduction of the outside video can be made.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Upper limb exoskeleton mechanical arm and control method of rehabilitation training
abstract_text: The invention discloses an upper limb exoskeleton mechanical arm and a control method of rehabilitation training, and the rehabilitation training is guided by medical staff and self-adaptive to patient limbs. According to the invention, the movement trajectory of rehabilitation training is recorded by a teaching mode, patient exercise intensity is identified by a deep learning framework, the identified results are embedded into an overall rehabilitation training control strategy based on deep reinforcement learning, and the adjusted joint movement rate signals are output to the mechanical arm to complete the rehabilitation training. On the premise of preventing secondary injuries of patients from the rehabilitation training, the method can eliminate the influence of hysteretic nature of movement signals and individual differences of bioelectric signals, improve the identification accuracy of exercise intensity and broaden the application area of rehabilitation movement trajectory by the vector fusion of movement signals and biological signals, so as to achieve advantages of reducing the burden of medical staff and optimizing the rehabilitation cycle of patients, thus improving the safety and applicability of the rehabilitation training.

title: Video intelligent analysis system based on deep learning
applicants: NANJING MUZE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video analysis system based on artificial intelligence. The video analysis system comprises a camera, a sound pickup, a video processing module, an audio amplification module, a voice processing module, an expression/behavior analysis module and a cloud server module. The video intelligent analysis system based on deep learning can track students and teachers in a classroom in real time, can judge the real-time emotion through the action miraculous voice of teachers and students, and can provide evaluation indexes or judgment basis for users, wherein the evaluation indexes or judgment basis can be used for emotion analysis, can be taken as the evaluation index of a classroom evaluation system in education by judging the emotion of a person by tracking the action of the person in a video. In the aspect of education, education workers can evaluate the teaching quality of teachers in a certain class according to the feedback result of the video, and can also analyze the emotions of the teachers, the emotions of the students and whether the students are distracted or not in the video so as to comprehensively evaluate the teaching quality of the teachers.

title: CLASSROOM ASSISTANCE SYSTEM
abstract_text: System's and methods involving machine learning functionality in a classroom setting are described to aid a teacher in certain teaching and administrative tasks. The classroom assistance system involves member devices used by students and at least one moderator device used by a teacher and may further involve an administrator device used by an administrator and a server. The member devices may display media content, The moderator device may include: an image/audio input device and may execute machine learning engines running machine learning models that generate results indicative of student behavior, student comprehension and the appropriateness of media content. The teacher, using the moderator device, may provide feedback regarding the results. The member device may generate more than one type of result and one result may provide feedback with respect to the other result. Feedback may he used to train the machine learning model and generate Improved models.

title: LABEL-COLLECTING DEVICE, LABEL COLLECTION METHOD, AND LABEL-COLLECTING PROGRAM
abstract_text: This label-collecting device is provided with an acquisition unit for acquiring teaching labels for teaching data used in machine learning, a learning processing unit for executing the machine learning of a model on the basis of the teaching data that includes the acquired teaching labels, an accuracy detection unit for detecting the accuracy of the model, and a presentation processing unit for presenting the accuracy. The acquisition unit acquires updated teaching data.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning. Fig. 3

title: Wearable system and teaching method applied to wearable system
abstract_text: The invention provides a wearable system and a teaching method applied to the wearable system. The real-time teaching demonstration based on picture-in-picture is achieved by a display module according to teaching audio and video data, the physical positioning of the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory on an object under the action of a knife and a pen is achieved by artificial intelligenceglasses through the dynamic automatic focusing of the mixed reality function, and thus an operator follow the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory to copy and learn. A wearable glove controls theknife and the pen action of the operator to be focused and coincide with the teaching demonstration dynamic trajectory and keeps the same speed, and thus the operator is guided to follow the teachingdemonstration dynamic trajectory to copy and learn. The operator is assisted in learning through the display module, the artificial intelligence glasses and the wearable glove, and the learning efficiency of the operator is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching experimental box and experimental manipulation method and device thereof
applicants: SHANGHAI SIYIXUAN ROBOT TECH CO LTD SIBOT
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching experimental box and an experimental manipulation method and device thereof. The experimental box specifically comprises a box body, a plurality of sensor modules, an audio module, a display module and a control receiving module, wherein the sensor modules, the audio module, the display module and the control receiving module are arrangedon the box body. The sensor modules are used for receiving touch commands of users; the audio module is used for outputting voice according to the touch commands; the display module is used for outputting images according to the touch commands; and the control receiving module is used for receiving data, programs or information input by the users through external equipment. In artificial intelligence teaching activities, students can input corresponding instructions through the sensor modules, and can observe feedback information intuitively from the audio module and the display module, thusteaching aids capable of practicing can be provided for artificial intelligence teaching, and in this way, colleges and universities can rely on the teaching aids in artificial intelligence teaching to achieve all-around training of students.

title: Video editing method and system for artificial intelligence education based on speech recognition
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a video editing method for artificial intelligence education based on speech recognition. The method comprises the following steps: (1) inputting a teaching document and converting the teaching document into a script file which can be recognized by a system; (2) inputting an original teaching video material file, identifying an audio frame contained in the original teachingvideo material file, and identifying a target audio frame of which the voiceprint satisfies a preset condition; (3) comparing the video file subjected to voice recognition with a script file, and determining a video clip which does not conform to the teaching document and contains a target audio; (4) finding out and automatically deleting video clips which do not conform to the teaching documentin the video file subjected to voice recognition; (5) automatically rendering video clips including audio conforming to the teaching document, and synthesizing the video clips into a complete video; and (6) outputting the synthesized complete video. The invention also discloses a video editing system for artificial intelligence education based on speech recognition.

title: INSPECTION DEVICE
abstract_text: It is an object of the invention to provide an inspection device that can inhibit a reduction in the accuracy of inspections of goods that include plural articles that sometimes overlap each other. An X-ray inspection device (10) irradiates, with radiation, goods (G) containing plural articles (A) having a predetermined shape and inspects the goods (G) on the basis of inspection images obtained from radiation that has passed through the goods (G) or radiation that has reflected off the goods (G). The X-ray inspection device (10) includes a storage component (51), a learning component (52c), and an inspection component (52d). The storage component (51) stores, as teaching images, at least the inspection images of the goods (G) that are in a state in which the plural articles (A) overlap each other. The learning component (52c) acquires, by machine learning using the teaching images stored in the storage component (51), features relating to the goods (G) that are in a state in which the plural articles (A) overlap each other. The inspection component (52d) inspects the goods (G) using the features that the learning component (52c) has acquired.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DYNAMIC ROBOT CONFIGURATION FOR ENHANCED DIGITAL EXPERIENCES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for configuring an animatronic device. Information is received about performance of a user exhibited in a dialogue between the user and an animatronic device which conducts the dialogue with the user in accordance with a configuration. The effectiveness of the configuration with respect to the user is assessed based on the information about the performance of the user and is used for machine learning at least one model, which is then used to adjust the configuration to generate an updated configuration for the animatronic device to use to continue the dialogue.

title: Video teaching method based on artificial intelligence, and related equipment
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a video teaching method based on artificial intelligence, and related equipment. The video teaching method comprises the steps: creating an action type ID and an articulation point type ID, and enabling the action type ID to be associated with the articulation point type ID; generating an articulation point standard action track and storing the articulation point standard action track in a database; obtaining a real-time articulation point action track and an action type ID corresponding to the real-time articulationpoint action track; and querying an articulation point standard action track in the database according to the action type ID, comparing the real-time articulation point action track with the articulation point standard action track, and sending prompt information according to a comparison result. For the video teaching method based on artificial intelligence, standard actions are input through videos and compared with the input real-time practice actions of students, and prompts are given, so that the action accuracy of the students is improved, and the practice efficiency is improved.

title: Class concentration recognition method based on face detection
abstract_text: The invention provides a class concentration recognition method based on face detection in the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps of establishing a data storage area ; intercepting a video frame picture according to a fixed sampling rate; detecting basic coordinate information of human faces in an intercepted frame picture; detecting the coordinate of each face feature point in each frame of picture, calculating the distance of each person feature point, calculating the distance of basic feature points of each student, calculating the offset between the distance of the feature points and the distance of the basic feature points, carrying out data fitting on the offset of the distance of the feature points, analyzing the lecture listening state ofeach person, and jointly analyzing the lecture listening state of multiple persons; effectively identifying the class concentration degree of the students in the video, identifying the listening stateof the students in the class and acquiring the distribution condition of the class concentration degree of the students. The method provided by the invention can help teachers to adjust the listeningstates of students according to the concentration degree distribution conditions of the students, construct a more scientific teaching system, and set more reasonable teaching schemes, thereby improving the classroom concentration degree of the students.

title: Internet precision education tutoring system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an internet precision education tutoring system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The system comprises a teacher client, a student client, a parent client, an education manager client and a server. The teacher client, the student client, the parent client and the education manager client are connected with the server. School teaching and management are assistedbased on big data analysis and an artificial intelligence technology so that the education burden of teachers, society and education managers in three aspects is reduced. By establishing a digital resource library and careful knowledge graphs, learning conditions of students are accurately collected, and personalized tutoring plans of the students are formulated in an assisted manner. By establishing an interest stimulation module and a personalized evaluation system, the learning achievement and exploration spirit of students are stimulated. According to the invention, a four-in-one system of'school + teacher + student + parent 'is established in combination with the Internet, and the functions of real-time communication, mutual communication and self-promotion are realized.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DYNAMIC ROBOT CONFIGURATION FOR ENHANCED DIGITAL EXPERIENCES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for configuring an animatronic device. Information is received about performance of a user exhibited in a dialogue between the user and an animatronic device which conducts the dialogue with the user in accordance with a configuration. The effectiveness of the configuration with respect to the user is assessed based on the information about the performance of the user and is used for machine learning at least one model, which is then used to adjust the configuration to generate an updated configuration for the animatronic device to use to continue the dialogue.

title: Adaptive education method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an adaptive education system based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a control center, a teacher end and student ends, and also comprises an evaluation unit which is used for evaluating the learning stages of students, a learning evaluation unit used for evaluating the learning progress conditions of the students, a learning path customization unit used for formulating personalized learning schemes according to different learning progresses of the students and a knowledge storage unit used for storing knowledge covering the whole education knowledge system. The control center is connected with the teacher end, the student ends, the evaluation unit, the learning evaluation unit, the learning path customization unit and the knowledge storage unit separately. The invention further provides an adaptive education method based on the artificial intelligence. According to the present invention, the teaching aid can automatically adapt to the learning conditions of the students and dynamically adjust teaching according to the learning conditions, so that the personalized education taking the students as the centers is really realized, and the customized education idea of the Confucius is truly realized.

title: ADAPTIVE TEACHING SYSTEM FOR GENERATING GAMIFIED TRAINING CONTENT AND INTEGRATING MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: An improved system and method for generating gamified training content using multimodal human-machine interfaces controlled by an adaptive backend training system. Such a system can include a gamification engine working in conjunction with a machine learning engine for adaptively updating or restructuring database elements by analyzing existing data and applying external training data. Training content can thus be progressively optimized for various users, groups, and training contexts as the system adapts.

title: Chip recognition learning system
abstract_text: This chip recognition learning system 10 is provided with: a game recording device 11 which records, as an image, a state of chips W stacked on a game table 4 by means of a camera 212; a chip determination device 12 which includes an artificial intelligence device 12a that analyzes the image of the recorded state of the chips W and determines the number and types of the chips W which are bet by a player C; and a teaching device 13 which teaches by inputting as teaching data, to the artificial intelligence device 12a, the image which is used for the determination by the chip determination device 12 and the number and types of chips W of a correct answer for an error, when it is determined that a determination result from the chip determination device 12 has the error.

title: Multimedia teaching material editing method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of teaching, and discloses a multimedia teaching material editing method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method includes: setting an editing requirement according to a teaching outline of a preset teaching stage, selecting a main text from alternative texts according to the editing requirement, matching knowledge point explanation courseware andpost-class exercises for the main text, and storing the main text, the matched knowledge point explanation courseware and the post-class exercises. According to the embodiment of the invention, a multimedia teaching material meeting teaching requirements can be quickly edited with high quality.

title: Power transformation equipment overhaul simulation training method
applicants: HAINAN POWER TRANS AND DISTRIBUTION MAINTENANCE BRANCH OF HAINAN POWER GRID CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a power transformation equipment overhaul simulation training method. The method comprises the following operation steps of performing data collection by aiming at power transformation equipment; building a three-dimensional simulation training model by utilizing a mode based on a BIM (Building information model); performing power transformation equipment overhaul video integration, information teaching course integration and AI evaluation model integration in the three-dimensional simulation training model; executing multimedia training display, teaching interaction and AI evaluation operation according to the three-dimensional simulation training model. The power transformation equipment overhaul simulation training method can truly show detail multimedia information of power transformation equipment overhaul, can enhance the mastering of skills of overhaul personnel, can improve operation levels, and can improve power network safety operation.

title: Intelligent question and answer-based Chinese oral training method and system for foreigners
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent question and answer-based Chinese oral training method and system for foreigners. The method comprises the steps of collecting oral Chinese training question andanswer pairs from Chinese oral teaching materials for the foreigners, the Internet and other data sources; generating a training question and answer pair by a machine by adopting a question generation algorithm; summarizing corpora, and constructing a knowledge graph according to the corpora; receiving a natural language question input by a user, performing vector expression on the question through neural network deep learning, and performing semantic association with an expression vector of the knowledge graph; and selecting an appropriate answer through correlation analysis and outputting the answer. The Chinese oral training method and system for the foreigners realize the functions of intelligent dialogue, knowledge base, skill service and the like, and can be used as an intelligent auxiliary tool for Chinese oral teaching for the foreigners.

title: Experience system for realizing tourism teaching practice through VR technology
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an experience system for realizing tourism teaching practice through a VR technology. The experience system comprises a virtual reality practice scene module, an artificial intelligence resource support module, a virtual reality interaction module and a real-time dynamic image acquisition module. According to the invention, basic requirements of various tourism scenes whichare required by practical teaching and are close to reality can be met; the time and money cost of a practical link are reduced; education quality improvement, the resources can be intelligently pushed in a targeted manner according to the teaching target of the class in the classroom and the personalized teaching style of the teacher; the interactive operation link in the teaching practice is exercised to the maximum extent; teaching and student learning effect score feedback and how to improve teaching and learning suggestions and other data are obtained in time; the learning efficiency ofthe students is improved, the lesson preparation cost of the teachers is reduced, knowledge questions and answers in the vertical field based on the loudspeaker boxes are achieved, questions of the students and the teachers can be correctly fed back in time, the teachers can achieve a better teaching effect, the students can better improve the learning effect, and the market technical blank is filled.

title: Interactive dialogue generation method, editor, interactive dialogue system, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a teaching interactive dialogue generation method, an AI teaching content editor, a teaching interactive dialogue system, equipment and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining teaching content displayed by an AI teaching content editing interface; determining an interactive dialogue node of the teaching content; obtaining a teaching question edited for the interactive dialogue node and at least one answer type corresponding to the teaching question; and adding the teaching question and at least one answer type corresponding to the teaching question to the interactive dialogue node, so that a teaching interactive dialogue is generated at the interactive dialogue node. According to the embodiment of the invention, the teaching interactive dialogue can be simply and conveniently inserted into the teaching content, so that students can perform interactive learning by utilizing the education robot.

title: Voice interaction generation method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a voice teaching interaction generation method and device, equipment and a medium and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of acquiring teaching content displayed in an AI content editing interface; determining teaching interaction voice and click-and-read voice of the teaching content on the basis of anAI interaction strategy; determining a click-and-read area of the click-and-read voice in the teaching content to achieve a click-and-read function for a user in a process of playing the click-and-read voice; determining an electronic blackboard writing area of the teaching interaction voice in the teaching content, and generating electronic blackboard writing content in the electronic blackboardwriting area to assist in teaching through electronic blackboard writing in a process of playing the teaching interaction voice. By means of the voice teaching interaction generation method and device, the equipment and the medium, an electronic blackboard writing function and the electronic click-and-read function which are matched with the teaching content are shown in real time, and the participation degree and learning interest of students are increased.

title: Classroom teaching quality evaluation method and device and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a classroom teaching quality evaluation method and device, computer equipment and a storable medium, and relates to the technical field of deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a classroom video and a course completion amount corresponding to the current course of a teacher; analyzing the classroom video to obtain attention information and activeness information of the student, and performing calculating to obtain teaching efficiency of the teacher; converting the attention information into attention values; and respectively obtaining correspondingfirst teaching effects from a pre-constructed first teaching effect library, and performing analyzing to obtain the teaching effect of the current course. Attention information and activeness information of each student in class are obtained by analyzing the class video, the teaching efficiency of the teacher is obtained, and the teaching effect of the teacher in the current course is obtained after comprehensive analysis. The method has a unified evaluation standard in the evaluation process and is automatically completed by the system, so that the evaluation efficiency, fairness and comprehensiveness of the teaching effect can be effectively improved, and a large amount of manpower resources are saved.

title: Artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system
applicants: GUANGZHOU AI DEA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence self-adaptive interactive teaching system. Sound information and face image information of students are obtained through the front-end information obtaining module. A preset artificial intelligence algorithm model can automatically determine the learning state of a student according to voice and facial expressions of the student. A display moduleis controlled to display the three-dimensional character model so as to push related learning contents to students or feed back the students in real time. Through the technical scheme, students do notneed to carry out tedious information input through a traditional human-computer interaction tool, learning feedback only needs to be performed through voice, and the artificial intelligence algorithm model can determine the learning content of the student according to the learning state and other information of the student, so that the student achieves a convenient and efficient learning effect,and the self-adaptive learning algorithm also enables the artificial intelligence algorithm model to be continuously self-optimized along with training, thereby achieving a better learning effect.

title: Method for reminding teacher of changing classroom teaching speed
applicants: SHAOGUAN QIZHI INF TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for reminding a teacher of changing the classroom teaching speed. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a preset number of classroom speed expectation training data; training a teaching speed suggestion model according to the classroom speed expectation training data; predicting the classroom speed expectation of each student in the online teaching classroomaccording to the teaching speed suggestion model in a preset teaching time period; presenting attribute data, learning state data and classroom speed expectations of all students in the online teaching classroom in a client of a teacher. The method and the system are based on the machine learning technology and are combined with various student learning data condition display methods, and finallya better classroom teaching speed suggestion result is obtained.

title: Artificial intelligence K12 education learning content management system
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence K12 education learning content management system. The system is suitable for future artificial intelligence K12 education learning content management/storage/big data analysis. The system effectively solves the problems that a traditional learning content system is too single in content and cannot realize multidisciplinary and multidisciplinary coexistence. According to the system, through splitting of Items (learning content), Leaning Point (learning point) and Taxonomy (learning attribute), test questions can be effectively split into a plurality of modules and combined into test question learning content. Meanwhile, a user-friendly operation interaction interface is provided, the difficulty of inputting learning contents by teachers canbe effectively reduced, the teachers are helped to quickly complete teaching and research tasks, and meanwhile, learning efficiency can be improved and knowledge point vulnerabilities can be found for the students when learning contents are provided for the students, so that the purpose of integrating is achieved. Therefore, the learning burden of students is reduced.

title: Video interaction content generation method and device, equipment and medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a video interaction content generation method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises: importing teaching video materials to be edited into an AI content editing interface, and playing the teaching video materials; displaying an interactive teaching image intercepted from the teaching video material in an AI content editing interface as a teaching interactive node; in response to an editing operation acting on the teaching interaction node, determining interaction content of the teaching interaction node; and sending the teaching interaction node included in the teaching video material and the interaction content of the teaching interaction node to the interaction device so as to indicate the interaction device to generate a teaching video including the interaction content. According to the embodiment of the invention, the intercepted interactive teaching image is taken as the teaching interactive node, the editing operation of the teaching interactive node is responded, the interactive content is determined. Finally, the interactive device is indicated to generate the teaching video comprising the interactive content, so that the technical effect of adding the interactive content to the teaching video is realized.

title: Picture book interaction content generation method, editor, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses a picture book interaction content generation method, aneditor, electronic equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises: importing a teaching picturebook material to be edited into an AI content editing interface; responding to an editing operation acting on any picture book picture in the teaching picture book material, and taking the picture book picture as a teaching interaction node; determining interactive content of the teaching interactive node; and generating the teaching picture book material comprising the interactive content according to the teaching interactive node included in the teaching picture book material and the interactive content of the teaching interactive node. According to the embodiment of the invention, the teaching picture book material comprising the interactive content is generated, so that interactive learning can be carried out by utilizing the teaching picture book material, and the learning efficiencyof a user is improved.

title: Personalized artificial intelligence driving training system and method based on historical data modeling
abstract_text: The invention provides a personalized artificial intelligence training system and method based on historical data modeling. The method comprises the following steps of: acquiring training informationthrough data exchange with an external system; acquiring student basic information in training information, carrying out characteristic model modeling on the student basic information, and carrying out basic classification on students to be trained by utilizing the characteristic model; acquiring student training information in the training information, carrying out capability model modeling on the student training information, and carrying out driving capability classification on the students to be trained by using the capability model; recommending a personalized training plan based on the basic classification categories and the driving ability classification categories to which the students to be trained belong. By adopting data exchange and modeling classification, personalized training teaching plans are provided for the students, and personalized driving training practice is implemented through a vehicle-mounted terminal, so that the defects of a prior driver training robot are overcome.

title: Energy-saving artificial-intelligence online educational terminal
abstract_text: The invention discloses an energy-saving artificial-intelligence online educational terminal. The online educational terminal comprises a transverse plate control switch, a load-bearing barrel fixed block, feeding barrel high-fiber molecules, a motor scanning camera and an air-pump second storage groove. The middle of one end of a vertical plate is provided with a display screen, the display screen and the vertical plate mutually cooperate to form an on-the-spot video teaching structure, the middle of the top of one end of the vertical plate is provided with the camera, the camera and the display screen cooperate mutually to form a video structure, the two ends of the bottom of the vertical plate are provided with rotating rods, and the bottom of the vertical plate is provided with an installation cavity through the rotating rods. According to the online educational terminal, one end of the top in the installation cavity is provided with an electric heating sheet, the top of the installation cavity of the top of the electric heating sheet is provided with a vertical distance inductor, the output end of the vertical distance inductor is electrically connected with the input end of the control switch, the device can prevent the myopia problem of a user, and the versatility of the device can be enhanced.

title: Multi-angle artificial-intelligence online education terminal
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-angle artificial-intelligence online education terminal. The terminal comprises a displayer, a box, fans, a base and a micro air conditioner. Universal wheels are arranged at the four corners of the bottom of the base, the box is arranged at the top of the base, and the fans are arranged at the two sides of the box; a control panel is installed at one side of the box, a single chip microcomputer is installed in the control panel, and the displayer is arranged at the top of the box; a camera is arranged at the top in the displayer, a wireless signal receiving andtransmission module is arranged at one side in the displayer, and temperature sensors are arranged at the bottoms of the two sides in the box. According to the terminal, by arranging a driving motor,when teaching displaying needs to be conducted at multiple angles, the driving motor can be started, so that the displayer rotates by any angle, multi-angle teaching displaying is achieved, people donot need to walk back and forth, the terminal is more convenient to use, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence online education terminal with memory function
applicants: GANSU PUGONGYING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence online education terminal with a memory function. The artificial intelligence online education terminal comprises a circuit board, a box body, a liquid crystal display and a protection shell. Fixing shells are welded to the two sides of the inner bottom end of the box body respectively. Lead screws are rotationally arranged at the top ends of thefixing shells respectively. A rotating plate is installed on the edge of one side of a connecting rod. A handle is installed on one side of the rotating plate. A thread cylinder is fixed to the outerside of each lead screw. By installing a camera, a microphone, a video processing module and an audio processing module, the terminal module has the memory function; the education content of a teacheris recorded through the camera and the microphone, processed through the video processing module and the audio processing module and then stored in a storage module; when the teacher give a lesson for the next time, the last part of the content taught by the teacher in the last lesson can be directly located, the teacher can know the teaching progress in time, and the teaching work can be betterconducted.

title: Personalized autonomous teaching course system
applicants: DARK MATTER HONG KONG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LIMITED
abstract_text: The invention discloses a personalized autonomous teaching course system. The system comprises a teacher terminal which is used for making teaching materials and designing an autonomous teaching method and a teaching process based on education And-Or-Graph structure-EAOG; a student terminal used for completing scene rendering and displaying and collecting and uploading voice and visual interactioninformation; a scene design terminal used for designing and developing a teaching scene; and a cloud server used for storing teaching materials and teaching scene animations, storing and calling a teaching method, and performing AI service and instruction service. Teaching process and teaching method control and personalized teaching target realization are independently carried out according to the current learning state of the learner and various teacher teaching targets, and the advantages of the novel teaching technology are fully exerted.

title: Method and device and equipment for generating grasping trajectory of mechanical arm and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and device and equipment for generating the grasping trajectory of a mechanical arm and a computer readable storage medium. The method comprises the steps that the weight of the primary function of a motion model is determined according to the teaching trajectory information, the target image is obtained through a depth camera to be input into the Mask R-CNN network to determine the starting point and target point, and the grasping trajectory is generated through the motion model. In this way, by means of the method, the weight of the primary function of the motion model is the same as the teaching trajectory, therefore, the grasping trajectory is similar to the teaching trajectory in shape so to achieve the purpose of trajectory learning, through the detection method Mask R-CNN based on deep learning, the target in the image is effectively identified and positioned, object grasping of the mechanical arm is made to be more intelligent, the visual perception is combined with a dynamic motion primitive framework to give the vision to the motion model, and the better interaction with the outside environment in the mechanical arm teaching trajectory learning and grasping trajectory planning aspects is achieved.

title: IMAGE CREATION DEVICE
abstract_text: This image creation device is for creating an image obtained by removing a bone part from an X-ray image of an area which includes a bone part of a subject, the image creating device comprising a control unit 71 constituted from: a DRR image creation unit 81 that creates a first DRR image of the area which includes the bone part and a second DRR image indicating the bone part by performing a virtual perspective projection that simulates geometric fluoroscopic conditions of an X-ray irradiation unit and an X-ray detection unit that target the subject, such projection performed on CT image data of the area which includes the bone part of the subject; a learning unit 82 that learns a learning model for recognizing the bone part by executing machine learning using the first DRR image and, as a teaching image, the second DRR image; an image creation unit 83 that creates an image representing the bone part by performing a conversion, using the learned learning model learned by the learning unit 82, on the X-ray image of the area which includes the bone part of the subject; and a bone part subtraction unit 84 that subtracts the image representing the bone part from the X-ray image of the area which includes the bone part of the subject.

title: DETERMINING GAS LEAK FLOW RATE IN A WELLBORE ENVIRONMENT
abstract_text: An estimated gas leak flow rate can be determined using a teaching set of concentration profiles, a regression model implemented by a machine-learning subsystem, and a subset of attributes measured within an environment. The teaching set of concentration profiles can include gas flow rates associated with relevant attributes. The regression model can be transformed into a gas leak flow regression model via the machine-learning subsystem using the teaching set. The subset of attributes measured within the environment can be applied to the gas leak flow regression model to determine other attributes absent from the subset of attributes and an estimated gas flow rate for the environment. A gas leak attenuation action can be performed in response to the estimated gas flow rate.

title: ROBOT SYSTEM AND ROBOT CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: To provide a robot system capable of reducing time and labor for a program regarding teaching of a robot operation and flexibly coping with an environmental change.SOLUTION: A robot system 1 includes: a robot 10; an image acquisition section 21; an image prediction section 22; and an operation control section 24. The image acquisition section 21 acquires a present image to be an image captured by a robot camera 31 arranged to move together with an end effector 13. The image prediction section 22 performs processing for predicting a next image to be an image that the robot camera 31 should capture next on the basis of a teaching video model constructed by machine learning by defining a video which is predicted to be captured by the robot camera 31 as a teaching video when performing an adjusting operation by a movable section 12 and the present image. The operation control section 24 calculates a command value for operating the movable section 12 so that the image captured by the robot camera 31 approaches the next image and controls the movable section 12 on the basis of the command value.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Intelligent teaching result obtaining method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent teaching result obtaining method based on artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the following steps: employing a server, setting a first database based on the type of a school, and carrying out the classification processing of the interior of the first database according to the type of the school; uploading the teaching data, and dividing the teaching data according to actual conditions to obtain a second database; and the first user registering and inputting the first user data to obtain first target data. A first database is set by taking aschool as a unit, type setting is performed on the classification of the first database. Through uploading teaching data of the school to the first database for use and division, first target data andsecond target data are established. The learning condition of the second target data is screened through the first target data, and a teaching result is obtained. Use of schools of different types ismet, and the applicability of the intelligent teaching result obtaining method of artificial intelligence is improved.

title: Method for generating optimal training set in machine learning inverse process
applicants: CETC KEDA BIG DATA RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
CHINA ELECT TECH CYBER SECURITY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for generating an optimal training set in a machine learning inverse process. The machine learning inverse process is also called machine teaching, namely a learning target of a model is given, the training set is solved, and the invention belongs to the technical field of machine learning. The method comprises the following steps: setting a teacher model, generating sample points, and optimizing the sample points. According to the method, a teacher hopes to achieve a better teaching effect under the condition that the data modification degree is as small as possible. According to the method, a strategy for generating the teacher is defined from the two aspects of the data modification degree and the teaching effect, and a trade-off parameter is introduced,the teacher can integrate the teaching effect and the data modification degree through the parameter, and the flexibility of the strategy is guaranteed.

title: Tactile feedback type training system used for body training
abstract_text: The invention relates to a tactile feedback type training system used for body training. The system comprises a plurality of tactile feedback devices, a second communication module, a central controller, a first communication module, a remote control terminal and artificial intelligence software, wherein the plurality of tactile feedback devices are arranged on training clothes of a trainee, and are used for sending out vibrating or electronic stimulating signals to the trainee; the second communication module is connected with the tactile feedback devices; the central controller is connectedwith the second communication module, and is used for sending tactile feedback control signals; the first communication module is connected with the central controller; the remote control terminal isconnected with the first communication module, and is used for sending out control signals to the tactile feedback devices through the first communication module and receiving sensor data sent by thetactile feedback devices; and the artificial intelligence software is connected with the central controller and is used for sending out control signals to the tactile feedback devices and receiving and processing the sensor data sent by the tactile feedback devices. The tactile feedback type training system used for body training is used for realizing tactile reminding on the trainee during remotecourses or training, remote teaching can be carried out through the internet, and the coach-free intelligent training also can be realized through the artificial intelligence software.

title: Complex dynamic gesture recognition method based on Leap Motion
abstract_text: The invention relates to a complex dynamic gesture recognition method based on Leap Motion, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and man-machine interaction. According to the method, static gesture recognition and continuous track recognition are used for complex dynamic gesture recognition, hand information in the teaching process of a user is captured through a somatosensory sensor, a support vector machine and a feature vector extraction mode based on learning are adopted for static gesture learning, and static gestures in the teaching process are all marked as instruction states. For the static gesture in the instruction state, information of the vertex of the distal bone of each finger and the central point of the palm is extracted and continuous dynamic track information is generated for learning. The complex dynamic gesture frame is decomposed by frame, and the instruction is identified after judging whether the complex dynamic gesture is the instruction gesture.According to the method, the accuracy of dynamic gesture recognition is greatly improved, the requirement for the complexity of dynamic gestures is lowered, and the man-machine interaction process ismore friendly and more natural on the basis of the visual acquisition equipment.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system realizing repeated learning
applicants: SHANGHAI YIXUE EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching system realizing the repeated learning. The artificial intelligence teaching system comprises an interaction module, a question bank module,a teaching module, a composition module, a detection module, a judgment module, a revision module and a pushing module. The interaction module is used for realizing user remote interaction; the question bank module is used for storing test questions; the teaching module is used for storing teaching materials; the composition module is used for storing a knowledge point map; the detection module is used for calling test questions and outputting the test questions to the interaction module; the judgment module is used for judging whether the knowledge points are grasped or are not grasped; therevision module is connected with the composition module and is used for deleting the knowledge points which are judged to be mastered from the composition module; and the pushing module is used for circularly reading the knowledge points along the knowledge point map, calling the corresponding teaching materials and outputting the teaching materials to the interaction module. According to the present invention, the knowledge points needing to be repeatedly learned can be deleted according to the personal ability and answer feedback of students, it is guaranteed that during the repeated learning process, the students concentrate the time to learn the knowledge points which are not mastered yet, and the learning efficiency is improved.

title: On-line education interaction system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an on-line education interaction system based on artificial intelligence. The on-line education interaction system based on artificial intelligence comprises an interaction platform and an AR device, wherein the interaction platform and the AR device are connected through the internet, the interaction platform is connected with an expert system, a computer-assisted teachingsystem and an intelligent teaching system, the computer-assisted teaching system comprises a CAI module, and the interaction platform comprises a biological monitoring module, a data collecting module, a data processing module and a data analysis and showing module. According to the system, through the AR device, a user can directly log in the interaction platform for learning, the operation is convenient, meanwhile, by adopting the biological monitoring module technology, the emotion of students in study can be known, thus the teaching method and strategy are adjusted timely, the teaching method is timely changed for striving to arouse the interest of the students, by adopting the man-machine communication and interaction mode caring emotion, a more real and more individualized learningenvironment is created for the students, and finally, the interest and efficiency of the learners are improved.

title: Wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal
applicants: GANSU DANDELION INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal. The wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal comprises a limiting frame, a single chip microcomputer, a display screen, a main framework and heat dissipation fans, wherein the two heat dissipation fans are embedded on one side of the inside of the main framework, a mounting groove is arranged in the other side of the inside of the main framework, LED light-supplementing lamps distributed at equal intervals are mounted on the inner side wall of the mounting groove, a display screen isfixed inside the position, on one side of the LED light-supplementing lamps, of the mounting groove, the limiting frame is mounted at the position, on the outer side of the display screen, of the edge of the main framework, a wireless receiver is embedded on one side of the bottom of the limiting frame, a voice player is fixed to the other side of the bottom of the limiting frame, a high-definition camera is mounted at the central position of the top of the limiting frame, and illumination sensors are fixed at the positions, on two sides of the high-definition camera, of the tops of the limiting frame. With the wall-mounted artificial intelligence online education terminal, the work environment of the online education terminal is improved, the teaching effect of the online education terminal is improved, and meanwhile, the accidental falling of the online education terminal is avoided.

title: Humanoid robot gait balance model building method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a humanoid robot gait planning method combining human teaching with robot learning, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and robot control. Human teaching and the support vector regression learning algorithm are combined and applied to gait planning of a humanoid robot, a humanoid robot gait balance generalization model is built based on the support vector regression algorithm, the joint angle and ZMP information of a human body when walking action is completed are input into the gait balance generalization model, and the joint angle subjected to stability compensation can be directly obtained. Parameters of a WOA optimization model are quoted so that the optimal generalization effect of the model can be obtained, and the performance of the gait balance model is improved. The NAO humanoid robot can be driven to complete stable walking action through the joint angle obtained through the gait balance generalization model. According to the humanoidrobot gait planning method, the complexity of the humanoid robot gait imitation algorithm is reduced, the real-time performance is improved, and in addition, the stability and personification of walking action of the humanoid robot are maintained.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR LEARNING PREFERENCES IN DIALOGUE PERSONALIZATION
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for user machine dialogue. Historic dialogue data related to past dialogues are accessed and used to learn, via machine learning, expected utilities. During a dialogue involving a user and a machine agent, a representation of a shared mindset between the user and the agent is obtained to characterize the current state of the dialogue, which is then used to update the expected utilities. Continuous expected utility functions are then generated based on the updated expected utilities, wherein the continuous expected utility functions are to be used in determining how to conduct a dialogue with a user.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE DRIVEN AUTOMATED COMPANION
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for an automated dialogue companion. Multimodal input data associated with a user engaged in a dialogue of a certain topic in a dialogue scene are first received and used to extract features representing a state of the user and relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A current state of the dialogue characterizing the context of the dialogue is generated based on the state of the user and the relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A response communication for the user is determined based on a dialogue tree corresponding to the dialogue of the certain topic, the current state of the dialogue, and utilities learned based on historic dialogue data and the current state of the dialogue.

title: System and Method for Artificial Intelligence Driven Automated Companion
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for an automated dialogue companion. Multimodal input data associated with a user engaged in a dialogue of a certain topic in a dialogue scene are first received and used to extract features representing a state of the user and relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A current state of the dialogue characterizing the context of the dialogue is generated based on the state of the user and the relevant information associated with the dialogue scene. A response communication for the user is determined based on a dialogue tree corresponding to the dialogue of the certain topic, the current state of the dialogue, and utilities learned based on historic dialogue data and the current state of the dialogue.

title: System and Method for Learning Preferences in Dialogue Personalization
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementations for user machine dialogue. Historic dialogue data related to past dialogues are accessed and used to learn, via machine learning, expected utilities. During a dialogue involving a user and a machine agent, a representation of a shared mindset between the user and the agent is obtained to characterize the current state of the dialogue, which is then used to update the expected utilities. Continuous expected utility functions are then generated based on the updated expected utilities, wherein the continuous expected utility functions are to be used in determining how to conduct a dialogue with a user.

title: Multifunctional liquid crystal all-in-one machine based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI BLUNT INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the field of education equipment and discloses a multifunctional liquid crystal all-in-one machine based on artificial intelligence. The multifunctional liquid crystal all-in-one machine comprises a multifunctional liquid crystal all-in-one machine body and exhibition stand supports. A liquid crystal display screen is arranged on the front end face of the multifunctional liquid crystal all-in-one machine body. A control remote controller and a teaching remote controller are arranged on one side of the liquid crystal display screen, a recording and broadcasting remote controller and a real object exhibition stand are arranged on the other side of the liquid crystal display screen, a recording and broadcasting camera is arranged on the upper side of the liquid crystal display screen, and the two sides of the liquid crystal display screen are each provided with a loudspeaker. The exhibition stand support comprises a lower supporting plate, a connecting vertical plate and a movable clamping plate, the lower supporting plate is perpendicularly and fixedly connected with the connecting vertical plate, a first blocking strip and a second blocking strip are arranged on the lower supporting plate, and the movable clamping plate is connected with the connecting vertical plate through a first connecting bolt. The teaching aid is simple in structure, convenientto install and convenient for centralized teaching; meanwhile, the teaching mode is expanded, and the teaching quality is improved.

title: An artificial intelligence expert system based on a knowledge management system and a construction method thereof
applicants: XIAMEN WUCHANGSHI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence expert system based on a knowledge management system and a construction method thereof. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining teachingmaterial information, question and answer information and user behavior information through the knowledge management system; carrying out Data structuring processing on the teaching material information, and constructing a knowledge graph according to the obtained structured data; Obtaining first association information according to questions and matched answers in the question and answer information, and updating the first association information to the knowledge graph; According to the user behavior information and the structured data in the knowledge graph corresponding to the user behavior, performing mining to obtain second associated information, and updating the second associated information into the knowledge graph. Therefore, online education content is directly used as a knowledge input source, and the knowledge acquisition cost is reduced. And more implicit knowledge is further mined according to the knowledge class information and the behavior class information of online education, so that the information breadth and the information depth of the knowledge graph are improved.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ENSEMBLE VEHICLE CONTROL PREDICTION IN AUTONOMOUS DRIVING VEHICLES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementation of human- like vehicle control for an autonomous vehicle. Recorded human driving data are first received, which include vehicle state data, vehicle control data, and environment data. For each piece of recorded human driving data, a vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal is generated in accordance with a vehicle kinematic model based on a corresponding vehicle state and vehicle control data of the piece of recorded human driving data. A human-like vehicle control model is obtained, via machine learning, based on the recorded human driving data as well as the vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal generated based on vehicle kinematic model. Such derived human-like vehicle control model is to be used to generate a human-like vehicle control signal with respect to a target motion of an autonomous vehicle to achieve human-like vehicle control behavior.

title: A teacher classroom performance intelligent evaluation method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teacher classroom performance intelligent evaluation method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the facial expression recognition, voicerecognition and behavior recognition of a teaching video of a teacher to be evaluated; Integrating vector information obtained by facial expression recognition, speech recognition and behavior recognition of the to-be-evaluated teacher to obtain an emotion state vector and a teaching state vector of the to-be-evaluated teacher in the class; Training a deep learning network for evaluation based onthe data set marked and scored by the expert; And inputting the emotion state vector and the teaching state vector of the teacher to be evaluated in the classroom into the trained deep learning network to obtain an evaluation result of the classroom performance of the teacher. According to the method, the classroom performance of a teacher is simply and objectively evaluated by combining facial expressions and limb actions, voice information is introduced in the recognition process, the result accuracy is improved through combination of images and voices, the pressure of a supervision group isreduced, and the evaluation result is more real and objective.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SPEECH SYNTHESIS FROM TEXT
abstract_text: FIELD: computer equipment.SUBSTANCE: method of creating a text-to-speech-text-to-speech (TTS) training set for teaching machine learning algorithm (MLA) to create machine-readable statements, which are input text, includes: obtaining a dictionary housing; parsing text representation of words from dictionary housing on phonemes; for each two selected words: creation of an artificial word based on combining separate phonemes from each of two words; making utterances from artificial words based on created two artificial words; obtaining estimates for created statements from artificial words, estimates are a parameter of human evaluation of the phoneme transition pattern near the tie point; determining acoustic properties of created utterances from artificial words; and classifier training based on created statements of artificial words, acoustic properties and estimates to create: quality parameter associated with new artificial word based on phonemes, wherein the quality parameter indicates whether a new artificial word based on phonemes naturally sounds.EFFECT: creation of machine statements without user-visible delay.16 cl, 6 dwg

title: Intelligent ecological IOT (Internet of Things) suite teaching aid
abstract_text: Disclosed is an intelligent ecological IOT (Internet of Things) suite teaching aid. The intelligent ecological IOT suite teaching aid comprises an intelligent ecological enclosure, a planting groove,an artificial intelligence voice module, a sensing module, a light module, a ventilation module, a control module and an education APP terminal, wherein the artificial intelligence voice module, the sensing module, the light module and the ventilation module are arranged in the intelligent ecological enclosure, the artificial intelligence voice module is used for voice prompt, the light module isused for supplementing light, the ventilation module is used for adjusting the concentration of oxygen and carbon dioxide, and the education APP terminal is used for receiving processing data and video live broadcasts. The control module comprises an intelligent gateway, a cloud server and a routing device, wherein the intelligent gateway is in communication connection with the cloud server through the routing device, and the cloud server is in wireless communication connection with the education APP terminal. The intelligent ecological IOT suite teaching aid enables students to observe the growth state of plants in classrooms and at homes, thereby deepening their understanding of natural science and developing their abilities of operation, independent design experimenting and observing research problems.

title: An automatic demonstration method and device for a weld motion track
applicants: BEIJING DEEP SINGULARITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an automatic demonstration method and device for a welding seam motion track. The method comprises the steps that a color image and a three-dimensional point cloud image of ato-be-welded object are acquired; The color image is processed, and a weld joint area is positioned; According to the corresponding relation between the color image and the three-dimensional point cloud image, a local point cloud image of the weld joint area is extracted from the three-dimensional point cloud image; And a starting point and an end point of the welding seam are determined accordingto the extracted local point cloud image. According to the method, the weld joint to be welded can be automatically extracted for the fillet straight weld joint welding objects with different placement postures and different weld joint shapes, and a large amount of repeated manual teaching operation in the welding process is avoided; According to the method, the technical scheme of combining artificial intelligence and a traditional method is adopted, and the accuracy and robustness of weld joint detection and positioning are greatly improved.

title: A domain knowledge modeling and knowledge level estimation method in an adaptive learning system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a domain knowledge modeling and knowledge level estimation method in an adaptive learning system, and particularly relates to the field of adaptive learning. The problem that class education services in the existing education field are difficult to meet personalized education requirements is solved. The method specifically comprises two aspects of domain knowledge modelingbased on a knowledge graph and knowledge level estimation based on a deep learning technology. The domain knowledge modeling based on the knowledge graph comprises the steps of determining a subject knowledge graph framework; Collecting digital teaching resources, analyzing structural characteristics and language characteristics of texts of the digital teaching resources, and constructing an education corpus used for extracting subject knowledge graphs, wherein the education corpus comprises four corpora of word segmentation and part-of-speech tagging, syntactic analysis, named entities and entity relations; Subject knowledge graph construction. Knowledge level estimation based on a deep learning technology comprises the steps of domain data preprocessing and vectorization, automatic extraction of domain features by adopting a CNN, feature vector dimension reduction, and deep knowledge tracking based on an LSTM model.

title: Question and answer system under education scene
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The question and answer system in the education scene comprises a semantic understanding module unit, a deep learning question and answer module unit, a knowledge graph retrieval module unit and a semantic search engine module unit, and the semantic understanding module unit further comprises a multi-modal question and answer trigger sub-module unit and a type judgment sub-module unit.
