The methodcan be applied to the open field; free switching is carried out in the specific field and multi-mode question and answer processing. questions and requirements of a user can be better understood; theknowledge points required to be answered and answered can keep synchronous with the teaching situation development progress in reality in real time; a user can propose questions in various forms of voice, characters, pictures and the like, question answering under an education scene is specially optimized, better answers can be achieved for knowledge point understanding, teaching resource recommendation, teachers, schools, students and other associated questions, and the answers and the retrieval structure are sorted more conforming to the expectation of questioners. Based on the above, the method provided by the invention has a very wide application prospect.

title: Robot teaching system, method and device
applicants: BEIJING ORION STAR TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The embodiment of this application provides a robot teaching system, method and device, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The system includes a driver layer, an instruction interface layer, an ROS communication layer and a program generation layer; the driver layer includes drive programs of robots; the drive program of each robot is used for communication with the robot; the instruction interface layer includes a pre-encapsulated instruction function used for control over the robots, the ROS communication layer is used for obtaining the state information of the to-be-taught robots in the teaching process according to the drive programs of the robots, the program generation layer is used for obtaining the state information of the to-be-taught robots in the teaching process from the ROS communication layer, generating a control instruction corresponding to the teaching process according to the instruction function contained in the instruction interface layerand the obtained state information, and generating teaching programs for the to-be-taught robots according to the generated control instruction. According to the provided scheme, the robots can be taught conveniently.

title: Chinese character writing normalization judgment method based on a convolutional neural network algorithm
abstract_text: The invention discloses a Chinese character writing normalization judgment method based on a convolutional neural network algorithm, and belongs to the field of image processing, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, establishing a writing original paste data set; 2, preprocessing the image; 2, training a convolutional neural network; 3, carrying out score verification; 4, making self-learning adjustments. The invention discloses a Chinese character writing normalization judgment method based on a convolutional neural network algorithm. Firstly, a data set for writing normalizationjudgment is established; secondly, judging the writing normativity of the Chinese character by combining a deep learning method with extraction of morphological characteristics of the Chinese character; Writing Chinese characters are scored, so that the workload of a calligraphy teacher in homework correction is saved through computer-aided evaluation of calligraphy teaching, and working points are put on a writing mode for correcting and guiding errors, which is helpful for improving the Chinese character writing standardization of teenagers in China.

title: program question automatic scoring method based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic program question scoring method based on machine learning, which comprises the following steps: 1) acquiring student program course homework data including studenthomework and homework score information; 2) carrying out data preprocessing on the obtained operation; 3) carrying out dynamic testing on the program; 4) extracting program characteristics; 5) applying a machine learning algorithm to perform static analysis on the program; And 6) integrating dynamic operation and static analysis results, and returning a final score of the program. According to the method, dynamic testing and static analysis are combined, that is, dynamic testing data of the program are used, and the program is analyzed; A machine learning algorithm is adopted for static analysis, a teacher does not need to provide a correct reference program for similarity comparison, the teaching burden is reduced, and the influence of non-uniqueness of a template program on a correctionresult is avoided; Static analysis is carried out on all programs, and the misjudgment phenomenon caused by the fact that all dynamic tests pass but programs are not compiled according to topic requirements is reduced.

title: An artificial intelligence teaching assisting sound box based on a classroom teaching scene
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching assisting sound box based on a classroom teaching scene. The artificial intelligence teaching assisting sound box include a sound receivingmodule, a cloud computing core processing module, a cloud computing module, a sound box sound production module; the cloud computing module is also provided with three sub-modules including a semanticunderstanding submodule, a knowledge storage sub-module and a voice processing sub-module. In the application, the sound receiving module receives and processes various voices sent by a user; the data is output to the cloud computing core processing module; the data processed by the cloud computing core processing module is input into the cloud computing module; the cloud computing module answersthe question asked by the user; and the voice data for generating answers are input into the cloud computing core processing module, the cloud computing core processing module processes the voice data and transmits the voice data back to the sound box sound production module, the sound box sound production module further generates voice playing, and finally answers the user questions in a voice mode and realizes communication with the user. Teaching assistance is provided for teachers and students, and a better teaching effect is achieved.

title: VIBRATION SUPPRESSION DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention provides a vibration suppression device. The vibration suppression device acquires a teaching position, computes a speed plan based on the acquired teaching position and a first acceleration/deceleration parameter, computes data related to deflection occurring during an acceleration/deceleration operation of a robot based on the teaching position and the speed plan, and acquires dataindicating a posture at the teaching position. Further, a machine learning unit of the vibration suppression device estimates an acceleration/deceleration parameter with respect to the data related to the deflection and the data related to the posture using the data related to the deflection and the data related to the posture as input data.

title: teaching system and method based on an artificial intelligence recognition technology
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching system based on an artificial intelligence recognition technology. The system comprises a teacher module and a student module. each of the teacher module and the student module comprises a literature module; a course publication module and a theory module, the literature module comprises politics; History and geography, the public course module comprises Chineselanguage; wherein the mathematical department module comprises physics, biology and chemistry, each subject comprises a test question exercise module, each test question exercise module comprises an error question summarizing module, each error question summarizing module comprises a teaching plan making module, and each teaching plan making module comprises a teaching plan summarizing module; According to the teaching system, after students make test questions, the test questions made by the students can be analyzed, the distribution of the wrong questions can be clearly displayed so as to betransmitted to teachers, the teachers can make teaching plans for the wrong questions in a targeted manner, and the teaching efficiency is improved.

title: ROBOT SYSTEM AND ROBOT CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: A robot system (1) comprises a robot (10), an image acquisition unit (21), an image prediction unit (22), and a movement control unit (24). The image acquisition unit (21) acquires a current image, which is an image captured by a robot camera (31) disposed so as to move with an end effector (13). The image prediction unit (22) performs processing to predict a next image, which is the image that the robot camera (31) should capture next, on the basis of the current image and a teaching image model that is constructed by performing machine learning wherein a teaching image is the image that the robot camera (31) is expected to capture when an adjustment action is performed by a mobile unit (12). The movement control unit (24) calculates a command value for moving the mobile unit (12) so the image captured by the robot camera (31) approximates the next image and controls the mobile unit (12) on the basis of the command value.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR ENSEMBLE VEHICLE CONTROL PREDICTION IN AUTONOMOUS DRIVING VEHICLES
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to method, system, medium, and implementation of human-like vehicle control for an autonomous vehicle. Recorded human driving data are first received, which include vehicle state data, vehicle control data, and environment data. For each piece of recorded human driving data, a vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal is generated in accordance with a vehicle kinematic model based on a corresponding vehicle state and vehicle control data of the piece of recorded human driving data. A human-like vehicle control model is obtained, via machine learning, based on the recorded human driving data as well as the vehicle kinematic model based vehicle control signal generated based on vehicle kinematic model. Such derived human-like vehicle control model is to be used to generate a human-like vehicle control signal with respect to a target motion of an autonomous vehicle to achieve human-like vehicle control behavior.

title: Intelligent education physical environment system
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an intelligent education physical environment system. The system comprises a display system used for displaying teaching content, a teaching system used for teacher operation demonstration, a VR practical training experiment system used for virtual demonstration practical training experiment information, a CAVE system used for virtual reality display, and a recording and broadcasting system used for recording teaching field videos. The display system, the teaching system, the VR practical training experiment system, the CAVE system and the recording and broadcastingsystem are in communication connection with the teaching comprehensive service system through the Internet of Things platform. The method is based on the smart education theory; the holographic intelligent classroom is established to form an educational physical environment by using technologies such as the Internet, the Internet of Things, big data, artificial intelligence, virtual simulation and VR, and a user can conveniently and quickly make VR teaching contents for teaching emphasis and difficulties by visualizing the teaching contents in the whole process, so that the VR teaching contents are used for image teaching and interactive teaching.

title: Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI GUANGSHUO EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an Internet of Vehicles teaching experiment box based on artificial intelligence. The sound box comprises a box body, a box cover, a touch screen, a loudspeaker, a module mounting base, a module storage box, a module fixing frame, a protection plate and a heat dissipation device, wherein the box cover is positioned above the box body; the touch screen is located on theinner wall of the box cover, the loudspeakers are located on the two sides of the touch screen, the module installation base, the module storage box and the module fixing frame are all located on thebox body, the protection plate is located between the touch screen and the box body, the heat dissipation device is located at the bottom of the box body, and hinges are arranged on one side of the box body. The beneficial effects are that heat generated when the module works can be timely discharged to the outside of the experiment box, the phenomenon that the module gets stuck due to over-high temperature is avoided, the two loudspeakers are respectively located at the left front part and the right front part of a user so that sound has a three-dimensional effect, and the touch screen can beprotected.

title: Large modular robot for teaching
applicants: BEIJING KNGLI YOULAN ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of robots and artificial intelligence, and particularly relates to a large modular robot for teaching. The robot comprises a head integral module A, abody integral module B, a right hand integral module C, a left hand integral module D and a chassis integral module E, wherein the body integral module B is a main body module of the robot, the head integral module A, the right hand integral module C, the left hand integral module D and the chassis integral module E are fixed through buckles or pins and the like, and the human body imitation structure is connected with the body integral module B to form the whole large modular robot. The head, the body, the arms and the chassis of the robot and components contained in the robot can be flexiblyinserted, pulled and assembled, teaching and learning are facilitated, and debugging and maintenance are facilitated.

title: Mobile device for English teaching in aspect of artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a mobile device for English teaching in the aspect of artificial intelligence. The device comprises a fixed frame and a first motor, a display screen is arranged in front of the fixed frame; bases are fixed at the lower ends of the fixed frames; first moving wheels are installed at the lower end of the base. a first supporting rod is arranged behind the base; a second supporting rod is mounted behind the base; a rotating piece connecting seat is arranged on the right side of the first moving wheel; a first fixing base is fixed to the outer portion of the first supporting rod, a transmission rod is fixed to the lower end of the first motor, a second transmission gear is installed on the outer portion of the transmission rod, a second motor is fixed to the upper end of the first transmission gear, and a third transmission gear is connected to the outer portion of the second transmission gear. The moving device for English teaching in the aspect of artificial intelligence is provided with an automatic moving structure, the automation degree is high, a large number of manpower and material resources are saved, large vibration in the carrying process is avoided, and parts in the device are prevented from being damaged.

title: VIBRATION SUPPRESSION DEVICE
abstract_text: A vibration suppression device acquires a teaching position, computes a speed plan based on the acquired teaching position and a first acceleration/deceleration parameter, computes data related to deflection occurring during an acceleration/deceleration operation of a robot based on the teaching position and the speed plan, and acquires data indicating a posture at the teaching position. Further, a machine learning unit of the vibration suppression device estimates an acceleration/deceleration parameter with respect to the data related to the deflection and the data related to the posture using the data related to the deflection and the data related to the posture as input data.

title: Binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device
applicants: BEIJING DASHENG ZHILIAN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device, which comprises a high-performance computer, a mechanical arm, a PLC and a material conveying belt. The mechanical arm is connected with the high-performance computer through a mechanical arm controller, and the grabbing end of the mechanical arm is provided with an image collecting device and an ultrasonic probe; the image collecting device is connected with the high-performance computer through an image preprocessor, and the ultrasonic probe is connected with the high-performance computer through a single chip microcomputer system; the material conveying belt is driven by a servo motor conveying device and provided with an in-place detection sensor; and the servo motor conveying device and the in-place detection sensor are both connected with the high-performance computer through the PLC. The binocular artificial intelligence mechanical arm teaching device focuses on facing practical application and solving practical problems, numerous teaching knowledge points are fused, the applicative teaching needs of multiple science and engineering specialities can be completely met, and the teaching process can be more approximate to practical working scenes.

title: Rule extraction method, computer readable storage medium and computer equipment
abstract_text: The invention provides a rule extraction method based on machine learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the path of each sample input into a trained machine learning tree model in themachine learning tree model, and enabling the path to be composed of nodes experienced by the corresponding sample; obtaining rule evaluation values of all nodes corresponding to the path according to the path; filtering and removing sparse nodes in all nodes corresponding to all the paths so as to determine the rest nodes as target nodes; and extracting a required rule according to the target node and the rule evaluation value. According to the rule extraction method, rule customization does not depend on experience and teaching and training of people any more, a machine learning method candeeply mine the relation customization rule among high-dimensional mass data by means of the computing power of a computer, and the interpretability and stability of the rule are ensured. Meanwhile, rapid iteration can be achieved through the rule extraction method, the rule customization time is greatly shortened, and losses are reduced to the maximum degree.

title: Plush toy with AI teaching function
applicants: YANGZHOU HAOAI TOYS & GIFTS CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a plush toy with an AI teaching function. The device comprises a heat insulation box, a socket, a rechargeable battery, a heat conduction cylinder, lower heat dissipation hoses,a cover plate, plush cloth, a heater and upper heat dissipation hoses. The rear end of the plush cloth is attached to the cover plate, and the heat conduction cylinder is fixed at the rear end of thecover plate through a bolt; the heat insulation box is fixed at the rear end of the heat conduction cylinder, and the rechargeable battery is installed inside the heat insulation box; the rear end ofthe rechargeable battery is provided with the socket and is electrically connected with the socket; the rear end of the cover plate is attached to the front end of the heater, and the rear end of theheater is attached to the front end of the heat insulation box; the heater is fixed inside the heat conduction cylinder, and the two upper radiating hoses are symmetrically arranged at the left end and the right end of the heat conduction cylinder; and the two lower heat dissipation hoses are symmetrically arranged at the lower end of the heat conduction cylinder. Compared with the prior art, theplush body with the AI teaching function has the beneficial effects that the toy body is heated and is convenient to use, the comfort level is improved, the child soothing effect is improved, and thereliability is high.

title: COMPUTER-BASED VISUALIZATION OF MACHINE-LEARNING MODELS AND BEHAVIOR
abstract_text: Machine-learning models and behavior can be visualized. For example, a machine-learning model can be taught using a teaching dataset. A test input can then be provided to the machine-learning model to determine a baseline confidence-score of the machine-learning model. Next, weights for elements in the teaching dataset can be determined. An analysis dataset can be generated that includes a subset of the elements that have corresponding weights above a predefined threshold. For each overlapping element in both the analysis dataset and the test input, (i) a modified version of the test input can be generated that excludes the overlapping element, and (ii) the modified version of the test input can be provided to the machine-learning model to determine an effect of the overlapping element on the baseline confidence-score. A graphical user interface can be generated that visually depicts the test input and various elements' effects on the baseline confidence-score.

title: Entity relationship classification method based on bidirectional-GRU and improved attention mechanism
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and specifically relates to an entity relationship classification method based on a bidirectional-GRU and improved attention mechanism. According to the method, Chinese corpora is converted into word embedding vectors to be processed instead of a traditional one-way method. The method has the advantages that the high-dimensional problem caused by the Chinese corpus can be well solved by the aid of the hot vectors, attention mechanisms can be improved in a targeted manner by the aid of self-constructed common entity sets, synonyms and synonyms can be replaced, the problem of low accuracy caused by classification of the synonyms and the synonyms can be well solved, and two-way-synonyms can be introduced at the same time; The GRUmodel better learns the context above and below the entity, and entity relationship classification can be carried out on the teaching material corpora with rigorous logic.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system and method, electronic device and storage medium
applicants: SHANGHAI SENSETIME INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence teaching system and method, an electronic device and a storage medium. The artificial intelligence teaching system comprises a front end applicationmodule and a background service module, and the front end application module is used for obtaining codes used for learning artificial intelligence teaching content through a browser and sending the codes to the background service module. The background service module is used for executing the code and sending an execution result of the code to the front-end application module. And the front-end application module is used for displaying an execution result of the code so as to display a learning result of the artificial intelligence teaching content. According to the embodiment of the invention, the front-end application module is matched with the background service module in a browser mode to execute codes. The front-end computer loaded with the front-end application module can be realized by using a common computer, and special software environment configuration is not needed, so that the realization cost of the artificial intelligence teaching system is reduced, the expandability isgood, and the application range is wide.

title: AI robot guiding and interacting dialogue teaching system
applicants: SHANDONG SHUNSHI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an AI robot guiding and interacting dialogue teaching system which comprises a main board chip, an audio module, a memory, a data interaction module, a voice interaction module, an expression module, a radio frequency chip, a WIF chip, a WIFI antenna, a power supply management chip, a charging module and a control end, wherein the control end is used for connecting the datainteraction module and the main board chip and comprises an auxiliary controller, a data entry unit, a data display module and a data searching unit. By transferring data directly through a cloud platform knowledge base, the system integrates science and technology knowledge in fields of math, physics, chemistry, biology, mechanics, electronics, computer hardware, software, artificial intelligence and the like, so that the system is of very high interestingness, effectively activates interesting of students in learning, and breaks the previous learning mode. Therefore, children are more interested in learning, the probability that children are addicted to games and TV is also reduced, and good living habits and learning habits of children are cultivated.

title: AI robot dialogue control method and system based on big data search
abstract_text: The invention relates to the field of AI robots. In order to solve the problem that a local user ignorant of local language has communication difficulty in communication with local people, the invention provides an AI robot dialogue control method based on big data search. The method comprises the following steps: an acquiring step: acquiring user voice; in a recognizing step, recognizing age andoral speech sound according to the acquired user voice; a determining step: determining whether voice teaching is carried out or not when the oral speech sound of the user is not a standard oral speech sound; a confirming step: acquiring confirming information of a user and judging whether the age of the user is greater than an age threshold value or not; a teaching step: when the age of the useris not greater than an age threshold value, playing a standard voice matched with the user voice; and when the age of the user is greater than the age threshold value, acquiring circumstance selectinginformation of the user and playing a circumstance dialogue standard voice matched with the circumstance selecting information. The invention also provides an AI robot dialogue control system based on big data searching.

title: Robot intelligent chess playing workstation
applicants: BEIJING HUATEC INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a robot intelligent chess playing workstation, which adopts a visual detection system to acquire chessboard data in real time, adopts a control system to communicate with avisual system through the Ethernet, weighs each position of a chessboard after digitizing the chessboard, and selects an optimal chess playing mode. By means of playing chess with a robot, the artificial intelligence technology is introduced, the education mode of teaching through lively activities is fully embodied, learning of students is not passively accepted any more but actively learned under driving of interests, and the teaching effect is greatly improved. Meanwhile, the design style of the workstation reflects perfect fusion of Chinese classical culture and modern science and technology, and the workstation is like chess for life, is a game feeling of encouraging students to pursue craftsmanship spirit and break through by themselves, and is also a fade and scatter chess pieces for pleasure chest bamboo and leisure chess pieces.

title: Fire-fighting lifesaving air cushion for primary and secondary schools
abstract_text: The invention discloses a fire-fighting lifesaving air cushion for primary and secondary schools. The lifesaving air cushion comprises a base, compression springs and an air cushion body, wherein thelower end of the air cushion body is supported on the base through the plurality of compression springs. The air cushion is suitable for structural fire safety in buildings of the teaching field, teachers and students can use the air cushion continuously to escape when a fire happens, escaped people can stably and safely land on the air cushion; and the ai cushion has the advantages of novel and unique structure, convenient usage and storage, safe rescue with a high speed and the like. The lifesaving air cushion is characterized in that compared with a traditional air cushion, wheels are arranged at the lower end of the base, so that the air cushion is moved conveniently.

title: Artificial intelligence operating room
applicants: SHENZHEN HUIJIAN MEDICAL ENG CO LTD
abstract_text: An artificial intelligence operating room is characterized in that a central server is respectively connected with a DSA image data acquisition subsystem, a rebroadcasting/teaching subsystem, an environment monitoring subsystem, an equipment control subsystem, a VR remote consultation system and a sound control automatic door through a network switch; the VR remote consultation system comprises adata processing and control unit. The data processing and control unit is connected with the VR equipment, the operating room equipment unit, the hand state acquisition unit, the storage module, the touch screen display, the result feedback unit and the monitoring unit. The voice control automatic door comprises an electric door and an electric door control device connected with the electric door.The electric door control device comprises a CPU controller, a sound acquisition module, a memory and a man-machine interaction module, and the sound acquisition module, the memory and the man-machine interaction module are connected with the CPU controller, and the electric door control device has the advantages that a current advanced VR remote consultation system and a voice control technologyare introduced, a digital DSA composite operating room intelligent control system is improved, and intelligence of an operating room is further achieved.

title: A precise teaching and research method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING ZHONGQING MODERN TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence-based accurate teaching and research method. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, obtaining a classroom video after a certain course isfinished through an audio and video acquisition device; generating a classroom observation report according to the obtained classroom video; based on the classroom participation degree curve, callingtime points of rising and lowering of the participation degree, and then calling videos near the corresponding time points to obtain a condition that the participation degree is changed due to the fact that teachers and students perform specific teaching activities; according to the two paths of videos of the teacher and the student in class, the questioning frequency and the questioning type ofthe teacher in class are obtained, and the characteristics of the teacher in class in the class question design are obtained; and generating a teacher teaching evaluation scale according to the obtained classroom observation report and the characteristics of the problem design, and generating a teacher ability matrix based on the contents in the teaching evaluation scale. According to the method,the classroom course evaluation report can be presented to teachers in a more scientific, convenient and rapid teaching and research mode, the course evaluation workload of the teachers is reduced, and suggestions are provided for the long-term growth direction of the teachers.

title: Speech recognition system for speaker in teaching scene
abstract_text: The invention discloses a speech recognition system for a speaker in a teaching scene. The speech recognition system comprises a camera, a microphone, a video and audio input module, a signal enhancement module, a cloud server module and an output module. Speech audio data of the speaker are processed with machine learning and deep learning methods, different audio intervals of the speaker are obtained by division, the emotion of the speaker at the moment can be further analyzed, real-time data processing is performed through real-time monitoring, the emotion can serve as an index for teachingevaluation, the index is an important link for evaluating teaching quality, limits of traditional conditions such as sampling survey, interview, examination and evaluation are broken through, and theclass situation can be reflected truly.

title: A voice-based classroom quality evaluation method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a voice-based classroom quality evaluation method, which utilizes a technical means of combining artificial intelligence deep learning and voice signal processing, and providesobjective evaluation index data by analyzing audio information in a classroom teaching process, thereby saving manpower, financial resources and time for classroom teaching evaluation. The teacher can optimize the teaching method conveniently, and the teaching quality is improved; and the enthusiasm of the students to ask and answer questions is improved. The classroom teaching effect is reflected through big data analysis and processing, and scientific classroom quality index data is provided for teaching affairs, teachers, students and parents.

title: Music teaching method and device based on AI (artificial intelligence) speech recognition and computer equipment
applicants: PING AN TECH SHENZHEN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a music teaching method and device based on AI (artificial intelligence) speech recognition, computer equipment and a readable storage medium, and relates to the technical fieldof deep learning. The method comprises steps as follows: acquiring learning records of a student according to preset frequency, and taking a first teaching scheme of the student; analyzing the learning records and the first teaching scheme to obtain mark deviation information and learning efficiency of the student; formulating a second teaching scheme of the student according to the mark deviation information and learning efficiency. The learning records of the student and the preset first teaching scheme are acquired according to the preset frequency, the mark deviation information and the learning efficiency of audio practice of the student are obtained after the learning records and the first teaching scheme are analyzed, and the second learning scheme is formulated according to the mark deviation information and the learning efficiency, so that intelligent network review and formulation of the individual teaching schemes are realized, intelligence and convenience of network musicteaching are effectively improved, and review efficiency is improved.

title: Child sitting posture intelligent calibration device for education
abstract_text: The invention discloses a child sitting posture intelligent calibration device for education. The device comprises a learning table, a teaching management system and a client, the client achieves two-way connection with the teaching management system through Ethernet, the left side of the top of the learning table is fixedly connected with a support block through a bolt, a telescopic rod is fixedly connected to the top of the support block, and the top end of a telescopic rod push rod is fixedly connected with a camera through a connecting plate. The technical field of education is involved. The device uses artificial intelligence to detect the sitting posture of a child, conducts monitoring at all time to ensure that students develop a standard sitting posture habit and solves the problems that since the students are in childhood, and do not have strong self-control, the case of a non-standard sitting posture often occurs, and a teacher cannot always supervise and guide each student,which affects the later growth and development of the students and seriously affects the physical health of the students.

title: A multi-dimensional student learning behavior non-inductive acquisition and analysis system
applicants: SHANDONG RENBO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-dimensional student learning behavior non-inductive acquisition system, which comprises a server; a central processing unit is arranged in the server; a classroom listening effect data acquisition module, a classroom practice data acquisition module and a homework data acquisition module are arranged at the connecting end of the central processing unit; The invention also provides a multi-dimensional student learning behavior non-inductive analysis system. The multi-dimensional learning behavior analysis is carried out through formula calculation according to the three-dimensional data acquired by the classroom listening effect data acquisition module, the class-on-class practice data acquisition module and the homework data acquisition module. According tothe invention, technologies such as the camera, the Internet of Things, the artificial intelligence and the big data are utilized, learning behavior data of students are collected from three dimensions of classroom teaching, class practice and after-class homework respectively, a data organization and analysis method is described, and finally, all-dimensional and multi-dimensional student behaviordata collection and analysis can be realized.

title: Target posture deep learning based vision acquisition method, learning system and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of robots and discloses a target posture deep learning based vision acquisition method, a learning system and a storage medium which are used for controlling a robot to clean teaching actions. The target posture deep learning based vision acquisition method comprises the following steps of collecting teaching image information during the process of teaching actions in multiple directions; analyzing the teaching image information, selecting a plurality of reference points of the teaching actions and fitting the multiple reference points into at leasttwo functions, namely the posture function and the displacement function, according to the relation between movement and time; and generating a control program so that the robot can implement the teaching actions according to the posture function and the displacement function. According to the target posture deep learning based vision acquisition method, the teaching action function is simplified, and the calculation quantity of point selection is reduced; the driving program is generated by collecting the teaching actions of a target, and the degree of the demand for artificial participationis reduced; and the target posture deep learning based vision acquisition method has the advantages of high intelligence degree, high imitation reduction degree and the like.

title: Target posture-based deep learning tracking acquisition method, learning system and storage medium
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of robots. The invention discloses a tracking and collecting method based on target posture deep learning. The learning system and the storage medium are used for controlling a robot to learn teaching actions, and the deep learning tracking and collecting method based on the target posture comprises the following steps that a plurality of reference points of the teaching actions are selected, the movement of each reference point is tracked, and teaching tracking data is recorded; Analyzing each teaching tracking data, and fitting into at least two functions through a movement and time relationship: an attitude function used for describing the change of the target attitude along with time and a displacement function used for describing the changeof the target position along with time; And generating a control program to enable the robot to realize the teaching action according to the attitude function and the displacement function. The driving program is generated by collecting the teaching action of the target, the requirement degree of manual participation is reduced, and the method has the advantages of being high in intelligent degree, high in imitation reduction degree and the like.

title: TEACHING MATERIAL AUTHORING SYSTEM
abstract_text: To provide a teaching material authoring system capable of appropriately grading or evaluating when artificial intelligence is used for a learning support system.SOLUTION: A teaching material authoring system includes: a text conversion unit for converting contents answered by a trainee to a given question into text data by a function of artificial intelligence; a text modification unit capable of correcting, by the trainee, the text data converted by the text conversion unit; a model answer storage unit for storing at least one model answer to the question; and a meaning approximation determination unit for determining, by a function of artificial intelligence, the degree of approximation by which the meaning of the answer of the trainee as a language approximates the meaning as the language of the model answer.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: A campus platform based on professional education informatization
abstract_text: The invention discloses a campus platform based on professional education informatization. The platform comprises a student information system, a teaching affair management system, an education platform resource system, a teaching evaluation system, a public information system, a database system and a network security module. With the help of the big data processing, network communication, computer programming, artificial intelligence and other technologies, the information sharing inside and outside the campus and between enterprises can be realized; the self-learning and evaluation of students, the teaching effect feedback of teachers and the butt joint of enterprise demands and student skill improvement are facilitated, the development of personalized teaching and guidance is facilitated, the self-improvement of the students is rapidly realized, the comprehensive reception and management of information are facilitated, and the efficiency and quality of campus management are greatlyimproved.

title: A student concentration monitoring method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN WINSHARE EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student concentration monitoring method based on artificial intelligence, and the method is characterized by comprising the steps of S1 recording the personal information ofstudents, the face information of students and teachers, and voiceprints in an artificial intelligence platform in a matching manner; S2 collecting images and audios of the students in the class attending process; S3 collecting student action information through the student images; S4 collecting the time from student roll calling to student response by the teacher through student audio; S5 carrying out statistical analysis on the acquired information, and sending alarm information to a teacher after finding out students with low concentration. According to the present invention, a teacher doesnot need to spend a lot of time to remind students to listen to the class during class, and it is guaranteed that the teaching progress of the teacher can be carried out as planned, the problem thatthe condition required for monitoring the concentration degree is single is solved, and the concentration degree of the student can be comprehensively judged; and the teacher can judge when to remindthe student who is distracted by himself/herself, so that the class rhythm of the teacher is not disordered.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching aid
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence teaching aid, including USB sensor module (1), power supply circuit module (2), relay control circuit module (4), control circuit socket (5), DAconversion module (6), clock module (7), program compilation module (8) outward, p12303 connects computer module (9), amplifier circuit (10), its characterized in that: power supply circuit module passes through the wire and exchanges ferroelectric phase even with 220v, it passes through the wire and exchanges ferroelectric phase company through the relay control circuit module with 220v to control circuit socket outward, the relay control circuit module is passed through the wire and is connected with a logic control circuit (3), again DA conversion module pass through the wire respectively with the clock module, the program compilation module is connected, meet amplifier circuit after the program compilation module, the program compilation module is passed through the wire and is connected the connection of computer module with p12303 again, P12303 connects the computer module and is connected to computer USB through the wire.

title: auxiliary statistical report generation method based on low school age teaching audios and videos
abstract_text: The invention discloses an auxiliary statistical report generation method based on low school age teaching audios and videos. Wherein the auxiliary statistical report of the audio and video comes fromextraction and processing of teaching video resources of a special teacher at the present stage; Audio data and video data are separated from a large number of excellent teacher teaching images, theaudio data are converted into text data through an LSTM-based network model, and word segmentation is conducted on the text data through Chinese word segmentation to generate a brief teaching plan; And the video data is classified through scenes, and then the category and time of the teaching auxiliary tool appearing in the video are counted through a target detection algorithm based on deep learning, so that a visual statistical graph can be generated. And finally, information extracted from the audio data and the video data is fused to generate a teaching auxiliary statistical report for auxiliary teaching of low-school-age students. The teaching auxiliary statistical report generation system can provide a real-time online teaching auxiliary statistical report and reduce the lesson preparation time of teachers.

title: automatic problem generation method based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic question generation method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: constructing a training set (articles, answers and questions), a verification set (articles, answers and questions) and a prediction set (articles and answers); creating Encoder-based construction by using deep learning framework tensorflow A sequence of decoders to a sequence neural network model; Carrying out word segmentation, word list making and word embedding operations on sentences in the data set; Wherein the data set comprises a training set, a verificationset and a prediction set; The training set is used for training the model, the verification set is used for detecting whether the currently trained model is over-fitted or not, and if over-fitting isachieved, stopping training; Otherwise, continuing training; And decoding the prediction set by using the trained model to generate a problem. The method is good in generalization effect and low in labor cost, the generated questions are better matched with articles and answers, and the method can be widely applied to the fields of intelligent teaching, intelligent questions and answers, knowledge question and answer games and the like.

title: REPAIRING-PART-DEMAND FORECASTING SYSTEM AND METHOD USING BIG DATA AND MACHINE LEARNING
applicants: UNIV SEJONG IND ACAD COOP FOUD [KR]
abstract_text: The present invention provides a system and a method for forecasting repairing-part-demand using big data and machine learning. According to an embodiment of the present invention, the system for forecasting repairing-part-demand using big data and machine learning comprises: an input variable setting module receiving repairing-part-demand information from a database to select an input variable; a machine learning model construction module using at least one of machine learning and a statistical technique based on the database to construct an ensemble model optimized for repairing-part-demand forecasts; and machine learning model evaluation module teaching the constructed ensemble model by utilizing training data and evaluating the ensemble model based on a forecasting result in comparison with test data.

title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FRAMEWORK
abstract_text: Systems and methods are provided for teaching and shaping the behavior of artificial intelligence agents using human input. A system may be provided that comprises a natural language processing neural network (NLP NN) and a relational reasoning neural network (RR NN). The NLP NN may receive a human observation and environment observations, and output encodings of labels for entities, actions, and/or policies, wherein the environment observations are indicative of states of the environment, and the human observation represents an observation of the environment made by a human. The RR NN may generate cross-modal embeddings from the environment observations and the encodings of labels generated by the NLP NN. The agent neural network may generate actions and/or policies from the environment observation and the cross-modal embeddings.

title: AI robot for physical teaching experiment
abstract_text: The invention relates to an AI robot for a physical teaching experiment. The AI robot for the physical teaching experiment comprises a test bench, a lifting rod is arranged in the middle part of the test bench, the lower end of the lifting rod is installed on an operation executing mechanism, and the operation executing mechanism comprises a executing operation frame installed at the lower end ofthe lifting rod, the inner walls between the executing operation frame and the test bench are connected through a limiting telescopic rod, a displacement sliding groove is formed in the lower end of the executing operation frame in the circumferential direction of the executing operation frame, and displacement branched chains are arranged in the displacement sliding groove. According to the AI robot for the physical teaching experiment, the problems that the consuming time is long, the labor intensity is high caused by a long time for an experimenter keeping a pulling spring pose, the balanceof the used tensile force cannot be guaranteed accurately, the precision of experimental data is affected, the operation is complex, the accuracy is poor due to the facts that the stretched length ofa spring needs to be controlled by the experimenter, a plurality of springs are needed to perform data comparison, the experimenter needs to keep a stretching distance, and the change of different tensile force values in different time is recorded in spring tests are solved.

title: Online education man-machine interaction method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI EDUCATION NETWORK PUBLISHING CO LTD
TIME NEW MEDIA PUBLISHING CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an online education man-machine interaction method and an online education man-machine interaction system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the field of online education. The system comprises a user side, a teacher side, a learning assessing unit, an online asking system, a knowledge point classified storage module, an intelligent conversion system, a course learning organizational form, a movement recognition system and a video teaching module, wherein the video teaching module is connected with the user side and the teacher side. With the method and thesystem provided by the invention, the problems that in the existing online education, the interaction between a user and a teacher is far insufficient, the learning progresses of the users are inconsistent, the mastering degrees for knowledge points are different, and the uniform course timetable can not satisfy the personalized demand of audiences are solved.

title: Robot module ization eyes structure
applicants: BEIJING KNGLI YOULAN ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of robot and artificial intelligence, especially relate to a robot module ization eyes structure. Does this eyes structure include lens (2- 1 ), display screen (2- 2 ), shell (2- 3 ), the PCB board (2- 4 ), main frame (2- 5 )And support (2- 6 ) to according to narration order fixed constitute left eye module (2) that superpose in proper order together, right side eye module (1) is the same with left eye module (2) structure and all fix in head main part (3), and puts at facial shell (4) left and right sides eyes hole site and expose. About two modules, but the picture of independent display robot eyes respectively, can the independent control, the independent dismantlement. This eyes structure is particularly useful for a teaching type module machine people, its installation method is simple, convenient safeguard dismantle, with low costs, to teaching intuition clear, strong and can take out alone and debug with other robot main part interchangeability.

title: Artificial intelligence all -in -one of imparting knowledge to students
abstract_text: The utility model belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, a artificial intelligence all -in -one of imparting knowledge to students is provided. This all -in -one includes the maincontrol board, and the main control board shows the switch including the HDMI matrix that connects gradually with screen display, is equipped with signal input interface and signal output interface onthe main control board, the HDMI matrix still with signal input interface connection, with screen display show the switch still with signal output interface connection. The utility model discloses artificial intelligence all -in -one of imparting knowledge to students can simplify teaching equipment, and it is scarce interactive and interesting to avoid giving lessons, reduces purchasing cost.

title: Teaching device with artificial intelligence technology
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching device with an artificial intelligence technology. The device comprises an artificial intelligence identification core based on an Android operation system, one or more first communication interfaces, a motion control module and a motion execution module; the first communication interfaces are electrically connected with the artificial intelligence identificationcore; the motion control module comprises a control core, the control core comprises an artificial intelligence core body and a single chip which are electrically connected with each other and is coupled to a signal socket through a photocoupling module and electrically connected with one or more second communication interfaces, and the inner core receives a signal sent by an artificial intelligence identification module; the motion execution module comprises a motion execution testing module and an industrial application testing module, and the motion execution testing module and the industrial application testing module receive control signals output by the motion control module. According to the teaching device, by arranging a large amount of hardware equipment such as stepping motors and mechanical arms, the teaching demand of the artificial intelligence technology can be met.

title: shared tutor and an artificial intelligence tutor service platform
applicants: GUANGDONG CHUANGYUE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a shared tutor and an artificial intelligence tutor service platform, including a cloud platform for entrepreneurial and employment personnel training in space, based on the cloud platform of entrepreneurial and employment talent cultivation ecosystem, first of all, the university teachers are integrated in the way of crowdsourcing the third-party tutor service, Entrepreneurs or on-the-job technicians, teachers of vocational training institutions, etc. become the resource bank of high-quality tutors and provide specialized tutorial services including teaching guidance,internship guidance, employment guidance and entrepreneurial guidance, and then create artificial intelligence tutors by collecting big data in the process. Market-oriented crowdsourcing service can motivate and effectively integrate, using excellent personnel from schools, enterprises and training institutions to provide guidance.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM AND MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
abstract_text: To determine the quality of an optical component after taking into account the purpose of use of the optical component.SOLUTION: A machine learning device 1 comprises: state observation means for acquiring image data in which an optical component is imaged and data pertaining to the purpose of use of the optical component as input data; label acquisition means for acquiring an evaluation value pertaining to the determination of quality of the optical component as a label; and learning means for performing supervised learning using the input data acquired by the state observation means and the set of labels acquired by the label acquisition means as teaching data and thereby building a learning model for determining the quality of the optical component.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Language teaching system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ANHUI ZHIXUN ROBOT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a language teaching system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of teaching. The system comprises an artificial intelligence module, a voice collection module and a voice output module which are connected to the artificial intelligence module; the voice collection module is used for collecting voice information of a user; the artificial intelligence module is used for understanding and responding to the voice information; the voice output module is used for playing a reply. The language teaching system based on the artificial intelligencenot only can provide convenience for the user to quickly learn a language, but also has an interactive communication function, thereby improving the interest and experience of the user.

title: Desktop interactive learning method, device and system based on image recognition
applicants: SHENZHEN VISION TALK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A desktop interactive learning system based on image recognition includes a mobile terminal, a camera adapter and a support base. The bottom of the mobile terminal is arranged in the first groove or the second groove of the support base, the top of the mobile terminal is arranged in the groove of the camera adapter, the mobile terminal is in contact with the arc top of the groove, the mobile terminal is in contact with the side wall of the groove, and the camera of the mobile terminal is opposite to the position of the reflector. Through the reflector, the camera of the vertically placed mobile terminal can acquire images on the desktop, and perform image recognition or character recognition on the acquired image information, and the recognized information is played through voice or screendisplay mode. The device can be adapted to different types of mobile terminals and has good versatility. The desktop image can be obtained by the front camera of the mobile terminal, the desktop interactive learning can be carried out, and the desktop interactive teaching can be realized by using artificial intelligence.

title: TECHNOLOGY FOR ANALYZING ABNORMAL BEHAVIOR IN DEEP LEARNING-BASED SYSTEM BY USING DATA IMAGING
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a technology for analyzing abnormal behavior in a deep learning-based system by using data imaging. A method according to the present invention comprises the steps of: receiving data to be analyzed, related to the state of a system to be analyzed; converting, into image data, the inputted data to be analyzed; teaching a neural network unit through the input of the converted image data; and receiving the data to be analyzed, having been converted into the image data, and allowing the neural network unit, having completed learning, to detect or predict abnormal behavior in the system to be analyzed. According to the present invention, abnormal behavior in the system to be analyzed can be classified and recognized through imaging of the data to be analyzed, related to the state of the system to be analyzed, and then through deep learning-based image recognition. Particularly, packet data encrypted with a protocol having unpublicized specifications can be imaged and analyzed without being decrypted. In addition, a multivariate analysis of multi-channel and past information of temporal data sequence are utilized together so as to enable comprehensive classification and prediction.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR A TECHNOLOGY ENABLED PERSONALIZED AND PRACTICE-BASED PEDAGOGY
abstract_text: The embodiments herein provide a system and method for a technology enabled, personalized and practice-based learning. Current methods of teaching and learning do not enable a teacher to provide personalized feedback and inputs to most of the students. The embodiments herein provide a hybrid system of physical and virtual infrastructure 102s for personalized and practice-based learning. The virtual infrastructure 102 comprises modules and processes for enabling an automated guidance and monitoring of a personalized learning mechanism. The student's handwritten and/or digital notes and recording of classroom sessions are processed by the system for automatically preparing customized study-aid tools based on a student's requirements. An artificial intelligence engine recognizes and understands a student's notes and provides a learning map to the student. The method comprises a process to enable a customized learning method that is designed by an artificial intelligence engine based on a student's requirements.

title: Differentiated artificial intelligence self-learning system
applicants: TIBET NINGSUAN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a differentiated artificial intelligence self-learning system. The system comprises an operation table; a plurality of supporting legs are arranged on the side wall of the bottom of the operation table; a first clamping mechanism and a second clamping mechanism are arranged at the upper end of the operation table; a learning device is arranged between the first clamping mechanism and the second clamping mechanism; the learning device comprises a control module; the control module is connected with a login module, a charging module, an illumination module, a wired signalreceiving module, a wireless signal receiving module, an information recording module and an identity confirmation module; the wireless signal receiving module is connected with a mobile terminal module; and the identity confirmation module is used for carrying out identity verification on user information transmitted by the login module, if the age of a user is 0-25 years old. The system is reasonable in structural design; and different learning systems can be provided for users with different age stages, so that differentiated teaching is realized and the self-improvement efficiency and speed of the user can be improved.

title: Adaptive and unsupervised intelligent sensing method for classroom teaching activities
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention discloses an adaptive and unsupervised intelligent sensing method for classroom teaching activities. Relevant information and intelligent technical means are utilized and developed to acquire, analyze, process and recognize classroom speech signals, and based on the establishment of an adaptive and unsupervised intelligent method, parts of classroom speeches from the classroom speech signals are robustly detected. Artificial intelligence processing technologies are utilized and developed to optimize and intelligently classify continuous classroom speeches and finally achieve classroom teaching activity recognition based on the classroom speeches.

title: Online classroom intelligent interaction device
applicants: HANGZHOU SAIROBO NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online classroom intelligent interaction device which comprises a classroom end interaction device, a teacher end interaction device, an intelligent processing device, a signal acquisition module, an artificial intelligence processing module, a structured data output module, a face recognition unit, a hand-up recognition unit and a standing recognition unit. The classroom end interaction device is connected to the teacher end interaction device through a network, respective sound and visual sensing signals are collected, a multimedia stream is formed through encodingand composite processing and is sent to an opposite end to be played and displayed, and the intelligent processing device establishes a network connection with the classroom end interaction device and the teacher end interaction device. In an online classroom of distance teaching, in the condition that a teacher and students are unfamiliar with each other or the teacher cannot remember the name of the students, the teacher can know the name of a student who raises a hand or stands up according to the online classroom intelligent interaction device, and therefore, the teacher can further interact with the student in real time to close the gap and let the distance be no longer a distance.

title: Light energy liquid crystal handwriting pad with AI intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN ZHICHUANG TIMES TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a light energy liquid crystal handwriting pad with AI intelligence, including light energy liquid crystal handwriting pad panel, AI audio and video control system, handwriting pad cleanup system, the AI audio and video control system still includes the built -in microphone who is connected with the speech recognition module including the LCD display screen, audio outputdevice, first touch -control board, speech recognition module, button and the power module that are connected with CPU respectively, handwriting pad cleanup system is including handwriting pad powermodule, boost module and the handwriting pad button module be connected with MCU respectively, boost module links to each other with handwriting pad power module, light energy liquid crystal handwriting pad panel is connected with CPU and boost module respectively. The utility model discloses having increased the AI audio and video control system on the basis of light energy liquid crystal handwriting pad panel, can having play video, audio frequency and picture, teaching in joy lets children playing the middle school, plays in, still has voice input function, convenient to use simultaneously.

title: A student application program monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student application program monitoring method and system based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of obtaining a working mode of a teacher end; if the working mode of the teacher end is a class mode, establishing a connection between the teacher end and the student end; controlling the teacher to send a monitoring program to the student;obtaining the running application program of the student end through the monitoring program, and sending the application program data to the teacher end; and performing the corresponding operation onthe student side according to the obtained application program. The invention can realize that when the teacher end is connected with the student end in the information network classroom, the application program running in the course can be obtained, and the corresponding operation can be executed according to the type of the application program, so that the student dynamics can be understood conveniently and the teaching efficiency can be improved.

title: A visual fatigue detection method based on machine learning
applicants: SICHUAN WINSHARE EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a visual fatigue degree detection method based on machine learning. The method comprises the following steps of obtaining the amount of scleral blood of the student's eye through the camera of the terminal after the teaching starts for a predetermined time; using the trained binary classifier to classify the scleral blood volume to determine the credible value of visual fatigue of the students; taking the teaching time as the weight value and weighting the credible value of visual fatigue degree according to the weight value to obtain the true value of visual fatigue degree; if the true value of the visual fatigue degree is not higher than the preset abnormal threshold value, judging that the eyes of the students are not in the visual fatigue state, and if the truevalue of the visual fatigue degree is higher than the preset abnormal threshold value, judging that the eyes of the students are in the visual fatigue state. The method of the invention can detect thevisual fatigue degree of the students in the teaching process.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, AND USER IDENTIFICATION DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a machine learning device for securing safety in work of a robot by preventing the impersonation of an operator.SOLUTION: A machine learning device 10 includes: input data acquisition means 11 for acquiring, as input data, operation data detected by making an operator perform preset operations related to a teaching operation panel 25 of a robot control device 20 and including measurement values related to at least partial motion of the body of the operator and the shape of the body; label acquisition means 12 for acquiring identification information of the operator as a label; and learning means 13 for constructing a learning model for performing user identification to authenticate an operator of the robot control device 20 by performing supervised learning using a set of the input data and the label as teacher data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: A microscopic full-wireless interactive teaching transmission and auxiliary class taking system based on machine learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a microscopic full-wireless interactive teaching transmission and auxiliary class taking system based on machine learning, and the system employs a mode based on artificial intelligence, employs the principle of machine learning, enables a teacher to train a computer before class taking, and enables the computer to have the functions of automatic identification and classification. Therefore, when the student uploads each microscope image, the teaching terminal system automatically scores the image and feeds the score back to the student, and the student mobile terminalcan generate the score of the uploading job at the time, so that the student mobile terminal can conveniently correct the score in time; the teacher can store the class schedule of all students and generate a report to record the result of the course so as to facilitate statistics.

title: An artificial intelligence interactive English teaching courseware trading system
applicants: SUZHOU MITE XISAIER ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
SUZHOU MITAI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence interactive English teaching courseware trading system, which is based on the Internet and mobile payment and consists of a courseware publishing platform, a personal courseware web page, a trading management system and a mobile phone mobile payment system. The courseware transaction flow is: the courseware seller publishes the courseware to the courseware publishing platform, the courseware purchaser searches the required courseware and checks the courseware to be purchased, completes the payment through the two-dimensional code of mobile phone scanning payment, the payment system notifies the transaction management system that the payment is completed, and the transaction system automatically downloads the courseware purchased by the userto the personal web page of the user.

title: Virtual object valve position (VPC) oriented control system testing device
abstract_text: The invention provides a virtual object valve position (VPC) oriented control system testing device which is characterized in that the device is mainly composed of an industrial control computer (1),a display device (3), a PLC_CPU (5), a master regulator control (6), a valve regulator control (7), an external interference resource Uf1(8), a first PLC_AO module (10), a second PLC_AO module (11), athird PLC_AO module (12), a first PLC_AI module (13), a second PLC_AI module (14), a subtractor (15), a subtractor (16), a first one-stage inertial link (17), a second one-stage inertial link (18) and I/V conversion resistors (19,20,21). The virtual object valve position (VPC) oriented control system testing device has advantages of low investment and high teaching result.

title: An instructional automatic chat method based on deep reinforcement learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses an instructional automatic chat method based on depth reinforcement learning, which belongs to the field of oral conversation system. Making use of the powerful perception of deep learning and the superior decision-making ability of reinforcement learning, the teaching module can give demonstration decisions directly or give additional rewards to instruct the decision-making module to make the right strategy. Whether the mode selection control teaching module gives the demonstration decision directly or the evaluation of the decision module is determined. The decision-making module constantly adjusts its own decision-making situation according to the evaluation given by the teaching module and the evaluation of the user as the optimization goal. This method increases the generalization ability of the system, increases the learning ability of the system, so that the system has stronger adaptability. Under this framework, the oral dialogue system can be trained more effectively, and the answers can be safer, more reasonable and more orderly.

title: Automatic interactive intelligent education system and method
applicants: DARK MATTER HONG KONG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LIMITED
abstract_text: The invention discloses an automatic interactive intelligent education system and method, relating to the field of artificial intelligence and intelligent education. The system comprises a user terminal and an operation device connected to the user terminal. The operation device comprises an identification module for identifying a user behavior in a conversation scene to obtain identification information which includes voice identification information, expression identification information and gesture identification information, a task management module which automatically drives an established node map according to the identification information, coordinates multiple tasks according to the node graph, and schedules a rendering module, and the rendering module which is used for rendering ateaching scene, a teaching tool and/or a teacher image according to a multi-task coordination result and transmits a rendering result to the user terminal to implement automatic interactive teaching.The task management module of the present invention establishes the node map for multi-task coordination and scheduling, a shortcoming that an existing system cannot achieve automatic and individualized interactive teaching through auxiliary education is overcome, the automatic interactive teaching and individualized teaching are realized, and the efficient completion of teaching tasks is facilitated.

title: Network-interaction teaching method and robot based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGDONG YUFENG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence. The network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence comprises a body, wherein a drivemechanism is installed at the bottom of the body; a central processing unit is installed in the head part; a flash memory module and a storage device are arranged on the central processing unit; a human-computer interaction control module is installed on an abdomen part; a power supply is electrically connected with the central processing unit; the central processing unit is electrically connected with the drive mechanism, a voice broadcast module, a liquid crystal display module, a projection module, a network communication module, Bluetooth, a USB interface and the human-computer interaction control module; and the human-computer interaction control module is electrically connected with a sound acquisition module, a scanning module and an execution module. Through the combination of software and hardware, and human-computer interaction, the network-interaction teaching robot based on artificial intelligence is enabled to guide students to actively construct the knowledge structure and ability structure through active studying, understanding and exercise, and complete a teaching program step by step and complete teaching objectives.

title: Simple programming method and device applied to robot education
abstract_text: The invention relates to a simple programming method and device applied to robot education. The simple programming method and device comprises the following steps that S1, compiling a language conversion program and setting the language conversion program in the development board; S2, writing a primary program of the script language class by the student according to the teaching target; S3, the primary program is analyzed into a secondary capable of being embedded into equipment through a language transformation program; S4, the embedded equipment runs the secondary program. The primary program and the secondary program adopt different types of programming languages. According to the simple programming method and device, by means of an interpreter running in the embedded equipment, a useronly needs to write a simple script type control statement, the interpreter can be automatically analyzed into the language which can be executed by the embedded equipment, and then the hardware is controlled to execute the control logic of the user; In this way, the user does not need to configure the embedded equipment by using a high-level language. The user can quickly familiar with programming logic through such a programming mode, learns the thinking of programming and familiarize themselves with hardware, and lays a foundation for subsequent deep learning.

title: A teaching process analysis method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN WINSHARE EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
