abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching process analysis method based on artificial intelligence, which is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: S1, pre-storing the courseware content of a teacher; S2: acquring the video of the teacher's class and the video of the students' attending the class; S3: carrying out image recognition processing on the collected video of a teacher in class and a video of a student attending a class respectively; S4, extracting audio data of teachers and students in the video to classify and identify the audio data; S5, comparing the recognized image and audio with the pre-stored courseware content, and analyzing the teaching process of the teacher according to the comparing result; The invention realizes omni-directional information collection, makes the analyzed material richer and more complete, and the produced analysis report is more detailed. Effectively reduce the use of a large number of human resources; So that teachers can be more targeted to improve their teaching ability.

title: Modular teaching assistant integrated machine, identification method thereof, and artificial intelligence control method
applicants: SICHUAN YIJIAN TIANXIA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a modular teaching assistant integrated machine and an identification method thereof, and an artificial intelligence control method, and belongs to the technical field of modular communication equipment. The modular teaching assistant integrated machine comprises an interface module, wherein a plurality of partition plates are arranged in parallel in the machine box, at least one assembly space is formed between two adjacent partition plates, each assembly space is identical and a modular unit can be detachably assembled in each assembly space; The machine box is provided with a socket corresponding to each modular unit, one end of each socket is communicatively connected with the interface module, and the other end is respectively inserted and matched with each modular unit. The machine box is provided with a plug-in window corresponding to the interface module, the self-identification between the interface module and each modular unit is realized by the identification method of the modular teaching assistant machine, and the man-machine interaction between the teaching assistant machine and the teacher is realized by the artificial intelligence control method of the modular teaching assistant machine.

title: Practice record appearance
abstract_text: The utility model discloses practice record appearance relates to an information storing device, especially a practice record appearance who is applicable to colleges and universities' practice teaching. Including casing and body, the body is installed in hollow casing, and the body includes control module, storage module, voice module, power module and message pick -up sending module, and storagemodule and message pick -up sending module, storage module and voice module link to each other with control module respectively, and power module is that control module, storage module and message pick -up sending module provide the work electric energy, be equipped with camera, microphone, data transmission interface, display screen and button on the casing, display screen and button link to each other with control module respectively. Adopt the course evaluation mode of putting into practice based on artificial intelligence, the discernment student put into practice the course to the classcircumstances, classroom performance and put into practice skill mastery degree etc. Mode through classroom real -time recording score gives objectively equitable evaluation to every student's the course performance of putting into practice.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND METHOD
abstract_text: Proposed are a machine learning device and a machine learning method capable of performing machine learning in a short time and an efficient manner. For each learning target, image processing having a high learning effect regarding the learning target is set in advance. When image processing has been set regarding a learning target included in the image for each image based on teaching data set prepared in advance, a processed image of the image is generated by performing the image processing to that image. By learning a learning target with image data of the generated processed image as the teaching data, basic learning information configured from externally acquired basic learning results can be tuned.

title: A teaching behavior analysis system and an analysis method based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching behavior analysis system and an analysis method based on artificial intelligence, the teaching behavior analysis system includes a data management unit, A data processing unit and a data evaluation unit, in particular comprising a video acquisition unit for collecting instructor's instructional behavior data, A time axis establishing unit for creating a pluralityof time axis sub-units on the teaching behavior data, a data screening unit for screening a class of teaching behavior characteristic data on each time axis sub-unit, and a data analysis unit for analyzing the teaching behavior characteristic data based on artificial intelligence. The teaching behavior analysis system of the invention uploads classroom teaching video by an instructor, And based on artificial intelligence, the teaching behavior features selected from the teaching video with multiple parallel time axes are automatically aggregated, analyzed, in-depth learning and modeling simulation, so that the teaching behavior analysis system can make a detailed and accurate analysis of the teaching behavior of the instructor.

title: An implementation method of speech automatic evaluation platform for oral English teaching of postgraduate students
abstract_text: The invention discloses an implementation method of a speech automatic evaluation platform for oral English teaching of postgraduate students, which is suitable for ESP oral English teaching of graduate students and is used for carrying out network speech recognition of keywords and automatic evaluation of oral English expression in an online international conference oral English teaching system platform. The method comprises the following steps: (1) establishing an ESP special corpus; (2) establishing a user speech recognition feature information database; (3) constructing an algorithm modelfor the automatic evaluation and implementation of spoken language teaching in international conferences; (4) analyzing and processing the feature information, and mining and realizing the retrieval and recognition of 'keywords'. The invention changes the teaching mode and combines the artificial intelligence to carry out the evaluation so as to meet the requirement of compatibility and internationalization, and covers the evaluation elements of English grammar, syntax and context, and has practical significance and improves the teaching and evaluation ability of spoken English.

title: A student privacy data protection method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SICHUAN WINSHARE EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student privacy data protection method based on artificial intelligence. The invention comprises the following steps: receiving a login request inputted by a user through a login interface on the teaching terminal, wherein the login request comprises an account number and a password; collecting a user's face image through a camera on the teaching terminal; comparing the captured face images with the ones stored in the database in advance, and verifying whether the account number and password are correct, if the facial image matching is consistent and the account number and password are correct, randomly generating a login code and sening to a preset mobile terminal, when receiving the login code sent by the user, verifying whether the login code is correct; If thelogin code is verified, allowing the login request and transmitting the data through the teaching terminal. The invention can prevent students' privacy data from being leaked through the artificial intelligence verification of the database.

title: Teaching quality comprehensive evaluation method based on teaching evaluation data credibility
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching quality comprehensive evaluation method based on the teaching evaluation data credibility. The characteristics are extracted from multi-source teaching evaluation data, the historical teaching evaluation data and the behavioral data of the evaluation subjects, a machine learning method is used to analyze the credibility of single teaching evaluation data. At thesame time, the weight of teaching quality evaluation index is adaptively adjusted based on the curriculum type and the attention of the evaluator.Then, based on the above two results, the teaching quality of multi-index fusion course is evaluated comprehensively. Through the method, the authenticity and effectiveness of teaching evaluation is improved, and the improvement of teaching quality is ensured.

title: A synthetic analysis system of emotion and behavior based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: An embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular, the invention relates to a synthetic analysis system of emotion and behavior based on artificial intelligence, includes acquisition devices communicatively connected to each other, platform analysis service equipment, a client display device and an education management service device, the collecting equipment is used for collecting classroom data information, sending the classroom data information to the platform analysis service device.The platform analysis service equipment is used for receiving classroom data information, mining and analyzing effective classroom data information by using convolution neural network, generating and sending visual report and after-class analysis report,the client display equipment is used for receiving visual report and displaying, and the education management service equipment is used for receiving and storing after-class analysis report. The system can mine, clean, structure and analyze the classroom data information in depth, and provide decision basis for teaching research and improving teaching methods.

title: CONTROL DEVICE AND MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a control device and machine learning device capable of adjusting a teaching speed of a tip of a robot so as to coincide with a predetermined target speed.SOLUTION: A machine learning device 100 included in a control device 1 of the present invention is comprised of: a state observing unit 106 for observing teaching speed adjustment amount data indicating an adjustment amount of a moving speed of each motor of a robot, target speed data indicating a target speed at a tip of a robot, traveling speed data indicating a traveling speed of each motor of the robot, and traveling route data indicating a traveling route nearest to the tip of the robot as state variables representing a current state of an environment; a determination data acquiring unit 108 that acquires determination data indicating a result of determining whether or not the traveling speed of the tip of the robot is appropriate; and a learning unit 110 that learns an adjustment amount of a moving speed of each motor of the robot using the state variable and the determination data in association with the target speed data, the movement speed data, and the movement route data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: CONTROLLER AND MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE
abstract_text: To provide a controller and a machine learning device that optimize a teaching position so that unnecessary disturbance is not applied to a robot manipulator.SOLUTION: A controller 1 comprises a machine learning device 100 that includes: a state observation section 106 for observing teaching position correction amount data which indicates a correction amount of a teaching position in controlling a robot according to the teaching position, and motor disturbance value data which indicates a disturbance value of each motor provided in the robot in controlling the robot, as state variables expressing a present state of an environment; a determination data acquisition section 108 for acquiring determination data which indicates a propriety determination result of a disturbance value of each motor provided in the robot in controlling the robot; and a learning section 110 for learning a correction amount of a teaching position of the robot in association with the motor disturbance value data, by using the state variables and the determination data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 2

title: An intelligent interactive learning system based on camera perception
applicants: SHANGHAI JIANKUN EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent interactive learning system based on camera perception, belonging to the field of learning equipment. The system includes image acquisition, image recognition and processing, state classification, analysis and result feedback. Image acquisition is used to collect face images. Image recognition and processing are used to identify student status and display student concentration in class. Condition classification includes inattention, attentive listening, sleeping and confusion. The analysis includes computer-aided analysis, result display and judgment. Results Feedback process includes computer feedback to AI teachers in a variety of ways, image acquisition to obtain face image data, face image data into the image recognition and processing, face imagedata recognition and processing, a part of the students focus on class. Thus the system solves the problem that AI teachers only contact students with video when they are teaching online, but can notknow the students' state in class.

title: English training system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU JINHUI FUSHAN SOFTWARE TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an English training system based on artificial intelligence. The English training system comprises a central processing unit and a platform database and a background service module, a personalized learning module, an operation module and an output module which are connected with the central processing unit and the platform database. The invention also discloses an English training method based on artificial intelligence. The English training method comprises the following steps: selecting the model; inputting the user and personalized learning information; making the learning plan; and intelligently memorizing and tracking the learning process. The English training system and method based on artificial intelligence can effectively improve the learning efficiency, realize sustainable and healthy learning and cultivate users' personalized learning ability and has high interactivity and can increase more user experience and functions and more interaction with learners through the cloud service operation mode so as to achieve the purpose of safe and convenient learning and pleasure teaching.

title: Implementation method of oral English teaching system for flipped classroom
abstract_text: The invention discloses an implementation method of an oral English teaching system for a flipped classroom. The method comprises: step one, constructing a cloud storage platform based on a new voicetechnology; step two, establishing a speaker recognition system on a cloud storage platform; step three, constructing a speech/text retrieval system frame for the speaker recognition system on the cloud storage platform; step four, establishing an STT system under the speech/text retrieval system frame; and step five, establishing a TTS system under the speech/text retrieval system frame. According to the invention, on the basis of the concept and teaching method of the flipped classroom, interaction between students and teachers and between students and artificial intelligence is realized bycombining the current speech recognition technology; and an online oral English teaching and evaluation system that uses the audio data as main learning data and have automatic teaching, self-learningand intelligent scoring functions is provided.

title: A visual analysis method of emotional behavior based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The embodiment of the invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a visual analysis method of emotional behavior based on artificial intelligence. The methodis applied to an electronic device communicatively connected with a photographing device arranged in a classroom, and comprises: image data and voice data collected in real time by the photographing apparatus are obtained and the image data and voice data are stored, a teaching model is obtained, the teaching model is input to the convolution neural network, a convolution neural network is used tomine and analyze image data and voice data, so as to obtain and store the results of teacher-student emotional analysis and teacher-student behavioral analysis, according to the results of teacher-student emotion analysis and teacher-student behavior analysis, visual reports are generated and stored, and the data of visual reports are interpreted by convolution neural network to obtain the data interpretation results and stored, and teaching diagnosis and early warning are carried out according to the data interpretation results. The method can improve the extensibility of multimodal emotionanalysis technology, and then improve the extensibility of convolution neural network.

title: Interactive teaching system and method
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence education and discloses an interactive teaching system. The interactive teaching system includes a student data acquisition module, a student data analysis module, and a teacher feedback module, the teacher feedback module comprises a teacher synthesis unit and a feedback unit, the teacher synthesis unit is used for generatingcartoon image or real person image parameters and corresponding actions and/or an expression parameter, and the feedback unit is used for giving feedback to the student according to the output parameters of the teacher synthesis unit. The system can be applied to various teaching scenes such as language teaching, programming teaching, and mathematical teaching. The artificial intelligence education can better realize the teaching effect evaluation and interaction, and the personalized teaching of thousands of people is achieved. The current mainstream artificial intelligence education methodis also mainly applied to the auxiliary teaching, and artificial intelligence needs to bear more and all teachers' work in the future, and a richer artificial intelligence interaction means and a morerealistic teaching atmosphere can be created, so that the teaching cost can be reduced, and the learning efficiency can be improved.

title: A standardized patient simulation system based on artificial intelligence for humanistic assessment
applicants: SHANGHAI JOLLY MEDICAL EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to a standardized patient simulation system based on artificial intelligence, which can realize humanistic examination, comprising: a control module; a voice interaction module which is connected with the control module and interacts with the examinees according to the test questions to simulate the interrogation scene; a simulated human, which connected with the control module, simulates the physical signs of the patient according to the examination questions, and is used for the physical examination of the examinee; an audio-visual interaction module, which is connectedwith the control module, according to the test questions to simulate the movement of the patient and the sound of various signs; and a humanistic assessment module which is connected with the controlmodule and collects the voice information and expression information of the examinees during the assessment, and sends the information to the control module to evaluate the interrogative attitude ofthe examinees. The invention can identify and understand the questioning of the examinee and feedback according to the data and information recorded in the case database. It can simulate the movementof virtual patient and the sound of every physical sign. It can replace the existing teaching mode of using real person as standardized patient; And according to the voice and expression of the realization of the intelligent humanities assessment.

title: Full-size intelligent display blackboard
applicants: ZIGONG ZHONGLONGQI EDUCATION EQUIPMENT CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching equipment, in particular to a full-size intelligent display blackboard, comprising a display system, a power supply system, a central processing system, a main frame, a video signal control system, an environmental monitoring system, a central control system, a touch control system, a physical imaging display system, an audio and video recording and playing system, a peripheral device connection system, a sound playing and picking system, an optical system, a network data system, an artificial intelligence system, a sound pick-up and a camera, characterized in that the full-size intelligent display blackboard is taken as a whole, and each system is integrated inside the full-size intelligent display blackboard. The invention has theadvantages of simple structure, convenient use, complete functions and high integration, and solves the problem that the existing blackboard is not environmentally friendly, the function is incomplete, the equipment is scattered, the operation is not easy, the vision is not wide, the interaction cannot be performed, the multi-screen display cannot be performed, and the screen cannot be intuitivelydisplayed.

title: Artificial-intelligence-assisted knowledge crowdsourcing question answering system
applicants: SHANGHAI YOUQIAN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: Provided by the invention is an artificial-intelligence-assisted knowledge crowdsourcing question answering system comprising the following application functions: an online question asking unit, a knowledge storage unit, and a matching unit. When a student meets a difficult question, the knowledge storage unit pushes a related answer in a database to the student automatically when the student putsa question by the online question asking unit; if the student is dissatisfied with the answer, the matching unit transmits the question asked by the student to a plurality of teachers via the internet; the related teachers answers the question based on the own specialties and the matching unit pushes the answer to the student; meanwhile, the matching unit stores the question put by the student and the answers made by the teachers into the knowledge storage unit automatically; and after any student puts a similar question at next time, the answer to the question from the knowledge storage unitis obtained timely, so that the question answering timeliness is improved and the learning efficiency of the student is enhanced. According to the invention, with the Internet artificial intelligencetechnology, the question asked by the student can be answered timey and correctly and the teaching burden of the teacher is reduced.

title: Teaching system based on combination of reality with artificial intelligence and virtual live-action teaching system
applicants: CHONGQING VIRTUAL REALITY TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching system based on combination of reality with artificial intelligence and a virtual live-action teaching system. The teaching system based on combination of reality with artificial intelligence comprises a classroom process module and an intelligent course guiding rule module. The classroom process module includes a classroom guiding unit for guiding a classroom process and an interactive training unit for carrying out interactive training between a student and a robot. The intelligent course guiding rule module includes a student interaction determining and identifying rule unit that is used for determining whether the student participate in interaction during the interaction training between the student and the robot. With the teaching system based on combination of reality with artificial intelligence and the virtual live-action teaching system, a problem that the teacher can not conduct a class for other students while giving guidance in study for one student because of one teacher in a classroom in the prior art is solved.

title: Personalized intelligent teaching system
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of intelligent teaching, and discloses a personalized intelligent teaching system. The personalized intelligent teaching system is characterized in that a task module is presented in a barrier passing mode, and different knowledge point explanation units, example units and exercise units are set at the corresponding barriers; a review module includes a personalized question pushing unit, a personalized question selecting unit and a personalized question exercising unit, and a subject map module displays the learning tasks and completion thereof of learners inthe form of images and in a split manner; and a feedback module includes a performance fluctuation display unit, a capability index display unit, a capability ranking display unit and an intelligentevaluation display unit. The personalized intelligent teaching system uses artificial intelligence and a big data algorithm to optimize the learning strategies of students, provide students with intelligent and personalized teaching content and exercises and provide visual intelligent feedback and suggestions.

title: Artificial intelligence-based teaching method, device and terminal device
applicants: HANGZHOU RENZHI NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention is applicable to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a teaching method, a device and a terminal device based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises thefollowing steps of: acquiring teaching medical record information in conformity with preset requirements; acquiring first medical history summary information and/or first decision analysis information of the patient in the teaching medical history information submitted by the student; invoking a standard answer to the teaching medical record, the standard answer comprising second medical historysummary information and/or second decision analysis information; comparing the first medical history summary information with the second medical history summary information, obtaining a first comparison result, and/or comparing the first decision analysis information with the second decision analysis information, the second comparison result being obtained, and the first comparison result and/or the second comparison result being displayed. The invention searches and updates the teaching medical record information in real time through the artificial intelligence, ensures the timeliness of theteaching content, improves the teaching efficiency, and has strong practicability.

title: Intelligent training system and method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent training system and method; the system comprises a training teaching module, a motion determination analysis module and a motion acquisition module; the motion acquisition module is used for acquiring user motion posture information and user life index data in motion, and sending the data to the motion determination analysis module; the motion determination analysis module is used for building a motion model, using the motion model to analyze the user motion posture information and user life index data, obtaining an analysis result, and sending the resultto the training teaching module; the training teaching module is used for displaying training teaching contents, and displaying the analysis result of the motion determination analysis module for theuser in real time. The motion determination analysis module further forms user motion training evaluation, suggestions and a whole motion condition report according to the analysis result; based on artificial intelligence technology, the motion determination analysis module can interact with a cloud server or be deployed on the cloud server; the motion determination analysis module makes postureidentification according to the user posture information acquired by the motion acquisition module, builds a user real time motion model and analyzes user motions according to standard postures in real time, and combines with the user motion life index data, thus obtaining the analysis result. The method and system acquire the user motion posture information and the user motion life feature indexdata, build the motion model and make real time comparison and analysis, make training evaluation and suggestions for user motions without needing artificial participation, thus training and guiding user motions in real time.

title: Online learning method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU HUANGJINWU EDUCATION DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an online learning method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of: playing teaching content; acquiring a video with a user face when the user playsthe teaching content; performing cace emotion recognition based on artificial intelligence to recognize the face emotion of the video with the user face. According to the emotion of the identified user, the teaching content is changed, which includes: accelerating the playing progress when detecting the expression of cheerfulness, excitement or expectation of the user; when the user expression ofdoubt is detected, the playback progress is reduced, and the played content is replayed. The online learning method based on artificial intelligence adjusts the playing content by recognizing the expression of the user to ensure the high-quality teaching level.

title: Building safe blasting protective device
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A building safe blasting protective device comprises a supporting column, a load-borne gear box combined hydraulic system, a left external torque driving wheel, a right external torque driving wheel,a left combined stretching hydraulic rod with a high-pressure water spraying device, a right combined stretching hydraulic rod with a high-pressure water spraying device, a left switching driving wheel, a right switching driving wheel, a left iron ball, a right iron ball, a main mansion, a left mansion, a right mansion, a combined hydraulic motor and a remote controller. The building safe blastingprotective device has the advantages that the supporting column is arranged on the ground which is located at the rear end of the main mansion, the left combined stretching hydraulic rod with the high-pressure water spraying device and the right combined stretching hydraulic rod with the high-pressure water spraying device are arranged on the two sides of the upper end of the supporting column and are adjusted to drive the left iron ball and the right iron ball, after the blasting of the main mansion is accomplished, the left iron ball and the right iron ball stretch out and draw back on theleft side and the right side of the main mansion to protect the dilapidated walls which collapse after the blasting is accomplished and to enable the dilapidated walls to fall to the left mansion andthe right mansion, and the high-pressure water spraying devices on the left stretching hydraulic rod and the right stretching hydraulic rod synchronously spray water to cover the dust raised by the dilapidated walls which collapse after the blasting of the main mansion is accomplished. By the adoption of the building safe blasting protective device, an intelligent teaching model is added to artificial intelligence education in primary and secondary schools in China.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD OF MACHINE TRAINING MODEL OF DETECTING MALICIOUS FILES
abstract_text: FIELD: information technology.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to anti-virus technologies, namely the detection of malicious files. Method of machine learning the malware detection model by using the machine learning model to detect a malicious file method of learning a detection model that provides monotonous changes in the severity of the file depending on the change in the number of patterns of behavior of the malicious file generated based on the analysis of the behavior log.EFFECT: providing the teaching on the detection model for malicious files.10 cl, 5 dwg

title: Controller and machine learning device
abstract_text: The present invention provides a controller and a machine learning device. A machine learning device of a controller observes, as state variables expressing a current state of an environment, teachingposition compensation amount data indicating a compensation amount of a teaching position in control of a robot according to the teaching position and data indicating a disturbance value of each of the motors of the robot in the control of the robot, and acquires determination data indicating an appropriateness determination result of the disturbance value of each of the motors of the robot in the control of the robot. Then, the machine learning device learns the compensation amount of the teaching position of the robot in association with the motor disturbance value data by using the observed state variables and the determination data.

title: CONTROLLER AND MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE
abstract_text: A machine learning device of a controller observes, as state variables expressing a current state of an environment, teaching position compensation amount data indicating a compensation amount of a teaching position in control of a robot according to the teaching position and data indicating a disturbance value of each of the motors of the robot in the control of the robot, and acquires determination data indicating an appropriateness determination result of the disturbance value of each of the motors of the robot in the control of the robot. Then, the machine learning device learns the compensation amount of the teaching position of the robot in association with the motor disturbance value data by using the observed state variables and the determination data.

title: Intelligent bridge system
abstract_text: The invention provides an intelligent bridge system. According to the invention, a multimedia broadcast system is taken as a medium, and actual competition situations of bridge online are observed andemulated at the scene by using the network; then card rules are understood through trick bridge and mini bridge of the Xinrui School; finally there is a teaching stage in which bid asking is learnt with the help of contract bridge; and self-improvement is conducted by combining BM2000. The logical thinking concept of bridge is gradually introduced into the classroom through virtual actual competitions of Xinrui bridge and artificial intelligence and real person games of Lianzhong bridge, so that the teaching of bridge is enabled to be conducted around the relationship among card rules, actualcompetitions and bid asking from beginning to end, the difficulty in bridge teaching is smoothly solved on the aspects of card rules, actual competitions and bid asking in a mode from decomposition to integration in the teaching process, and the bridge theory is enabled to be deepened in understanding step by step.

title: Method for achieving user ability prediction through man-machine interaction
applicants: BEIJING XIZI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of machine learning, and discloses a method for achieving user ability prediction through man-machine interaction. According to the method, participation of any human teacher is not needed in other steps except data preparation and parameter setting in the first step, and therefore occupation to the manpower resource and particularly the education resource is reduced maximally; meanwhile, due to the fact that the method is achieved on the basis of the question step structure and the single step-level doing right accuracy rate, the performance abilities when a user answers various parts of a question can be more precisely estimated, and the purpose of improving the prediction precision by introducing step-level information of the question is achieved; and in addition, in the man-machine interaction process, the step-level right and wrong information of the user can be obtained on the condition that the teaching process is not influenced by means of the ingenious interaction design.

title: Disabusing method and disabusing education robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a disabusing method and disabusing education robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The disabusing method comprises the following steps that: obtaining thequestion of a user, analyzing and mining knowledge big data, and obtaining a knowledge statement set corresponding to the question of the user. By use of the above method and system, a user doubtingquestion is combined with the knowledge big data, the knowledge big data is used for teaching by aiming at the question, so that the user can obtain relevant latest knowledge related to doubt questions from the knowledge big data, teaching exhibits better pertinence, the user can obtain new and comprehensive knowledge, and a teaching effect is improved.

title: Automatic teaching projection system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SUZHOU CHENGRU INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an automatic teaching projection system based on artificial intelligence. The automatic teaching projection system comprises an intelligent classroom, a projection device, a telescopic device, a display device, a closing device, an identification device, a wireless device and a processing device. The intelligent classroom comprises intelligent desks, a blackboard frame and atouchable display screen. The projection device comprises teaching projection channels, teaching projection hydraulic pumps, teaching projection hydraulic rods and teaching projection mapping devices. The telescopic device comprises telescopic channels, telescopic hydraulic pumps, telescopic hydraulic rods and teaching eye trackers. The display device comprises display channels, display tracks, teaching display screens, display motors and display rollers. The closing device comprises projection closing motors, projection closing plates, telescopic closing motors and telescopic closing plates.The identification device comprises first cameras, second cameras, a teacher display screen and warning lights. The wireless device is disposed at an internal position of the processing device, and the processing device is disposed at an internal position of the intelligent classroom.

title: DEEP LEARNING IN BIPARTITE MEMRISTIVE NETWORKS
abstract_text: A bipartite memristive network and method of teaching such a network is described herein. In one example case, the memristive network can include a number of nanofibers, wherein each nanofiber comprises a metallic core and a memristive shell. The memristive network can also include a number of electrodes deposited upon the nanofibers. A first set of the number of electrodes can include input electrodes in the memristive network, and a second set of the number of electrodes can include output electrodes in the memristive network. The memristive network can be embodied as a bipartite memristive network and trained according to the method of teaching described herein.

title: Method for realizing individualized teaching through man-machine interaction
applicants: BEIJING XIZI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, discloses a method for realizing individualized teaching through man-machine interaction, and provides a method for realizing individualized teaching comprising automatic decomposition of learning tasks, automatic recommendation of test questions, positioning of error steps, explanation of questions and the other teaching links through the man-machine interaction. The method has the advantages that in addition to data preparation and parameter setting in the first step, the participation of any human teachers is all not needed in other steps, thereby reducing the occupation of human resources, in particular to educational resources to the maximum extent, compared with a traditional explanation mode taking 15-20 minutes on average, by determining wrong reasons and performing step-level precise explanation, not only can content that does need to be explained be skipped to the maximum extent for specific learning conditions of a user, the questions of the user are explained emphatically, the roots of the questions are excavated deeply, so that the user can understand knowledge points more easily, but also the explanation time is shortened to 2-3 minutes, thereby greatly improving the learning efficiency of the user.

title: Assisted classroom teaching method and device for using robot to recognize student state
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of teaching robots, and discloses an assisted classroom teaching method and device for using a robot to recognize a student state. The method includes: performing knowledge accumulation and deep learning on student states and teaching behaviors, and constructing a student state behavior knowledge database; extracting an eigenvalue of each student state, using anSVM classifier to perform classification and recognition on the eigenvalues, and using a mathematical statistical method to obtain a sensible state weighting method. Meanwhile, an assisted classroom teaching device is disclosed. The method solves the problem that a single sensor cannot accurately recognize the student states, and uses a plurality of sensors and the sensible state weighting methodto analyze the student state data to obtain the accurate student state.

title: Big data and artificial intelligence-based teaching effect evaluation method and robot system
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a big data and artificial intelligence-based teaching effect evaluation method and a robot system. The method comprises the following steps of: searching and obtaining a teaching effect portrait of a to-be-queried teacher from a teaching effect portrait knowledge base; and obtaining values of all the evaluation units belonging to a to-be-queried evaluation unit from the teaching effect portrait of the to-be-queried teacher. According to the method and system, teaching effects of teachers are evaluated through big data and artificial intelligence-based teaching effect portraits, so that the teaching effects of the teachers are evaluated more really and objectively, and then the objectivity and correctness of teaching portraits and teaching evaluation are greatly improved.

title: Virtual online teaching system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to a virtual online teaching system based on artificial intelligence. The virtual online teaching system comprises a plurality of cloud management platforms, a communication network and a plurality of terminals, wherein the terminal is connected with the cloud management platforms through a communication network; the plurality of terminals comprise a teacher management terminal, a parent monitoring terminal and a student intelligent terminal. The teaching system can help teachers to realize more refined virtual teaching. Enough interactive communication can be added in addition to the traditional single-side infusion teaching. The students are scheduled to practice in the class, and more participation sense is achieved compared with a traditional classroom. The attention of the students can be easily attracted, and the studying quality of students in class can be obviously improved.

title: Artificial intelligence auxiliary teaching system
applicants: TAICANG YUHE NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence auxiliary teaching system, and the system comprises a first collection module, a recognition module, an analysis module, a feedback module, and a second collection module. The analysis module is connected with a data module. The analysis module judges whether the student's answer is correct or not according to a standard answer, and analyzes thederivation direction and derivation mode of a knowledge point that a student answers. The analysis module judges the reasonability of the derivation direction of the knowledge point that is answered wrongly according to the relation of knowledge points. The analysis module simultaneously analyzes the derivation mode of the knowledge points of the correct answer corresponding to the wrong answer. The auxiliary teaching system also includes a simulation module, and the simulation module performs the simulation of a problem employing the knowledge points corresponding to the correct answers according to the derivation mode, obtained by the analysis module, of the knowledge points of the correct answer and the application of the knowledge points. The feedback module feeds the simulation condition back to the second collection module, and the second collection module performs supplementary acquisition of test questions according to a feedback problem.

title: Teaching artificial intelligence control system based on voice interaction
applicants: SUZHOU RUOYIMEI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching artificial intelligence control system based on voice interaction. The control system comprises a recognition unit, an analysis unit, a voice unit, an adjustment unit, a projection unit, a play unit and a storage unit. The recognition unit is used for acquiring voice information in a classroom, the analysis unit records and analyzes information sent by the recognition unit, and the voice unit is used for recognizing a command instruction and transmitting the command instruction to the adjustment unit and the projection unit. The adjustment unit includes a temperature control module, a brightness adjustment module, and a gas permeability module, and the projection unit includes a projection module and a receiving module. The projection module is used for controlling the order and forms of items in the classroom, and the receiving module is used for receiving and recognizing the voice instruction. The playing unit includes a task module, an alarm module, and an adjustment module, wherein the task module is used for broadcasting a command, the alarm module is used for broadcasting an emergency event, and the adjustment module is used for adjusting different voices. The system is used for storing information and voice command messages of the analysis unit.

title: Teaching method based on AR (augmented reality) technology, cloud service platform, and teaching system
applicants: SHENZHEN BOSUN FANTASEA TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a teaching method based on the AR (augmented reality) technology, a cloud service platform and a teaching system,wherein the method comprises the steps: transmitting structured knowledge contents to a physical robot and a user terminal based on a knowledge map; receiving image information and voice information,collected by the physical robot, of a real scene, respectively performing facial expression recognition and voice emotion recognition of the image information and the voice information, and acquiringfacial expression information and voice emotion information; performing the fusion calculation of the facial expression information and the voice emotion information to obtain real emotion informationof a user; adjusting the knowledge contents presented to the user in real time according to the real emotion information of the user, thereby solving a technical problem of a poor teaching effect ofthe robot in the prior art.

title: Immersive virtual reality disaster survival rescue optimal path selection system
abstract_text: The invention relates to an immersive virtual reality disaster survival rescue optimal path selection system, comprising a positioning and tracking unit, a negative factor unit, a scene model unit, apath node unit, an artificial intelligence unit, a voice unit, a database unit, a network unit and a three-dimensional engine unit. The selection system is equipped with a training platform. The training platform comprises an accident scene selection module and a function module. The function module comprises a theoretical part and a practical part. The theoretical part comprises a perception andcognition module and a teaching module. The practical part comprises a simulation exercise module and an examination module. According to the system, a virtual reality technology and artificial intelligence are combined to simulate a real disaster scene; through utilization of an immersive virtual reality technology, a participant is enabled to feel a tension atmosphere of a disaster site; and escape training is carried out on a student through utilization of the perception and cognition module, the teaching module, the simulation exercise module and the examination module, so survival probability of people on the site when a disaster occurs is improved.

title: DEEP LEARNING IN BIPARTITE MEMRISTIVE NETWORKS
abstract_text: A bipartite memristive network and method of teaching such a network is described herein. In one example case, the memristive network can include a number of nanofibers, wherein each nanofiber comprises a metallic core and a memristive shell. The memristive network can also include a number of electrodes deposited upon the nanofibers. A first set of the number of electrodes can include input electrodes in the memristive network, and a second set of the number of electrodes can include output electrodes in the memristive network. The memristive network can be embodied as a bipartite memristive network and trained according to the method of teaching described herein.

title: Teaching content mining method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching content mining method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: establishing a teaching content portrait of each teacher according to teaching process big data, and querying teaching contents and teaching effects from the teaching content portrait. By adoption of the above method and system, the effect of the teaching process is accurately evaluated, the location to be improved in the teaching process is accurately positioned, and the utilization effect of teaching resources is improved.

title: Robot assembled from parts of scrapped vehicles
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A robot assembled from parts of scrapped vehicles comprises the chest, the neck, the head, left and right antennae, left and right eyes, the nose, the mouth, left and right arm rods, left and right hands, left and right legs and left and right feet. The parts of the scrapped vehicles are used to assemble the robot, potentials of the robot in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) can be simulated in a computer, a special teaching model is provided for AI education for domestic primary and middle schools, and the robot has significance in culturing innovative talents.

title: Learning performance image method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to a learning performance image method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises: each evaluation unit of each student is used as an evaluation unit label of the learning performance image of each student, a ratio of the total duration of the first preset action of each student to the total duration of each evaluation unit is identified in the teaching video corresponding to each evaluation unit of each student, and the ratio is used as the value of one evaluation unit label of the learning performance image of each student. According to the method and system, the learning performance of a teacher is depicted through the reactions of the students in the classes in the big data of the learning process, and the learning performance of the students can be reflected more realistically and objectively, which can greatly improve the teaching image and the objectivity and accuracy of the learning evaluation of the students.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DEFINING OR LEARNING A ROBOT COMMAND
abstract_text: The invention relates to a system and a method for learning or teaching a robot command. According to the invention, an operator (2) generates robot data (S30), e.g. positions, orientations, poses and/or forces by repeatedly or multiply manually guiding the robot (1), e.g. by pushing and/or pulling one or more robot members with varying forces, an impingement pattern being learned by deep learning by means of a neural network (6) on the basis of the previously acquired sequence of robot data and being associated with a robot command (S40).

title: Intelligent question and answer-based virtual learning environment construction method
abstract_text: The invention relates to an intelligent question and answer-based virtual learning environment construction method, and belongs to the technical field of man-machine interaction. The method comprisesthe following steps of: 1, acquiring and constructing a specific field teaching question and answer data set and preprocessing acquired questions and answers; 2, constructing a BI-LSTM-CRF model to carry out semantic analysis and feature extraction on the questions and answers, so as to realize word segmentation and sequence labeling of sentences; 3, constructing an LSTM network-based answer confidence calculation model, inputting question and answer pair feature vectors, balancing matching degrees of the question and answer pairs through the model, and converting and outputting the answer feature vectors with the highest scores; and 4, building a virtual learning environment by utilizing a Unity 3D-based virtual reality technology, constructing an intelligent question and answer engine, and importing a trained deep learning question and answer model to realize intelligent question and answer-based virtual learning environment construction. According to the method, deep learning is utilized to realize the intelligent question and answer of semantic comprehension layer in specific fields, and is applied to teaching-oriented virtual learning environment to expand thoughts and methodsfor virtual classrooms and man-machine interact research.

title: Teaching content portrait method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention provides a teaching content portrait method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps of taking each time period of each teaching unit of each teacher as a teaching unit time period label of a teaching content portrait of each teacher; recognizing a teaching effect through a teaching video; and respectively taking the teacher teaching effect, the teaching video and the teacher teaching content which are corresponding to each time period of each teaching unit of each teacher as a first content, a second content and a third content of the teaching unit time period label of the teaching content portrait of each teacher. According to the method and the system, the portrait can more objectively, accurately and dynamically reflect the teaching effect and the teaching content of the teacher, so that the portrait can be used for accurately evaluating the effect of a teaching process, carrying out accurate positioningon improvements to be made in the teaching process and improving the utilization effect of teaching resources.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching platform comprising a first support plate, a second support plate and a third support plate. The two ends of first support rods are fixedlyconnected in the four corners of the upper surface of the first support plate and the four corners of the lower surface of the second support plate. The two ends of second support rods are fixedly connected in the four corners of the upper surface of the second support plate and the four corners of the lower surface of the third support plate. A bottom disc is fixedly installed on the lower surface of the first support plate. A double-spindle motor is fixedly installed in the middle of the bottom disc. The front transmission end and the rear transmission end of the double-spindle motor are fixedly connected with a rotating shaft. The artificial intelligence teaching platform is reasonable in structure, easy to operate, small in size and convenient to install and maintain. Meanwhile, automatic motion and manual steering can be realized, and the students are enabled to realize learning of the Python programming language and experiment and practice of the field of artificial intelligenceand robots under the ROS system environment so as to have high practicality.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Teaching effect portrait method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching effect portrait method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: serving each evaluation unit of eachteacher as an evaluation unit label of a teaching effect portrait of each teacher, identifying the proportion of occupying the total duration of each evaluation by the total duration of the first preset actions of all students in the teaching record corresponding to each evaluation unit of each teacher, and serving the proportion as the value of one evaluation unit label of the teaching effect portrait of each teacher. Through the method and system disclosed by the invention, the portrait can be performed on the teaching effect of the teacher through the reaction on the course by the studentin the teaching process big data, the teaching effect of the teacher can be reflected more really and objectively, and the objectivity and accuracy of the teaching portrait and teaching evaluation canbe greatly improved.

title: Teaching assistance system based on artificial intelligence

The teaching assistance system based on artificial intelligence is applied to teaching assistance, therefore, when a user needs to insert an optical disc to play movie and video materials, the output end of the optical disc driver is electrically connected with the input end of the teaching assistance machine, and a USB socket parallel to the optical disc driver is formed, and through the optical disc driver and the USB socket, the user can place the optical disc into the optical disc driver to use the teaching assistance system and can also play needed teaching materials by inserting a USB disc.

title: Individualized education analysis system and method based on video analysis

The system comprises a video monitoring system, a host server, a central server, first switching equipment, second switching equipment and a client. The individualized education analysis system of the invention is an analysis system by virtue of artificial intelligence video analysis, can realize automatic collection, automatic analysis and automatic transmission of classroom teaching related data, reduce labor cost, provide a decision-making basis for teaching research and teaching management, provide teachers with reference for classroomteaching adjustment and improvement, and provide targeted guidance for students' autonomous learning. At the same time, the system is simple in structure, easy to deploy, and low in cost, the client can use an existing PC or smartphone, and is easy to upgrade and maintain, the upgrade and maintenance cost is low, in general, only software of the central server and the host server need to be upgraded, and the intelligent degree is high.

title: Precise teaching evaluation method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence
applicants: DAGUO CHUANGXIN INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a precise teaching evaluation method and robot system based on big data and artificial intelligence. The method includes: establishing a teaching effect portrait of each teacher according to the teaching process big-data, and obtaining a teaching effect of a to-be-queried evaluation unit from a teaching effect portrait of a to-be-queried teacher. According to the above method and system, the portrait is generated for the teaching effect of the teacher through response which is of students in classes and in the teaching process big-data, and is used for teaching evaluation, the teaching effect of the teacher is more really and objectively reflected, and objectivity and accuracy of the teaching portrait and teaching evaluation can be greatly improved.

title: Artificial intelligence child development platform
applicants: HEFEI ALADDIN INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence child development platform, which comprises a first mobile terminal module and a first computer terminal module, wherein the first mobile terminal module and the first computer terminal module are both connected with a first wireless router module, the first wireless router module is connected with a login module, and the login module is connectedwith a child development platform server module. The artificial intelligence child development platform has the beneficial effects that: corresponding teaching practice games are proposed according to relevant teaching videos, such as military chess and Chinese chess, and parents can judge preferences of children according to big data counted by a data statistics module and can prepare some favorable gifts for the children by means of an online shopping module pushed by a controller module, thus the artificial intelligence child development platform can effectively improve the relationship between the parents and the children, so that the physical and mental development of children can be effectively guided, and the social stability and happiness of people are increased indirectly.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, PARTICLE FRACTIONATING SYSTEM, PROGRAM AND PARTICLE FRACTIONATING METHOD
abstract_text: [Object] To provide an information processing apparatus, a particle sorting system, a program, and a particle sorting method that practice a spectral type analysis usable for sorting particles.[Solving Means] The information processing apparatus according to an aspect of the present technology includes: an analysis unit; a learning unit; and a discrimination unit. The analysis unit calculates fluorophore information indicating respective amounts of luminescence of a plurality of types of fluorophores on the basis of detection data indicating amounts of luminescence of fluorescence at respective wavelength bands, the fluorescence having been emitted from a particle irradiated with excitation light, discriminates whether or not to treat the particle as a process target in accordance with the fluorophore information, and generates teaching data by associating a result of the discrimination with the detection data. The learning unit applies a machine learning algorithm to the teaching data, learns a characteristic of the detection data discriminated as the process target, and generates dictionary data including a result of the learning. The discrimination unit discriminates whether or not the particle whose detection data has been acquired is the process target on the basis of the dictionary data when the detection data is supplied.

title: Combined intelligent melon and fruit children's toy
applicants: FOSHAN CITY SANSHUI DISTRICT XIWANG TORCH EDUCATION SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: A combined intelligent melon and fruit children's toy comprises a pumpkin baby, a luffa baby, a left eyebrow, a right eyebrow, a left eye, a right eye, a mouth imitating player, a left palm, a right palm, rollers, luffa stems and an apple teacher. According to the characteristics and requirements of mental growth of children, humanized bionic design is given for melons and fruits such as a luffa,a pumpkin and an apple, the shapes of the pumpkin baby, the luffa baby and the apple teacher are vivid, language dialogue functions are implanted, interaction dialogue and dance of the melons, the fruits and people are realized, strong effects of teaching through lively activities are achieved, the vacancy of Chinese toy markets is filled in, Chinese toy design is promoted to develop towards the field of higher artificial intelligence, and Chinese toys are more effectively promoted to move towards international children's toy markets by wisdom in China.

title: Artificial-intelligence English learning platform
applicants: GUANGDONG YIXUETONG EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial-intelligence English learning platform comprising a control module. The output terminal of the control module is electrically connected with a parent learning supervision management module, a synchronous course learning module, a specialized training module, a wisdom review module, a three-dimensional evaluation module, a leak filling and enhanced acceleratedlearning module electrically; the output terminal of the parent learning supervision management module is connected with a learning report module, a learning progress module, a learning arrangement module and a testing arrangement module electrically; and the output terminal of the three-dimensional evaluation module is connected with an English-Chinese module, a Chinese-English translation module, a voice evaluation module, a spelling evaluation module and a dictation evaluation module electrically. According to the invention, with the artificial-intelligence English learning platform, the students are assisted in improving the learning method and enhancing the learning efficiency; the children's learning enthusiasm is stimulated; the ability of taking examinations is enhanced; controlling of learning of children by parents is realized; on the basis of the VAK learning style, the classroom teaching is set reasonably, the teaching materials are selected reasonably, and the teaching activities are arranged reasonably; the teaching levels of teachers are improved; and the knowledge transmission mode is adjusted.

title: Method and device for early warning credit of kindergarten teachers
abstract_text: The invention applies to the technical field of artificial intelligence, provides a method and a device for early warning credit of kindergarten teachers. The method comprises the following step of: determining the identity information of the kindergarten teachers currently in the class according to the current time and the preset course information; and obtaining a monitoring video correspondingto the classroom; detecting whether there are uncomfortable expressions in face images comprised in the monitoring video; and if there are uncomfortable expressions in the monitoring video, generatinga credit record comprising the monitoring video which comprises the uncomfortable expression and the identity information of the education; and sending the credit record to the credit server. By monitoring the teaching scene, detecting facial expressions and performing pre-judgement, in the event of a suspected security situation, the security status can be confirmed by the credit server, so as to provide a early warning of the activities of the kindergarten teachers in order to prevent the child safety accident from happening again. And the transparency of teacher disciplinary records is improved by ensuring that the records are open and reliable, the judgement of bad behavior is fair

title: Artificial intelligence teaching tool applied to art field
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching tool applied to the art field. A first telescopic rod is arranged,a drawing board is arranged on the first telescopic rod,and the height ofthe drawing board can be adjusted by adjusting the length of the first telescopic rod so that the drawing board can be suitable for different people to use; a rotating shaft is arranged at the top ofa connecting rod,the angle of the drawing board can be adjusted by rotating the drawing board,different people can adjust the angle of the drawing board according to own needs,and the drawing board isconvenient for teachers to use; then a camera is arranged on a third telescopic rod through the rotating shaft,the position of the camera can be adjusted by adjusting the rotating shaft,the second telescopic rod and the third telescopic rod,then the camera can shoot a drawing on the drawing board,and the drawing can be conveniently projected on a projector and can be conveniently watched by students; a fourth telescopic rod is arranged,and the drawing board can be supported by the fourth telescopic rod so that the drawing board can be fixed,and the drawing board can be conveniently used by the teachers.

title: TEACHING DATA GENERATING DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM, AND CROWD STATE RECOGNITION DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: A rectangular region group storage unit 81 stores a group of rectangular regions indicating portions to be recognized for a crowd state on an image. A crowd state recognition dictionary storage unit 82 stores a dictionary of a discriminator acquired by machine learning by use of a plurality of pairs of crowd state image as an image which expresses a crowd state at a predetermined size and includesa person whose basic site is expressed as large as the size of the basic site of a person configuring a crowd defined for the predetermined size, and training label for the crowd state image. A crowdstate recognition unit 83 extracts regions indicated in the group of rectangular regions stored in the rectangular region group storage means from a given image, and recognizes states of the crowds shot in extracted regions based on the dictionary.

title: Campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence
applicants: NEWFORD RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF ADVANCED TECH
abstract_text: A campus education big data cloud platform based on artificial intelligence includes a unified basic platform, a student behavior management subsystem, an education big data comprehensive analysis system, an intelligent decision support system, a regional teaching quality evaluation system, and a regional teacher growth file system, wherein the unified basic platform includes a unified data platform, a unified identity authentication platform and a cloud application management platform, and provides business support for upper-layer applications and provides users with a station-based smart education service. The invention has the characteristics such as district school coordination, unified account, connection openness, and modeling agility. The design of the student behavior management subsystem is closer to the attention needs of parents and teachers, is more conducive to the cultivation of students' specialties and interests, and may also promote the personalization of students andbecome more humane.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE AND THERMAL DISPLACEMENT COMPENSATION DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention provides a machine learning device and a thermal displacement compensation device capable not only of deriving a highly accurate compensation formula but also achieving highly accurate compensation itself at low cost. The machine learning device includes: a measured data acquisition unit (11) that acquires a measured data group; a thermal displacement acquisition unit (12) that acquires a thermal displacement actual measured value about a machine element; a storage unit (13) that uses the measured data group acquired by the measured data acquisition unit as input data, uses the thermal displacement actual measured value about the machine element acquired by the thermal displacement acquisition unit (12) as a label, and stores the input data and the label in association with each other as teaching data; and a calculation formula learning unit (14) that performs machine learning based on the measured data group and the thermal displacement actual measured value about the machine element, thereby setting a thermal displacement estimation calculation formula used for calculating the thermal displacement of the machine element based on the measured data group.

title: Application operation processing method and device and storage medium
applicants: CHINA MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS GROUP CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an application operation processing method. The processing method comprises the steps that a first command is acquired, wherein the first command is used for instructing that acurrent task scene is switched to a teaching scene for task-based teaching demonstration; teaching demonstration information and operation guiding information are sent to a client in response to thefirst command, wherein the teaching demonstration information is used for demonstrating the task-based teaching scene on the client, and the operation guiding information is used for guiding a user inoperating a target character in the task-based teaching scene when an AI robot stops controlling the target character in the demonstrated task-based teaching scene. The invention further discloses anapplication operation processing device and a computer readable storage medium.

title: Accurate teaching method based on big data and artificial intelligence and robot system
applicants: DAGUO INNOVATION INTELLIGENT TECH DONGGUAN CO LTD
abstract_text: An accurate teaching method based on big data and artificial intelligence and a robot system are disclosed. The accurate teaching method comprises the steps of establishing a teaching content portraitof each teacher according to the teaching process big data, inquiring teaching content and the teaching effect from the teaching content portrait, and selecting the teaching content to be recommendedto a user. According to the method and the system, after a teacher completes a class, the teaching units and the teaching periods that the teacher are good or bad at can be known through the portrait, so that the effect of a teaching process can be accurately evaluated, accurate positioning can be carried out on the position where the teaching process needs to be improved, and then a teacher canbe helped to improve the teaching effect. Meanwhile, the teaching resources are uploaded to the internet. After the teaching resource is uploaded to the internet, students can download the teaching resources to see clearly good and bad teaching effects of each teaching unit in the in each time period, so that the the utilization effect of the teaching resources is good.

title: ANALYSIS DATA ANALYZER AND METHOD OF ANALYZING ANALYSIS DATA
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To enable input dimensions useful for discriminant/regression analysis about an unknown sample to be selected with high reliability even when the number of samples of teaching data is small as compared with the versatility of data that is the object of analysis.SOLUTION: After executing machine learning using teaching data and constructing a learning model that is a non-linear function for discriminant analysis or regression analysis (S2), the degree of contribution is calculated for each input dimension from a partial differential value of the function. Then, an input dimension to be nullified is determined using a threshold determined by a gaussian distribution function based on the degree of contribution (S3-S5). Machine learning that uses teaching data with some input dimensions nullified is executed again (S6), the degree of contribution per input dimension is found from the obtained learning model, and the degree of contribution is updated on the basis of old and new degrees of contribution (S7-S8). The process of steps S5-S8 is repeated a designated number of times (S9), and a machine learning model is constructed after determining useful input dimensions on the basis of the final degree of contribution (S10).SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

abstract_text: Provided is an information processing device, comprising: an acquisition unit which acquires first teaching data which includes data and labels for target task learning, and second teaching data which includes data and labels for watermark detection; and a learning means which, on the basis of the first teaching data and the second teaching data, generates a model parameter which configures a machine learning model for detecting the target task and the watermark.

title: MACHINE LEARNING DEVICE, SERVO CONTROL APPARATUS, SERVO CONTROL SYSTEM, AND MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
