title: Online education management system based on deep learning
applicants: XINHUA COLLEGE OF SUN YAT SEN UNIV
GUANGZHOU JINGZE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an online education management system based on deep learning. The online education management system is composed of a central server and mobile terminals. The central server isprovided with a neural network model for automatically judging the mastering levels of knowledge points by students and is used for collecting lots of student learning situation samples to train theneural network model, inputting the results of test questions answered by students and corresponding knowledge points into the trained neural network model, and outputting the weak knowledge points ofthe students. The central server optimizes and adjusts the teacher's teaching content and learning plan advice information of the students based on the weak knowledge points of the students. The mobile terminals obtain the optimized and adjusted teaching content for the teacher and the optimized and adjusted learning plan advice information for the students and generate corresponding test questions. According to the invention, with introduction of deep learning into the education industry, the neural network model is constructed and the weak knowledge points of each student are evaluated automatically, so that personalized and flexible learning plans are made for students. Therefore, the working time of the teacher is freed and defects of strong subjectiveness and one-sidedness of manualevaluation are overcome.

title: Practice recorder
abstract_text: The invention discloses a practice recorder and relates to an information storage device, in particular, a practice recorder applicable to college practice teaching. The practice recorder comprises ashell and a body. The body is mounted in the hollow shell. The body comprises a control module, a storage module, a voice module, a power supply module and an information receiving/sending module. Thestorage module and the information receiving/sending module are connected with the control module. The storage module and the voice module are connected with the control module. The power supply module provides working power for the control module, the storage module and the information receiving/sending module. A camera, a microphone, a data transmission interface, a display screen and a key aremounted on the shell. The display screen and the key are connected with the control module. Attendance conditions, class behaviors and practical skill grasp degree of students in a practice course are identified in a practice course evaluation mode based on artificial intelligence, and objective and reasonable evaluation is carried out on the behaviors of each student in the practice course in amode of carrying out real-time achievement recording in class.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching system and method for science learning
applicants: GUIZHOU JINFU YUCAI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence teaching system and method for science teaching. The system comprises an input device, an output device, a calculation device and a data storage device formed by a plurality of databases, wherein the data storage device is internally provided with a knowledge chapter database, a knowledge topic database, a test question database and a test question answer database; a keyword extraction module, a learning path recommendation module are arranged in the calculation device; the data storage module furthermore comprises an evaluation test paper database, a student evaluation report database and a student individualized test paper database; and the calculation device furthermore comprises a management module, a statistical analysis module and acorrection module. The system and method are capable of effectively managing knowledge points and test questions, and continuously correcting, improving and recommending learning paths in allusion tolearning conditions of student individuals, so as to realize accurate recommendation.

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To allow an optimal white balance gain (WBGain) to be set by using a classification category obtained by machine learning.SOLUTION: A teaching data storage unit 641 has stored teaching data including plural pieces of image data and category numbers of light sources. A machine learning unit 642 performs machine learning of criteria for determining categories of the light sources, and stores the learned criteria (classifier) in a related parameter storage unit 643. A light source identifying unit 644 performs category classification of an initial estimation vector with the classifier stored in the related parameter storage unit 643, and outputs categories of one or more light sources at a scene photographing a frame and data such as distance between the categories of the light sources and the initial estimation vector on a feature space to a white balance correction unit 65.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 7

title: IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, IMAGE PROCESSING METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: Provided is an image processing device, comprising: an acquisition unit which acquires an image for learning which is used in machine learning; a region of interest setting unit which sets, on the image, a region of interest which includes a detection subject; a detection region setting unit which sets, on the image, a detection region whereat a teaching signal is to be set; and a teaching signal setting unit which sets, on the detection region, a teaching signal which can take values that are three or more values corresponding to the degree of association between the detection region and the region of interest.

title: Attitude evaluation scoring method and system based on computer vision deep learning algorithm
applicants: DONGGUAN SONGSHAN LAKE INT ROBOT INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an attitude evaluation scoring method and system based on a computer vision deep learning algorithm. The attitude evaluation scoring method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image of a sporter, and extracting a skeleton which has several joint parts and joint points; acquiring spatial position information of all the joint points; comparing the obtained joint pointinformation of a current image with image joint point information in a sample library, and calculating the spatial distance of the joint points of corresponding positions of the two images and the angle of a limb connected between the joint points; fusing two results and calculating a current matching value; recording the current matching value as a larger or smaller score according to the matching results; counting scores, and displaying color-marked images and the corresponding scores for users to view. The attitude evaluation scoring method and system based on the computer vision deep learning algorithm, disclosed by the invention, have the advantages of convenience in use and stronger teaching purpose.

title: Artificial intelligence's teaching system based on tensorFlow
applicants: BEIJING HAITUN SHIJI EDUCATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence's teaching system based on tensorFlow, including power module, image acquisition device, treater, a plurality of teaching module and display module, power module is used for providing operating voltage for each part, every teaching module is connected to the treater for receive images collection system gathers treats to carry out the image information of the identifier body detection and identification to image information and handle, obtains detection and identification image information, select corresponding teaching module according todetection and identification image information to with detection and identification image information transmitted to the teaching module who corresponds, teaching module is used for according to detection and identification image information and presets the teaching resource generating the content of courses, display module connect the processor for show detection and identification result and broadcast content of courses completion teaching. The utility model discloses not only reduce the study threshold, and inside can store a large amount of education resources, and can alleviate the burdenof books, improved study enthusiasm, make the student give the interest to study for change.

title: Artificial intelligence classroom teaching system
applicants: ANHUI TIME SHARE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence classroom teaching system and relates to the field of artificial intelligence. The artificial intelligence classroom teaching system comprises a user, a client side serving as a platform for conducting information interaction between the user and the system, an artificial intelligence server serving as equipment for providing intelligent service,a knowledge base for storing a large amount of knowledge-type data information, and a user library for storing a large amount of user data information. The artificial intelligence server is arranged between the client side and the knowledge base, and the user library is connected with the client side. The artificial intelligence server further comprises a student unit, a teacher unit and a parentunit. According to the artificial intelligence classroom teaching system, a platform for intelligent solving, teacher teaching, self-testing and data downloading is provided for students through the student unit, a platform for learning progress learning and communicating with teachers is provided for parents through the parent unit, the learning efficiency of the students is improved, learning interest of the students is increased, and the parents are helped to learn learning situations of the students.

title: Artificial intelligence VR novel holographic laser projection imaging teaching demonstration rack and method
applicants: HUZHOU FENGLEI JIUZHOU HOTEL MAN CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence VR novel holographic laser projection imaging teaching demonstration rack and method. The rack comprises a bottom plate and a supporting plate. The two sides of the top of the bottom plate are fixedly connected with guide columns. Through grooves matched with the guide columns are formed in the bottom of the supporting plate. The ends, close to the supporting plate, of the guide columns are in sliding connection with the inner surfaces of the through grooves. The position, located between the top of the bottom plate and the bottom of the supporting plate, of the outer surface of each guide column is sleeved with a first spring. The two sides of the top of the supporting plate are fixedly connected with U-shaped plates. The tops of the inner surfaces of the U-shaped plates are fixedly connected with rotating blocks through connecting blocks, and the inner surfaces of the rotating blocks are rotationally connected with lead screws. The invention relates to the technical field of demonstration racks. According to the artificial intelligence VR novel holographic laser projection imaging teaching demonstration rack, through cooperationbetween motors, first belt wheels and second belt wheels, the lead screws can be driven to rotate, a demonstration table can be driven to ascend or descend through cooperation between the lead screwsand threaded columns, and students on the back row can clearly see the content conveniently.

title: Intelligent classroom roll-call system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent classroom roll-call system based on artificial intelligence, belonging to the technical field of communication. The intelligent classroom roll-call system comprises a photo acquisition unit, which is used for directly acquiring photos by a course teacher, directly transmitting the photos to a school central server, and sampling photos by the teacher in a class and before the ending of the class; a student feature information extraction unit, which extracts the feature information of the photos, establishing an initial database, and associating the featureinformation with the information about the numbers and names of students; an artificial intelligence deep learning unit and the like. The intelligent classroom roll-call system provided by the invention can be easily interfaced with other systems such as an educational administration information system and an learning industrial production information system; big data processing is carried out tocomprehensively reflect the learning quality of students, the classroom assessment of teachers, checking and evaluation of learning industrial production, etc.; the intelligent classroom roll-call system uses the technical means of artificial intelligence deep learning to reflect comprehensive information in the process of a class through a photo, and is coordinated with big data for analysis ofthe classroom effects of teaching and learning, so a scientific decision-making basis is provided for teachers, educational administration personal, parents and the like.

title: Student comprehensive portrait label management system for online teaching based on deep learning
abstract_text: The invention discloses a student comprehensive portrait label management system for online teaching based on deep learning, and the system comprises a data acquisition unit, a data preprocessing unit, an image label refining unit, and a result output and presentation unit. The system employs the point burying technology, the brain wave acquisition technology, the viewpoint tracking technology, the image recognition technology, the text mining technology and a deep learning algorithm for the learning contents, behaviors, physical sings and result data of students, and carries out the integration, checking and cleaning of the data collected and obtained from a plurality of data sources. The important dimension information is screened out of the basic data, and a representative portrait label is extracted, and a top-to-bottom integrated label system is formed. The portrait label result is displayed and used in a visualized manner through a proper logic. The system achieves the scientificevaluation of the hierarchical capability of student groups and individuals, achieves the scientific evaluation and presentation of the hierarchical capability of student groups and individuals in asystematic manner, and effectively guides the optimization and improvement of a student training scheme and a teaching content plan.

abstract_text: The invention provides a robot self-directed learning method for human-machine cooperation. title: Teaching assistance big-data intelligent analysis method based on feature recognition
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching assistance big-data intelligent analysis method based on feature recognition, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, obtaining a student stationary image;S2, extracting direct gradient features of the image; S3, carrying out the machine learning operation; S4, sliding a window; S5, selecting a motion with the maximum probability under the motion classification, and recognizing the motion; S6, carrying out the face recognition of a person who makes the motion at step S5. The method can achieve the extraction of the behavior features of a student, achieves the recognition of the behaviors and motions of the student, greatly facilitates the management of students, and facilitates the improvement of the teaching quality.

title: Big-data-based online teaching process evaluating method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a big-data-based online teaching process evaluating method. The method comprises the following steps: step one, acquiring data; step two, carrying out data mining; and step three, building a model. On the basis of the characteristic of deep layering consistency of the deep layering structure of a deep learning algorithm and a human brain cognitive system, an online learning process analysis model is constructed to realize education quality assessment and policy analysis study based on the education quality assessment. According to the big-data-based online teaching process evaluating method, the online learning process analysis model is constructed by utilizing the characteristic of deep layering consistency of the deep layering structure of the deep learning algorithm and the human brain cognitive system, so that the education quality assessment and policy analysis study based on the education quality assessment are realized.

title: LEARNING MODEL CONSTRUCTION DEVICE AND OVERHEAT PREDICTION DEVICE
abstract_text: The invention relates to a learning model construction device and an overheat prediction device. The learning model construction device (20) includes an input unit (21)that inputs cutting processing conditions and a present temperature of a spindle motor. The learning model construction device also includes a learning unit (23) that receives the cutting processingconditions and the present temperature of the spindle motor and a label which is a temperature of the spindle motor after the cutting processing is performed as a set of teaching data and performs machine learning on the basis of the teaching data to construct a learning model for learning temperature-related information after processing of the spindle motor during the cutting processing.

title: Internet-of-things experimental device based on artificial intelligence

title: DICTIONARY LEARNING DEVICE, DICTIONARY LEARNING METHOD, DATA RECOGNITION METHOD, AND PROGRAM STORAGE MEDIUM
abstract_text: In order to enable machine learning to be carried out more efficiently, a dictionary learning device 1 is equipped with an importance calculation unit 2 and a data selection unit 3. On the basis of feature vectors, multiple items of teaching data are arranged in a feature space having, as variables, elements that constitute a feature vector in the teaching data. In this case, for each unlabeled data item included in the multiple items of teaching data the importance calculation unit 2 calculates the importance of the unlabeled data item, on the basis of the density of labeled data in the teaching data in a region having a size that has been set by using that unlabeled data as a standard. On the basis of information representing the closeness of an unlabeled data item and a discrimination boundary based on a discrimination function serving as a basis for discriminating data, and information representing the importance from the importance calculation unit 2, the data selectin unit 3 selects data to be labeled from among the multiple items of unlabeled data.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING DEVICE, IMAGE PROCESSING DEVICE, MICROSCOPE, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND INFORMATION PROCESSING PROGRAM
abstract_text: [Problem] To reduce processing load when computing a feature value of a fluorescence image. title: CAMERA CONTROL SYSTEM, CAMERA CONTROL METHOD, AND PROGRAM

title: COMPUTER SYSTEM, TEACHING DATA TRADING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: [Problem] The purpose of the present invention is to provide a computer system, a teaching data trading method, and a program that enable teaching data used in machine learning to be traded. [Solution] A computer system for trading teaching data used in machine learning receives from a lister an input of teaching data to be listed, receives from a purchaser a search for teaching data the purchaser wishes to purchase, and receives from the purchaser a purchase of the preferred teaching data. In addition, the computer system receives a search that is based on any among the data type, data volume, data content, or programming language of the teaching data the purchaser wishes to purchase or based on a combination of a plurality of the same. Additionally, the computer system carries out machine learning using the teaching data for which the purchase was received and provides the results of the machine learning to the purchaser. An input of the listing price for the listed teaching data is received from the lister. The compatibility between the sensor device used by the purchaser and the teaching data the purchaser wishes to purchase is presented. A sensor device having excellent compatibility with the purchased teaching data is presented.

title: Artificial intelligence diagnosis and treatment ecological robot
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence diagnosis and treatment ecological robot comprising a central processor; the central processor comprises a medical diagnosis module, a treatment module, an intelligent lift experience module, an intelligent work experience module, a shopping module and a system setting module; the medical diagnosis module comprises a face diagnosis module, a tongue diagnosis module, an index analysis module and a foreign video conference module. The central processor has the medical diagnosis module, the treatment module, the intelligent lift experience module, the intelligent work experience module, the shopping module and the system setting module, thus conveniently treating patients, providing the best diet sports solution, carrying out interesting teaching for children, automatically regulating home humidity, easily providing online shopping of body care products and diagnosis services for patients, and realizing a multi-function integrated one-stop medical ecology platform.

title: WIRE ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a wire electric discharge machine that appropriately and simply performs heat displacement correction of upper and lower guides. The wire electric discharge machine includes a memory part (21) relating a temperature of a mechanical element to measured values of relative locations of upper and lower guides to memorize the relating result as relating data and a relational expression calculating part (22) in consideration of the relating data as teaching data and extracting and calculating a relational expression between the temperature of the mechanical element and the measured values of the relative locations of the upper and lower guides through machine learning. Further, the wire electric discharge machine includes a location estimating part (23) substituting the temperature of the mechanical element for the relational expression position to calculate estimation values of the relative locations of the upper and lower guides and a correction calculation part (24) calculating amounts of correction of the upper and lower guides on the basis of the estimation values of the relative locations of the upper and lower guides. Furthermore, the wire electric discharge machine includes a correction execution part (25) calculating correction of the relative locations of the upper and lower guides on the basis of the amounts of correction.

title: WIRE ELECTRIC DISCHARGE MACHINE
abstract_text: The present invention relates to a wire electric discharge machine that appropriately performs heat displacement correction of upper and lower guides even though there is a change in installation environments. The wire electric discharge machine includes a memory part (21) memorizing a temperature of a mechanical element as temperature data and an expression part (22) numberizing installation environments to express the numberized results as environment data. Further, the wire electric discharge machine includes a location command part (23) commanding the relative locations of the upper and lower guides and a relational expression calculating part (24) considering the temperature data and the environment data as input data, considering the relative locations as teaching data, and calculating a relational expression through machine learning. Furthermore, the wire electric discharge machine includes relational expression determination part (29) substituting the temperature of the mechanical element for the relational expression position to calculate amounts of correction of the upper and lower guides and if an error between the relative locations of the upper and lower guides based on the amounts of correction and the relative locations of the upper and lower guides commanded by the location command part (23) is small, determining the relational expression as a regular expression and a correction execution part (25) correcting the relative locations of the upper and lower guides with the relational expression.

title: Mobile phone intelligent teaching and management platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a mobile phone intelligent teaching and management platform, which comprises a user login and management system, a resource loading and management system, a function task and operating system, and a teaching evaluation and data interface system. The teaching and management platform of the invention is developed by means of the computer programming, network communication, multimedia, artificial intelligence, virtual reality and big data processing technology, is used for classroom teaching, interactive teaching, online learning, self-directed learning and intelligent learning, implements formative evaluation of a learning process and dynamic early warning of learning effects, and performs teaching affairs information statistics and teaching effectiveness analysis andevaluation. The teaching and management platform of the invention is helpful for the application and popularization of new teaching modes such as online and offline teaching, flipped classroom, virtuality and reality combination and the like; helps teachers and students to interact and carry out personalized teaching and guidance; helps students to actively participate in classroom teaching and develop self-directed learning and active learning, and promotes the implementation of a student-centered talent training objective; and contributes to the dynamic updating of teaching resources and opening up and sharing across regions.

title: Standardized patient simulation system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI JOLLY MEDICAL EDUCATION CO LTD
abstract_text: Provided is a standardized patient simulation system based on artificial intelligence. The system includes a control module and a case history database, the case history database is connected with thecontrol module, stores various types of case history data and information, and sends the case history data and information corresponding to test questions selected by participants to the control module; the system also includes a voice interaction module, the voice interaction module is connected with the control module, and based on the case history data and information, the voice interaction module conducts interactive question answering with the participants and simulates scenes of diagnosis through interrogation; the system also includes a simulation person, the simulation person is connected with the control module, and simulates signs of patients on case histories according to the case history data and information, and the participants conduct physical examinations on the stimulation person; the system also comprises an audio-visual interaction module, the audio-visual interaction module is connected with the control module, and according to the case history data and information, the audio-visual interaction module simulates movements and voices of various signs of the patients on the case histories. According to the system, the questions of the participants can be recognized and understood, and feedbacks are made according to data and information recorded in the case history database; the voices of various signs and the movements of virtual patients can be simulated; anexisting teaching mode which uses a real person as a standardized patient can be replaced.

title: Artificial intelligence teaching aids system
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence teaching aids system. The artificial intelligence teaching aids system comprises audio image collecting equipment and a computer terminal with a dataanalysis system; the audio image collecting equipment is arranged at an assigned position of a classroom and collects teaching audios and teacher and student facial images, and the computer terminal displays analysis data of the teaching audios and the teacher and student images by the data analysis system, judges whether the analysis data is abnormal or not according to a set threshold value, andgives out prompt when the analysis data is abnormal. Class-attending state data of students is provided for a teacher in real time through a screen, the ratio of students who do not understand the content or the students who do not attend the class can be artificially set, when a set value is exceeded, the teacher is reminded to reexplain the corresponding knowledge points or maintain the class attending order. The teaching voice of the teacher is captured through microphones and then subjected to voice recognition analysis, the unsmooth content in the explaining process of the teacher is looked up and labeled, and the system can give improvement suggestions about improving the teaching ability of the teacher according to the teaching behavior of the teacher.

title: Man-machine interaction method and system for online education based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention discloses a man-machine interaction method and system for online education based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the digitalized visual and acoustic technology in the field ofelectronic information. The system comprises a subsystem which can recognize the emotion of an audience and an intelligent session subsystem. Particularly, the two subsystems are combined with an online education system, thereby achieving the better presentation of the personalized teaching contents for the audience. The system starts from the improvement of the man-machine interaction vividnessof the online education. The emotion recognition subsystem judges the learning state of a user through the expression of the user when the user watches a video, and then the intelligent session subsystem carries out the machine Q&A interaction. The emotion recognition subsystem finally classifies the emotions of the audiences into seven types: angry, aversion, fear, sadness, surprise, neutrality,and happiness. The intelligent session subsystem will adjust the corresponding course content according to different emotions, and carry out the machine Q&A interaction, thereby achieving a purpose ofenabling the teacher-student interaction and feedback in the conventional class to be presented in an online mode, and enabling the online class to be more personalized.

title: Adversarial neural network-based driver training and test system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an adversarial neural network-based driver training and test system and relates to the technical field of computer application. The traditional single training system and testsystem are replaced by a neural network system in machine learning, and the aim is to convert data of test qualified personnel in the conventional test system into useful information, such as voice, prompt tone and text information, for the driver through training of the neural network to replace part of teaching tasks of a coach. Labor cost is reduced and waste of time is reduced, so that the learning efficiency of students is improved.

title: Artificial intelligence education system based on big data and data processing method thereof
applicants: FOSHAN JIJIA INTERDYNAMIC TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an artificial intelligence education system based on big data and a data processing method thereof. The system includes an education resource management end module, a teaching service end module, a school management end module, a learner end module, a supervision evaluation end module, a technology and security management end module and a fee payment management end module. The education resource management end module, the teaching service end module, the school management end module, the learner end module, the supervision evaluation end module, the technology and security management end module, and the fee payment management end module are connected to the center of the education system. The method includes data preprocessing, data classification, structure collation and integration, and data storage. The system and the method can carry out wireless data exchange, are beneficial to the sharing of data and are conducive to the implementation of the education process; and the system and the method can also promote the processing speed of big data, are conducive to the reception and transmission of big data, make the data not need to be accumulated, and achieveresource sharing.

title: Teacher classroom teaching process analysis method based on artificial intelligence technology and teacher classroom teaching process analysis system based on artificial intelligence technology
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a teacher classroom teaching process analysis method based on the artificial intelligence technology and a teacher classroom teaching process analysis system based on the artificial intelligence technology. The method comprises the steps that the class video of the teacher is acquired; image recognition processing and voice recognition processing are performed; and teacher classroom teaching process analysis is performed according to the result of image recognition processing and voice recognition processing. The big data acquisition standard of the classroom teaching process can be established, the analysis data of the classroom teaching process can be accurately acquired and the analysis result can be automatically generated; and teaching process analysis and learning condition analysis can be associated so that the teaching mode can be analyzed and the teaching effect produced by different teaching modes can also be analyzed. Data acquisition is more completeand accurate, and the analysis result is enabled to be more accurate through combination of the image recognition and voiceprint recognition technology of the artificial intelligence technology. The method is not limited to the conventional S-T analysis method, and multiple teaching processes of teaching of the teacher, interaction between the teacher and the students, group discussion of the students, teaching video playing and silent practice can be accurately recognized.

title: Real-time concentration analysis method based on face recognition technology and real-time concentration analysis system based on face recognition technology
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a real-time concentration analysis method based on the face recognition technology and a real-time concentration analysis system based on the face recognition technology. According to the method, the personnel face image under the current video monitoring environment is sampled and analyzed through the face recognition technology of AI (artificial intelligence) of the information technology field so that the big data acquisition standard of student concentration can be established under the state of no interference in the classroom teaching process, the concentration canbe judged and the objective and real data result can be provided for learning condition analysis of classroom teaching through the scientific big data algorithm. The result is applied to the technical field of education and student concentration analysis of the whole class can be completed by using the principle of statistics and the algorithm. The learning condition of the student in the classroom teaching process can be accurately analyzed through other relevant data like classroom teaching process analysis and face recognition accurate matching, etc.

title: Piano music record difficulty identification method based on metric learning semi-supervising
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of machine learning and music score automatic identification technology. The invention aims to realize capability of adapting with music score data change, realizinghigh identification stability and high identification accuracy and supplying reliable piano difficulty grade information for a piano teaching process and a piano learning process. The invention provides a piano music record difficulty identification method based on metric learning semi-supervising, wherein the method comprises the following steps of 1, collecting data sets of a testing data source with a difficulty label in two different evaluation systems; 2, performing normalization preprocessing and data cleaning on the extracted characteristic data, settling a problem of data unbalance, and evaluating effectiveness of a difficulty-related characteristic; 3, performing supervised algorithm classification based on a metric learning theory on one data set, and obtaining a classificationcorrect rate; 4, collecting the data sets of the two evaluation systems; and 5, improving classification correct rate of the data set in the other evaluation system by means of the data in one evaluation system. The method according to the invention is mainly applied to a music score identification occasion.

title: Machine Learning Controller for Prize Dispensing Entertainment Machines
abstract_text: A system to rapidly set up new claw machines for different styles of prizes, while also providing an excellent player experience through dynamically changing claw machine behavior through machine learning algorithms. These systems can be readily installed on most any crane machine by replacing the controller card. The system is configured by means of a control wand physically connected to the controller. Teaching the machine about the prize is accomplished by physically inserting a sample prize into the grabber, and executed a command via control wand to tell the machine to learn. Once configured and taught the prize, the machine is autonomous, and will maintain its programmed profit margin throughout the prizes dispensed by learning player behavior and making adjustments after each play.

title: Intellectualized teaching result obtaining method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: GUANGZHOU MOYI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an intellectualized teaching result obtaining method and system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical of data sifting. The method comprises the steps ofestablishing a first teaching database through a teaching data set; obtaining first target data according to data input into the first teaching database by a first user; conducting weighing processing on the first target data to obtain first result data; setting the sequence of data in the first teaching database according to the first result data; establishing a second teaching database according to the first result data and the sequence of the data; obtaining second target data according to data input by a second user in a second database; sifting and processing the second target data according to a sifting rule to obtain second result data; conducting data expression according to the second result data to obtain teaching result data. The technical problems that data is ossified in a teaching platform, only static data or data within a local time is provided, and the teaching result data cannot be given in real time are solved.

title: Big data education technology-based customized self-adaptive learning system
applicants: HUNAN YISHANG POWER NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides a big data education technology-based customized self-adaptive learning system comprising the following steps: education data mining (EDM) is performed; statistics, machine learning and data mining methods are researched and used for analyzing data produced during teaching and learning processes; learning analytics (LA) is adopted, data concerning learners and learning environments thereof is measured, collected, analyzed, gathered and presented; an aim is to understand and optimized learning and learning environments. The system is aimed at providing customized learningservice, teachers are enabled to know well about students and understand and observe learning processes of the students; a suitable teaching method and order can be found, problems can be timely found and intervening operation can be performed.

title: Novel multimedia teacher desk of mesa self -adaptation adjustment
applicants: GUANGZHOU FOCUS DIGITAL TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a novel multimedia teacher desk of mesa self -adaptation adjustment, it includes the lectern body, an elevating devic, the reversed pallet device, electronic equipment system and control system, the lectern body includes the upper portion podium and the lower part cabinet body, the podium is passed through elevating gear and can be installed movablely from top to bottomon the cabinet body, be provided with on the lectern mesa and utilize a drive arrangement drive left side, open or closed protecting cover smooth protecting cover is automatic on the right side, andcarry out angular adjustment's display screen through the reversed pallet device, the utility model discloses an each electric putter entering artificial intelligence operating condition of CPU microprocessor intelligent control realizes that the lectern mesa goes up and down, the protecting cover opens and shuts and the full automatic control of display screen angular adjustment's intelligence, can adjust the height of lectern mesa according to different teachers' height self -adaptation, realizes the display screen and adjusts more accurately and keep at the visual rotation angle of the best, and is small, and simple structure is easy and simple to handle, can satisfy different height teachers and modern multimedia teaching's demand.

title: Artificial intelligence educational machine people
applicants: SHENZHEN QIANHAI YUNSHUBAO INTERNET CO LTD
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence educational machine people, including intelligent robot intelligent robot's eyes in install the security monitoring module respectively, module,figure identification module and projection functional module, the live module of teaching, home theater module are recorded to the video, the intelligent robot head still install online education system and speech recognition system, still include and carry out the communication system that communicates with the intelligent education management system on backstage. Like this with online educationsystem through installing on intelligent robot, integrate intelligent robot and online education system.

title: Artificial intelligence learning and training system based on feedback
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence learning and training system based on feedback, system include two equipment, and firstly equipment will train, the student studys the wearable intelligent sensor that notes student standardization training action one to one, and secondly whether equipment instruct the feedback student move in the motion process correctly and inform that student's train uses the controller. The utility model provides an artificial intelligence learning and training system based on feedback, the part replaces train's guiding effect, can let the student whenthe train does not guide, whether equally obtains to move the exact feedback, improves the teaching efficiency, reduces student learning cost.

title: Gesture recognition method and application thereof
abstract_text: The invention provides a gesture recognition method and application thereof, and belongs to the field of intelligent teaching. The gesture recognition method comprises the steps that (1) a depth map captured by Kinect is inputted to perform sample sequence preprocessing so that the synthesized dynamic gesture training samples can be acquired; and (2) the synthesized dynamic gesture training samples are inputted to a trained deep learning model to be recognized: the trained deep learning model outputs the recognition probability of each class according to the class, the highest recognition probability is found and the corresponding class of the highest recognition probability is the recognition result. With application of the method, the gesture recognition rate and robustness can be enhanced, and the teacher is enabled to use the natural gestures used in the common teaching process to give lessons to the students with no requirement for focusing on memorizing the interaction method sothat the limited energy can be completely devoted to teaching.

title: SYSTEM FOR COUNTING QUANTITY OF GAME TOKENS
abstract_text: A chip recognition system in which a chip is configured to at least partially have a specific color indicative of a value of the chip includes: a recording device that uses a camera and records a state of the chip as an image; an image analysis device that subjects the image so recorded to image analysis and recognizes at least the specific color and a reference color that is present in the image and differs from the specific color; and a recognition device at least including an artificial intelligence device that uses a result of the image analysis by the image analysis device and specifies the specific color of the chip, wherein the artificial intelligence device of the recognition device has been subjected to teaching using, as training data, a plurality of images of the chip and the reference color irradiated with different illumination intensities.

title: Method and device for teaching hosted by robot
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the field of robot education and discloses a method and a device for teaching hosted by a robot. The teacher firstly inputs teaching objectives, student characteristics, teaching resources, teaching methods in the form of parameters to the robot, and issues teaching tasks; the robot analyzes the teaching objectives and the students characteristics, chooses appropriate teaching methods, organizes teaching contents to carry out teaching, communicates and interacts with students through modes of voice, visions and body movements, and answers questions intelligently; underthe participation of the teacher, the robot evaluates teaching effects through self-analysis and student feedback and determines teaching strategies in the next state. The robot teaching method of the invention can completely replace the teaching of the teacher, greatly reducing the teaching workload, and the teaching robot can constantly update the knowledge base according to the techniques of machine learning, expert systems, etc., optimize the teaching strategy, and continuously improve the teaching effect and teaching quality. The method and the device provided by the invention can alleviate the shortage of teachers in remote mountainous areas and rural areas.

title: Knowledge content weight analysis system and method based on knowledge graph
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of information and education, and relates to a knowledge content weight analysis system and method based on a knowledge graph. The knowledge content weightanalysis system comprises the following modules: a datum preset module, a data acquisition module and a calculation analysis module, wherein the datum preset module is used for prefabricating a knowledge point tree diagram according to course outline requirements, establishing a relationship among knowledge points by setting weight values for the knowledge points and generating a preset knowledgegraph; the data acquisition module is connected with the datum preset module and is used for acquiring teaching content knowledge points in the class teaching process and carrying out matching on acquired teaching contents; and the calculation analysis module is connected with the data acquisition module and is used for carrying out summarizing analysis on the acquired teaching contents and carrying out matching analysis on the acquired teaching content knowledge points and knowledge contents of the preset knowledge graph. According to the knowledge content weight analysis system and method disclosed by the invention, the teaching knowledge graph can be preset according to the actual course outline for teachers to teach, actual contents of class teaching is analyzed by an artificial intelligence technology, a comparison analysis result can be fed back in real time, evaluation on class teaching knowledge contents is quantified, and teaching quality is continuously improved.

title: Simulated-figure artificial intelligence teaching system and method based on multi-language human-computer interaction
abstract_text: The invention discloses a simulated-figure artificial intelligence teaching system and method based on multi-language human-computer interaction. The system comprises a server and at least one learning terminal. The server can establish data exchange connection with any number of learning terminals. The learning terminal is configured to establish human-computer interaction, pre-store real-figurelanguage teaching videos, carry out simulated-figure processing on a real figure to obtain simulated-figure language teaching videos and send real-figure language teaching video data and/ or simulated-figure language teaching video data to the learning terminal according to a learning terminal request; the learning terminal sends a signal for requesting for entering a real-figure language teachingmode to the server when obtaining a real-figure language teaching mode signal; and the learning terminal sends a signal for requesting for entering a simulated-figure language teaching mode when obtaining a simulated-figure language teaching mode signal. The advantages are that the system and method have the advantages of improving interaction effect, increasing learning interest and improving students ' interest and the like.

title: INFORMATION PROCESSING APPARATUS, INFORMATION PROCESSING METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To determine the state of a surface of a building or the like, exhaustively.SOLUTION: An information processing apparatus includes: a learning unit which performs deep learning on an image obtained by imaging a surface, on the basis of teaching data indicating the state of the surface; an image acquisition unit which acquires an image obtained by imaging an area including a surface and associated with position information indicating a shooting position; and a state determination unit which determines the state of the surface in the image acquired by the image acquisition unit, on the basis of a learning result of the learning unit.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Teaching diagnostic analysis system through comprehensive application of artificial intelligence technology and teaching diagnostic analysis method thereof
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of communication and education, and relates to a teaching diagnostic analysis system through comprehensive application of the artificial intelligence technology and a teaching diagnostic analysis method thereof. The teaching diagnostic analysis system comprises a prefabricated classroom indicator module, a data acquisition module, a face recognition andprocessing module for extracting images, a voiceprint recognition and processing module for extracting audio signals, a voice recognition and processing module for converting voice into texts and recognizing high frequency content and a natural language processing module for performing secondary analysis on the text content. A correlation analysis module is used for establishing a correlation analysis view with the time value acting as the index and generating the classroom teaching quantitative indicator analysis result. A diagnostic analysis module constructs the correlation analysis view of the learning condition, the knowledge content, the teaching process and the teaching characteristics with the time value acting as the dimension so as to form the teaching analysis result. The big data acquisition standard is established by using the artificial intelligence technology so that the classroom teaching analysis data can be accurately acquired; and the teaching process, knowledge content analysis and learning condition analysis can be correlated so that the teaching effect generated by different teaching modes can be analyzed.

title: Method and system for distributed deep machine learning
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to distributed deep machine learning on a cluster. In one example, a request is received for estimating one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model on a cluster including a plurality of nodes. A set of data is obtained to be used for estimating the one or more parameters. The set of data is divided into a plurality of sub-sets of data, each of which corresponds to one of the plurality of nodes. Each sub-set of data is allocated to a corresponding node for estimating values of the one or more parameters based on the sub-set of data. Estimated values of the one or more parameters obtained based on a corresponding sub-set of data allocated to the node, are received from each of the plurality of nodes. The one or more parameters of the machine learning model are estimated based on the estimated values of the one or more parameters generated by at least some of the plurality of nodes.

title: System and method of using courseware to automatically generate classroom teaching knowledge graph
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of information and education, and relates to a system and a method of using courseware to automatically generate a classroom teaching knowledge graph. Thesystem comprises the following modules: a classroom content recording module, a data acquisition module and a graph generation module, wherein the classroom content recording module is used for enabling a plug-in installed in a user computer to record and recognize a classroom courseware content; the data acquisition module is connected with the classroom content recording module for converting the recorded classroom courseware content to text information and recognizing a key content; and the graph generation module is connected with the data acquisition module for calculating the weight value of the key content recognized by the data acquisition module, building a correlation property-value pair relationship, and storing the data to generate a preset knowledge graph. According to the courseware of a teacher in class, depending on artificial intelligence technology, the courseware content is recognized, the weight value of a knowledge point is calculated, the relationship among the knowledge points is built, and the knowledge graph related to the classroom teaching content is generated automatically, the teaching knowledge content of the teacher can be evaluated in real time, reflection of the teacher is promoted, and the teaching quality is enhanced continuously.

title: CHIP RECOGNIZING AND LEARNING SYSTEM
abstract_text: A chip recognizing and learning system includes: a game recording device configured to record a state of chips piled up on a gaming table as an image by a camera; a chip determining device including an artificial intelligence device configured to analyze the recorded image of the state of the chips to determine the numbers and kinds of chips bet by a player; and a teaching device configured to input, in a case where it is determined that there is a doubt for an error in a determining result of the chip determining device, the image used for determination of the chip determining device and the correct numbers and correct kinds of chips for the error as teaching data to the artificial intelligence device to allow the artificial intelligence device to perform learning.

title: Quantization classroom teaching quality evaluating system and method
applicants: GUANGZHOU THINK HEIGHT INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention belongs to the technical field of communication and education, and relates to a quantization classroom teaching quality evaluating system and method. The system comprises a data acquisition module which is used for acquiring courseware in a teaching process and a knowledge content in a teaching video and converting the video content into an audio content, a data processing and storing module which is connected with the data acquisition module, uses an artificial intelligence technology to carry out information identification and data preprocessing to establish a teaching quality database to store the acquired data, and clusters the data, and a data mining and presenting module which is connected with the data processing and storing module, and is used for carrying out sub-index score calculation on the data in the teaching quality database, summarizing the calculated teaching quality results, and visually presenting the results according to the set dimension. According to the invention, the system based on the artificial intelligence technology can effectively identify various factors of classroom teaching; total factor evaluation of the teaching quality is realized; the investment in supervising the teaching quality is effectively reduced; and the education quality management efficiency is enhanced.

title: Embedded teaching system control method and device
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of embedded systems, in particular to an embedded teaching system control method and device. The method comprises the steps that by parsing and decomposing embedded program codes, according to the function and structure of a program, different code segments are obtained, and different prompt signals are distributed to the different code segments so as to provide the corresponding prompt signal according to the running condition of each code segment in the program code running process, so that segmented prompting of embedded program running is achieved, entry-level learners can obtain the running conditions of the program codes intuitively and conveniently in real time, and then improvement is made in time. In addition, signal prompting is conducted on all phases of starting and running of an embedded system body, junior development learners can be assisted in intuitively and deep learning software and hardware structures of the embedded system, and the device is a teaching and developing platform of the multi-level intuitive embedded system considering system software and hardware, embedded programs and the like simultaneously.

title: Courseware editing method for computer to simulate live lessons
abstract_text: The present invention provides a courseware editing method for a computer to simulate live lessons, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises a preparation phase and an editing input phase. According to the method provided by the present invention, for the process of human-computer interaction, people can be enabled not only to deeply understand the logic of explanation in the communication process, but also to master the skills for allowing the partners to understand the explanation content as soon as possible and communicating and interacting with each other timely; compared with the existing courseware editing and production methods, the method provided by the present invention can not only allow the students to get out of the awkward situation of being unable to learn anytime and anywhere, but also provide a more scientific and reasonable mechanism of human-machine interaction in the fields of education and teaching for a wide range of teachers and schools; and timely pause and interaction optimize the teaching level of teachers, the error rate of teachers in class teaching is reduced, and the unlimited copying of excellent teacher resources can be realized while greatly liberating productivity of the teachers, so that real teachers in ''double-class classroom'' can have more energy to concentrate on other aspects of student development, and an available approach is provided to the balanced distribution of educational resources.

title: Knowledge classification-based multi-screen knowledge visualization method
abstract_text: The invention discloses a knowledge classification-based multi-screen knowledge visualization method. The method comprises the following steps of: 1) dividing knowledges into concept type knowledge, process type knowledge and application type knowledge by utilizing a logic regression classifier which is established through a classification method on the basis of logic regression in machine learning; 2) knowledge visualization: carrying out visualization operation on the knowledges by utilizing a corresponding visualization tool so as to obtain different types of visualized images; 3) for the visualized knowledges, displaying the visualized images and character information at the same time by using a multi-screen technology through combining corresponding character specification. According to the knowledge visualization-based method, a viewpoint of classifying the visualized knowledges is presented, a multi-screen teaching system is combined to carry out display, and information is displayed in a vision form and a character form, so that the learners can enhance the knowledge understanding and memorizing through dual-coding processing information, so as to promote the application of a knowledge visualization technology to the aspects of teacher teaching, knowledge transfer, thought inspiration and the like.

title: Multi-screen knowledge visualization method based on knowledge classification
abstract_text: The invention discloses a multi-screen knowledge visualization method based on knowledge classification. The method comprises the steps that (1) a logic regression classifier established based on a logic regression classification method in machine learning is utilized to divide knowledge into concept knowledge, process knowledge and application knowledge; (2) the knowledge is visualized, wherein a corresponding visualization tool is utilized to perform visualization operation on the knowledge, and visualized images of different types are made; and (3) a multi-screen technology is used to display the visualized images and text information of the visualized knowledge at the same time in combination with corresponding text description. Based on the knowledge visualization method, the viewpoint of classifying the visualized knowledge is proposed, display is performed in combination with a multi-screen teaching system, the information is displayed in a visual form and a text form at the same time, a learner enhances understanding and memorizing of the knowledge by processing the information through "dual coding", and application of the knowledge visualization technology in teacher teaching, knowledge transmission, thought enlightenment and other aspects is promoted.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to estimating one or more parameters on a system including a plurality of nodes. In one example, the system comprises: one or more learner nodes, each of which is configured for generating information related to a group of words for estimating the one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model; and a plurality of server nodes, each of which is configured for obtaining a plurality of sub-vectors each of which is a portion of a vector that represents a word in the group of words, updating the sub-vectors based at least partially on the information to generate a plurality of updated sub-vectors, and estimating at least one of the one or more parameters associated with the machine learning model based on the plurality of updated sub-vectors.

title: Classroom teaching evaluation system based on artificial intelligence micro-expression analysis
abstract_text: The invention discloses a classroom teaching evaluation system based on artificial intelligence micro-expression analysis. The evaluation system consists of a video input system, a cloud processing system and an output module. The cloud processing system comprises a server, a GPU acceleration artificial intelligence calculation module, a micro-expression module, an attendance checking module, a seat position information module, an interpersonal relationship module, a learning assistant system, an educational administration system and an evaluation and estimation system. According to the invention, through classroom real-time monitoring, comprehensive information like expressions and micro-expressions, seat position information and interpersonal relationships of students can be dynamically captured in real time; through a data base connected with educational administration information, learning assistant information and a mental health center, classroom effects, recognition and mental states of students can be reflected through big data processing; and important scientific analysis and decision basis are provided for each of teachers, educational administrators, learning assistants, and parents.

title: Artificial intelligence technology-based teaching system and method
abstract_text: The present invention provides an artificial intelligence technology-based teaching system and method. The artificial intelligence technology-based teaching system includes an acquisition device and a control device; the acquisition device is connected with the control device; the acquisition device is used for acquiring teaching data; and the control device is used for controlling the acquisition process of teaching objects for the teaching data and is also used for controlling the operation of the teaching system according to the teaching data. According to the artificial intelligence technology-based teaching system and method of the invention, video and audio analysis technology is adopted to automatically acquire and analyze the class attending conditions of students and teachers in real time so as to generate teaching behavior data, and acquire and analyze field environment data to generate teaching environment data, so that the teaching behavior data and the teaching environment data can be combined tougher, and therefore, the operation of the teaching system can be controlled, and intelligent teaching can be realized.

title: Railway vehicle state monitoring device
abstract_text: To provide a railway vehicle state monitoring device that is capable of performing determination easily without requiring much time and effort to adjust parameters for determining a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in a railway vehicle. This railway vehicle state monitoring device 100 comprises: a detection device 1 that detects vehicle information represented by e.g. the wheel load of wheels 31 of a railway vehicle 3 traveling on a track; and a determination device 2 including a classifier 21 to which the detected vehicle information is input, and that outputs a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in the railway vehicle. The classifier is created by employing machine learning such that, by employing, as teaching data, the vehicle information of a railway vehicle for which the vehicle state is known and said vehicle state, said known vehicle state is output when the vehicle information is input.

title: Evolution operator teaching aid
abstract_text: The invention relates to an evolution operator teaching aid and belongs to the teaching technology and artificial intelligence field. The evolution operator teaching aid comprises a base plate (1), a wiring box (2) and a display plate (5). An operation process and an operation result of an evolution operator are displayed through the display plate (5), an operation process progress is visually displayed through movement of a chromosome block (7), and changing chromosomes are emphasized through locus light. The effect is vivid, visual and is full of fun, students are facilitated to deeply understand an abstract operation process, the students are stimulated to have further thinking, student innovation is facilitated, an algorithm in the prior art is optimized, an evolution operator with higher performance can be designed, student innovation consciousness is cultivated, and creation enthusiasm is stimulated. The evolution operator teaching aid is advantaged in that the evolution operator teaching aid can be used for realizing demonstration in class teaching, innovative or design experiments can be carried out by the students, scientific research personnel can be facilitated to carry out evolution operator design, and the evolution operator teaching aid has a wide application scope. The evolution operator teaching aid has important meaning for research, application and correlated subject development of an evolution algorithm.

title: REVERSE MULTIPLE-CHOICE METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE ENGINEERING AND EXPERT SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION
abstract_text: A system and method of communication based on the Reverse Multiple-Choice Method of teaching and testing is disclosed where at least one communicant is a machine. The method is applicable for training a machine for knowledge engineering and artificial intelligence oriented applications, as well as for a trained machine to assist a human being engaged in the activity of teaching or testing.

title: Intelligent teaching and learning system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The invention relates to the technical field of teaching, and in particular to an intelligent teaching and learning system based on artificial intelligence. Aplurality of intelligent learning terminals are connected to a learning resource database through internet signals. The intelligent learning terminals which can be arranged by users can perform self-learning. The plurality intelligent learning terminals are in electrical connection to a fault detection system. An intelligent acquiring terminal is in electrical connection to a data acquiring module. A micro-processor is in electrical connection to a data integrating module, a data determining module and a data processing module. The data determination module is in electrical connection to the data integrating module which is in electrical connection to the data acquiring module. The microprocessor is in electrical connection to a data extracting module, an execution module and an acoustic module, and the data extracting module is connected to the learning resource database through internet signals. The system herein can mitigate burden of books and increase learning passion.

title: LEARNING SUPPORT SYSTEM HAVING CONTINUOUS EVALUATION FUNCTION OF LEARNER AND TEACHING MATERIAL
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a learning support system capable of realizing highly efficient learning support compatible to an actual state by evaluating the possibility of presence of a teaching material obsolete or including errors and the possibility of a difference in difficulty of storing and fixing due to question difficulties or characteristics or learner's characteristics.SOLUTION: This learning support system is characterized in that question information 310 includes question sentences, solution information, and achievement target values, learning history information 400 includes question information identifier 311, a learner identifier 210, and achievement information 420, and an analysis unit 104 includes means 712 for continuously estimating and recording the academic level probability distribution 711 of a learner and the difficulty level probability distribution 721 of questions by a machine learning algorithm on the basis of the learning history information, and means 715 for calculating and recording an oblivion function indicating how much the learner has lost stored learned question information in a time axis after learning by utilizing the academic level probability distribution of the learner, the difficulty level probability distribution of questions, and the learning history information.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 7

title: Assembly tolerance optimization method based on quality loss and cost minimization
abstract_text: The invention relates to an assembly tolerance optimization method based on quality loss and cost minimization. The method mainly comprises the following steps: establishing a mathematical model of quality loss and processing cost; adding actual processing capability constraints; performing parameter initialization on a multi-objective teaching and learning algorithm; performing iteration in a teaching phase on an initial solution of the algorithm; adopting a hill-climbing search strategy to further develop the solution; performing Pareto ranking on a population; further studying the solution, and further increasing the accuracy of the solution; and completing the iterative process and finding the optimal solution. The assembly tolerance optimization method based on the quality loss and cost minimization provided by the invention is based on the computer technology, and combines the swarm intelligent optimization algorithm in the field of artificial intelligence, which further improves the calculation efficiency and calculation accuracy of assembly tolerance design, and aims to satisfy the design accuracy under precision manufacturing, improve the production efficiency, and improve the parts quality, so as to further reduce the production cost.

title: Method for carrying out anaphora resolution on teaching video on the basis of unsupervised mode
applicants: SHENZHEN WETECCTV SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention puts forward a method for carrying out anaphora resolution on a teaching video on the basis of an unsupervised mode. The method comprises the following main contents: a vision-language model and the learning and the reasoning of a combined model. The method comprises the following steps that: utilizing a vision model to process the video; processing a transcription and action graph by the language model to show information related to all pieces of anaphora of coding; formulating an anaphora resolution target as a graph optimization task; utilizing the action graph to serve as potential expression; connecting an entity to action output; and utilizing all historical information of the action to realize unsupervised anaphora resolution. By use of the method, a limitation that a traditional method needs to have enough supervision in training time is broken through, an unsupervised anaphora resolution method is imported into the teaching video, learning vision and the language model are combined to carry out the anaphora resolution so as to solve different types of ambiguities in a better robustness way, and natural language processing is promoted to be further developed in an artificial intelligence field.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED DEEP MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to distributed deep machine learning on a cluster. In one example, a request is received for estimating one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model on a cluster including a plurality of nodes. A set of data is obtained to be used for estimating the one or more parameters. The set of data is divided into a plurality of sub-sets of data, each of which corresponds to one of the plurality of nodes. Each sub-set of data is allocated to a corresponding node for estimating values of the one or more parameters based on the sub-set of data. Estimated values of the one or more parameters obtained based on a corresponding sub-set of data allocated to the node, are received from each of the plurality of nodes. The one or more parameters of the machine learning model are estimated based on the estimated values of the one or more parameters generated by at least some of the plurality of nodes.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR DISTRIBUTED DEEP MACHINE LEARNING
abstract_text: The present teaching relates to distributed deep machine learning on a cluster. In one example, a request is received for estimating one or more parameters associated with a machine learning model on a cluster including a plurality of nodes. A set of data is obtained to be used for estimating the one or more parameters. The set of data is divided into a plurality of sub-sets of data, each of which corresponds to one of the plurality of nodes. Each sub-set of data is allocated to a corresponding node for estimating values of the one or more parameters based on the sub-set of data. Estimated values of the one or more parameters obtained based on a corresponding sub-set of data allocated to the node, are received from each of the plurality of nodes. The one or more parameters of the machine learning model are estimated based on the estimated values of the one or more parameters generated by at least some of the plurality of nodes.

title: Method for automatically establishing online teaching resource library
applicants: CHANGSHA ZHIQING INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method for automatically establishing an online teaching resource library. The method comprises the steps of firstly establishing an online teaching resource database, wherein the online teaching resource database comprises a data crawling table, a teaching resource data table, a teaching resource classification table and a teaching resource scoring table; secondly performing information extraction and quality detection on resource information of the online teaching resource database, and storing detailed data of online teaching resources in the teaching resource data table; thirdly performing automatic classification on the online teaching resources by using an SVM algorithm in machine learning; fourthly storing a classification result in the teaching resource classification table; and finally performing scoring on the online teaching resources according to a page view of the online teaching resource library, user evaluations and the number of participants, sorting the teaching resources from high to low according to scores, and storing a scoring result in the teaching resource scoring table. The method has high integrity, continuity and unity, and brings great convenience to clients in resource search and evaluation.

title: Artificial intelligence learning and training method based on feedback
abstract_text: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence learning and training method based on feedback.
