The method specially comprises the steps that 1, through the adoption of electric sensors by students and based on the method of neural network learning, standard training actions of the students are recorded when coaches and students are learning one-to-one; 2, in the follow-up training of the students, follow-up training actions are compared with the standard actions recorded in the step 1 by the electric sensors, so that whether the follow-up training actions are correct or not is recognized; 3, after the comparison, the coaches feed back whether the actions of the students in the movement process are correct or not through the indication of the controllers and tell the students; 4, after instructed by the coaches multiple times, the students record correct movement modes and wrong movement modes through the electric sensors. According to the artificial intelligence learning and training method based on the feedback, the instruction function of the coaches is replaced partially, students can also get the feedback whether their actions are correct or not when without the instruction of the coaches, accordingly the teaching efficiency is improved and the learning costs of the students are reduced.

title: EDUCATIONAL TEACHING SYSTEM AND METHOD UTILIZING INTERACTIVE AVATARS WITH LEARNING MANAGER AND AUTHORING MANAGER FUNCTIONS
abstract_text: An educational system presents an interactive avatar representing a subject matter expert in a particular field on a student's device, where the avatar can respond to queries posed by the student, and accompany the response with additional supporting information. The avatar's responses are based on artificial intelligence comparisons between the student queries and a knowledge base of anticipated questions, responses and learning goals. An authoring manager system employs natural language processing to identify an underlying meaning in the student's query and to add semantically equivalent questions in the knowledge base and internet searches to aid in compiling the list of anticipated questions. A student profile is stored containing student information and a history of the student's interaction with the avatar. Learning manager software, using the learning goals in the knowledge base and a record of the conversation, can compare and assess the student's progress to the learning goals.

title: System and method for evaluating students' mastery degree in class based on multiple sensors
abstract_text: The invention discloses a system and a method for evaluating students' mastery degree in class based on multiple sensors. The method comprises the following steps: collecting student data; preprocessing a student face image sequence and a speech sequence; extracting facial expressions and speech features; classifying facial expressions, speeches and examination results; using a Gaussian mixture model to integrate the classification results; and analyzing the integration result and giving class evaluation and suggestions. The convolution neural network in deep learning is adopted in speech emotion processing, and complicated artificial feature extraction is avoided. Through use of the Gaussian mixture model, the degree of classification confidence of classifiers is determined according to sample distribution and fused adaptively. A novel student in-class mastery degree evaluation scheme based on multiple sensors is designed by combining the facial expressions, speeches and examination results of students. The mastery degree of students in class can be evaluated more objectively and accurately, the mastery degree of students can be judged, and a teaching evaluation result and corresponding suggestions can be given.

title: Interactive teaching method and terminal used for intelligent robot
applicants: BEIJING GUANGNIAN WUXIAN SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention provides an interactive teaching method and terminal used for an intelligent robot. The interactive teaching method comprises the following steps of acquiring the current scene picture by an image collecting device; performing image processing to the current scene picture to identify objects in the current scene picture; identifying the identified objects; judging whether a knowledge base has knowledge terms corresponding to the identified objects; if the knowledge base has the corresponding knowledge terms, judging whether the knowledge items are associated with a teaching module further; and combining the teaching module to generate the multimodal output data related to the teaching content and outputting it. The artificial intelligence device of the invention can carry on the image analysis to the real scene and cooperate with the knowledge base to search out the corresponding knowledge in the corresponding teaching application environment to carry on the scene teaching to the user, so as to make the learning of knowledge closer to the user's life. By triggering similar scenes, knowledge teaching is conducted, and the user is enabled to better understand the knowledge.

title: Railway vehicle state monitoring device
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide a railway vehicle state monitoring device that is capable of performing determination easily without requiring much time and effort to adjust parameters for determining a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in a railway vehicle. [Solution] This railway vehicle state monitoring device 100 comprises: a detection device 1 that detects vehicle information represented by e.g. the wheel load of wheels 31 of a railway vehicle 3 traveling on a track; and a determination device 2 including a classifier 21 to which the detected vehicle information is input, and that outputs a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in the railway vehicle. The classifier is created by employing machine learning such that, by employing, as teaching data, the vehicle information of a railway vehicle for which the vehicle state is known and said vehicle state, said known vehicle state is output when the vehicle information is input.

title: Tail end quenching experiment device
abstract_text: The invention discloses a heat treatment experiment device and belongs to the field of material heat treatment and performance tests. The heat treatment experiment device mainly comprises a plurality of heating furnaces, a rotary mechanism, a quenching workbench, a normalization workbench, a tail end quenching workbench, a furnace body support rotary mechanism, a furnace body, a circulating cooling system and an atmosphere protection system. The rotary mechanism supports the heating furnaces and drives the heating furnaces to rotate along a spindle. Under driving of the spindle, the furnace body can rotate to be above the set workbench, meanwhile, under driving of the furnace body rotary mechanism, the furnace body can rotate by 90 degrees, and the process that samples from the insides of the heating furnaces are subjected to oil quenching, water quenching, normalization and tail end quenching is completed. Traditional manual operation is replaced, and thus danger and measuring errors caused by manual operation are avoided completely. Artificial intelligence software is installed on an upper computer connected to the heat treatment experiment device, estimation judgment and experiment result prediction can be conducted on the set experiment parameters, the local operation process can be simulated through a virtual laboratory, and thus misoperation in the operation process is reduced. The heat treatment experiment device has wide experiment teaching application prospects and further has the characteristics of simple operation, high efficiency, safety, water saving and the like at the same time.

title: GRIPPING INFORMATION ACQUISITION DEVICE, ROBOT TEACHING DEVICE AND ROBOT CONTROLLER, AND GRIPPING INFORMATION ACQUISITION METHOD, AND ROBOT TEACHING METHOD AND ROBOT CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To accurately and easily acquire information associated with a gripping form in which a person grips an article in his or her hand.SOLUTION: A gripping information acquisition device 3 comprises: an infrared image acquisition unit 11 which acquires an infrared image generated by imaging an object gripped in a person's hand in a predetermined gripping form by an infrared camera C after the object being released from being gripped in the hand; a thermal trace extraction unit 12 which extracts a thermal trace of the hand left on a surface of the object from the infrared image; a thermal trace feature quantity extraction unit 13 which extracts a feature quantity of the thermal trace; a tutor data acquisition unit 14 which acquires tutor data corresponding to a predetermined gripping form; and an identifier generation unit 15 which generates an identifier 16 for identifying the gripping form corresponding to the feature quantity of the thermal trace through machine learning of the feature quantity of the thermal trace and the tutor data.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Method for detecting contamination of an optical component of a surroundings sensor for recording the surrounding area of a vehicle, method for the machine
abstract_text: A method for detecting contamination 110, such as dirt, dust or rain, of an optical component of a surroundings sensor or external camera of a vehicle. An image signal comprising an image area 300 from the camera is read and processed by a machine-taught classifier to detect the contamination in the image area. Optionally, the image signal may comprise a further image area 302, which spatially differs from the first image area. The first and further image areas may differ in the time they were recorded and compared to determine a feature difference, and the image signal is processed as a function of the feature difference. Optionally, a grid may be formed on the first and further image areas. A lighting classifier may be used to distinguish between different lighting environments. A method of teaching the classifier using machine learning on training data is provided.

title: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR SUPPORTING CREATION OF TEACHING DATA, PROGRAM, AND PROGRAM RECORDING MEDIUM
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To create teaching data used for machine-learning of learning data, with a user-friendly operation, used for classifying an object from the feature of the object obtained by imaging a carrier carrying a cell.SOLUTION: The method according to the present invention includes the steps of: displaying teaching image including an object for creating teaching data in a display unit and allowing classification of the object; and receiving the result of classifying the object displayed in the display unit and creating teaching data while associating the classification result and the teaching image with each other.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 6

title: Navigational Control of Robotic Systems and Other Computer-Implemented Processes Using Developmental Network with Turing Machine Learning
abstract_text: The Developmental Network incorporates a Turing Machine that injects teaching instructions directly into the skull-closed network. The Developmental Network can also autonomously learn directly from the natural world without the need for a human to encode its input and output. The neural network so configured can be used as a controller for robotic and other computer control applications where the neural network is organized into plural X-Y-Z areas receiving signals from sensors and providing signals to effectors.

title: Teaching analytic system based on artificial intelligence
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a teaching analytic system based on artificial intelligence, it includes structure frame, smart host, display, wireless connection ware, facial recognizer, activity projecting apparatus, sense of touch strip and face identification terminal, smart host installs the structure frame is inside, the display is fixed on the structure frame, the display with the smart host electricity is connected, the wireless connection ware with the smart host electricity is connected. Compared with the prior art, the utility model, have following advantage and effect: can realize localized solution, install the teaching analytic system based on artificial intelligence of movable projecting apparatus, can realize the insitu analysis result and can realize on -the -spot show.

title: Intelligent classroom and intelligent control method
abstract_text: The invention discloses an intelligent classroom and an intelligent control method. The intelligent classroom comprises a classroom body, desks and chairs, acousto-optic equipment, a student control touch screen, a teacher touch control screen, a display screen and a central processor. The central processor has a data memory and a processor, the data memory is internally provided with teaching content of each subject, and the processor is in wireless connection with the student control touch screen, the teacher touch control screen, the display screen and the acousto-optic equipment, and receives or sends a control signal. The invention also discloses an intelligent control method for the intelligent classroom. By means of technologies of artificial intelligence, the Internet, and the like, various learning demands of the learner can be met.

title: Intelligent computer aided teaching system based on information fusion and machine learning
abstract_text: An intelligent computer aided teaching system based on information fusion and machine learning comprises a teaching process information fusion subsystem and a teaching simulation execution subsystem. The teaching process information fusion subsystem is used for conducting multi-dimensional object information extraction for objects, materials and tool elements involved in the teaching process, processing unstructured incomplete data, eliminating coupling noises and relevant redundant data among various index data, and providing metadata support for the teaching simulation execution subsystem. The teaching simulation execution subsystem is used for mining and integrating the metadata uploaded by the teaching process information fusion subsystem, and simulating the execution process involved in the teaching process; and for achieving optimization and dynamic scheduling of the automatic teaching process according to the evaluation of student learning effects and current teaching resource allocation conditions. The invention provides the intelligent computer aided teaching system based on the information fusion and machine learning, which has higher intelligence and good applicability.

title: Electron mathematics learning machine
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a digital teaching field discloses an electron mathematics learning machine, learning organism, capacitive touch screen, built -in speaker, shift knob, data connection port and wand have been included, the utility model discloses a configuration optimization design is adopted the wand to discern the manuscript and is turned into the electron manuscript and save in the learning, carries out real -time autonomic learning to can through external magnetic force computer keypad sleeve carry on the electron manuscript editor, handle and respond, the structure is small and exquisite, suitable student hand -carries.

title: Triaxial wind pendulum motion control experimental teaching device and use method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a triaxial wind pendulum motion control experimental teaching device comprising a triaxial wind pendulum and an upper computer. The triaxial wind pendulum comprises a support which is provided with a power supply, a control device and a driving device. The free end of the cantilever of the support is connected with a pendulum rod through a universal joint. The pendulum rod is connected with a bracket which is provided with an angular sensor and a triaxial motor. The triaxial motor is provided with positive and negative oars. The control device is connected with the upper computer in a communication way. The upper computer controls motion or adjusts the state of the triaxial wind pendulum through multiple interactive modes. Therefore, according to the triaxial wind pendulum motion control experimental teaching device and a use method thereof, the platform relates to multiple aspects of training, including motion detection, the control algorithm and machine learning so that the platform is suitable for practical training of multiple majors of students, such as automation, the computer and the electronic information technology.

title: Method and device for reducing student behavior analysis misjudgment of recording-broadcasting system
abstract_text: The invention discloses a method and a device for reducing student behavior analysis misjudgment of a recording-broadcasting system. The method comprises the steps of inputting motion data into a preprocessor for performing preprocessing; transmitting a processed motion attribute to a trainer and an analyzer; performing model training by the trainer, thereby obtaining a decision model; and analyzing each behavior model by the analyzer. According to the method, student behavior analysis misjudgment is reduced through a machine learning method. The device is composed of a data preprocessor, a model trainer and the analyzer. Through training the data of the preprocessor, a system finishes automatic detection for behavior analysis according to one behavior analysis model of one teaching environment school, thereby preventing setting of a large number of parameter according to a parameter method, and preventing misjudgment.

title: Curriculum group support evaluation method based on knowledge automation
abstract_text: The invention discloses a curriculum group support evaluation method based on knowledge automation and mainly relates to the field of knowledge automation. The curriculum group support evaluation method comprises steps of: acquiring curriculum teaching data; preprocessing the data and computing curriculum knowledge interface coverage by using an IF-IDF algorithm; learning samples by using machine learning to acquire a knowledge rule and expressing the knowledge rule with a discovery analysis model in order to be called by decision service; performing knowledge iteration update and decision analysis by using decision management circulation framework; evaluating the curriculum group support by comprehensively using previous curriculum interface support evaluation, subsequent curriculum support evaluation, and curriculum examination evaluation. The curriculum group support evaluation method has a self-analysis decision capability and may high efficiently predict evaluation of support a curriculum group to graduation requirements.

title: EARTHQUAKE DETERMINATION DEVICE, SYSTEM, PROGRAM, AND METHOD CAPABLE OF EARTHQUAKE DETERMINATION BASED ON LEARNING
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an earthquake determination device which individually adopts influences from an environment around a position where vibration is detected, and thereby conducts earthquake determination with higher precision.SOLUTION: An earthquake determination device capable of acquiring earthquake determination information from a server includes: a vibration detection section for detecting vibration; information arithmetic means for generating a feature amount intended to determine an earthquake from data related to the detected vibration; device earthquake determination means for applying the feature amount as input and outputting an earthquake determination result using a determination function of machine learning with a teacher; device communication means for transmitting a query to the server about earthquake determination information corresponding to the earthquake determination result and receiving the earthquake determination information from the server; and teacher data management means for generating a teacher data set in which the received earthquake determination information is associated with the feature amount used to output the earthquake determination result when transmitting the query, and for teaching the device earthquake determination means by using the teacher data set. In addition, notification means for notifying an external part of the outputted earthquake determination result may be included.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 3

title: Industrial process control experimental device based on internet of things
applicants: SHENYANG NORTHEAST UNIV AUTOMATION CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention relates to an industrial process control experimental device based on the internet of things, and belongs to the experiment and teaching field of industrial automation and process control technologies. The industrial process control experimental device based on the internet of things comprises a controlled object unit, a field bus instrument unit, a field bus electrical unit, a wireless control unit and a computer main control unit, wherein the controlled object unit is composed of a first air blower, a second air blower, a first field bus electric adjusting valve, a second field bus electric adjusting valve, an air heater and a tee joint; the field bus electrical unit is composed of a first frequency converter, a second frequency converter, a first soft starter, a second soft starter, a first motor protector, a second motor protector, a first electrical switching device, a second electrical switching device and an air heater controller, and the first frequency converter and the second frequency converter are provided with a field bus communication module; the wireless control unit is composed of a controller, a DI/DO/AI/AO module and a wireless communication module; the field bus instrument unit is composed of a first field bus air flow meter, a second field bus air flow meter, a field bus air thermometer and a field bus air pressure meter; and the computer main control unit is a PLC/DCS provided with a field bus communication module and a wireless communication module.

title: Teaching method and mathematic model for assisting judges in judging civil and criminal cases
abstract_text: The invention discloses a teaching method and mathematic model for assisting judges in judging civil and criminal cases, and relates to a method for solving actual trial problems of a courthouse through a mode of constructing a mathematic model by use of function knowledge. The mathematic model [P=F(S)=f(S), S belongs to K], is obtained through a function fitting method by introducing mathematic symbols through abstract summarization of actual problems of trial cases, for the purpose of solving the actual problems of the trial cases, for instance, a reference sentence of a larceny case can be quantified by use of such a function expressional relation [P1=F(S1)=f(S1)=(S1-Q)/Z+L], and the trial practical problems of the courthouse are solved by use of the mathematic model, wherein S1 represents a theft amount, Q represents a sentence starting point amount, Z represents a theft amount increase, L represents a sentence starting point, f represents a corresponding relation, F represents a law clause, and P1 represents a quantification result. By use of such a method, a reference sentence judgment result of the larceny case can be obtained through four operations of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division, and the method can also be programmed into artificial intelligence judgment program application software for installation in a computer, such that intelligentization of case judgment is realized, and assistance is provided for the judges in judging the cases by use of high technologies.

title: USER-GUIDED TEACHING AN OBJECT OF A DEICTIC REFERENCE TO A MACHINE
abstract_text: A method and system for teaching an object of a deictic reference to a machine. A processor of the machine teaches the object of the deictic reference to the machine which results in the machine learning the object. The teaching includes: the processor finds an item in a region indicated by a physical pointing gesture, by the user, that points to the object; the processor shines a laser light on the item and in response, the processor receives a negative spoken indication from the user that the item shined on by the laser light is not the object; in response to the negative spoken indication from the user, the processor interacts with the user in an iterative procedure wherein the machine learns the object in a final iteration of the procedure. The processor stores the learned object in a storage repository.

title: RAILWAY VEHICLE STATE MONITORING DEVICE
abstract_text: [Problem] To provide a railway vehicle state monitoring device that is capable of performing determination easily without requiring much time and effort to adjust parameters for determining a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in a railway vehicle. [Solution] This railway vehicle state monitoring device 100 comprises: a detection device 1 that detects vehicle information represented by e.g. the wheel load of wheels 31 of a railway vehicle 3 traveling on a track; and a determination device 2 including a classifier 21 to which the detected vehicle information is input, and that outputs a vehicle state, such as the presence/absence of abnormalities in the railway vehicle. The classifier is created by employing machine learning such that, by employing, as teaching data, the vehicle information of a railway vehicle for which the vehicle state is known and said vehicle state, said known vehicle state is output when the vehicle information is input.

title: REVERSE-MULTIPLE CHOICE METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE ENGINEERING AND EXPERT SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION
abstract_text: A system and method of communication based on the Reverse Multiple-Choice Method of teaching and testing is disclosed where at least one communicant is a machine. The method is applicable for training a machine for knowledge engineering and artificial intelligence oriented applications, as well as for a trained machine to assist a human being engaged in the activity of teaching or testing.

title: 3D virtual teacher system having voice function and method thereof
abstract_text: The invention discloses a 3D virtual teacher system having a voice function and a method thereof, and relates to the digitalized teaching field and the artificial intelligence field. A 3D virtual teacher server (10), an Internet network (20), and a client terminal (30) are sequentially communicated. A user can open the system, and the system is used to log in the 3D virtual teacher server (10) by the Internet network (20). The method comprises 1, the intelligent voice automatic question-answering and 2, the virtual teacher emotion processing. Compared to the prior art, the virtual teacher having the 3D image and the emotion can attract the interests of the learners more, and the voice question-answering is more convenient, and the learning efficiency of the learners can be improved by the learning content recommendation.

title: Teaching data generating device, method, and program, and crowd state recognition device, method, and program
abstract_text: Provided is a teaching data generating device whereby it is possible to easily generate a large quantity of teaching data which is used in machine learning of a dictionary of an identifying device for identifying a crowd state. A person state determination unit (72) determines a person state of a crowd according to a plural person state control instruction which is instruction information of a person state which relates to a plurality of persons, and a specific person state control instruction which is instruction information of a state of an individual person among the plurality of persons. A crowd state image compositing unit (73) generates a crowd state image which is an image wherein a person image is composited which corresponds to the person state which the person state determination unit (72) has determined with respect to an image of a prescribed size which is obtained by a background extraction unit (71), and specifies a teaching level with respect to the crowd state image.

title: Ideological and political theory teaching of multi -media colleges and universities board
abstract_text: The utility model provides an ideological and political theory teaching of multi -media colleges and universities board, including casing, loudspeaker, liquid crystal display, USB interface, wireless input device, voice acquisition module, voice conversion module, GSMGPRS module, storage device, microcontroller and bluetooth module, liquid crystal display is installed to the centre of casing, install voice acquisition module, voice conversion module, GSMGPRS module, storage device, microcontroller and bluetooth module in the casing, voice acquisition module electrical property input connection voice conversion module, and voice conversion module electrical property input connection microcontroller, the equal two -way electrical property input connection microcontroller of GSMGPRS module, storage device and bluetooth module, microcontroller electrical property input connection loudspeaker and liquid crystal display. The utility model has the advantages of simple and reasonable structure, economical and practical, convenient to use can realize artificial intelligence ization, bring the convenience for teacher's use, also enable the student simultaneously and obtain more education resources.

title: Virtual simulation teaching application platform
abstract_text: The invention discloses a virtual simulation teaching application platform which comprises a teaching resource allocation and management module, a virtual simulation experiment operating module, an assessment and quality monitoring module, an information and educational management module, and an input/output interface module. The application platform disclosed by the invention refers to a virtual simulation teaching application system developed by virtue of technologies such as virtual reality, multimedia, artificial intelligence, network communication and computers, limitations of objective factors existing in current teaching such as high experiment cost, high consumption and existence of potential safety hazards can be overcome, and experiment teaching and skill training with advantages of low cost, low consumption and high safety can be developed; students are facilitated to rapidly acquire knowledge and master skills, learning interest of the students is aroused, interaction between teachers and students is promoted, and innovation and entrepreneurship capabilities of the students are improved; trans-disciplinary, cross-department and trans-regional openness, sharing and popularization of teaching resources are promoted; and moreover, dynamic update, high-efficiency operation and management of the teaching resources are promoted. The virtual simulation teaching application platform disclosed by the invention is popularized and applied in the fields of teaching, skill training, teaching resource allocation and management and the like.

title: Experimental device for towards virtual object selectivity control system
abstract_text: The utility model provides an experimental device for towards virtual object selectivity control system, it includes industrial computer (1), characterized by industrial computer (1) and PLC -CPU (3) link to each other, PLC -CPU respectively with regulator controlling part 1. (4), the regulator controlling part is (5) 2, PLC -DI module (9), PLC -DO module (10), the PLC -AI module is (14) 2, PLC -AI module 1. (16) links to each other, the regulator controlling part 1.
