(6) output links to each other with relay (12) normal close node, PLC_AO module 2. (7) output and relay (12) is normally opened the node and is linked to each other. The utility model discloses simple structure, the small investment, teaching effects is good.

title: Machine Learning Controller for Prize Dispensing Entertainment Machines
abstract_text: A system to rapidly set up new claw machines for different styles of prizes, while also providing an excellent player experience through dynamically changing claw machine behavior through machine learning algorithms. These systems can be readily installed on most any crane machine by replacing the controller card. The system is configured by means of a control wand physically connected to the controller. Teaching the machine about the prize is accomplished by physically inserting a sample prize into the grabber, and executed a command via control wand to tell the machine to learn. Once configured and taught the prize, the machine is autonomous, and will maintain its programmed profit margin throughout the prizes dispensed by learning player behavior and making adjustments after each play.

title: Experiment apparatus for virtual object selectivity control system
abstract_text: The invention discloses an experiment apparatus for a virtual object selectivity control system. The experiment apparatus comprises an industrial control computer (1), and is characterized in that the industrial control computer (1) is connected with a PLC-CPU (3), the PLC-CPU is respectively connected with a regulator control I (4), a regulator control II (5), a PLC-DI module (9), a PLC-DO module (10), a PLC-AI module II (14) and a PLC-AI module I (16), wherein the regulator control I (4) is connected with a PLC-AO module I (6), and the regulator control II (5) is connected with a PLC-AO module II (7); on one hand, the output end of the PLC-AO module I (6) is connected with the positive input end of a comparator (8), the output end of the PLC-AO module II (7) is connected with the negative input end of the comparator (8), and the output end of the comparator (8) is connected with the input point of the PLC-DI module (9); and on the other hand, the output end of the PLC-AO module I (6) is connected with the normally-closed node of a relay (12), and the output end of the PLC-AO module II (7) is connected with the normally-open node of the relay (12). The experiment apparatus provided by the invention is simple in structure, small in investment and good in teaching effect.

title: Man-machine interaction environment based data acquisition method for learning process
applicants: WUYISHAN DONGFANG QIANNENG SOFTWARE SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY CO LTD
abstract_text: The invention discloses a man-machine interaction environment based data acquisition method for a learning process. The method comprises: drawing a plurality of transparent vector layers, which are mutually mapped and progress in sequence, on an underlying learning situation interface medium to construct a knowledge structure; a student triggering cognitive hot spots of the transparent vector layers by operation to finish a cognitive operation, and acquiring a cognitive set sequence; and on the basis of the constructed knowledge structure, obtaining a cognitive structure of the student. According to the man-machine interaction environment based data acquisition method for the learning process, deep fusion of information technology and education is realized, so that on one hand, a novel man-machine learning mode is provided for the student, and on the other hand, the learning process of the student is recorded; and the method becomes a teaching assistant of a teacher, provides support for efficient learning and easy teaching, and facilitates automated, intelligentized and positive development of education and teaching.

title: SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE LEARNING SYSTEM AND SUPPORT VECTOR MACHINE LEARNING METHOD
abstract_text: [Problem] To make it possible for a label of a teaching signal to be reliably concealed when support vector machine learning is being performed. [Solution] An analysis executing device, which performs support vector machine learning, stores a set of learning data which serve as the target of the support vector machine learning and which include a characteristic vector and a label encrypted by means of an additive homomorphic encryption scheme, and subjects the encrypted learning data to an updating process by means of a gradient method employing an additive homomorphic addition algorithm.

title: Open robot training platform based on section bar is built
abstract_text: The utility model discloses an open robot training platform based on section bar is built belongs to education robotechnology field this training platform includes the frame, and the revolving stage is gone up, lower revolving stage, a drive arrangement, the 2nd drive arrangement, first side chain, second side chain, terminal actuating mechanism and work platform to the drive arrangement mount pad, the frame is put up by sharp aluminium alloy member and is constituted, and first side chain is by last revolving stage, and first master arm and first slave arm are formed, and the second side chain is by revolving stage down, and second master arm and second slave arm are formed, and terminal actuating mechanism is including carrying out the cradling piece and carrying out terminal mounting panel the utility model provides a training platform is very typical mechatronic system, has merged machinery, the electronics, and the computer software and hardware, control, advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and molding technique, this platform accords with the relevant demand that the teaching was used, can accomplish orbit planning, writes, picks etc. From the function of tonic chord, has good price / performance ratio, opening and scalability, the while can increase as required conveniently, subtracts the functional module and innovates

title: Open type robot training platform based on sectional material setting up
abstract_text: The invention discloses an open type robot training platform based on sectional material setting up and belongs to the technical field of education robots. The training platform comprises a machine frame, a driving device mounting base, an upper rotating table, a lower rotating table, a first driving device, a second driving device, a first branch chain, a second branch chain, a tail end executing mechanism and a working platform. The machine frame is formed by straight line aluminum profile rod pieces in a setting-up mode. The first branch chain comprises the upper rotating table, a first driving arm and a first driven arm. The second branch chain comprises a lower rotating table, a second driving arm and a second driven arm. The tail end executing mechanism comprises an executing support rod and an executing tail end mounting plate. The training platform is a typical mechatronics system, advanced technologies such as machinery, electronics, computer software and hardware, control, artificial intelligence and modeling are integrated, the platform meets the related requirements for teaching using, autonomous functions such as track planning, writing and grabbing can be completed, good cost performance, openness and expandability are achieved, and meanwhile function modules can be increased and decreased according to needs conveniently for innovation.

title: EXTRACTING DEMONSTRATIONS FROM IN-SITU VIDEO CONTENT
abstract_text: Embodiments disclosed herein include a method, a non-transitory computer-readable medium, and a system for generating video clips for teaching how to apply a tools in various application programs for editing documents. The method includes identifying one or more characteristic features of a video clip. The method also includes providing the one or more characteristic features to a trained machine learning analysis module. The method further includes evaluating the characteristic features to generate a clip rating. The method also includes determining whether to discard the video clip based on the clip rating.

title: Reverse multiple-choice method for knowledge engineering and expert system implementation
abstract_text: A system and method of communication based on the Reverse Multiple-Choice Method of teaching and testing is disclosed where at least one communicant is a machine. The method is applicable for training a machine for knowledge engineering and artificial intelligence oriented applications, as well as for a trained machine to assist a human being engaged in the activity of training, teaching or testing.

title: TEACHING DATA GENERATING DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM, AND CROWD STATE RECOGNITION DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: To provide a training data generating device capable of easily generating a large amount of training data used for machine-learning a dictionary of a discriminator for recognizing a crowd state. A person state determination unit 72 determines a person state of a crowd according to a people state control designation as designation information on a person state of people and an individual person state control designation as designation information on a state of an individual person in the people. A crowd state image synthesis unit 73 generates a crowd state image as an image in which a person image corresponding to the person state determined by the person state determination unit 72 is synthesized with an image at a predetermined size acquired by a background extraction unit 71, and specifies a training label for the crowd state image.

title: TEACHING DATA GENERATING DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM, AND CROWD STATE RECOGNITION DEVICE, METHOD, AND PROGRAM
abstract_text: Provided is a teaching data generating device whereby it is possible to easily generate a large quantity of teaching data which is used in machine learning of a dictionary of an identifying device for identifying a crowd state. A person state determination unit (72) determines a person state of a crowd according to a plural person state control instruction which is instruction information of a person state which relates to a plurality of persons, and a specific person state control instruction which is instruction information of a state of an individual person among the plurality of persons. A crowd state image compositing unit (73) generates a crowd state image which is an image wherein a person image is composited which corresponds to the person state which the person state determination unit (72) has determined with respect to an image of a prescribed size which is obtained by a background extraction unit (71), and specifies a teaching level with respect to the crowd state image.

title: Chinese recitation and dictation machine
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a Chinese recitation and dictation machine and belongs to the field of Chinese language and literature teaching equipment. The Chinese recitation and dictation machine comprises a housing and a display screen. The housing is connected with the display screen; the display screen is connected with a transparent glass plate; the transparent glass plate is connected with the housing; a scanner is arranged at the corresponding position under the display screen in the housing; the display screen is connected with a circuit board; the circuit board is connected with a central processor and a power switch; the scanner is connected with the central processor; and the power switch is connected with a battery slot. According to the Chinese recitation and dictation machine, learning content does not need to be downloaded each time, and the machine can be quickly used only by putting the content to be recited under the learner machine; and the Chinese recitation and dictation machine is reasonable and ingenious in design, easy to carry, and can motivate learning enthusiasm of learners through the right and wrong answers each time, and enhance the learning interest.

title: Tailoring model intelligent interactive teaching toy
abstract_text: The invention discloses a tailoring model intelligent interactive teaching toy, and belongs to the fields of environmental protection, Internet of Things, artificial intelligence, education and toys. The toy mainly comprises a tailorable plane surface substrate printed with patterns, and an intelligent interaction electronic module. Along with the micro revolution and We-media age, a product no longer has independency. A paper-cutting model, having the problems such as simplex function, few teaching contents, and interaction deficiency of finished products, if combined with the intelligent interaction electronic module, can provide a product which has edutainment, high interactivity, and better hope, and focuses on user experience; moreover, as the same intelligent interaction electronic module can be shared with multiple cutting models, the toy has the characteristics of low cost, economy and environmental protection, sustainable circulating production, and the like; during a manufacturing process, the user can promote self manipulative ability, learn new knowledge, develop intellect, or cooperates with others in a multi-user team for enhancing emotion, and the like; a finished product is dynamic and intelligent and can be interacted with persons, and takes people education as the ground base as well as has significant social and economical importance.

title: PRINTER, AND CONTROL METHOD THEREOF
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a printer capable of simply generating a print of a regularly decorated shape.SOLUTION: A printer includes a guide print part for printing a tape T having a cutoff guide G for teaching a cutoff position for cutting the tape T into a regularly decorated shape. A decorated shape label DL decorated with a regular pattern is obtained by cutting the tape T along the cutoff guide G printed on the tape T. This makes it possible to use a conventionally available tape T without producing a special form tape T anew, obtaining a decorated shape label DL in a shape having the regularly decorated shape simply and inexpensively.

title: REVERSE MULTIPLE-CHOICE METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE ENGINEERING AND EXPERT SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION
abstract_text: A system and method of communication based on the Reverse Multiple-Choice Method of teaching and testing is disclosed where at least one communicant is a machine. The method is applicable for training a machine for knowledge engineering and artificial intelligence oriented applications, as well as for a trained machine to assist a human being engaged in the activity of training, teaching or testing.

title: Electromagnetic connector for electronic device
abstract_text: An electrical plug (510) and receptacle (550) relying on magnetic force from an electromagnet to maintain contact are disclosed. The plug and receptacle can be used as part of a power adapter for connecting an electronic device (70), such as a laptop computer, to a power supply. The plug includes electrical contacts (520), which are preferably biased toward corresponding contacts (560) on the receptacle. The plug and receptacle each have a magnetic element (570, 530, 532). The magnetic element on one of the plug or receptacle can be a magnet or ferromagnetic material. The magnetic element on the other of the plug or receptacle is an electromagnet. When the plug and receptacle are brought into proximity, the magnetic attraction between the electromagnet magnet and its complement, whether another magnet or a ferromagnetic material, maintains the contacts in an electrically conductive relationship.

title: REVERSE MULTIPLE-CHOICE METHOD FOR KNOWLEDGE ENGINEERING AND EXPERT SYSTEM IMPLEMENTATION
abstract_text: A system and method of communication based on the Reverse Multiple-Choice Method of teaching and testing is disclosed where at least one communicant is a machine. The method is applicable for training a machine for knowledge engineering and artificial intelligence oriented applications, as well as for a trained machine to assist a human being engaged in the activity of teaching or testing.

title: English phonetic symbol mouth-shape training device
abstract_text: The utility model relates to an English phonetic symbol mouth-shape training device which comprises a diamond support, dental laminas, labial bars and a telescopic pole. The diamond support is formed by four supporting poles which are in shaft connection in sequence in a head-tail mode. The dental laminas are two in number, and are respectively fixed on the upper shaft and the lower shaft of the diamond support. A return spring is arranged between the two dental laminas. The labial bars are two in number, and are respectively fixed on the left shaft and the right shaft of the diamond support through the telescopic pole. According to the English phonetic symbol mouth-shape training device, the labial bars are indirectly driven to move through the occlusion tooth plates, the mouth-shape needed in the pronunciation /i/ in the phonetic symbol /ai/ is achieved, and the problems that the mouth-shape needed in the pronunciation /i/ is not accurate, and the pronunciation is not accurate are resolved. Learning interest of students is increased, and learning efficiency is improved through the auxiliary phonetic symbol teaching tool.

title: Interactive semi-supervised machine learning for classification
abstract_text: The invention is a system and method for teaching and using a computer to apply a genetic algorithm in order to generate rules for classifying data objects, such as documents. By permitting periodic human intervention during and/or after the initial training stage, the invention improves upon existing methods that merely automate data classification. Using an initial training set of data objects, the system develops a set of rules to apply on future data objects. To improve efficacy over time, rules may be periodically amended by a user during the initial training stage or after rules have been generated. In this fashion, classification rules may evolve, thereby improving the accuracy and speed of the classification process. Classification rules are also presented in a human-readable format, thereby improving the transparency of the classification process and facilitating the interaction between the system and the administrator.

title: Lighting and power supply and distribution system teaching practice training apparatus based on LonWorks technique
applicants: JIANGSU CROSS DOMAIN INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY DEV CO LTD
abstract_text: Provided is a lighting and power supply and distribution system teaching practice training apparatus based on LonWorks technique, comprising a net orifice plate (10) characterized by being provided with illuminance sensors (1), a gate inhibition card reader (2), human body detectors (3), manually-operated switches (4), lamps (5), a clock module (6), an AI/AO (analog input / analog output) module (7) and a DI/DO (digital input / digital output) module (8); a multifunctional electric power monitoring instrument (9) and the illuminance sensors (1) are in connection with the AI/AO module (7); the gate inhibition card reader (2), the human body detectors (3) and the manually-operated switches (4) are all in connection with the DI/DO module (8); the lamps (5) are in connection with the AI/AO module (7) or the DI/DO module (8); the clock module (6), the AI/AO module (7), the DI/DO module (8) and the multifunctional electric power monitoring instrument (9) are all in connection with a lighting and power supply and distribution host computer (11) through the LonWorks network. The apparatus of the utility model has a simple structure, can completely match with the present teaching program and building real status and is in favor of raising teaching and leaning levels.

title: DIGITAL ELECTRONIC TUTORING SYSTEM
abstract_text: This invention relates to an interactive, multi-sensory digital electronic tutoring system. The invention finds particular application as an electronic learning and teaching device that is configured as a digital or software “book”, preferably in a rugged slate form factor, that allows a user, normally a child, to activate electronic images, sounds and other outputs by selecting indicia displayed on a touch screen or the like and that includes programmable logic adapted to monitor and direct the child's teaching and learning experience. Central to the system is a software-derived teaching agent, presented in the form of a digital “tutor” that is integrated in the programmed logic (software) of the system in the form of an artificial intelligence (AI) system that provides a knowledge-driven, adaptive teaching and learning system that uses programming and internally- and externally derived data to adapt to the child user in a predetermined manner and that provides the child with a personalised learning process best suited to the particular child. The AI system is preferably constituted by a Self-Tuning Adaptive Control (STAC) system.

title: System for Training
abstract_text: The present invention provides for a teaching module having a training scenario database, an editor component, a student component and an artificial intelligence component. The training scenario database has a plurality of video clips, audio files and associated artificial intelligence metadata to simulate a person's personality and mood. The editor component facilitates the creation of a training scenario involving a simulated person. The student component facilitates the interaction with the training scenario by a user. The artificial intelligence component alter the simulated person's personality and mood based on the interaction by the user to provide realistic responses allowing the user to learn how to respond to the simulated person to achieve a desired result. The teaching can be located in a single computer or over a network of computers.

title: METHOD FOR DETERMINING SHAPE CHANGES OF A WORKPIECE
abstract_text: The invention relates to a method for determining shape changes of a workpiece made of steel or a steel alloy due to forming, wherein a varnish is applied to the workpiece, the workpiece is formed, and then a visual shape change analysis is performed by measuring the applied varnish. The problem of providing a method for determining shape changes of a workpiece made of steel or a steel alloy, said method also being suitable for analyzing the shape change of a workpiece after hot forming, is solved according to the present invention in that before the forming of the workpiece a varnish having an AI proportion of more than 30 wt% is applied to the workpiece, the workpiece is heated to a hot forming temperature for forming, and the workpiece is cooled after or during the forming.

title: Dynamic demonstration model for sound being received by human ear
abstract_text: A dynamic demonstration model for sound being received by a human ear relates to a teaching aid, which is characterized in that a thin plastic bowl is used as an auricle; a plastic film is covered on the top of the bowl to serve as the tympanic membrane of the simulated ear; a plastic tube is connected to the circular hole in the bottom of the plastic bowl; a pin connected on the plastic tube is connecting with a lead; the other end of the lead is connected with the center part of the plastic film covered on the top of the bowl; and a screw is provided on the contact point between the LED lead and the pin. The experiment of simulating sound being received by a human ear can be carried out by adjusting the distance between the screw and the pin and clapping toward the top of the bowl until the LED gives off light. The dynamic demonstration model allows students analyzing the transmission process of sound; gradually understanding the function of every part of an ear, thereby significantly arousing students' enthusiasm for learning and leaving deep learning impression.

title: EDUCATIVE PLATFORM ORIENTATED TO A SMART CONTROL SYSTEM THROUGH COLLABORATIVE ROBOTIC TASKS.
abstract_text: Developed is an educative platform based on the implementation of algorithms of artificial intelligence, smart control, optimization and neuronal networks applied to collaborative robots capable of: a) Processing signals from the environment. b) Generating learning patters. c) Copy and automate decision reflecting an intelligent behaviour. e) Performing actions such as labyrinth solutions, crossing or evasion of static or dynamic obstacles and optimization of paths with a defined destiny. f) Establishing communication with the community members. g) Developing a learning platform for transmitting the knowledge. h) Transmitting the knowledge to the community members. i) Teaching a determined information through the exemplification of concepts.

title: Spoken Chinese stress automatic detection method
abstract_text: The invention relates to a spoken Chinese stress automatic detection method. In the method, the voice recognition technology is used to combine the reading voice of a speaker with the text content which is read or read after the tape to perform automatic segmentation and alignment, the voice signal processing technology is combined with the basic theory of linguistics to extract the characteristic parameters of the segmented voice sections and then the machine learning method is used to classify the extracted characteristic parameters to obtain the detection and diagnostic message of spoken Chinese stressed syllables and unstressed syllables of the speaker. The invention can automatically and effectively detect whether the speaker stresses the right syllables and can be used in a Putonghua automatic test and evaluation system so as to benefit that students can better master the stressed syllables and ensure that the expressed meaning is clearer. In a Putonghua auxiliary teaching software, the stress detection and diagnosis functions are added so as to benefit that the Putonghua of the speaker can become more native, thus achieving the aim of efficient communication.

title: DIGITAL ELECTRONIC TUTORING SYSTEM
abstract_text: This invention relates to an interactive, multi-sensory digital electronic tutoring system. The invention finds particular application as an electronic learning and teaching device that is configured as a digital or software "book", preferably in a rugged slate form factor, that allows a user, normally a child, to activate electronic images, sounds and other outputs by selecting indicia displayed on a touch screen or the like and that includes programmable logic adapted to monitor and direct the child's teaching and learning experience. Central to the system is a software-derived teaching agent, presented in the form of a digital "tutor" that is integrated in the programmed logic (software) of the system in the form of an artificial intelligence (Al) system that provides a knowledge-driven, adaptive teaching and learning system that uses programming and internally- and externally derived data to adapt to the child user in a predetermined manner and that provides the child with a personalised learning process best suited to the particular child. The Al system is preferably constituted by a Self-Tuning Adaptive Control (STAC) system.

title: Test device and method for simulating field electric energy measurement
abstract_text: The present invention provides a test device and method for simulating field electric energy measurement.The device for simulating field electric energy measurement is a novel simulating device designed according to the state electric energy meter field standard and DL/T448-2000, includes a real load portion and a virtual load portion in principle.The real load portion is composed of current voltage transformer, second wiring thereof, and electric energy meter, is a single bus double loop, can simulate various real wirings in the field, thus ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the electric energy measurement, and avoiding bringing hidden trouble to the safe operation of the power system.The virtual load is composed of three-phase program control test power supply and voltage, and current wiring switch box, has the characteristics of stability, strong function, easy use and the like, can be used by power supply department, metering department, school and training center for explaining practical phenomena such as false wiring of three-phase three-wire, three-phase four-wire active and reactive electric power meters to students, making the teaching closer to the practical work.

title: Language arts game
abstract_text: An interactive live game, computer program game, television game, television game show, Internet game and Internet game show for all ages. The game in all forms is based on language arts, testing and teaching the players' knowledge in the use of written and oral language. All aspects of language arts, including but not limited to punctuation, spelling and grammar, are determined, found or corrected by individual teams. The game may be utilized in other educational fields, such as science or mathematics, or may be utilized for example in concepts of artificial intelligence, voice recognition and the like.

title: Test device for simulating on-site electric energy metering
abstract_text: The utility model discloses a device for simulating a field electric energy measuring test which is a novel simulating device designed according to the national standard relevant to electric energy showing field and the requirements of DL/T448-2000. The novel simulating device is divided into a real load part and a dummy load part on principle; the real load part consists of a current/voltage mutual inductor and a secondary connection line thereof as well as an electric energy meter; moreover, the real load part has a single bus and double loops and can simulate various real connection lines on the field, which not only ensures the accuracy and reliability for measuring the electric energy, but also avoids bringing hidden troubles to the safe running of a power system. The dummy load part consists of a three-phase cell-type test power and a voltage/current connection line switching box, has the characteristics of good stability, strong function, convenient use, and the like, can carry out explanation on the real phenomena like three-phase three-line as well as three-phase four-line active/reactive mistaken connection of the electric energy meter to the students in power supply departments, measuring parts, schools and training centers, thus leading the teaching to be closer to the real working.

title: Interactive rewards-based pedagogical system using an engine of artificial intelligence
abstract_text: A system is disclosed that provides an interactive rewards-based method that uses a protocol for instructional response in order to provide a motivating, individualized educational and entertaining experience. The system utilizes an interface through a computer. The system offers the user (a.k.a. student) simulated environments that represent different realities and an opportunity to solve interesting problems and learning puzzles. When the user inputs a response this calls forth a system response using the built-in Intelligent Mentor, thereby teaching the user. The iterative response process provides the user opportunities to discovery before proceeding to a higher level of the subject material. The pedagogical system uses neural nets (engine of artificial intelligence) that drive responses that are synchronized to typographical and graphical illustrations and/or pictorial illustrations used to simulate reality and to provide dynamic interactions. Stages of progression are integrated into the pedagogical system in order to provide users with individually paced experiences determined by the level of difficulty and rate of performance per time period. Users' interaction involves real-time decision-making and fusion of the educational material. It involves programs in computer medium that create a rewards-based system to provide a motivating educational and/or entertainment environment including natural attractions that further motivate continuous involvement in the learning process. Encoded lessons are enabled in the system that provide feedback on aspects of user performance such as mission management, mathematical solutions, recognition, matching, and utilizing data to solve problems and puzzles. The user receives credits each time he/she successfully completes a section. Credits are additive and may be exchanged for material rewards by using this invention of the "virtual mall" for the computer network. The rewards redemption system includes a server in communication with the users computer mechanism to form a network that may include the Internet. The credits may be saved or can be exchanged for material reward certificates. If redeemed, the student player is dispensed a specific verifiable reward acknowledgement. The computer system can also provide for competition games played for a rivalry of credits by a number of users. Reward information, such as reward costs in terms of specific credit redemption is automatically determined by the system. While this invention has been described in terms of several embodiments, it is contemplated that alterations, variations and equivalents thereof will become apparent to those skilled in the art of pedagogy upon a reading of the specification and study of the drawings. For example, many types of problems/solution sets and puzzles can be provided for use with the disclosed rewards based system, and the computer tool can be utilized for classroom teaching as well. Thus variations can be used. It is noted that the rewards-based system of redemption can be implemented on a single computer connected to other computers, with or without use of the Internet. However, the preferred embodiment illustrated here envisions that the invention will be used in a broad network such as the Internet. The provision of rewards can be achieved by redemption certificates or electronically. It is therefore intended that the claims include all such alterations, variations, and equivalents as fall within the spirit and scope of the present invention. This rewards-based pedagogical system offering lessons within simulated environments and providing for various reward redemptions represents advancement in pedagogical systems for computer-assisted learning and paradigms of progressive skill-development.

title: Method and apparatus of simulating and stimulating human speech and teaching humans how to talk
abstract_text: This invention comprises a method and apparatus for combining electronic voice recognition circuits, electronic voice synthesis circuits, electronic computational artificial intelligence algorithms and computer programs in an interactive learning process, so as to simulate the experience of learning to talk, speak words, phrases, and sentences, and other types of human speech. The invention may be embodied in a number of specific forms, ranging from voice and audio systems and experiences operating over communications systems or as entertainment and educational experiences operating on personal computers, video game systems, portable computing machines, and the like. The invention may also be embodied in self-contained, portable electronic toys and games, including, but necessarily limited to, dolls, plush animals, creatures or character figures and sculptures.

title: Method and apparatus for assessing psychiatric or physical disorders
abstract_text: A method of assessing the psychological or physiological state by analyzing language cues captured from a patient. The language cues may be semantic cues (speech or written text) or visual cues (expression or body language). Key features are extracted from the language cues and compiled into a data file which is submitted to one or more pre-taught machine learning algorithms. The output of the machine learning algorithms are combined to determine the psychological or physiological state of the patient. The method of teaching the machine learning algorithms is also described. In the preferred form there are three machine learning algorithms including a support vector machine, a decision tree learning algorithm and a neural network.

title: Handwriting teaching data selection system
abstract_text: Various technologies and techniques are disclosed that generate a teaching data set for use by a handwriting recognizer. Ink input is received from various ink sources, such as implicit field data, scripted untruthed ink, scripted truth ink, and/or ink from at least one other language in the same script as the target language for the recognizer. The ink input is used with various machine learning methods and/or other algorithmic methods to generate a teaching ink data set. Examples of the various machine learning methods include a character and/or word n-gram distribution leveling method, an allograph method, a subject diversity method, and a print and cursive data selection method. The teaching ink data is used by a handwriting trainer to produce the handwriting recognizer for the target language.

title: Predictive artificial intelligence and pedagogical agent modeling in the cognitive imprinting of knowledge and skill domains
abstract_text: System and methods for predicting and dynamically adapting the most appropriate content and teaching strategies that aid individual student learning. System and methods are based on a cognitive model that integrates new information with what the student already knows. A program of study is predicted by the unique cognitive needs of the individual student correlated with aggregated student data history using an Artificial Intelligence Engine (AI Engine). Said system and methods then dynamically adapt the initial cognitive model to the student's ongoing progress using personalized software Agents. Said system and methods include a computer network that incorporates a server-side AI Engine and a collection of client-side software Agents embodied as animated characters. The program connects new information to prior knowledge and then strengthens these connections through dedicated learning Activities, customized to the student, to ensure that effective, and real, learning occurs.

title: E-Critter game for teaching personal values and financial responsibility to a child
abstract_text: An Internet-based game for teaching personal values and financial responsibility to a child includes interactive game events, an adventure story activity with selectable story elements, a scoring system awarding a virtual collectible creature having artificial intelligence characteristics and characteristics mimicking a financial instrument, and indicia of account information.

title: СПОСОБ СИНТЕЗА СОМООБУЧАЮЩЕЙСЯ СИСТЕМЫ ИЗВЛЕЧЕНИЯ ЗНАНИЙ ИЗ ТЕКСТОВЫХ ДОКУМЕНТОВ ДЛЯ ПОИСКОВЫХ СИСТЕМ
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DIAGNOSIS AND CLINICAL TEST SELECTION USING CASE BASED MACHINE LEARNING INFERENCE
abstract_text: A system and a method for diagnosis and clinical test selection using a case based machine learning inference are provided to offer information about accurate diagnosis by using an NNDT(Neural Network Decision Tree) teaching machine and a random forest teaching machine at the same time. A system for diagnosis and clinical test selection using a case based machine learning inference comprises a patient case database(200), an input device(100) and a machine learning classification device(400) constituted with one or more machine learning device(410). A machine learning trainer(300) determines important test items of each diseases, and stores it in a test items database(600). A diagnostor(500) including a test item selector(520) derives the main test item selection result of each diseases. An output device(700) outputs the test item selection result and a disease determination.

title: CANVAS FOR VEGETABLE DYED PICTURE AND METHOD FOR CREATING VEGETABLE DYED PICTURE
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a canvas for a vegetable dyed picture, on which a dyed picture can be easily drawn by any person in a simple operation as transferred as per the shape and color of vegetable leaves or flowers and as a teaching material in a culture class, and a method for creating a vegetable dyed picture. ;SOLUTION: The canvas for a vegetable dyed picture comprises: a canvas main body for a dyed picture on which the vegetable dyed picture can be drawn, e.g. paper having an outstanding water absorbency, or having an outstanding water absorbency and an fine unevenness formed on the surface, a cloth, a board, a gypsum board or an unglazed earthen ware; and a pH value setting solution of either of a DL malic acid with which the canvas main body for a vegetable dyed picture is impregnated so that the pH value is 1.0 to 5.0, a sodium DL malate, a phytic acid or a citric acid or a mixture of not less than two of these chemicals. ;COPYRIGHT: (C)2005,JPO&NCIPI

title: SYSTEM, PROGRAM, AND TEACHING MATERIAL FOR SUPPORTING GUIDANCE
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a guidance support system which encrypts information on rectification of errors inputted correspondingly to a learner to send it to a guidance support system, and enables a study instructor to obtain useful support information for the guidance. ;SOLUTION: The guidance support system 1 consists of: a study support server 4 which is connected to the Internet N and provides support information relating to the study guidance; and a plurality of instructor side terminals which are used by the study instructor T and receives the support information. The information AI, AI', AI'' obtained by encrypting the information on the rectification of errors are sent from the instructor side terminals 3, and the guidance support server 4 receives and decrypts this into the information on the rectification of errors. Then, on the basis of the decrypted information on the rectification of errors, the support information including the first statistic information FSI such as a national average mark about scholastic ability evaluation problems SQ and learners' comments for study presented to the learners M are sent from the guidance support server 4 to the instructor side terminals 3. ;COPYRIGHT: (C)2004,JPO

title: METHOD AND DEVICE FOR SUPPORTING LEARNING
abstract_text: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide teaching materials suited to a user. ;SOLUTION: A metadata storage part 103 stores the metadata of concepts, the metadata of relation between concepts, the metadata of teaching materials, user's metadata, and the metadata of questions. An understanding measuring part 104 measures user's understanding of concepts by using a placement test. The user's understanding of the concepts is stored in the user's metadata. A teaching material retrieving part 101 retrieves teaching materials on the basis of the user's understanding of the concepts and learning strategy (wide learning, extended learning, deep learning). A teaching material sorting part 102 sorts the teaching materials retrieved by the retrieving part 101 on a prescribed rule and displays the sorted teaching materials to the user. ;COPYRIGHT: (C)2004,JPO

title: KNOWLEDGE ACQUIRING SYSTEM USING INPUT OF NATURAL LANGUAGE
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To form a knowledge base with input of a natural language and without using an AI language like LISP, etc., by extracting the knowledge out of the input natural language and acquiring the knowledge in the mode of a hierarchical frame. CONSTITUTION:The knowledge is supplied from a display device 1 in a natural language with key input. In case the key input is not through yet, it is decided whether the knowledge of the natural language supplied by a user can be extracted or not by reference to a teaching rule 3. A knowledge extracting part 2 extracts the knowledge out of the input natural language by reference to the rule 3. Then a frame production part 4 turns the extracted knowledge into a hierarchical frame and stores this frame into a knowledge base 5 in an addition/correction mode. Thus it is possible to form the base 5 with use of the natural language and without using an AI language like LISP, etc., for coding.

title: ROBOT CONTROLLER
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To enable gentle acceleration and deceleration while generating a continuous and smooth speed pattern by generating a signal for speed control based on composite travel pulse command generated by a travel pulse command generating means and travel pulse feedback. CONSTITUTION:Composite travel pulse command, hi=d(i+j)+ai [where (i) is a counter value of integer from 1 to (n-j) and (j) is a parameter set value of integer from 0 to (n-1)] which is obtained by adding travel pulse command at the time of deceleration di and travel pulse command air at the time of acceleration which are stored at the time of teaching is generated by a travel pulse command generating means 1 at the time of mode which makes a robot pass a passing point which is taught in advance. Next, a signal for speed control is generated by a speed control signal generating means 2 based on the composite travel pulse command hi and travel pulse feedback to drive a servo motor M by a servo motor drive means 3. As a consequence, it is possible to eliminate rapid acceleration and deceleration due to discontinuous speed pattern.

title: PRODUCTION OF ROBOT OPERATION PROGRAM
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To extremely improve the coincidence between the track of a robot and its target one in a non-positioning control state. CONSTITUTION:The dividing points Ai are decided to divide a target robot track Qd (t) into many minute sections, and a teaching point generation intervenient point Bj is extracted out of these points Ai in response to the curvature. Each point Bj is extacted under the condition that the space between these points does not exceed a teaching point non-setting allowable section length index Lmax and every time the directional change of tangent vector <gi> exceeds a teaching point setting density index N at each of points Ai. Then a teaching point Pj is set at a position that is decided when the point BJ is shifted toward the center of the curvature according to the curvature of the track Qd (t) at the position of the point BJ. Then an interpolation system, a moving speed and a positioning rate are designated and a robot operation program is produced for execution of a trial reproduction operation. Meanwhile an actual robot track Qo (t) is recorded and the difference between both tracks Qo (t) and Qd (t) is evaluated. Then the trial operation is repeated while the parameter is changed to decide a shift extent toward the center of the curvature until the satisfactory result of evaluation is obtained.

title: PLAYYBACK TYPE NC MACHINE TOOL
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To realize not only an automatic teaching but a high-accuracy play back working, by installing a device which detects both the working state and the tool position of the machine tool at all times and then converts them into the NC command information. CONSTITUTION:A constant supervisory is given via the machine operation detecting device 24 to both the NC control unit control signal Cn and the main shaft start/ stop signal Cs for operation of the machine. And the signal change is transmitted in the form of the machine operation signal Ct to the NC command information production part TCH of the computer 18 for control. The present position display pulse signal Pp which is proportional to the extent of table shift due to the servo motor 20 is delivered from the NC control device 16. Then the present position counter 28 integrates the numbers of signals Pp and then transmits the present position information Pc to TCH. Based on these input signals, the TCH produces the teaching NC command information Nt and then decide according to the level of the teaching effective signal Ce whether the information Nt should be stored to the memory device 30. Then the device 16 decodes the information Nt after deletion out of the device 30 and through the command information deletion part DL, and then drives the motor 20. Thus an automatic reproduction is possible for the operation during the teaching.

title: ROBOT LOCUS CONTROL METHOD
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To improve both the stability and the follow-up properties of the servo control by calculating a real servo interpolating position from a primray equation. CONSTITUTION:The interpolating position is calculated in two steps between the teaching positions of a robot axis, and the robot axis is reproduced and controlled based on this calculated interpolating position. The interpolating position of the 2nd step is equal to a real servo interpolating position Pi' set at the present time point by averaging the past real servo interpolating positions Pi-1, P1-2... and the present logical servo interpolating position Pi by a simple equation including a specific weight function ai defined as a coefficient as shown in an equation I. The position Pi is set by dividing the interpolating position of the 1st step by a servo interpolating cycle on a segment connecting linearly both interpolating positions. Thus the position Pi' can be calculated in a simple equation without using a high degree curve. Then the calculating time is shortened owing to reduction of the degree of an arithmetic formula and the interpolating frequency is increased. As a result, the control performance is improved for the locus of a robot.

title: ROBOT CONTROLLER
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To provide a robot controller capable of optimally controlling acceleration so as to utilize the performance of a motor. CONSTITUTION:As to an interval ranging from a teaching point P1 to a teaching point P2, Inertia sI in a start point (teaching point P1) and another inertia eI in an end point (teaching point P2) are found out in relation to the first axis (a) to the sixth axis (f) (S81). In order to control a motor on the basis of the mean value of inertia in time of acceleration and deceleration, inertia aI (inertia at the start point side) in a position of 1/4 from the start point P1 and inertia dI (the start point inertia) in a position of 1/4 from the end point P2 are found out in regard to each axis (S82). Acceleration aD in time of acceleration is found out of the start point side inertia al and another acceleration dD in time of deceleration from the end point side inertia, respectively (S83). Control over respective axes is carried out by those of acceleration aD in time of acceleration and deceleration dD in time of deceleration found out.

PURPOSE:To quickly generate an automatic mounting machine control program by inputting and storing making references of mount parts, parts shafts, and area addresses correspond to one another by a machine only for teaching. CONSTITUTION:Areas are set like a matrix on a printed board where references N1 to N8 of mount parts are added in mount positions of mount parts. Coordinates of prescribed points Ai to Ei in areas, to which mount positions of mount parts belong, on the printed board are stored in a storage means by the machine only for teaching, and they are read out, and a driving means is controlled based on them, and areas on the printed board corresponding to references are displayed on a fixed display means. An X-Y table is moved seeing display on the fixed display means, and accurate coordinates of mount positions of mount parts are stored in the storage means. Thus, an automatic mounting machine control program is quickly generated.

title: CONTROLLER FOR ARC INTERPOLATION POSTURE OF ROBOT
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To control the posture of a tool against an optional arc plane in the fixed or continuous properties by performing the arithmetic of arc interpolation through a posture control coordinate system set on an arc locus. CONSTITUTION:The posture control coordinate systems Xj', Yj' and Zj' where the Xj' (j=1, 2, 3) axis, a Yj' axis and a Zj' are decided in the normal line direction of an arc locus, the tangent line direction and the direction vertical to the Xj' and Yj' planes respectively are set the teaching points P1, P2 and P3 of the arc locus respectively. Here the posture vectors of a tool are defined as a1, a2 and a3 at the teaching points P1-P3 which are shown in the robot coordinate system X0Y0Z0 fixed to a robot main body are expressed in the posture control coordinate systems Xj', Yj' and Zj'. Thus, posture vectors a1', a2' and a3' are defined. Then, the vectors a1'-a3' are divided on a fan-shaped plane decided by said two types of vectors as well as on a fan-shaped plane decided by vectors a1' and -a2' and vectors a2' and -a3'. Thus a vector ai' is obtained at an optional time point. Furthermore the vector ai' is converted into a posture vector ai in the system X0Y0Z0 and each axis of the robot 1 is controlled based on the vector ai.

title: TEACHING TOOL AND INTELLIGENCE TOY SHOWING SEVERAL PERMUTATIONS AND THEIR COMPOSITION
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To obtain a teaching tool for learning regarding several permutations and their composition and use it even for a game. CONSTITUTION:For objects A1, A2...An on which permutations operate, respective places are provided on a panel and fixed. While X1, X2...Xn are regarded as (n) different characters or colors, any of X1, X2...Xn can electrically be displayed at a place of each Ai, and one of them illuminates at the place of each Ai. As for the permutations f1, f2...fs on the objects A1, A2...An on which the permutations operate, a button B(fj) showing operation is pressed and the character or color illuminating at each Ai is made to illuminate at fj(Ai).

title: TEACHING DEVICE OF PLANE DATA OF ROBOT
abstract_text: PURPOSE:To attain ease of operation by designating the direction and slope of a parallel plane cuttng the surface to be machined and teaching a pitch interval of cut and a representing point on the curved face from a teaching section to decrease number of teaching points. CONSTITUTION:A plane data teaching device consists of a robot main body 1, an operation control section 2 and teaching section 3 and grinder 5 provided to an arm 4 of the robot main body 1 applies grinding to the work on a positioner 6. In the teaching operation, the teaching section 3 drives the main body 1 to designate the cutting direction of the surface S to be machined. The wrist attitude of the arm 4 is taught at a boundary point Pi of a cross line between the cutting plane GAMMAi and the surface S to be machine, the arm is driven under the restricting condition that the cutting point of the grinder 5 being a working point of the wrist is placed always on the cut face GAMMAi so as to teach approximate points Ai-Qi of the cross line. At the end of machining for the entire curved face, approximate point Ai+1-Qi+1 of the cross line at the cutting of the next plane GAMMAi+1 are taught. The robot main body 1 is driven by the interpolation operation at the running.

title: Collected biological information used for controlling motion of robot teaching programing
abstract_text: The utility model relates to a collected biological information used for controlling motion of robot teaching programming, which adopts a sensor to collect the biologic motion information of men or animals, such as the pressure information for finger tips, joint motion information and ocular motion information; the motion of the robot or the frame data served as the teach programming or the motion programming is controlled in real time; the four compound control forms of real-time control, teach programming control, artificial intelligence control, monitoring control are adopted, the utility model supports the transmission control mode of remote network, and the complexity of programming is reduced; the multitudinous repetition work programming control and single-piece small batch work programming control of the robot are solved through a simple mode, and the risk of the runaway of the program, which is caused by complete autonomous artificial intelligence program is avoided. The robot is not only applicable to the multitudinous repeatability work of production lines, etc., but also is applicable to the small repeatability work, such as, special environment work, strong magnetic field weld, households, sight control mouse beacon, non-contact control, etc.

title: Artificial serum for experiment and teaching
abstract_text: The invention relates to experiment specimen used in teaching, concretely man-made serum used in medical academy biochemistry major university biology major experiment teaching. It is used beef peptone as the base liquid, added man-made serum to form single or mixing man-made serum. The content of the man-made serum is 0.5-2g/dL. The invention can prepare random need content man-make serum. This instance in preparing protein, G, TG, Chol, ALT, K+, Na+, Cl-, Urea, and Vit B1 experiment teaching man-made serum. The invention has the advantages of simple preparation, low cost, and no pollution.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ASSESSING PSYCHIATRIC OR PHYSICAL DISORDERS
abstract_text: A method of assessing the psychological or physiological state by analyzing language cues captured from a patient. The language cues may be semantic cues (speech or written text) or visual cues (expression or body language). Key features are extracted from the language cues and compiled into a data file which is submitted to one or more pre-taught machine learning algorithms. The output of the machine learning algorithms are combined to determine the psychological or physiological state of the patient. The method of teaching the machine learning algorithms is also described. In the preferred form there are three machine learning algorithms including a support vector machine, a decision tree learning algorithm and a neural network.
